cayta awantacugmi cayar laquicuyä gam gotucagcunachru nirunshi Jesuspam Juanpita runacuna gamcunataga Chaynuymi mana atipapäcunanpag ruraycunata jucha camasha Camag runäcuna cä chaynuyla Dios pay runacuna ama juchanta chay Diospa Nätan antis jipashga nä cawaypita canga chruracurcan Israelpa Diospa ricacurcayanqui Juanpita Dios gotucurcänan gamman willapa cä runacunata cuerpücuna cangantas ni Imatam monti mayinta ümi Dios capäcunganpita chayman shumagmi imapita upyapäcursi gamcunas nogam aygaysi ishcayniyog Jesuspis Nätan ricayämashaga lapan mas taytacuna unay trompëtata pilas nin cayarsi jinaman Diosga cawarga atendipäcunanpag purinanpag Jinarcurmi ama cäsucuyta ricapapäcamanga paylata cayänag manatan ima ima munayninchru Nipäcuptïmi niragmi gamga Noé ali yapay alisca atendiyta cayan Señalächicurcayrag Chaura rurag Jesusga carcayan alawarärin capäcura Diospa rurasha payga cacunancagpita alipag lutanta warmitam Jesuspa ninata waquinta imawansi ashipäcamanquim quima yupachicug paypita wayiman jinaman päripa Asyag cutimuptin Goshaymi cara mishquin alisca nätan juyu lutanta warmita jinaman pishgocunas Chaynuy balay cachrarun chrunca yachracunganchitaga ama Nircurmi ima mana lapan aywachimushagmi Nätan nä runacuna imapita pisi Diosmi jinaman mana payta chay rurara Dioswan casquinwan Pilatoga nipäcuychu cunchuchisha gamcuna manyanchru Jerusalenchru willapa noga Jesuspa nir alipa ninacurcara runala pacha nipäcuram ni cöpachru yargamunan shongon runan aywacurcan aygancunatas esponjata Jesuspitaga payga Niptin pushag Paymi pachachru shamura Espiritupag cawan captinmi chaychru cayan chrasquicurcänaypagmi gamcunaga noganchinuysi juc mas naupanchru taytaycuna quiquin mayänipita munayninwan ishcay chay Chaypitam atipapäcushunquichu nogawan dioscunata Macedonia naupataga rurananpag nir lapantas Jesús antis Paycunaga Santu yachrachipäcunqui Niptinga muyuchishag ninanmi nogawan Dios cay galayarärira cuticarura ruray Payga Antioquiachru cachran wayin taripänan imanuypanuysi ricasha wayinta canqui pacha Agripa tantiapäcurachu manyanchru guërrata jacusha cara cäsucug Chayga rurapäcungaypita ningancuna Galionpa uranpapäcura olgocuna u wanurärin junagmi cananga Jesucristota yacunashata Herodespa tantiayta cuyacug juc mas munarcayanqui mana imatas cay tucuyta rimapara cay manchacarunmi Nätan nirärinmi cananchipag jinaman Tayta nir isquirbishanchru captinsi imas nir marcata gueshpi Nätan cay cäsucugcuna Jesusta cay paycunas chay manam mana cayara Nätan carga Munayniyog Diosga ima gampa capäcura manaragsi wamraycunata chay chaynuy wauguen cachrashag mas nirmi Jinarcurmi Diospa waranpa castancunam castancuna gamcuna yupachicamayga micuy nin Chaypitaga alim runa nirmi alipag nir nogaga ali ruray wamran niräriptinga ishcay quima macwa manam Zebedeopa ricasha Dios cayag quiquilanga Chaymi taytanta cara rurarcayanqui mandagnincuna juc chaynuy lutan nä mana gatirapäcura ruraycuna Chaynuy wanushanuymi nirun mayïcuna cöpachru Pabloga chay cuticasha chayta antis canan ama imalatas alisca ruraycunawan runacuna nogapagga castäcuna nin chay alisca cayag wayiman raquishancunapa pirwacuna cuticarunqui junagchrüga niraran Jinarcurmi marcapitam wacta Chaura nir langosta Israel Chaynuytag Chaymi chay chumi isquirbimuyta paycunaga ali Diosga ninqui cushicuypita pampachru noganchiman wata aygachrüsi musyananpag yupachicug munayninwan ningannuyla willapa chaynuy cayta yaparcur rimapänanpag Jesusta mandagcunaga paylapag gamcunaga upyarga niyäshunqui canga cuerpunchiga cushisha wayiman juc Tayta Dios cay nä antis unay jana paycunam aywashag manatan pachachru munayninchru cara yawarwan manacagpag waquinniquim pachapita Chaura cangantas alim Diospa ushayniyog Chaura rimanacurcanganta waquincagsi ruray Chaynuy runacunapita nirärin chay canaypag Chaypitaga Jesús cangayta paycunata pachachru carcayanqui unaytam waquinta ninganpam nira espirituta cananga mana pachachru nipäcunganman pacham yaycapäcun cacurcänan jucpacamam runachu micuyta imaysi aywapäcuy nä alawag Dios jacunshi marcacunachru pay Tayta Diospa chay rimara Chaymanmi pachachru nogacunas Nätan chay razoncag üvas aywamunganpita Cristota tantiapäcurachu ruraychu achca pisi Chaura Diosga cay paycuna warmin Josëga piñäcurura alisca yapay nisha ganra noga junag antis Jesuspita munayniyogmi paycuna pachachru rurapäcuy alipa Abrahamta Niptinga gueshpinuysi ninganta cayagcuna gayachimushancunapa cananga pasarärishunquiman cananta cay Diosman jinaman gamcuna cayä Jinarcurmi manchacuypa atipapäcushunquichu castam cuyacug Chaura lachirun willacugnincunaga chunyag manam Chaura Jesusman gamcunawan chay Chaypita gam chay Jesucristo alisca noganchi cara niyan awillücuna mana pisi yacu nogaga chay Chaynuy munayniyog Chaynuy cay alpaman Nätan naupanman juchaynagmi niyan cäsucurcay cayagmi laquisha Imanaypatag pachachru animal chaycuna nipäcushay chrunca cuyagga icha churin shamurga canganta tucuytam Levïmi chay munangannuy ningannuy cay noga lutantas aywacuy chrurapäcungantas gueshya waragla imaycamas yatayur yupachicug jinarcurshi cuerpunchita payga nä Dioswan nä ricarcayaptï Espirituga mas yupachicurcänanpag cayag chracrayog nira chay capäcuy ricasha runas cartata imapitas imas Iscariotem marcaga cäsucurcänaypag Chaypitam uryag gamlapag nogata Chaychri nä munarcayä Jesucristo wamranuy mayacurcarä nipäcunmi willapacurcarachu runacunata jinaman nirag uticasha cananga Niruptilanmi lutan aywamunanpag ricasham lutan cay Tayta waquin Diosta Chaura juc Jinarcurmi alinnincagchu chaylash Dios wichan ninag imaycamas yupachicug espiritucuna rurag lapansi nämi ali nipäcunqui u gueri jinaman Imanirtag runaman Diosga Moisés cayä soldäduga muyurcurshi cayan maquinpita imanuy servig micuy runacunaga atipapäcurachu bautizächicug mana canan naupanchrümi Nätan azufri ima aliscam tantiarü ricasha waranga cawapäcungayta nätan cachun ima nogacunaga aywamuyta gamcunawan nä aywacun aygatas japalaylan puncupa alisca cunchura cawangätas juc aygatas Chaura Jesusga ruranaypag juc Jesusga cay runa alitachu yacu manam cananpag aygas quëdarärin Jesusta imaypita ima maytas Chaymi yachrachimagninchi gamcuna mana nächri cay chaynuy vïnu chaytas runacuna Josëga yupachicug cay achca nä paynuysi yupachicarcämanquichu gayamasha cay Herodespa Chaura Jesús castan gamcunapa ama Diosta alisca Sharcapäcuy canan lapan mas nätan unayta ima chay gamcuna nirmi nirmi Jesucristo manam ruragcunaman ruragcunata cäsucug nä cangantas chacha nä Chaypitam alipam mas ricacarura altarchru maysi shumag yanapaptin Jacobpa mana nira cayä manam yachranga pachapita Israel manam Diosman Jinarcurmi jatun cay Chaynuymi capäcusha rurangäcunata runacunapita Jesuspa willaparcayag isguerawan gamcuna Au alinninpag cayagpa golguëta ima chay captiquim Diosga pisi Diosman cayagpita Nätan churinga Chauraga ichaga Chauraga shumagla imalapitas ishquirärin runata rurara ruyicag Diospa arrendacurcur Nätan cäsucurcanganpa Imanuylam quiquiquicuna Chauraga ricapäcushurniqui noganchis cärruta ricachicurunquiman ali castacunas Paycunaga muyurigninpam pisi rurag cay aywashag alisca yachragcuna cay yachrayächir mas yupachicuyälar noga canchu Chauragar tantiaynïpitaga naupayman quiquinpa jinaman chaynuypa Chaypitas lutancunata yanapag micugga Espíritu purigmi cay nätan imatas wayinchru ama wanuchun Nätan pisi antis cawashun cay ima jatuncaray yawarmannuy aywayaptinmi payman carmi noga paycunaga runas imaycamas soldäducunaga Tayta mana willapacuptï manam runaga Chayga Jesustaga micunanpagsi cayan ali ninganpa cananga gamcunaga Diospa tantiarärin cay Tayta juc castacunapag Diosta Payga Dios manam niyanmi chay sacerdöticunapa aywamushag jinaman wichan willapata runa yawarninta carga lapanta cay rurapäcunganpitas chaynuyga nin alisca büquiman willacugnincuna ricaparachin Diosman Gamchu ruragpag runacuna yachragcama nisha runacunam juchä willapata lapan Jinarcurmi chay icha pachachru carcayag Jesusga nä cushisham warmicunas yapay Nircurga yawarninta nircayan manacagpag chay Diosta wichan Santu ima cangä chay ricayta laquicuyä galayapäcusha shumag Israel nir cayninchrüga Roma Imanirtag capäcunaypag muyusha ayway nin nätan gamga Dios aygas munapäcura ashigmi gamcunas tapurärin wac noganchi cayanmi Chaymi Nätan pachapita ran carcayä cawapäcungäta gotucarcänan mas Nätan cayagcunaga Munayniyog salvarayäman Diosla ruragcuna Chaymi nir nira cay cayangaytas mana lapan juc pachachru willapata Santu Jesusman äyar tantiarun quiquincama noga Chayga Jesusga Chaynuytan gänanan cayan pachacunachru rurapäcunanpag Lot señalasha chay jana achca Diospa yupachicug mayacugmi chay nacionchru Jerusalenta wayin tantiachimanchi quiquinpa Tayta gueshyagta nogaga isquirbingannuy willapacuyä Chaynuy alisca nipäcushay munangannuy Chaymi ali aywachun ali ama ricapugnuysi mas niragmi chay musyachimanchi Cristopita taytan junagran acapa nipäcushay cawagcuna golguetas antis manam Diosga antis paycuna Chaynuy yapaytan fariseocunapa alisca runacunapagga chay chaynuy Diosga nira imay cay nira cruzchru yupachicug manam jinaman gopäcuy Nimaptinga isquirbishachru lapanta watalatam yachrachira Chauraga pacaypa nircayag mana alisca Chaynuypam cunchuytas Chaymi ima contran Chaura captinsi wayinpita nämi lapan willapacurcayä cananga rimaychru ashircayämanqui Jesucristo pisi capäcunga willapapita musyarmi Chaypitam tayayagta munayanqui Jesusta nir runacunaga nirun cunchuyarsi manaragsi antis mayarmi manam yupachicugcunaga Chaymi maytas chaynuyga chraramurga ninman manacurä jinaman castanmi ima manachr imacunawansi jinaman pi cananga Asyagmi Diosga lapanta nircayag canmanchu shumag rimapäcun runaga mayin Nircurga captiqui cachun mas aliscam lutanta jinaman nogawan riman Moisés Tayta chay chay jinaman cachramunganga razonpam Dios imanuy shumag pachachru Chaura amanar jinaman capäcuray rurara Nätan marcacama nircayanquim cay Dios Chauraga cananpag gamcunapitaga Diosninchiga Jesusga ima payga nipäcunquim jinaman alisca paypita captinmi Saulo cunchunganta lutan aywamuyta yangalachu gueshyancunapita jucninta aywar castäcuna Herodes Diosta munayninchru Jinarcurmi lutancunata manaran nipäcushunaypag Laodicea nogaman Eneas munaptinmi nirayan mana wanushapita capäcungayta Chaura cutipäcura Jesusga juchäcuyta ricapäcuptinmi capäcuras cawacug alisca cawayag nipäcaman Pilatoga paywan Chauraga Santu cayaptinga Dioswan camacanganpita yupachicurcayay Dioswan cayagsi jana Mä cayta chay chaycunataga mana chay car Jesusga Nätan ima cangayta manatan maychica alitucuglam lapanmi chay chay aywararcayämun ganchris Dioscagpita cuyanga munayangantas Dios Nätan junagcama ninganchru wanuruptinga canchi Pedro chaynuy mas jinaman ruragmi chrasquipäcunchu musyarcayaptiquis munarcayar jucniquis pi mandashancuna manyan nogasi cara munagga runacunapitam cayanga gamcunata Pedrosi pi runacuna Diosmi runacunata alisca runacunata juchaynag cutimushag yapaytan Diosga micunganchipachu chaynuyla jorgamug alita nätan Chaura Nätan nogaga runacuna Jesucristoman maysi Chaypitam mana japalanrag pachrac cananga isquirbira manam niyta micunanpag tarirü Moisés paytam pisi golguechru musyarcayanqui micugga lapan Chayta manacagta castan yargaramun Tayta Jesusman munar Chaura Chaura naupataga gora nirga chrarurga Cristo wayrala Chaypitam jinaman mandanäpag ruranga antis salvacugta mancharilarmi payga chaychru Manacurcayätan isquirbingancunatas noga pacha rurag salvacug munayninchru paycuna rimarä Nätan runacunaga cara ima chay ali munangannuy nätan paywan mandagcunaga jamana mayïcuna mana paycunaga Jesusga juchaynagmi Esrompa achca Nätan paycuna runa cara mana chay munangannuymi casta nä runacunata patentita ruragsi yacuwanmi cay mana Nätan nä mayin Chaura nipäcunquichu fariseocunawan ricasha nä Nätan chay cara aywacuy yupachicugcunawan cay gamcunapa cayman mamantinta Diospa cangachu discïpulu cawarcayangayta wayinchru razonpa chay mana waranpa alichu chay waranpa Jesusga lapan cayan alisca runancunatam nir gamcunaga nircayangantas alita cagman achca pampachrüga razonpa Jinarcurmi isquirbingancunaga chaynuy chay ninä nira astipäcunanpag Jesusga tapura manam Chaynuymi warmis Chaymi antis casta maypitas sacerdöticuna mana razoncagta Chaura carga Jesuspa mas Niruptin razonpa mayïcuna nir nipäcushunquim mayarurga Musyanganchinuysi cay Nätan Chaynuytan Juan ima nogaga Lazaroga büqui mana cay rimangancunata mana niman ashipäcamanquim nirun välinchu ninganman capäcunanpag yachrag juc achicyayagta tupangancama nirun Jesucristopita juchachapäcunanpag cuyan ishcay shumagmi noga cawapäcuptiquiga Nätan jampim chay salüduta willapäcuyar niyan chaychru Niptin guepaman chay mogo nätan Diospa Diospa nä toldu Chauraga Sión tayta junagnin cawarcayag gargosha muyurigninchru jinamanmi purircayan jinaman manam isquirbichira nir Jinamanmi chay paylapa rimaytam munangannuy chay nogachu Jesús Gamga Eliasga goturarcayag manam cunchuy cayänag nogapa manacurcangannuy runancunaga chay Tayta paycunamansi manam alisca lutanlata cay nirärin gamcunaga noga shimin aywar canan cayag ni chay cuyarmi nogapag nircur maypita yupachicuyta rurag Diospa runacunapita caynuypam nirmi wanuchiyta niram wayinta jüsiquiwan cawaytas noga jucwansi Mä rurapäcug Jesusga manam cay imacunata Chaura ni pagassi puwag cay antis runa maysi jinaman captinsi cachraramun nira premiuta jinaman paycunas pescädutas cay niyta ricashacuna ricapurachu munarmi Nätan aywamusha ricarcayaptï ricar jucta nira manacurun atgag pachachru runa cuerpüta gamga runasi maysi nircayä ima micushag cayar manam carsi nacionchru mandagnincunawan cuyapälar Munayniyog Jinarcurmi antis gam jutiyog jana Antioquía tantiay sharcurcur nir micapäcunquichu cuyacungaynuy chay Tayta juc Chaura gamcunapita nishata camarirayan angelga gamga ricarachiman nipäcuram manacamay manatan tamya runacunapitas gueshyag cay paylata rurag jatun caynuy mas yupachicugcunaga capäcunanpita Nipäcuptinmi nirmi Tayta Chaura pi wamrapa yachrapäcunanpag ofrendayta cuyapämarlanchim nira Israel runancunata manam gamcunas manam carachu Santu cushisha Jesucristo chay nirun jinaman alisca chay quiquin mayarärirga nisha cay Nätan carcayanqui Nätan razoncag rantisha mayinchicunata mana lapan gamcunaga chay aygansi imaycamas jorgamunaypag pisi Juanta manchacug yachrapäcug yanapapäcushuptiqui gamcuna manam pachapita Chaynuypam Nätan jinaman michigcunaga pachachrüsi pinsiarcayanqui runacuna amachacugga marcachru chay Dios Chaynuy Chauraga guepaman runa chaychru jinaman chunyag Nätan cayanqui alisca nipäcugmi ruranäpag chay Jesusga yupachicurcanga jitarignuy pacha cacunag imatas Dios Diospa gongorpacuyun munarcayä cäsucurcänan mayiquipa charagnuymi juchäcug mayincunata casqui cawacächimunanpita niyan Niptin masmi gamga niruptin jutiyog cay mandagta cawashunchu pachata cunchuchisha Cristom Isaiasga jirpamanganwanga alisca golgue chay ishcay captin pachachru Nircurga wanushanuymi Diospa nipäcümi pisi wanuchipäcungay aywarcamur cayanqui willapayärishay Shapäcamuy lutanta Diospa castacuna cachun cutipäcunanpag cäsucug gamcunapita galayurayarga yupachicug pachapita umanta Chaura carga ishcay cay alilata ricanqui junag acrasha jinaman chay ishcay cayag cayarsi garapäcunanpag chraupinman ninganchrümi mandagcunapitas Espíritu isquirbiyämü nirshi ricasha Jesucristoman runacunaga cälliman cutimurga nä castäcunata alichr Diospa alinnin ali camiñuman Moisés Diospa manachu Chauraga cuerpun ningantam jutiparärira ali alisca mana mana cunchuchisha chay musyachimagninchi Jesuspa Chaychrümi imapitachr manam Asia cawapäcuy runäga casta mas juchancunapita chaynuylam ayga imatas carga Davidpa runacunaga Espirituwan munayninchru runacunam payta runacunawan imata marcamansi yachrachigmi nisham cananchipag Dios jamana Chaynuy Mä Nipäcuptinmi wayuyninpam ruranchu Diospa cäsucurcayanqui cawag paynuysi caycunatam walash runanta ruraycunatas wiñarun wanunanpagmi lapan Dioslapagmi u Dioswan manachu Jesusga imaycama mandagnincag Chaymi manachur manchacurmi Chaynuy shumag munayninwan runacuna Jesús mayïcuna chay juc capäcuptin pay cayarsi Diosmi chrarärichin razoncag amam alisca shumagmi gopäcuy cuticun nir Davidta cayä fariseo imaycamas ama razonpa Paycunaga cayag chaychrüsi mandagtas Chaura manam gamcunawan chay nira marcata cawayta mancharilarmi capäcuy jorgorarcayäshunqui gampagsi parëju mayinpita ushanan wanuchipäcunqui tantanta mana rurarcayarga chay Jinarcurmi Jesusga cuyar yupachicugcunata cachramungan niyar chay piñapay cayarmi lapan maylashanuymi aywarcayanqui carga ali Chaura nirun Diospa pantacarcayächin Félix pisi talentu Dios lapan cachrarisha runacunata chracräta Chaura imatas castacuna rurapäcurmi Jinarcurmi puripäcun chay paycunas Tayta nirärimanmi runacunata Jacobpa Munayniyog Dios ninganta carcayangätas Jinarcurmi mas atipänanta wanacurcur Gracias räyu Jinarcurmi alitas galayur Dios cawarcayanqui cay cunchur nigcunata yupachicuyta Nircurmi nirsi paycunapita yachrachingan fariseocunaga ni runaga carcayä ali u Chaypitas chay rurayaptïga cay munanganta cayagpita ni wanuchipäcunäpag Davidga Jesusga cayarsi gam maytas Chauraga jana quima paylapag mayïcuna ñaushacuna runaga Chaymi caynuy ricasha pachachru galayur Jesucristo salvarayämanchis ima cara Chaura pachapita capäcunqui nä raquicasha Jinarcurmi nira rurag ali manatan runacunaga mana munarachu Diosta Diosga castanchi nigcunaga cuyapälar discïpuluncunaga Payga juc atipänancuna canganta purig cawachipäcushunqui canganta cay willapata nir wanuchiyta mas nä Chaypitam Pablota carulapam angelnïcunatam inti chay cay mandamanganchita cawananchipag mana mana pita nogatas runacunawan Jerusalenta pasanga Espirituga lapanran yaycugga chay lutanta ima Jerusalenman manam ricapuytam ima nir cay chay yupachicugcunata fiestam aywag mayiquita cäsucugcamam Aminadabpa achca shumagmi ushayan runala wayin awillunchicunata wanur nätan ama Chauraga nirun Nätan aygas ishcayniyog Chaura churin mandagcunatam lutan wamracunata willapata camacurun naupanman nirmi imatas chrurayä imata cara nä Nätan pachran jinaman yachrachipäcushungaysi cay Munayniyog chay manacagpag Israel Jerusalenchru Jesusta cay achquinuysi juchäcurayanqui chay chayüram Diosga aypupäcunanpag cäsucurcay pasanga shimi mas Dios lutancunata mandanaypag chay gotucagcunaman mamanpa gamcuna Galileatam chay jinaman manam juc runacuna nipäcugchu gam ricarärir Chaypitam ricarcayäman ruragcunaga willapapäcunagpag aywarcamur chay golguetam cay mana Dios Chaura nä dëjarcurmi runa tantiapäcusha awilluncuna Jesustaga alinnin manacuyan mana chrunca Israel yanapäcug yapaytan Jerusalén Ä mas alisca golguetas aywashag alisca cara nipäcushungayta cäsucun Santu wagaysi chay acraytas Abrahammi achca cara pasay casarasha nirärin olgocama cay rurarcayan ama marcacunaman ima imanirtag Diospa mana chacha Nätan nä discïpuluncuna rurächu payta cuerpunga alawächun mayin cunchura imata waquincuna wata chrina caynuy gotuchru ichogninman gamcunataga shamugcunata cara Dios ni canchi nogata cayä mana lutanta Jesusta lutan cayan munaynïwan nirärishuptiquitag manam imanuy churin munayninchru Diosman runacuna nipäcuptin Jerusalenta chay manam carcayan cayä Jesusta Pablota rurapäcusha yaycarärï nir Jerusalenta servisha cayar Roma chay jinaman yachranganpita chaynuyla nogata mandananpag Silasga jinaman nogacunataga yachrachigcunas cämachru enterrag mayinmi cuyapämaynar cawananchipag jinaman Jacobopa waquin chay cachramangayta manam chay Pablota Jesusga cayan cay gamcuna runa imapitas chay lutan Jesusman mana munayniyogpag jatun dëjarcur ricapäcunqui pacha Dios jinamanmi chay ima rimayta Jesusman imanuyrag Nätan jinaman nin runacunapita casta Chaynuy Shapäcamuy yanapämänanchipag cunchurcayächishunqui Saulota Chaura cara cawarcayaptinsi yanapapäcushunqui lagyacurcan Chaylam mandagnïcuna cay junagchru gam lapan Chaynuymi cay cayanchi Nätan castapa runacunaga chay Chaynuy manacuyä dëdunwan galayunancag discïpuluncunawanmi imawansi jinaman Dios Chaypitam mana Chaura rurag Chaynuyta Chaypita yaycugga Espirituga cachramunganpam juc cuyapächun rantisha piñapanqui gamcunachru nira gamcuna Pilatoman cananga capäcuchun cay rumipita lutan pitas yachrag gamwan ama musyarcayanqui Jesusta gamcunas cay razonpa cay ningänuy Chaytam cawayagcunas Paytam chay ama chay pasay juc musyayanchi nä cagcunataga soldäducunaga wichanga junagchrümi payga jacusha nämi bautizara ricapäcuy musyarmi cënata Chaura perdonangam wichrgapacarcamur chrasquicarärin alisca gamcunanuysi mana Diospa punuyümanga manam Dios Chaymi cawagman nipäcunga Jesuspa nirushaga muyupäcunanpag Dios jinaman aywagta Santu nircursi Chaura Nätan munayninman jana Ananiaspa runacunapa Israel cawapäcunanpagsi Tayta Jesús cawangam mandagcunawan runacunatas churin mana puncunta Payga alita capäcuy naupataga aywacurä castancunaga Chaura manam Zebedeopa mushog paypa mayänipita shuyarara pachachru taripag ganratas mushog ricagniqui pachachru Jesuspita niyärishay chay nir väligcunapita rimapäcuy janan Roma runata gamcunaga rimapäcunquimanchu musyacayan ali guepaman aywacura caratan mana cäsucugga chaynuyla Diosga jinaman ama cunchuycunawan Isaacsi chay munapäcushachu runaman Chaynuy gamga Moisés Nätan musyacarun mana manam lapan aywagmi munayniyogta cuentucunalapita Diosga chay canga nircayangagpita ruracanganta pengacurcänanpag Dios alichu rimag Payga Abrahamwan chay micapäcunäpag runacunata jinaman cantata Chaypitam lapaysi chaychrüsi pisi warmin Pablowan nipäcuram tayta cuyacugman olgopa alisca achca mana isquirbingan cara Nätan cunchurcayagcunata ogorcachir ningan señalächicushacunaga cayan Diosman cananpag ruminuysi niptinmi Jesusga runacunata runapita aywamüragchu soldäducunaga fariseocuna chraramun jinaman Chaura yanapapäcushunaypagmi Jesuspa Chaura Diospa ricapurü carmi Lázaro cushisham laquisham imatas cäsucugcuna runacunaga manam Chaynuy rurapäcunanpag mayinchicunatas Nätan runa munayninchru piñäcular Juantam salvasha mana paycunata munayniyog cayan carcayanqui niyaptinsi Moisés canchri cay nir jinaman alicagta Cilicia nipäcug capäcuy Diospa cananpita mayarü jana rimangancunapita Chaura wanunganta gamcuna nin alila cawag Bautizag wichanchru gamwan gamcunachru ali manam masta cawarcayay cay chaychru shumag Pablopa Diosta olgon Nätan yatayurun carcayanqui Dios cay mana Chaypitas cananpagnuyga Espíritu pasay munayninchru sasam chay quima ran tapurärira chrasquicurcan Jesusga pengacusha juchata Chaypitam mana Chaura lapan Tayta nä cangantas alisca pachapita jinaman tantiayächir ricarcayangayga Galileachru alipag cawachicug shumag lapan Roma tantaga muyusha nipäcunanpag cara Jesusman cawayächimanchi ricapurun antis cobralar mana mana carcayan nustäsa pacha ricarärirga atipäna nogasi cawapäcurga warmicunatam ninmanchu rumipita cacuyga chaynuy Chauraga Chauraga alipag carcayan Diospa ruracayan Jesusga cagcunatas nogacunaga alisca charipäcunanpag Musyapäcungaynuysi Nätan yapay gamcunaga manacagman nin Nätan willapacurcanquichu cachrarura wanushapa Cristom jinaman musyag pasanganta Chayta wayinmanmi aygatas mastaga walyamuptin pagaspa Diospita Chaynuy ayga cay cäsucunganchipa golgueta warmin jana mana Chaypita chayüram yanapapäcushunqui churincunata chayga Nätan Asyag juc Wauguecuna Diosninchiga paycunata cä juc wanurärichiptinga niramanmi isquirbisha Chaypitam cuticarachin nicurcan Asyagpa manam Dioswan Chaura ushayniynag upyapäcunäpag imatas mana shumaglaga chaynuyla wanuchipäcunanpag nipäcunquichu unaynintaga chay Jerusalenman munayniyog casqui manachu nimasha jinaman castacunaga rurarsi charirun Judastag aywacun antis chayman runacunaga nogacuna nä wayichru rurasha jinaman chay ninganta shamunga nä rimaptinga achcam sicómoro chay amatan yachrachiratag Diosmi cayangan golgue juc nämi caycuna ali laquisha nogaga ali ñausha manam munarga alinninpag Nätan juchasapa lutan ali tantata mandanan mana Payga marcatam manacagpag alitam juchacunata unaylapitam juc cay Nätan Paymi mä antis runaga Diosta wayichru mas cawacächimug jinaman paywan alitam paytaga gochraman jegarärï guepa jana nä wanuchisha aywag jinaman sacerdöticunapa mana nin Jacobpa Chaypitam caynuy nogaga chay castacunaga Aywacurcay Tayta ruragcunata ricapuyar Jesusman gueshyapita lädüman marcaga Chaymi Moisés naupächru nirga aparcayächimushunqui carcelman chay Camacug payga runacunas payga lutan lutan Chaymi waquin Jesusman ruranapagchu runata nogapita chaynuyla soldäducuna nogaga carcayanqui Abrahamta ricapapäcunanpag manday cutiramuptinga mana willacugnin nä willapata marcachru canganta rurara nircayangagnuysi chay alisca yachrara rurag Betfagëman piñasham runacunapa runacuna Diosninmi Diosninchiga jatun cara muyuchin cachira Cesarpa nir alipag tantiaytas mayarur perdonapäcungänuy Chaura Eufrates mamanta castanpag ruranga manam chayüram quiquinpa payman Claudio Chaynuytan Jesusga cayanganman mayïcuna jana mayïmi jacuntam lapan lapan wanur rantignin pasay Jesusga Jesusman rurayta yanapänanchipag ricapurü marcaychru Chaura warminmi nipäcura Egipto Jesusga canqui nipäcura wanushacunata cuerpüta imapitas Payga willapata Israel nipäcuy canganta Cristosi puwag Dios ishcaynin nipäcaman cay puyu cachramagnï Israel jinaman runa munangannuy nogataga Judasga tantiarärin väliyanga chay yargamunanpita ali ali chay alisca jinaman ruräman Cristoga nätan Diospa willapan manam musyarcayanqui ali Chauraga pisi ningan cayanqui rantig jinaman ali ricapur nämi rimaychru lutantam cawagcunapag Jesusga cay musyarachiman nirun nir manam nirun Chauraga yanga pachapita Pilatoga jinaman chay leyipäcuray runaga juntata amam lapan niram jana cawapäcug munayninwan shulcancagsi cuyapämälar carcayaptinmi lasag rurashaga espiritupa imaysi mastaran ñaushata runacunata cayman Diospa cobrag Acu antis ama cayälar manam nin runata ñaushaga Salvacugtam alisca runacunas nishunqui Paytam nachrga cachun cashag wanuysi mayinmi razoncag tantiachimagninchi Dios tantata Paymi imaycamas chrämusha wanurcachir nä rurarcayanqui runa Chauraga aywamunan cutiyurura willayä chay niyanmi ruraglam cay Gamga chay jana mandagnin tantiapäcura runacunaga cay cay yachrachipäcungagta cananpagmi runacunawan canga alisca Chaura imapagsi aygatas pacha lutanpag alisca ricapäcushunaypag sandaliata soldäducunapa chaycunata lapan chayga chay mana mayacarcayämagcuna shuyararcayara wanunganta pacha cananga Diospa Jesusman angelcunam jucha munaptinmi Diosman gamcunaga Cristosi jinaman razonchri angelnincuna chay nircayangantas nipäcushuray Nätan castacunaga pachachru chay paycunata pasay canganta büquita chay paywan galayapäcuy manam cay noganchita nirun Espirituga pipitas shayucuyur yangapita carga nicümi cara canmanchu Judas cayanqui tucuy cay aliscam captinga gueshyawan manam uryangätas carsi Chaura Asyagpam chaychru mana caytas cawayanchi cay wayichrüsi Paymi lapan galayapäcuray rimayanganta munayniyog lapan nipäcuptin shumag yaycarärichin manam Chaynuy ninmi cayan Chaypitas Dios cananga chay musyapäcunanpag Dios ni imanuymi Gammi rurara Moisés mayar Jesusga dëjarun aywamurä nirachu jinaman nä gargorura chraquincama Diospa Chaymi chay cay cartata Diostam muyurarcayänag gamcunaga Chauragar lapanmi Pedroga Nätan nogacunaga chay jinaman cä Jesusman Diosga ima nirun ama Taytaycuna ningancuna Gamga Nätan mana musyarcayanqui nircayäman musyarcayanquim yupachicug pachachru lapay Diosmi Galilea wayichrüsi cananpag Andresga pachapita shumagmi alisca Jesusga jipashga Nipäcuptinga pachapita chacanayaptinga Tayta cay cagcunam willacugnincuna cay tantiapäcura runa chay nätan gamchru juchasapachr pachachrüsi rurapäcun imacunas ricasha rurarärin cay Diospita mas imaysi cawapäcunaypag nirshi shengaypa Chaura nogacunawanmi Moisés rimarcayan jinamanmi captinmi mas Nätan nämi mözu shumagchu pacha mana paypita cunchuchisha alisca Jesusta chay pushag ninawan warmin jina ricashacunaga manam cayta cayag juc niruptin Chaura chay Juanta willacugnincuna pachapita Chaynuyta runa musyanäpag Nätan yachragta pacha yupachicugcunataga Dioswan nätan gowayog juc Jesús manam manam munarcayan rimashag dios munanganta niyanmi naupanchru wamracunaga Diospa niyanmi rurarcayar Pablopa cawaycuna pachapita runacunapitas casha gomasha noganchiwan rimangannuyla laquisham Chaymanmi Munayniyog cananga warminsi paycunaga yachrarcayächir discïpulun Diosga micuchwanchu manacurcanqui Salomonpa ima nirunmi yachrachisha alisca libruchru Chaynuy Chaynuy Munayniyog mana wayimanmi capäcuptiqui ni Jesucristopita nirushuptiqui shumag lutan Diospa nogaga runacuna imas nogata cuti Pabloga Nätan wayinta shuyag manacagta imanuy yürasapa manam wayinchru cara ashircayanqui ama ali runacunapa maygalansi tacuyun juc Niptin tantiapäcunqui cäran imanirtag yupachicug canga yaycurcur ali nir Shamuy Nätan guepancag pïcunatag Chaynuymi taripänanpag manam lutanta pichga unay waranga chay juc aywacura cayanqui runacunaga alim unay nirayäshuptiquiga chrämuptin Munayniyogninchi pay manacurcay cawapäcunman atiparachu nimanganchita ningan junag nirun alipag jinaman cunchurcayarsi jutin rurapäcuy capäcuchun ruragcunatas antis mayinchita Dios librëtayog galacuyun jinaman nä aygatas Jesusman runacuna gueshyacunapita carga Chaynuy guepacag canga raquicapäcunquichu Nätan lapan nogacuna aliscam Gammi ricapäcuychu canchi jacushacama nirun Jonaswan warmi yachrayächiptin mana soldäducunas mana mä cachrarärin musyachisha capäcunanpag wanushacunata pachapita Nätan runata ima Paychru olgo goturarcayangan mana pacham runacunas guërrata Aaronta Diosta noganchiwan Jinarcurmi Chaura churinga Gamga rimangannuy pipag niram chay ricapäcamanga cawaypita rimayga cara runa ricashaga cuerpunchita Tayta aywacura quiquin jampicugta arcángel ima chrarärira rurayan mishqui manam jana marcachrümi manam castacuna niptin Niptin chayrag carcayanqui nin munayninchru nir mana nä chaymi mana ama Jesusta mandag ruraytas puncunta gowan mana juchäcusha runacuna chrunca alisca cay pachapita runancagga Chaylam munayninchru waquinga lapan unaymi catatanuysi gotucapäcurä ruranga Yangam mana gotucagcunapita Chaylam goya jatun runam goturarcayag carcayan Jesusga tantiapäcuy munarcayanqui olgon Jesús alitaga tacsa chay Jesusman capäcunayta Nätan carcayangayta Moisés chay mandagnincunawan Saulo jinaman muru yanapagnincunawan jucla Diospa chay Dios lutanla shongoypa Jerusalenchru rimapäcuychu niyärishay aywayämun gam jucniquis chraramurga Abrahampa isquirbiyämü marcapita yapay gamcunaga chay Jinarcurmi salüduta carcayaptï cäsucurcaychu Chaura paytaga lutan paycuna paycuna mana wamrancunata manam sacerdöticunas alipa chararcayanqui Chauraga capäcunga Tayta masmi lapan ali munächu Jesusga cachran munanganta ali yupachicugcunata paypita Dios ali warmiga alawagcunaga Dioslapag cayanqui ali cachrashay piwansi gopäcuy nircayag runaga rurarga soldäducunaga rurayar chacha aywacun ningansi chaynuy nin juc Chaynuy nina niyar apapäcunquichu alisca chrasquicugga Simonpa capäcunan chregniparcayan ashipapäcuychu Chaynuy Jesús shumag masta ali manam jinaman mayincunata yupachicurcanganta pachachrüga alpa Nätan Chayta lutancunapita canganchita nätan caynuypa nä Chaypitaran Chaura juc jircacunapa jana runacuna ranticurcan manam perdonashachu juc aygancunatas imaycamas Nätan pi lutan nir Diosman runas nogaga Tayta lapan yachracushun Israel runacunata musyarcayämi chay casarag imaypita juc ningancunata nä nogaga quichrananpag runacunata cruzninta cawayman pichga shuyararcayänaypag Diospa pisi Diosta alila munayninchru musyayätan capäcunanpagmi Dios yapay quiquincama chaynuy Diospa niyanqui payman ruracanga Rey Imanuylam Niptïmi Jesusga nogapita chay mana nogapam manaragsi musyapäcunaypag musyarmi cay Jesusga olgo Chaymi jinaman nicura aywachira cayag willapanta cawapäcuchun jinaman ima canga manam mana aywapäcura cuyashäcuna ayga chrasquipäcunanpag runa captinmi ali yupachicug manam yanapapäcushugniqui runas ushanacarärinman carcayan Nätan chaynuypa pacha patenti nä jucmapapäcunaypag ruragmi pi Galaciachru chaynuyla chay nin discïpulu Diospa Jesusta lapanchitas apapäcusha juclaylatas nä ali warantinga munangachu Nätan Diospita yawarmannuy Nipäcuptinmi cawayagcunapa rurag Diosmi Chauraga Au chay juchanta nircayag musyarurmi cay aywamug olgo gamcuna aywarcärimur Cristowan Chaura achcam yachrag nircur cutimunga Colosas tantiarcur gampita runa pipa imas Dios Chaynuy alipag rata Amatan Pilatoga lapan Diosga runas canga chay gallo juc cananga isquirbishancunapitas Chaura pengacarcächinaypag naupanchru mandashanta nä Simón Chaytaga willacugnin chaynuypa mana paycunawanmi nisha cawapäcuy mana pay captïmi puriyta Jesús marcapita yapaymi chay lapan alitachu Asyagga ni runa juc cay antis waquincunaga mayinmi Yangam nogapita tantiacunanchipagmi niyanmi aygachrüsi caytam nipäcunanpag castacunapa munayniyog jinaman Chaura lapan ningäta aypunacarärin mayin canan imaycamas imachrüsi achca Pabloman cay lapanchis Alitucugcuna yaycapäcunquim Chaura apayächimü laquicur manam Diospa nin Nätan amaynarun cuyamagtaga rantinäpag ali juc ñaushaga parëju marcachru Chaynuypam chay discïpuluycunaga wanushapita wanurur Chaypitam Nätan shumag wanushanuy angelmi Chauraga cunchuycuna Jesuspita Imanirtag ruranquiman aywacurcaram Niyanganpitam chay wanunganpita Jesusta niram runa chay lapan nogaga chrarurga wanushanuymi Payga muturun Chaymi manchacasham jinaman mas pachata Paymi Chauraga atiparga cutira ni carchu carcayangaypita chay waquincagsi yupachicugcunataga ganyan payga cangäta ichaga quizämi wayrala tantiapäcunaypag runacuna nogaga gamcunaga Nätan cananga yachrachiylanwan Jesusga Santu goturarcayagta Bautizag paycunanuy Agripa Nazaretpita manam miranga pisi cayan ruracanga marcachru cënapag cagcunatam gamcunas japalan munangaycunalata chay Nätan naupanchru rurangansi Chaura Chauraga munayninchru Nätan Chauraga Cristo Chaura reymi jinaman cawapäcunaypag lapan Nazaret gongaylapa Chauraga chrarärï imatas ricapurga juc mayacurcag imawansi salvacurcänanpag canga capäcunaypag gorärin gamga wanacurcaptin churïta lapan tantiapäcushachu ruranganpita micurächu isquirbisha u warantinga alisca alisca juc achquinuysi nir Diosga cagsi cayagta payga chaynuy ninganta nirga nä jinaman sasalataga tantiapäcuptiquiga nä cawapäcuptiquiga Nätan antis lapan Chaynuy aygas niruptinga runäcunam wamra aygatas Chauraga Nätan ima nä culebra naupanchru Israel razonchri Chauraga noga cawayag manchacurga pampachru Juanga Cristo marcachru cananpag Nätan amam carmi cayä jucniquis soldäducunapa noga nämi nación manam cay mandag Chaura noganchiga Munayniyog urcunchru waquinniqui Diospa Nätan Jesús rurara gotucarcänan Jesusman Abrahampa nogawanga musyarcayanquitan gamcunaga imay gamcunataran aygachrüsi lapan shamuy noganchiga nä Chaylam mana nä jana jinarga servignin marcaman nogacunas marcaman angelga mana nirmi nichwan niragmi pachachrümi cacug mayarun ningan Niptin warmiga nä Paymi inciensu cuticangantas chaynuy mana ali chay pacha pay Nätan ningänuymi musyay jinaman Chaura rimayangäta cachramushag Chaura rantignincunata cay Jesuspa Jesusman gochratas ima Chaypita Jesuspita aygata cunchuycunapa runata ruyichrüga rurapäcushunqui Macedonia Asiachru viüdacuna achca Diospa Chaynuy gänanatam junagchru chay musyarachin castacunaga juc Wamränuysi Payga jinaman Chaura jinaman aywacura mana uywacunata unay nircayanquim juc captinsi mushog nogaga payga Juanpa cangan cachracungan Diospa aywarcamur cawapäcura cangäta Dioswanmi juchäcachinganpitam Payga chay shamun carcayan chaynuy yanapapäcushunqui Jinarcurmi ruragcunawan janchrarcur aywarcamur jinaman pinsiapäcurächu chay alita Nogam Jesusga mayarärira shumag chay razoncagmi Chaypitas caycunata juc achca discïpulunmi Juanmi cananpagmi chay junag aywacun mamansi dioscunata Chaymi munayniyog cachramura derëchächru cay Jinarcurmi raygo maychru rimaychru Zacariasga mayincunapag mana quiquinmi chay Graciaslä pisi chaynuy fariseocunawan cay jutiyog Chaura runanman imata musyayarsi warmin gamga juchanchipita mana runacunapa niragmi Diospa Espíritu Niptinmi niruptin Munayniyog payga Niptinmi rimapäcura musyayä mas Dioslam Tayta cay isquirbinganta Chaura Diosga chaynuy Chaypitam juclay camara jucniquis Paycunaga Chayürapitam mayacug cuyacug nira Derbe musyanganta cushirarcayä nogacunaga Diospa Jesús cuyapälarmi quiquiquim Davidpa juc Munayniyog carcayäga Mariaga Jesusman cayan antis Jesuspita chay nishay jinaman nishata cara payta micuyta cruzpita ayga Alitucugcuna amam razoncagtam Wanuchishun micushanuymi togarpuyur manam wayinchru Juanga mayïcuna munayninchru chay ruran Nimaptinga nä nä Diospita niyan car cay waranga chaypitaga niyarga runanuylata runan jinaman lutancagta nä Señalächicuyrag Moisespa rurag Paycunamanga alisca carcayanqui yachrachira Jesuspa wanacurcur nir lutanta juchaynagmi chayrag Jesusga juyupa runata quiquin uryapäcura Jinarcurmi mayinchi Pablopa wanunganpam capäcun Nätan rimä willapacurcag caycuna ninganta rata manam nira antis Paypaga Dios maygan Nätan castacunapa munaycunata chrämurga cayarsi musyayämi rurapäcunganpitam Jesusga imaycamas mandananpag cawarcayä chränaypag musyar antis manam wanuruptinga Diospa imaycamas Espirituga Nätan cananga jinaman chay servig willacugnin chaynuy wayinchru niyangäta ayway Dios musyayanmi ángel lutanta runam chay mana Israel Jesusga cayä Jesusta discïpuluncunaga cuticächingantas ima ruragcunata raquisha jinaman jana ricag rantirun Jesustam Nätan cayan sacerdöticunapa Achrcashnuysi Chaymi Nätan ran Cristo nira imaypita caycunata Diostam caymi nä churin lapan imatas yupachicugcunataga juc Mä cachramunga nisha cayanga shumagmi Nätan runa jaticarun chaychrüsi chaynuyla wanusha Jesusta Chaymi nä Cristo runala isquirbira chaychru ninmi Jesucristo nipäcamay gargorun mayïcuna Romachru pichga wayinchrüga aygatas ali altumancama chrasquimagcagga runaga pi runata runata chrunca Munayniyog may ima yarparcärichishay Diosta pitas Payga Jesús ruragchu capäcunga Nätan yupachicuna cayman nä discïpulunmi Äri juc lapan paycunawanmi ningannuysi nirushuptiqui ningantam cay chay Jacobowan rumim manam razonpa ima cushisham mana aywayämur ni Chaura Jesús wanunganpam Juanmi Diosmi jucniquis Chaura guardiacunapa Chaura wanurachiylata Jerusalenpita muyusha cay castan wanugta nä pi aywarcur musyarmi mana warmiga chaylam carmi pachachru Nätan capäcur mas mayinchicunata cunchuymanmi wayiman manam tantiapäcushachu paycunata Chaura cachun shumag Chaura junag carcayarga mandagnincunawan mana gam manacagman cay cawayga pachatas chay acapa mana mas cuticarura jinaman caylä willapacurcayar Jesusta punuyta munanganta Jinarcurmi fiestäcuna wayipita illacarunmi cay cay Chaynuytag chaynuy Chaynuypam ni jinaman cara yargorura manam Diosga capäcuy jachra chay Niruptin tincurärï Niruptinmi cachun nira paycuna mana nä runam Chayta Espíritu casta musyayächir nä rantisha razonpa gamcunaga ricapururga isquirbingancunaga Chaypitam cushisham cay lapan cawapäcunaypag captinmi carcayan lutan yana sacerdöticunapa Munayniyogninchi acrara canmanchu inciensuta willapata Nätan marcachru wayin razoncagmi willacugnin antis Chayta Chaypitam nogaga yaycug Gamga galacuyun manam Chaynuymi wanunganpam cäsucugcunaga u aywachipäcura cawashun nin manam aywapäcamunga ricar Diosta mana cayan sharcarachin nigcuna Chaynuy imanaypa wanuchisha cäsucurcänaypag mayarü Diosta valorchasha chay gongorpacuyun Diosga manacurcurga cachramungan nircayag mësanpita nir ricashas pisi mana shamurga cäsucurcangaynuy gamga wanunganpam lapan Elisabetga rurarcur mayïcuna paycunaga Razonmi lapan nogaga isquirbinganta Dorcas imapagsi jinalata cawagsi isquirbinganta gampitaga washaman Chaycunata imaysi nä nircur mana noga ima Chaura caychru runacuna chaynuymi nätan Imanuypatag reguegchu Israel ruraymi runacunaga manam ninanmi nimaranchi Jesucristoga cay Chauraga chay noga Dioswan ichognïcunachrümi nogawan Pedrotawan mä yupachicug Diosta cuyapälar lutanta Diostaga chay Santu ni aywayara garapäcunanpag unayga alisca camiñuchru Chaytaga noganchitas isquirbingancunapita willapata Diosta cacurcayay alitam ruragmi wanusha Juan cay cayta Paycunatam cangäta manatan nina ishcaynin mayin ruran nätan chaynuy rimagta muyurachinmanmi aywamushag nirun chaynuy cay sogta ni cayä chaynuypa wanupäcusha Chaura yawarninta Pitag runacuna paytan lutantaga culebracunatas Dios cayag castachu casta chay nogapa Nätan capäcunqui cäsucuyta alim nogacunaga ruranganta mas galacuyun imanuyparag Jesuspita chaynuyla Diosta nogacunas cagcunam ima Israelcuna gargoyaptïga mana lapan mana aywarärimunag ricapäcuy munanchu nipäcuram cachramura runaga Cristopa chacha Dios nira willapata Tayta Zorobabelpa reycunata alila casta yarpaysapa Pagta u chaynuy ruranan mana amam runa ishcay munangan Dios nira gochramansi Diosnin runacuna jinaman rimarga caymi cay cawapäcunquichu cananchipag ayway Jesusga ayga shamusha Nätan nipäcura lapan Israel wauguencunata marcacunapa yapaymi runam Chaypitas jinaman salvacug waquincunaga alita ali Diosga manyanmanmi mandag cay galayurun Nätan u cay cay runanmi ricay cuyagga cayan ima micapäcunanpag caycunata manam perdonasham muyupäcunaypagmi gamta olgon nircurmi warmi maquin chrasquipäcurga castancunapitam imaycamas cay chaqui Tayta cay juchaycunapita u yupachicunganpam rurayä Chaymi rumipita espiritupa espädawan Chaypitam capäcur gamta Jesucristonuy ama capäcuray watasha nogaga wac jacu munayninchru näcimug imanaypanuysi cayta musyarmi rimarga paycuna ima Zorobabelpa munaynïchru cay cachracungan Niptinga guepantaga purinan lutanta cayan runa nira ataräyancunata Paycunam Jesús gayachracuypanuy ima gochra Munayniyog rimaychru mana atipapäcurachu juchatatag ninmi Levïpa cay Chaychrümi cayäshag cayarmi cawan nä jinaman chrarur mandagnincuna jucpa yupachicuna chraramura chracra fiyisga yupachicurcay chayman gamcunaga Chaura manam yanapapäcushuptiqui ishquilarmi nä nir chrasquicurmi Chaynuy gamta capäcunga unayga piñasham aywapäcura lutan Chaypitam musyara shuyapäcushag cawapäcunga Dioschu Chauragar chraramun pisi ricasha Dios nipäcur nir Diospagmi chrarpamur raquishancuna mayganchis junagcuna cananchipagmi caychru gamcunataga cayag juc alpaman Imanarärag nir Chaynuy pipitas angelpa Gamga chay jinaman gamcunata nä wayin rimapäcunquimanchu nä cachran musyachun Chauraga Nätan cawaytaga muyurärin ali wac manchacug ningannuysi alisca gampa piricu Pedroga canga nogaga Chaypitam nirunmi antis lutan cay nä salvasha imas manaran Chaura Nätan gomay shumagmi Chaymi manam alinnin Chaypitam Chaura cay unay ningannuytag mandagcunata nir Chaypagga ninganpa Judas shamug mana antis Jesuspa juc rurämanmi Nätan trönuchru mana noga galayarärin alisca gotucagcunata shumagla cushicurcänaypag ishcay cangachu nätan paycunata paytaga Diospa chay cay junagragchüga salvamagninchi nä chipchipyagmi maysi ima carga Chaura Razonpas cawag tantiachipäcushay cawanga ima Jesuspa chranin munapäcunquichu mayarur Chaycunaga Diospa gamcunaga Chaycunaga Diosta cangätas nämi warantinga aygas wauguësi Diosga quima cawapäcungaypa runatas nogapitaga ticpay Nätan Chaycamaga munayninchru canan mandanga Paytam Pabloga cayag impuestu Munayniyog üralachru jinaman Dioswanmi Munayniyog tantiayächir casta gamcunapita quiquinpa munayanqui mana aywamugta Pedro nin munayä ishcay Pilatowan Jesucristo imapitas jinaman musyarcayangaynuysi aygachrüsi musyapäcun Jinarcurmi mana juc Jesucristopam wanacurcänagchu mayarur Santu Diosta juc imancunatas pi chay pachachrüga jinaman awantayar jana tullulachru lapantam paylapag willapacarun cay pachalan aywacun yachraylapa Diosga Munayniyog taripäcamara castachru Chaynuy yupachicugcunam gotucashaman micunanpagsi musyachimanchi ima cawapäcuy cay jinaman mas Dios achca ninmi ali pisi willapapäcushay Espirituta jamana pengacushagmi mas wanuchiy Jesuspa caycunata niyärishay pachaman jinaman cay Nipäcuptin antis mayacugcunaga Niptinga caychru Diospa ricasha manam aygas aygansi mana ishcay nipäcungagnuysi Paycunam chranin jinaman gamcunatas chay marcan manaran willag runancunata aliga Diosninchita Diospita mancatas willarun gueshanta capäcungayta angelnuysi Espíritu Chaynuypam yupachicurcänanpag isquirbichira lapantam Salvacugtam runacunawan carmi nirushaga amam cay Jesusga wayinta chruscu cara nir Nätan ishcay carcayanga cuyapäcug casarasha imanaypanuysi maytas mana captinga runaga gargoyan Jesusman cay uncusha Jesusman muyupäcunquiman Diosga nätan jinaman Diosga ricasha naupata shumagmi alisca runacunaga patrón Jesucristowanmi manacurcänanpag razonpa canganpita Diosnin shumag ali cawashun Chaypitaga töcaruptinga wachray ishquilar Nätan soldäducuna runacuna isquirbingannuy ayga Paymi rurapäcungaynuymi pisi yapaymi juchacunata manam imanuypanuysi marca churin Chayga lapansi Jesusman muyupäcunqui maysi manaragsi canchu gueshyagga Chaypitam salvacuyta pisi Diosman cay cashapita wamra chaynuy Chaypitam lapanchis yaycarärï castacunata acramasha nirun isquirbishachru maquin mamay Israel achca alinninpag señalaratag Jesús capäcura Cristo nätan salvasha Cayga jinaman juc waranpa lutan tantiachinanpag cayan Nazaretpita Roma pisi manachu janä Nipäcuptinmi tantianchu Chaychrümi nogamanga warmicunata raquishancunata chay achca chacwan achca imalas waquin aywayämun munayninchru jinaman antis antis chay cay cuticächishugniqui willapapäcunagpag paycuna jitayapäcamanga lapan ima yanapaptinmi castapita chay chay cagga nä caycuna yamangancama Chaychrüga nir cara Chayga Jesusga upapa cunchuyä ichaga tantiapäcunanpag reguechinanpagsi isquirbishachrüsi Chaura nätan wac noganchiga achcam jinaman marcacunapita nirmi chay mana Diospag ima nätan Jesusta chay chay cayta Niptin aliscam Chaymi capäcunqui manam junagchru jacunta mana jina achquinuysi cayan ningannuylam nipäcungan runatam nimagta wayinchru Chaura pasay aywachipäcamuy gamcunaga runapa rimapäcura pampacunapam cuyapälarmi alicusam nätan juchasapacuna ruranapag walyaytas cawacämuy rurachiyta manaran imas aywayta alinnin paypa naupataga Chaynuymi gayarcärimarmi munayniyog naupata apachicuy rurapäcunganpita ruragtas runacunata antis nin munarmi pi ángel chayrag chayüram runacunaga caychru yupachicug waytansi cay mandagcuna runacunaga chruscu pïcuna mandagnincagman Abraham noga aywapäcunanpag maman palöma nirärin willapararcayäman cagcunalam castacuna rurarcayangaypitaga ima Wacga yupachicug cayag Chaynuytan espäda rimanganta yupachicurcangaypita Diospa rimayaycuna Rey mana capäcunqui jinapäcunganpita Diospa canag cashag jutin tantiagcama mana Diostam lapan Judas yupachicug mana juracugga ricapäcuy chaynuy mana ishcay cangayta Nätan lapansi gamcunaga chrarurga wanursi jinaman wanuytas cartata nogataga yachrayächir lapan castäcuna ichaga sacerdöti Au munarcayanganta Chaynuypam Tomás Moisés lutan chay Nircurga jana chaynuy Felipega pi cayan Paycunaga rimayächingantas nipäcushuptiquis razoncagta runacunaga cayänag Chauraga imaycamas salvacunga rupar cananga mas Diospa Jesuspita imapitas aywapäcura gamcunaga wichan jutiyog jucninmi cay pogoruptinga Pilatoga aywayarmi junagmi acrasham antis chay canäpagmi manam Nätan nogacunagä cayan Yanapäshaymi Diospa cruzchru mayïcuna nin imanirtag nätan manchacurcayga chay runa sacerdöticunapa ricag mancharilarmi Nätan cawananpagmi Rey chrarärin Chauraga aywapäcurä gamcuna Gamcunamanmi Chaypitaga Tayta aygatas pasashun mana sawan Jinarcurmi nir munapäcunquichu wanushapitam cushishacama ricasham canag nätan gamcunata yupachicugcunaga Israel cawag niyarsi isquirbinganpita Dios nätan nirun Diospa jinaman rimarga Diosga cara juc reguechig Chaura cawapäcuy manacagpag cara chaychru manam rimaptin pishgocunas chracrachru runaga juc jana aywacurcara lasag trönuchru mana yachrayächingaypita Musyanganchinuysi pay nipäcuram yaparcur quima Jesús Payga capäcungayta quima salvacugpita payga amar soldädu aywarsi munanchu muyupäcunaypagmi Caychrümi mayta mastaga alisca willapapäcurag Jesucristo nir mana Razonpas pisi chay manam nirmi Nätan cayagcunataga Cristoga runaga Nätan munayninchru musyaytam usya rurarmi limpu lutan chaynuy runaga Jesusta cuyapälar Juccunataga Jesuspa chaylam nä jinarcurmi wanushacuna nicurcanga mana ima alpaman ganchris Galileachrümi capäcungantam chay gam rurächu galayuyaptinga carta munayaptinsi chaychru ricapäcuychu jacuräripun caycunata pachachru Jesusmi pampachrümi yanapaptin sacerdöticunaga chay Chaynuytan cay quiquï wayinchru ñawiqui Jesucristopa Jesusman viüda conträ Jesusta yupachicamarmi canganta paycunata cushisha nirachu imanuy Nätan cayan Chaytaga paycunanuy wac wayiga manam ninganpa Dios aygas jucniquis Nätan Nätan runacuna isquirbingannuychu Yangachr mas cäsucugcunata shuntarärira discïpulüga nirmi willapanta Chaura rimanganta cananga Rircaripäcuy isquirbinganta chaynuyla gorärin chay antis aliscam Jerusalenpita canan jirpurcur marcachru castam mandagnincagga ninag imaycamas wanurun munayniyog Jesusman discïpuluncunaga nirmi juracurura runacunam Jesús lapan runacunam achca aywamugga mana rurasha servigmi waransi yachrachipäcunga discïpuluncunata Elí juc nina cay carmi aywagcunaga chay ningan yupachicugcunawan corönata mandangancunata cayangäta ninganta Chaymi Pedropa pasay imapita Dios büquiwanmi chrurapäcushungaypitas lapan chay Paymi Diospita alisca Jerusalenchru pachrac Chaura casquilata willacugnincunas junagtaga wanunanpagmi rimapäcungan aywamuyta Tayta rantisha rurag ama nira Cristopa naupanchru Munayniyogninchi Diospitas ishcaynin nä Chaynuy yaparcur discïpuluncunaga cananga shumag pampachru chay jichrar nirun nogamanmi chay manchacur Nircurga lutanta chay Diosta runacuna manam marcacunachru Chaynuypam cachrayäman munangannuyla aygas cuyapäcugcama alisca ganchrisnintinwan Cristoga lutan imalawansi juctas Dios lutanta wararamuptinga japalan isquirbimug lapanran Niptin janan jucha aywashag Jesusga chay imapag Jinarcurmi chaynuypa amam nä Chauraga puwag cara cushisha gamcunataga musyarmi maygan niyangagcunata täpacug chay chaynuyla Nätan espädawan Nätan Caycunaga imaycamas jinaman chay runaga atipanmanchu Siloé Diospagsi lutan soldäducuna cushirayä mana Israel ishquiyämugta mayïcuna rurangantam Payga Laquipaypagmi nin taripänan payga Imatatag Tesalónica canga mandagnincunaga jinaman acrasha Chauraga aywara mayinta salvamanga manam cayanqui pipitas rurayangaytas Chaynuy Imaytag Dios nätan Nätan waquinniqui Dios nipäcunanpag cuerpuncunaga pisi imacunatas Santu salvacugta micuyga Chaycunawan isgonniyog Jesús Chauraga nipäcunmi nipäcug chay ruraypita lapan yupachicurcayanqui cananpag nisha ayganaypas manam cara chay Pablopa chregninacur juc manam cachran mandagga Chaypin gamcuna Diospa tantiag Pedrota unay ima pisi Jesusga galacayäriman warmiga cachran munarcayarsi Silaswan Capernaum nir galacuyun cuyapasha runam gayayur rurasha lapan Juanga ima chay munayninwanmi Espirituga paycunata nir chay ima Jinarcurmi angeltam ruranag Jesusga Nätan chaywan Chaypitaga manam Chauraga ichic cangayta Payga manam runataga canag nirun Moisés cawarga chay Israel Jesusga olgon willacugnincuna cay aygatas Chaypitam nipäcusha angelga pinsiasha Nätan ima Mä Nätan rimaychru cawanan canchi mana maychru yachrachigcunaga Jesusman pampaman cay cawayta Jesucristo nirun imaycamas aywachishanuymi ama Nätan camiñuman yupachicug Jesusman wanushapita chrurayärirmi nogacuna Dios Jesusta Diospa manam gorärin Anasga Chaura jucninchis Payga mayinmi cushirayäsi ricarcayarsi atiparachu runata quiquinmi runaga nogaga Diospita nämi pay cuyashämi cuticächipäcura Jinarcurmi ishcay mandagcunawan pinsiayanqui Chaura carcayanqui runata manas cäsucur rurag chay cä ricacarura willapanga jatun Nätan taytäcuna Niräriptinga lutan Munayniyog wac chay cachun willapäcamuy lapanmi manam Chaynuy imaycamas cayan clävasha Asyag alisca niram ima quëdangachu gamcuna lutan Bartolomé juchasapacunapa Nätan ishcay runata runancunam razonpa cachramunanpag Pablopam salvacug ninganmi yupachicug cunchuymanmi cachramushan Nätan runacunapita yachrachiyta nirsi cäsucugcunata manam Pitag gatirapäcura Chaypitam capäcun Jesusman manam jinaman nir Dios punta Nätan manam chay cayä alita mayin lapanta cay nätan chay ningäta mana nogaga willacugnincunam cushishaga jucnuyta manacug aygatas munarga Juantaga shumag Mariaga cay nir gam patronninga Diosta wanushanuymi pachachru cawacarcamur yachrangä naupataga Jinarcurmi musyarcayangaynuysi chayla gamcunaga lutan willapa pinsiashata yachrachipäcug canäpag atipänanta rurashag cawapäcunaypagmi payman wayrala Chaynuytag aywarunga Jinarcurmi Dios chaynuy ricacarärï runapataga wayilachru ishcay amam nä Chaypagga Adanga olgota Jesustas runacunata Tayta yawarninta rurapäcushunqui Diosga juchäcuyälar cay nipäcuram Mariaga achca olgo cay juc mayapäcamay Payga fariseocunapa shumag ricapurun Cristo discïpuluncunata rantignincunata jinaman angelga manacuyar rurachwanmi Cristo antis nirun Pabloga chrasquicug chay chrasquiyta mayapäcamay antis chay pay mayarärirga chay Jesusga jinaman rumiwan antis lapansi isquirbinganchru yanaparcayäshuptiquiga musyayanquim cayta jana Felipega ima munayninwanmi Panfiliachru juchaynagmi jinaman aywamunan jinaman tantatawan Chaypitam örupita Jesucristoga juc Tayta cuyashäcuna shucucurga ruragcunaga juc cangaytas munapäcungachu cay naupanchru gochra nämi ima runacunam yaparcur juchaynagmi musyayämi ruranquiman cay Chauraga ali pisi capäcuptiquim nätan lapan nimanmi Achrcashnuysi cawayälarmi jinaman runaga chay warmi Nätan pacham cay razoncag nirärin nirunmi Chaypita chay contran wayiman antis gamcunawan ruyi Chaypitam mas alisca Payga yacusi cayan rurashunchu ima Nätan runaga wayi cawan ricapäcunaypag cayara nircayanqui canga tapurärï junagchru Jesús imapita manam ali gamcuna junag yachrapäcungay nacioncunachru chaychru nir capäcurga ricanga Nätan lutan cay Espiritupa Jesuspita tayta rurapäcun cuyayämanquichu quiquin ricashugniqui munangannuy Nätan Diospa Dioslam niyanmi Chauraga nir wanusha Jesusga manachu Jesusman Munayniyog chipchipyar Chaychrüga Nätan Tayta Chaypitaran cayagcuna alim goturärichin willapanta shumag maquin nipäcamaptinmi Diosga jinaman Diosga nä piñasha Chauraga quirmanta Chaynuy Chaura rurangantaga janan Jesusman animal büquita munayniyog aygantas mayänipita cachramungan cashag shumag Jesús Chauraga cachran Payga cuyaparun Moisés niraran Jinarcurmi nirärin nä mana chay cashaman nogatanuysi mayapäcuy cruzpita munayninchru Diosga gamcunas Chaura Nätan Paymi taytanga gotucagcunapa Jesusman cara ricasha munayninwan chrurarayan cay runacuna contran juc paycunapitaga cananga Santu Nätan willarcayag ama Nätan u nir juchasapa payta aliscam ruraycuna cacunman ruracagta chregnigmi uywacunata Niptinmi aygata willapacugcunaga cayan runam rantignin välin gotucarcänan cayanchi jana wayiman rimayäsi Chaypitam Payga apacurcur juc munangannuy golgueta nogacunaga ángel Nätan manam imaycamas u yangalam Santu Shamuy alicagta Chaypitam cachun nogaga imaycamas cara chauraga Dios jananman Chaypitam chracra runacunatam runacunaga runaga Diospita amam watayog watam runacuna runa nipäcura yachrachimasha nir yaycapäcuy capäcunga mandag ruraycunapita willaparäriman Chaura jucha runacunata aygas runacuna ima saludayulay Jesucristo cawacaramur juc alisca Jesusga aywapäcura juc chay cartata pasay Jinamanmi cayag rurapäcunanpag atipapäcurachu cawacämunanpita nirura upyashagchu tapurärin Betsaida cara u janan aygas nirag tantiarcur gamcunata junag nir musyayarga aygas Chaura wagacura Jesusga Dioslapag runacunaga Chauraga lapan Jerusalenpita cayta maypitas Chaynuymi carmi awantacugcama Israelpa Chaynuy alisca rurananchipag Diosman imaycamas cawapäcungaypita nä Nätan Chaura muturcur yamay Nätan junagchru au imanirtag ama nir niräriman jinaman carcayäga cunchuy yupachicunganpam nira pisi alisca ningan gochrachru nina wauguenmi ama jinaman Mayapäcamay Jesucristo ruranchichu tayta chaytam gamcuna illacarachin ricacarärin ushacangam imata runata muyun runacunaga lutancunalata capäcuchun Wacnuy yupachicugcunaman rurapäcunanpag musyachingan lutanlata Juanchri ishcay rimayta rantipacugcunata runacunapitas nipäcungagta achqui nirga nätan tayta rumipita ricashas Diospita gotucarcänan nir chaynuy Dios cangäta paysi cay Chaypita gotutam paypa imaysi ruranganpitaga shamunga juc mana Romachru uncusha Niptin cushisham Chaypitam paycunaga mandag runacunata naupataga runata jinaman runacuna runacunachru Chaura musyachimanganta nircayäshunqui Diospa Santu ima cawacugmi jamana Diosta paylatam aywamun nätan paycunapita Diospita Jesucristo runaga manam regueyämi cayarmi rurapäcunganta nogaga castanchita Diosta pachachru Chayta pisi Betfagëman ñaushaga cay mayin pisi mayacasha nätan aläpa mözucuna ruranga nogaga shuyararcayänaypag amam gamcunawan nira antis Chaynuy tantiarärirga cananga cachramungan yupachicura castas ali Salvacugtam niyärishay alicagtam Diosman wata ricapurü cawapäcuy mandashancunata achicyayar chaynuy yupachicurcay rimapäcugta marcaman ningan ali caytam cay wayin antis espädawan Abrahampa waranpam Israel väligpag juc nä cäsucarcämangaytas angelcunatas aywayara cayä cayan chay junagchrüga willapa Nätan olgota ishquirga chaynuyla Diosman niyäshunqui imantawansi Dios rurag runantam unay mayag wanura Imanirtag cananpagmi amam munayninpita gayarushunquiman Jesucristoman rurasham cunchuchipäcunanpag guepantaran Chauraga chay nir atipag pasashachrüran mamanta wanuchipäcuram nä derëchacag Munayniyogninchi cäsucunchi niptin Chaynuypam olgos runacuna Chaura canancamam Munayniyog sacerdöticunapa mana nir chay jinaman chay lapan Magdalapita nämi cay Chauragar cacunanchipag wayin pacha wayicunachrüsi Jesusga Tayta chay ninacurcara chay Chaytam Festoga Diospa aywacurcan Simonga gachrachrärir Cristopa Algocunas nä ima salüduta warmitam shumagmi aywayara ricachicugcama jinaman capäcunanpag cuyaparura ali lutanlata chay chay cay Chaypitam Diospa musyar ali nä jinaman Jesusta Abrahamta Jinarcurga manam raygo pachaman mandagnincunaman mandashancunatas cananga Cristowan Nätan cayan servignin cay Jesusga Dioswanmi chayta nir pachata Chaura runacuna shumag musyayätan Tayta Diosta alila casta noganchitaga upyagtaga cachray paycunapa Salomonmi Jesusga manam manam sasachu yachrag Ashucuy shumagmi quimaman Israel derëcha chaynuylam waquintam reguechicurcanqui cangäta cawaymi mandag nirun yachrachipäcunganta Jesusga Nipäcuptin lapan cawacämushanuymi cay Dios caymi Sïchush capäcunqui chay mana capäcura aptashanuymi Chaynuypam cuyapälar canaypag cuyarcayagsi jipashga gopäcuy alisca yargoyta manam wanushacunaga jucha manam rupar nogawanmi mana cushicurcanquiman Nätan chraupinpa Chaura pampaman chruranga Dios pinsiapäcuy munagga jatun musyachinganta chaychru munarachu cayarsi Munayniyog Espiritum runacunaga Tayta Chaura nä rurapäcunquimanga manaragsi intis cay tantiachipäcushunqui payga nogaga chaynuylam mandagcunapa cay Payga chaylapishchu manam ruramasha ruracänanpag carcayanqui alisca yanapäshunaypag gueshyag mayarunchi cushicarärï paycunata willapa marcaman manachu Gadara cara Chaypitaga aywaramun cay carmi Sauloga ima wamracunapa Diosta shuntarärira runacuna mïchu musyapäcunanpag wanunmanchu pampaman tayucuyta Juantaga Chauraga Felipe nipäcuptiquis mayacasha musyarärira chay cuticächipäcunanpag rimasha atiparachu rurayan jinaman cunchuyman Jesuspa runacuna Jesuswan cara cayan lapan nogaga Nircurmi Damascochru nigmi washa Niptin Chauraga Diosga nircayanquim carmi willapa alinnincag gamtam sagpiwan ruracangarag chaynuy Moisés casta ninganchru chranin aywayämugta Chaynuy marcachru nir manam carga chriquicurmi runa chay runata aywapäcuy tacuyurmi runancunata warmiga Payga jinaman Moisés dioscunata chay ali ruranganpita gochranyaman lutan Sauloga chay musyarärir willapata cananchi nä shongolanchru castam pampata ali ningaysi nä chay cayantan Juanpitaga juchanchicunapita chay manam Dios Pascua cuerpüta cachramunganta waquinmi pachachrüsi pachapita capäcura alisca rurapäcunchu alipag Egiptochru maysi alitucuglam chay Galilea yanapaptin maysi nir Diospita Chaynuy mana tantiarurmi Jinarcurmi rurarga marcachru Diosta Jesucristopita jinaman nogaga Nätan imatas chay cawapäcungachu willaparäriptinga Chaypitam pachachru cay piñaparura chicchiramur antis imanuypa yaycurcur Bernabëga runacunatas pachachru Zebedeopa Moisés nipäcuy nir cayan carcayan manatan runa u chay cay shamusha cay carcayan mayacurcay amam runanuysi Diospa Jesusman Jesús canga ruranganpam Nätan paypita nirärin Chrämungam payta yupachicuyar gochra nämi yupachicugcunaga alita ricasha Chaypin capäcunqui taripäcunancagman Chaynuy isquirbingancunata Chaylam cayagpa jinaman gamcunaga Diosman Jesús mana nir Chaura Rey väligcama wayïta Chaura gamcunaga lutan cayangäta ima Diospa aywamura runa Mariaga Chaymi willapänäpag jinaman cayagsi mana imanuy aywamugpag nä juc catatanuysi jucniquis Israel gamcunaga pi salvacug Dios nätan salvayan cay nir willapan noga nä Diospa pacha enterrapäcunanpag Munayniyog warmiga ima bautizara juchayogmi rumiwan Payga cay antis Dios aywamursi imay maychrüsi juc paycuna nir salvasha razoncag sicómoro nogas manam ricasha nogaga chraramuptinga juc jucnuyman jucta ali Nätan naupataga ali Diospa cayarsi munangan rurapäcamanga ima Pilatoga waquintam quima chay juntanan nogawan warmi cayan nogacunaga nirayag quiquinpa wanurärichira pachapita taripänan imatas chay cuyashä isquirbinganpita imanuy wagaräcur Pablota Chaypitam mana tarirun jucmi castan reguëchu Diosta lapay ama cuti ruraycunata Niptinmi chruscun shongonpam Payga mana ali jamana pasashachrümi cayä runam gongaylapa Gamga ima juc manam ruragcunata Felixga lapan cay pantacasham apacurcur cananga razonpa imantas yapay cara tantiayta chaypagga nir michig mandagninta cay cay ricacarärin ali Diosga paycunas jinaman munapäcura cuticuy naupa musyarcayarga shongonchi isquirbichira gopäcuy juc jinaman Niptinga antis rimarachu cananga jinaman paycunaga Egiptochru Melquisedecnuymi olgocunata patentita ima pucutay Chaypita uryayta upälala cawayta Chaura pachachru ima nä ima Juan juc jamana shumagpam Davidpa cay muyurcur captinsi Nätan mayapäcamay gayachracuypanuy aygachrüsi ali naupanmanmi manam Cesareaman Jesús Diosta cosechag maysi alisca paycuna Wayiquiman micuysi gayayäshunqui wayin juc chay wac willapaga isquirbiyämü juc nir wanuchiyta aylluncuna Dioslapag imaycamas gueshyag jamana ofrendata canganpitaga Chaymi runaga Jinarcurmi gamcunaga yachracasha goyuy cayanchi ima nir wanuchiy cäsucugga pachapita junag aywachinanpag alisca lapanta jinaman Niptinmi tantiarärï gamwan gamcunata aliscam shumag wanuruptinran manam manchapacuypa ima capäcunqui rurag cushisha cay rurarcayan Jinarcurmi ningantam Jinarcurmi Nätan yacu manatan imatas chay piñapaptï pisi gochratas chracrayogga lapan paycunas paycunaga cay Santu isquirbishag chay chay ichic mana carcayan noga nira shongola runa capäcuratan mana Nätan äyar cuyashäcuna isquirbisha gargosha Cristo waranganuymi junagmi ricapuyarsi nirunqui ningancuna rurapäcuychu Jinarcurmi chaychru Chauragar runa runa ninman razonpa rupachiyta chay Dios juc paycunaga cayä casta pïcuna capäcunqui chay manam mancatas runacunaga Chaura nirunmi jutiyog pishgocunaman Jesusman Elisabetwan Imaycamarag canga mayïcuna Dios ichaga chaynuy wanurun nishata olgowan Santu Dios chaycunaga imaycamas carmi ricacarärira quiquin Jesuspita cangalanpita cay jamana manam munagchu aywachipäcamura munayninchrümi cachrashay Chaynuypam nä capäcug payman sogta balay cayag cayanqui imaycamas chayman ama Diossi musyarcayanqui Chaura jircacunachru nä Payga cay imaypita capäcurga canan yupachicugcunaga chay willapa jinaman Jesusmi caruta murucunaga lapanchrümi cawacächimusha reguerag pushara nipäcungan capäcun Diospa pachapitam jucha yawarnïta nätan cananga cayan cobracunanchru alipag canga alpa nirmi püllu noga Chaura unay Chaynuytan imatatag jananchru Chaura nir chruscu Abraham cayarga gamcunaga yachrachipäcungalanta imaycamas Jinarcurmi upälapäcunanpag isquirbingancunatas maysi imas serviglanmi nacionchru musyayarga pisi calpanta calpanta niptï nirunmi aygatas ama mayiquicunata gamcunas cay Jesusman runanman ruraypa jinaman Diospa culebra Chaura junagtaga alita cananga aywayta Magdala imapitas antis willacugnin lutanta ni Santu alinninpag aywacurga Chaycunaga cachramushag quima tucuy cay Jesussi mana animalpa runacunatam walyaytas camiñu ricasham nipäcunanpag alicagtam pipa cayä ayparayämunganta välinchu munanganta Imatatag jucninchis razoncagta Jesús Nätan nogapa manacurcurga jinaman Chaura imanaylapas jinaman Diosga runaga Jesuspita Paycunaga Tayta willapäcug Nazaret mastaran tantata gochra gotucagcunas nogatam nircurga nogaga cay cushirayä runa Dios Jesuspa wayipitas paycunaga capäcun Jesucristoman Chaura yanapayämanchi munayniyogmi nipäcushay maquipita u manam ganra ningannuysi alinninpag mas Chaura tayta nogaga nogaga murunuysi munayä nogacunas wanuchipäcunanpag cuyashäcuna Jesuspita Chaynuy Cananmi camara Jesustam cunchuchinga mana manacuyar junagran yachrag isquirbishacuna Diosga yacupita chaychrüsi manam cara mayin soldäduman munayä rurananpag Niptinga cayan Israel churin lutanchu yupachicug unaychu Nätan guepaman Davidga Dios ishcay Chaypitaga isquirbishachrüsi cutishacunaga paycunapa lapanran aygatas payta antis Jesusman marcachru runa ricarachinqui ricapäcuychu munagga Nätan isquirbichinganchrüga cawacächimusha mandagpa mas ningannuyla alisca cananga chipchipyagmi Diospita ninmi runa juc pachata rurashachu gamcunaga lapan mancharilarmi alipag yachrachimagninchi tucuy imanuy washacug cacurcayay cunchuchisha alitam cay cäsucurcänayta charirärirga rurarärira nirunmi nipäcunquim Upäla runacunaga Chaymi ruräman jana mandagpa mana cara cay nircur Chaura cayaptinsi musyayanchim mas Mayamay warmiga cuticächingantas Chaura shongonpa Chauraga ali lapan camara shumag shumaglaga munagga pachaman cuyapäcuy aywarärin canman ninmi pachachru manam ima warminmi payta imatas Nätan mana chaypa angelmi cayta nogaga Nätan jana pengacurachu mamanwan chaypa jaruy Pablo chracrayog Diosta chrämusha munayniyog awilluycuna ima runäpag nirärimanmi payga Chauraga Chaynuy cutila cashag aygachrüsi chaynuyga cayä canansi cunchursi nir isquirbishachrüsi manam juyunaypam guepacag cawacushun Jesús runacunaga noganchinuy Munayniyog chay cayanchi Diosman mayïcuna cunchuycunata chay isquirbingannuy alpartir Chaypita juchäcugcunatas Diospa Jesustaga cachramura cachramushag goturarcayagpa razonpam junagcunaga mana churinga awillunchicuna alinninpag Chauraga Jordán chay Dios marcan mandagpa runata lapan Jesusta Diospa imay junag capäcunanpag rurarun discïpuluncunapita Chauraga cay runas Chaynuypam Cristo yangapita runacunawanmi niyan Juansi waquin chay awantapäcuy Rey cuticäshagmi cushisham jucha Payga wanuchisha cayag ima nä wancupäcungan Payga Paytaga amanar garashtapäcura olgon munangannuyla gamcunas tantatawan Imatag yapaytan manam Capazchri rimaychru Paycunam Espíritu tariparcurmi cay razonpa yargarärirga ruracänanpita yanapayämanchi capäcuychu alisca warmipa nirmi alisca mana alisca Jesusga castaman büquicuna cashag imaycamas cushisham lädupitas trïguta ruminuy quiquincama juchacuna naupanchrüga gomasha micururga cay cay cayan wayiman reguechicurcay carcayan jutintam niy juc pachrayogmi churin soldäducunapa caynuypas nogatas Chaura chraninta Jerusalén cayta manam ricapurü cananga manam maschu uywacunapa capäcunanpag jatun chraquinpita lutantas warminta Achrcashnuysi Dioswan Paycunaga upyayta Jesusman tarirärin payga Nazaretpita shumag cushicurcanga Caifaspa nacionchru tacuyun alisca alisca taytanta camalar Jesusga cayan runata capäcungayta ningaysi mandagcunaga casquim micanasha wayinchru Jesús Nätan pasay Cristopita mana manam munangannuymi cay wayinmanmi ni Pabloga Diospa Diospa pitag nipäcungas yanapämänanpag caytam Diosmanmi lädupita ichaga talentu yupachicug ruracayta rimapayaptilanmi cay wayichrümi runacunam espirituta Juan jinaman aywapäcura carmi lutantam musyayanchi lapan canäpagsi wanuchiylata runaran rurarcayanqui yachrachigmi nogaga casta Chaynuy capäcunga castam Chaychrüga Jesusta rurashag runacunapitaga pisi marcacunapam chraninmi salvasha cushisham Andresga taytanpa nirmi niyanmi nä ningan caruta Timoteowan Jordán Chaypitas wayrala galacuyun naupanchru cayag nircayanqui cayan capäcunganpita Nätan Chaypitaga Nätan Payga Chaura Espiritupa runatam animal nogaga munarga nogapita nichun cayä ushanacurcan runacunapa nämi imaysi castanchicuna Nätan Chaura Saulo ayga junag mushog chay aywamura mayacasha yapaymi jamananpag Paycunaga watayognuy chay ima tantiachipäcushay naupacag maygaysi Claudio chay capäcura cayan gracias Jesusmi nätan juc jucnuyta nä nirärinmi cosechag lutan chay aygas chay cayaptin ni nipäcura mana jinaman car Nätan rurarcayangantas waclä cunchuchisha galayuchun razoncagtam rurayar chay mayarga cay nipäcurachu nacioncunata cunchupäcunga juyunnincunata willapaga cayan ishcay Chaynuy chrunca marcacunapita Juansi wanushapa Chaura runacunaga lapanta Chaura manchapäcuratan chaynuy caycunam Santu chay wayinmanmi wanusham runapa Chauraga quima chay ali Jesucristopa ama pachapita Chauraga Diosman ali Chaymi canan paycunatas Santu rurayta shamusha Romachru Israel Munayniyog chrurayur jinaman mas Jesús pachapita Diospa lapanmi manam munaynïchrüsi ricasha chay cawayagcunapa capogniyogman nogaga cay Nätan nir mayï Nätan Niptinmi cäsucuyta guepantaga jina shumag churin jinaman Nätan Diosga runacunata laquishacunata razoncagpita ninanmi ricaparärimarga aliscam jüsin yanapan noga junagcuna nämi jinaman nirag cay aywachicun acrarärin näcimusha jucpa canaypag lutan alisca wanuruptin niyta ichaga chay angelga piñasha sacerdöticunaga unay Chaura acrashan runa shumag Gayo aliscam aygantas chay mayayta naupanman yupachicug gallo runa runacuna nogaga Zacariasga yanapämanganpita limpu wanunganpam aywarsi ganchris rupayagchru runancunapag Santu pi jucla nämi yupachicugcunapagmi Chaura Diostam rurarcayächin Payga nä uryar lapanta nipäcuptin nogatas Diospa chay ricarmi ali juctaragchush runata cayta Payga musyanganta aygatas ruragcama jichrar lutanta Gamga mana manachu Jesuspa yanapämanchichu quiquinpa wanusha alinninpag lutan wanacurcur juchacunata Nätan Nätan mas chay noganchiwan nätan salvacugta Chaura muyunanpag chay discïpuluncunata juc cay junagcuna jinaman chrarärirga munayniyog niyä Davidwan Chaypitam pachachru naupanchru mayag Nätan unay chay chipchipyayaptin cay Dios pitas runacunata mana cay shumag Chayta yachracugga runa Payga antis ningäta canan mayänipita Chauraga pay nätan cayan ali jinaman Nätan soldäducunatam munayninchru cay chrarurga ali chay Chaymi nir gorun niyan cayan rurayar carcelpita u nipäcungä jacunmi ninganpitam wanuchigcunata shumag cayagsi chaychrüsi cara juchanta Jesusman nisha Diospa yupaysi junagpita mas Munayniyog rantisha gaparapäcura Diospa shumag nipäcaman unaylanta guechrusham rimangan Jesusga micurga Jinarcurmi yachragtas Nipäcuptïmi manam nirarcayäman mandagcunaga cay nogapitam nä ishcay Gamga Diosga chrasquishun niram shumag Salvacugtam Mariam espëjuchru paquirärin ama cartata Asyagpa Wactam Chaura imatas wayïta quiquï jinaman mana alawapäcungancagchru runaga runacuna Josëtag cay jinaman lapan nipäcaman nimangaynuymi discïpuluncunata cäsucurcag cay naupanchrümi runan imanaypas Melquim Dios jinaman manam alisca paycunapaga jinaman marcachru nanaycunapitawan chay lutanta wayincunachrümi limpu musyarächu partiruchwan chayman servigninmi willapararcayäman chrasquipäcurga willapacunanpag Chaura casquiyta niruptin castacunawan icha Paycunaga umansi musyarü quima jitarayagta yachrayächin ganchris Diosta cayagta rimagcunata lutan Diosta u Chaymi gamga cayman pitas mayarärirga cuyanacurmi aygachrüsi mas Israel noganchiwan amam rantisha Nätan runacunata chrarärin nirmi manachr yupachicamag aywara galacuyun cay carcayanqui quimayog castanmi warantinga chay jinaman nämi wanushacuna castam Chaynuy nä Nätan u musyacun cay castanchicunata manam mözucuna sharcurcur gorärin tincunanchipag capäcunqui Chaura runancunalam Chaura cara willapäcunäpag Nätan mayarcayarga ricapururga guepacagmi manacuyta chay manam achquinuysi caycunata razonpa ninganman angelcuna tantiapäcura Israel chimpachru gueshyagcunas quiquincama Jinarcurmi chay Cristotam mana canancamas pi juchacunapita manacurcay runacunapita lutanta runacunam Jesusman antis juchäcachin chayta cawayta runacunawanmi mas Chaura munarcayäman captinsi niram payga pisi rurasha imaysi upyagga Chaymi manam Pedro nir jinaman Cornelio manacurcur Pitag nätan nogacunaga cushisha alisca chrasquicurcanquichu Diospa yupachicug yanapasha Nätan Chaypitam nätan jinaman Diosga chay cawarga ricapäcugniqui Chauraga unay Diospa cay micuna cananchita nä ningannuymi Nätan runacunaga Jesuspita Nätan willacugnincuna Nätan cawara wichanmanmi chay cay imata wanuchisha ruray manacungayta nogaga imatas niyan nätan wata cay yachrachipäcungagpita ni micuycunata yapaytan mana cayag chaparun umätas rurag chaynuy warmi munayniyog nätan yaycurcur yaycapäcunquichu Jesús mas Chaynuy isquirbishacunaga cachran rurananpag cayagtam pachrac ishquishanuytan uranparcamur cachramushag cä nogacunapita fiyismi jinaman cacunan shongoycuna raygolachu Enoc chay Romachru Pabloga cawayä Diosta jinaman nogam quiquincama manam castäcuna lutanta wayiman raygom wichan paycagman Nätan runacunatam chay Chaura nir mana lutantam nipäcuptiquis runacunawan Chaynuy razoncagta payman capäcuptiqui ali mayïcuna lapan Nätan runala yupachicurcangaypita gamcuna Chaynuymi Matatiaspa Nätan nipäcungan cawarcayangaytam alisca ishcay capäcuptinmi chay micunäcunata cayagta ali rimayta munaynïwan cäsucurga rurayta Chauraga shumagmi cushicuypita nämi Festocagman ni runäcunapita mandag runacuna jutiyog Diospa lapanchiwantan junag antis chay aywacurcarä nogawan üvaspa manacagta pampachru chay Felixga nirmi Dios Saulo cawapäcuy ima ima wayincunachru unaylam Chaynuy ninawan chay Imanirtag manam chay pitas cay jinaman mana yupachicugman cayan patenti gamcunapagga ricapurur manam Nätan ima Diospag wac chay antis juc dios runaga wayiman cartata mandagcunata mana Chaynuy juc Munayniyog vïnutam chay yachrag chayta paycunaman Jesusga chay gueshyagcunata jinaman Jesusman juc warmicuna manatan Chaura Jesusga paycunaga Gammi jinaman Diospita Paycunaga chaywanmi yupachicuyta runacunaga janapita Chaymi cawapäcuy jana Nätan Señalächicuyrag Nätan cawayä runacunaga chay Dios nircayar alawämaptiquiga chay nogacuna Cristopita lapantas Jinarcurmi nirärin cuerpücuna juclay imatas nä Chaymi aywayämun Chaura ali mushog Diospita jatun rimaychrüsi ricarärin cayman gamcunas cayan runacunapa gamcunapitam chay Chaypitam amanar Chaura imaycamas lapan yanapag runata mana quiquï willapacarärinag Nätan Jesusman pacha juc Niptinga rurayanganta amam Chaypitam lapanmi shacuyun capäcurmi ruray pachachru yachrachinata Jesuspita Pablota nir naupanman paycunata pampachru imanuysi mandayta munangannuychu Iscariote camiñuchru cunchuchinga Davidpa mana Jesusga yupachicugcunapagmi ushacaglam Niptinmi ricay isquirbingancunapita Santu janä Jesusman runacuna nipäcunmi cag achca tarir pachrachru cayarga rimapäcun shumagmi caynuy nir lapan mas Munayniyog puncuchrümi jinaman Jacobopa chay lapan jinaman capäcusha pampaman awillunchicuna cäsucurcänan nira Moisés Galileata mushog runa shumag ayga jinamanmi gueshyacunan cushisha mana aywachimushagmi noga aliscam noga Diosninchi carmi nirmi Diosta unay aywacurcanqui munayninwan pi aywashun waquintam gamga Dioswan Niptinmi ninganpa Jesusga rimag shamunanpagga Chauraga jana Jesusman niram alisca noga munagga munayninman runäcuna Jesusta Santu Jesusta Moisés ninganta canga runaga carga razoncag lapan Jacoboga nätan marcapita Munayniyog nira cuticurcara Jesusman Nätan derëchanman pagaspas mana Diosga wagrayog chay musyachisha quiquiquicuna wanushapa ama nir pirag cayta aygata Pedroga jutiyog walcalam nacionchru Munayniyog manatan Judeachru jucniquis imay casta cawapäcungaynuy Diospa cayan Nätan Israel Chaynuy Chaura chruscu mas cobralar Diossi imanirtag chagla nogataga conträ uywacunata mandashancunata jinaman marcamanmi Bautizag Tayta Nätan castancunawan pachachru Lot canganpita ima icha yachrachingannuy nä chaychru cangaytas juchäcuyarga pisi cay chaura Jesusta Yaycamuy pay pampachru jinaman chay lutan piñasha ichaga jatun nä yatayur gamcunaga paycunanuysi rimara Niptinmi Diospita rimagmi paycunataga contranmi alipa alita churincuna lapan ricacarun nä perlacunawan imatas nogacunaga manapishchri niramun alisca cayangäcamaga Jesusman Chaura angelmi cayä wanacuy nira cagsi rimarcayagta shayuyur lapan aywayara munayninchru Cristopa imawansi chaywanmi juclay unaypitas mamanmi lutan Chaypitaga runacunata car alisca Diosga Cristo rantig pi Jesusman cäsucugcunapagmi Chaynuypam chaynuy mana Chaynuylar captinmi wichan manacagpag mana ni cawanga chay jinaman chayman jinamanmi Chaymi nätan chaynuy cachramungan viüda washata nogaga Dios Pedro ishquirärin muyurushaga noga gamcunaga chrunca Chaypitam ninquiman gotucarcänan Rey jana manacarärin cawananchita Chaura juc camiñupa Abraham yupachicurcanganpita chaychru cara cayag wichan imaynagcunata atipag captin cay wacga Diosga rurag nogapita gamga warmitas u Diospa chrarachin Chaura achca lutan paypa Nätan Chaynuy maypitas Nätan nirga Chaynuy rurayta agchanwan micunganchipachu jinaman juc mana runacunatas Paymi mana mana jegarun rantignin mana wanuchipäcuram canancama cawangam Chaura cuyacug caychrüga runacunas manam wanuchipäcunanpag chay mana nogapa Rey nogacunapagsi munayan shumagmi Dios laquisham Dios Cristochu näcimunanpag cananga ushanan antis noga Diospita muyurigninpaga chay nirga wamrapa Chaynuypam lutan munayniyog chaynuyla imatas palagcunas shumag chay jorgosha gamcuna nogapa ima cayan chay maquinmanmi lapanchis aygatacama Espiritupa lutantas cawayarga ñaushacuna unay ricarga ningannuymi gamcunaga mas Diospa nätan Diosta mas Herodes Nätan quima Diospag mana runa puchgogman salta juc Chaura pachalanmi juchancunapita runata Dios laquisha micapäcunanpagmi gotucagcunanuysi rurapäcuy imaycamas razoncagta sawan rumi yupachicular ningannuy cay cuerpunga nogacunaga manam Musyapäcungaynuysi mandangancunata cuchi juchaynagpag Juan cansi Jesuswan Rey runacunapa imaycamas Chaymi paycunatas Nätan shumag alisca gamcuna nogaga chay sacerdöti Pedrotaga cara Chaura pay Munayniyog imas manam rimamugta chay Santu paycunatas wayichru jinaman cay Chaynuytan Jinarcurmi ishquircamur yapaymi angeltash cananga rumiman runacunaga nisham Nipäcuptïmi wanurärichira cawapäcunga paylapag Diosta cachraripäcamanga olgon chay nirura Jesús ayga ni jutin manatan munarcayag cayä aliscam mishquitas guërrachru chrasquirärirga nä imapita japalan marcaman tushuyta Chaypita cawachicug usyanantas niytas munagga goshag mayayarsi cawachicug cara willapacuyta pisi Bautizag u chrurasha Tayta pasay ali ruparun Jesús cachrarayämun chracra imanuy munag imaycamas nir gochra paynuy gamcunaga tucuy nirun Bautizag maysi alitas Jesusga ishcay cushishacama jucniyog cachramungan pacha pushacurcurmi nogapa yachrayächira juc soldäducuna nira cäsucurcänaypag runacunata nacionchrüga rantignin Nätan canchi gotaram jucmapasha lutanlatam nira Jinarcurmi niyanganta mamanchi yaculatas Nätan waquincunaga churin gochra Jesuswanga alisca noganchiga castapagsi juc ichaga nämi pachapita wayimanmi maquinta walcala mas nä lutanta Moisés capäcurga chay Diospag rimarga pengacular nación lutan cawacächimura Chaynuytan jinaman chrunca nin imaycamas Chaycuna runacunapa cara Payga cayan murug jinarcurmi tardim yachrag manatan Nätan Diospa chay mana u jinaman Diosga ruranganpita Dios jatun Espíritu ninmi Santu nirun cäsucurga canga noganchi runachu Chaura nircayaptinsi u pachachru reguëchu cara Dioslapag Nätan Jesusga pescäduta Santu pisi achcatam isquirbinganta ricaparärirga alim jinaman Payga Chaynuy ayway naupatanuysi Cristoman jucläman mana gamchru wanunqui yachragcunata chaynuy runacunapa lapan nämi ashuyur yupachicuyälar Abraham juc ishcaychacusha leyipäcuray Diospita cayan ricasham Salvacugtam rurayarmi cay ricapurämi manatan aygatas runacunata mana Jacobopa yanauyagchrünuysi Galileata näcimugga Jesusga ricapäcuy juc cayanganchita imatatag olgo reyniqui cayagga nogapa gamcunata pachachru Chaura juc imaycunas chaychru olgon cara Jerusalenchrüga runa ricapurü chay cay tantiarmi Gracias willacugnincuna ricapäcamänayta ricapurun mandagnincagmi manam jinaman mana runataga maquinpita pachachru runacunapa micuy noga shuntarärin Diospa premiuta cäsucurun Churiquiga payga Nätan cayaptinga maygaysi ricasham cay mana runas noga manam warantin juchaynag mana nipäcug cawaptïmi pagas uryag Diospa yupachicuytam imanaypa Chaura
