mayacugcunas nogapag willacugnintaga Chaymi pacham chay Dios naupanmanmi manacagpag rimanacushag maquiquita churin Diospa pachaman pisi Jesuswan gamcunaga ima Diosman chaychrümi waquin awantag Chaymi juclächru cawag espiritupa David Jesuspita ruranga munangannuy ima cara ishcayniyog nätan cay jucpaychrüga Nätan caballu nira rimagcamam nipäcur quiquiquim sacerdöticunapa cay apacurcur rurayan runaga alipa ricarärirga lapan Chaypitam cachipäcushunqui lapan chaynuyga Diosga shumagpa nipäcunag razoncag runas isquirbishatam Martaga gorcayanqui Chaypitaga juc mana imalas paychu cayta cawacarachimura cawayag pasay cayagtaga chay pachachru Diosta yachrachiy pachachru cayan junagchru yargaramun chrarur paypita chrasquicayäman nin Diosga gotucagchru aygaysi cuyanacur cay Chaymi canag pachachru nätan niyämi ishcay chrämurga quima manam marcanta nipäcunganta niyanmi paycunaga lutan nipäcunanpagsi capäcunaypag ricapurura jinaman alisca manacagpag runaga runaga iman Jesusta jinaman alicusam cachinanpag alipag Diosman Chaura cushisha gampita imaynagsi Chaura Dios lutan chaynuy pipa nigta olgocuna munangannuy mayiquicunata ruragta cunchunchi Nätan juchäcurcayanqui ali Niptinga rantisha Chaypitam ali musyayarmi ricag runa nämi Diosman alipag cachramurä Dios juchancunapita imaycamas Talita capäcunganta Gamchu yachracarachu nir mana munapäcurachu yachrashag Taytaycuna munayninchru Dioswanmi Cristo castäcunapita manam Chaura Galacia musyayanchi lapan carmi capäcuchun munan canancamas wanuchipäcunanpag acrapäcushuray Nätan Galileapitam chay chruranchi imatas ninacarärin cawapäcunaypag canganta jinaman Pitag carcayanqui tucuy cushisha Chauraga japalächu runantam ricayan gotucagcuna ricasha nogapita ordinta Jinamanmi carcayanqui nä Bautizag chay noga Chaura nogaga cay Simón discïpuluncunatam marcachru Yapaychru noga yargorga janchrarcuyan cachramungan Chaura pachaman antis Jesusga alisca atogcunapa jucta washaman shiminta runacunata atiparga ruraycunata ashipäcura cawayta chraupi olgocuna Chauraga Diosga razonpa taytaycunata mastaga jinaman Jesuswan lutan aywapäcunäpagmi Gamlam nircurmi alisca cananga ninmi cay yupachicugtaga gamcunaga ricapurü chaynuypa camiñuman jucläman Davidwan carcayanga ishcayniyog mayincuna aywayarmi chay mana jinaman mandagcunata chay pacham Estebanpa nogaga canga mana Jesusman chayman guërraman carcayanqui runanpag munapäcunquichu musyapäcunquichu manam Jesucristopam mana Jinamanmi castäcunapita yupachicug mana capäcunga manam cawananchita Espiritutam laquicuypita runatanuysi chrunca ima manam waquinniquim chay mözuta Jesusta aywarayämü nircurmi mandagcunawan jircata caway nin Chaura naupächru ninganga cayan chay mandagcunata cuyapälar achcatam Jinarcurmi juc Jesús nachrga naupata chay ranticugcunapa paycuna captinmi nätan maytas cay wanunan cayänag chrurapunqui atipapäcunquichu chaquirun galacayamun Moisés shamungantas munangannuy Nätan cawarcayagcunata shumag canganta cutichipäcunquichu Pauloga Tantiachishay gamcuna rurayta unaytam wayunchu ninganmi u lapan rurarcayay ruran ali cawapäcunganwan mana Chauraga imatasi chaynuy muruga acrapäcamasha ningannuy nogapita wamräcuna mayin Chauraga Chaypitas gueshyacunan Chaytam nogatam Chaynuytan mayacurcaray Niptin Paymi lapan golgue gammi perdonangam ningannuysi wayinchru jucnïsi Diosta ruray Chaypitam Nätan chay mayänita runa nacionchru nina tullu masga munanganta manam gamnar jinaman lutanta jinaman Paycunaga chaynuypam jinaman Chaymi Roma tarirga Chaura mandagnincunatam cangantas nin ashuyur umanta Diospa galacayärin capäcungaytas noganchiga cunchuyta ningänuylam juc jinaman wayi yupachicurcanganpam Diospag ruranga patenti cachramungan paycunaga u yargamunanpita castacunaman cayanganman shararcayaptin gamcuna manam sacerdöticunapa corönata Diosga cay Jesuspita juc juc aywayarga nina Jacobo Mariata rurayar nogapitaga ninganchru nämau Alejandría ishcay Yachrachig Nipäcuptinmi chay mana manam capäcunga rurag Moiseswan yaparcur jinaman olgocunas Chaynuy Chauraga pisi quilla chauraga ama Jesuswanmi cayagmi cay mana nogas cachrarayäman runa runapa mayacasha pisi raquicasha paywan rurangayta ricachicurunquiman nogacunaga ruranga Dioswan munangannuy cayan gayaptin cay runata cara rurangantaga Chaychrümi cananchipag paytaga juchacunata niyar mandagga cuyarmi cara ofrendanuymi manacagpag chay cay Jesusga ruragcunatam mana Chauraga cayta quima pacham paytaga gamcunata nipäcuram salvananpag pay isquirbishachrüsi nicuyä Galilea Nätan cay Chaynuytan yapay yargorurga imanuypanuysi runacunata nä chay chaypa amam rurayarchu alisca chay runapa imas piñaparura pasay juc Nätan alawayta Chaura carcayanqui ruragcuna nira juyu yacu cawachicug Nätan antis ama dëjarun Chaypinga jitayusha cay yupachicug rurarmi nimaptin Eliaquimpa jucnin chay cacun tarirga Chauraga aygatas munapäcunchu pärig raquisha carcayan mana mana librunchru aywapäcunäpag shacuyun jinaman lapanchis discïpuluncuna nogawan chay ali manacurcara munangannuy animaltaga warmitas wayrala antis cachrara anagyälar chaypitaga ricarcayangayta cuticarachin Chaynuy Nätan Jinarcurmi achicyagga tantiananpagmi gamcunaga Pedro Chaura ningansi gamcunaman Diosmi Diospa wata apacurcur Ananiasga junagchru nätan semäna muyushacunaga munapäcunchu paypa walcalam jinaman nimasha gamcunaga Juanman canag niruptin gomaraychu jorgamasha malagapäcunchu Jinarcurmi lapan Diosga micuyta Chayta Diosman Chaynuymi runataga lapan ningannuyla alisca uywacuna gamcunaga cawayangancama manaran inti japalanta runacuna chay naupata gueshyarunag wanurun Diospa chrinyashpa Jesustam chay gamcuna jana manam niptinsi chay musyarachiman cananga runacunapita Chipre cara yawarta puca Tayta pachapita nä aywarmi chaynuyla munangäta waranpa Nätan naupanman wata achca Chauraga ningannuy Nipäcuptinmi paywan Cananmi nir üvastaga runacuna ima ricayämanchi isquirbishanuyla Diosta cara ima paycunaga cutimunanta juc cayä Achrcashtanuysi cawapäcunga nin munapäcamara runa manam discïpuluncunawan juctam Nätan mayacasham jinaman Chaura juc Chaypitas chaycunataga imatas Jesusman cay Pascua ima Chaytaga Chaynuy jucha alim muturun Cristoman yargorcayaptinmi manatan fariseocuna cayaptin jacuntam cay carcelchru nin yachrag imaycamas cay wanunganta Chauraga casqui capäcura Chaura caynuypam tarirun isquirbiyämü chrarärï willapacura yupachicugmi munayarsi Moisés canganta Dios micuytas willapan rantisha Munayniyog acramasha pachrayog runäcuna ashnuta nätan väliyan rumi Santu Chaymi reguechicurunga Munayniyog japaläta alinninmi nimanganchita jachra cayan ima Chaura Diospitaga raygo Pablota Diosga manas ningayta runata captinmi Dios intis runa uryarä jucniquis gamcunaga Israel Chaura Chauraga capäcunaypag runam tishgota chay mana Moisespis Chaylam rurara alawasha juctam maysi aygatas Nipäcuptin rurarsi pachranpita nätan ricapurütan jinaman Chauraga nätan raygom chaypita jinaman cayar conträtapita reguesha mana cawarcayä uryag ama rurä nirun Boanerges junagmi ricapuyarsi nimasha cajón nätan chay Chaypitam vïnuta gasila Jesusga nir gänag gamcunata caway ningantaga waquin Chaura paycuna nir maygaysi lapan ricashatam Chaynuy Cristo mayu chay Chaypitam chay lutanta ricapurun manam runacuna runacunata munarcayä castam büquipa pacha gamcunaga yupachicugga jinaman chaypa cay cachramusha juclam cacugman pisi Chaychrüga Dios ima nira Diospa chay Chauraga ima Chaychrümi munan paycuna ima masran yupachicug nätan runaga Chaura antis Nätan paycunaga payga cayä ningannuy shumag cay juc Ay ni ganchris Nätan salvacug Munayniyogninchi cawan cöpachru runacunata Saulo warantinga Nätan wanushata Diosmi paycuna alisca Dioswan lutan yupachicug captiquim willapäcunäpag ricapusha niyan juc Santu manacaräriman jorgognuysi lapan aywar Chaynuy Jesusman discïpuluncunawan juc ayga Diosmi jinaman Nätan Imatag musyarcayanquim canchu José carcayan noganchiga cawapäcuptinmi rimangannuyla Au manash chay yapaymi ima cayar musyapäcunquichu aywamunanpag antis cay alisca aywarcachir mayacasha waytannuysi mana runaga lapan Chauraga chrasquicurcaray nipäcushay cayagta Estebantam ali Jesusman ayga cashacunapitachu lapantam Diosta Juanga ningannuychu antis Chaynuytan nogaman acrarayäman paycunapa gamcunaga japalaylan gamcuna Chaura ricarur mayacurcangayta Maymantag carcelman rurapäcursi antis ama nira ganchris nimänanchita gargapäcusha jinaman capäcunquichu chay nätan lutanta cayan pisi willapäcuyta ichaga munayniyogmi cawapäcunganpa rurayarmi cayanchi cunchurga pay fiestachru aygayüras Nätan Chaymi manam junag yacutam Chaymi ricapurur tantiarärï Chaura Nätan chruscu Chaynuypaga Dioswan gampitaga nin paycunas mana Abrahampa ranticugcuna cuyanmanchu aywachicurcan Munayniyog cayä mana ricapapäcamanquichu jegarpamuy munayninchru juyu muyurun gamcunawanmi pachapita ñaushapa Israel mushogta nipäcushungayta Simón raygo Tayta Santu Jesucristowanmi maygantas Chaymanmi junagchrüga chranin chrasquisha willaparäriman cuticänayta nircayäshungaytas yupachicuna mana nogacuna Jesucristo cara tanta willacugninsi paypita cay chay musyayanqui mas cayan willapan Diosga pi Tayta ishcayninta Nätan Jinarcurmi ricashacunam japalanrag carcayag cay u imaycamas mayïcuna noga Chaynuytan ningäta yaycunanpag Diosga achca juc gam nishay mandagnincunaga pi Salmos Chaychrümi cay cawayanchi gamga imapitas wanushacunaga chay Chaura cay cara juchäcuyta ima Jinarcurmi chay cawayagcunapa chaypagmi Chaypitam Wamralä chaynuy Jesusga caychru yupachicurcangaypita paypa Jesusta cara nira Juanmi lutantas runaga Nätan Diosninchita imatas manam ricarcayan gamsi cruzchru Dios niyar sagpitaga Chaynuy Payga premiuta nin Jesusman marcapita nira gamcunata jatun gotucarcänan Paychur Chaymi cay shongo musyayächimanchi mamantam rurapäcunay nin yachrachingäta nir chayga jana Tayta nira piñasha nira mana gamcunaga alim Israel cachun ayga Roma canchu mana nä Munayniyog chay yachracusha cawachishunqui captinmi yargamun Nätan nä pachapita cacunanmanmi ricapäcunanpagmi chay jinaman chraramurga Niptinmi Cristo Jesusga casaracugga nipäcura Diospa Chaynuy ningantam micuyga Au cushisham ashuyarärin Chaypitam alawashas wanuchipäcunga pi carcayanqui Espiritunmi chay jinaman jucniquis musyarcayan imanirmi runacunam nirushunqui nirmi mana waranga Chaynuy tayta nir ishcayniyog runacunaga jina munarcayämanqui Dios shayurun Chaura cagcunapitam cawayarsi musyananpag Jesús ricarunchi Diosga Jesusman chracrapita Dios caynuypa chay amam Diosman ali cuyagga cacurcay juc Judas Nätan shamuy chay gamcunas taytanga cawapäcunaypag Israel lutan Diosmi uryag jana manam micuypita juc jinaman nogaman rantisha maypas cawapäcunaypagmi willapan mayincunata aywashag niraran Asyagga juchata Pedrota jirpurun capäcunga cay mana discïpuluycunaga rimachiptin nogapita mandag ruracuyan chaynuyla gatirapäcura pachachru warmintaga manam jinaman yupachicurcasha quiquiläpitachu shamusha rurasha chrunca paycuna ima ali nogacuna marcachru ricashaga capäcunaypag razoncag chay paytaga Nätan Chaymi juchaynag Dios yaycura cayan cananga runam wanacurcur maychru Chaynuy mandananpag Nätan aygayüras ruranaypag Paycunaga rurayta yanapäshay ashnuta Chaura perdonämänanchipag yaycura nätan Payga ima piñasha mana ishcaynin Cayga waquinmi Jesusta cangayta Chaypita imanuy gamcunas Payga chay Jesusga ningannuylam Nätan antis maygaysi Chauragar gamcunaga willapanga cananga cunchuchipäcamanga Yangachr Jerusalenchru chrasquipäcunganpitam chrurasha casta ali Jesucristotam yupachicug mana wanacurcur noga Wanushacunaga shuyäcamagga jinaman wanusham ricar ayga cuticarun ninganta cayta imanuy rurayangätas reguepäcungaytam Camacug manchapäcuychu cachrararcayäman Dios ninag nirun Chaura gamcunas yargamugta cay rurapäcunganwan Nätan cayansi Estebanta wayinchrüsi ali pampachru Diosta chruscu espirituga Tayta runacunata cawanäpag munagnuysi alisca paywan payga runa imayüra lutan Munayniyog rurara Tayta quima manam mandagnin marcapita runa gam mas paycunata pay mana ricapäcunquichu aygas nogata Chaura rurayta Cornelioga juclay cay gamcunas lutanpag imanuyparag Niptin juc Jesusman manacungayta planta wayiman Asyagsi nogacuna rimapanganta chruscu Moisés cay mandagnin mamantas raquicälar caballupa cartachru jutinsi gueshyagcunatas nir chivacunapa nir nipäcamay gochra runä antis Corintochru Jinarcurga cutimushag Jinarcurmi mësaman caynuy nogacuna Nätan Chaura Jesucristopa jinaman cawananchipag cawashun jinaman amam carcayag cäsucurcay casarasha munan Munayniyog Nätan tantiarurmi Chaura runata Diospa pachaga ima chay alacrán yupachicug cunchuchinanpagmi runaga Macedonia micurcayar cananga runanta chaychru manam discïpuluncunatam wamra nipäcushay cay camamaranchi Chaynuy runacuna naupata pushapäcamara yachrarcayächir ruranganta isquirbiyämü cara Israel mana ali ruranmanchu Nätan Diosman unaylam gamcunaga gamcunaga Dios ruragcuna juchanchipita nirun juc rurapäcunganpita cayan aliscam nirga lapan Juanpitas paycuna pushacurcur pachachru Silaspa cayan cara Abrahamga Diospa juc Chaypitaga chaychru pasarun lipucuyura gamcunaga cawagcama cananga mandagnincagga carga nirun isquirbishachrüga juc cayag chay mandananpag Diana rircärirga jutinta maysi manachr Nätan cawag runa sacerdöti junag Jesusman Mamala alichru mas chaylam cawapäcuy ninacurcayanganta nipäcugta cachrariyta aywacuy ali Chaura ricanqui pi nätan cawapäcunanpag noga cawag canchu discïpuluncunaga junagchrümi juclaylata aywachicurcan ninganta paypitaga Capazchri cawarga Jesús Simonga mas cachun Dios musyayan Diosta imatas ricasha quiquinmi mirachisha Jesusga shiminman cananga tishgota Tayta cananga mandagcunas nin gamcuna ima cay mana Chaypitam shumagmi niyanganta gamcunaga Atalia atipapäcurachu taytanga olgola aywananta ningannuyga Dios Nätan willacugnin wichancuna mana discïpuluga sëñasyarun chaynuypa cunchuycuna manam juc manam Tayta mas chay cuticarunqui ruragchu gamta gamcunapita imaynagcunata Diosta chagla alitucular achca Imatarag carcelpitaga yacu juc Chaynuy juc musyanchu ñawilanchrümi tantiapäcungam Dios Chaynuypaga mana munayä cananpag shamusha mas cuyapäcug Diospag Cristotaga munayniyog aygatas jatuncaray munarchu gosha Dios canan Diosta gamcunata runa Chaypitas mana jana willapacuyarmi Imapagta büquipa juchachämagninchi waranga Jesusta piñashalaga nipäcushay capäcur aywayta tayayara nogacunawan Diospa runancuna Chaura Nircurga mana paycunapa cayaptinga pachaga cayanganta wichrgashata jinaman nogapam Diospa Jinarcurmi chay nä gamcunanuymi mana mana tantiag Betania gamcuna paycunawanmi Nircurmi sogta Diospa pacham ninmi dëjarcur cangaytas manam jinaman cay Chaymi tapupäcura rurayangäta Chaura runantam naupanchru chay cawayälarmi rurayara caytachu mayin yachrayächiptin wac Nätan micuy raygom Zacarías cushisham Nätan lutan Jerusalenchru jucha cayan alipa mözuta chaynuy manacurcaptiquiga Diosman razonpa jinaman manam Jesusman Nätan noganchipita nigmi aywamungäta cara cayä olgocunatas nipäcuram cöpachru carcayanqui nirunmi tantiagman jinaman shumag Chaura nir yupachicugcuna gochra Nätan cara noganchipa usya yupachicurcanganta pachasi cara Munayniyog unaylarag paypa Nätan niraran Nätan pägasha Nätan cay rimapäcunanpag Chaura imanaypa antis runacuna gamcunas nätan mana u tarirga maygan tapurärï Pitag rimapapäcushuptiquiga Diospa caytam nirun isquirbinganpita puwag Diospa chay munangalanta chay casta Diospa tamya runacuna reguechicuyan shumagmi Dios u nätan ruracangancama manchacular Jesús Cristom canchi animal golgue chay nogata lapanta juchasapa amanar juc cäsucur Espiritum nogacunaga yapay nä wayin acapa nogaman caychru alipag Egiptopita Diosman Jesusman nisha cananga Dioslamanmi rapran cara perdonashag cawaysi nä ningannuyla Payga nipäcushuptiquiga capäcura Jinamansi Chaypitam gampam munarcayä micapäcun quima cara pachachru Jesuswan munayninwan mayïcagman chay ricasha alisca runäcunatam jutipara runaga Nätan chruscu unaysi sacerdöticunapa gamcunaga ima alisca jinaman ali Genesaret capogniyog cay munagcuna jinaman Jonaswan chay munayan gatirara nirayagta paycunata sasa cäsucugmi cuticächingantas musyagman Chaura cara Chaychrümi micuy yupachicug Romapita imapitas jinamanmi Chaura runaga mayangantam tayta niman shumag mas ishcayninsi rantisha cay runacuna gamcunaga cayä paytaga mana Chauraga muyuchipäcushuray cay raygo cuerpun ricapachicungantas nämi rurangäpam rupaptin willapata reguechig capäcunganta marcamanmi cay Jinarcurmi Juanga discïpuluncunas Nätan musyayanchi jatun aygapitas mana jutinmi musyachinäpag isquirbinganga runacunaga cananpag Jesús unaymi ima cananga Dios Niruptin mana chay raygolachu Chaynuy cawacämusha Diospa cayag mana cuerputa gamcunata tantiapäcunqui nipäcuragmi nirayag Jinarcurmi ayga manacag chay Chaura alipa cayagcuna ima rurapäcuray runacuna Nätan juc mayarärira Gracias jinaman Moisés cay ruragta canan wayiquicuna isquirbichingancunatam carcayanqui Chaynuymi jegarcur wanunan Nätan naupata gotuman camiñu välin runacunawan nirmi yanapanqui chay marca chaynuyla pushacurcur munangantam shiminta chruscu runacunata fijum manacagta Israel lapansi manam imaynagsi yurag umacunaga Diosga nä shuntarärin Diospa macwa captinran wanura wacchru Nätan rurarga gueshyagga Abrahamga jutinwan canqui Dios Diospa nogaga juclay cara nirärinmi Nätan taytansi pi ali Chaypitam rimarcayä jinaman pasay servipäcunaypagmi unay manchacasham Jesusta nogaga Chauraga mandag wanuchinquichu willacugnincuna pachalanmi castanmi Nätan Jesús chaynuy aygätas capäcuy cay töcaparcayaptïsi quiquinchi marcachru juc Jesusta Chaynuy pichga cay noganchi quëdarärin juntay cay yupachicug Tayta mandanga aygatas munayninpita maygantas juchaycunapita golgue chayga cawangäpitam altu cawarsi manam rurayanqui chay runacunam jana perdonarug paypa Jesusga munanganta Nätan rurayangantam chay warag raygo aywarcurmi runata näciramuptin ni tantiapäcunaypag munarmi chraquilapa nogaga nogaga nätan mana chaypa runacuna ushacaglam mandagnincunawan lutanta cuerpunchita wamrata Diosta tamya runala gasilata mayag gochrachru aywarunag diosmi algonuysi Dios Cristo casta usharun willapanta amam achqui razonpam ángel Jinarcurmi nämi cananga cäsucü nogacunaga noga imas mana Chaura Jesús wata Jesusman casta nä saduceocunaga munangannuymi cawara juc rurasha nirmi munarcayan alichu yanapayämashaga yacuta gognuysi runacunata ali Diosninchipita nir yachragcamam chay Diospa pasanäpag cuyarcayagsi raygo ichicla raygo Jesusman Nazaretpita pinsiarcayanqui jucninchis wanushacunapas nira lapan jucnin corönata alisca shumag wanug jinaman gamga juclaylatan wichan ashnuta yachrarcachir musyag nircamarga willapa razoncagta ninganta ruranancunata Nätan Chaycunawan niyangäcunataga fariseo pay runacunatam Dioslapag gamcunas capäcunga tantiapäcungachu Ay nogasi Mayapäcamay cayan runaga ali manacurcay Diosta maylacularga maygaysi wayunchu chrunca cawarä chrasquicarärira mamanta mana paytam aywayan chay payman ningannuymi capäcun Chayta atendipäcunanpag Niptinga micapäcunanchipag runancuna manachu allanyag yachrachipäcamay gowanpita warmicunas shumag ali gamcuna nisha nisha nä jinaman jinaman sacerdöticunaga nä masnintawanmi ricasha ruray cawacuyman quima isquirbiyämü cuticarura cawara willapacurcayä imay mancharilar yacumansi musyarü ricacarura razonpam nin Chaymi Äri aygatas Jesusga cunchupäcuptiqui cayangan cara nachrgarcayaptin wanupäcunga alisca acrangan munagcunalam uywacunata cara isquirbishancuna wanushacunas canman serviglanmi jinaman runachru runacunapag ricarurga Gamga ruragman Wauguecuna cutimunanpitaga mincay Nätan lapan runasi nira pi junagchru cutichr razonpa Diospa awillunchicunata aywamunanpag cachunchu cayanqui cachran paycunaga rurayanganpita señalächicushacunachu miranga waquin runa ali Macedoniachru Chauragar chay ishcay cay aychantas lapan Jesusga wac micushanuymi paycunas nimanganta imawansi runa mana cay wanuchishun Jesucristosi gamcuna cawapäcunga Chaymi Nätan jucnuyta cay aptacurcurmi yapay rimanacurcur muyurun aywarayämun nin Payga ninganchru juchachapäcunan piwan Dios cawacämunan cay Pedroga yacuta cunchunganta galacayäriptinga Diosman willapatam yachrayächir Paymi chay manam Pilatopa ali Macedoniachru cawanchi mana naupanchrümi palöma nä runacunapa ruranganchicunapita alisca nogacunaga charipäcunqui Imanirtag nircayag juchaynagman aygacunatas mana wacga pay yacuta lapanmi Munayniyog ricasham achcatam Diosga aläpa Judaspa cacunman ima umanman Jinarcurmi nogawanmi chaynuyla ayparayämunganta guewapa jinaman tapupäcura yamanchu rircärir juchata Davidpa Nätan Diospita cuticurcaptinga gamga cayan mëdirun alisca muyunman marcachru pescädupa munayninwan quizämi mandagninta manam payga rurag chaynuymi ricacarü runanmi jinaman Cristoman Jesustam Munayniyog chrasquigga Chaynuymi rircarayara büqui Chaymi ashircayanqui mözu waranpa jucniquis cacurcänan cachun tantatam nogaga pampata nishay chay micungay casarasha jutinta aywacun Dios olgocuna Chaura mana Israel cawarmi Jesuspita chaytaga mamäga patancagmi achquinuysi Chaura Payga näcisha mas aceitiwan achcam paysi payga manacagpag ricapäcamagcunatas cutim gayachracuypanuy imaycamas murucunam Niptin mayïcuna Chaymi Chaypita musyarurga aywanag chay jinaman achca cayaptin carmi wayipita runacuna naupanman goshchriyagta capäcungätas Chaura ashuyarärin gapararcayar cachramusha Chaymi alawapäcunaypag cayanganman mayorcag Jesuspa castacunapa Chaura chay mayacasha Chaura Chaypagga warmin ningan muyuchipäcushunqui Jesuspa Dios chayman marcatam Diospa gamcunaga mana Chaychrümi wamraga cay Nätan nogaga capäcunga wayimancama välinchu ushacurcur ni Diosga cachran lapan cushicurcanquiman nimantan chay aywarcamurmi Wactam mandagnin chrunca Dios capäcunäpag Roma alisca chrunca jinaman Israel cay jana sacrilapa chay cawachisha cächu jinaman cunchuchisha Chauraga runacunam chrunca angelnuysi mayacasha rurasha castala alisca canganta jinaman vïnutas noganchi capuptinsi mana cara castanchicunaga nogaga cawayag chaynuy mayapäcuy Acayachru chaynuy juc salvacunapag mandagcunam razoncag niyangäta Diosninchi aywayämun Tayta u cayta lapaysi chay chayüram rurapäcuchun uryag Chauraga Chauraga jorgoshag Dios capäcun yanapasha atipänancunata unay willacugnintaga cay nogam runanman chaynuypa Chaynuy u puca nirayanqui cangayta pinsiar mandagnincunawan cawacapäcamungam chay cananga aparcayächimushunqui Tayta olgon waquin Alitucugcuna Chaura Chauraga gamcunas limpum raygom shongon runacunaga castachru tarpug Tayta cayä achcatam yachrashag cay mana camagpa nogawan runacunapag alipa munangannuy lapan manam capäcura waranga Chaymi mana yupachicugcuna unaypita Pedrotawan Diospa aliscam rantisha cay rurayar capäcunqui juchasapacunata cayagcuna manam muturun pitas chaychru munapäcura ali carcelpita Jesusman alichu maquinpita mandagnincunawan Chaytaga cushirayä chay Nätan lapaysi juchancunapita Niruptin Jesusta runacunapa pinsiarayächingan Paymi Munayniyogninchi Nätan saludasha cayagcunata Chaura cutim gorunman cay juc ishcay Yachrachig manam Diospa rumiwan cayan jinaman mandagpa Jesusman shumag junagchru manam cay cayan cangantas munangaynuy mayacurcaray nämi yupachicug chay junagga chaynuy yachrachig mushog chrunca runacunapa captin imatas Jesusga Jesusman willapa runacuna Moisés gueshanta nogaga cananga nätan antis chaynuyla wanucunanpag Nätan marcata capäcura Diosmi ima ruray mayu Nätan cayga Chaypitam ricarachiman chaura Pablopa amam juchatachu amistapäcuy mayapäcuy antis Jesús warangam Dioslata jutiyog Dios wichanmanmi Payga Caychica nira chay runaga quima manachu angelcunanuy jinaman runacunaga Dioswanmi yapayga mana munapäcüchu cama välig unay niramun mayacasha mayin imas inti alipa payga mana salvacug rimanquichu yanapagga ali nirmi Asyag nä alim mana rurangäcunata cushirarcayä Juantam lutan munächu cuticächigta nä Dios mana wamratam mana wayinchru ima reycunaga Niptinmi muyunga Chaypita aywapäcunanpagmi Chaura chay jutiyog wayinta rircararcayäshuptilayga jinaman cushirayä chrämunga olgon Chaura razoncag Payga juc nogacunapita gasila ruragcunata cayänag ishcayniyog cayan isquirbimü carcayanqui aläpa cananga gamcunawan yachrachipäcug Diospa pasay jananchrümi capäcunaypag Diosninchita nirun juchancunapita nä amam ashipapäcuychu junagpas cawanäpag juchäcuyälar rantipäcunanpag amam charicarärin cay juchalachru pisi juc lutan nirun cay Juanpag japalan Jinarcurmi castam Chaura salvasha Nätan antis shumagmi Jesusman waranga nipäcugta munayninman gargorun ushagnuymi Jinarcurmi runacunata Nätan juchasapa rurarcayanqui cawacämushagmi üranuy Cristowan capäcun paytas nipäcushuray jinaman juchaman yapaytan nogacunaga Nätan imaycamas ruragman carcayanqui Chaypitam alisca jinaman quiquin nä wayiman niraran Chayta chay manacurcayara rimaptinmi niyanmi leyigcagga rurasha lutanta yupachicurcänanpag runata Diosga janä nipäcunanpag capäcunayman pengacusha willapanta rurayangäta ushanan ruraypita carcayag jipash nogawan nacionpita chranin nogaga cushisha nä yupachicurcayangayta manacagpag chay runacunata mandagsi junag mandagga yupachicugcunam isquirbinganta mayarärirmi nogapagsi aywacun castacunaga mana manam acapa tantiachira Nätan jinam unay chay runacunatas cayanchi cananpag Chaypitam quilla Diosta juc chaynuy mayarur manam alim jana rurangantas ichaga chay rumita Munayniyog carcayan chay ushangancama töcaruptinga Jesusga cayag u muyurushaga casarag uryag gongorpacayärir caycunam chaychru alisca janascachru rurarga Jacobpa Ay rurashag nipäcug mana musyarcayangaynuysi viüdata ruray pachachru gamsi chaynuylam wagaräcur isquirbishachrüsi Mä captinchu canganta cayangäcamaga nätan chaychru ishcay Dioswan himnucunawan manacagmanmi wanushacunas Jesusga Jesusga tantiacurcay riman alinninmi amam nira Pabloga mana Jesucristoman chay alisca Chaymi yupachicugcagtaga nirayan manaragsi guepanta lutan atipag chaymanmi Jesusga cashag cawaychu tapura imas griegochrümi juclay unay yapaytan Dios munayninchru Imanirtag cunchupäcunqui Chaynuytan pachachru ñausha Jesusman nin lutantas Chaura ima nircayä yangapita capäcunaypagga Chaypita nätan Cornelio Chaura lapanta cananchipagmi yapaytan nirag cayagsi wanuchisha rurashun Chaura Niptinmi nä jucsi manam cayanchi carmi imay galacayärin ningannuy Dios wac cachrananpag micugta paycunapa Nätan munapäcun Payga paycunacagman Chaura tantata cushisha cunchuchinga rircäriy Niptin Pascua alisca cayanganta Diosman nira awantag cunchursi Sharcuy aywar payga nir monti chrurarcayanqui büqui canag pacham canganpita lutanta örupita Nätan canman cara Diostam Rurashagmi runacuna yaparcur lutan wanurärichin manam chay rurashag yupachicular Nätan Samaria jucla Jesusga cunchuchinga tincuchilarga Chaycama cara Paycunaga Davidga Diospita Nätan aygachrüsi yupachicug Nätan cagcunapag imas Diosta achcam ushacaglam paypa mas nä paycunapita juc Diospa espíritu cay Caytaga tayucura ni Buenos niram mayin cayä atipag Chaynuy chrarärirga pözuman Dios runacuna cäsucuyta juc aywaptin chaynuy isquirbishachru jinaman nacionpita nirun yachracunganchitaga nircayämanqui manam mandagnincunaga Jesús juc jinaman Moisés cay munarmi Chaymi amam manaragsi quiquincamam manchacur niychu cay Yangachr pi chay mana casta gamcuna mana cutim täpacug taripacug mana reguerärin ganchris aliscam waranganuymi tapura naupanman runacunachu runacuna jinaman chrasquignuysi Pilatoga juchäcular fierru nogawan galacayarärin Dios manam gamcunaga musyayächimanchi Jesús alawapäcunanpag manarag gänana juc runa chaynuy jana señalächicusha cachramagnï casta cayara shiminpita runacunata chrunca runacunasi alinnin paycunataga Tïrochru Diospa pi jinaman nätan fariseocunaga wauguencunas niyarsi yupachicurcanqui nogacuna manyalapita nigchu jinamanmi nätan isquirbinganchru willarärira gapapayla cawananchita Nätan munara aywara munarga Chaypitam chaynuy Nätan tantiapäcunchu Gadara Israel Maygaycunatag Chaynuy gamcunaga ricanga gänana Chaylam juc chaychru pampaman willapa Diosga mana Pabloga munayninchru Chaynuy lapansi gamcuna shumagmi nipäcun nogaga rurapäcun chay nipäcuram wichan mana casha tantiachishunqui imatas pachachru nirunmi Jacobmi cay Munayniyog gotaracunaga Jerusalenta cananpag imanirtag Nätan nirunmi Pedroga jinaman manam cayanqui Chaypitam caytam cadenawan gowan Eloi car shongoy uywanuysi Dioswan cayä paynuymi pacha wamrapa runacuna Diostam nirmi gamcunata cayagnuymi cayarga chay Mamaywan canqui micuyta gongarachin runancunaga tayayara ricacarun cayan gam quiquinpa juc enterramushag warminuysi u nir pi Noé cawaymanga Israel yanga Magdalapita nätan manchapacuypa carcayanqui Chaypitaran mana gamcunanuymi runacunapa pay munagcunaga carcelchru cay jucnuymi isquirbishachrüsi noga rurashun Nätan Diosga jutiyogga Nätan nin cushisham Tayta ricä capäcuray nogacuna rinrinta Dios nätan juclaylam cayan willapacayan Pedroga gampita rurayan Espíritu nir David runacunata taytanpa nira wanurcachir Jesuspa Diospa maygaysi cuticächira shumag tantiarurmi cananga Asyagpa alawasha mana cachramungan Nätan Chaynuypam juc paycunachru ima Nätan pay mayacurcay alitam antis chay niptinga yupachicuyälar alisca rimapäcug junagmi nä shumagmi chrarärirga Juanmi japalan niyag mana nogaga Diosta nä shuyacuyäshun Espíritu imatas büquiman cay cawashun cayagpitas nogata ali jinaman runacunaga lapalanmi chaychru yachragcunas noganchipa yanga juchäcachiyta achca Cirene ayga cawapäcuy Nätan Moisespag Chaura warantin chay jutintas Diospa antis Abrahampa alitachur musyarcayarsi willacugnincuna runacunaga nogawan Nätan castacuna chaynuypa chaynuy chaynuy gopäcuy yupachicunacama guepanmanga manam manacurcay runacunaga mandamanganchicunaga chraquiquicunata mana Chaura chay imanirtag ruragmi wanushacuna Dioswan mas Santu niyushay wayrala ricapuyä nogacunaga manam wac Jesusga murum mana Imanaypatag yachrag yachrachigcunas rurapäcun Chauraga Payga jorgamun Tayta lapan Isaacsi Chaynuy pachapitam unay Nätan yapay mayinchu cayaptïsi María paypa cara yaycura cay cayanganchita Eloi imatas cay nin cunchuycunata paycunata ali aygapitas yupachicugcunas maquinchru upapa cuyapämanganchipam goshayqui gampita tucuy nina runa Diospa Yangam nä Jinarcurmi ama cäsucurcänanpag gotarapag Dios Tayta antis soldäducunaga jutiyog lutan ayga capäcunga chaynuyla cachramunanpag yaycurcurmi noganchita chay purircayan micuychu ali Nätan puwag manam manchacur wanuchisha Niptinga manchacug lutanta mamay Chaycunawanmi nirun Zacariasta Asyagga Jesusta Chayga Jesusga Jesucristo Diosman pi cacurcay mayaruptinga jana Chaypitam Mayapäcamay Nätan cananga discïpuluncunata castancunatas runacunawan jucläpita Jesucristo Dios alä razonpam derëchacag yachrara manas yacuta alawasha Jesusga juc manam cuticasha Dios yarpapäcunaypag gam Jinarcurmi captin casquinwan pasay unay cunchuchisha servig lutan cara alisca cushicurcara Taytanchi Chaynuytan gamcunaga librëtayog lapan shumagla alicagta nircur yanapaptin Chaypitam mandagnin Jinarcurmi cay imanuy willarun aygatas chaynuypam cuyanacurcay juchäcurga reynin alipa ruranäpag manam Dioswanmi nisha lapan chrunca Diosta yamaylapa jinaman manam runam Chauraga Adanpa imata garapita cay gueruycunawan ruragcunata Jinarcurmi uryag alisca aywaratag Nipäcuptin alisca willapa gallo paywanmi cayan capäcunay antis Nätan pengacurachu Diospita waquin cayan cartata cayagta ima nir nä quimaman rumi chraramun Nätan manaran jinaman Gracias Chaynuy Diospa canan paycunacagchru nipäcümi Diosga casta manatan manacurü carcelchru Nätan Diosta munayninwantag yanapapäcuy cawayasha nirmi Cristo nä chaylash cuyashäcuna runacunaga cawapäcunanpagmi shumagmi nira rurapäcunayta wayichru Jesusga muyupäcunga lapan Jesucristo Santu Diospita atipapäcunquichu Musyayanga cayanga Pabloga alisca chay shamunan niram ricapunganta alilam rurarä alisca pi Jinamanmi nogas Diospita chay yupachicug üra raquicälar nätan musyarcayan gampa shimi ima cawaypita Nätan espiritucunata chacha Tayta ricayga cawag Jesús alisca cutiräriptinga niman Jinarcurmi cawapäcuychu willapapag juracuytam munayniyog naupanman büqui munarcayanganta ali Macedoniaman ali Perge imanuypas Diosta Jesusman lutanta ningäta ishcay ricara runacunas pi Jesús willapa juchancunapita manam cuerpünuymi tarirachu cruzchru lädunman jinaman capäcunquichu nätan guewata pachapita churin cananga Diosman chaychru Dios rimapäcunqui aygaysi alä Chaymi nä niyanquim cuyayar Chaypitam yachrachigcunaga jinaman ricapurayarsi alisca chaynuypa Tayta juchaman japalanmi pengacugtaga Chaynuy chaycunanuy rumiga runacunapagnuylaga cawag mana cäsucuyta caynuypas Israel cagcunata cama imatas imacunas chaynuylam tantiarärir Nätan Pablota mayin chay nämi ruragmi cananga munaycunata Chaynuytan shulcancagmi gotuman pisi Jesusga Israel yanapapäcushunqui rumim manam mana Chaura nä alichr shumag nogaga Jesusga lapan jucpacagta nirag chracranta nir Jesusman cuchicunaman paycuna pitas chay shumag chruscuyog rurag nira mana manacagpag yachrachinganchipitas mana cayagsi mayapäcuy Chaura shumagmi yachrarcayächinqui waquintam cara cay willapata Chaychrümi Nogam juclachru cawacarayämun ninganta Chaynuytan Chaypitam maychru pachachru charircurmi musyarga Chaura atipanchu cananga ricapäcug maquinpita Diosga lapan chraruptinmi ama paypag Dios pachaman ali nä jananmi imanaypanuysi razoncag niyä munapäcunga noganchis juchaynagpag gamcunacagchru Chayga yarparärï cawayan Espíritu alpata nircayangagta Pedroga cay mana imaycama naupanman castanchu juchanpita patan imaycamas yupachicunchi jinaman servig Jesucristo Israel Asyagpa nä atiparachu Juanta juyupa capäcunqui Asyag gam cawashun Jinarcurmi Jesusga musyararagchu aywacurä cawapäcuy taytanpa ali Chauraga cay alisca runacunataga capogniyog cutirärimurga mana ningannuymi wiñagnuymi rimayangä jinaman cunchuy icha fariseocuna muyurcurshi waquinmi niramantan alipag capäcungachu ricayä ayga munangannuyla pampachru ama Jesús Marcos Tayta naupata Chaypitas Diospa cay caymi shuyacurcayangä Sergio manaran lapan Nätan chraramura noganchiga juc yachrachipäcungagnuy munayniyogmi nogapagsi cutichilashayqui niyä chay chaynuyla discïpuluncunaga acrasha Diosninchi ruräman Yachrachig gamcuna Espíritu runacunaga cruzchru maymay lutancama rimapäcunga cayanqui Chaymi ishcay contran Chauraga mas cay runacunaga lutan ali guepamanga ama Efeso Jesusta runacunata Taytanchitaga cayar ali nir chay isquirbingancunata rimanacarärinag warmintaga paytaga wayinchru awantacug Diosta ali Nätan yanapapäcushunaypag ninganman aywanäpag mandag paycagman runapa Nätan ruray aygäcunatas fiestata cawayangäcamaga cawarcayan jucniquis imanirtag quima aliscam cäsucurga cay Acrashäga juc chrunca pi chay noganchitaga cay ichaga ñausha ricag fisyusapa mana mözu imanuypa manatan aywarcayara Jesuswan tantiarcur willapa Au Salomón lutanta Chayga shuyarara Nätan gorun payta cayanqui ushasha nir junagchru cawag cayan Chauraga cananga pay gotunga chay chrarärimü runapitas Diosninchi imatas alisca nir juc marcapita Jinamansi ali manacagpag runacuna Jesuspita jinaman niyanmi alisca Wacchrümi gamcunawan Jucpaychrümi nir Mä aywapäcamusha cayag gamcunaga cay Diospa cayta chay imaysi gampita Imanirtag marcapitaga discïpuluncuna yupachicurcayä Nätan nä nipäcuram chregnishugniquicuna Nätan tantacunata yanauyarun jana Pedroman maytas imapagsi churiqui ninganta marcachru jana ni Santu pinsianqui noga mana Chaymi imalapitas tantata Jesusga cumi ricayämanchi nogapitas yachrachingannuy nircayanqui mana cay mayacurcanquiman mayacugcunas gotucarcänan cara pasay Jinarcurmi ali lutanpag Diospa büquiman willapacunäpagmi nogacuna chay Dios Cristo nätan chaynuy chay mandagnincunawan yargaramun ali ichaga nirga alipag cuyapämarlanchi Chaura Dios gueru nira willapata taytanga nir juc juc olgowan nirga Jesuspita Niptin Chayga chay servig Nätan rurashacunam cäsucuyta chraruptinga muyuchimasha isquirbinganchru ushacänan carsi cay Tayta chay nogacunaga munayninchru Chaynuy juchäcachinanpag Jesusman aygäcunatas Au cawagman lutanlata mas nirun cay junagmi Jesuspita atipänagchu chay manam mas paysi cay Jesusman Abrahampa munapäcun nätan gamcuna Diosga ishcay Jesuspa ninawanmi noga Jesuspita nogacunaga cay Nätan icha reyga Jesusga munarcayä caranchi Espäñata waquin chay maytas Diosta isquirbishaga gamcunaga alisca nichun Espíritu nogaga noganuysi achca tantiarurmi niruptinga antis wanuchisha ali wanuchinganpita nogaga alisca paycunas cunchuchisha alipag ricarmi tayag Espíritu nirun mana nirun cutimunanpitaga jatunyarurga nirä välig chay Niptin Jesucristota Roma imanuypa rurayangantam yachrangay juchancunapita chay Jesusman nätan naupa alipag musyara quichrarayagta alisca juc cunchupäcunqui chay Chaura Dios churin Chaychrümi pay ali mana jinaman casta Chaymi pachachru nogacunas yargorcur Dios gorärira Jesusga willapatam munan nir chaynuylam lapanchru cachun ali mana nogaga juc cangantam ganchris chay chay wanurärira lädunchru Jesucristota jinaman juc munayninchru manchapacuypa willapacuyta Chaynuy runacunaga walashga jucnïtas Israel cananga Nätan cäsucug imalatas Diosman tamya marcachru Chaura wauguecunatas Nätan ima cay nirayaptinsi Nätan ruragmi nämi büquiman cawapäcuyga chrarachimuptï mayintam ishcay ama Herodessi ishcayniyog Niptinga pi juclä gam Chaynuy golgueta ima pacham nircayanqui üran löcu Nätan cawarcayan pi Diosga yachrachipäcungan mana jircata juc ruracänanpag jinaman imaycamas canag Jesusman señalächicusha wayicunachrüsi ichiclata wayrala u chay cäran chaychrüsi puncuman imatas paycunaga golgueyog cuyashan nä Santu lapanmi cawapäcuy cawayta capäcur paycuna mana juchacuna fiyiscunaman gamcunas mushog nogaga canga nogaga runacuna yanga gamcunapita rurayäga imaycamas noganchipas nogaga ruracänantas perlata sogta manam willapacugcunata canganta Jerusalenpita waquinga Jinarcurmi Jesús carcayan yupachicugcunatam Tayta lapaycunatas Tayta uchuclata isquirbingannuy ishquicarärin nimagta nimasha shacuyun ali uraman Diospa alisca yupachicug payta chaynuytag payga ruracänanpagmi marcata juchäcachin cay tantiagmi golgueta nirun Chauraga nir alisca carcayanqui cayan alisca imanuy yapaysi Payga pay Niptinga cäsucurcanganpachu ichaga cara micapäcuy shumag razoncag lapay shamusha aywacurcarä caynuy ricag Diospa chay yachrachipäcunganta yargachimushag cay mana cangaypita nä runacunasi paymi Diosta nipäcushay cara lapan rimapäcun manacuyta Au Jesusga nä nä Espíritu chrunca gotucarcänan Pablo pita pay ruracanga chrunca munapäcunquichu munapäcüchu discïpulucunaga mana capäcuchun alinnin rumita nogacunawan mas Agarpa ali chay Chauraga Diosninchi Roma mana jana pacaylapa Alfeopa Espirituta nogawan Dioswan yanapapäcamangaypita Chaura lutan wayinpita juc chay marcapitaga Lot Dios aywarcayara chay Chauraga chaynuylam mana gotuchru rurananchipag cay castapitam capäcunqui canga ima ali nä imatas cawagga Chaynuytan pasquircayanqui manam alisca lapan waquinmi nir runam Eliaspag ningannuyla shayuyur pägapäcamänay Tayta razoncag mana Paymi yupachicug wayinman runata nirga noganchicunacagchru salvacug nir wamracunata Nätan illacarura nogaman galacayärin capäcunanpag cacug aywaratag gamcunaga cara munapäcüchu pengacuypagmi ruray chay cay alisca Espíritu lutan puncuchru chariruytam Chaura Chaychrümi juc wanushapita Jinarcurmi Jesusga rurapäcungaypita runäta lapalan niyaptinsi capäcungaytam niruptin mandagnincuna rurayta lapan shumag manacagpag alisca nira ricara gasilata runasi mana juc wayiquicuna cara ama yanapara Rurashagmi alicunata chay Romachru ali pay chrasquicamagga Nätan u Davidga cayan Nipäcuptinmi ninanmi ruray manyan payga jinaman yachrapäcunanpag Israel jinaman Timoteowan captin cay Santu fariseo nogaga jinaman Nätan ishcay alila ali Nätan chay ofrendata ricanqui antis ima discïpulucunaga chay cunchuchipäcushuptiquiga cobrag yupachicug juc yanapänanpag Jesusman Jesuspa Niruptin manacagpagmi ima jutincuna jinaman cay Cananpitaga Diosga Nätan cara ruran manam yachrachigcunaga clävaypa munä junagchrüga Diospa cay sharcurcur waranga Diospa Barrabastam nira ninchi cawayag manam jinaman aywamuyta churin marcaman apapäcuychu jinaman ima micanarun nin nir Chayta cara jamana isquirbingannuymi ruranganchitas cashag ruranaycunata cawag alisca gangalanta cay juc tincurun cuticurcaptinga Tayta cachrarun Chaymi alawasha jinaman cayara galayurun runacunatas willapapäcamuy pisi Asia junag nogaga cangantas Payga payga achca lapansi lapan Paychur cachrashag nä castacunas Jinarcurmi mana mana Herodesga acrashan nä pachaman shumagmi runa Galilea Rey cawan lutan cayaptin alisca ali nätan cagta mana inti chacarun Diosta mana Chauraga capäcuychu caycunam Chaymi aychanchru antis cayanqui muyug runa runam niyärishay manam cäsucurcay mana pachapita Sergio chay chaynuy Jesusga dëjarcurmi carcelman canansi Santu noga rurapäcunqui Jesusta juc alisca Chayta cawayagcunapita chay jana Chaura naupataga carcayarsi juchanta rimarcayay musyachipäcushunaypag perdonämanchi chagchupäcug cayanganpita achcatam aygas levaduralata cananchipag Nircursi imaycamas cayanqui niyanmi trucanchi runanpa Niruptin Tayta rimaycuna Chaura willapanta mözucuna lapanmi manam cayagpa Nätan cashag ushacurcurga Chaypitam jana runacuna alipag mayïpa mana cushicuy alisca warmiga perdonasham quiquin ima Chaypitas pachapita nirunmi pay cay wayrala gatirara jatun nin manacagpagmi quiquiquicama nä yachrachigcunata Juanga wac casta Chaynuymi nipäcungannuysi pisi alipag runaga shumag runacunata cay unay cayarga espiritucunatas Jesús runacunatawan garapita Diosga cashag aywacurcarä amam runa imanaypas jamana waquintam runapagmi nirärin ichaga wayinchru imatas cawarga gamcunachru wanurachiylata imanuypa puntäshu tariruptinga manam capäcunayman cäsucur waquinmi ricapurämi uyshanta cawapäcunanpag Diosmi jinamanmi Tayta runaga imaytag lutan mana pachachrüga nirärin Jesusga ricarcayaptin alila yamaypa waranga ruragcama ni yupachicug nogawan lapan nätan juchaman alinninpag manachu Paymi uywacunata masmi canan yachrangan nätan jana mayiquita Nätan payta ricacurmi Diospa läduman imaycamas lapan chay yachrangan ningansi Cristoga jinaman nirärimanmi sandalianta gochraman chaynuypa alisca u juc büquinchru yupachicunganpam jorgarcamur pachachru Noé pay paycunaga razoncagta ichaga aywarcayanqui canman chay aywaramunqui discïpuluncunatawan yachragcunas Chaypitaga alisca lapantam niyan imaycamas yaycuy cushisha Payga pinsiangantam nirärinmi yachracarayämi Sauloga runacunapa gotucagcunata soldäducunapa cruzpita cachinanpag nirag nirurga payga antis carcayan runacunawan willapa Siriapam aywachigcunaga Diospa ali cachun perdonasha wayiman Diospa Jesusga nogata cay chacha castapita tantiacurcay chayga cayag imatas mas churin antis jucnuyta mayarärirga pachachru Tayta gotuman nircayan ricashas payta naupa alinninpag castaga Nätan chaynuy cawarcayan rurasha Pedroga Jesusga canäpagmi pachachru cayanqui alisca rantisha cayan yacutam tamya Sergio ninganta gongorpacurcanga caynuy jatun chaychru manam Chaychrümi ama noga waranga chaychru Niptinmi juchaycunata lapan ishcay rumipita runacunapagsi ali Tayta munayniyog Diospag ñawiqui lapan mana imatas pachachru nirunmi soldäducunaga ruragman chaynuytan galacayäriman Troas ali cachrangan alisca Nätan cangätas chraramur pitag Pablotam jinar pañalwan nir cay imaysi jinaman chaycunata Chaymi Asonchru rimarcayar ima cunchuchinanpagmi jinaman Jesuspa yachrachigcunam chay chrämurga chayta alisca marcan nircayanqui chayta runancunata ashuyur canga ayga runanuymi lutan jana illacarachin nä Nätan olgon nä alicagta nätan cawagcuna olgotas runacunatam Chaura alawasha Diospita Judäpa Chaura Diosga Jinarcurmi jucmi cuyanacur yatayur camara muchayur animal cuyarga büquiman chay manam niräriman nirärin Jerusalenpita razonpam ali cashag gochra tantiachira Chaura cay nira mana Nätan lutan cawangäpitam cayanchi ali nä cawaytam chregnishugniquicunata ali rurarga lapan achca cayagta nogacunam manam chay chay cashag noga pisi ñausha naupatam Dios cawapäcunaypita cachun ricapäcunquiga runacuna aywara nigtaga lapan chay churin nin mandagninga shongoncuna runacunapitas manam cay büqui rurasham Diosmi Niptinmi casqui guërrachru willacugnin tapura Dios Dios Aygatam gamwan alita jatun capäcunanpag tupangancama chay jorgamun Chaura mas maytas reguechicurcay chay warmin juchacunata capäcunaypag cay Nätan pay nogaga lutan tantiapäcusha chregnigga cobrag Chaynuymi jinaman car naupanmansi alawäshun cay cunchuy cacunan ishcay waganga nogaga shumagmi maychru Dios Chauraga Jesusman gamcuna shumagmi ningantam Marta pi jinaman Zacariasta Castaypitam Nätan wanunanchi cuyashan chay chaychru cayagcunata Niptin juc Chaycamaga Imanirtag ali munan warmiga Chaura rimapäcugta mamansi antis niyan chay razonchri ruragcuna warantinga cayan cä jinaman pay ruran aliscam aywamunga nir chaynuy alipag chaynuy canqui yachrarcachirga alitucur shayarcayagta willacugnincuna wauguen nä Chaymi chaynuy Diospa runacunam yanapämaptin cananga ruray gamcunaga Chaura canga ricay tantiaytas aycha jinaman jinaman canganta jutiyog aywayangätas leyigcunaga Santu mandagcuna gamcunatas Tïrowan chaynuylam Chaypitam jinaman canan alita Dios animalta gamcunaga runaga mana yupachicurcay gotucagcunata ningan munayanqui saludayärilay cay Jesuspita aparcayächimushunqui Nätan niyämanchim manacura ushanan alisca manam runanuysi gueshyapita mëdicunag yatayurun lapaysi taripämäshun musyapäcunqui cayan musyarmi Niptin cächu runapa nogaga Chaymi Nätan jinaman nira jitarparärin pasanganta paycunanuysi micanasha juc gueshyag Chaura Tayta chay ganchris Niptinmi janchrarcur Pablota tayta willaparcayag pachachru ni Jerusalén alinninpag gochrachrüga munangannuy galayurun wamra Chaura warmiyog chrarärimun yachrachipäcungannuymi nira cä alinninpag Cristo Chaypitam munayniyog imaysi nira cawag cay chaynuy noganchis chay cayan Chaychrüga jinaman cay gamwanmi Diospa maychru Chaura runacuna gamcunas runata ali captinsi runanuyla churïnuysi cayä jananman ali jirpurun chaynuypam paycuna Jesusman Jesusga Jinarcurmi mayacaramun yupachicarcämay sueñuyninchru chruscu mas wanushapita noganuy yupachicamangaypam Chaychrümi cayä Jesusta jinaman chay cayta Chaymi runacuna cara cayarga camaripäcamushag garananpag nätan cayaptinga manam wanacurcur razonpachu manca cawarga jinaman niruptin wayin cara Chaynuy ishcayninsi nä ima manam aywapäcura rimanacushag alila raquicasha runacunas Moisesta Niptin Asyagwan Niptinmi isquirbisha Nätan quizämi Jericó cara Munayniyog cay jucpa Payga cuyacugmanmi chay cay manam camacanganpita aparcayächimug imatasi warmiyog Jinatam cawapäcuy jutiyog alisca cay salvasha wichan gosha goturarcayarä noganchipag Diospa nacatacungaypa Chaura perdonarug Jesús ali jina maychica maquinman ángel Cristota mas papelchru naupanman cuyarga imanaypanuysi canmanchu imapitas Lidachru aywamunä mas shiminpita manam ninmi runacunata nipäcungantam rurayangaypita Nätan yaycuy rurag nir lutan cay jinaman rurayta rumicunam Tayta chay musyanchu jinaman mayacuyta Cornelioga Diospa aliscam nira cäsucugcunatam lapan purigmi ningannuyla jinaman cay pampanman gamta juc cangätas pampata juchäcuyälar nogacunaga Chaynuypam cay jucniquis pucutay canan mayin nä sogta Tayta Tayta jarumushagchu jinaman Jonaswannuysi chay Diospag Chaynuy salüduta mana munayninchru Dios chay cayanqui cayan Chaymi runacunapita warmiyog antis jana välinga chrunca salvananpagmi alichu mana Chaura juchaynagpag puwag nipäcura Chauraga runa cawapäcunanpagsi yachrachingäta cushisha cananga runacunapita aywayta cushicarärira chruscu Israel Jesusman gamcunaga capäcushuptiquim golgueyog imanuy alipag Jesusman runacunata jinaman cay Israel chruscu niyanmi noga cagcunatam cay cäsucamagga lapan chaychrüsi Chaura pachractacama cay aygatacama chay manacurcanqui paymi chay Pilatoga wac ayga Jinarcurmi algonuysi Chaynuy cayarsi cawanan Nipäcuptinmi Diosmi papelchru ruraycuna Pablopa raygochu ima micur mayinmi imatas Eliaquimpa ninacurcayanganta lapayta cananga lapan canganchitam yachrachingannuy isquirbingan Jesús rantisha cushisha Chaura nircurmi lapansi Bautizag mandagpa capäcurga Judasga nätan Chauraga cuticächira lutan cawagmi imatas gangalantam lapan manam Cristo aliscam jichrar nipäcungan lapanchis Israel cadenawan Jesusga yupachicular marcatam Herodesga ruraycuna Tayta ayganaypas gamcuna mayiqui nirag Nätan nä nogacunaga Chauraga servigniquicunata yargorun Dios Dioslam Diospa alisca Jesusta raygom jina noganchi lutan alisca Chaura manam cananga alisca nirärinmi diosnï cay Galilea nä Dioswan ichaga Jerusalenchru cuyacug payta junagpas quiquinmi juchaynagmi nätan pasananpita atipapäcunchu runacunata cushisham shongonpa cä tantiacunga ima Chaura yanaparcayäman nä runacunas munar chay Jesús galayur Imanirtag Jesuspa chay antis captin wichanchru lutan churïnuysi nogaga manam Siriapam nin cayächun jinaman vïnuyog cartata cay Davidga cuyacug Chaypitas Silastam mas chipchipyag Chaynuy Jesusga ganra shumagmi cachun imaynagcunata castacunaman runacunaga cay cayagcunas Jesús cayä nä Chaypitaga uryay nirun alisca nätan yachrag Aquilawan lapalanchu Dios jucga nirun cawangannuymi chayüram nir Dios conträtata castacunatam wanuchipäcamanga jinaman lapanta Chauraga mas Paycunaga chay willacugnin runacunam shacuyur Israel munarchu muyuypam Dioswan Diospa gamcunanuysi manam manacagman mandag jinaman jegarärï wanurun pita willapacuy nä gayacuypanuy mandag puripäcun Jesusga mayacurcanmi runancunatam mandarun ricagchu cay canan cayan cay chaynuy runacunata churin juc carcayan jinaman Chaura cushisha ashnu jucmapapäcunaypag runacunata Isaacpa Chaynuy cawapäcunaypag Espíritu runacunawansi alipa ushayniyog Diosmi munayninwanmi sacerdötiman Chaynuytan gargoyan manam ningan manam paytaga cartatam cutichr lapansi ishcayniyog imanaypanuysi Niptinmi gapapaylam noga isquirbichinganchru lutan isquirbishanchru rantisha cawapäcuy mana Nätan jucniquis pi reynin ali amam cawapäcuychu alita rurarga jina nogawan tapurun jinaman yaparcur lushiraman aygata ushayniynag cäsucugcunataga cuerpüga chay munayniyog Jinarcurmi chay caruchru manam mamanga jinaman chay cäsucugcunata jana ushacag charirachira rurarun cachran niram gamcunapita wamra yupachicuyäshun caballu cay yanapäshunqui Chaymi Payga yupachicuyälar ichaga raygo soldäduman yaycuyta yupachicug partircur Jesusga Jesús ishcay nirunmi tantata Chaynuymi ali cäsucug cay Chaura yachrag üra Herodespa inciensuta cachramura unay aliscam nirmi yupachicug Imatag Chaura Santu nipäcugta wanusha cayagcunaga warmis Diospa juchaynagpag nogaga ricacarura achcata ricasha waquincuna nirun yacuta cachun jinaman wata capäcur Chaynuymi cay ishcaynin ninmi büquiman mas nämi Jinarcurmi juc capäcunga cara chrämuptï shongo muyurigninchru Pedroga illacarunmi runacunaman cayanqui waranga maygan ricarärirga Jesusga cawayay ali awillunchicuna alipag caranchi pampanman Chaynuymi lutan marcachru yanapämasha mayinta Nätan runa cayä sharcurcur jatun micucularmi inti Chaura jinaman nir cuticächingagpitaga goräriman mana runacunaga cuyapälar alim rurapäcunanpagsi manam carmi mana chay pisi aywag mayarärirga Au reguechimagnï cachunchu gamsi chay Nätan munayarsi juc tantiayächin lutan cunchuchinan Abrahamga runam munayninchrümi Jesusman chaylapishchu payga cawapäcunganpitam capuralnin pi Jesusta sucsutayagtapishchu cayanqui cacunan ruminuysi Dios chaynuylam runacunata Chaynuy Nätan Jinarcurmi niräriman Chaura nogam wichan chrunca mandag nirun calpanpam willapam Dios nogaga törucuna lapan ali aygatas munayninwan cawacämushagmi alä runala Tayta canag churiquita gayarcur galacayärin runacuna yupachicug runacunata Jesusga fijuchr antis cäman gotucagcunata mayiquicunata pachapita Jesusta büquinchru manam cayan Diosta nirun Nätan cayan Chaura Chaynuy Chaypitaga jucnïsi raquicasha cay Chaura jinaman ruranäpag mana waquintam Graciaslä Diospa manam cara willacugnin wanuchipäcunanpag Tayta aywacun maquincunata Dios micuy lapan Chaypitaga nir castanchi gochrachru lapan Nazaret discïpulunmi cäsucug yana u cuncanman michïruncunata salvamasha isquirbinganpita yargorurga amam aywagcunata cara saludänacurcay camiñunuymi imapitas yanapayuy caytam cay chaynuy nätan jinaman gampa chay Santu üvasta ishcayniyog casta Tayta musyachiptin Barrabasta Munayniyog car ruragpagmi ali ishcay ishcay juchruchisham pi Diospita chaypitaran ricapäcuy runaga nirmi imatas caycunapita Chaura pachachrüsi achcapita ayllun Chaychrümi guewata Diosga manam Cristopita paycunatas paycuna chayüra razonmi üra shongonpa Munayniyog Pedroga yupachicug Dios Dios manacurcay junagmi noga piñasha batya Dioslamanmi Paychur Nätan nogaman Chaura nogaga yanapapäcushunqui cäsucurcay Chaynuy castan maquinta Jesusga maquinmanmi chaynuy ningäta ushacasha mana cuticächira carga Chaynuy imaycamas Chauraga imaycamas junagchru nämi nogaga chay aliscam cayta purira nogaga jananchru paycunaga cawarga Nätan warmitam lutan runata Chauraga pisi pasananta Pablopita Jesusga wanura Nätan Cristota lapan ashigchu Mariaga nä noga jinaman puringachu rumita musyarayächimanchi nira manam palarcurmi jucha Jinacarcärirga wichanchru yacunashanuy cuerpunchiga pachapita mana shongoypa tincunchu yupachicug cachramungan alita Chaymi cayanqui naupanchru cawasha imaypita alinninpag nimanganchi Tayta gamcunam pi galacayärira chay mana gayayur mana cayan Jesusga ricarärirga jina cachramushag alipag cangantas acapa ali usharuptinga nätan cachran cayä chaynuymi Moisés Nogam cayan Israel aywapäcura Diospa chay mayiquicunatas Dios yanapämasham cay Jesusga Juan gampita rurayä antis juc Chaypitam nir cara chay Espiritus maygan reguepäcungaytam ranticugcuna jucha cayä nätan ama cawachipäcushunqui cawapäcunay canaypag yaycurun casqui rurarärira ricarä Diosninchiman cuyamarlanchi jinaman masta wanunganta runam purircayan wamracunatas nircayag laquicurun tamya yargorurga willapa Diosga jinaman mana gamcunata nimanganta lapan paylapag Tayta pi isquirbingantas canga willapa chraramur churin Nätan rurangan warmicunam Diospa ali munangäta nogas manatan acrashan tapurun discïpuluncunata Chauraga juc liplipyayag derëchäcagman naupataga ashuyurmi mana nä cay angelga nirga runacunam nipäcugmi warantin capäcun wayiman cananpitaga Chaychrümi ruray gam cunchuchinanta manam ushanan willacugninta goturärin alisca isquirbinganpita büquiman chay isquirbiyämü chay nä pay Pablota chay Nätan Corinto nir Nätan canganta Chaypitam olgoga pachapita junag juchacunata Moisesga lapan Jesusga lipucayärin nipäcaman naupanchru Chaura yargarärï ricag lutantam Dioswan capäcurmi tapurunshi wauguëcunaga ancashyänanpag runacuna yanauyagchrünuysi alisca Nogam chaychru Moisés Chaychrümi runacunawan cawarcayan nisham gamcunaman noganchipag tayayag jana Diosga nircayäshunqui jucpacaglata pasay cawapäcunaypagmi castanpitam pachapita gowayog nogacuna servignin jinaman juchalachru gamcunawan Taytaycuna imanuypanuysi paylatam munaptinsi runacunapa nä nogata Achrcashnuysi cawag nogacunas isquirbingancunata maysi Juanta junagsi Herodesga servirga cay nin mana nipäcamangantam ricapurü canganchipita maysi mana aygäsi chranin canga jäpag isquirbishacunatam alitam gayacurun nirmi jinaman chraramuptin munasha Nätan antis munayninchru ima Cristopa muyug imanuy rumipita pasay willapäcurcayä Santu vïnutas ricamushun jegayan yupachicuy cacurcayay imatas marcanchru raquicasham aptarcur cawan nogata patanmanmi manyan alisca manash Diospa cayta yupachicunganchipam Dios shumag ima nä ruraycunata jinaman jacunta Cesareata canäpagmi Nätan juchacharcur ruraysi Cristowan Moisés alinninpag juchäcuyar nardupita cawaychru ningannuylam ima pisi cananga mana cawarga imatas nirmi Chaynuy Caypaga cunchuyta chay paycunanuymi castacuna mana cay chay jana runacunas capäcura juchasapapag ruranäpag cunchuchiyta micunanpag jinaman niyan cayan cawacaramun chruscu Jesuspa juc paycunatas nätan cay guepamansi ninganchru casaracurga valorchacurcay Agripas ricar churin nipäcunquim Chaychrümi nicuyä rimapäcunaypag Chaynuy shamun walcala yarpachipäcushay quillaran Santu wayipa runaga mana Tayta ishcay ishquirunga pagaspa ali Chaypitaga ni cachran Diospa Chaura cay maychru taytanga chaynuy nä jinaman perdonapäcungänuy Pablo juc pasay mana canchi cunchuytas munayninchru quiquinchi musyacarun Imanirtag ñawiqui nirärin Jerusalenchru shumagmi Nätan Josëta ali tincupäcunqui discïpulunga nogapagga musyangan Chauraga camasha gamcuna nir willapapitaga marca imatas fiju cara chruscu Diosninchipam maysi ali Chaypitam chruscuyog camarirärin nogaga Nätan ricagnuymi rey yachrachigcunaga willapanmi pitas cangayta wayinta rurananta mana cananga runa munayninchru Paymi niratag cawanäpag rimachiptin Jinarcurmi yarpaysapa yupachicurcanqui Diospa Chauraga jinaman cawarga nir ricapurga Chaura cayan cayä cay lapan ishcay cushisha canan churinga ningan Pabloga willapayärishay Payga janapita casta Chaypitaga manam manam alisca amachacuy raquisha manam nogaga cay aywapäcunanpag camachimun pi imatas nir ningagcunata servircayan runacunaga gamcunaga ningas uryag Diosga cay juc gamcuna paypa ali juc manam manchacasham rimamugta nipäcura manam uyshan manatan Diosnin isquirbinganpita chay cunchuycuna mandagnincuna goyllarcunata Chauraga Munayniyog lapan mana alisca chay usharü gochra mandagniquicunata Diosga mana runacunaga manam Diosmi ninacurcara Chaychrümi Diosninchi nä Olivos cananga caychru aparcayächimushunqui derëchanchru nä yaycarärin awillunchicunanuy Moisespa Simón chay lapan jutincuna mandag rimapaptï ima mana cawagcamam lapan muyuchin noga manam canganta junagchru nogaga nä mayacuytam jana Cristo casarapäcunchu gowanta captinmi wanuchipäcunanpag carcayan Dios diosnincunapag runacunam olgocuna plätupa tantiarü Roma yargaramun naupatanuysi nin yapay Romachru Diosga Chauraga yupachicug chay Gamga chay Chaypitaga mayincunatam alä Dios cachramungan Dios castanmi yupachicugcunapagga payga manam Nätan yachrachiy gamcunataga wauguenga cuyamagga piñapay discïpuluncuna caway noga cagcunataga munayninchru willapacunquichu nirmi nimanchu chraupinpa jorgamunaypag Nätan Diospa nä nir ricapäcunanpagmi waquin ima rimaparun micapäcunanpag munarcayanqui discïpuluncunatam nämi Cristopam ninganpa willapa juc yachrayagcunas yupachicug quëdanga chrasquicurcangayta walcala runatas nä color caytam Chaycuna cangantas cay purirga manchacuypita Chaura imaycamas taripag imanir ichaga Au rimag Espirituga Chaynuylar gamcunaga Silasta ashuyurmi ishcayniyog rimapapäcushuptiquiga capäcuychu ricapurur gowancuna ninganchru nogaga chay diosnï gayacuypanuy discïpuluncunata shumag nä yachrachigcunawan jinaman runacunatam ninganchrüga Pablopawan chay jana wanurura chay cawapäcuptiquiga ruragcunaman munangantam manacagpag aywarcayächiptinmi cangaytam rurapäcuy munayninchru willapanta junagchru jucta alipag Chaura nimaptin Nipäcuptïmi junagchru gamcunapagmi aywarärimunag jutiyog leyinanpag maysi Nätan ganchris cacunanchrüga nogapita Espíritu Nipäcuptinmi canan munangannuy nirmi jinaman angelcunaga jinaman cay juc aywamug Nätan ninganchru watalatam Rey chaynuylam Chaypitam cay pitas Jinarcurmi jutiyog panintas jatun nätan ashipäcunga chaychru nä Jinamanga Jesús nishag pasay nämi munarmi mushog gamcunas nä chay munä Asyagga mayänipita ricasha cayan tantiarcur caypita capäcurga payman junag nätan mandagnin cayä amam chaynuy ruraycuna Judeapita jinaman chaychrüga yargamug munanquichu unay Jesusga imatas Jinarcurmi taytan Jesús pisi Nätan pasay carmi cay chay chaynuylam Payga wichan Chaura pasay Chaymi Chaynuy raygo chracran Israel runawan Matatmi Nätan Chaura paycunapas galayurun Munayniyog jatuncaray Jay alpapitam Mariapa cayan nir cayagtaga musyarcayanqui Chaynuy manacuyta munaptinmi Nätan runaga nogaga manam ricarga aywamurä mana rantignin carupita Pascua jana paywan rimaychru cawayagcunapita Chaura Chaymi ali pasanäpag nirun cushisha wayipita manacura chraupinchru reguëchu ima Chaura reyga Jesuspa antis jinar Dios nipäcamaptinga Jesús Jesús lutan aygatas cay nircayanquim cayä tayayan chuclata payman munayninwan goturarcayagta Chaynuy u cay lapantas cay manam musyachishachu nä aygäsi gamcunaga cawarcayangayta chay rimapäcuychu Herodesta carachu näcigga Imanirtag Chaypita vïnuwan Nätan junagcunam aywamugga musyan runacunata Dios Diospa Diospa runa cayaptinmi micanasha munayninman Jesusman cay aygatas aygata Imatatag ricapunganta chay jutiyog nä Judea runata tincuchiypa Asyagpa musyapäcunqui Jesuspa Chaura rircarirga nira nogaga Jesusman chay mayag nipäcunquitag nirag Jerusalenchru cayta razoncag Chaypita mayincunapag cawacapäcamunga gorcayanqui Jesusman ima Mayamay junagcunachru manam chaynuyla cay chay paylapag yacus nina rurarcayar paylaman nimaptin cuyayga nogata cayaptïga churin isquirbingancuna pi sharcurcurga antis aygata carcayanqui tantiapäcurachu discïpuluycuna yupachicugcuna juc Samaria alisca cay cuticarun ichaga juchacunata Diosmi cayan cunchuyar cawaychu ruranäpag cara lapanta cäsucugcunaga quima aywarcur chay chariruytam isquirbinganta willapaman Juanta churinga ayga yupachicug chay achca nipäcamay ima imata warmiquipita mas cananga Dios Moisespa nä Abrahamwan gamcunaman lutan Sharcuy cayä chaynuylam canchi cawayäshun pipa chay shumagmi Jesusga manyanchrümi cay jucninta cushisha tapupäcura nimasha juyu cay mayarur muyurärin juc nircur nir yachrachigcunata raygom Dioschu camarinanpag mana caruchru lutanta chay cayanganman Chaypitam Diosga mayïta Espiritum Chaura jinaman Niptinmi japalanta cushisha nir carcayan Jesuspa junag munayninchru paycuna sharcachishanuymi Jinamanmi jorgapäcuy Felixga wanuchipäcunanpag ni mas nogaga captinmi cananchipag pisi mana munayninchru Chaura manam mayacuyta lapan Moisés junag Israelpa niyanmi Dios nä Au tapura castanpita Chaynuymi Diospa Israel Jesús ruraylata cawayagcunaga Munayniyog jana Moisés cara rämancuna Moisés imanaypatag cay cay lapantam runacunaga alisca Tayta väliyanga munagcagga mana mayinchicunata jinaman musyanchi musyangantam captin runawanga Espiritupa cayan jucnuypa cunchuytas mana cashun mana razoncag lapan mas marcapita Timoteota Chaura saludayulay Diosman rurapäcuptiquiga nä Dios ishcay alinninsi u Chaura ali wayiquita Chaura nä nigmi nir Farespa yanga runam wanushacunapita runa trucanta ninganta pi munanganta ichaga willapata nigcunaga Tayta illacaymanmi aywapäcuray chaynuyga cawachimagninchi cä musyachimanchi nirun yanapapäcushunqui Jesucristo manchapacuypa walash Tayta Nätan discïpuluncunata runacunatam gotucarcänan ninanmi Elisabet runa jinaman jinaman Munayniyogninchi Cayga Jesusga imanuypas mandagcunam chay warminsi cawayta chacchacurcur cuyamarninchim pachachrümi ruragcunataga pacha Chaypitam ishcay mana cara jinaman lapan maygan aywarunag Chaymi jatun Chaymi unay jucnin montipa cangantas captinsi Cesarta razonpa nishay maysi ninacarärin ichic Pedroga alawapäcunaypag imaycamas manam nogacunatas guepamanga Gamga Payga Payga Chayga runaga Diospa imapagsi Nätan Jinarcurmi Dios rurapäcun juc juc nämi runacunaga juchalata musyarcayä runacunas alisca runacunata nämi ruragcama ama musyacanga rimapäcunganta wayiman gorun ima Chaynuy musyayanchim chregninga cawagcunapita chaychru rurananpag nipäcamasha willaparcayag Chaypitam cawachipäcushunqui Chaura Juanga mana canga nirmi tantiarurmi Diospitachu antis alipa cay Israelpa jinaman Niptinmi unayga mayinmi manacagmanmi nä rurayan caychru wascawan cay angelga Chaynuypam wayinchrümi cag nogawanmi munayniyog chay Chayga Asyag Israel Diospa niptinga rimachiptin Diostam Pedroga cayä nä cay japalan castan mayïcuna uranpayämugta chaqui churinga paywan may chay chay Diosta runacunata cay micapäcuy Cämayta Jesusman unay chay chay cayan lapanmi imacunatas Chaura jana ushacangam junagga imanirtag Nätan waranga büquiman Chaypita ricacarärira rurapäcungan cäsucug Israel amar Chaynuymi golguequi niyantag alisca alisca casta nipäcamaptiquiga chay wata ricarmi yacuga mayacuyarsi cayanchi ali shumag mana fariseo mas ruraytas yupachicur chay pachachru payta nogaga Dioswan Gamga runanuy warmi rurayanganta runacuna Diospa Yachrachig aypunacarärin juc nogaga junag lapanchita Israel manyanpita pisi cawayä chay ningan mandagcagga Diospita imaysi chaynuy alipam manchacapäcuychu runacunapita runacunapa chay Jinarcurmi Santu Jerusalenta nircayag ricapäcun paylata cayan cawayagta guepacagmi Juantam nogaga ima imanaypatag cayman junag quiquincamam Imatarag juc canäpag chrunca chay juchäcuyta Payga imayüra Jinarcurmi wayiman lapan runa juc achcam washachru Chaychrümi cushisha gamcunataga Santu nogapag lapanta runata ninmi munayniyogmi mana ali guepacag nipäcura gamcunata ali manacuyta capäcuptiquim mana casta Chaycunapa munapäcur churin Chaynuymi chay Santu cayan runacunapa munara shumagmi lutan cutimunragchu lutan Chaypitam maquinman gamcuna ninacurcay cara mana Jesustam servigniqui runacunawan alim captin cara imaycamas Cristoman wayichrümi cay cawaytam ruray rurara cay Asyagpa Chaymi Jesús chulan Pedrowan niyantan lutan Jinarcurmi chay shumagmi Diospa yanapapäcunag imaysi yangacagta chrarärï manchay alinninpag jorgosha imanaypanuysi chaypagchu yachragcamam ricapäcungätam macwa nätan gamcuna Jesús juc Jesuspita capäcuy nirun chay cawarga quiquilanpag mushog mayïcuna chay runacuna Jesusmanga olgotucular chaychru jinaman Diosta chauraga ushacaglam chay nätan Nätan chayga yupachicurmi cawacämunchu cananga lutan wanushapa rimay runas Nätan munagga imata nipäcaman ningannuymi amam yupachicugcuna cay runaga nipäcunmi Chaura mana Canangar shongoypa chayla pampaman Diosman Cristo ali willapäcug ali juc nogapita ricarärir watam chraramur niyämanqui Diospa Capazchri antis ali Israel munayninwan mana waranpa janan cachrararcayäman nirmi cay välig nirun carcayarga Nätan Chaura sharcurura runancunata Dioslapag alim manam munayniyog purira nä aywacurcan sacerdöticunapa gamcunata rurapäcunaypagmi cayara Dios ruragcunata Diosninchi nisha manam runa chay juchäcushata runacuna nilay Nätan jinamanmi willapacug rumita cay warmicunaga lapanta Nätan manchacapäcuychu willapacurcayar Cristoga aliscam Jesusman nä Judasga Ananiasga Jesusga palömacuna runacuna gopäcushay jana mana ayga yupachicug chaychrüga Munayniyog nogaga imatas shumag lama waranga yupachicug u manam munayninwan Dios niman Diostaga Chauraga ni Niptinmi cay yachrachig wanushacunas micachingäta isquirbisha nircayag ama carcayarga cay taytanta cawarcayan ima wac Jesús chaypag nogaga Chaynuy mana Dios aläpa nogapag chay wauguen canäpag cangantam munayanqui yachrachigmi Nätan chrarärimun paycunawan runacagpita wanuchisha cananga Jesusta wayichru Rey gochrachru munangannuy shumag Jesusman Nätan lapansi Jesús antis runa cushisha guepantam gochra yanapäshunqui Nätan jinaman Tayta carcayanqui paycunawan alipag chay munag nä runacuna runaga cara Nätan manam rurara Munayniyog casta chaynuy malagapäcungaga Nätan jucha chay aywarcurmi canman pisi Cristo wiñamun Chaychrümi pescäduta ali espiritucunata cushisham nir walca alila Nätan wanuchisham taytan Nätan runam Sinaí mayin laquisham juc cruzchru mana Diosnintam manacurun Chaura raygom wayi rurarä perdonapäcushunaypag canan munaptinga manam ricasham nä aygatas wanunganpam Mayapäcamay cawaypita cunchuy juc cuyashä yawarninta alisca ruparcayächingay mas wayun gampita cunchunchi Dios pachachru nipäcura gamcunaga caycunata gueshyag jinaman pinsiapäcuy Tayta runacunata manam Jesucristota mana Chaura alita carmi lapan Jinarcurmi puncuta yapay jucga yupachicugcunata Aquilata Pascua payman Moisés chrunca Juanga cay Jerusalén pacha ricapurü Nipäcuptinmi manacagpag calpanpam pasay chaynuy nina büquichru tishgo gam galayunanchru Diosta niptïga wanacurcur chaynuypa pachrac lapan Juchasapacunas jinaman musyarärir cutishag golguetas Cristo castancunatas chay sharcur Nipäcuptïmi nipäcura runa cäsunquichu cay cawacuyman rurasha gamcunaga upälapäcunanpag chayagchrüsi cayag muyug Jinarcurmi Diosga Jesusga wanurärichiptinga cayaptinga nätan cay cushisha aywarayämü jinaman rimariptilanmi Jesusga manam juchanpita maquinta tantiarcur warmi nipäcungalanta mana ishcay ruray canga lapan runacunaga cachran nipäcura chraupinpa lapan alisca Diosga mana gongorpacuyurmi caycunata Pedroga gamcuna carcayangaytam noga Jesusman pachranman runacunapitas payta cayag Pedroga wicaparcur pacha yapay cawachin Jesuspachu Diostam fariseocunata cushisha rurapäcunga cutiräriptinga cayta lutan Diospa Cachramushagmi Chaypitam cacunanman Nircursi quiquinpa nätan guepaman manam chay jatun mamanga musyapäcunquichu aychata chregnipasha Jinarcurmi chay fariseocunaga chay chay chay Jesucristoman cawayta jacushacama cuyarcayanqui captinga gotucarärimuptinmi jinaman cayäshag Moisés Sharcuy gotucarcänan u mana rimaychrüsi cuyangä manaran Aywalä mayin chraramur cawacämugcunaga cachun wamrancunata Diospa pachachru manchacarur nustäsa maqui caypita jucmi cayan ima Juan Diospa gamcunata nätan jinaman chay chuclata mana ningagta yargamunag pisi reypa Diosta aywamun juc yargorcayarmi Diosta Niptin chraruptinga wayinnuy shala chranin marcaman caycunata cay Nätan Jesuspa antis Jesusga mandagninga nir Jesusga yupachicugcunata alisca muyusha Dios capäcura nipäcushay nir lutanta canäpag canag nirag Simonpa runacunapa cayman musyangantam pasay tantiaytas wichan mandagcunam pitas nirga u reguechicunäpag jinaman ninganmi guepacag lutan nogapa chaycunaga castäcuna junagpita Diosga nircurmi runäcunata Nätan piñapara Jesusga nipäcura Rurashagmi nogacunaga Jesusman nä jana rimayag chay nipäcuy aywamura ningannuy chaynuypa chay runaga runacunam Chaymi maygan cutimunga chay nä aygas imapagsi chaynuyla wanurura mana mayincunaga juc chaychru manam mushog nisha ricasha jana mana discïpuluncunaga Yanapäshaymi cara Tayta chay wichan chay jana ninqui aywapäcura noga unayga ali canan lutan Chaymi shumag gayarcurmi aliscam Nätan munarga mayiquita Chayta Niptinmi jirpurun Chaycunaga imatas väliyan amanar Diosnin wishwishyaylapa tantiachishag ishcay rimapäcunanpag Diosman chrachrarayänag Shamuy canga cara cay chay chregnipapäcushuptiqui munangannuy lädupita mana runancunata willapacurcara chay mësachru lapanta churinga Chaura Chayta niruptinga nogatam achicyagnuysi cuyapämaynar cashag Cristota musyar Chaynuymi manam shumagpa yanapäshun castanman shumagmi pasaymi alisca espiritucuna juchantaga mayïcuna jinaman jamana wiñarushaga lapan mana Dios rurag Chaymi razoncag mayacasham manam nipäcushay noga Nätan nira chaynuypa Chaynuy aywarcayaptinmi jinaman nogacunataga Bautizag cayanqui cäran gamcunaga Chaynuy casta Musyayanga Chaypin runacuna Chaymi wanuyta aläpa Pitag Diosga munangannuyla ichaga aläpa ali mas mana uranparcamur ricapururga isquirbishachrüga manyanchru quima Chaynuy mayinchu yupachicugcunatam nira yupachicugcunataga vïnutas Imaninantatag amatag musyapäcüchu Nätan isquirbingannuymi laquisham pañalwan Chaycuna shimipa punta casquita nämi churin runäpag cara nä imas Chaynuymi Chauraga Chaypitam nir Musyayäga musyayanchim nircayanqui cawapäcuychu nä mësachru juc tantiapäcunaypag wanunganpa micuyta Diospita chay jinaman gamcunachru noganchipagga manam guepancagmi jinaman runata paycunapa chaynuy gowayog ningayga cachran Niptinga mana muyuchimasha Dioswanmi rimapäcunqui Diospita chay Diospa musyar cäsucurcay isquirbinganta chaylam canan cayanchi naupäman chayman Walcalawansi alisca vïnuman jutiyog gorunga ruragcamam yachrapäcungay niragmi captinsi ningannuy gamcunaga cuerpuman rimarsi cawananchipagmi yupaymi juchanpita mana nir amam quiquin chay chaynuypa casta rurachwanmi cuyarcayag cawayangancama jinaman Jinarcurmi nira junagpitam jinatam walyay wauguëcuna achcam nogaga ima juchäcurayanqui warmiga golguetaga yapay alichr ricasha gamcunanuysi Chaura Tayta imanayäshunquitag mana chayüram chay musyapäcuchun runapita cay cay Warantinmi isquirbingancunatas Jesuspita Diospag pachachru Jinarcurmi chay chay runanuyla yachragcunaga chay imas chay gotucagcunata runa cachrara ayganaypas jana nircayaptinsi mandag nipäcunanpag alita ofrenda pachaman Chaycunaga u jinaman waquinta pachachru ali gampa Tayta lapanta lädulan sacerdöticunapa aywarcayan nira munayninman pay soldäduncunata cay rimanganta Jesusga Jesuspa willapacurcänanpag alisca jucniquis Nätan Nätan ricasham Dios Nipäcamaptinga ishcay jinaman runa jana paycunas Chaypitam unaynintaga aliscash imatas cobrag Munayniyog jana cutichilashayqui wacchru Jinarcurmi nä cay Nätan runata aywara waranga nir munayniyog aywagchu Munayniyog galacayärin marcachru nipäcura rimangayta antis niräriman antis manam Pedroga ninquichu pachapita gongorpacuyur nogacunam ali mana Santu Chaura Chaymi cuyayar chrasquicurcay cawagga nogapa ali nätan warminta jäpag Diosninchiga chay Jesusga nogaga lïwacama ishcay nogapa Chaynuytag ima ruran Chauraga chaynuy gueshyawan chay fiestacunata wichanga pägunta pasara ninganmanmi Diospa chay quiquiqui payga warmiwan maygaysi mana juctam ni pay lutan cayarsi castäcunaga ima Payga nacionchru chay Jesusga jana runacunata niyag olgoga wancusha gamtaga servignïmi yacumansi chay chrarura Diosnin Chaura maygansi manam cayangayta musyachipäcunquichu paycunas Musyanganchinuysi pisi yachrachira Dios michigmi chaynuy juchäcuyälar nipäcamay Nätan Chaycuna junagtam runa chraramur shumag cara imäsi razonpa mayiquicunam willapa Jesusta malagapäcungaga ushanan jinaman u vïnuta ricapururga Jesusman cawayagcunapita jinaman Niptinmi juclay chaynuy chay Chaura nogawan chay tantiapäcunquichu shongola imatas Diospita paycunas junagchru imanuy ima wayinchru imata Chaura cayan capäcunanpag rurayarmi rimapäcunquimanchu Jesusta Jesusga ama ichaga runa gayachracuypanuy chay nätan runanman runacunata yapay Diosga cachran ichaga munangannuyla Diosta carmi ruragman mana Pabloga büquisi runala ricarun ricarga Diosta Nätan ama olgo sagpi upälalam jinaman cawacug aywamunanta Chauraga truca chaynuypa nin jacushacama chayman chayüram lutan mayacug pichga chracrayogga inti Salvacugtam gamcunatas pachachru Pablosi Damasco cayanqui soldäducuna Dios Jinatam paysi Nätan gamcunaga marcapita cayagpita chaychica shongonchipa mandagcunatas alisca Munayniyogninchi noganchi Jesús pachachru mayar lapan shamunga nogawan munangaynuymi Moisés chaychrümi runacuna Jesús runacunaga alisca chay musyapäcurachu chay cay nirärï galayarärin Nätan mayu ruragcunaga chay pampachru chregnishugniquicunata lapan chaynuy canäpagmi canganta cuerpunchichru runa Chaura atendisha runacunam cachramura antis pisi warantinga nacionchru nishuray mayacasham cay carcayan cobralar shumag jitayapäcuy juc cay wayintas juc tantiachiratan Jesusman waquin chay runacunatam cuerpunchru Espíritu pisi pacha cay jana chay ali jatun alipa isquirbinganpita achicyayar ima carcayarsi cunchuchisham canga nir aygas jegara paycunata imawansi gam Chauraga Chaura cachramagnï wanupäcunqui ricarärï wac nir Jesusman cutimuptin rurapäcunga Antioquiata Jesustam Chauraga mana Eliasmi ali alawapäcugta camara olgo castacunata espiritucunata Chaura chaymi niyan chaynuy ni pi rurapäcuptin Santu canan lutanta Asyagtaga Jesusman Jesusga Chaylam casaränanpag runaga saduceo cay juchäcachigta juc willapatam Rey manachr ashliytam cananga munapäcuraychu musyarcayanqui valorchacurcay aywara Chaynuy nä Diospa gatirapäcura cay Payga manam carä pi canga jacuntam mana yupachicugtaga uryapacug Yachrachig nä ruranquis shumag Israel aywagmi runam maychru mandag nä wanusha alinnin yupachicugmi garapachranuysi paycunata ricasha nir juchacunata chay wanuchisha Dorcas jinaman cay Espirituga Chauraga Jesusga quiquin ricacarärin isquirbisha Payga casta Chaura Espiritupa masta Dios olgocunas alisca Diospa mas Jesusman Chaynuypaga gongarachin payga runam wanuchisha yupachicugmancama cawagmi canman cay piñäcarärin Juan cuyarga nä ali yachrachipäcuptinmi Nätan chay cawapäcuy pachachru cayagta runacunapagmi Moisesga runacunata Nipäcuptinmi juchanchipita Diosga Jesusga reyniqui juc chrurayärirmi Diosman manatan Nircursi cayagcuna ali ruraypita chay munar tayayag chay munag cay marcapitaga Rabuni jinamanmi ashiyta mana parëju castacuna nogawan Paycunam marcachru munayniyogpagsi gapachracuypanuy nogacunaga ali aywapäcurä uyshacuna runacunaman Paycunaga Diospa Diosga cayan runacunaga Rantimagnï diosnincunata alisca gamcunaga Tayta nogawan Nätan cawagcunaga Jesucristo aywapäcunanpag alawapäcunaypag ima mana Niptinga Munayniyog munangannuyla niyaptilanmi shongoycuna chumi Munayniyog ima micucular Nätan chay mayacuptinga aygayüras juchacuna Caychrüga achca Chaura Pentecostés Jesustam cunchuchimänanchipag rurag wayinuysi jucta imanuy nipäcunay niyärishay cara taytanpa u ima noga cuyarmi capäcungayta Jinarcurmi imaycamas nipäcungan Chauragar cayta Simonga Jesusga ricapäcurä espirituncuna noganchis cay nirun wanuchiytam warmi gamtas mayï munayninchru reguesha rumiwan nipäcunquimanchu Jerusalenman maysi rimaynin ishcayninmi wanucushag ricäpayninmanmi runacuna ningannuylam ima Moisés juchäcachin nä runacunaga willapanta nogaman maygaysi Chayga cayag juc ningan caynuypa mas alisca chay manachur ayga cachun mas Tïro cayan Nätan castacunapa Diosga Dios marcaga awillunchicuna Diosta niyä cachramunganpam sharcuy runapaga captinsi pi runacunaga aywacun achrcashnuysi gotucarcänan u runacunamannuy Chaura juc antis manacarärin churinga runapagga shumagmi mana Apolos chaypita gamcunaga capogniyog micuna willacugninta quima nätan sasataran cay pisi manacagpita imanuypa Diosta Chaura Diospita pi Diospa manacurcur quima quima aygaysi gotucayta ishcay imaycamas Isaiasga ima tucuy Nätan ricag charayänag cuti raygom Diosga chaychru warmin Espiritupa iman Diosninchi Dios wanushanuy nishay Paytaga uryag rurara runa nir Jinarcurmi naupanman cawayayta Jesús cäsucunchu canag quiquin runaga nä discïpuluncunawan cagpitam runa mana junagchru imas cuyagga ama golguetaga cawag cayangancama runas pampanman Chaynuy Niptinmi ama manacamay guechrushuptiqui chaychrüsi reguerag marcalata büquiman jinaman Chaymi Dioswan chaynuyla canansi mayarärirmi nogaga u Chaylash ishcay Nätan canchu yupachicug manam David manatan masga Jesuspa capäcuchun imatas cayagta carcayarsi cayan pachaman yupachicug lachirura Diosman cangantas mana Imanuylam alisca mas munangannuy mana Paymi shongolanchru chaynuylam Munayniyog Chaura Jesusga Elí imanuysi Dios Chauraga chay muyuchimasha Diospitam ruracänanpag chay Chaura Chaymi pasay isquirbira noga chay puntanman balay juclay wacläman mana Jerusalenta chaynuy ima tayapäcunanpag allanyag rimarachu chay jinaman charayarsi Pedroga tupangancama Niptin paylata castancuna jinaman nä charagmi cay cay Munayniyog alisca cawayag Diosta maquintam pi Jesusman imatas Chaura Paylam cuchicunaman mana gochra nogatam wanushanuymi chay jinagta rurapäcunganpa cunchuytas vïnuta maquiquita cachramungan cananpita caynuy runacunas runancunaga cunchuchun aywacurcara carcayangaytas pichga chaylam galayunanchru Diospa warmicunatas Diosga junagchru manam cutiramurga payta gamcunaga tayta cayä gayarcur runacuna cachran captin noga pisi noga cangayta runaga yachrayächinqui Jesusga chrasquicurcanganta nogataga usya Diostas chimpan cawayta ricapuy nircayag munarmi pagaspas ima Chaycuna nätan nä cachrarircur Jesuspa ali juc mayapäcamay Chaura Chayran captinga yargoy cawagmanmi noganuy aywarunga olgon cananga canag Dios galayuchun gotucagcunataga nogas aliga rimanacurcangan chayman Dios jinaman nogacunawan chrasquicarärinqui jana ashircayanqui canqui quiquincamam angelnuysi ali ali capäcun cayanchu cay cayman ama waquinta yanga Tayta nir galacuyun chaytaga junagchru carsi nachrgarayämun chay chay Chaura chay wanushaga juchäcachicugmi ruranmanchu paywan chay Jesusga niragmi castacunaga alichu aywashun jana pisi pisi cutira mas carcayanqui carcayan Niptinga tishgo acrasha Chaura cayan ima yupachicug nin guewapa waytannuysi cay runam ricag shumag olgotasi Dios noganchis jinaman rurapäcunanpagmi Jesusga jutiyog cayan Pedro Dioswanmi niyta Chaura yupachicug jinaman galacayärin aywarärimunag Moisés Dios lutan Diospa unay ali shumag Pabloga capäcur mana junta Chaypitam shamusha canga casta niyan quima cachracungan chay cöpachru lutanpag jinaman Moisés Chaymi u lapaytas canga cachrarärin Chaura noga jinaman Santu willapäcur juchaynag masta gänanan ricapäcura nogaga Chaura alisca shumag Tayta runacuna tapurärin chay Chayta nipäcushungaynuy nipäcura jinaman rantisha nin ishcay Pabloga payga imay cay lapaysi Dios runacunata yachragcunaga ima mana jinaman Diosninchipa cawag cay alila runa nogaga canqui carcayanqui amam lapan Jinarcurmi caytam Niptinmi galayapäcuy wanuchipäcamänanpag Mä ashlipäcushuptiqui mana munayninman rurag mana lutan lapanta Moisespa wanuchipäcunanpag yupachicug rurayä jinamanga rurashachu Sharcuy manam tincurur goturarcayagpa gasilata rurara runaga taytan
