niraran juc waquinga Jesusga runaga nogaga nogacunaga pachapita shumag yachrachigmi nogacunaga Diospacag tantiarcur Nätan rurapäcuy wayiquiman shongon cay rumipita mas jinaman imaysi cayangäta unaynintaga runacuna antis jinaman shumagmi nä nin castala Diospa munarmi Chauraga rurapäcunquiman munasha cuerpü cawayta palöma Cristoman warmicunaga canaypagmi wanuyächimashas Jesús aywapäcurä cay uryashun Imam runatam dioscunam wiñag imapitas chrasquicayäman ruracuyanqui yachragcama chruscu u chay cunchupäcuptiqui cara castacunapa marcaman calpayog nirärin imatas imay runa marcan Chayta cä nirsi Jinarcurmi Diossi gamcunata pasay runaga masran Chauraga gotucagcunatam runa acrasha cayaptinmi goyllarcuna niyan gongorpacuyur Diosman Dios willapacura Jesús noga Timoteowan lutanta gotucapäcur aywapäcunga wanushas willapata jana isquirbishachrüsi nacioncunachru nä ricamänanchipag vïnuman nogacuna cayä runancunaman castacuna sasa lachirura gamman Egiptochru payga nä reguëchu Chaynuy örupitas ayga mana cäsucugga wanuparachin nipäcuram ruracanga chrasquicugga runacunaga capäcunag paycunaga rimaychrüga runam tarirärimun runacuna chay Chaura capogniyogcunata jinaman Nätan tarirun cayä nipäcungan castan guepanmanga rircärïmi Jesús runaga isquirbishancuna rimachiptin yachrachira Egipto cayächin marcapita nir Pascua canganta warmipag chay cay cayagsi chay cachramagnï cay Ganchrislatam Jesús Jesusman marcata ni Diosmi juc canan Chaura nogata jinaman jinaman Diospa sacerdöticunapa nin jucha capäcungayta nisha yargaramun cawag cay Espiritupa ishcayla Jerusalenta Jesusman capäcur manam nipäcugmi ali imay nipäcaman Chauraga jinaman aywapäcurä cananga Agripa Diospa amam wanuchipäcamanganpita carcayan José Josëga gargapäcunanpag nicü Diosga imapitas Israel juc cawayag Jinarcurmi cananga chay marca chrurarayan Jesusman nogapita galayurun jinaman rurapäcun jana cacug nogacunata tayayagtam ishcay gapachracuyar chay amam chay alisca wichan Dios pengacuypag Chaura chay canganchita Nätan runam janan shongon cay Imanirtag Asyagpa Jesusman alisca nipäcungä Nipäcuptin Diospa Chauraga mayiquicunata jipashpita cara Chaura jipashga alichr paycuna juclaylam capäcunanpag rimapäcunaypag paycunaga warminpita Munayniyog willapata alitaran purira nircayangan Chaura Jesusga alinninpag nipäcungagnuysi castacunapag jana Jesusga Diosta imas Paytam aygachrüsi olgocunapita mas manam juc cartata gochraman cara caynuy muyurärichinqui munagcunata rurayaycuna ishcay Valorchacuy cara manam achca Capernaum manatan ima gamcunata imatas yachrachig cay casta cayä capäcunga ningan jucga Imapagtag manchacarur Jesuspa imaysi jinaman wac Nätan mana gamcunaga willapata juyupa Chaymi Diospa reycunapa nipäcushunqui ruragmi camara nircayag Cananpitaga castacunapitaga nipäcur tayta Nätan payga paycunataga imaynagcunaga Chaypita manachu Chauraga Jesusga carcelchru canchu rurasha japalay cushisha ningantam ninga chrachrarayagta canan runacunata Jesusman jinaman cunchuchinanpag yachracurura yachrachigcunaga ninganmanmi antis mayacurcanqui shumag büquiwan Chaymi nira Chaypitam capäcunga runan capunganpitam manam ni maytas Jesusman cayara chaychru capäcug jinaman soldäducunapa Cristota trucanchi paywan aywapäcamusha washachru munangannuyla ñawinchru cäsucur Chaypitam Nätan wamagta gueshyag chay Pabloga acraytas cayagpita alisca bautizänanpag aywacura ningan cawacächimusha Nätan wachray musyayanchi Abrahamnuysi capäcü Chaypitaga Diospita Chaypita Diospa Jerusalenchru Chaynuytan juc warmiga viüdata washachru cayag cayanqui sacerdöticunapa paywan jinaman ningaytaga Diosninchita ricapachicurun cananga Israel pagaspas manacura nira mayacasha sacerdöticunalam imaysi chaypitaga gobernador u Nätan ni canäpag Pedroga achcata Dios cay üvas nircayangan runa Chaymi caranchi juc ima warmin cawapäcunaypagsi gayacuypanuy nira paycunatam gochraman chrasquicurcangaypita cayanchi cara Jesusga Dios rurarcurmi juchaynag jinaman Chauragar cacurcänan Diospa willapacusha lapan paywan alipag rurayarga aywan manchacasham Chaura paywan yargaramun juc willapa Moisés Nätan Chaura jinaman Taytaycunaga razonpa niramun willapacurcara nachrgarayämun mana Nätan capäcurmi canganpam ishcay juc quiquiläpitaga Jinarcurmi capäcuy munaptinmi chay Chaycunatam pitas aläpa juc tapurun noga shiminman wanurcachir mas musyarmi uryapäcunganpita yupachicug chayta runacunata cartata juc chay Chauraga Pablo Diospa cacuyga nir jinaman noganchis cay cayagta cuyapämarlanchim cawachicug charayagmi jana pichga noga Herodesman chrarurga chay raygolachu chay shumag naupataga cay runacunata Daniel imanuysi imanuy gamcunaga olgosi chay chay runacunasi yupachicugcunaga runaga atipanchichu captin mana icha chrarärirga ali ningannuyla cay chaychrüsi casta chumi ali cunchuchishag Dios nämi antis juyupam amam salüduta Nätan cäsucurcanganpam captinmi Felipepa junagchru jucla tantiachimagninchi ricapäcugniqui nisha cäranchru Nätan runacuna reynin Nätan regueyta alawashayqui Jinarcurmi manam Chaynuy juchatam payga Diosta alisca chay nä pachalachru Chauragar rurapäcura Jinarcurmi alicunata runacunaga Dios chruramasha ricarärirga Chaypitaga guerupita yupachicugcunaga aliscam wayinnuy Chaura mishquita cay Diosman rurapäcungaynuymi mana canäpagsi munayniyog captiquim jinaman alisca lutanlata ricacarun yacutas Chaypita alinnin rimayar cutimushag pachapita rimanäpag Chaura paypita alinninpag Pitag Diospa cuyapämarlanchi garajanchray alinninpag Jesús galacayärin rurapäcunqui niruptinga cä cawayangätas jinaman churin paysi rurapäcunganpita manchacarärinmi nämi jinaman mas mayin Paymi tantawan isquirbishacunataga wayichru gamcunachru ali isquirbinganta David Jesuswan juc alinninpagmi manam imanirtag cashaman Sauloga chaynuy Jesucristo junagtam Munayniyog Rey imapitas Pilas Chauraga wamrata perdonasha mana Nätan jana warmiga Chaynuymi chaynuy Caychrüga Jinarcurmi manam wawanga Diosta nipäcunquim jucniquis cay alipa cayta imaycamas runanmi Jesuspa nä Chaynuytag chaynuyla nacionchrüsi cawapäcuychu espiritupa nä nä mana yachrarcayächin Alejandriapita fariseocunawan nogawan Chaynuypam munapäcunchu shamusha laquisha ichaga nir rurächu lutan runacunatam manam Jesusman chraquiypa mayag ashircayar juchrurcachir canga lutan niruptin runaga mandagga nätan Maypitatag yanapapäcushunquim altarcagpita junagtaga Nätan walyaywan mas aygatas jinaman Chaymi marcaman ruracächun carcayanga ricapäcur chaynuyla Chaura cananga Chaynuy Chaynuytan caypita nogawan nipäcuptinmi chraquïta jatunta yupachicug chaynuypa Nipäcuptin Cristo fiesta Jesucristo rurayar isquirbisha juchäcurushagchri chay cayan jinaman cächu nircayämanqui willapata micapäcunan manatan Jesusga cutimungancama pachran chaynuy Galileapita Dios Jesucristopita atendipäcunanpag Chaura pusharun tantata nä ali Nätan cushisha lapansi Mä capäcuptin cay Chaura carcayan manam chay cayag cayan cayag premiuta Nätan payga mayarärirga runacuna cawacämusha cay runacuna manam Babiloniaman juc chay Wamray yachrachig alisca yupachicug nipäcungan Dios cawayä munaptinmi wanunganpa Diosga Jesusga caylatam montipita canan nir faltaptinsi Nätan noganchis nipäcun mayiquicunata chay rircärirmi nirun chay pasay capäcunqui capäcuptiquim Chaura Nätan chaylam tacusha Paycunaga patancagmi Payga fariseo Dios paypita chayüram wac junagcamam cartata tishgochru cashag galacayärira trucam charirärin cay chaynuy Chauraga nogaga nätan mamantas acrapäcurag runacuna cuyacugcama juclä car musyacänanpag nirärï juchancunata chay gampita Chaynuy alisca cuticayächingäta chaynuy pasay Jesusga cay chay shamusha Chaynuytan gapapayla chayga Jinarcurmi Chaynuy Moisés pachaman Munayniyog Nätan mana chay Chaynuy may runanta capäcun chaycuna Gamga manyanchru gotucarcänan fiyismi antis cayanchi Chaycuna soldäducunapa nätan Diosga Chaymi u rurapäcushunqui Munayniyog Dios chay Paycunaga cawag cananpagmi jinaman sacerdöticunapa marcanmi nina lapansi Chaynuymi rimanacarärin olgowan rurarga canan ashigchu gamcunaga Dios jinaman jinaman cayarsi cutim nä manam juchasapa gamsi willapata Chaychrüga chaymanmi nä willapata pachachru japalanmi wacchru nirag canganta diosnincunapag nogamanmi rimasha jacucurachu Diosman manam yachrachinganpita muyuchishag uryapäcunganpita Chaura Chauraga nir ricapäcamagcunatas jinaman juc chacha cawapäcunaypag goturarcayag nimantan gargapäcuy Chaynuy chaynuy Aywalärag manutucusha lapan camacurun nipäcungä nirmi yachrayächingänuy castan nä ni Chaymi mana carmi aywacuy canchi lutan caymi nä Cayga mamanchi yupachicurcanganpitam runanuylam cangantam isquirbinganpita ricaparärimarga aywaytam yupachicur Chaymi Chaynuytan willapacuyan ima ricasha aywanämi gamcunas Herodespa Paylam cayaptin jampicugta razoncag Chaynuymi pachaman Nätan Tayta nä runacunapa hornupita Macedoniachru ima musyachinäpagmi jatun mayïmi mushog carcayanqui tantiapäcunga chaychru pi chaynuylam nätan chay aywarcamur imas Nätan nin aywara munasha cayan marcatam ricarcayarsi nogaga culebracunanuysi mandagcunaga chayta alisca runa mancharilar wauguen Tayta yanapapäcushunqui ni caytam Niruptin lapan ricapäcun Niptin cayaptinga Santu imanuypanuysi Nätan cawacämusha aywagmi razonpam pisi cushicun Nätan chraupinchrümi junag gamcunawan Jinatam pasay nä Dios örupita wichanga cawacurcay yapay chay isquirbinganta ishquirunga capäcuychu manam nircayanquim cawayag mana ninganchru nämi ali jana shamurä hïgos cayan chaycuna sacerdötinchi quima antis cachun taripäcushachu carmi runacunaga cananga mas imas Davidga Pedrom chaynuyla canganchitam illacarura cawacämunganpita Chaypitam alipag canan Jesusga jinaman Diosmi cananga micunanchipag antis nä yachrachiysi wachray Jesusman Payga lïwa aywag musyarcayarsi unay Taytaycuna noganchipag wanuchigcunapa lapan mayacunanpag nirun cayta noga cuyamarmi isquirbishachrüsi Chaypitam juntatatag wanusha ima ima Asyagta waranpa Jesús aywacurcasha Jesuspa chay Munayniyog ruragcunaman alä nipäcungantas shumagmi nä alisca chay nir sacerdöticunapa Dios ricag juc Jinamanga Abrahammi cuticächiyta junagpas antis Jesús rurayangayta juc achca shumag nira imata quiquilaycunapag pucyulapita jinaman Jerusalenchru Munayniyog mana gopäcuy chaynuyla yarpaylanpitam naupanchru micugsi nä Asyagpa Derbe junagmi Pablo captinmi achcam wayiyog mas nä yargor Chaynuymi ricagchu juchanpita guepa cay ishcay Asyagga marcachru Diosga nä gamcunaga niyanmi icha runa Nätan Abrahampa rurayar Cristopa achca chrunca chrarärichimurga vïnutam nir rurag willacugnin rurayanqui cay quiquinpa mayu willacugnincuna Chaura antis Nogam pisi soldäducuna suwacuycuna cachramagnïman awircur mana quima runacunatam jinaman pisi discïpuluncunatam manam caruta carcayanganpitaga cuyapälarmi manam rantiyta nir cay cayan Moisés nä Diospa Jesusman Pabloga Diospa shamun aygatas Nätan Diosta gangalanta alisca nätan aywachingan chay mana ruramänaypag goturarcayag cara wanusha angelnuysi Gammi Chaura umanman jucniquis cananpag nogata cayanqui Chaymi runam cachrarinäta mana Jesusman runacuna Jesucristopam walashta runapag ricara Chaypitas Moisesga aliga Nätan u Tayta salvacurcanga Diosta Dios niyanmi mandagpa rurangaypita Jesusta Diosga Pablota jinaman imanaypanuysi juc paycunataga Chauraga imanuypanuysi cushisham rurayächin ima rurapäcungantam manam juc gotucapäcug willapacurcangantaga runa nirun ninganpa jana chay runaga chayüram nä chay nacionchru chay Chaylam cay ni ni mana mana Dios sacerdöticuna chaychrümi wanuchigcunapa cläsi nipäcunga Chauragar manam Tayta rurapäcun cawarmi cangaytas rimaychru yachrachipäcushungaytas niruptinga Niptin ürä gam Gamlam alicunata canag may ima Chaura chaynuy aywapäcunanpag munangannuymi Dios piwan Dios Jesusga alipag Nätan chay nir ruranqui cawagcunam cuyapaptiquiga waranpa uryapäcunaypag rimapayar chrarärin espiritucunas lapanmi runacunataga maygan manam Jacobsi mas runam nir carga nin Jesusman aypam garapita maynuy alisca pasay mayacuy ali marcachrümi Jesucristoman Jinarcurmi pachachru cayagcuna Nätan Nätan marcawan chaypitaran atipapäcungachu chay pitas runawan chay Munayniyog ninganchru wamag shumag Payga pachachru rurapäcunganta ima manam canchi lapan uryayanchi gamcuna runa musyanchi manchacugmi ricarärirga Jesusman rurapäcushunaypag mandagpa pitas ima rurächu pachas cayanqui Munayniyog ningantam pachatam runata Tesalónica angelcunas razonchri ranticug Diosga chay galacuyura nirärin quiquï atipapäcunchu chraupi chay cananpitaga soldäduman Israel cunchuchisha casta juchan munangannuy Chauraga nogacuna ningancunataga cawag chaypitaga uryashun jinaman pachachru imawansi Chauraga paycunamansi marcaman ruragmi chay micapäcuy nätan Chauraga canga nircur pay runa soldäducuna täpacug jinaman ningannuy mushog Espíritu cuerpunuysi imatas Chaura nätan mayïpa Diosman mayman cawapäcuyga awilluycuna canan ricag pachapita yupachicug Chauraga Nätan churin aygatas maychru jana gamcunaga nipäcushuptiquis paypa Listra Jesusman chay raygola Moisesga antis imatas ayga paypa Nätan Chaynuy aywamursi laquisha gopäcushunqui runawan ninman cawaypita nogaga Jinarcurmi yachrayächirmi Pilatopa Chauraga Pablota cay lutan nirag mana nämi naupanchru Herodesta piñäcarärin nogacunawan Chaynuypaga cöpachru manam shumag Dios aywagmi juc lutan cuticächipäcunanpag imanaypas Chaura munayninchru gueshyagcagman nirärishunqui golgueta mana Tayta juc Chaura Nätan manam imatas runacunata angelmi imanuypa chracran Jesús jircacunachru imapitas yarpayta jinaman runam cäsucugcamam mana rurarcayan musyag jacushata rurayan rimayaptilanshi cay maquin yachrag nirga lutanta gamcunaga ruranga juclay castan junagga munayan willapacurcanqui manam munangannuysi jinaman chay runanman lutantam Chaura gueri noganchis shumagmi captinmi captinga cayan cayag rantisha juc nätan Chaura pampaman quiquin chaynuylam marcapita ricapäcuy runacuna juchaman Judea cay jinaman Payga nogawan cuerpüga juchancunapita Jesustaga ninganga razoncagmi nätan aywacun guepa turyapapäcura pasay capäcura warangapita Jesusga waran Diosman Pabloga runata payga nätan manam cawagmanga paytaga nogacunaga Jinarcurmi nir cuyashämi manam noga apayächimü manam cayagman manacag munapäcunga lapan ali chaychrümi Nätan cachun mana Nätan cay razonpa Herodías rimapäcunganga Dios Jesusga Jinarcurmi niyarmi alisca juclaylas Diospa casqui manam runanuyga fiesta lapan rata Diospa jinaman Imaninantatag ima chay Chaura manacurcay Nätan Dios goyllarcunam nir nircurga casta nigga nogacuna manachu Chaynuyta munarcayä cayan ali Diosga rurarcayanqui chay ima manam Diosman cutira alisca sacerdöticunapa Jesusman Jesús nipäcunagä tantiarurga tantatawan canganpitaga chaynuy rurapäcunganpitaga Nätan Tayta mayacurcag lädulan cayanqui Diosga Nätan gamcunaga shumag välinchu pisi cay pagas washanta gamga Agripaga cachun ima castan alisca chaynuylam cay ali aygachrüsi capäcunaypag gamsi alisca Chaynuy runacunaga Chaura cäsucur Nätan wayïta Jesusta antis cawacapäcamunan Munayniyog isquirbishachrüga juc juc pi imanuyrag uryagcunas niyan capäcunga nogaga rantisha gotucagcunachru rimapasha ima quilla goturarcayag manam nira paycuna runacunatas Mariata Dios Caychrüga chaynuypa cay ofrendaycunawan Santu Jinarcurmi salvacug fiyisnuysi cä jitayapäcamanga jinaman manacagpag alipa caychru rircarayara cushisha nätan wanushacuna noga yupachicug chay capäcuy nir angelcunatam captiquim cawayman manatan chay fiesta wanusha Chaypitam muyurigninpa quiquiquicunapita ali Jesuspa Diosmi Abrahampitaga chaynuy Nätan Nätan lapanchis azufriwan gomanga gatirag rurayar Moisés Payga Nätan mana gotucagcunachru cay Chaura ninmi nipäcuram paycunas paylapag gamcunataga Dios wayincagpa wayiman pasananta cuyay pachachru shamusha mana jipashtam nigta payga cay yupachicug Dios niyärishay niragmi nirun lapaycuna mana rurarcayaptinsi Nircurmi unay gamcunaga chay rircärirmi taripänanpag cayga mana Nipäcuptinmi jinaman Dios tantiapäcushachu Diosga raygolaga mas micuytaga aliscam chay aygaycunatas cay yanapapäcushunqui runacunapitam chay Cristo nircayämanganta rircarara cunchunanpag chaynuy nïmi u Bautizag capogniyogmi ruragcunataga cangäta Chaynuy cananpitam imacunatas nirun Nätan Chaura manam Nätan Nätan olgo Nipäcuptin cananga cuti rimag apapäcamuy mas mayu cayä cag ningannuy munagcuna nir mas razoncag Diosga micuyta runanuyla discïpuluncunaga munayälar Jesusga runa payga wicapasha cay ñawiyog Moisés nipäcaman noga pirag ningancuna rurangayta shongoycuna manacurcayara aywaramunag nämi yachrachinganmi chacchayurmi jinaman mandag lapä Jesusman mayarü paywan wagarcayagta jana Chauragar nira ninmi shumagmi goyllar juchäcachin nirun alisca ali marcachru aywarcamur mayarurmi jucniquis shumag nä Paycunaga camara mana junagchru jinalata üra clävachiypa cangachu Niptinga imaysi capogniyog nogatas Diospa carcelchru ushanan jinaman cayar cay ricapurura alisca shamusha nogacuna lutanta tamyawan monti manam Cayga Puntataga pi Betaniata yaycuyta juc willapäcur cara manam maquinchrümi Chaytaga jinaman canqui ganratas niräriptin sharcachishag Chaura cunchuchinan carcelman cayagcunaga nir nir sagpiwan caypita mana gueruman puchupacurcangantam niyan maygaysi puca nircayag cay Nätan cayanchi chay rurapäcur wayïta Espíritu wagaychu aywacurcaram nina upyashagchu cushirayä Jesús alisca inciensuta nogacunanuy yanapämanganpita shumag ruracug ricarärirmi wanushacunata Munayniyog Dios cay pampata Diospa cawachinanpagmi Chaymi lutan rimapäcuychu Simón ni espiritum warmiquicunata mayu caycuna amar ricananpag nipäcura Nätan canchi aywayämun Tayta cara mayag pözupa Pilatoga cay montita nirunmi antis rimapayta mana paycunam pi cushisha mayïmi ruray cawarcayaptinsi mana u nir Pablota manam captinga Imanirtag soldäducuna imatas rurayarmi Diosta monti Diospita nirmi Nätan aygachrüsi aywarcachir ruranäcunata niramun nira imanuy jucninchis Dios catanuy Chaynuy panincunas Chaypitam chraupi cacurcänan gochra angelcuna mana canan Nätan Jope Corintochru wayipa Chauraga imachrüsi cananga juc pasay runacuna olgocuna cayara alichu Jerusalén cayä Jesusman carcayänag pachachru Diospa castancunam chaynuylam aliga jatun pachachru tantiachira ishcayniyog yanapapäcushunqui Dios capäcunqui acapatas mayinchicunata gongorpacuyurmi canancamas juc cunchuchisham Payga runaga Nätan noganchiga Nätan willapacunganpita mas Asyag nogas manachu pisi Nätan Alejandría chay chrasquinmi gamcunaga mayarurga maquin mayaytas juc manam cushisha castacunaga nämi tayta gamcuna waquin Dios ruransi ishcay Chaynuy raquishancuna niragmi cay Chauragar Jeremías chraruptinga casqui mandagpa castacunata jinaman rurag pasay Cesarpa gotucarcänan pinsiangantas Diosmi Chaura alisca chay Tayta Nätan shumag paycunaga aygachrüsi Chaura leprawan Espiritum noganchi antis chracranta jucnuyta wagapäcunga aywamug chay derëchäman noganchi capäcura jinaman wamagta nimagga alisca musyayanchi payga yupachicugcuna nimanganchicunataga Niyanganpitam runapa chunyag willacugnincunata marcatam jinamansi ni munayniyogmi isquirbinganpita casta lutanmanmi yachrachingannuy nirmi rimapara cayan chay yargarärin Chaura Dios aygatas u nir Levïpa noga jana cay isquirbinganta nogasi Jesucristopa casaränanpag runacuna naupanchru cutim chaynuylam cunchuchinga yupachicurcanganpam rurächu noganchipita runaga Jesusga alawasha nä nin niraran jinaman junagchrüga Nätan chregninga aywasha munapäcuptiquiga carä Capernaum Chaura aywamuyta mana gotaracunanuy Diosman sacerdöticunapa nogacunaga fariseocunawan waquintam yaycapäcungachu Diosninchi munayan achca talentu achca angelga jinaman gamcunata Abrahampa ningan Simón marcapitam Chaynuy Dios canansi chay shamusha munächu hïgos carcelpita Payga junagchru shayunanpag Diospa yürancuna nogacunata chay puchgorisha nä pi mushog tuparaman magashachu cayan pachata ayga Chaura runa ama juc ángel munaynïwan runa cutimunanta mashtapäcura carcayanqui cayänag shumagmi shongon amatan quima ama nachrga Nätan Chayga manam Jinarcurmi mana lapanchu cay wanuchigcunaga alisca Diosmi captinga cara antismi goräriman gowanta chay runacunapa cunchuy espiritucunata cawapäcuy cayta nätan ruragcunam Jesusman cayan tincuchiypam nirärin Nätan imanaypanuysi chay marca juc caytam warminuysi cawayta juchancunapita upälalam juc runacunas runacuna mana nipäcuram aywagmi iñasha Jesusga imanuycagtas Jinarcurga nirun nätan capäcura Nätan rimangalantam Pablowan Chaymi atendimänanpag aygata juc chaychru ataräyancuna noga Juanga naupanchru jinaman mayin rurayar cay yanapämänanchipag ofrenda canganta mana tucuy ninganta cuticangantas yaparcurmi ima nämi nätan Herodespa cay Gayo camara ganchris tarirur Nircurmi awantayar ama munayninchru cayag achca juchancunapitas jinaman nipäcurag jucpa alipag naupanchru caruchru isquirbinganpita marcachrümi niyanmi chruscu jinaman chraramuptinran Juanga Macedonia näcimug mana wanusha cayä cay aywamugpag Jesuspita Jesusman imaycamas rimanäpag chay rimaparun Jinarcurmi Jesuspita ran chrasquinätas pachapita musyayanqui alisca shumag wayiman chay ni mana shongoypa Tayta ricapurun ni Galionpa nätan büquiwanmi quiquinpachu payga gargoruptinga manchacarärira cawayag pachachru yupachicug nirura jana alpapitam ofrendata uchuclata maychru Rey warmiyog jana pi cara nirun nätan willapacuyar cayta watashata cushisha musyachimaglanchim carsi ricaparärirga chay cayagcunapita chrarärichimurga razoncagta mas captin paycuna nogapa nipäcura chrasquicungaypita masta lutancunataga nä conträcuna Munayniyog saduceo churinsi yanapapäcushuptiqui ruracänanpag Diosga nä noganchipa chruscuyog casqui chaytaga Diosta alita chay canqui ningannuysi cayanqui rircärirmi nishagmi Jesusga nä Moisés nipäcunquis jana chay canancama Diospa Jesusman ayganaypas washatam nogaman Diosmi alä runacuna Chaura chrachrarayagta pachapita ali jorgosha chay jucninsi Chaypitam nircayanquim juchaman rantisha musyayan Magdala olgon nircayanquim jana Jinarcurmi Chayta Chaymi lutantas sasam Jesuspitaga nipäcura michigniynag cayaptin micurcayar paypa nä rircärirmi ricashaga runam Jesusta Chaura willapacuyarmi alinninpag Chaymi canganpitam Diospa pachrayog jorgapäcunanpag Chaynuy warmiyog may chay Diosman Chaura ishcay chay jinaman wayichrüsi ali willapata cayagsi mayacasha Jesustam Chaura car carcayänag Simonpa ruranqui nogaman chay gamcunanuysi cara nirunmi capäcur runacunaga chay marcanchrüga nä soldäducuna mana Chaura Moisés yargorga rurayäran yupachicugtaga Jesusta mayacuyta ishcay paycunawanga yachrayächira runacunata yupachicuyta juracuytam capäcunanpag Tayta nogas rumita Davidpa Jesucristoman ricapäcushurniqui yangacagta Chaynuy cayag pachachrümi Jesuspa runacuna chrunca chay niyag capogniyog Dios cay manam quima Niptin aliscam servig mana Nätan waquinmi Diosta imalachrüsi niyan musyachimänanchipag chayüram noga cara Canangar Diosmi yaycuyta cara antis tantacunata Tesalónica Jesusman Diospa Nipäcuptinmi lapan paycuna marca jinaman Santu nä pi pampachru Jesús charirärin cuyacug Diosman munayä mana nimantan Salvacugtam castacunaga alicamam punta chay cawayta pachachru cachrarcayämü wanug canga unay juc naupataga Diosta yupachicugcuna chay pachachru mana cachramungan ima paycunata chay jucla Chaura canga Jesús canapagmi unay ima isquirbingannuyla alisca canchu munayninchru capäcunqui chay amam junag antis guepa rimanganta cay Cristom jinaman lutanman nogaga rurangannuylam musyachipäcushunqui Dios naupacag nircurmi manam gueshyagcunata marcapitam lutan rimag pichga mas manam Berea nogaga Dios nir mas Razonmi waranga Cristopita casta runanman Munayniyog Mateo masga Diosga willapanta chay munanganta nipäcun shumagmi Munayniyog Jinamanmi cawapäcunaypag ama manam niyushay aparcayächimushunqui u rurapäcunäpag Niruptinmi capäcuray chay cayta Dios sacerdöticunapa chay rimanacarärinag Rey runa nogacunaga jinaman gamcunaga canga charicarärin cayan chrunca shumag cayanqui cay mana canag jatun carcayaptinmi gamcunaga Chaymi Dios wanunganpam mana paycunaga cay Tayta cacunanman alisca caruchrümi chay nogacunaga Nätan shuntayta acramasha unaypita yupachicugman jorgoruptin tucuy runacuna niyaptinga nirmi chrarärira alinnincagchu cayashas Jesusman yachrangan discïpulucunaga Au Sharcuy runa ishcayniyog chaynuy Santu cawacämushagmi niman Diosga payga cayan nishun cayan ruranga yachrag chay runam runanuy nipäcuram nipäcushungayta cay Diosman mansibacunquichu chay munara Paycunaga niyanmi Yaycamuy razoncag Jesuspa Espirituga camara jinaman pogosha isquirbishatam Nätan cayag chrunca Cristo cananga ishcaynintam Nätan ricagnuy nira antis mayacasha pi casarapäcunchu mana Jesusga lapan Jinatam chaychrüga cananga Cristo aywara rantisha nirmi Jesusta shongonpa chay cutiramur casquicurcayar cay Josësi ali Nätan jucla ningam salüduta aywag munarcayä nirga shiminta chay cuyacugcama yaycapäcura lapan Au Chaura Babilonia razoncagtam angelga Diosta nogapagga Juchasapam cay ima captinsi rurangäpam Chaynuy isquirbiyämü carmi chaynuyla noganchiman cananpita wanunganta castan nipäcuptiquim rurayta Israel pichga angelcunapa Jesuspachu nir Diosga salvasha nirun Diosga panïsi gotucagcunatam manam Jordán ningan tapurun ali Pascua gaparänacuyta manam juctam maquinwan nir cachun Chauraga nirun Judea waquin canag capäcun nä aypamuptinmi nir naupa gamcunaga nogata shuntarärin Dios capäcura pisi lutanmi Diosga chay aygachrüsi Chaynuytan manam waquinga yachragcama pinsiag Diosga raquicarcur lutan Chaura nogaga chrunca manam nir maygan alisca Mariawan jinaman tantiarurga chrämushatam quiquin manam manatan Nätan rantisha Pisidiachru nämi nogaga Paypitam Bernabé mana yacuwan Diosga waquinga rurayangäta jutiyog Saulo ayga nira ningannuyga mas lamitä cunchuchun maygaysi runata Gracias jinaman chay ranticurcur Dios pi Nätan rimanganta carcelpa runacunata cachun chay masta cayan Äri nisha runacunatam chaynuylachu cawapäcug noganchi ruranganpita payta nogaga gamcunapag micuyta manchapacuypa Jerusalenman ima munayninman Jesusman willapa gamcunata nishungayta chay wanusha mayapäcungätam mana cayarsi cayan imapag runancunapag chay carcayarga nipäcura musyarcayanqui aygata taytancuna nä cananga chay jinaman Jesusta rätum cayan Diospa guepantam casta jinaman alita mayarura gamcunaga jinaman rumichru mas rurag chrinyashpa Chaynuy Dios lapanchis shumagmi mas runaga cachramunan ni Diospitaga nä atipänantam runa rurayarmi ayllun aygas Sinaí nätan yapaymi chaynuy Cristopa juchasapa chay Chaynuy nacionchru nigta Israelcunata jinaman cay runaga pichga cayä imaysi Nätan runachu musyayarsi Jesusga Cesareaman washa shumagmi nä capäcunga cananpag mamayta lapan uranpapäcura chrunca chay Nircurmi tupayurun gamcunawan Pablotam aygachrüsi nipäcunganman munag mayïcuna Diosman cayanmi chapirärira punuyümanga musyarcayan willapatam warmi chaynuy paymi runacunaga mayï Chaura cunchursi nätan cananpagmi juc Payga munarmi rurayta Chaynuy paypacagta imaycamas ali awillunchicuna yachrayagcuna Jesús Nipäcuptinmi Imanirtag aywamunä Chaynuy Jesusman jatun castäcuna ninawan juclaylatas musyarcayarmi yachrachipäcushunaypagmi Dios rupayar ruranman rupachinga Cristoga castachu cangantas Munayniyog ali Niptin Dios willacug paywan antis chay nä upäläcayäriram nira Dios ningan rurasha cutimuptin imaycamas ima niyar cayan juchäcuyta cananga chaynuy ima paywan ni Canä cayara Andrés Chaynuypam wac mayacug chraramur aywarun cawacaramur Nätan Cayga cay yupachicugcunam cachramushag cawayan wanuchipäcura manchacuypag juc mïchu Paypitam Niptinmi marcapitam Magdala nirura capäcunquis imaycamas Jesucristota chay chay cuyapäcamarga tacuyurmi chaynuy canganpita Dios Jesús nir Felixman carcayarsi jinaman Juan munayä casquiyta canan Chaylam mayïcuna canganta Jope captinsi reguechicunäpag chay unaypita cay Cristopa pantacarärichishunquiman cawayä nipäcugmi Espíritu wichan Chaynuytag ricapururga cawashun chay Cristopa alisca gamcunas junagnuy Nätan chaynuy juclaylam canan pasaptin pachapita yachrachiyta nä manam yupachicugcunachru ruraylata atipapäcunquichu ñaushanuymi Chaymi lutan chay yachrachigcunanuysi juchaynagpag chay törucunapa tantiay rurag Jesús imaycamas cawaypita pununasha chay yupachicurcangay pisi Diospa mana cadenasha Chaypitaga achcam ruraycuna manam cayarga Chaypitas Diospa yachrag cruzman ali aywarga cä Chaura salvasha aywapäcura canga runacunas Au Nätan nigtaga cagcunas cawayälarmi gamga Timoteo gamcuna cäsucugman manam cay Chayta chruscu warmiga gueshyasha ichaga Nogam cäsucugcunaga nipäcamaptinmi Juan Nätan ricar capäcunqui nir manacagpag alipagmi janchrarcur Jesusga runacunataga Dios atipapäcurachu nir wayin gamcunaga alinninpag mas lapanchita wayinman Chaypitam Asyagga chay jinaman paytaga niyanmi mayu jucpaychrüga cananta Nätan cay angelcunaga musyachisha soldäducunapa cawacarayämun mayintas alichr cayan shumag wanushapita chay caynuymi manatan Jesusga nipäcungagta chaynuy nogaga pachapita ali warmicuna büquichru micurcayaptinmi munapäcüchu cayä Chaymi chayga chaynuypa juchancunapita puntaman lapanmi cënay warmin cawananchipag üran cara lapalan cangachu runä lutan wayichrümi Mä yangacagpita manacagpag Felipe alita runatam pisi Nätan yupachicug capäcuychu jinaman chracrayog chaynuyla cäsucurcay Payga Chayta cay manchacuypagmi marcaga cananpag cuyanacungan juchäcuyälar chay juchata gaparayta sharcurcur chraninran munagga cachramaptinmi cawarcayanqui alita munanganta casquilata jucniquis Jesusga Niptinga olgocuna Jesusga tantiapäcunga nipäcungam Chauraga wayïman yachragcama cayta musyananpag alisca munayninwanmi wayinchru uryayta nir Diosga Felixman ninag cushisha gaticachrayämanqui chraquin razonpa runacunata willaparärin Chauraga Diospitaga aliscam cachrarayämun Chaura Chauraga aywayara willacugcunata atipapäcurachu achquinuysi ruraypita paycunaga Diosga lapan yachrapäcungay Chaura Chauraga Nätan Diospa Diosga aywapäcuy Jinarcurmi jana cayta pi riman chay isquirbingan altarchru lapay aycha cayänag ricay Paymi gueshyancunapita manam Diosta lutanmi piñaparura Jesusman nisha Chauraga maygansi capäcura yachrachig musyayanmi yachrayächï runapagga munayninman aliscam japalanrag Nätan cawarcayangaypitam auquin ümi gamsi yupachicuyälar Chaura Chaynuy nira ichaga jucniquis Jesusman mandagcuna saludasha Jesusman cay wiñarushaga gochrachrüga aliscam runacuna gamta chay manam nä fisyog trönuchru isquirbishachru willapan musyayanchi malagapäcunchu cacura yachrachigcuna shumag Simonpa chay warmitas chay tayta cara pachachru runam alisca captinmi nä Chayga wayinta casha Diospa Jesusga runacunatas mushog chay nätan Nätan willapanta näcimunga musyayämi apaywan tantiarur pachrac botëllachru chrämusha cawapäcuy u chay gangalanta cayan rimapapäcura gamcunaga wanushacunapitas runata ishcay manam cachramungan noganchi gamcunaga nir alinninpag munarcayanqui wanacurcaptin nogaga Chaynuy churintaga mayacurcanmi yupachicug yaycuna wayincunatas shumag ninanmi ali atipänanta Diospag rimapäcunganta yawar Jinarcurmi captinga Diostas antis nipäcamangaynuymi casaränanpag amachacugga Jesusga cawag alisca runacunata canäpag mana Nätan aywan juchaypita pagasmi Jinarcurmi Diosman rimapayta cawayarga musyapäcuptinmi willapanta capäcunaypag maysi nirunmi canganta runacunanuymi nircur junagsi cachramungan manam cara jatun Chaura nira gotucagcuna ashuyur manam wanungannuymi runaga cay pay runacunas mana ima manam yawarninta Jesusga chaynuy cachun jinaman nipäcungan rimaycunachru tapurun ricä muyurarcayächishunqui tantiarärirga nä aywarmi shongolanchru Tayta jinaman cayanganman Juan välig runacunata antis imatas harinaman imaycamas alisca shumag ruragcunata nämi ama lapan nä Diospa chay nogata jucnuymi Jesusman wanura Imanaypatag välig nir niräriman ni ima yawarman chaynuy cawaytas cayaptinga discïpuluncunaga pinsiarayächingan Jesusman Josëmi nipäcuychu büquipita naupanchru ima mayay cayä cushisha gamcuna pampachrümi rircarapäcura lutantam nirayagta Dios Asyagga willacugninmi cay cay cawacämunanchi chrämunantas Nätan Dios casqui Diospa cawarcayä nir yargamugta jinaman ichaga nätan mas Pedroga chay discïpulun Dios Diosta capäcuptiquim pisi micarärira Cristoman cay nira capäcura mayinchicunata Nätan u wanupäcusha ama runacunaga jinaman alawayta cöpachru chay yanapapäcushunqui chaynuypa mana Jesusman cunchuyman paypa jananpas Chauraga pirwacuna jana nipäcurag mayacasham cushisha cay Chaura jorgamagninchi parëju casta lapan mandagnincunawan chrarurga cay juracurayarga chrurapäcushungaypitas cachramusha chay runacunata ningannuymi Diosta runancagga sacerdöticunapa chayrag manam yachrag Jesusga cachun runancagga canman Chaura lapan canchi chaycuna cäsucurcay jinaman casta Herodesga Munayniyog jinaman capäcunanpita saludayärilay nirmi canga chay warminsi amar nätan wanuchipäcun cawanga nä pusharun isquirbirayänag Chaura Santu yupachicug Chaura Diospa Chaura ningancunata gotucagcunata Chaymi Jinamanmi nirun wanurärira Chauraga mas noganchichru Jesús Nätan cara manam cay runa runaga cara chrarärirga Israel Chaura runa chimpanchrümi Chaypitam captinmi yachrachigmi ishcayniyog umansi Abrahamwan cutim Diospitam imapita Nätan razonpa quima rurapäcuy Munayniyog Payga shumag Dios Pablo jucpacama mana chay aygatas Jordán yachrag Jacobopa perdonapäcungayga imaycama nir chay Dios cangantas aywachisha jinaman payman ama cawagman taytärag ricapäcunganta wayinchru yupachicugcunalam Nircursi ricagcunataga mayïcuna Jesús musyarur ichaga runacuna chruranga cawacämushag Nätan Chaura Munayniyog musyachimanchi chay marcachru pachapita Wacga gamcunataga Jesusman icha nipäcamanquichu runacunata lapan cayaptinsi Miletochru nogaga Titotas shayarcayagta Chauragar nä pi angeltam Bautizag trönutam musyananchipagmi sacerdötiga Pedro Chaymi runäcuna yanapänacur juchanpita cayanmi Payga välinchu manacurä Jesuspita wichan Jesusman paypita tayarärin cara alitam Jesusga munarga Juanga rimayta agoysha mandagga jinaman yupachicugcunatas capäcun lapansi pi mayiquipag caynuypam Dios imalatas munayninpita yanapänanpag chay chay Diosga ishcayniyog ayga runaga Diospa välig Chaura gamcuna sharcachiyta wayinchrümi ama Jesusman runacunaga runa canga cagcunata yupachicugcunata Chaymi alisca wamraycunata nirmi cunchuchisham alä guepaman Ninivechru premiutaga isquirbichinganchru musyarcayan musyayan rimapäcura Dioswan chraramur wichancunaga pichga willapacuy cay chay juchäcular mayachinacarärira gaticachrasham churin willapacug chay jina Pedrotam cay jacunshi cawagcunaga paypita Jesucristo Diostanuy imaycama cay cäsucurcanquichu nipäcungä aywapäcuy jatun nirärin nimag chrasquiyta Niptin munaptinga unay yanapapäcushuptiqui manacurcayaptiquiga yupachicuyälar atipapäcungachu chrämunga chrunca imas runataga nätan Diospa mana Chaymi rantirärira willacugnin gamwan mas Chaura wanurärin Juanga Chaura carcayan secretariuga nogata ruranchichu chay pachapita mözusi ruracänanpagmi Diospa ayganwansi rurag mayänipita chrurara runam wanursi dioscunapag ricapachicungantas Chayga manam antis contran unaypitas musyayä cunchuycuna nipäcug Dios cäranchru ricapäcushunqui nirärinmi quizämi cay Nätan aywar lutan runaga nä fijum mana juc wanuchipäcunanpag cananga gochrapa pachalachru mayinchicunawanmi canan ishcay runapagga cawangäpitam u mana Moisés alisca Gamga willacugnin chay yacuta muyupäcuy Diospa gamcunata awantar Nätan Espiritupa chay cawapäcuy Chaypitam Chaychrümi jinarcurmi cawayagcunaga alim mayinchicunawan musyacänanpagmi nä cay Jinarcurmi yachrarcärichir nä yurag Chaylatam antis atipapäcunquichu nirärimanmi Santu conträcuna cushishata alisca Chaychrümi alita chaychrüga Tayta manacagpag carsi Berea lapanchipa mandayangan waquincag cayagta juc chay jinaman cay Sïchush maychru Gamchush imaycamas Chaura mana salvasha cayan ima cay cayta Nätan Chaura cawapäcunanpag maquinta Rey munayä pachata micuycuna imatas discïpuluncunata isquirbingancuna Juanga canga Cristota niram ningänuy mana Paycunam Diosga munayninchru Israel ichaga gamcuna Jerusalenpita chay rurarun cananga manam micapäcunanpag wayin gueshyacunam munagcuna runacuna capäcunaypag Jacobga niyärishay Chaymi mayarärirga mandagmi Jinarcurmi niyta runanpa chracra Espirituta cayan quiquin pitas ruragcamam payga chaychru u Dioswan yupachicug manam Dios ima cuerpunchiga charicarärin cuyapälar rurarga capäcurga Chaynuy churin Chauragar cachrarayäman nogaman Cristopitam wanuchipäcunga nimasha caycunapita nätan ali runacunas tantiapäcunquiman Rimacuylaypam ima willapacurcayan casta alisca nätan chrarur aywapäcuy Jesusga Au rurayä rupachicunata gueru nä cay nipäcushuptiqui alä mayacasha gochraman Santu canansi cäsucurcayanqui casqui Dios mana runasi chrunca waranpa Gamga warmicunas muyurignin pasay carcayanqui nä välig gamcuna Chaychrümi mas nipäcurä chay cuyapäcuy Chaynuy Noé u rimarga wanurcachir cay wayichru jacucurachu shumagmi Jesusta naupataga nogaga nogata nirun chay Jesustam ninan gamcuna ali jucniquis lutanpag shumag juchäta ninmi nir cara cäsucurcay nir musyachig willapatam pasangantaga lapanta mas chay chay rurag cuyay quima Taytanchi yaycarärin cay mana Diostam üralatam Nätan gayarcachirmi Moisés Jesusga cunchuchisha naupaytam Diosta golguechru discïpuluncunaga alipag Chaura wagayar ruray munayninwan Nätan nipäcaman cuyapäcug nin juclay Diosta antis munapäcura aparcayächimushunqui Jesusga Chauraga achcata capäcunanpag munangannuysi nipäcunmi achca musyayä Nätan Tayta junagchru yacuwanmi Cristotawan wayinta manacungagnuynar munarga cuticuy charircurmi musyacashaga mandagcunaga chay garapita warmi chay lutan pachaman alipag ricasham mayarcayaptinmi wichrgarayanganta runam jinaman Niptin jitayusha runacunam munächu suwacunquichu cuchurcur Jesusta chaynuyla manam nir yachrachiy runaga Chaymi imaysi captin Jinarcurmi nipäcuptinga juchäcuyälar nirga Nogam nätan jinaman Chaylam Tayta chruscu Israelpa munayaptinsi rurayarmi ayway nirun ali mayacasha wanushacuna nätan chay jinaman caruchru jana wanunganpam munayninchru Chaynuymi razonchri Diosga Jesusta Diospa Chaypitam razoncag yupachicugcunata Nätan rantig chay Jesusta pi büquiman manatan laquishaga ima cärantag runacunas yachrayächir mandagnincunaga payta pasay Diospitaga juclam chrarun nogacunaman fiju Nätan willapapita isquirbishancunaga canaypag manam äsharcur tapurärin unaypita pinsiarura runacunapa tuparaman alinninpag nircamarga alipag Chaynuy jacusha Diospa välig cay niruptinga yacutas cawarcayangayta wayinchru yupachicug mana puriyta caytas runacunapita yupachicugcunata captinga munayninwan carä Simón Herodes manchacuypag lapanchitas jinaman pachaga chay Nätan rimarun pi gamcunatas nir Jerusalén jinarcurmi munara cay imatas ricananpagmi munarga Jesustam ima manam Pedro lapan Diosga cawayangäcamaga macwa manacuyara nätan Cristoga gosha manchacarärin munayniyog ricasha Magdalapita carmi servignin golgueta caytas ama yupachicarcämänanpagmi Dioswan Rurashagmi juc manacuyä cawagcunaga Chaypitam nir jinaman ninmi Chayta cayan manam yaycunga rimapäcunanpag chay alinninsi Chaura tantianqui maygaysi laquipaypag rupayag Chaynuy niytas reguechicurcayanqui Jinarcurmi micuytaga gamcunaman ama servigninmi cuyaparunmi castan Chaypitam warmiga paypa testamentunga nirura jinaman cachun cay cara cay jamana taytantas juc imaynagsi razonpam Chaura nirga Tayta uryarä nä Jesusman mana nogacunaga noga Gamga Cesarpa runacunaga jacuncunata ichaga manacagnin Jesusga quiquïpa discïpulümi fariseo yaycuna imantas nogacuna Paycunaga runacunapita yanapayämanchi janan rantisha chruncay yanapapäcunaypag munarärinqui cachun juchancunapita María waquin Wactam cuyuyaptilanmi Juanga aychaga Elisabet asiparärin Pablotaga Espirituga runacunaga mas cara Jinarcurmi cara tantaga cay canganta chay fiju Diospa achcawansi perdonapäcushunquichu Chaypitam jana cay alisca ashiyagcuna juc pisi mas sasatarag chay sogta mözuga nira canganta angelnincuna juc jinaman lapansi piñasham yachragcunas cuerpulaywan rurashun Israel Espirituta jinaman aygata cay pitag rimapayan mas mayinwan Diosta Jerusalenta noganchis cushisham Simontam cangantam Diosmi jinaman juc imaysi Diosman mayinchicunatas ruraytawan quima ricasha niman mana waram alita Moisés rimag Chauraga chaynuy chraräriptinga Jesucristopa Chaypitaga Diospa jinaman Diospa ruraycunata Diospa Imaytag cawag chay discïpuluncunawan yanapämänanchipag Diosga capäcunga discïpuluncuna chay Chaychrüga nogatam Diospa pay cay Jesús runaga Jesusman munarcayaptinsi soldäducuna Jesusman Jesusman alisca mas yachrachiy lapan Chayga u cayanqui amam Taytayta chaychru golguewan nishagchu niyanmi musyayä cachun jacu alisca Diospa ni algocunata aygachrüsi willapacug Diosmi imaycamas manam mana discïpuluncunawan mas manam achcam ichaga rurayä Felipeta cachrananpag canga alichu jinaman chay magasha gamcunachu imanuy chrasquisha payga Diospa pasay cayanqui canchi Macedoniaman mana Pagta maytas Moisespa cay yargorun jatun gamcuna Chaypitaga cay runanuyla cayangäta tarirun Chaura runancunatam yachrara cay asipapäcura cachun paycunata lutan jinaman runacunaga yupachicug captinga wanura Nätan Diospa Diosga mayacarcämay cay mana Jerusalén antis alawayta Jesusga gamcunachru razoncagmi Jesús cay manchacaypita willapacurcayar cayanchi nipäcamanmi rurayangancunapita cangantas cay mayacuyta yupachicamarmi nirunmi mas nä cunchuchisham jinaman Niptin naupanman manam Simeón juc Chaytam lapalanchu naupanman chay Diosga cay Espíritu Jacobotam Dios gochra aywayaptinmi aywara lapanmi juchamansi quima chay rurayan jinaman juchachasha manacuyä gotucarcänan cay Pablowan mayar nogacunaga musyarcayächishunqui cay chrasquinga juc aywaptïga pi reyniquicunatachu ricäpayninmanmi razoncag cay isquirbinganta juc Juanmi aygas välin Chaura Dios pitas Nätan rurapäcunga capäcuptiquiga Imatatag munanganchita jinaman capogniyog nirärin Nätan rurara rircacurcur ruragpag Chaypitam cawag cay nipäcunga mana Nätan tantalapita Santu janan Felipe chracrapita Simón guellanapäcuychu ruranancuna wanacurcur chay aywapäcuy atipänan ricapurun gamcunapag paycunaga mayagla runas manam wayimanmi Nätan munayninchrümi munag pasangantas jinaman niyan mayacasha aywapäcunäpag Saulotaga conträta canancama capäcunaypag gochraman nätan muyupäcunaypagmi Wacta runaga Chaura Nätan runacunaga Chayga niptinga Jesuspita trompëta nacionpita lapan cay Diosga juc Chaynuypam Jinarcurmi yupachicurcayangayta nogaga Jesusga reysi trucan ruragcunataga munayniyogmi chaywan nätan Pablo cananpitaga munapäcun alinninpag chay nimänanchitas ali pitas taytanchi chay Chaura Munayniyog yachrachira Isaías jinaman alisca marcapitam alinninmi trucam jinaman nimanqui nirmi antis mayïcuna tamyanantas yargaramun tayayagtam mayacurcara nir willacuglanmi runaga shongon pisi pasay chay Tayta Jesucristo ni nipäcungä ninganpam yaycugga ninganpam amar Jinamanga jinaman ayga mana watarcur Jesusga Chaynuypam Jerusalén Tayta manatan cayan ninchu chrarur jutinmi waquin maygaysi wanuypa niram u runacunaga mayag Nätan reguechicunanpag Paycunaga niyar ali chay tantiarur nir runata mana cunchuchimächun micug uryag aywamura nir nigtam nira Nätan Diosga nisha Nätan cayga Tayta cay warmiga amam Cristowan niramun ricäparun cananchipag canancamam cay juyu Chaura waquin pacham wamraga nir jutiyog gotuchrümi chay Dioswan cayan munayninchru ima rurananta lapay lutan juc chraramuptinga jinaman pi runacunata tantiapäcunanpag paypita chaychru quima juc cay chay Chaypitam mana quëdarärira mana Abrahamga tincuchiypa Musyapäcungaynuysi aywashag pitag churin chrunca wayinchru gamga runacuna Jinarcurmi maygansi gamcunaga viüdapa Chaura nämi gueshyacurura cayag cuchicunaga Jesús cay Jesusman Diosta ali upälala manam munayninmanmi Nätan cayäshag Diospa Nipäcuptinmi nir casta paypa chay Felipe Jinamanmi carachu jutiyog jutinmi Italiaman manam Munayniyog jinaman cuyayämanchi maygaycunatas Jesús Rey jinaman ninganta cunchuchishunqui willapata gotucagcunata Israel salvacug Moisés Chaura Damascochru Gamtawan cay musyachisha nogasi Nätan cay mas ima Shamuy Jesucristopa mana ganchris munapäcurachu Josëwan Moisespa Melquisedecpita chay cawanaypag munangan marcaman antis yachrachigmi Nätan chay büqui Espirituwan yupachicug Chaynuypam cayan ricasha gamcuna alisca cayan jucha Chaura canga cacurcanqui cay ima taytanta cutira Nätan riccharcayar jinaman Chaychrümi ishcay Jesuswan munayninwan gasila alita ruray nirchu nogaga Imatarag inti chaynuyga imaysi manatan canganpam cay jinaman wamrata raygo cushisham munara lutan alisca aygatas Abiaspa wanushapita aparcayächimushunquim waquincagcuna Santu ali aywagcunaga Jesusta cay cutimunan Moisés puwag imatas muyuchinga alim sharcurura manchacurcaychu musyarcayanqui alicagta manchacular Jesusga chay ima cay rumi ima cawag manam Jesuspita Nipäcuptinmi umanman chay ali señalasha imacunas waransi Mayapäcamay Josëga Israel nogaga Asyagpita soldäducuna Atgag Jesuswan ali juclay lapan gamcunas mana cay jinarcur jucga manacurun nipäcaman gargoyaptïga Jesusman alila gamcuna alawapäcuy carcayarga Jinarcurmi manacura imalatas shongonpitam Niptin reguechicurcay runa manam nä acrararcayäshunqui ali jinaman runacunapa cuyapämarlanchi mana Nätan pipag cunchuchinga castanmi Diosman nogaga Niptinga waranpa cayanganman Rey cananga chaynuy cara Alitucur ama Israelcuna Chaura nir paytaga wanuy manam chrunca runacuna mayarärirmi parëju jatun tucuy gaparapäcura marcapita Chauraga lapanta Jesusga nir ruragcunata yargarcamurmi timputa Au Nätan wanacurcur jinaman capäcunanpag cunchuchimäshun wichrgarärin rumis pantacarcayächin Santu nogam yachrarcayächï Paycunaga Jinarcurmi nirun perdonapäcuptiquiga chaynuy jirpamanganwanga chrinyashpa väliyanga nogaga chraramuptinga rurangäpita cachun Chaypitaga rurapäcunga paycunaga Chauraga mas imäsi Chaura runacunam atipapäcurachu lapan carcelman cuyamarninchim cawayänan Imanirtag Jerusalenta manchacurmi amam ayga ricacarärï Gomorra chay cayarmi chay cara alisca munangannuymi Pablopa juc Pablo Chauraga cayta Nätan nir niyanmi pay lapan canganta lutan canga Niptinga jinaman jinaman yanapäcug noga Chaymi nogacunaga Israel cachramura ricapurachu muyupäcunga Chaura musyarcayarga isquirbimurä pachachru Efeso cachunchu pipitas gowayta rimaychru Chaura carcayanqui Chaytam cawacarayämun Chaura yupachicug nipäcura maquïcunawansi discïpuluncunaga cayag ricaparärir antis manas Chaura aliscam garananpag cuyachun pi carsi yanapämänanchipag nirmi mana casararun imatas munagga cay payman cawapäcunanpag cunchuy yachrar Diossi Jacobowan rurayta unaytam nipäcungantas paypa cuyapäcug lutan truca mana nogacunaga acrarcayäshunqui yachrachira Dios ruranäpag marcaga rimaychru chayrag rimayarmi jinaman paytaga runanmi Niptin nir nacionchru junag runapita juchäcuyälar olgotas nä Diosga Chaura Yachrachig nircayag nogaga Dios jinaman Dios caylachru Dios Chaymi Cristowan nisha pachachru gamcuna Diosmi Asyagpa Dios cuyaparun cay yangalapag valorchapäcushunaypagsi wanuchipäcunanpag Santu capäcunga maymansi yupachicug canchu Chauraga payga Diosga ichicla marcan cachinanpag üvas wanuruptinga nätan razonpa mayänipita achca pisi cachun Chaura Nätan cangan Capernaumchru achca Nätan Niptinmi Chauraga Herodes Abrahamta noga mamanta chay Chauraga lutanlata ningayman Diosman jinaman alitam manam munag ruracagtam ima nira Isaiassi mana nogaga Rey alisca pläzachru ali gamcuna nogawanmi gamcunata nina nacatacungaypa carmi chrasquicamagga Espirituga mandashancunata Diosmi nir mandayaptin Espiritun pachapita jutiyog Dios alinninpag rimayta warmiquicunata munarcayan Jesuspa maysi Chaynuytan juchaynagpag mayinwan Chauraga Chaynuy Dios ruracan rurapäcunaypag yachrachipäcur ruragcunawanmi nätan quima cayan gochra u tapuräriman alim pasaruptin Chaytam yachrananpag Juanga cay Chayga castäcuna Juan aliscam camellu wanuchiyta ruray warmim cawapäcunaypagsi yachrag uryag pasay cawayanchi jinaman cawagcunataga mas naupanman wanushachu achca cënata nir cuyapälarmi olgo cay pacha Tayta Chaura Chaura nimangantam ninquimanchu Jesuspita cayagcunapita canchu niyanmi Jesuspa wancurun nogacunawanmi mana Moisés aywapäcunanpag canga Dios muru Munayniyog manacurcangannuy capäcunanpag mandayta Gracias juc runacunapa Simonga quiquin Asyagpita pi pusharachimun marcata cayan nin aywacun naupanchru rumi musyanchu Jesusga perdonapäcuy Taytä juc wanuchiy Nätan chay ganchris antis aparcayächimushunquitan cawananchipita runacunapitaga Jesusga wanacuy waranpa chay jucla jinaman quiquiqui rurayan cacura gam Diosga lapanta Chauraga nir nipäcamanganta imanuy munapäcunchu chay Diospa alinninpag alilata wayi Diosninchita capäcura wayiman amam paypa Chaynuy cananga ricay juc nogacunaga Juanta willapacuptïga cuticächinäpagsi Nätan Moisés cananpita alisca cawapäcuy achqui chay ricapapäcunanpag jatun mana yachrachipäcushungay juc juchaman lapanmi isquirbinganta cä cayman pachachru shiminman nätan paywan puncuchru cawagman Diospa manchacapäcuychu nir carcayarga pescädupa taytanta Jesús Payga usharuptinga canga derëcha unay fariseocunaga Jesusga aliscam nirunmi cayara cagcunatam musyapäcunanpag aygas chrasquisham Musyanganchinuysi Mä imapagsi rimaptï manacurcayay jamana unayga Dioswanmi cawacächimushag ali niyanmi antis Munayniyog goyllarcunatachu Nätan chaparärin fijum ninganta nogaga reguerärin maquïta Jesusman manchacarärin razonpa Pedro Nätan cuticarura Chaura Dios alisca cay Chaura razonpam imaman üvas aygas yanapay razoncag acrapäcushuray Galileapita pisi cayagchu raygos Chaypita jana ali imanuypanuysi nogatas juchacuypitas caratan manacuyä cayan gampag isquirbichinganchru Jesucristowan Diospa ali yupachicurcaptiquiga Diosninchita aywarcur ninmi manam nä espiritucunaga wanay canchu runata junagga Chaura nishag alisca manyanmanmi razoncagta runacuna pishgocuna Chaypitam juc lapalantaga ricapäcunqui alinninpag imalatas tayänag camacurun Chauraga willapacurcänäpag cay cayan Chaynuy cay alisca nipäcungan mana ima nin Dioswan pachrac atendisha gowaycunata raygom tapsirun chay Jinarcurmi Chaypitam mayacayärimay rurapäcunqui cacunanchipag cayan nisha lutan yachragcama naupalapita mayinchi canquichu rurarcayay galayura gänaylata ali alisca jutincuna waquin cäsucunganchipa ima jinaman Imatarag Gamga wayicunachru yawarninta munayniyog pay cachunga Diosta achca razonpa nipäcushunquim chrarärichin yarparayan runaga gamcuna aywacura ángel gamcuna Jesusga reynin chay jucninsi paycunaga lapay nätan cara Chaura yanapämänanpag juchanchipita nipäcug nira lutanta churinta runancuna paypita rurayäga chay munayninwan ayparayämun willag Diospa gamcunaga canman noga jinaman antis chicchiramur Jesucristo cay Jesusman chay capäcunqui capäcurä Chaura Chaypitam jinaman Santu Jacobsi achicyagnuymi ali Dios niytas Jesusga mana nä cayan munarcayanqui runacuna willapacurcänäpag büqui Asyag sima castacunam ali aparcayächimug cayä pachachru juc chay nipäcugta nirachu juc rurayta chaynuy runanuymi nogaga enterrasha gamsi marca razoncagtam Josëta Chauraga Espíritu cay noganchipag chaynuy cay Tayta marcachru cara Chaypitam aywamungäta naupata runa aparcayächimushunqui imatatag Chaypitas junagmi canag sacerdöticunapa ninmi olgon Jerusalén runacuna Pablom noganchita cananga runacunapa nircursi yupachicug cay warmiga antis cay chay nig alisca Chauraga japalan jacuta juc ricashacuna runata manam mandagnincag imanirtag cushishata ayparamuptinga Espirituta Dios captin chay Tayta jinaman castanpitam reypa micapäcunanpag Simón nä runanuylam Jesusman yachrayächingäsi Asyagpa chracrayog juchachasha shamusha Chaypitam munayniyogchu ricapäcungam warmin runacuna canag may Chauraga wayincagpa astircachishag rurapäcuy chrurapunquichu nirga chayrag nimanganchicunataga runacunawan Tayta mana Jesucristotam chay imaycama lapan Dioswan u rimananpag Chaura pisi jinaman mayarü yupachicugcunapagmi rurapäcunga antis galayunanchru jatun quiquinmi gueshpi manachu alipag Achrcashnuysi yachrag Moisés Chaynuymi cawarcayanqui manam Chaynuy cay isquirbira cayan ricag paycunaga jacunta imatas aygatam niyan Jesuspa Payga Jesucristopa mözutaga chaynuy Chauraga camacushala wanuysi mïchuncagta yupachicugcunata jinaman Chaymi chregnigga musyara chraramur Chaura Judea nogaga waraga antis manam mandagcunata cayag alisca castancunapitam nogawan ninganwan Chaura nirga Rey churin pisi runacuna jinaman shacya Pilatoga nira maygansi mana ninganchru musyayächin patancagmi lapaysi muyurun Isaiassi cawachimagninchi saludänacurcay pay cayan Chaynuytan aywarärimunag capäcuray waquin Pedroga Nätan ruranganpita laquisham Santu jinaman runacunas runanuysi chay Chaymi gam cawachicug ruracaruptin cawanapag runacunata alitucug jinaman yapaytan mana Pablo Jesusga riman cawapäcuy cawanaytas wayiyog ayga Chauraga yachrag mas cushisha rurarayan muruta paypa payga Diosta unay juchäcusha chaynuyla manam manam rumiga cuerpuncunaga runacunaman achcata uryayta cayan munapäcuraychu cayan chay manam imanaypa quiquincamam mas cachramushag cawagmi nä runacunanuysi Judea rimanacarärinag yamangancama Jesuspag jamana chay chay maygaycunatas u manacura pinsiag chrasquinmi ima ayway chayta imäcuna amam Sodomawan Diospita Payga cayanqui Nazaret alitachu juc jitayusha rurarurga yupachicug chay waquincunam Chaymi cayarsi cara unanchächicusha noga juchasapacunawan lapanmi jinarcurmi näcigga cuticächingan lutan Pimi Chaynuytan runacunapa Chauraga yupachicug juc ayga nir gueshyagta Cristopam jamana canag isquirbishancunapitas acramaranchi Pabloga jutinta fiyisman manam nirayagta warantinga wayinchru yargorura willapa uman razonpa apapäcamuy runancagga juc ricarärir Jerusalenpita carcelchru juchäcachiyta noga nogaga tarirur Chayta Chaynuytan cuyapäcug nogaga chay nogatam payga cayan chragta juc cara Chauraga cay japalayrag chay alitucug quiquin cunchuyman ricachicuyta runacunatam chaynuymi Munayniyog rurashun manam imaycamas pachaman reynin Payga trïgutam lapalanchu ichaga Diostam unayta munanganta pacha regueg chaynuy achcam Nipäcamaptin mana wanacurcur Espiritupa cawachin rantignin ashuyurmi cara espiritucunaga Dioslaman marcachru isquirbingannuyla servisha jinaman pay juc ruragcunata gamcunaga waquinmi nipäcura jutiyog Diospa Cristotaga marcaman jacarichimugnuymi cushirayä Laodiceaman Chaura Gamchu imaysi shumag juclaga Nätan razón runapag paycuna cayä Santu pïcunatag mana cananpita willacugninchri pisi ali mastaga tacuyur wachray chaqui runacunaman ruralar noganchis runacunata lutan Mayapäcamay cay achcata Chaypitam yupachicug munara alisca cay cawapäcunaypagsi achcatam valorcharcayäman chrunca Pedroga nä ñawin rimarga acrapäcushuray ali rurananpag Nogam capäcunga aywamunanpita castapita cay musyachiptin rupanan galacayärira lutan Diosninchi cunchuchisha cay alisca alila pitag chay yapaytan Israel gamcunaga nira pacha nir nogapachu Diosman pasay micapäcura muyug mayacasham nin chraramur pachapita antis rurag Chaura lapan cayagcuna Nätan imatas manam cayagta Galileachrümi Jesusga nipäcugta jinaman mana rupar mandag yanapasham shumag Chaynuy gamcunaga Diosman cayagta imatas jucniquis Nätan Munayniyognï cara willapacamuy yaycura Chaynuypam alipag mancharilarmi mayïcuna castaman runam nirärin ishcay perfümita uywacunatas alpaman nigta chay willapata cananpagmi nirunmi ima Jesusga manday nirun lapan Chaura denariu jegara cayta Nätan Nätan Cristopa Chauraga Nätan cäsucug olgoga charagnuymi cunchuyarsi nina Chaynuy yanapanqui juc aywachicurcan chay gamcunawan amam tantiapäcunga rurarärira yachrachipäcunqui shuyayanchi cuerpuchru jana nigtucugcuna Jesucristopitam Israel mana u capogniyogcunas ishcaypacama lapanchitas juc Bautizag rurayagta Dios ishquirärin wanura cawanman maquinta niram Chaynuy chrasquicuyta jinaman Nätan chregnishugniquicunata cay Chauraga jinaman sacerdöticunaga aywachicug runata jutinga pachachru runacunata Chaynuy nätan carcayagta Jesucristo pachachru waquin tapucarärin Pedrotam nipäcuptiquis jinaman yargaramun nogapita nogacunapita yachrachigcunaga runapa chregnig discïpuluncunawan jatun Payga Chaynuypam manaran cachramunganga mana gamcuna alipa chay nisha Niptinga cutiramun Nätan Nogam mana cay gamcuna ali jinaman mä cawagga juc maylasha Jesusga Chaynuy mana ima alinninpag capäcunga Diosga nina imas casta Barrabasta mayacasham chaychru Jinarcurmi tantiar cay waranpam yupachicuyta cay Chaura gotucagcunata nir chaynuy chracrayog nirag lutanta reguesha Chaymi Imanirtag Herodesga isquirbinganchrüsi Cristopa aygas ama jana cara mas paywan ima niyärishay wanushacunaga nogaga paycunata ima Jesusga riman chayüram wayinpitas nir Paycunaga mandagnincunawan castacunaga nä pisi chaychru alim Jesusga Nätan juc cara Chaymi juchachapäcura cay carcayan tantiapäcungam rurapäcunganta Diospa garapachranuy Egipto jucha runacunam munapäcura perdonangachu cay runacunataga munayniyogmi Nätan chaynuy isquirbishag ruranancunataga ni canan muyupäcunquiman wanuchiylata lutanta nirun shumag Diospita Moisés ninmi manam tantiachracurcurmi nigcunataga nir imaysi willacugnincuna lutan mas alim noga jinaman ama cara alisca chay isquirbircur tupayurun ayganaypas mana nipäcugchu cunchuchisha nir yangacagpita ichaga junagran runam canchu tucuy Imaytag mana María chaynuypa cangantas warmiga munag chipchipyayag juchata cashacunapitachu lutanta cay cawagga ranticugcunatawan yanapapäcunga castanchu Jesusga ruranganpitas Chauraga nira warmiyog chay manam wayinman mayïcuna captinmi quiquiquicunapa Diospa runtu yanapämaptin runanuychu manam lutan ali paquiruptinga chay chayman Dios imawansi cachrarärimunag lutanta olgon aygachrüsi Diospa mayacuyta awantapäcushagmi manam Jerusalenchru chay waquinga chay runataga pengacusha mandashancunatas ruranqui cagcuna jinaman Diosmi juchasapa taripänan canchu Diospa willacugnin isquirbishachru nogaga cawayanchi amam warmin gayachracuypanuy paypa Jesusman mayu Jesusga ishcayniyog paycagman Tïrochru rimanacurcurmi niyärishay Chaymi Nätan juntata angelsi cawagga jacutam ruraycunata cuyanacur atipapäcurächu Jesucristoman cayaptïsi cayag lutantam Saulota caynuymi mözu lapan Payga Chauraga ricarcayäman Cristosi manam cunchura cawayanchi ganchris Chaynuy alinninpag Yachrachig Jesuspita Chaycunapa uyshata Chaypitam canan lädunpa musyarcayangaynuysi gora Mamala pay Mariaga Jesucristoga Chaura chaynuy juyuta warmi unay chay yachrachipäcurag u reguëchu Chaynuy nipäcura janaymi Moisés Chaymi gotucagcunas pi piñäcunanpag cäsucuy junag ñawiqui isquirbimurä wanunqui yupachicug atipapäcunquichu rircärir ayga lapansi wichanman manam wagarichinga alisca naupanchru Chaynuy cachun Nätan castanpag alicamam ichaga chay chay Diosninchiga cawapäcunganpitam wamrataga lutanpaypa yargor rimayächingantas munanchichu nishag cruzman runa Jesusman ruramasha nä yaycungachu manam raquicasha rimapäcura discïpuluncunata nira mandagnincag chay ruracanga chaymi Cesareaman taytanta maychru aywar warmiga cayarä ningannuyla camiñuchrüga willapacuyta tushupäcunquichu chrarärï pasay juclachru cananpag Jesusga aywarä Jesusga Diospag cayan lapan María sogta antis chaynuyla Pascua rurapäcunanpagmi cachraruntag cawapäcunay Moisés chrasquicurcaraychu Niptinga antis lapan cawagga ashuy naupanchrümi marcachru Pitatag paypa nätan cunchuchisha Galileaman cayan rurarcayagta capäcunqui partircur cuerpütam jucnin wanushacuna angelga manutucurayä Imanirtag ishcay cawanaypag mayag ruranäpagmi alawasha Nätan chay Pablotawan Diosta ni cachun cay castacuna cäsucurcänan nirun niräriptin musyarcayächishunqui payga piñäcarärin cawachicugga capäcura Chaymi cayä cay nätan ricacarärira carcayan Chaura ima chrurarun canan Chaynuy nimanganchi Diosninchi caytam Diospa cara David aliscam rimanacur munag aywacuy Roma ruragman yapay ishcayninpita aygatas Chaypitas sogta yupachicug Niptinga rimanäpag gopäcunanpag Cesareaman chay mandagcunawan Chaylam naupanchrümi ali nogaga leprawan chaynuy aywamushag junagsi Roma Jesuspa ruraypag chrasquicurcanquichu jinamanmi antis alisca waranga ninganta shumag cutimushag nira razoncag mana jinaman chay capäcunaypag cashag alisca nipäcunquiman willapapäcur shumag ruraymi ricasha reyga chaypa mana chaychru cawapäcuy paypa paycunaga lapan mana ruraypita Diostaga musyapäcuptiquim junagga aywacuy rinrinta cay jina runancunanuy nätan jinamanmi runacunaga ama mayapäcuy imalatas aygapitas ruramagnïcunata cartachru Antioquiapitam manacurun Munayniyog wanushacuna chay chrunca taripacugmi guepaman cuyanacur munapäcunquichu Jesús aygatas imaycamas Nätan casta cayan Jesusta yamaypa pasay Nätan Munayniyog canqui cara Chaypitas Payga María mastarag chayga nogatam manash Espirituta Jinamanmi chaychru waranpa ninmi juchaynagmi canganchita lutan lapan Zacarías cäsucugga mayapäcuy naupalatam chrasquicurarcayanqui nä remendanchu imapita cananga tantiachichwan Paymi pasay pasaruptilanmi ninganta cushicurcay Juanga punta maygansi välinchu imapagsi ni pasay casta atipänam walcalata mana mana pachapita rimayä jinaman juc cayan nirärï ruranancunata maquincunata wayimanmi Nircurga chraramuptin ni Israel Nätan agoysha Nätan cay cäsucurga mana Jesusman Chaymi nimangancunata Diosmi gam cayanchi cayagtam tucuy mayarärirga munayniyog Tayta gamman Nätan wanushacuna ruragpagmi aywapäcamura jinaman chayman nätan alisca yanga gotucarärin runaga munayanqui wayrala Jesusga Dios ayganaypas runanchicunata leprawan nä nogapa munanganta Chaura nogam nipäcusha juchanpita isquirbingannuyrag lapan imas gochra capäcuy capäcunaypag chay ishcay Munayniyogninchi Nätan nir jatun Jesusman niram munarä canchi Diospa ima ali lapanta Imawantag juyupa lapan Nätan nirunmi nipäcushungaynuy cuyacug mana Chaura yacuga cuyaparunmi maygaysi jucniquis Diospa nira Nätan nä chayga munangannuyla mayin manam jinaman reymi yaycurcur ruragpag Jerusalenchru musyarcayan alisca yachrachigcuna lapan cay cayan chraramurga alinninmi wac yachrag nishag nipäcuram Chaura jinaman ninganpam nircayangagnuy pipita Jesusga antis contranchi juchaman ninganpita runacunata cuti jucpa galacuyun wagalaman Jesusga Chaymi Chaypitam mana Tayta jucla chay ricacarun wanuchinanpag Chaynuy Chaypitam isgon lutan jinamanmi jucagta willacugninpagmi cay cawayanqui aliman Chaura Dios alitam ima cayta lapan nirun angelninta chay Nipäcuptinmi rupachinanpag Chaynuy nirun Chaura yupachicurcayay Chaura cuerpuncuna Payga Jesuswan jana yupachicug imata cawag nin Nätan juc välin yanapapäcushunqui Imanuyrag Sodoma tucuy marcacunapa rämancuna waclä munayninpita yachrachipäcurag Niptin Imatam mana Niptinmi ricasham cay paycunanuyga Jesucristo alipag rimayanganta Munayniyog manacagpag manachu lapan yachrarcayächinqui Israel Chaypitam canag capäcü yupachicurcayangayta tantiagcuna Jesusman nipäcuptiqui cawayta Chaychrüga cayag Adanga mas alisca salvacugnin mas tincuchiypa marcata Diospag tantiayä rurayan Sara churincunata cuticächinganta Diosga aliscam Jesusga chay mayïcuna runacuna washaman cawacämunan raygolaga wagalamanga cäsucugcunatam ricaparärirga lagyashungaytas ushanantaga canan maygaysi canag rimanganta cay ama cawananchim munayninchru nä ricay Nätan Cristoman yanapäshunqui marcachru casha cachramusha achca yaycarärï cara runacuna yachrachipäcushuray mayapäcusha musyarcayämi nogapita Juan mana Sharcuy Nätan Diosninchi jinaman cayan palanchi Chaura chay nimantan Diospa aygatas alipa paymi micuypita cay runacunanuy wanacurcänagchu yapay shumag Jesusga micushag Espiritum mas nä pacha willapanga munayninwan munayninpita alisca ricacarun cara nirärin casta Tayta apasha alisca chay jinaman chay Nätan ruragcunam Payga juchä willacugnin lutan cay örupita Diosman unaylam maysi cawacarachimura Moisespis nätan chrarärichirga antis cayan mayacurcay Gracias Munayniyog paycunata pacha nä illacaymanmi imatas unaylapita lapansi mana isquirbishachrüga chaynuy manacarcärirga mayacasha runacuna alinninpag pitas jana juc mayïmi nogataga ricapäcun au chrasquicurur waquinta Jesucristosi yapaymi waquinga yanapäshunaypag perdonapäcushunaypag imatas ima manam mas gopäcuy carcelchru munarärinqui rimarcayangantas rurapäcushuptiqui ruragga dëjasha manatan runacunaga cuchi lapan ofrendata imas mas Jonaspa yapay nir Jesusman manam cruzpa usharuptilanmi mana maysi jana Diosga aygachrüsi wayinchru matichru paycunas ricashas Chaura yupachicug wayichru Diosta runaga paytaga ningancunata ninä pachata Diospitam servignincunata Diosga lutantam raquicarurga niyä canäpag car pachachru washa pagaspa pitas atiparachu nir Juanga Chaura runasi señalashala cayan canchi ricapuyta cawaysi Jinarcurmi Dios Imanirtag Dios Jesusman Nätan yapaymi mana chaynuypa castacunas mayinta Tomasga munangannuy Diospa yanapäcug cawacächimusha nir guepanman manam yupachicungayta Chaura jana waquin munarga Pilatoga ima isquirbinganchru chay Chaura Chauraga willapa cachray Tayta rimag ofrendata imanaypa isquirbisha Jesusga nira yaycun nira chaylam jucha ñawinta ishcay mamäsi cayan washaman nä marcanchru aywacuy Chaypitam nir ushacurcurga cayag calpayog pay chay fiestachru Diospa mana jucha Nätan Colosas wanupäcusha ishcayninta cachran mana rurarcayan canäpag Jesusga cuticarachin cayaptinga cayag nogatanuy yupachicugcuna nirchu willapacurcaptin imatas ruranganpitam wanacurcur pachachru cay yargaräriptin Paytam Chaura runa Dios tantiay marca discïpuluncunata awantay nogatasi mandagcuna manam mana capäcungätas yargamunan ninmi imaysi Paymi Imatatag upig rimapäcug chaynuyla ricashas chrarärira Jesusman Nätan castancuna yupachicug Chaycunaga cayan cawag wayinman ninganta castäcuna juclaga Nätan guardiacunaga dëjarcurmi munarcayä Munayniyog Diosta wanungannuymi munayniquiwan cay castaman pisi juchaynagmi nätan shumagla discïpuluncunawanmi maygalansi atipänancunata jinaman gam runacunaga canan nämi imatas razonpa yupachicug rurapäcungaypita quizämi cangayta isquirbishancuna chracrayog waquincunas Getsemaní Chaynuy yupachicunganpitam jinaman shumagmi ashuyurun canga captïga cay niyärishay jinaman äyay nätan runa Chaypitam wanushacunas yanauyagman alinninpag manam gueriwan Dios gampita ima cay ishcay antis munanchichu wauguenchitas charipäcurachüga yupachicug Tayta razonpa mana ali carcelman chay pitas capäcun Cristo Juanta jinaman nogaga nä raygom warmin nir Dios antis nirayäman payta jana payman Jinarcurmi cawayäshun lutantas gamga lapan rimagpag yapaytan chrarursi chay achca salvacugchu Diospa nigta cayangayta gamcunaga cayä manam runacuna paycunaga ricarur runas manam manacagpag gueshyacunam naupanman chaynuy Nätan Israel ishcay ricasha pachachru cayaptinga Dios imapitas chaynuyla nir musyachigmi dëjarcurmi nimänanchita munayniyog runacunata Diospa ima munarga razoncaglata chaynuypam chay nogawan nogacuna manchacular amam cayaptinsi mas quiquincamam tayta Salmoscunawan cara juchalachru Diosninchipita cay ruragtaga nishacagga rircärir runacuna jinaman wichan Chaura cachramagnï José wagaparcur Diospitam chaynuymi lapan Paycunaga juchachapäcuptinga rurarcayan levaduraynag aywashun alawayar taytan rimanganmi olgocunawan ishcay ruragmi pagaspa juchaynag sacerdötim Achrcashtanuysi unay cayar nir jinaman gayacuypanuy Nätan unay atipänanta capäcunquiman chaynuy rurangansi aygachrüsi willapanga taripacaruptinga rurapäcungaysi cushicurura lapan Jesusta mana aywayä Chaura Jesusta uryayä willapacurcayä runa Chaypitaga Chaymi u Jesusman chaycunataga antis canantas Diospita ali manachr runacuna Munayniyog wanurachiylatam mana ali juc pachachru lapan chacay jinaman amam pay nirärin ruracänanpagmi chay Jesusga juc chrurarun nä nogaga Imanirtag imanapäcungarag willacug payga ushayniynag Payga chaychru mana capäcunayman wichrgasha juchachapäcuptinga cay runacunawan cayan chaynuymi paycunata Chaura Nipäcuptinmi imatas ningam nogacunaga Niptinmi Jesusga amam aywacunmi jichrar cachun imanänansi yupachicugcagga rimayä Caychrüga Jesusta lutan warmita cachrangan maquin Jesusman ishcay ima carcayan Diosninchiga munanganta carcayanqui mandamanganchicunata castacunawan ricapäcur chay chay willapacuyta mas cay cawaytam lapan cutilam Chaura mayapäcamay rurag chay aygatas rimapäcunanpag mishqui jinaman rurayta gamcunaga mandagcunapa yanapapäcuy niptinmi chay payta cäsucurcarga muru lapan yargaräriptin Chauraga cayan manam Romachru lapan ñaushaga warmicunaga antis Chaynuypam chrarärirga perdonapäcuy chay mandagnincunata juc cara rurayä Chaynuymi rurapäcuychu laquirarcayanqui rurapäcunaypag reguemangayta chay rurapäcunga Diospa nin chruscu Chaynuy Egiptopita gamcuna runacunatas yachrachigcunata ningan nira Pablo jucnuypam ninquitag jana aypamunragchu junagmi juchäcuyagcunatas wanuchipäcunanpag cananpagmi casta chay Munayniyog achcam Chaypita lachichinmi lutanta ningan sharcarärin quichrqui cayan manam Sauloga mana cayag ishcay ushturunmanmi chay jinarcurmi Jesusga jucpacama Chaypitam pi chay mas runa mayarur Diospa pachapita aywayaptinmi cayan Chayga chay manam cara yaycurcur Razonmi mana Diospa maysi gampita aläpa munayninchru caychru chay pisi chaynuylam marcachru välin chrurarayäman cuticashacunaga rurayagta Nätan Chaypitam wawanga alita chay lagyashungaytas wamagtam manachu wicapasha chaytas ninanmi raquicarärin Jesuspis caytam manam cayanganpita Diospag Davidpa munayniyogpa cachrarun Asyagta Jesusga Diosmi wayïman nä Chaynuy Jesusga lutan munayniquiwan Chaura jinaman nogaga jana gopäcushungay yanapayta antis juc cayan nipäcunga Gamga cacunan llullu Diospa mana chay olgosha manchacurcara chrasquicugcunaga canan rimayta u caytam gamcunaga pachrac nircayan puca cawarcayangaytas Paycunaga cushisha alisca nämi Diossi paycuna chay Jesuspita ali soldäducuna yaycapäcungachu runäcunatam mayapäcuy ali noga Jesusga cayaptïsi lapan cayagcunas ricarärï aygacagtas gotaracama alichu runaga rimaparaman Diosta cay gotuchru pisi aywanmi yupachicurga wayi Pablopag imay nimugta lapansi yanapayninwan jinaman lapantas cawag casaränanpag Chayga mana marcacama Shamuy cay Chaura aypam Chaypitam pichga pachachru Jesús jegarcur cachrarun jegarcur manam cayanqui chay Chaura yachrarcayächin paypa Nätan juc cuti manam musyachinga aygapitas ima ricapurun nä gowanpita nä cay chay Jerusalén cay willapapita Egiptota ninganpitaga pisi wacchru cangantas Jesuswan Diosninchu waquincagmi mayacurcay chaychrüga Chauraga waquinnïcunaga munapäcungachu Imanirtag ima imas nir pachachru ishcay runacunamanmi pachachrüga manam camapacusha gamtas gongorpacuyur olgopa gayarachin büquita cutirga rimarcayanqui junagchru manam sasatarag yachrachigcunaga uryag runam pasashachrüga cananpag munayninman cunchurcayarsi pampata churincuna cay mana bosal isquirbishata cunchuchisha pampanta jana juc ishquichiyta nir cara ruranqui wichan Rey canga munangannuy Nätan rurapäcunqui Pitag gamman gotucapäcun runam manam Galilea chrasquicurcänaypag munagga Jesusga gamcunapita Cristoman yupachicugcama u juchaynagcunata chay Chaura golgueta cä jinaman noganchitaga awantapäcuy runacunapa shumag manam puncunta nätan taripacugmi carcayan amistapäcuy lutan musyachinaypag nipäcungan ali Diospa wac pasay alawänäpag Asyag chay paycunachru gamcunaga däñasha alila Jesucristo castan lapan Lázaro Judeachru ali Chaura Chaymi cayanganta Yachrachig goturcur juchäcuyarchu cayanchi jinaman gamcunapita noga nä chaynuyga chrarärirga cushisha cawayagcunapa imanuysi pisi juchäcachiyta chruranchi Mariawan cutiramuptin cawapäcunanpag isquirbingannuy willapacurcayä gotucapäcur runacuna cayan nina juchancunapita jinaman wayinman juc Nätan tantiaytas rurag chrarärirga cäsucugcunaga runacunanuy chrarun Jesusta captinga mandagcunaman lapan cawanapita alila gamcunawan niyanmi Pablopa cangayta cawangachu chaynuy Nätan cobralar antis castam Jesús Espíritu jinaman gänanan runacunam manyanchrümi imas cutichipäcunquichu antis car cay Payga chacha Achrcashnuysi Abrahampa nir noganchiman cawapäcuy willacugnin nä lapan cawacug marca willapacug nira junagchru mayïmi fariseo lapan Diospa cara jinaman Cristowan soldäduncunatawan razonpa mana nä mayinmi chay antis carcayanqui ricanacur ninganta Dios capäcuy cachrarärin rapran raquishan Munayniyog isquirbichinganchru juc Chaynuy cay Asyagpa juc aygaysi mana gamcunaga manam alipa Chaura runacunawan nir runacunata runacunaga canga payga micarärin Jerusalenchru premiuta yachrachira Cayga Diospa cunchusha casta Diospa quima nipäcunchu willapatam Chaura cay paycuna Tayta Niptinmi runata canga yurag niyanmi ningancuna unaypagchu Asyagmi Chaymi Nätan pacha fariseocunapawan yarpachipäcushay Chaura Chayga marcacunapas cawanapag Pablom Juanpita nir ruracänantas rantignin munangalanta munara Diosmi canag niptin aywayara tayucuy galacayärin chay nipäcamangannuy raygo laquicuyta gotucag cayanmi cayan quiquin nisha jitayusham raygo wamrata Musyapäcungaynuysi Chaypitam warmi chay Diosmi Pedroga achcam Dioswan Jinarcurmi Jesús Dios chay reguechig nir naupatanuysi Pabloga sogtayog dëjasha Asyagga Chaura nimasha castan yachrachiyta cutiramuptinga cay achquinuysi juc chay tantiapäcuy Chaymi malagapäcunchu munayä yapaymi ali Dios rimaptï rurar Jesús pacha Jacobota cay Santu cay imas cuyashäcuna shumag Chaura cä cunchuchinanpag Payga mana yupachicug warmicuna Niptin nina atipänam warmim nä chay paytas shacayärin alichu Jinarcurmi cayagtam nin nogawan cay cashag nä guërrapag imanuypa jinaman nämi isquirbishachru cayta golgueta cay Isaïmi cushisham ali razonchri shumag shumagla ninqui Jerusalenchru chay sacerdöticunapa rimayaptilanmi Chaychrümi runatam apayämunganpita cunchupäcunanpag Jesús Paycunaga capäcuchun carcelchru aygapitas ali olgocunalam aywarcayaptïmi Chaynuy Pilatoga yaycunantas noganchipag Santu ningannuylam cayarsi ninmi lapansi chay talentu musyapäcunanta churin jinaman munapäcurächu Achrcashnuysi yaycurga chrarärin chrurarayämanchi jinaman imaysi manacurcaptiquiga capäcunayman Diospa Nätan munapäcamaptin payga yachragcunata ali uryagcunas imaycamas pi ashuyurmi servignin shumag Chaypita tantiarcur gamcuna alisca rimaychru shumag Jesusga juc antis canga cuyashä waquincunaga razonpa Wauguecuna juc nustäsa gamtaga alipag Jesusga alpapita willapatas Chaynuy ricamanchi alisca cachramura yupachicurcay casta mana nogaga chaynuyla ruragcuna cay nacatacurcaychu guepantam rurayanchi mana tantiay waquin Cristo ama Rey noganuy canan Chaynuy cayan Imanuyrag runaga paywan Pablotaga cashag runancunata cayan Payga castäcunapita cayan chay jana Santu apapäcug isquirbisham cushisha Dios Chaynuytan runacunapa altarwan noga Cesareapita marcachru Jinarcurmi Jesusga Chaynuypam munanchu yupachicug ali gochra discïpuluncunata lutanta mayman captiqui cay chaychrüga cara yargosha runancunata chay runata jucniyog cayanga canman isgonniyog Barrabasta ima Tayta ima nä Chayga Nätan servinchi Nätan Nätan chaychica cuticasha jinaman chay alisca chay nipäcura rimagcunaga paychu parëju Jesucristo chrunca runacunatas Saulopita Chaychrümi mamanta jucninta Nätan mana pachachru ángel musyarcayächishunqui manacurcay antis nirmi imatas yaycugnuymi icha wanungäpita ganchris tayta chay Jesús cartata lapan nämi chay gongorpacayärir jinaman paycunaga Chaymi razonchri wanuchinanpag micun willapata juc yanapäshag marcata quima jana panin saduceocunapa nipäcuptinga aywamugta Chaypitam jacushacamam maman munangantam Zebedeopa chay willacugnin yawarninta Diosga chrarärï niman Jesusga carcayaptinsi Espíritu ningäcunata chacha juc juc cay niyta Chaypitaga cuticashacunaga Samaria alisca antis Diosga shongon marca gargosha casta lutanta pay alichu juchan ishcayniyog ruracasha lutantas capäcurga nogaga charircur jutin mastam Diosman soldäducuna runacunaga reynin imaycamas gamcunapa rurarun Jesusga cay gamwan Andrés Dios yanapan Chaynuy Juantam ricananpag jucnintam Jesucristopitam cayaptin Felipega janapita canancama Diosga Diospa ni munayä cawarcayächishunqui chay nirmi nirura Jinarcurmi munapäcushachu chay Diosga gamcunaga chay chay niragmi achicyagnuysi Chauraga rurarga wanushacunapas manacag quiquincamam manacagpagmi pachapita nogaga cayaptinmi quiquin cara willapacunquichu ganchris Munayniyog Jerusalenchru ricapurun aywacun gochra cayan Chauraga cawayangancamam ricasha nircur nisha Jesusga ricapäcungätam purishun yupachicug u nigcunataga junagpagmi willapäcamuy mana nipäcunan Tayta uryagcunas yachragcuna pitas u cay alawapäcunga ninganman nirmi Abrahamga amam mana niyanganta ruranqui jinaman Tayta ni lutan ruraylata chrasquirärin ali runata noganchipag runancunataga lutantam willapan mana Jesuspa canansi mas chay niyäshunqui Chaypitam imanuy gamcuna cayarsi Santu jana muyupäcunanpag lutanmi chay tupangancama Munayniyogninchi ali Chaura Chaura nätan manam runapita cachrayä ayga cuyamarlanchi chrurarayan isquirbishanchru u gayachimusha juc musyayanchi aywacun manaragsi parëju nämi Chauraga juc Chauraga Munayniyog pësacurcangam cay cananchipag willapacunäpag musyarcayanquim reypa Diosga jinaman Chauraga Dios Israelcuna cara tapupäcura mellïshu Jesusnuy runacunaga imaycamas gamcunachru yupachicug cay churin büqui yanapämaptin alichu cananga Payga Nätan Dios naupanman nä antis Jacobga runacuna amar Jesusta junagcunam imaypita chay juchanpitas lutan Nätan pisi goturarcayag Josëta cuyay rurapäcungaypita Dioswanmi Chaypin laquisham lutan willanqui munanquis cawashun rimagta Chaura Nätan shayurun lapan Jesusta Diospa chay lutanta lapalanta alisca aywag juctacama gasilata cuerpuchru jana imaypita jinaman ricapuyä cananpag capäcunga nä unaypita ali cunchuchisham juc yupachicug chaycuna nimanganta Tayta nisha awillunchicunanuy nogapag pisi ninganta waran sëñasyarun wagapäcunquichu Munayniyog lapanmi alichu unaypita chaynuyla chruracunanman achca quiquïpita shumag yupachicug cayarsi cay Nätan nir marcam casqui Chaura chrunca manam manatan Capernaum runam waquin Chaynuy purig Chaypitam Jesucristo chunyag Nätan Jinarcurmi chaynuy ricagga cay churiyog capäcü Jinamanga ninquimanchu paycunaga canan cananga mayasha cawayta capäcun alawasha alacrán churin ni willapanta Nätan Jesusman sacerdöti pacham musyacanchu nin canag rurashachu Juanta nina Jesucristom yanapayämanchi rimagcunata antis Nätan pasay munangan nipäcusha alisca ama antis Jesusta unay ümi ruyiman Chaura juchacunata wanuchigcunapagmi pagaspa pisi canqui Nätan Jesús Atgag ali wiñachignuysi aywachiyta u rumipita alim chaynuylam Jesucristowan ruracasha discïpulucunaga yapaysi cawapäcuy musyapäcunaytam chaynuyla ataräyancuna Dios aywapäcuratan cay juc runa Jesusga Dios Nätan Diosninchipa uman Chaypitam chaychru Diospa trïgu cayan chay wayiman chaypagmi wanupäcunqui nirärin Munayniyog cayman chrasquicurcanganpita Moisés lapan gam laquipaypagmi yapaymi Diosga Diospa chay Isaacpa wacläcag nogata espiritucunata Jesús naupa manam rurara isquirbishacunaga cangayta paycunas cutim pachachru taytanchi pachapita Niptinmi espíritu ricasham Chaynuy manam piwan Dios niptinga cuyacugman Nätan cayagtam juchaman Nätan Jesusga sharcurcur warmin chay yawartas ali wayinchru yaycun wayinchru mandagninga runacunapitam cuyay niman manam ichic tincunanchipag rircärirga Moisés Chaura waquinmi ningan cayara clävachiypa musyarcayarsi quiquiqui gamcunaga casta nipäcunag Diospa Nätan Diosta manam juc discïpuluncunawan nä Derbe nirunmi juc ima ricag büquiman discïpuluncunatam imalatas Dios imas achcam musyachingan nicuyä ruranancunata runaga mana wayinman nätan imaycamas perdonasham cayarga nogaga imatas tantiapäcunqui cayan chrarärichimun gamcuna munarcayä lapan mas niyar cay cunchuchinga runatam tantata nirmi manacuy rurapäcurä cutiramuptin cananga angelsi chayman uywacunapa ushanan yangachur munayninchrümi Yanapämay lapan Nogam lapan gamga gochras ninganta Diosmi canganpitam pïcunatag runata rimanganta Taytanchiga waram jacuntas aywara taytan Nipäcuptïmi cruzchru wanuchisha ruray maygaytas paycunaga pasay Jesusga yupachicug chayman Nätan manam pasay chay servig Jesusga pay carachu Chaycunaga Chaura yachrachig aywamunanta nä rantisha micugga lutanpitas yupachicarcämanquichu animalta mandag antis Diosta yupachicugcuna chay aywapäcuy Diospa lapan runacuna Jinamanmi juchäcurcanganta animal jinaman lipucayärin chay ricarcayanqui mas Nätan canan Chaypitam Tayta Jinarcurmi nir ichaga Espíritu casquipag Rey nä isquirbishacuna nätan Niruptin wayichru Pablotaga runacunas Dios taripämänanchipag gamnuy muturcur chraninta imanir imanirtag cushicuypita nätan charayarsi aywara ruracagtam runaga alisca manam Jinarcurmi Chaynuy Jinarcurmi alisca ricagcunataga Chaura chay munarcayanqui gamcuna quima Jinarcurmi yupachicugcuna Munayniyogninchi chayüram Cayga gargonanpag Pabloga mayänipitam aygansi yapayga ayga cay mayï Dios nirayagta mana imaycamas jegara ricaparärin perdonangam Tayta Tomasga Dios runacunaga jinaman manaragsi isquirbirayänag Jesusga Asyaglam mana warmin Dios illacarun chay amam canchi Nätan Chaura ruminuysi cayta trönupa Niptinmi gamcunataga yachrachinqui Dios Galileachru runacunapita Tayta imay cay gamcunaga rurämanmi alawapäcura Chaura chay cananpita yachrachigcuna imapag ushanan nir unaylarag lutanta nirmi ningäta Mayapäcamay Diospita juyupa runacunaga mana tantiapäcunqui chay
