cuyapäcuy warmi jinaman wanusha cachran canganta mana pi juc chayman nira Paycunapaga goyurun alipam Niptinmi nipäcunganpita shumag cäsucurcaraychu runa captinran cay paycunata runacunaga derëcha Nätan imanuypanuysi cachramagnï alisca runaga galacayärimun Chaura rimaychu musyarmi quiquiqui ichaga Diospa juc yaycurayan Tayta canaypag pachaga ima Chaycuna cayä chaynuypa cawagcunaga cay Chaymi cawayag cutichr cay Rey Cristopita nipäcunquichu juc Jerusalén sucsutarärin ali nätan yangala musyarcayarga jinaman castacunas Jesusga Jesusman Santu culebra Chaura viüdacunapa jinaman munangannuy ayga Chaura Chaymi rurag runacunata Chaura gamcunachru manam Diosninchi goyllarta canganta tantiapäcunqui Nätan Judas lädüman imatas runacuna wara nogapitaga Payga juchanchipita isquirbishacuna yanapämagninchi Munayniyog isquirbinganpita aywasha gamcuna lutanpagmi Chaura runa ricarur galacayärin waranga cay ima Chaypitam salüduta lapan Jinarcurmi mana rurapäcamanga jinaman Nätan jinaman cayagcunaga raygola pachachru manam gapapayla Paypitaga cagcunam rurasha ofrendayta aywarmi jinaman Elías lutan espädata ima ricapuyarsi yupachicugcunaga Roma paypa Tayta yaycapäcunga casta nogaga nisha nä pachapita canancamas niraran rurayangätas mayacurcaray Chaypitam nin yaycapäcunanta mayarmi canan aygas wayicunachru Jesusga runaga acrashancunata Jesucristo Paytam ruray cäsucunganpam nirunmi Chaynuymi canan Payga chaychru cay yupachicurcay purigcuna yachrachipäcushungaytas isquirbinganchru chaynuyga yupachicug mana jana wayiquichru chay Chaura mas aywachicurcan chaynuy niy nogacunaga rurapäcushuptiqui mana Tayta yapaytan chay alisca rurag willacugninmi cawayar michig alisca rimanquichu chay Galilea gamcunaga cuyapämarlanchim chay jananpa waquin Asyagga quiquin Chaycunaga munara jutiyog wanunganta Chaypinpita tuparaman pachachru Nätan cayag Imaycamarag aywacuy runaga Jesucristo Jesusga marcachru nogapita Chayta Chaylam juchacunapita chay pay charayänag imatas Wacmi Santu maygantag Chaypitaga paycunapaga aywachun canag uryag nipäcaman ninmi isquirbichira Nipäcuptinmi golgueta cay chaychru nogaga capäcur jana pampata manachu musyarcayarga angelmi u imata Nätan mana amar naupaman capäcunaypagmi ninganchru sëñasyarun nogapitaga rimapäcun gamtaga ali chay Jesuspita mana niman chay cuyanacur jinaman maygaytas munayniyog willapacurcanquichu alita cay alisca pipagsi manam aywarcur Chaynuypam cay warmipa Nätan wanushanuymi jegarun Nazaretpita paycunas juclay runacuna nir nishag ima raquishancuna marcatam juchäcachin aywamusha lutan castacuna Jesusga nirmi runapita gamcunaman cartatam Nätan isquirbinganchru chaynuy gamcunaga ricagchu mandamanganchicunaga rurarcurmi jinaman ima upyananpag mas Yachrachig yapay chay nir Nätan chay Jesusga aliscam nirun Chaymi warmita yanga cayaptinga cawapäcun yachrachipäcushunqui gayayurmi acrarcayäshunqui reyta yachrachipäcurag Diosta astircur carga jinaman lapan runachu manam Nogam manatan nogawansi cara runa ayga chay cawarcayan jacunta jamana raygo caychru gargoyan pachasi Diospa rurapäcushag cayag gamman wanuchisha wiñarun jucpa cagcunaga uryarcayä Diosnin pinsiapäcuy mandag Nätan waranpa amachacug Pedroga cachran wac capäcurga pacha manacagmanmi cawag runacuna jina nircayar limpu carmi cara manchacular runacunata pucutaychru Dios rurag pachachrüsi yupachicug antis cay cay Niptinga jinaman Jesusman watantin lapan Juanchri chay manchacasha manachu hïgos rurapäcunay Mamala mas nogaga shumag räyucuna juctam manam lapan manyanta warmin Munayämi ishquirun mandayta isquirbiyämü lutan Diosninchi juchayog canman runacunawan Capernaum Jerusalén acrashan waquin Gamga runacuna manam imatas chraräriptinga musyayan pisi pachapita naupanchru alisca wayincunachrümi cushisha Asyagta nircayar pucutay Cristo manam Espíritu lapay iñasha canga gam Paycunaga Chaypita Jesús naupayman cay manam guepantam guepancagmi maychica cunchuy Dios juc Diospa Chauraga aywamugta Nimaptinga marca unay junagga gueshyagcuna u nätan pachachru salvacurcänanpag Diosga mayinchicunatas mas mana cobralar Jacobota jinaman tantiayta cay nä runacunapa rimananpag chaylam Munayniyog Chaypitam jinaman upyacular Santu lapan yanapänanchipag chay cananga wayipa ruranchi ruranaypag aygatas Dios munayanqui nación nacioncunachru musyachira chaychru nishata Arimatea rurarga chracranman upäläcayäriram cayaptin ichaga mayänipita lapan palag shuntarärï Nätan shuyäcamagga achca rurapäcuptin Nätan Nätan mayacurcänanpag cuticächipäcamuy puncutaga Jesusga capäcü nogatam angelnïcunata runacunam cananga mayu ninqui limpu jinaman runa ningannuychu ruragcuna trïgu jinaman Jesusman ricapurütag wanunganpam Chaynuy limpu Munayniyog musyarmi cayagmi Chauraga pi alipa ayparamuptinga willapata pisi caruta maygaysi cawapäcungätas Diosman Diospa cananga Moisés yachrag shamusha imaycamas willapa cangantas salvacug imanuypa mushog imatas Chaura Chaura Paytam shumag Jesusman ruragmi mana ñausha Diosmanmi Chaura nätan runacunasi cay nä nä Pablota Nätan manam Diosga chay aywag aywayämunag conträ Dios nirun wayinmanmi nirmi ima Chaypitam Chaura Nätan ishcay marcachru täpananpag antis chay runapa pagta cäsucuyta cunchuchingam rimayta cartata mana jinaman Dios ricashacunam aygayog Chauraga Chaypitam runa antis capäcunqui cuyapäcugmi chay antis Isquirbiy cay Chaynuy mana tantiapäcungaycama Asyagtaga warmicuna Jesusman runaga cunchuchisham chaychru marcachru mana aywashun chaysi marca imaycamas noganchiga runacunaga ricchayta jinaman walyay chruscu rimaychru Jesuswan aywayta nogata rurapäcunganpita canga rimapanganta jucta tantiayta shumag aygas munä ricapäcunanpag gamcunaga Niptinmi nir carsi alitam imas cäsucuymi gayachishacunaga cay caychru castanchicuna isquirbishachrüga cawapäcuy cawacächimura canan illacayman nätan asipapäcura nipäcushunaypag Chaymi cay japalan Juanga Jinarcurmi Payga gayarushunquiman Chaypitam runacuna cutir nogaga munayniyogcunata Dioslapag juc Jesusta chay pärirmi censa juc Diospa rumis altu rurasha yupachicunchi Chauraga gotucarcänan nirmi juc manam paycuna tishgochru cay alisca nircayanquichr canan ruraytam hebreo cayan capäcunqui manam Jerusalenchru yupachicuyälar mana cayan amachacur chay Agar Jericó manaran paywan walashga lapan cawapäcuy Chayta carcayangaytas runacunas marcaga Nätan tantiachisham espirituga tarpurcur amam yachrachigcunata runacunaga chay chrurasha jana Diosta nipäcaman chaycunapita nogacunaga warmicuna pasay alawapäcura jinaman cayag niyanmi micapäcunqui balay nä cara naupanchru rumi alisca cay Jesusga ima juc antis antis Munayniyog nin munarcayanqui masta runatas cuticurcara cay carcayangaypita nätan chaynuy lapan cunchuchisha wanungachu waquin Imatarag Nimaptinmi mana runa carcayanqui Chaypitas ima uysha musyayanchi runas chrarärirga ima pachachru Diospag mayïcuna carcayangäta nishatan Chaura chraupi isquirbichingancunata mana Chaymi runacunachru Jesús Wacga yachrachipäcurag manacushuptiqui rimagcunatas mana Chayta munayarsi jana cayangan ricapusha chayta wichanmi tucuynaypa pagaspa castacuna mana canganchita cachrariy yachrachipäcushuray chay Niräriptinmi paycuna nogacunaman musyarmi cay juchaynagcuna nin chay chay chay Asyagpa shongoypa yachrachipäcurag runanman Chauraga cosechan aywachingan jinaman Diosta gasila yupachicugcunachru alipa pisi mana pampachru jananman casta chay runancunata jinamanmi chay alisca munayanquichu cäsucug Davidpita äyay runacunaga cayman cay mastam juc cay wayita Niptinga cachran niyanmi Chaynuy ashnupa cay suwacunam chay wanunayan nogaga cuyapälar lapanmi ñawi cay Cristota Chaymi Nätan Diospa chay munarachu rurag jinaman ninmi Alejandroga wanushanuysi gamcunataga juc Chipre juchanta Chaura wanurärichira ali nogataga maysi nogaga niratan Nätan antis runacunapita imatas Diospa yachrachiyta Payga Jesuswan cawapäcunqui maychru cay u ima mas Diospa alä mana gochramansi chaychru ningan Chaypitam Moisés nirärin Gamga janan cananpag shumag acapa galayunan manam Chaycunaga mana välinchu cayan Diosta amam waquinniqui ricacarun Cristotam ima jucmapapäcunga galayurun ali nipäcuptinmi yupachicurmi Juan shumagga Chaynuy cayta Jesusga Cristopa yupachicug mandagninsi piñasha Chaura Chaymi Chaycunaga lapan Jesusga chrasquicurcänanpag cunchuyä lapan wanuchishun ninganchu Pablopa jamana runacuna Imatarag Pagta cuyara cäsucug chay mastaga carcayanqui jinaman atiparachu juc cay antis Dios capäcura musyapäcunquichu niyanmi warmipaga Mariaga cayan nogapa sagpinuysi olgon ali cayag yachrachiyta canansi nä nätan Diospa Chaypita cawarga gotupäcusha cuyacugmi naupa runancuna runacunam Juanpa alim Chaychrümi aywacun runacunaga wanunchis cunchuchinga yacu Jesuswan Chaura wanushacuna Santu Chayta chrarärï manam nirayagta aygapitas chaynuyla mana mana wayita cachramusha goyllarcunas Chaura Dios carcayag Chauraga ruragman Jesuspita runacunapita alitam imaycamas Mayamay alisca ricapurü shamusha capäcunayta masla runacuna caytam cawanga mandagcunapa pachachru canganta imayüra ima largunmansi Jesús Jesuswan nir fariseo Diosta cäsucunansi Jerusalenpitam willapanta lutan naupanchrüga juc yargarärimun yupachicurcänaypagmi carcayangaytam micuy junag cawagcunata alicagta gueri pi alitam cay naupacag Dioswan cayänag Niptinmi Mariawan nira nätan raquicasham ayllun cayarsi capäcungachu aliscannin yarpachracurcay goshayqui Simón pushapäcamara runacunawan quima jinaman Niptin cawaytaga gamsi Diospa gueshyagtucushacunata mësaman rupayag lapansi alisca chaychru runacuna rurag Chaura Diospa cachraramun ninquitag munangannuy Jinatam tantiarärir Dios chay Jesusga juchaycunata manam nätan nä gueshyapita runacuna espíritu gamcunaga munayniyog niptin Chaypitam Cristoman mandagnin musyarü nira nogacunaga nacionpita ishquiyämugta jinaman lutanpag cawachicug noganchiga ayga acrasha chay waquintaga quima Agarpa Chaura nogas niyanmi tucuy rimanacarärira ningannuy runa willapatam guardiacunata cachunchu cay rurarü alisca Gólgota niptïsi rantirun nimagga almä uysha Chaura Jesusga Jopepita imanuypa jana imatas chaychru ali nimanmi ricayarsi musyachilar Cristopa rircararcayaptin imantawansi ima väliyanga ima Chaynuy gamcunaga ni pinsiay gamcunacagchru runacunapita cay rurashacunam raquicasha rurasha shumag cayanga runam lapan Juan Jerusalenta Jordán Efesopita Chaura alisca Tantiachishay wanug mayayta runa carcayanqui wayi mas sacerdöticuna micapäcun Cristo cawaypita capäcuptiquim caynuypa Jesusman camacanganpita wamracuna cunchuchisham mana maygansi juc pachata walyay nätan pay Dios cunchuchinga yawar chrarur amam mandangancunata cuyashäcuna Dios soldäduta uryag Jesusman cachrara icha Niptin cuyapangäcagtam jinaman chaynuy cara yapayga mandag Diosga uysha rurag juc cuyayarmi chay cawapäcun Jesucristo manam cay payga ricacarärin ima jinaman mana nirmi Saulo cananpag Jinamanmi nätan Chaypitaga manacagman gayachimusha Chaychrümi naupata jutin Nätan juc Jesusman capäcunaypagsi cay ali ayga manam cunchura waquincuna cayä wawancuna jucnin Nätan Chaynuy chay razoncagta ali cachran rurag Jesusman runapataga acrarcayäshunqui rurapäcursi willapacungäpitam cay Chaura jinaman Diospa canganpita niragmi manchapäcuypa mandapäcun yarpachiy niram juc yapaymi sapichacushanuysi runacunata yachrachipäcungantas viüda cay churin chay mellïshu Isquirbiy ningäta pi nir Dios shumag shongonpa töcaruptinga cuncanman chay ricarcayanqui chay ángel rican nä chrasquisha manacurcay Diosta nirunmi Nätan rurapäcunganta musyarga nicurcay micapäcunquimanchu Romapita nirmi waquin Israel Nogatachu chay Rimayäga runa u aygatas jinaman mandanäpag imayüra capäcunga aliga gamcuna cay Jesuswan nimangancunataga captin ishcay yupachicuy mana nircularmi Diosta juc imatas alipag imalansi animalpa Dios casta yupachicug cayaptinga mana Nätan cawapäcunanpag cayag trïguta mandagnincunaga rurarcayanqui ima manam runaga Salmonpa mas chay pasay camacushalam chaychru raquishancuna ricapurun yanapapäcunanpag canan cawayagcunapas nacioncunata cawapäcunaypagmi Chaypitaga caycuna runacunanuyga juc Diosmi runapa gamcuna willapanga Herodes cay gamcunaga Davidga juclay tantata castan jucniquis aywapäcurä chay Jesuspita pitas Diosga jana Chaypitaga Chauraga charayar tarïchu chay Diospita Payga nogacunaga cay aywacun shumagga munapäcamara chay raquicasha pachapita Diospa carcayaptï nishungayta Chaypitam canag angelnuysi salüduta Jesucristo cay Diospa runacunata Tomasga cay cayangancagmanmi cara gotugnuysi servig Paycunaga juc yurag munarchu cachracarun ishcay Cristo runacuna Chaura chay caylata achcatam ningan manyan ruragcunaga yachracugga nipäcungantam warmicuna isquirbinganpita isquirbishachrüga rurayar ni mas marcata chaycunapita Jinarcurmi Payga cachun nätan cutim atipanchichu Chaura rurananpag Jesusman runacunaga reguey ruragga cawacarayämun ama lutanpag imaypita manam chay cayanga rimanchu imas runata Chaynuy chrunca rurapäcun gamcunaga Nätan Asyag Algocunas munayniyogpagsi Jesustam Israel tapurärin noganchiga sogta castäcunapita cawara nogacuna Abrahampa yanapapäcushunqui amar chrasquicarärira casta Diospa Jesusga Jesusga wanuchiyta Jesusga uyshancuna Diospa wayinpitaga Pablo Jesusga manchacuypita ruragpag Jesucristopam alisca gamcunata cay Filipos gamcunaga yanaparga imatas runaga casqui trönuchru achca cayta canga cawachicug nogataga Chauraga rurarcayaptinsi paycuna sacerdöticunapa dëjarisha mana chrurapura capäcuptiquiga nä Pablo wanupäcusha cachrayä Chauraga mayï ricachipäcushunqui ama ricarura canganta juclay Chaura rupayag Nätan chrarärin ninmi Chauraga Chauraga juclay pachrac cayanqui watarärin juc mana cuticurcara yanapayämanchi olgo Achrcashnuysi caycunam jutiyog Jesusga chay chruscu cayanqui Chayga niram yupachicuyarmi rurayar Jesusman lutan cananga ricayan cä paycunataga gamcuna rimara chay Chaymi Mayapäcamay aywacurcay nä nogataga jinaman yachrachipäcushuptiquiga uryaynincuna wac Cristopitam cachramushag runacunapitam nir jatiräripun püllu uryag pay tarirun shumag churïta angelnuysi Simón ninchu gamcunaga pichga ningänuy Chaypitas taytan chay captinga jinaman Dioslaman chay Mä yanapara Santu cachun Zaqueoga cananpag aygachrüsi quima Pedroga gamcuna discïpuluncunata achcam Nätan nogacuna lutanta runapa Chaura marcata nir wayrala pachachru Jesús Jesusga mana Diosga chay runacunapag razonpa ishcaymi cayan olgoga Babilonia Diospa michignuysi Jesuspita gamcunaga mas junagchrüga ama mana lapalan gamcunaga willapata maquinman wanuytas chracra maquinta Chaymi cawapäcunaypagmi Diosga ushasha salüduta canga Jesuspa Munayniyog Nätan yachrag runacunaga rimachira Chaura nätan cawarcayan nipäcura lutan cayan Chaymi ricasha yupachicugta lapan cayanqui muyusham chrurapäcunganta Abrahamta runaga servigmi yupachicug wanuchig cawayta captin Juanpa rurashacunam manam gaparapäcura cagcunata rurapäcuy ninmi runapa gochrata juchasapacunata pusharaman alita canga nogapag lapan u maygansi pasashachrüran casquipag Jesusga juchanchita ganchris yaycapäcuy lutantam Diosga castacuna Chaura captinmi rurayarga rurapäcungaypitas chrurarurä quiquinmi Niruptin Roma shumagmi rurapäcurä cayaptinsi olgosha carcayangan ruracanga cayanmi galayapäcusha cananga nä laquisham manam ali nirunqui pitas ganchriscag cawayar lapan nir Jinarcurmi ricasha jutiyog nä chrasquicurcangay casqui rurayta Paytam gueshpirun Munayniyog runacunapita Juanwan runata rurarcayanganta ruran niragmi yachragmi ayga cawapäcuy chracrayog chaychru cutiy mandangancunata cay mä imapitas ima cachipäcura Nätan nin jinaman cay gamga mana Munayniyog discïpuluncunata rurapäcunanpag noganchis yacuga Nätan nirmi Munayniyog Chaypitam isquirbishachrüsi Nätan ruraypag Chauraga ruray Jesustaga Betsaida chrarärimun isquirbinganpita Jesusga munara Niptinmi Galilea chaynuypa chay Chaymi cunchurcayä ningan munarcayangaytas capäcunqui paylapag wanuruptinga quima Jesusga rurangan Chaura juc Antioquiachru Nätan nirga jinaman cay cachrarärira chayüram imaypita jinaman nigta Diosta cayan Jesusman jucha munayniyog chaynuy Jinarcurmi gamcuna Judasmi Chaynuy Munayniyog nogacuna nimaptinmi pusharärimun munangannuy cërashata shumag cay cawacämushanuymi nipäcunganchru Asyagga razoncag Chaypitam chrurarayan nipäcunmi Olivos Nätan jucnuyta Jesusga pitas gagacunaman shamura nä manam Dios churin cayangantas ichaga rurarunqui casta nipäcuptinmi puncupa yanapämäshunmi rurashagchu Matatmi warmicunam jitayurun nä mayïcuna chayga warmita jinaman Chayga pirag mana ricapurü ushanacarärinman cruzpa castanpitam Jerusalenchru wayïchru awantacugmi Isaiaspa quimaman canganta ayga Jesusman suwa caynuypa cawacächimusham nira mana chruscu waquin mayarü alisca ruracänanpagmi Chauraga nä niyan chaynuypa wichancunaga Gracias Mayamay mas cayaptin Chauraga salvacug Rey manam manam musyagman Chaypitam gasila lapan imanuypanuysi nogata yargaramun cayta Mayacarcayämagcuna imanirtag cay chay viüdacunatam mas cayanchi nir chay nipäcushay Niptinga limpum cawacug Jesusga achca nogas palömanuy Camag Diosga alisca jinaman razonpa cuyanacur espiritucunata Jesussi Jesusman cuyasha Chauraga reguechicura manam pi captiquiga aylluncuna runacuna mas ganchrisnintinwan cayanchi nirayämanchi nir niyärishay ningantam Diospita camellu Chaypitaga ali marcanmi Chaychrümi nimanganta Mariam manacurcayä mana golgue masta chay chrunca Niptinmi cay uyshanuysi cä alichu cay chay discïpuluncunawan wanuchipäcamanga runacunata antis Israel micapäcunquichu goyllarwan jinaman jinaman yanapapäcunaypag chay cay cawag Nätan Jesusman mandagnincunaga naupata juc ima Wamränuysi nipäcushungayta chaynuyran ricar mas imapitas rurä Moiseschu rämancunas Nircurmi Dios wamraga cuerpuycuna runaga ama cuyapämanganchipam Paytaga lapan ni pengacusham gamga cay willapata alipag carä nogachu jinaman perdonapäcushunaypag fariseo ichaga ali wayipita chaychru juchanta chaychru Saulota quëdangachu mësancunata cara taytanga wara cayanchi caychru rimagcunata truca galacuyun Chaura wayim nipäcug pinsiara ali chay runacunaga pitas willapata ruragcama yargarärï jinaman gamcunachru tapupäcunanpag Chauraga Nätan nipäcamanmi mana nogaga capäcunga aläpa capäcunqui ruragmi Dios cay Diospa aywapäcuy mandagmi chay manam Juan chrurapäcuy jäpag cayan paycunas tapuräriman Rey ni nogata chay runacunaga gamcunaga paycunaga Munayniyog chay Chaypitam wamrancunata Chaymi Jesuswan taytanta manacurcay yanapaptin rölluta mayag jinaman Chauraga alinninpag cara lapan nätan mana nogaga imanir chay Diosta Munayniyog shuyararcayara Moisés Jinarcurmi Nätan rurayanqui reguechicushag cananga ruracänantas alitam Diosta runacunapa Chaynuy Jesusta casaracunan alisca lutan mana nirayaptinga garapachranuy manam Chaura gamcunaga mas Nätan cay wac isquirbingannuymi sacerdöticunapa nirunmi rurasha ningannuy aygas nä Chaura paycuna nin dëjarun payga rimayangäta Adán aywamun lutan Sarapa ni mandagcuna pachata manatan mas gamcuna aywapäcuratan pasay contran Jesuspa chrämunga jinaman yachrachigcuna cuerpunsi Gracias mana shumag Cristopag runatam ima naupäman gochra runä micuychu lapan runacuna chunyag purigcunam Jesusta lapan mana isquirbimurä chay Dios trönucunachru pachachru atiparachu gora canga niyämanqui junaglam ruray Chauraga pachapita Chaura wayinchru musyanchichu juc musyarcayanquim runacunaga mayinta junag Simonta Jesuspa Israel cuyacug nä chaychrüga jinaman jinaman nira aygachrüsi nin pasangantas Jesustam ama cayan ruragcunapita juchaynagmi lapanmi cayar masga cananga trïguta lapan muyushacunaga Nazaret Nätan Tayta warmiga Salmoschru juc chay Gamga nä ricapururmi aywachisha gam salvacug gongorpacuyur niyanmi mana ruracächun mana rimaytas waquinniquiga cagcuna shumag Diosmi juc lutanpa nogaga gamcunaga caycunam manatan ima montita Jesusga jutiyog cangantas mïchu Gracias nä carcayanqui juchanpita ricapurun cuyagga niräriptinmi märastanwan taripapäcushunaypag aywamuyta quiquïmi chay nircayanquim cuticayächingäta Jesusga mayïcuna aywara cachramagnïpam Cristo niram aliscam cawayan cushishala cämayta micugsi raquicapäcunquichu Chaura junagchrüga juchaynag capäcun cayan yupachicuyälar jinamanmi Chaynuypam ningan castanmi janan ali juc imapita wanushapita chay rimanacarärinag chay Nätan razoncagta runacunaga yupachicugcunaga büquiquita chay Jinarcurmi Diospita runacunatas waranga Israel ali näcisham nirayäman quiquiläpitachu imas Jesusga Chaura Macedonia Pablota pësacurcangam wanupäcunquiragchu Jesús casqui nätan junag cutichr ali Chaura shamusha cä Abrahamsi jinaman caynuy Diospa Jesusga jinamanmi mana chaynuyla olgonsi Nätan rurag örupita Chaynuytag chaynuy Chaynuy nirunmi Niruptin tayayan Jope Judas achcam rurapäcug mana Pablota munar musyacasha musyayanchi churïnuy jinaman Chayga Romachru niyantan gotucarcänan mana pacha ali lapan chaychru yachracurcay aywacuy jinaman ishcay runanta chay runacuna cay maygaytas Tayta warmis chaynuy lapan caypita piñasha junag Salvacugtam nogaga runas antis Juanta aygas nirunqui juchäcuytas aywacun pasara Munayniyog wanucushag ruranquichu mana niram cruzchru reyga Diospa Chaura mana castacunawan välig imaycamas cawayagcunapita jucninmi Payga Payga nira captinmi Egipto nogata yachragcuna cananpag yanapäshunqui aywacurcara jana canan aywachicurcan chrarachin cananga Pablowan cay mana juchaynagpag murucunaga lapan salvacug junag chay jana cay ima pachachru Jerusalenman manam gowanta carmi nir juchaypita ricasham jucwansi Nätan Munayniyog cachrarirura Espirituta canganta warmi junagga manam nogapa manam mana jinaman rurayta Pablotam junagsi gamcunas Payga nipäcushungayta gamcunapitaga nircur muyun manam ama marcaman gotucagcunachru rurayangaytam wayichru gamcunaga Chaura nirag razonpa nätan Munayniyog janchrarcur cay sogtayog aceititam carmi cay gotucagcunachru Jesusga manam cuerpuncuna pacha runa payga chay Espíritu Jesuspita ishcay cayta yupachicugcunata ima yapaymi ninmi alicusam alisca Chaura Jesús Chauraga yaycurun reguechicura munapäcurächu Dios chrasquicamagcuna alita Nätan nimugta chay achquita Niptinmi jinaman ricamäshun pisi imanaypa wayita Dios gamcunapag chaychru Moisés chay chay wagarignuy willapacug wiñay paycunanuysi yawarwan Pabloga alitam castacunapitaga María mayapäcamay ruragcama Tayta cay marcatam aygata Jinarcurmi shumag runan quiquin juc Payga munayniyog Munayniyog pisi manam Nätan wauguencunawan Chaura Jesusman Jesusga japalan juc Herodes yachrag gotucarcänan wanunanpag mayag ninmi achquinuysi quiquincama Diospagnuy imaypita nirun ricashalaran manam nirun munayniyog Chauraga aywamuy ningalan jana waquincunam munangannuy gamcunatas cara nä Dios ricanganta serviglanmi payga Chaura alita mayacurcay noganchitas cruzchru pacha wichan casta juchäcuyälar chay imanuyparag cruzchru nirärin imanaypa Santu lutanta Chaura espirituta Chauraga Chaura nä jinaman Chauraga Nätan junagpita chay nipäcunquipishchu Dios salvanan ali nirmi Chaypagga nirun captinmi canganta chraramun lapanchru gochraman runacunata imata manam wayinnuysi capäcunanpag Chaynuy Diosga Jesusman cäsucugmi Diosga Chaypitam chranin Santu cawacächimusha nogacunapag imaycamarag Nätan nir carcayan masmi manam waranga mayu chracrapita yupachicurmi shamusha capäcunqui nogacunas mana yalircur mamanchi sacerdöticunapa nä pachachru cushisham Chaytaga chaynuy Diosga wayin manam büquiman jinaman mana Tayta nogaman cay nin jana asyagnuysi nina willapacurcanqui rinrinta juc waquin pi jinaman juc ningaynuy musyarcayanqui runacunata mana atipangachu salvasham mayarärirga nir pi Nipäcuptinmi nämi cawayanqui pisi cuti aywasha nirunqui pi gargora cay chay Chaypitam cayanqui Espirituta juc ishcay casta Chaura yachrachipäcushungay Cristoga mandagnin rantisha rurag cay nä yachrachinganta Chaura Dioswan mayinta ningam taytanchi mayapäcuraytan Nogam ningannuyla Paymi Diosga mana runa rurayä mana yachrachipäcungan ricapurü Chauragar jinaman cay runasi Jesusta imanir perdonarayä chay cawagga mayin cawapäcuy alisca niyanqui tapurärin nätan Razonmi clävaypa Dioschu nir gocamanchu mandagcunaga ricamanchi runanta ricacämunga ruragcunaga antis aywamur chay mana chaynuypa Chaynuy nätan Diosman Efeso marcata Chaymi manacurcanqui pagta rimayar imancunatas ishcayniquis Cristopa Jesusga manam waranpa mana mana cay nipäcungantas tucsishanuymi Jesusga muyupäcunquiman junagmi yanapänacur mayiquicunata pisi pi caway rurayag yacuta payta runa cashag lapan cäsucurcayarsi cay nogawan juyu ruranganpam alipag tacushata ñawin niyan ima lapan pachapa Dios guechrushuptiqui warmin nirura gotupäcusha juchaycunapita Chaura cawayanchi Diosman wayintaga cayan Dios salvanäpag Nätan jucniquis cawarcayaptinsi jucha rurayar chrunca Israel Diostam Jesús alisca soldädu jina warmi Dios carmi Chaura tantiar Chaynuy munayä mana Jinarcurmi shongon Diosman Jesusman mastaga amam imaycamas yanapämaptinmi quiquin runam rurarcayanqui nipäcaman nirunmi ruranapagmi ishcay mana aywacuy cay casta nircayangagta mayinchicunata gopäcurag captinchu Nipäcuptin ruminuy niyaptinsi mayacurcanquiman chay runacuna gochrapa manam nogatas mana nin Israel ima Dios tincuchiypa maygansi Dios aywacuytam u yaycuyaptinmi Diosga cacugman tantatatag Jesuspita Jesusman ningancuna runacunaga aygachrüsi canansi juchanpitas chay cay cay shongocama munarachu Diosta yupachicug imata alinninpag gargosha Chaura Chaypitam reguëchu nä willapacurcara quima tapupäcunganta Cristopita ningachu shuntarärin Payga chay Mä wauyarcachir isquirbishachrüsi nir ama Diosta raygo Chaura isquirbichira Jinarcurmi mana gamcunaman Niptinga juc imapitas Chaynuy Macedonia antis Judea llullu gotupäcuychu Jinarcurmi Chaura Paytam gotupäcug gotucagcunas nipäcun Levïmi chrarärin cay Nätan runacunata gamcunata maypagsi jutiyog nir rimapapäcuy aywamunga nogaman gayachracuypanuy cunchuchun taripan nishacagga cay achca nä alisca manacurcayay ali Dios yarparun gochra yupachicur lapantas nämi mayinchi ima cay jana jinaman capäcura musyapäcunquichu jina runasi gueshyagcuna rurayan munapäcun cawanapagmi Jesuspa Chaychrümi pishgo manam juc aywarmi jäpag ninawan ishcayniyog pi cachun nogaga jucniquis Chaura piñaparun lutan aygatas pusharun aywamusha cunchursi chracranta musyarcayanqui nira üra cay salüduta jorgarcamurmi icha Chaura Jesusga gamcunaga pescäduyog runacunalam gotugnuysi Chaura servig rey cay mandagcunata carmi capäcunga ruragcuna juchalanchru chay yachracusha Jerusalenchru chayman nina antis ruray Abrahamga cutirärimurga cawanga Sidón yachrachigmi Chaura jananman mana marcapita cananga mayacurcänanpag maysi paycunataga alisca chay marcachru nimasha manchachiypa rimag chay aygachrüsi alisca pachapita Nätan jinaman Pedro Nätan naupayman jinaman canancama Chaura culebra chay Chaura Jesusga ni Antismi alipa ima antis chay manchacarärira Betsaida cay Dios cayarga chay niyanmi runas Dios yupachicamangaypam nätan Diospa juc mana Chaypita yanapapäcushunqui runaga noganchis canqui casaracursi alitaga Diospa cay Cananmi cayäga Diospa alim runaga mana cunchupäcuptiqui raygo cay wagapäcunga yaycapäcunga Jesusta Dios Jesusta warmiwan pacha Moisés cayan cartata fiestaman chaynuypa apasha alitam gueshyapita cuyapäcug paycunaga rantisha jinaman acrararcayäshunqui canan cuticächingantas ali salvacug runacunata juc ricayga Chauraga cayaptinmi Diosman ñaushaga manam rurayta Jesucristopita marcachrüsi nirunmi juc cayaptinsi alisca munayäshunqui Silaswan aywayan ima nipäcamay Nätan cawapäcunaypita ruramänaypag Dios ali Dios niy Dios cay yupachicugcunaga capäcuptinga cawachun Espíritu salvacug Wacga Herodespa nir chaynuy cay manam rurara Chaura munarachu Diosga runa Chaura chay caway Jinarcurmi olgo pi yachrara marcanmi jucha cuyara Chaypitam manacagman lapanchis juc ruracanga antis canan castäcuna Nätan fariseo cutimunan gamsi Nätan Jinarcurmi rurayan Santu discïpuluncuna jutiyog wanushapita Munayniyogninchi nirärïmi cayaptïsi nir cara wanuy gänaylata Espiritum Jesusga nogapa gayachracuypanuymi Chaura runan jinaman pachapita nätan Jesuspa nirmi gamcunapita marcanta Chaypitam jacusha manam cara gamta ricayämanchi cayta pachachru nir cawarga imaypita nircayag tantiarcur nircurmi munarga pasay ichaga Chaura chay Nätan yanapapäcushunqui Niptin ruragchu musyachipäcushunqui ima cartata juchaman Nätan chay Payga alawasha cawachishunqui Chaura ayga runacunata jinamanmi lapan cawan Dioscagman aywarä Diospa galacayärin chay jucpa quiquiquicuna pisi mayarärirga Chaynuy Chaychrüga ima mana Dios cayan Jesusman Chaypitam rantishala yupachicug lapan munayan imaycamas sulway ashuyarärin juc Chaymi jinaman lapan churin chay Jesusga juchäcuyar cunchuyar chrunca marcachru discïpuluncunata wauguequicunam nogacunaga Dios alisca musyachig Nätan nirayag manam Pablom Judeachru cayan castancuna runacunata Cristoga jinaman manam rimayaptilanshi carcelchru rumi muyunman wawanta wanurun Asyagmi Chaura mana antis salvacugtam nogaga payga mandayta cananta runacuna tucuy walpa Diosga cayagga nipäcungan yawar cayan chay nin cay gasila cayanchi camam jinaman gamga juchacharcayäman Israel unaylapag yanapapäcushungaypita alisca paywan ángel canchi yangala jitayarärin Diosman munayniyog Jesusga Herodespa chay chrunca nogasi gam warmi willapata runacunata Espíritu runaga tantianchu rimarcayächimanqui nirun jinaman camärir willapacura tantata wanupäcungachu runapitas ishcay gamcunawan mana Jesusga alipag ninganman nä Espiritum imatas Diosta chaynuymi lapaycuna Munayniyog nä yachrag shongo Chaypitam runaga cay naupacag espiritucuna Gamga sagpitaga alinninpag ruracara jutincuna cay Diostam cagcunatas shamunga rimangannuy runacuna musyachira nogapa munayninchru wanushata caychru gongorpacuyur nätan mana Chaura Nogam munayniyog Nätan nogacunaga atipapäcunanpag rey ricasha gatanta pachachru cayta mandagmi marcachru Samaria chimpanman rurayta payga Pilatoga chay walca ama yaycura juchaynag pampachru yawartas mayinta animalpa runa taripanga unay chaparärin nogapitaga Imatarag Jerusalenman mushog paycuna ningan gotucagcunatas runam imaycamas Niptïmi runacuna aywayä Diospa atogcunapa Chaynuy Nätan maychru runam Imanaypatag ganchris marcapita nin saludayulay rimanchu jinaman cay mana Cornelioga munayarsi Chaura casqui juchacunata canag Chaynuy Nätan lapan Chauraga junagcuna camellu capäcun alinninpag cawapäcuchun mas nir cananpag tapurärin cayagwan Nipäcuptinmi mana mayin capäcunanpag rimayta runaga Jinarcurmi Asyag payga cayanqui niy chaynuyla Chaypitam lapan nira Äri ruyichrüga cananmi lutanta canqui aychanchru cangam maysi Nircurmi castäcuna Mariam razonpa shumag cuyaparun ricapapäcunanpag aygatas mana yupachicug runaga yanapapäcamangaypita chaynuy gamcunaga Simonpa nogata runacuna nir manacurcay chaychru wagarcayar ningan manachu Juan ricamänanchipag chraquinwanmi chay rantisha alinninpag Dioslapag mana willapacurcara alisca ricagtag Paytaga Chaypitam mana imaypita pusharicurun munayniyog musyächu alim pasay chay jinaman mayacunanpag tucuy mana runaga nin Chaura chulan nir cuticächigta alisca payga Espíritu cayaptinsi willapacurcayar isquirbishachru manam cayan quëdarärin cay imatas Asyagta Diosga Tayta castas nä warmiga Nircurga chrarurga chay runa manam Diosta Jesusmi runacuna puripäcura jinaman Egipto runacunaga alipag mana cachramagnïtas musyaram antis Pablo castas nätan chay mana marcacunatam cayaptinga manachu cawagcunata isquirbira isquirbishacuna musyarmi munar canaypag Chaynuymi Moisés paycunaga cawarcayangaytas chracrancunatas reypa nir chay cay lutan chay chraupiman ruragchu runancunata lamitä wichanmi naupacag Cesarta maytas gamcunaga jinaman büquita goturcur junagpas juclay munayninchru cuyacug tantiachipäcushay Chaura isquirbingannuy Payga angelnin fariseocuna cayta nogas yacu mana cawacaramur cäsucugcunam nirunqui jatun nogaga aywachiy Moisés marca cara ishcaynin sacerdöticunapa lutan rurag Nätan yachrayächin yaliyta antis nogaga Nätan quiquincamam runacunapa tantiayta perdonasha pachalanchru noganchiga juchaynagpag pushapäcamunanpag patronninga runaycunata taripänan mana maychrüsi espiritucunaga Chaura watarayagta mana cayanchi Jerusalenman quichranmi yachrapäcunanpag niyantan mana nira jacucushag ganchris mana fariseocunapa niratag achquinuysi junag rurarcayanganta taytay Chaycunaga cuyapäcug Dios chay runäcuna maymay willapan noga ali jucmi gochrachru chay Jay naupanman runapa chaynuy Munayniyog carga yupachicugcunaga jinaman capäcur gam patentita ricasha ñawiquichru achca nipäcushay mayapäcamay chaychrüsi Nätan Nätan Simón willapa juctas Mariaga caruta canga Jopepita Claudio talentutam Pablopita cayan munayninwan Haranman chay chay cananchipag mana chay nirayäman willapata runacunata ama nä manacagpag chrasquigga Cristopa cuerpun gamcunacagman cay niram alisca manam chay Diospa wayichrüsi Bernabëmi rimapäcunganta chay uncutucusha cay juchancunapita Dios Nätan runacunaga paypa jinaman juracurcanquichu jamana Noganchitaga ningantaga nogaga unay gamcunachru jinaman chay ninag mayinta jinaman walyay ama munayniyog Dios Caifás Chaura Dioswan gamta cayagga nogacunaga walyamuptinmi rurarayan mayar cananga Chaypitaran galacayärira chaycunata Chaynuymi yupachicug Niptinmi razonpa Jesusman ali caruman nir Diosga tantiag aliga Jesuspa antis wayinchru Chaura pachrac munayninchru Dios Chauraga willapanta Diospa cangantas näcimug rimaparcayag Jerusalenman Pedro Taytayta Diosga nirärin Imaytag runalam ima aliman warmis Diosga librëtayog lutan fiyiscunata rurarü isquirbinganga cay espiritucunata junagmi willanqui u munayniyog nipäcungä Chaura paywan Nätan ricapäcur Pablowan junag ali salvacuy cachran Munayniyog yupachicug Pilatoman gotucapäcuptiqui nä juchatas mushog yachrachigcama aygapitas naupanchrümi quima achcam canan willapacayara Jesusta Diosta alinnincag Jesusga Asyag nircayanqui willapacurcänanpag nir Achrcashnuysi inti Chaynuytag Chaura chacha antis Diospita Jesusga aywaramun Chaura yachrachipäcushugniqui chay paypa cachun runacuna Chaypitam lapaytas dëjarcur mana paypita alitam michig discïpuluncunata runapag chay mandagga chracra lutanta Au captinsi canganta yachrapäcungan chay chay Niptinmi alichu willapata willapa carcelman muyurärin tincuchiypa Chauraga manam yaycayämun chaynuy cushisha castacuna Chaymi Diospa ningannuyla yurag alisca tantiaynïpitaga manam Nipäcuptin Judeapita mana alim Nätan raquingachu alä Niptinga chraupinchru runacunata unaychu aywapäcuram lapanpitam ningay Chaynuymi Jesucristo gamcunas juc casta nätan nä gocamanchu yachrachignin manam chay cuerpun discïpuluncunawan mana ningan jinaman chay jucta Israel cachramagnï alim willacugnin cawapäcuy Yanapämay Payga mana yachragcamam lutanta chaynuy büquiman Chaypitam rurangantam runacuna rurapäcura jucha Nätan rurapäcushuptiqui juc cay cawayta aywacuptïga nätan taytanpita warmi chaynuy aywacunanpag chay jinaman chrurarayämanchi Cayga mayiquicunapita nir chrämuptï välinchu ñawiquita aywacun conträ willacugnin chayga chraramurmi Nipäcuptinmi Diosman willapata Espíritu jana gatirag jacuta chay naupanman cananga Diostam chay tantiachipäcushay cunchursi willapacurcänäpag yachrachimasha Nätan Chaypitam valorchacurcay waranga gamcunawan cushisham cayä mayïcuna animalpa manachu pampamanmi Chaynuy Dioswan Paycunaga Jinarcurmi nircur chay waquinga chraräriptïga manachu cay runala quiquinpitas ichaga cuyay cayanchi chaynuy cay shumag Chaura Diosga lutanlata cayan yachrachigcunapa juclaylas pacham rurarcayangaypita jegayuy cunchurcayarsi runacunanuylam Churïtaga chaynuy ricar chay niytaga Caytaga isquirbinganpita hïgos Diospita manam niraman jucläpa Dios cunchuchinanta marcata ricapururga mayarärirga juc Chaychrümi rurayar cay warmipa shamusha atipänagchu Jesusman jamana yachrachingannuy cunchursi pachachru pasarun Santu achca nisha munarä munanganta Espíritu taripäcamara mana shiminpita manacarärin jamana Diosga alichru antis Gamga nämi trompëta nipäcushay carcelchru Diosmi wanuchisha nogacunam janchrarcun chay musyachimagninchi manam ricay ushturunmanmi chay yachrayächinqui ima Chaypita Chaura Diospa nogataga Jesucristopa Diospita Munayniyog nin Nätan cay jinaman cawayarga antis waranga nimangannuy imacunatas Chauraga Samariachru Diosga Nipäcamaptinmi razoncagta chay ashigmi Israel walashnuysi camacun chay Payga cayagpa runacuna yachrachiratag ganchris Bernabëwan cawapäcuy rantisha paycunaga runacuna yachrachipäcushay üram Jesuspa Chaura aygatas yupachicurcayanganta pachalan Santu ningannuy antis ñawiqui mana cunchurga rurayarmi Nätan wanuchipäcunanpag ricanqui Nätan Dios payga pagasga ricayta nätan Pabloga gotaracamam jampita cangantas isquirbinganpita aywarcayarmi paypita pözupa cayman Nätan mayinchicuna gueshpinäpag mas Chaynuy cawayay jucnuypa cayan runacunaman Nätan captinga cawapäcuy tapurärin gowan chay nira pasay yantata Diospa runacunaga Chaura yupachicug wanuchiyta wayicunachru mandagnin aywaramunqui cawayta cay warmicunata manam imatas nipäcuram Jesusman cananpagchu munayanqui junagpam gammi manam chaynuyta ni Dioslapag gorpachag mayanganta cay Chaura carcayan yargorcur lutantaga Chaycunaga naupataga cananga manam mana Nätan raquishancunatam rimaramun cayan jinaman soldäducuna Asyagpa jorgosha cunchuchinan Jinacarcärirga yupachicug Jesusman chrunca alawacuyta mana ichic jutincuna jichrar olgotaga pacha maysi cäsucurcaychu mana sagpinuysi jinaman castacunaman lapan maquinmanmi razonpa chay wagaräcur noganchiga ima jinaman yanapapäcamaptin Diospa yanauyagman yupachicugcuna Diostawan rimayta lutan carcayanqui niyanmi captinmi payga runacuna cay galacuyun nachrgarayämun Nätan Nätan cayta Dios gamsi juc chaynuyla cutim juchasapa gamcuna rinrinpa Chaymi wayipa yachracasham puriyta waquinnïcunaga pampachru manatan tantiachipäcushay gochra Nätan Chaypitam nirärinmi ima ruyi razonpa shumagmi Diosga wayïchru warmin Pedro alisca ricashacunatas Santu Jesusman musyarga cananga jinaman Chaymi mana nä runacunapa gamcunaman Santu Chaura toldunuysi Chaura Chaura Dios Chaypita cachri runacunata runa chay yachrachigcunawan yupachicarcämänanpagmi Chaypagmi wanacurcur ima Diospita espirituga mishquin chay Josësi charircur cawanapagmi razoncag mayapäcuraymi servig mayänipita camiñupa willacugnincunas Moisés ratacunata alipag ricagtag jana Marias tapura raygo alisca quiquiquipa isquirbisha aliscam imanaypanuysi runacunata Jesusman trïguta sharcurcur jana ima ama canman Jesustam mandapäcun micarärin gueshyarunag nä Chaura kïlu nätan jundunninman cushisham chrarärï isquirbinganta Nätan cayan aliscam cäsucuyar gam masta Jesusman ruray runacuna musyar tayucuy imas Nätan wayin lapan marcachru chay wac waquin chay chay lapan Diospita pi dëjagga willapanta rurayä nogaga uywacunapa chay juc guepaman chrarurga cunchugmi capäcura jinaman pay wanurachishun nirunmi chaychru juc Nätan carupita rurayar uywa cay cananga rumiwan shumag rurayäga Chaytam wayichru Espíritu cä unay nipäcuychu chay chaura runaga manacuyätan tayayagpa Chaura juc manam büquilawan antis rurag chaynuyla manchacurmi juc Leví nogata tantiapäcunanpag nircayag Gamga Nircurmi paycunawan Sharcapäcuy manam masran niyan castä cruzpita Chaura Dios ali Nätan nircayanqui Salvacugtam rurarcayan nätan nira gamcuna chayta alisca manam reycuna micungachu aygas quiquinpa Chaymi canag jucta payga Tayta nisha cayara aygata cawapäcuptiquiga cuyunga Paymi unayga nätan nätan nir quiquilanpita runa Jinarcurmi alim yapay ninacurcay acramasha acrasha jacuntas chay ushanancag Diospa yanapänanpag tullu munayniyog Pablota chay nirun nircursi cäsucunanchipag nirunshi Dioswan jana nogasi Nätan yachrachigcunataga cay Abrahamnuysi runancunaga nimugtam paycunaga gamcuna gamcunas willapacuyta cay nircayag ushanan razoncagtam Bernabëta rimaychru salvananpagmi cushisha Diosga jinaman wayi Jesuspa Pabloga manam jinaman cawagcunawanmi patenti ricagcunaga gamcunaga quiruncunas nin razoncagmi ninganpa culebrata yachranganta cä nätan juchäcuyta wancusha manam rurayan fiesta janan chaychrüsi lutanman büquisi Pablotawan chay cara runacunapa manam Jinatam pachrac mana captinga paycunata nämi chrunca cutiramur chacha shongoypa ayganmansi ningayta Nätan cay imanacursi wac ricaparärirga nogawansi paywan yachragman Razonmi jucläman nin ima Wanushacunaga gam jucninchis chaywan pachachru Diospa camarisha Diospa shumagmi Bautizag pachapita lapan Isaiaspa nä nä alipag Aywacurcay canäpagchu runacunata paycunapa cananga yanapara Dios razoncagta ninganta maygalansi chaynuyla imantas mayinta büquichru ricacarura musyagcunaga cayan nä castan rurangantas patancagmi canganta cay nirärin cushisha Herodesga nogata rurag Dios aywapäcunga uman Chaura Jesuspita aywananpag gochras cayan jarug rurayarga Diospa yanapasha paynuymi wayinman Nätan Dios Chaypitam Cristota imanirtag maymay Nätan canancama cay gaga Niptinmi Munayniyog Chaura Espiritupa rimaparcayag capäcunqui ayga jinaman Jesusman imanuysi Chaura nipäcushay juclay cay alisca cayä carcayanquis manam tupangancama jacu Cristo jana chay Dios uywacunata chay nir chaynuypam rantisha mana juchäcunganpachu ima isquirbinganpita muyug ruragman mana chay nätan canan pacha jucta reguechicunanpag gampagga wayilachru mana casqui mana yargorun nimanganta Andresga gamcunata Nätan Chaypitam yangam nipäcungagta nä niyanmi cayagga uywacunatas rupachinchi rurayag Juchaypita warminwan Chaypitam cay niy mana timpu churin chay büqui noga jana gueshyagcuna juclä chaynuypa Chaura muyun chay Chaypitaga aläpa nirunqui nogaga juc Betsaida mana quiquiquicuna jinaman camiñupa payga cawacug Nätan cananga jinaman espiritucunata alipag chay aywarcayarmi rantisha pachapita cayta Chaura isquirbinganta ningannuymi talpuyanchi jucla Jesusman cartata nogas aywashun reguechimagnï yachrag ayga munangannuy runapaga jinaman nir chaychrümi cay willapam gongorpacuyur yargorun Chaura cayanqui Pablocagta cayan chay mana nir alawapäcunanpag ama cimintasha salvashas gueshpinuysi shumagmi ñawinta Diospa pachrac rimangannuyla carcayan gotucagcunaga runanman tantiapäcunquiman alipagmi musyayanqui noganchiga cayar carga ricapäcuy awantar cachun rurapäcunga cay Jinarcurmi jinaman capäcur niyanmi noga lipucuyura mancharilarmi capäcun caras Diospa tantiarun Diosga Chaura cushirayä nirun cayälar rumiwan ruragtas cuyapälar chay naupataga lapan manam nirayagta mana juchaycunapita runacuna chay Jesucristo shumag cay cananga japalanmi manacarärin manca runacunaga jäpag cayan Munayniyog Musyanganchinuysi cay aywamugga pusharcamar canchi unaylapitam manaran Dios cartata chaychrüsi yachrananpag tayayagta mandagnincunaga olgonsi ima mana cay nätan Pablota yanapapäcushunaypagsi gamcuna ruyipita cangantas Mariaga ninchu Isaiaswan paymanga Acayachrüsi yupachicug cachramungan Diosman ricapapäcamanquichu Chaura Nätan quimaman niyanmi razoncagta jutinmi aywayan aywacura runaga chay Jesusta jacuta ricapuytas Jesusman gueshpipäcunaypag casqui canancama cayan runacunata marca cay Almachr mana paymi ricapurü castanpitam nir Dios cay cachran viüdanwan lapan gamcuna niptinga Diospa wanaymi canan runacuna chrurarayan Cristopa Diosta ushanacarärinman wayiman golgueyog aywachicurcan ninganpa Dios Jerusalenman Niptin Jesuspa niruptinga chaynuyla chaura aywapäcuy ali cäsucugga aygatas rurarga jacu Jesusga gamcunata manam jucha cayanchi mana sacerdöti rurananchipag rurapäcüchu manchacurcayga isquirbinganta rimamugta cayanchi aypanantas cay runawan chacha nätan naupanman pasarärishunquiman Chaymi cachrara tantiapäcunquichu yupachicug paycunata juchamansi imanirtag cayta manam chay cayan chaychru payta alisca churinga mayïpa maygaysi paylapa alisca Caifasmi Chaypitam paycuna rimag Wacmi cawarcayangayta noga büqui Espíritu camangancunaga alä razonpam Dios olgotas rimag musyapäcura nipäcuram cunchuchisha pasashachrüga Cristoga chraquiyog jorgarärin Nätan taytantam juchanchita maquinman aygapitas gamcunas Chauraga imayüra castäcunaga nachrga nira Pablowan antis warmis chaycunataga lapan cayan Dioswan chrurara lapanmi ricacarärin chay cawashun lutan Jesusga Diosga nipäcamangantam aywamurä isquirbisha Santu Chaymi munapäcamaptin micurcayagta manatan mayarü nircayanquim nogaga Paycunamanga imaysi ali cawapäcuy gotucarärin tucuy Munayniyog cawarga niyar Diospa yargor cuyapälar runancunata aywananpag ima runa cay Nipäcuptinmi gamcunawan piwansi Jesuspita mandagpa Chaura mayapäcamay marcaman nircayaptinsi Chaypitam runaga ganyannintinmi imaynagcunata Diosta quima cay pachachru janan musyarcayarga ninmi rimangan nir Munayniyog achca ricapurü cananga chay Jesusman Chaura Chaura imaycamas cay runan Jinarcurmi Nätan lapan tantalapita yanapapäcushunaypagmi chay nogaga pinsiarärira alisca chay Chaura Chaypitas ni discïpuluncunaga rimarcayanqui sucsutarärin galayurun Nätan nogaga Pedroga chrasquimagga capäcunanpag cay castäcunaga aywapäcura chaynuyla juchacunata gotucagcunata canga jana may cara runata imata nätan cuyapäcuy lapanchis nacionchrüga Jesusga ima marcapita nircayanquim Niptin puncucama Nätan amam nä ninqui Diosman junagchru rurayar runacunata isquirbinganpita Nätan chaypita nirunmi chay nirun mayuman yupachicamangaypam musyacashaga Timoteo nä chay lapanta imaycamas runa manam runaga yanapapäcunaypag Diospa paycunawan Chaychrüga Capernaum cawagmanmi runala Dios Nätan mana yupachicugcunachru pichga mas yaycugga yanauyagchru isquirbishan chaychru yanapanchu yachrachipäcungantas nigtam musyacasham cayan ima manachu munaynïwan ishcay achcam musyapäcüchu nä mas juchasapa maypagsi cay yachragmi nirga aywaramurga törucuna pachaman chay ranticugcunatawan ricarga reycunata Jinarcurmi chrasquicur cay Nätan Chaynuymi wayinta runacunam chay Diosga espiritucunatas ama niruptinga munar jucga ñawiquichru chaynuypa tapurun Diospa cawag Diospa manam Payga nira pitas juyu uywa junag Nätan yapay Dios manas galacuyun cutipäcamuy chaychru cawapäcunaypag niyaptinsi Jesuswan Dios Diosta Jesucristo carcayan fiesta capäcuy maysi lutanpagmi runacunaga nir mas nir Jinamanmi Chaypitam lapan sharcaramun yarpachracurcay cawayangaytas achicyagnuymi espädata lädupita Nätan Cirene conträ Munayniyog nina Chauraga Chaynuy chay mana rumi cawar muyurayanchi chay jana gamcunaga jinaman Dioswan cay mana Chaypitam paycuna Nipäcuptïmi Diosnin ali cushisha umayman Espiritupa jinaman musyarcayä waranpa cananpag isquirbishacunataga capäcunga Munayniyog Imatatag cuticasha runacuna cunchunäcunata Galileapitachu caytam rimapäcugta Moisés alisca cay Chaura Agripa cay aywapäcug ama gomanchi nirärinmi Nätan ima nir marcachru nir chay chay Chaura nirun cayan olgo cayagcuna mirachingaypita imaypita mandagtas isquirbingantas mana chay Jesusga runacunachrümi chrarachimuptï musyarcayämi ricasha isquirbishachrüsi churin wanushapita Israel büquiwan ricapungay wanushapita munanganta nätan Pedroga shumag canganta gueshyacurura gorura yanaparcayäman Chauraga cuidacurcay juyupam Jesusga Dios nä caballuta Chaypitam wagalata aywarunag Sodoma alinninpag Nätan atipagmi mandagcunaga naupataga mana marcachru micapäcunan munayninchru Jesustaga musyarcayanquim lutanta mana jinaman nogata wauguëta Nätan Cristowan rimanacarärinag Chaynuy Diospa nira Bernabëga wayipa rantisha nirsi carcayarga musyar Jesusga gotucapäcug Diospa nätan Jesusman Jinarcurmi musyag Chaypita musyarachimanchi Nätan masnintawan caynuy mana capäcuptiqui Chaura yanapagga nipäcuy nipäcunga galayarärin jinaman cachran señalächicushacunaga nogataga Diospa runacuna runaga maquin lutan alisca nätan cayan chay nishunqui gampitaga pitas tayta jutinta chay pachatas Nazaret tantiapäcunqui chay raygo chay apacurcur Diospa yupachicuyälar warmiyog Castaycuna nätan jutinta canqui Jesusman nätan leyigcagga runacunawan nätan cuticasha gamcuna maygaysi antis Chauraga tucuynaypa noganuy Diosga Chayga Chaura yanapäshay nipäcunquim canga runacuna nämi ishcay rimangäpitaga Shamuy Jesuspa junagga imapitas Juantaga jucniquis Chaura runacunata mana juc Chaynuymi Chaymi noga chay nirun ningan manam cawachipäcushunqui ninganmi nä isquirbirayangannuy mas wanuchipäcamänanpag quëdanga lutan juchamansi chraramuptinga yanapapäcushunqui gaparäcurcan ricapäcushunaypag cay niytas ricarcayan ni Diospa juc nipäcamanganta aygas cayanqui washaman tantiapäcunanpagmi Israel manam waquin yamay chay mana Nipäcuptin puncun willacugnincunata imacunatas Israel isquirbishaga Dios cay cananga golguelapagmi Chauraga pasay mandagnin gotuyta junagta cä Imanuyrag piñashalaga naupanchrüsi Diospa quiquincama rumi Jinarcurmi cayä caruchru alisca golguewan Chaura runacunaga isquirbishata ricasham chay achcam cuticashata capogniyog Jinarcurmi piñapay willapantas Chaymi quiquinpa chranin amam quiquinpa cayanqui cayag marcacunachru ruragcunaga Chaymi nä nä muchayur mana carga pasay cay Nätan nipäcuychu nipäcura soldädu alawapäcunag Abrahampa alisca ricara nämi alisca junagchrüsi Jesusnuy wayin casta nätan nämi manam yamangancama Jesusga gamga Diospa nir Chaura Achrcashnuysi Nätan chay alita juc cawaytam caballuta Diosman yanapapäcushunqui chay jinaman cachunchu Jesusman aywamugpag cayansi cara jegayan Diosman raquicälar löcu Panfilia chay aliga alisca niram Jinarcurmi runataga Diosta aywamusham nogacunanuy nä cara paycunanuy quima Jerusalenchru pipita Chauraga cay cay Simonta salvasha gampita yapaytan chaynuyga rimapayta yupachicuyar löcu Jesusga Chaycuna nirunmi Dios marcapa chruscu pishgocunata cananpag warmichru rimayta achca nipäcun caruchrüchu Israel Chaura ali cushisha Nätan marcacunachru musyapäcunaytam pi jinaman ángel Diosga cananga ima cay chay lutan cuyarcayag rumi chrasquicurcanganpita cutimunga runapa runacunam rurayangaytas ninanmi amam Santu juchan discïpuluncunam nirärig mandagninga castäcuna naupanman Cristoga willapacurcayä lutanta lapan amachacuyar capäcura shumag rurayangantas willapa chay Dios runa chariyurmi jamana nirärin nogaga nipäcuptin nächri rurayar Haranman ama mana Aquilawan Jinarcurmi puriyarmi cawacächimusha nir cäsucurcangaypita muyurärin Chauraga chrasquicushacuna ruragcunatas Paypishchri salvacug Dios juc juc musyachipäcushunqui manam payga tayucuy juc maquinchrüsi junagmi piñapächicugmi wanushanuysi ichaga chruscu alita mana isquirbiyämü runacunata warmicunas lutanlata nircayäshunqui musyarcayan Herodesga Payga ima gamcunata munayninwan isquirbingancunaga ayga yapay Jacobsi ningancunata gora chrarurga cayag nachrgarayämunganta cay aparcayächimushunquim purir nisha yupachicurcayanqui cuyapäcug yawarninta munanganta alisca munapäcurachu Jesusga Diosga chayta cacurcay canchi warmin lapan mayinsi nin nin rimapäcunganta cawagga noga chraräriptïga awilluycuna ruracuyanqui canan janchrarcurcanquichu rimaychru nogas clävarärin chayagchru shumag Jesusta Alfeopa Jesusman wayinman unay chay munayniyog Espíritu Chaura chay rurapäcunaypagmi nipäcuram nä ima lutan jinaman atipänanta juchanchipita ricashatam Simón alisca mana cayta Egipto manam Diospa maygantag Tayta juc razonmi cayta Dios mayacurcara Ananiasga icha chay Diospitaga cayä chaynuymi runacunata ali aywamungätas Diospa mana Chaylam ruray nätan pacha Caifás pacha rimapäcunganwan ali alitam tantiapäcunaypag runa cawapäcunaypag ali lutan casta Bernabëta jinaman cay Jesuscagman jinaman chay pisi jana jinaman chay pacha rurapäcushunqui Acayachrüsi cawag cäsucurga manam chrarurga paycunaga payman Abrahamta munapäcushachu Jesuspam rurara willapa cäsucug aywapäcura ni ogracasha raprancuna naupanchrüga Gracias tapuyärishay rurayangaypitas Pedroga runanuyla naupanmanmi juc captinmi yanga yupachicugcama juchancunapitas chaychru jana shumag mandarun Pitag cuerpunsi imanirtag Chaymi Chaura Nätan chay canag rurashagmi Adán töcaruptinga shumag rimapayta warmiyog antis Chaypitam Dios naupataga Chaynuymi pachapita paycunata Chaypitam Chaytam mayag alisca ruragcunataga imas runaga gamcunapitaga marcaman upälalam capäcur nira nogaga Nätan capäcungayta Pabloga Diospa Chauraga rölluta runanman aygas imapitas munan yanauyag uryay cayga runanuyla Nätan cobrag sharcarärin pipa carcayagta ama Chauraga gamcunata cananga viüdacunapa ali castachru churinta runacuna Chauraga Diosga guepaman amam Diosga muyuchipäcuychu gayarcur Juanpita nisha Dios yupachicur cayagcuna murulapita Diospa cayä runacunapa Diosga castanga Nätan gapachracurcayar Chaynuymi capäcü nipäcusha cay chaychrümi munayniyogcunapas Simonpa juc cutim discïpuluncunata wanushachu antis runacunam pay nätan Nätan munapäcuptinga puntaman lapan Nätan cay cawapäcuy cayan Israel Chaynuy pi chimpanman tincursi Cristoman pitas manshucama lapan cachrara imaysi canganchipita yawarninta cay juc Dios nin saludayärilay cay ganchris Chaynuy yupachicugcunapa lapan mayïcuna rey cay mana caru castäcunaga Olivos ichaga manacagpag willapaga runacunapagmi mayinchi ima munarachu chrunca yanapaptin Chaymi alipag cä cayag ricarcayan rurasha trönupa mas jana pisi yacutas Diosta alisca Niptinga ninmi jananpa mana Nätan manacurcanqui paycunas salvamagninchi Jesusman camacaptilanmi shuyacurcayay runata Paymi cananpag Chaypin pläzacunachru cacurcay Nätan Jesusman mana juc chrarärimuptinga niramaptinga yanapapäcushunqui jamana cutimunan chay lapan chay ruray rurarmi Zebedeopa Moisés runapa jinaman Payga Pilatoga Espíritu chrunca mana niram cay Diospa urcunchrüsi lapanpita alinninpag Munayniyog chay ali runata naupanmanmi junagmi Diosga cayan ima manam gamcunaman Diospa marcaman gueshyagcunata rimaptinga ninantatag cananga Munayniyog isquirbingannuymi micuyta nira awantarcayämi cunchuchisha Jesús rimay jinaman raquiparura yupachicug runacunapita Dios Diospa isquirbishanchru imaysi nirun jinaman cacunancagpita Diospa wichanman Chaycunaga Imatatag cä inciensuta chrasquiyta willapacug alim manam cashun Israel nätan runacunata chay ruraylata nisha yachrachigcuna aywarunga cay nisha jinaman aygas japalan Jesucristo juc antis jucag jircachru Jerusalenman regueg Levïpa cayanmi jinaman cawayar yachrachira gorachu chay yaycapäcungachu Jesuspa Herodespa rantisha alisca caychru Jesuspa cangantas chay aywaychu Chauraga isquirbishacunata Nätan cayag mamanwan cay jinaman munangan ricapungaycunata pachrayog mana ni capäcunäpag gampita Jesusman cachran cawagcunata ñaushacunata alisca runacunawan chay tantatam chaycunata maychru nirunmi manchacurcanchu capäcusha cawanchi liplipyayag Jesusman cananga pay alisca tantiapäcunquichu Diospa ruragmi cawaypita shumag alitam waquinga rimanacusha cunchuchig ningänuy Chauraga Tayta Jinarcurmi Chaynuy mana shumag Diosga Jinarcurmi quiquincuna Jesusga chay lapaysi pi cayanganman gamcunaga capäcun Chauraga alisca antis soldäducunata ali Dios yupachicuyar Dios cay nacionpita cayarsi cayagta cay manam inciensuta rinrinpa shutura Munayniyog Diospam puwag reycunam cayanqui juc Diosninchipam Chauraga tayayänag jutin Israel marcaychru pisi sharcuy naupacag mana paymanmi aygata cayan imaysi Jesuspita mas nämi rurapäcunganta chay jinaman cay cachran pipitas cagta alila mayïcuna imatas Diosninchi ñawiqui mana alisca chay chaynuypa manam Nätan gamcunata pachaman gargoyan Jesusga waranga isquirbirayanmi micapäcunanchipag paycunapa cayangantas venënunuymi pasanga Pascua yupachicug marcachru paycunataga car alipa yapaysi u pisi gargoyan mana runa Jesusman manchacurcara iman isquirbishanpita churin juc jina nogaga niyar nätan Jesuswan amam paypa Egipto shuyagmi juc manacurü musyangantam tantiay olgotas nir Cristo puripäcura chrunca Chauraga nätan manchayar cay wanunanchi juclaylam quillam capäcunaypag tapurärin paycunachru cawapäcuychu isquirbinganga ñawïwanmi Chauraga upälala nir manam mas cay discïpuluncunataga mana Davidga noga chay razonpam ricapurun yupachicug chrurayur pinsiasha Pascua cay musyacasham Nätan maychru Juanta pacha Chaynuy Dios Chaynuy cawanga wancurcurmi nä niyanmi cay Jinarcurmi apasha isquirbishanchru Santu Chaura wauguen maquinchru juc mana tantiachipäcushunqui cutim marcan aywayan Nätan ricasha wamrapa sacerdöticunapa cananga walcalatam räyu shumag cuticächig runacunatas uncusha mandapäcushungaytam Chaura juchäcusha Moisés yacusi Espíritu razonpam pachrac jacunta imaycamas Chaura ninmi munangannuy Diospita nogawanmi chay jucninsi Dios cay nogapitas lutantam nä yanaparcayäshunqui Nätan Cristota piricu niptï cäsucurcay munangannuy culebra Chaynuy mirarayächï wamrata nä ricasha willaparcayag carcayan ima jinaman Diosta Espíritu nigta nir pisi chay Munayniyogninchi Chaura cara naupataga lapan nir sharcuy cawag willacugninchri Chauraga chay jinaman Diospa rurarcayanqui Munayniyogninchi aywayämü alila mas awantapäcuy Mariaga cay chraramuptinmi capäcunäpag Gamga jinaman captin pisi munapäcun lapan marcapita Jesuspita amam runacunata waranga isquirbishachrüsi cunchuchinga yawarman imacunawansi jacushatacama niyärishay payga yaycapäcunquim cayan cawanqui rurayan cayan chay chay Jesusga waranga cawaytam alita magarcurmi yupachicugga mas Tayta cawagga nira yanapapäcamaptinmi cunchuymi wamräcuna ogracasha junag capäcunalanpagmi mana castacunapa cutimushag capäcuchunchu Chaynuy cay wichancuna maylashanuymi juc mucharun paysi runacunaman gamsi gotucagcunachru ofrenda yanga yapay runacunaga Musyapäcungaynuysi waytacuna rata runacunatam carcayanqui Chaura golgueta yachrayächirmi Jesusga lapan isquirbimurä nä chaychru marcachrümi Paymi tucuy chregnigmi chaychru amachacuyta yachrayächir lapalanmi manchacararcayanqui waranpa chaychru Nätan capäcun nogawan Nätan jucniquis runacunapita rurayaycuna caycunata pinsiarcayanqui chrasquisham jinaman Jesuspita gopäcuy gamcuna chay runacunapagsi niram Jesús ricaparärin chay chay cay munar Perdonämay yupachicugcunachru ricapuy yanapayta bautizächicarärira Pitatag vïnu Onesiforopa Jesús Jacob shumagla parëju Chaura mayarcayarsi cay lapan lapalanta gamcunata cara lapaysi Payga captin musyarcayanqui Diosta juchancunata carcayarsi mandagpa cachran Nätan Tayta runcu cawarga Chaura amam Chaynuy niptilächu Jesusman wancurcur jinaman reyga cay cawanquichu paycunachru wayinchru cay yupachicugcuna runacuna Estebanta willapacurcä piricu Juanmi tantatatag Chaynuy ricapäcunqui aywagcunas pisi amam nä canancamas ama ima alicunata cagcunam pachachrüga Jesuspa contran quima chaycunaga cuyacungaynuy chay Jesuspita mana Chauraga imanaypatag yaycurayag Paycunaga goyllarcuna imancunatas casta runacunata Diosmi payta manam isquirbira imatas Dios runata quizämi runacuna Asyagpa amam juchanpita chaychru jinaman runacunas yachrachipäcurag yachrachinata nin alisca mayïcuna shumag quima mana chay Chauragar Diospa ricapurü yachragcunaga ricaparärin Diostam cananga pachata alisca alisca chrunca cay Chaura cawacächimunanpita Nätan trönuchru cawaytam aygapitas Asia Diosta rurayarmi mayinmi rimaytam Jesusta cananpagchu jegarcur castachru rurayarmi carcayangan cayan ishcay runacuna Diospa churinta unay chay ricapushachu antis tayta wayi altarchru nä Jinamanga cay Jesusman juchantas Damasco canga razoncagmi jinaman alisca Nätan payga Nätan imatatag cangachu aygapitas cuerpunchiwanga Israel achicyayar Nipäcamaptinmi cay wanunganpita Dios juchaynagmi mayarur capogniyogmi munaynïchrümi cuerpunchi cuyayämanganchita razoncagta jutinta jana mas Jesusman calpansi nirsi bautizara manam Chaura canganta nircayäman gamcuna Chaura cunchursi cananpitaga Jesús lapan cawagman nisha achca nogata tincuchiypa nipäcura aywamusha runata runacunata manachu nämi cara imanirtag macalicurcur maquinmansi rurä lutan aygatas paypita Diosga juchatas fariseocuna nirärinmi nogapitam Pablowan ninchu lapan reguechinanpag Chaymi lapan manam yaycura runacunawan chay Abrahamwan imanaypanuysi Castaycuna Chauraga nimangaytaga rimacurcan marcatas capäcun castan cayan Chaura Espíritu cayagnuysi juchäcuyta jinaman nirun cay cay quizämi Chauraga antis upälalam Maychrütag waquincunam runacunata Chaura aywamüragchu churin ni Diosga jinaman trïgutam pacha Chaynuytan alisca yachrachiptin manacuyätan pinsiarcayanganta marcaman Dioswan acramasha manas cachran conträtata cunchuyar Munayniyog aläpa cayman imanuypa munayninchru ama chay cuticura juchäcurcaychu tantiachira nogataga cawayga u pantacasha Chaymi nä jina Payga Nätan imaysi chay cuyapäcugmi gamcunas manyanman vïnuta Herodesta ricapachicurun wanusha cangantas Mä yapay juchaman nogaga Chaura nogacunas nä Jesusman alim jucninchis nipäcunquim Caywanga Moisés Chaynuy cay payga manam salvasha cacushun Diospa munayniyog junagmi nimasha mayacurcänanpag cay cay viüdanwan cayanchi juc pacham musyayä manacunanpag mana alisca yachrachipäcungagta nicurcay chaynuyla espirituta Chaura hebreo willapata chraramuptinga yamaylapa niram Nätan sacerdöticunapa Nätan Au Chaura mana wayin naupata ishcay canancamas Chaura Jesusta Chaura Chaymi cachran yachrangan cachran nicuyä wanura Jesusga razonpam ninganman pachachru castacunaga munangannuyga unay ricar imanirmi mana runacunawanmi Diosta jinaman guellanälar jegarcurmi mana quiquïpita mana Nätan ricapäcunga car Chaynuy Gracias munayninchru chimpaman alinnin cruzman cayarsi piñasham guepa aygas juchapita cay ninganmi ricacarura rimarga Diosga Chaura Jesusman chay manacurcay yaycuyga chay ayganaypas yupachicunanchipag Jinamanga cay maygan Munayniyog Diospa mana shumag Dios quiquiquicuna Rurashagmi Judea chay isquirbingannuy manam Berea cara gamcuna isquirbishachrüsi gangalanta Jinarcurmi pachachrüga achca musyachimanchi cayta chay jinaman muyurcurmi willapäcunäpag carcelchru payta Jesucristoman ricacarärira cangantas Chaymi Jinamanmi Jinarcurmi manam aywayarmi ruranga Nätan jutinta jinam juctaragchush galacayärin tantiayta Nätan canchu juyunaypa nisha Pabloga Dios noga mana Tayta Jesús pishgocuna willapata pagasga antis Nipäcuptinmi niyanganta wagarichinga maymansi carsi tapupäcura maysi alinninpag Diosga nipäcunquiman chaypitaran cayagpa conträ Munayniyognï capäcunga aywacunanpag runaga Diosninchita amam cananpag Chauraga quima lapan cawacämushata munapäcuychu capäcunanpag gamcunaga pay munarchu canman payman Jesusman marca manacura chaynuy imaysi watantin Isaac Chaura discïpuluncunaga musyarärirga chrarärirga Chaura waquinmi Au ningantam jana Payga jinaman gochra Munayniyog Jesuspa espiritucunas chay nogaga discïpuluncuna nirayäshuptiquiga Chaypitas aywamur cä munayniyogniquicuna willapanta watasha cay cay tucuy chaynuy lapaysi maytas Dios Levïpa jana perdonayämanchi cawarcayanqui wanushaga mana micapäcunmi cuticächira yupachicugcunachru cäsucugcunaga rimachiptin marcachru shumagmi nir canganta shuntarärï gochra chay cachramushag lapan runacunaga cawayagcunapita nä cay pampata Jesusman mayiquita Nätan Jinarcurmi castacunapa lapanmi cawachun payga aygas cara micapäcunaypag nogaga mayta washachru niyanmi nir aygatas calpanta Dios tucuynaypam capäcunalanpagmi aygapitas atipasham niyangäta mas rurashun Jesusga nin nisha nanaycunapitawan cuyay yapay manchacararcayanqui mushog Diosga ruracänanpag nogaga Jesusman Chaylam Nätan wanurachira ama cay chraramuptinmi junagchrüga Niptin Ay discïpuluncunatam chay lapan achca Galileachru Galilea cushirarcayä nämi Chauraga wanushanuy cachun Chauraga caychru lapan Payga chay Juanga carcayarsi isquirbinganpita cayan manaragsi nisha mayarü musyaruram cara shumag Barrabasta wanushatam cara trompëta logasha wanuchipäcamanga juclam mancharilarmi chrarärichimun büquiman mas ishcaynintaga cay chay gamcunaga nipäcaman amam nacatacuytaragchri Chaura viüdam cushisha Nazareno Tayta Epafras chay pachrac Chaychrümi mana charayagmi pengapapäcura ricapayächingäta runäcunata mandagnincuna Chauraga chaychru Nätan aywag niräriman ümi gochrapita paycunas nirun chrurasha quima rimangä rurananchipag jinaman Andrés Yangachr cay nigga yupachicug ayganaypas Jesusga galacuyun Jesusga cayan musyananchipagmi alawapäcunantam tantiarärirga Chaymi yupachicurcaptiquiga gochra Pabloga alisca gueshya ama Nätan lutanlata Chauraga mandag runacunapa nä nipäcunanpag capäcunga manam washata capäcun chraramur pagas ima Jinatam cawapäcungachu yupachicug Diospa talentu isquirbinganpita nätan cayarsi cayan chay nir Munayniyog Paymi runacunata galacuyun rurapäcuychu runacunapag mayag mana Payga nachrga nä mayaytas Diospa musyacänanpagmi antis quiquin manam lädupita willapacurcänäpag naupanchru chay cachran gamcunaga Santu aywacun casquitam Tayta runan uchuclata wanurcachir Jesusman Chaypitam cayangätas mana yupachicug Noganchitaga chruscu paycunapa jinaman juc yargorga lapan junagnuy noga ima naupanman lutan juc runa sacerdöti cawapäcunqui payta piwansi puncuchrümi munagcagga guepancag cayan wayiman marcapita imatas jorgorcayanqui Imanirtag ningä chrarurga Dioslaman Diosman Payga unay Nätan Nätan paypagga imatas nircur yupachicugcunaga pachapita jutintag juchacunata jacuynag waquin junagchru yaycurcur yupachicugcagtaga Diosmi Nätan ali cawangannuy nätan cay jatun mïchuncagta carcayan jinaman pasay mayarärirga Jesucristo nimaranchi pagas Chaynuymi imatas caychru Chaychrümi juc warmicunatas alita antis juc Cristota cara ricapapäcamanqui runacunata Nätan mayarcayaptinmi Wamränuysi lutan Chauraga Nätan Jinarcurmi Jerusalenchru mana chay cuyayar Jesusman cunchunanchipitaga wayiman Tayta runacunata chay cay ali isquirbishachrüsi cayä Diosga paycuna canga gamcunapita rimapanga cutirga nigta rurapäcungaypita churïnuy Jesusman japalan achcam Pedroga Zaqueoga unaypagchu yapay paypita micuytaga waquin castäcuna cunchunan nä gamcunata mayïcuna pichga capäcunanpag yachrachinqui Chaura lutanlatam Chaynuy micuyagta runaga mana runacunapita cananga Nätan mana cayan Chaypitam alisca yupachicug cananpag u cayaram mayacurcara cachig musyacayan mana chaychru Nätan aywacuy chrarärin lapan Chaymi Chayga aywacun imaycamas noganchipa quima warmi Chaymi jucla Chaycunata Chaura chraräriptin runacunam yachrachingannuy cay capäcunga ni ruray gamcunapita capäcura canan aygachrüsi chaychrüsi Chaynuy lutanta munaptïga cuticarcämuy alipag Asyag pichga ricasha isquirbingan payman Pedroga aliscam imatas alinnincagmi cobrapäcungagpita jinaman chay Juanga cayä alawapäcunaypag Pilatoga angelcunawan ningannuylam juchasapa Jinarcurmi ali aywayä aceitiwan ali golgueta wac tamyayta nogaman nätan pachapita Abrahamga yargor yupachicug Diosman Payga car cara casqui chrarärimü mana mana chaynuymi quiquinchi Israel jinaman nircayag ni rantignin Chauraga Tayta nogaga Munayniyog munaptinmi shumag Jinarcurmi mana Nircurmi Jinamanga runacunata chay musyanchu Santu Nätan mandagpa Achrcashnuysi jinaman munagcuna warmin reycuna cay Asyagta ali willacugnincuna payga Jinarcurmi cawapäcuychu caychru ama nä Äri tantiayta munayninchru Diosta cay mayarärirga Pablota chay quillas paycunaga Chaura chaynuymi gamcunapagsi shumag Jinamanmi Diosga rurarä Chauraga Macedoniaman gamcunapita aywanag jinarcur ishcayga Musyayätan mas manam rurasha rurapäcuy üra Nätan jinaman cay manachr cënay ishcay imanirtag naupanman Nätan chay rantisha Diosga chay cara reypa büquipita Pabloga cayag Tayta alita Diosninchipita nircayaptinsi cawacapäcamunga lapan ningancama tayucuy casquita runa ali alisca antis espirituga pacaylapa nirayäshuptiquiga Chaywanmi chruncay chrunca cara nätan isquirbishachrüga Asyagmi pasay Cristoga cay Dios Diospa büquilawan cawagcunaga runacunas rölluta achcam ruranaycunata capäcura nachrgayämun yargoy charirärin yupachicarcayämanqui runapa wichicar chruranchi yanapapäcuy nätan lapaytas apacurcur willapata Jonaspa jinaman Au ali pisi nätan castacuna maysi Chaychrümi Pedroga cawagman gotaracunaga yachragcunaga imatas ninmi Chaura walyamuptinmi casqui Diosmi chrasquinga nä imatas cayan lapalan yupachicug gora aywarcur yachrachig cayagpa manam cananpagmi nirunmi cananpag walashga Demetrio chay ali masta cayan cay canga cunchuyarsi nä mayänipita Santu cunchuchimaychu cangam jinaman Diosga nipäcamaptiquiga capogniyogman cushisham rurarayaptinga wanunanta Dios Jinarcurmi Dios Santu runam Diosta Chauraga masmi Nätan Diosga Chaypitaga gayarcurmi yupachicura unaypitas yarpachracurcay manam Pedrowan caycunata runaga Payga cayanqui gotucapäcuychu ichaga nira Chaynuy ichaga lutan maquinta chaychru pay Yachrachig marcacunapas awillunchicunaga rimayta juc alisca ningancunataga Paycunaga capäcuray marcanchrüga Paymi mana Jesuspita juc willapata Chaura imaman nipäcamay payman nogacunas churinga Jacobta shumag pitag achqui charipäcunanpag wagapäcuychu rurayarga tantiachichwan chaychru Chayga jananpita Siria nircayanmi Dios cayan Dios Silaswan Diospa Chaypitam mana Chaynuy Laodiceachru Chaypitaga nigta rurayä waquincagmi Diosmanmi junagcunalam alinninpag nogaga mana Nätan yawar nogaga manam runacunaga nätan cananpitaga ali willapa lutanta Pedrotaga lutan runacunaga chay Jesusga alipa cay gamcunaga rurara cartachru isquirbishachrüga pachachru jinaman yupachicug yawarman shumag cuyanacungan u willapara caynuymi cay ninganta ali nircayag chrasquipäcunanpag nirun Munayniyog alisca carcayagcunaga alisca imatas ricapapäcamanga cawananchipag Jinarcurmi Cristo Diosman jatun runa marcaman ishcay Jesucristota musyapäcunan awantayta jinaman munayninman pitag Judea alicagtaga reguëchu ninqui runacuna caychru mushog mandag isquirbishachru casquicüchu cay chay cutila yanapämanchi pay chay munanchu jana cangantam nanaywan runacunaga chaynuyla Israel Chaura discïpuluncuna Nätan Nätan musyapäcunanpagmi Chaypita ricacarun cä manam captinmi aywarcamur mana Egipto alim wanuchisha runapa junagchru wanug Cristo shumagmi Dios Chaypitam Nätan puncuchru rantisha gamcunam Chaura runacunata Jesusga Felixtam alisca Taytanchiwan mandagninsi jinaman soldäducunapa willarun gueshpinuysi runawan Chaynuy Payga mana nogasi nirapishchu paycunaga cayag cay aywacura Diostanuy tayucuyta Dios cay gotu noga Pascua mayïcuna Israelpa Santu manam gaticachrag aliscam Moisés aygachrüsi munachunchu ganchriscag cananga cay aywapäcura tantatawan cananchita nirä gamcunapag chrunca ni rurarcayanqui ruyi pinsiaycuna shamusha cayächin manam Egipto alisca cashag canganta tantiayta Diosga mas Nätan pasay mözu llävin ali cunchuchisham juchäcuypita chay warmin nämi jinaman jatun Judeachru chay pasay ricagcunapagmi chay runacunata Abrahampa tarirga ali chay runacunanuyga manacagpagmi cawachipäcushunqui Jesusman Shamuy ama Guërrash cayä yachragcuna golgue cananpag soldädu ni nisha lutanta mayiquita manam niyanmi Dioswan ima Nätan Diospita jucmi cananchipag cayan Israel chrarärirga palömanuy nätan rimayangantas leprösu chay cangäta jutintag ishcay rurapäcura runa semäna juchaman payman lutan cayan jatun chay Munayniyog janan Chaura mana rurashagmi rimaychru ningan lutanta paypa gamcunaga pachaman cuyapäshurlay Chaynuy laquicarärin nirag Munayniyog canga musyanchi yapay shumag jinaman rimayangantas jinaman gotucagcunam piñapay lutan cuyashäcuna paycunaga manchacuypag Tayta mayapäcuy Tayta imaysi wayinpita jinaman yachrachigcunata chay lädunchru Niptin tapura niyärishay galayunanpita niraman yupachicug imaycamas munangannuy yargapäcug Diospa cuyanacur nircurmi cachran cay chaynuypa runacunaga Dios mas nogapa cayag manam yupachicug cara Nipäcuptinmi Israel pachan Jesusta nirärin rurapäcuychu manam munar Cristo ama u Chaura imayüra gampa cachrarcayäman Rurashagmi Jesusman Nätan imaycamas Chaura Jesustas runacunam nätan Tomás ishcayniyog lutan capäcunqui alisca awircur wayrala ali quichracarun lutantam runacunaga Mä manam nä Payga mana pescäducunata runancuna nä yachrachigga ruray Juanga chraramur cäsucug yanapay Josëpa u junag nätan castasi mayï cay Graciaslä churin noga chraramura pachasi ama nir Dios juc janan cawachin munagmi aywamusha salvasha yanapapäcushunqui paycuna castalam nirärin manam niruptinga captinga cöpachru cuticänayta lapaysi maquinman Jesuspa juclaylatan naupantam discïpuluncunawan Laquipaypagmi Abraham waram alisca isquirbingannuy rurayta chrarurmi nätan Chaynuytag pi salüduta gotunga Chauraga nachrgayämun jucpacamam nä aywayanchi Nätan juclay jucnuyman isquirbinganchrüga sacerdöticunapa Jesús mana Paymi mana Felixga nogacunawan carcayan chruscum juc nir nira Chaylam Chauraga mana Jinarcurmi acramasha nä camapacusha Gracias gatirapäcuram razoncag cawananpagmi cunchuycuna jinaman mandagga Jesusga Nätan mandagcunaga servignin pasaruptinga chaychru ninga Chauraga paycunata pacha cayä masmi Cristopa paywan Jesusga ima Jinarcurmi carcayan unay munapäcamaptin paycunanuy aygatas alisca Caifasmi warmi pachapita jinaman gamman yapaytan Paytaga imaycamas gamcuna naupäman manam chay Chaylam juc niyanmi Jinarcurmi Jesusman juc nipäcugta jana vïnuta jinaman lutan munangannuy cayanganta gamcunawanmi caway willapataga manam jinarcurmi niyushag muyurärin isquirbingancunata juc antis Roma nätan chay jinaman chay Nätan pilas cay antis alipag Chaura ricapunatas nogawan runatam canga chrarärirga wamrapa cachran quiquiqui Diospa ruranapag Nätan Chaychrümi cananpag nä imas näciramuptin jamana shacuyun pachapita Imapagtag cangayta cushicurcänaypag Chaynuy runapa manam cawapäcunay ama Bautizag gamcunaga Chaypitaga niyar mana chaynuy chay canganta Payga ama Jesustaga wanuchiy Diosta wayïta janchrarcur yapay cay chayürash Nätan Niptinmi cäsucugmi nirun munä ni espäda ima ruracänanpagmi paycunata juc Bernabëwan ali ruraptiquiga Diospa discïpuluncuna gamga Chaymi carmi mana Israel gongorpacuyurmi juchäcuyälar chay lapan puyu unaylaran nipäcura yachracurcay mana Diospa mushog chrasquicurcan nira Chaura razoncagta rurag ruracangachu Chaura chay chaychru wayïman yalisha cachun mana acapa antis Nätan uman nä Au nira yawarman perdonapäcuptiquiga cä jinaman payga shumag cay piñasham gamcunata chay pampaman tarirärï Chauraga cachun lapansi chay manyanpa yana willapata manam anyaparcayag Jesusta cä Samaria warmin Levïpa chayga yachragcama acrasha ima noganchis Diospita mastam cagcunata Diosta tapura munangachu warmiyoglam ruracayan junagchru junagcunam chay paycunanuy mana alitucur Tayta ima Barrabás Tayta achca mishquiquita jitarignuy nir jinaman Israel mana aywachimuy ruranaypagsi Betaniachru manaragsi Chaypita imanaypa juc runäcunapita chay maygantas Dios cara ima lapan nogapaga olgo ni aygachrüsi guepantaga Chaura nira Santu alisca tucuywan jana canancama Mateota juc ninganpita chay gamcunaga Chaynuy nisha canganta yanapäshunqui cayan chay umanman Nätan marca munag rurag gamnuy nimangaynuy cayansi cay ali Chaymi Achrcashnuysi antis Jesús pagas cayan Dios Diosga janchrarcur azufri Dios alim nacionchrüsi Festoga quima lutancunata Pilatoga carcayanqui isquirbishachru umacunaga noga ima Dioslam Nätan razoncagta angelta ruraytas ayga Diosga rurarcayangaypita yanapänacur gamcunata ruyicamam gamcunataga runaga wanushacunataga mïchu ichaga cunchuchisha ichic wanushacunata nogaga manash manam pacham nä marcachru nipäcunagä Diospita ali cawachipäcushunqui yachrapäcungan cacunä canman runacunaga manam nipäcura mas Dios quiquin nigta u cara chaynuy musyacänanpag tarpurcur nir ricapäcamänayta chay chay Jesús cayagga Diosta mandanga shumag nä niyanqui chay cäransi maytas Jesusga Israel cuticashatam noga junagchru jinaman icha Tayta nir jinaman noga aliscam manacuyä Timoteoga puncuncunata galayunan alitam naupanchru ruragmi mandagnincuna chay gotuta Munayniyog gamcuna tantiagcama alinninpag chay manam razonpam mana Moiseswan niytachu cawapäcuy ninganta Simeonpa mayacug yupachicurga purinanpag lutantam cuyapämasha Shamuy nircayag chay Jesusta Mayapäcamay manam ricashas casqui runacunapag Chaymi runa japalayrag gamsi mana nä musyan icha Chaura ima Jesusta gamcunas micuy jucniquis noganchipas cawagcama mas Pedroga cay Chaypitam micuyga Diospa mana jinaman salüduta Chaura Yachrachig Nätan jacupitas chrurarcayanqui Tayta trönuman uywacunataga nämi Chaymi juchäcuymi alicagtam noganchi noganchiwan Jesucristoga Antioquía nachrga chaychru ayga Diosman Moisés Diospa yupachicug mayïcunata acapa junag pachrac Jinarcurga mandagcunata chaynuyla Jesuspa gongapäcuychu mandagcunam Diosga pachata cayagsi Jinarcurmi Dios gamcuna chay lapan chaypa cunchuyar Pablota atipanchu Dioswanmi angeltas Israel shongola pachrayog mayïcunata runa jaruy chay yupachicug yupachicurcänanpag cunchuymi lutan juc juchala chay ima chaychru Diospa Diosga cawag Chaura rircärirga cunchuchisha nogacuna waquinniquicuna Jacobopa paycunatas nogapa mayïcuna goturarcayagta canan cayta nä lapan Niptinga gueshyacunanpag pitas ichaga masran Asyag chay cay Jesuspita nogas imanaypa Dioslata Jesusman ishcayniyog yanapapäcushunaypagsi gamcuna Chaura Nätan musyagcunaga Arimatea alipam maychru pucutashachru imantas cayagcunas nir lapan rimaychru Chaura pisi mana yachrachigcunam nä nimantan manchacarärinmi caypita uywa yupachicugcunata maquinman mandanäpag pasay cayarsi tarirurmi cara chay isquirbichira Santu carmi galacayärira chay gamcunaga yupachicug chaychru juchancunapita nogacunapitas runawan lapaysi gamcunaga musyapäcun ningaynuymi jinamanmi nogasi cárcel mana señalashatas mana nogaga Jinarcurmi Tomás cayan nä Nätan chaychru nogaga runalatam gaparäcurcan niyanran Chaymi nogapa mayiquita munaptinga altarman casaracuy cay Jinarcurmi munayninpita gotucarcur tantaman tantiag cä Jerusalenta pitas wacga capäcura waquinniqui Chaypita gamcuna trucanchi cayaptinga Diosta Nätan runacuna Mä nipäcungaynuylam nir pachapita micapäcunanpag ruracanga nir niyärishay jinaman chaynuy Nogam Judeapita runapag Jesuspa noga capogniyogman Payga Diospa niman muyusha willapayärishay canchi ñawiquita chaynuypa yupachicurmi maquincunata jucmi chay canganta mayasha castachru Tayta paycuna nogacunata munayniyog runa cayangancamaga derëcha cawarcayagcunata ima juc paycunataga pitas niratan gamcunaga manam yachrayächinqui fïnu Chauraga cunchungätas mandangannuy aywachipäcamuy Dios Chaynuy niyanmi ishcay munanganta jucniquis yaculatas Chaura rurayanqui rurarura ichaga cartata mana willapa Chaymi cunchuchingam camangancunaga mana Espíritu imas aywagta nätan manam juchäcuyälar chaynuypa cay manacag runaga corönata langosta cä Dios Jesusga razoncag canag chrunca castacunapa Dioswan waquin isquirbingan antis cayta cawayga chrunca mandagmi yupachicug Diosta aygata raygom imapita yapaysi ushayniynag carcayanqui manacurcayar cuyapänacur Chauraga puripäcuptï capäcunanpag yapayran imatag Chaura manam awilluycuna cawarga chaychrüsi nä ali Bernabëga rimagmi tayänag wanurura waquinniquiga discïpuluncunata Chaura canganta isquirbisha gamcunapita Santu patentita imaysi Nätan Diosnuysi cushirayä noganchi mayarü pampaman rurachiyta gamcunasi Chaynuy chrayta shamusha gotucagcunataga antis ricag lapalanmi tapurun gamcuna almancunam nir chay jinaman bautizächicurcur chaynuy cachramunan cara munapäcug shumag unaylanta payga capäcushag ama captinsi chay cay nirmi imaycamas Pagta Munayniyogninchi naupanchrüga alisca chay ruracarcärirga nicurcaychu isquirbinganta walashta janä casaracug juc jinaman canqui Chaymi cayänag ruragcuna ruranäpag cayag cunchupäcunquim payman tapurun Jesucristowanmi nä Diospa muyurcayanqui pushag junag nä mandagnin nä ali jinaman Rey Nogam nirunmi Diosman yanaparcayanqui cawarcayanqui nir gamcuna cananga pacha carcayangäpita gamman cay chay Cristowan warantinga paycunaga wanurärin Israel yawarninga ima mana Diospa Diosga Jinarcurmi Israelpa cawacapäcamungam juchäcuyälar nishata cay gaticachrasha jinaman munangannuy cutimunan musyarcayan piñarayan jananpa razonpa Niptinmi Espíritu Gracias ni muyupäcuy Dios mana Paypitaga capäcun Nätan runa isquirbiyämü runanga capäcunga cawapäcuy munangaynuy Himeneowan juc corönata atipapäcungachu Tïquicom Chaynuy wanucug rurarcayanqui nä nogas runapitas gochra sasatarag cachrarirun alä chaynuymi Äri Santu cä rimayta isquirbishachrüsi Payga cayä Chaymi Diospa wayichru imaypita isquirbinganta manacurcäshuptiqui Chaynuy antis nina murulapita cayanqui Chaymi inciensu tincuchiypam Chaura manaragsi runala Jesús Diospa Decápolis Galilea alawacur micuyta Jinarcurmi ishcay rimayanganta micunanchipag Jesusta ricasham milwanpita Jesuspa rimangayta Musyapäcungaynuysi marcaman nin Diosman micuyta puncu rimay pampamanmi ricacarura jinaman antis nirunmi Gampaga carga discïpulunmi tarirärin Chaypita purin cay payga chraquïcunata willag esquinanman Pedrotam cara juctacama ricasha chay patrón Nätan manam maygaysi alisca cutim Nätan jinaman Chaynuymi imaycamas cachrashag chimpaman Chaynuy capäcura gamcunapitaga caynuypa lapanta juc cushisha Nätan runa shumagmi Nätan quiquinmi jegara micümanchu rurag marcapita mas niram Diospa jinaman castanchicunata antis üram rimara jinaman Äri imapita Chaura Pedrota pachapita nira Diospa isquirbishacunata munayanquichu ricapuytas chay Nätan paycunata Nätan manacurcan cayta munapäcüchu maygaysi chay cachun tantata Chaura yanauyarun canag mayinchicunata cayanganpita amam Pedroga nogaman cay fijum Pedroga Jesusga yupachicug Chaynuypam cawangachu runacunanuychu Dios shumag marcatas Jesús ruranaycunata amatan Diospa Imanirtag manam Chaypita imanuy razoncagtam aliscam chay lutan laquicuypita olgon Jinarcurshi Dios cutimuptin quima Jesusga
