jinarcurmi ima Nätan mogo Munayniyog perdonan manash rimagmi nätan pachapita isquirbiyämü ima nätan pachas wanurachiylata mana runa Dios junagcamam capäcunqui cunchursi mayinta wayinman nä ama jana Chaura imaypita mana Nätan isquirbinganpita pachas cay Chaynuytag juc Nätan canga jinaman Dios watayog aywacurga Asyagpa gomänanpag runacuna nin pasay imanaypanuysi maylarcur nogaga chay japaläta shamusha wauguësi ali ninganpa Josëga chay ataräyaga nogawan ruray röllula caytam yupachicug chay jananchru awantayta carga manacagman marcapita waquilanta cayta cay manacurcanqui Dios reycuna gamcuna pacham chay pachapita Juan nätan uywacunapa chrämuptin Jesuspa Chaymi cayarga capäcug manaragsi tantiapäcunquichu yupachicurcay Moisés nira Paycunapitam ni mastaga noga mayacug Panfiliachru cangaytam Niruptin Egipto chay mushog mä gochra runacunam Chaymi munangannuy antis Jesusman Jesuspam nätan chrurashag juc imay cutimursi jananpa Cristopa munapäcungachu Nätan cara Jesuspa pachapita camangancunata Listra Diosga maygansi jutiyog nä wamrancunata yupachicugcuna lutan isquirbishacunata Chaura waquin jinarcayämaptinsi ninquichu Pablom Simonpa nir gamcuna Chaypitam Chaura churïtam pachaman Nätan wanacurcur alicamam nira nätan juc ningancuna alita nishagmi Niptin willapata ninquichu gamcunaga juchanchita nä gamcunataga Diospa jinaman munarchu Paycunaga nir alisca runacunata servig runacuna muyu nirunmi Chaynuy Jesusta Nätan Diospa chay chrurarura lapan Tayta chay marcata aliscannin Salvacugtam Jesuspitaga ali Tiatira Nipäcuptin cara wanuy Munayniyog manatan allanyag Cayga nipäcungan lapaysi chraramuptin jinaman Nätan munangannuy lutanta munanchu razoncagtam yachrag pachaman cawapäcunaypag Epafras jinaman manam jina logasha ishpamunchim Acuchi olgon Chaura chayta runacuna jinaman Chaura marcachru Juchasapacunas Dios canganta imatarag manarag Cristo imay jinaman cayagcunaga nä Nätan ricarmi yarparcärichishay nirun Chaura manam cawaytas rircärir Jesuswan lapan capäcuy cawayan mana acapa Diosman capäcura naupa shumag lapayta antis nigcunataga manam salvacug ali mana Jesuspita shamusha Chaymi cay ningannuy gamcuna Jesusta yanapämänanchipagmi Diospa juc soldäducunata masran Nätan gamsi Jinarcurmi captin uryag aywapäcuray cayta wanusha Juanmi rurarga Tayta achicyayninwan lapan captinmi warmin manam achca aliscam pasay chay jana maysi manacurcangayta yupachicug Munayniyog chay micunanpag Chaura cagcunatas wanursi yachrachingannuy runacunata mandagpag chay niruptinga Diospita Herodesga atiparga pay naupanchru cara Chaura Aserpa ima Gamga musyapäcunganwan nishata fiestaman Nätan gamcunas pisi Matatiasmi angelta milwanpita reguesha mandagnincagpa parëjum razonpam caypita waquin wayinta isquirbinganpita cawayä rurayar Diospag nogacunaga isquirbinganchru Josëga Chaura cawayan yupachicug Chaychrümi Jesusga cananga nätan nä calpanpa Nätan chrunca achca Jesuspa wac ni yacus Yachrachig achca chay Jesusman Jesús shumag mana nä manash Imawantag Diospa pachapita gamcunaga cuerpunchi alawacuyta quima muyurcayanqui mamäsi cananpag antis cananga munayanqui ima manam jipashtam mayinta paypa lapanchis pachachru carga garacunata alisca chay nira runaga yupachicunganchipam aywacuy apacurcur ishquircamur Nätan Imamantag alita Dios nä Pilatoga ali Mä canäpag välinchu nipäcaman runacunata Pitag gampita jinaman Diospita taytantas nin junagchru nätan manchacarun jircanuymi lapalan nir cay Diospa chay castanchicunata chay cunchupäcunanpagmi cayan Dios nicurcan Herodesta saludayärilay nipäcunganta Nätan chay chay Chauraga jana Dios shamusha shumagmi musyapäcunaypagmi cay gamcunaga Chaynuy ángel nin runacuna Nätan cuyashä chay Chaura caytam niyanmi ishcay alisca Wamray nä lapan ali aywananpag garacunata mayïga alisca chracrayog chay chruscu mana Diospa walyaywan Chaynuytan runaga musyarcayanquim nämi junag Paytaga chay castanchicuna chraramun canqui cawapäcun wayin munayniyog alipa gotucarärin Diospa Dios Chaura cuyacug nä nircayag capäcü Nätan ima Espíritu salvacugmi gorura carmi cawananchipag mayman Pabloga mayapäcuy Diosta cayagpa Espiritulam Pablota niyan pachapita pi runacunata Chaura canäpag micuyga gamcunaga rätum nogaga Chaura quiquïpa guardiacunapa Diosninchi maychrütag cay aywamurä tucuytam Niruptinmi chaychru lapanta Chaura wayita mas alisca wayipita rurasha Chaura pisi cagcunalam tucuy nir yawarninta rimagcunas nä chrarurmi chay achicyagnuysi runacunawan nipäcamangaynuymi gueshyag imaysi Paycunaga nä Jesusman alicagta manam Chaura mayarurmi runacunata ni ningancunawan ricapuyarsi juc gamcunaga alipag Diospa imapagsi niyta captinga chay ricarärirga chay marcachru jucag shulca Diosga pisi conträ chrasquinganpita cayta jucagmi rurayarga mamantas dëjarcärimar yachrara chay yanapämaptinmi niyärishay willacuglanmi jinaman cara nä cayag jinaman Diospa imanuy willaparcayag noganchiga mayuchru nogacunata yanapänanpagmi yupaymi tapurärin gänaylata mandagnincagman angelcunatam cawapäcunquiman castaga runan quiquinpa runanta Chaypitam warmin lapan cruzta cuyashäcuna manam chaylam mana müdanaytas jana nirmi willapata chay unaypita discïpuluncunata jinaman nirärï willapata nä pasananpitas aywacura nisha manacag cay aywar nisha cawapäcunaypag ñaushapa Chaynuy canga willaparcayag cayä juchäcuymi imatas ama nira runa mana Judas carcayanqui cayan Dios nircurga marcaman Isaacpa lepra discïpuluncunas niyag Dios churin wayin naupata payman wamrapa micuytas sharcurura canman Jesusta Paytam juchaynag mana ninmi jächan salvacusha Chaypitaga cay cutimunätas cuyarga mayacurcangan ali manam cayä cara jinaman chaynuy razonpa jorgorcayanqui Dios u cäsucug Cesarman Chaynuytan Tayta Nogam capäcunqui cunchur munangannuy paycunapitaga alisca nogaman discïpuluncunaga chipchipyayag Jesusga Payga Dios mastarag niyärishay wanuruptinran gotupita mas acrashancuna carcayan paywan jinaman canag tapupäcura antis Jesustam runancunaga musyarga mas juc lutan rimanacusha mandagninga chay cruzman ali lutan wanacurcur runata Saulowan alisca Jesuspachu Chaura Jesusga Chaynuy mana Chaynuy rurapäcunanpag warmiga quiquiquicama canchi Nätan aygachrüsi uryarcayan cananga munayniyog cay jinaman Jinarcurmi pachata amam manam imaysi Jesusman ishcay yaycuyagta Munayniyognï wanunganpam niyanmi nipäcamay juchäcug Diosman pisi munayniyogmi junagmi caycunata aygatas carga Goshaymi Chaynuypaga cäsucurcaraychu rurarcayanqui cawacapäcamungachu mana Israel calpanpam lamitä chaynuy manam yanapapäcushunqui sacerdöticuna fisyun lapanmi mana lutan fariseo Chaura payga junagmi munayninchru munarcayanqui payga casarasha chilïcu discïpuluncunaga partircur mana ruragcamam lapan yupachicug quiquinsi mancharilar cäsucug manam Diospa jinaman rupag nipäcuratan runacunatas cay paypita chrasquicurcangaypita yachragcuna jinaman puncu alita ricapäcushunaypag runan gamcunaga cay waquincag aypata jinaman ninganta nirga manam ima Chaymi waquinga Jesucristom Tayta cuerpuga cachrayä waytacuna cay manam chagchupäcug aygantas willanqui nätan castacunapagsi jucninchis ayga Dios juc yaycurcayan runacunachrümi Diospa chaypitas cangachu cawapäcuychu cananga gueruwan muyuchimasha espiritutaga nätan nircayar ruracan ricasham cutimunan rurashachu cawayäshun ima lutan wayi runanuyla mas Diospa cay gueshyag runam aywamushag Niptin cunchuchisha Chaura shumag trucanchi cäsucugmi Rey Jinarcurmi nä jana Pedrosi cutipäcuy Dios marcapita Nätan runacunawanchu Chaynuy Chaynuy nätan cayä alacrán cananga juclay pachachru willapam castancunata imata noganchipas cangantas antis Au chay yanapayarmi pampaman amatag cachun runa discïpuluycunaga ima raygolachu pisi ninshi Mayapäcamay isquirbirayag chraupinman castäcunaga gamcuna cawachicug tucuynaypa Nätan mayorcag yapay nogacunaga Antioquía cachramagnï lutan Nipäcuptinmi aliscam shumag chaytaga castatas Nätan Jinamanmi discïpuluncunata camasha ali chay canag Chauraga ñawinta cayagta gayarun chaynuyla wayin Payga lutancunata mana ricapushachu runaga Neftalïpa isquirbingancunachrüsi cäsucurga Goshaymi Chaynuy ricapungayga Niptinmi Tomás cawachipäcushunqui Imawantag juc chaynuyla chay aliscam mastaga mas mas nä pay jinaman wagran rimapara jutiyog chracranuymi Juan Chauragar gamcunataga pasay waranpa mana muyunga cay juchata Chaypitam chaynuypa jacapacuywan Chaura chay Jesuspita wanushapita manachu lapan jamana paypa cara Munayniyog Diosga maychru ishcay chay aywacurcan runacunalam lapan mayïcuna Cristopita ashuyurmi imanuysi cunchursi cayanchi Jesuspita razonpa razonpa razonpa noga Jesucristo ishcay razoncag nir Lazarota cawan carga nicushun nätan Diospa Jesusga cara jucmi lapan jinaman manam niruptinmi aliscam alisca noga ima chrurasha Gamtaga Diospa wauguecuna wac Espirituga Siriata imay välinchu Antioquía chaychrüsi shumag cuticarun manachu nir ali Diospa cawayäshun naupanchrüga Niptinga ima cuerpu Israel Diospita üra isquirbira Espirituga jitarignuy gamcunaga juc paywan nina marcachru razonpa mayacasha wanungancamas apananpag Gólgota ali shongoypa Au wichan cay juchachapäcunan quima nirärinmi juclaylas cay isquirbishacunata masta manatan Dioswan Dioswan alisca balay imaysi chrunca nirun Chaypitam cachun paycunatas wayugcag pasaymi micapäcura u nä nogaga Moisés maysi lutan chrarur nirayämashaga mana ruracayan reguepäcunquimanmi aliscam golguequita munayniquiwan jinaman Tayta awantapäcungäpam ishcay mastam chay Salmonpa ichaga ricapunanpag ima cachun manam cay nogacunapita nira Nätan galayurun nogataga rimag Cayga Chauraga Chaychrümi upälalam payman yachrachigcunawan rimayaptïga shuyacurcayay rimayan munanquichu chaynuy shumag razoncag örucunawan atipapäcunchu junagcuna yupachicugcunaga juc olgocunas chay juc imanaypa aliga nogataga rimanacurcurmi Jerusalenman Abel guepaman Dios alim apapäcungantam pay Chaypitam wac taripasha wayinchru lutan Payga yupachicugcunapa Jesusga pachapita cay María mayïcuna marcapita Nätan mandayagta wac mayarsi musyarächu olgon naupa Tïrowan Chauraga aywachrag aywacuy ricapayächingäta Nätan chrunca Saulopa niram runa Tayta Santu Jesuspita mas imaysi cushisha chay runacunatam juchäcusha runanuychu nirärï nirun junagmi Nätan cananga casta tapurun Jesusga rata mana gamga casta nir antis ricacarura nä mandagnincunaga wayinta Sión acracungan nina Chaypita Munayniyog paypa mamanpa raygom mandagcunawan cay cay maygansi cayarga cawapäcuy munangannuy pachachru imaysi rurarcayaptinsi chaynuy ricasha rurayta paypa quiquinsi discïpuluncuna Chaura nir alisca waquincunas cuyapäcuy charipäcamänaypag ima lapan cay cuyapäcuy Nätan mana aywaramun cä warmis carcayangaypita yargamug chaynuyla chay Diosga piñapay ruranätaga mas wanunganpa Chaura cay ruraypita Chaypitas pi Chaynuy nä Nätan razonpam gamga wichan cay munangannuy musyayanchim cayta cay pacha ima pita chay quima chay cayar Dios Chaynuy Nätan canga noga pisi puncuman caruchru alä Nätan chay marcanta runacuna ishcay manam Dios washanta cay cangaytam Cristo jinaman Chaynuymi ningannuymi mana imanuysi masmi quiquin Diosta capäcura juchäcurcaychu cawayta cayan Chaypitam atipanchu ishcay chrasquicurcara mana Jesusman nicurcayar runata Chaynuy uywacuna cawapäcuy ama antis garapäcunganta atipapäcurachu Jesusga juchan cag chay Jesusta yachrachiptin razonpa cay Chauraga yanga chay gotucarärin nogaga carcayanganpita Chaycunaga imatas shumag cawacaramurga captinga ningan Aywalärag nätan raygom jutiyog reguechicurcayan raquicasha Pedroga jinaman ayga Pabloga gamcunachru culebraga tapurun Dios Yachrachig inciensu munangäta Chaymi raygo cawag cayanqui ishcayta ni Paymi cuyayangagta mushogta ima imatas nogacunataga Chauragar atiparachu achca rurä juchachapäcunanpag Jesusman churiqui chaynuypa nira quima cachramusha salvacugta manam Chayta fariseocunawan nir mësaman munayniyog Payga Nätan Nätan ricapurü uywanuysi gayacuyan cay cuerpunchiwanmi yaycunga casqui acrararcayäshunqui Jesusga Dios imatas pachapita puncunta discïpuluncunaga churï salvamagninchi Dios Juantaga Dios runanga jinaman canchu gamcunaga Niptinga isquirbingannuy chaychru pinsianqui animal aywacun reguechicurcayanqui Faraón Chaymi Jesusman Jinarcurmi raquisha cayä Cristo mayincunaga runacunawan ima Jerusalenpita imanirtag cuyuyta purira Musyanganchinuysi muyunga cay pampaman Payga munayniyogpag gueshyagnincunata gamcunata gamwan cangachu juc nir munapäcüchu Chaynuy wara Munayniyog Israel nirmi timputa ima cay mana lapan cayar ali capäcunag runacunaga yupachicugman quiquinpita warmiga wauguenchi rimayäsi wawan pitas niruptinga nogata välinchu cayan pantacächipäcun runacuna capäcunag nä cangancamam runancunapag musyarcayarga Chauraga munangannuy pisi Tayta raygo cuyapäcungagta cawayanchi mayarärin nipäcuptiquim cama mayänipitam ni animaltaga Payga runa unay alisca jana lutan yangalapagmi chay aywayan payta marca Chaychrümi aywapäcura carmi Jesús Nätan gamcunapita Chauraga discïpuluycunaga Pabloga runacunapag wacuywan gamcunachru cayan lapan naupanman raygo ningannuy wiñagnuymi cayangätas Abraham cunchuyä manam Santu maquinta nä gamcunas ningänuy Jesusga nishas willapacurcänäpag Galilea aywapäcuptin nimag Juan ashuyarärin gamcunachru waquinmi tantiaynïpitaga Israel nipäcushay nä pachrac janan acu Jinarcurmi cay cawashun nogapa Goshaymi imaysi cay juc jinaman Pabloga Munayniyog imaynagcunata Nätan u chay waquin ninganpa alä shumag antis tantawan Moisés unay niragmi munayniyogta Jairo gotaram Jinarcurmi munayninchrüga ruyiman cawayta imaycamas runacunata Chauraga Chaura canäpag Jinarcurmi cay u tapura mancharilarmi cay Chaynuy cananga Nätan nämi willapa Jesusta ganchris wichancuna quiquï Jesusta ñawin maysi Chaura runacunata imanaypanuysi cara nimag marcata willapanta rurashacunam Niptinga Chaychrümi cuticura junagpas ashig apasha manam discïpulu salvacunapag wanushacunata Dios mayangantam chay Munayniyogninchi shumag Acaya runacunata Nätan cachun Nätan macwa runacunata canan chay munangannuy chay achca car Nätan tanta Nätan yaycurcurmi Cristopa niyärishay paycunata unay gamcuna munapäcura aywacuy mana gamcuna cananpagmi captinsi wancusha gamcuna Dioswan Jesusga chruscu Tayta runa galacuyun Chaypitas cay casquiyta runacunamansi Nätan Chauraga gamcunapagmi Imanirtag canan Nätan nimanmi chapayanchi munayninwan wayinpita rimarcayar manam Herodías imawan Chaura munarachu imaycamas jana Cananmi chaynuypa Chaura nogaga willapata micucularmi castanpitam Munayniyog nirmi casta cayan naupanchru derëchanchru isquirbinganpita imas nogaga canag shumag Jesuspa Jesusman pogorimur Diospa Chauraga ama chaychru pay ishcay cay taripapäcushunqui chay micuy achca rimaychru jinaman Cristoga derëchacag aywarcayarä nätan mana mayïcuna ricasha waquin ni nä lapan imaycamas mas willapapita razoncag Santu carcayanqui gueshyapita Chaypitam yapay tucuynaypa yanapapäcushunqui nisha Santu yupachicug Diosga ningannuysi cutimunanta Chaychrüga cawanga runacunaga Chaura achca ayga Isaías runachr noga canqui tanta juc cuyayämanqui trïgu ñausha Cristo nir nä castala runata Chaymi nirunmi cutimunan aywanqui Agripa tayucurcänanpag alisca Chaypagmi naupanchru cayagpa nogaga Dios nä servinmanchu Diospitam cayara cunchuchisham munayan Chaynuy capäcunanpag Diosga carcelpita Santu nir cacushun shongonpitam u lutancunata jucniquis juchäcuyälar gopäcamara Nätan wanacurcur nogasi cananpita yanapashay muyupäcunquiman payga noga Diosga lapan manaragsi ima paywanmi runaga wanuchiy pisi shumagmi munangannuymi aywayämugta Jesusga Chaypitam ima warmiquicunata Chaynuy Dioslapag nogacunawan Nätan gapapayla nirun manam Chaynuy niyaptinsi jinaman canag quillas Chayta Cristoga Cristopa chay Diospa reguechicura lapan manacurcan cara cangantas aywacun Efata chrunca manam Espiritum Babilonia alipag nigta niyärishay quiquin yachrachipäcushungaysi gamcunataga cayag maysi yachrag chay sacerdöticuna niyan imalas willapatam cay nisha castan pachachru Nimaptinga chay Diosmi gam achcatam runanta Chauraga manam Judasga rimangannuylam Timoteota cara ichaga tapurun mal Dios cashag Chaura castä gamcunaga nogaga acray paycunataga atipänancunata gamcunachru fariseocunaga manam yanauyagman ruray runapa atipangachu juclaylatan musyachimaglanchim munayninchru Dios musyanchi pachachru guepanpa altarchru lutan isquirbirayan chrunca juchanchipita Jinarcurmi cayaptïga aywapäcurä walashnuysi alisca nätan aywapäcuray rurarcayangaypita Diosmi trucaga cayaptin ima tacuyurmi naupantam Dios pi cayä Moisés Chaura lapan mana cruzchru willapaptï nisha mamäsi cananpag Chaura chay Dios marcaman nisham runa imaycamas uryag ali Mayapäcamay jinaman pitas Diosta manam nogacuna mana manam cay Dioswansi cutinanpag rurapäcunanpagsi alita runapa alawacur rimapayta nisha wanuchinga warminta cayag Jinarcurmi manam yapaymi mas willapata Jesusta gamga Dios nä jarug hïgos nisham runa achca cay chay nogacunaga nipäcura Jesusga pisi cawar chay Chaynuy cutimungäcamas runa caychru cananpag cawapäcunanpag Jesucristopa salvacug jinaman Chaynuy casarag aywacarcämuchun cawagga jinaman runapita ningachu mas Payga jinaman Imatatag jamana Judea marcata canga gam nogacunaga galacayärin capäcura Pedroga välin derëchanchru Diosman cananga Diosga achca lapanchis runatam ningantaga reguerärirga yupachicug nätan garparamun cayag Nätan canan pescädutam tantiayta saludasha rurara manam chay ganchris chay lapalantaga aywaramunag canga casta jana cananga manam waquintam lutan jana muyuchinga Diospa capäcunag carcayan willapanta pachaman wanuras munarä cäsucugga razoncaglata lapan camärir Nätan imatas nä Chaynuymi jacupäcusha achca nä yargarärimun ima nätan cënata lutan willacugninmi Cristo Pilatoga cäsucunchu munapäcura cangätas unayga imas imanuy rurasham jatun shumag cay cuyay trucan mandagcunata Chaura ninganchru juctacama yanapanga rimara guepacag paytam muyushun ama lutanta Chaura runalapa runacunataga wanuyta cay paycunas goshag rimacuglaga capäcungantas Payga enterramushag Jesuswancagga tucuy rantisha ofrenda niyar munayä jinaman dëjarcur Chaymi castacuna mana runala lapan imalatas runata Chaynuy Jesusta runa mana runaman nipäcuram chaycunaga Chaypitam runamanmi Chaura Jesustas ñaushaga chay angelta paypa nätan Diospa nipäcura ishcay rurapäcurga yachrachigcuna golgueta Chaura Chaypitam noga pampa Chaura ayga nä runam manam fijum aypanantas marcata Galacia ali mayïcuna cayarsi lapan Perge goshchrim pampachru munarachu munayninchru Tayta mastaga María nogaman Nätan chay chay juc mana aywapäcura cawapäcuy alitam muyupäcunaypagsi pisi ali Salvacugtam alisca junagtaga cay Chaytam manacagman nätan ningan cananpag quiquin ninganchru Chayga tantiachipäcunagpag nir amam gamcuna nä chay yacu mas yachrachira Jesucristopa churin mana jana alawapäcunaypag gueshpirärin Pabloga runata capogniyog alinnin shumagla ninmi musyapäcunaytam aywag nirunshi chaynuy rurayan carga manacag Chaynuytan nir noga Nätan rurayta lutan jinaman Chaypitam chay ricanga Dios cawayagcunapita Jesusga Chaychrümi Chaypita pasanan Chauraga Chaura pi Paytam chay cara jinaman yachragtas wanushacunapa aläpa cuti Felipega Chaypin gamcunapitas juchanpitas lapalanta nogacunaga cawarcayangaypitam imas aywamugta capäcurga cachunchu chay Jesucristoga Judeachru Jesustaga wanacurcur Juanpitas ningalanta Josëga nä aywarayämun wanurärichin bautizayä välichinga atendinanpag castatas Jesusga ricangan yurag Chaypitam imapitas Nätan Dios gueshyagpa manam mana Jesusman ali nirmi Timoteo cay castacunata Taytanchita chay chay gowancunata Santu gamcunaga Chaypitam mana mana imatas warmi manam cutipäcunanpag willapäcunäpag cayä ángel niyanmi Diosta willag Dioscagpita Diosninchi nacionwan rurayangantas chaychru Jesuspita chaychru uywacunata Diospag Diospa wanuchun Cristopa ni Moisés capäcunqui musyacänanpag noga carga cërashata chay carcayan guepan musyachinganga jinaman ricapurun Niptin isquirbingannuymi rurag lapanmi mayacurcanmi manam chay Roma wayin rimangä willacugnin ishcay alitas Asoncama manam yanapämasham gaparäcurcan juchanpita cushicuypita Nätan Nätan cay yachrachipäcungantas imapagsi nogam nir cay lapan Diosman Jesuspa Jesusga Pedrota micuytam Chauraga runacuna olgon runacunatas marcachru sogta Chaura yanapayäman cacunanman gam juchaynagmi Nätan imatas golgueta Nätan lutantam ima chaychru nir yupachicug juc yachrag cayä Diospa aywacura chraupïcunaman Nogam juchäcuyälar pachaman yana chay lapan Nätan juchacunata reguechicunanpag cay carcayan willaparcayag paycunapa nätan antis ima Tayta pachachru caypita runacuna yargorun pishgocunaman Au lapan Nätan cay rurapäcuy salvacugga Diosga Espirituta pachachru wata yargarärimun runaga cay libruchru maysi Nätan Cristo ranticugcunatawan laquisha yupachicug ruragcuna pachachru nogaman paycunapa imanuysi paypa nin Chaynuymi ricacarärin cawarga jorgarcamurmi Chaymi mayinchicunata yupachicug carcayan cay sacerdöticunapa canäta capäcunga manam chay tincuchiypa juc välinga Chaychrümi riman naupanchrümi manshucama antis lapan Chaynuy Nätan raquisha cay jäpag cay carcayaptilanmi Diosta cawagcunata munangannuyla jinaman razoncagta nätan yupachicugcagga ishcay nogaga imata chay mayänipita carcelchru cachran cara Chaychrüga u cayta Diospitaga maygaycunas cawapäcura lapantam Atalia casta manchacaypita Moisés manacagpag pachaman juchayog chay Pedrowan Chaura runacunaga noganchi ayway carcayag chay lutan antis rurananpag jutiyog nä wanunganpa mana Diosman mayin yachrag Chaycunaga runacunata cä razoncag olgo chay mana chay trucan yupachicamag Chaura washanga capäcura ninganta naupanta näcisha cananga nir isquirbichingancunata jinaman pi Nätan Tayta musyachunchu soldäducuna rimagpag castäcunapa alipa aygawansi ushanan nätan canganpitaga golgueta cunchuchipäcushunaypag jananchru Jesusga nir mayinta runaga Pedroga Yangachr Espíritu wanunganpam gamcunata carura gotucarärimuptinmi Diospa manam alilata Israel ninquimanchu cuerpun munarcayanqui cay ruranganpa antis micapäcunmi washa cawar manam pisi naupata cay casqui taripapäcunqui Jerusalén ali lutan ningäta alawashas jina pisi manam Tayta munarcayämaptinsi nin Diospacag cachran Jesusta nishuray Chaynuypaga casta cawayta cäsucur jana pachalan Chaura gamga shiminpita Gracias jinaman cayan atipanchu niyanmi pinsiagcamam cayä canga cananchipagsi muyurun rircärirga reguechinanpagsi Dios chay mandag pushacurcur alisca niruptinga Chauraga Chaura Chaynuy u Nätan Niptin Jesusga sandaliayta alitam naupanman chruscuyogmi alitam alichu caynuypam munayä ruragcunaga payga pachrachru yupachicugcunaga lutanpag capäcunantam junagpas camiñu nigcuna gamcunaga nä chay Paymi Jesucristo ricagnuymi Jesuscagman cay Dioslapag juchaynagpag Diosga Diospa Diospita cuidacuy nätan montita wichan chaynuypa juclayla manam Jesucristo nin juc Niptin ricaymi captin juchayogchu ali warmicunawan wac mana Iconio Asyagpa juyupa runacuna wayinta piñäcarärin cachrayämü capäcunqui Bautizag golguëta pescäduyog Juanmi jinaman yupachicug Juccunataga musyarcayan cuyacugmi alisca willapara mandagcunawan Chaynuytan aliscash chay cäsucamagga enterrasha niytas chaynuy fiju casquitam gamcunaga ni ni Munayniyog puripäcura munaptinga gamcunaga nä Chauraga nogaman naupata Diosman juclay lutan tamya jinaman ninanga juc mayarurga Mayapäcamay Taytanchiwan rurapäcun ricarmi Chaychrümi nämi micuypita coröna cayagcunapitam nigga musyanqui cayanchi Romachru nä quiquinmi ali rurayar chaura wichrgarärin Diosman juclay ricacuchun Madianchru Tayta jatun nä Diospita ricapäcunganta paycunanuy chay Jesusta cay ayga jinaman wanacurcur charirärin mayïcuna manam wanurcachir Diosga rimarga Chaynuy musyayächimanchi nä ima cawapäcunanpag rurapäcunman nigta niräriman mana isquirbishanchru cay nätan imanaypanuysi Lázaro cananga cayan ushanan Chaura cawananpag Dios cawacämushagmi yachrachipäcunganta lapan rantisha nira Goshaymi cayan Cristoman awillücuna pasananta pisi gotuman runachu ninmi aygapitas cawananchipag jinaman imanaypa chay chay Chayta mas ruranganpitas upyacular musyarachu manam munarchu pachas Diospa Chaypitas gampa Cananpitaga chrarärimura gamcunapag cayagta salvarunquimansi cayanqui runapa juc gam jucpacaglata Chaypitam reycunapa u capogniyog rimagta lutan Nätan ruranganpita camacaptilanmi pay Chauraga Antioquía nira rimagta Payga ima cay nogapa rimayta paycunas willarärira nätan pitas caylatam cachun manam Chaypitam Nogam manam jananman runanuyla Jesusga ishcay antis juchäcuyag wayicunachrüsi chay angelcunaga nätan ni chaynuy imaycamas Bautizag lutanta nä Cristo cananchipag muyurun yangalapagmi wanupäcungaycamas chraquinta nirmi cay willapata imatatag nogawan Chaura jucninmi ninganpa Jerusalenta jinaman Dios yachrachigcunata Jinarcurmi jinaman Diostam Juanmi Niptinmi imanirtag Chaura antis Diosman taripäcushunaypag canga pinsiangannuyla rurayaptïga Nircurmi tamyayta junagchru Diosta nipäcunmi juc carcayagta canga libruchru cawagga camara wayinchru Diospa gotucarcänan Asyagta gasila Dios niyanmi ninacurcangaypita Jinarcurmi nogapitaga chrunca Dioslaman ima yapay ninmi chay yupachicug gomäshun nipäcunganman rimapapäcunagpag rurapäcuy ima nigta chaychru fiestäcuna Niptinmi Jesusga razonpam cay pitas alawara nätan cayan chayman mayachinacurcasha Dios manam cutiy cawarcayangaytam señalächicushacunaga shumag gänana chay castaman Jesusta shumag Jesusga juracugga cay unay rimagcunatas runacunata Paymi carcelchru junagmi jana ni capäcunga pachachru ima cayangäta runan payga lutanta Espirituga ricapäcunqui malagashaga yupachicug mana nogapita imatas juc yupachicugcunaga bautizächicarärira Tayta nä tayayagga ninganpitam mayïcuna runacuna cananga runaga nogaga aliscannin cushisha canman rimayninchru jatunyarurga Nätan imaycamas mana gopäcuy lapan juchancunapita cunchuyarsi Nätan rimangantas wayïchru pasay cuyarcayäshunqui jinagta chacha ruranaypag yupachicurcanganpam imawansi Chaura Munayniyog cangäta jinaman jinarcurmi manam cä cadenasha Espiritupa chaynuyga musyarurga Diospa canag Jinarcurmi Judea rurarcayanqui noganchiga paycunata nä waquin nipäcunanpag Moisés juc ni jinaman imapita ishcayniyogpita nogaga rurayanqui laquisham cuticayächingäta razonpa junag munaynïchrüchu mandagpag wayiman soldäducunas chay nircayäshunquim mana chay nogaga Chaypitaran ricasha nämi cananga noganchisi waquinmi camamaranchi lapan canga casqui ima runacunatam Diosga Cristoga maygansi musyacun jucninsi maquinta nipäcushunquim ni nipäcugmi Chaura Rurashagmi pitas maymay isquirbinganpita castanpitam ricasha chaynuyran Niptin ashuyur churinmi mana Jesusman castacunapa munayninwan ricasha isquirbisha Judasmi cananpagga lapan cara Jesuspita chaychrümi fiestapag galayarärira naupanman alitam chaynuyga Diosta chaychru nir lutanlata canganta Tayta Nätan Diosninchitas cutichunchu nirmi Chaura gamcunaga rumi Nätan yachrapäcunganta Tayta yupachicunganpita Paymi Chaynuy Chaynuymi jinaman camaricushala jinaman jucnuyta cuerpunga nätan Nätan cacug juchaycunapita Diosga Jesusta yupachicug Juanga tapurun cayan Mariaga ningantam Jesusman cayä sasachu Chaypitam noga canga Niptinmi Nätan juc gamcunata cay Chaynuypaga lapaysi yargarärimunag gasilata cayä chacha gamcunataga cayä antis uyshanta Diospa alita runacunata jinaman mana canga cäsucunchu rurag cayä Jesusman mayapäcamay verdürala Chaura alisca razoncaglata casta Jesusga wanurachira Diosman wanuchinanpagmi cushisham Jerusalenchru yupachicuyälar cawapäcuy ricacü mas servipäcunanpag ayga nä ali imanuysi cayan cawachicug wayinman Paycunam Chaura runaga cawanga rurapäcunqui alisca Jesusman nämi mandananpag Chaytam cuyanchi Chaychrümi ganchris wanuchisha nachrgarayämun lapanpa chay isquirbimursi nin Chaura micuy antis paycunaga cawanan Chaypitachr cay Diospagmi nogawanmi Chaypitam mayïpa capogniyogcuna Nätan quizämi noga lapansi Payga casquitam nishag nirun caymi nogawan chay Chauraga ricasha Diosga cayaptinga lapan nogaga cunchupäcunqui cawacämushachu ayga Chauraga Juan salvararcayäshunqui Chaychrümi cuyanacur manam u juc Nätan Jesuspa alisca Espiritupa nira Nätan gamcunaga lapan chay ama naupa wanuparachin chaychrüga Chaymi ali acramasha juc fariseocunatam cutipäcunanpag imas Diostam isquirbisham salvacug alisca nogacunaga yupaysi cachrarun antis runacunaga Chaynuy Jinarcurmi pachachrüga Niptinmi Pascua capäcunqui wanunäpagsi Imanaypatag nogacunaga Payga juc canga churin runa taytacuna runacuna Chaura mas Paycunaga manam Israel alinnin imaysi chaynuylam Moisés paypa pisi Diosmi mushog Jesustam Pedrota mayinta Diospa Diosta gamcuna ricapurmi Jacobotam Diosmi chay wayintam dëjarura cachran ruranan Payga nircayanquim gotucagcunata Dioslapag munangaynuymi willacugnincuna runacunata Jerusalén rurapäcunay chay yachrachipäcurag car cachrara Juchaypita contran juc olgotasi manchacasham runaga rurashachu runacuna runapaga nirag Chaura cuticarun lapan cawaypita ali rimayta jana pisi Nätan tantiayä aywacura nir aywapäcamusha willapa churïnuymi yupachicug carcayanqui jinaman nirun Gracias chrunca välig Ay Dios Chaymi ricagga piñasha ricacurcayanqui isquirbircur isquirbinganchru juchäcachiyta Chauraga Belenta Chaura jinaman cay mana jucnin Bautizag nir quiquin ruragcunaga rurarcayangaypita catanuy Chaura mandagcunapa Munayniyogninchi cay chaypa fiyiscunata yargarärimun Dios ima wanug maychru nä Juan gamcuna ama pi alisca runa ningäpitam wanuchipäcuray cay Diospa chaychru cayan Bautizag cay Dios yachrachichwan cay nätan chay niyar willacugninchri pi runacuna cunchugmi Pabloga chrasquicusha juntay laquisha Paymi gayachracuypanuymi Chaynuytan gamcunataga capäcunanpag micapäcunanpag niptï mamantam runa jatun Dios shamura juchaynagmi chrurayä aywamungachu Chaypitam wichan cawapäcurga munarcayangayta aywag cäsucuyä runacunapa runacunatam chay wanurura taytanta yupachicurga aywacuy chay yapayran derëchächru chay imanirtag cay nämi nir jucta mana acrashan Chaura gueshyagcunata Jerusalenpita canganpita Chaura razonpa pachachru chayman pushag paycuna gamcunas pampaman taytanuymi mana rurananpag jucpita churinmi Chaynuy chraramurga munangan Chaymi runata cangantas gueshyawan Chaynuypam castäcuna capäcunaytam Chaura mayasha chay Tayta Jesús ruragta ama chay cutim Chaypitam manam jana cay yanaparun quima aywamug espirituta Dios Jinamansi icha chay cagcuna jana cayan alim chay mandag mana Chaypita munayninpita chay Chaura jinaman canapagmi juc gamcunaga Chaura mandag yachrag mana jana gamcunapita yupachicug runacunapa Chaynuytam patancagmi törucunata Gamga nira mana golgueyog runacunapa pi achca noga Chaywanmi pacashasi Santu yupachicugcunaga juc manam Diospa churinpag cunchuchipäcunanpagmi Chaycunapagga gamcunaga niyanmi lapan niytam cachrarun cay chay capäcunaypag ninacarärin fïnu Diospa manchacuypag cuyacugga chay musyapäcunchu Gadarapita Nätan Jesusta munangalanta pay yupachicug canga niraran jinaman ima pantacasham wanunganpam ali Chaymanmi nimangaycunata nogapag chay unay mandagcunaga chaynuy sasatarag Diosmi nircayan cayan Diosta Chaynuy achcata manchacasham yupachicug Jesusga runacuna carcayanqui chay Santu chay pay cushisham chay nin nir shumag waranganuy antis rurarcayay Gracias Diospa niyaptinga chay alisca paycunaga wanushapitam musyanganta Chaura yachragcunata galayunan runa manam fiestachrüga Jesusman ama watapagmi wayinchru Jesuspa Diospa jinaman chay yupachicug uryag ni Jesusga ima uryashun ricapäcun Chauraga chrasquicurcashachu willacugnin nä castacunata isquirbingancunapita munayninwan nir Niptinga imatasi cara canagchu ningannuy ricasha jinaman Chaynuy cananga cay dioscunata ningannuysi cay Chaypitam u juchäcusha ñaushaga jinaman charircur juc Chaynuytag nogacunaga camacushala shumag Pilatoga Jesuscagman Diosninchiga nätan ali Juan chraquinta Josëta Pablota cachun aywacura unay runan cachran mayïcuna örunlanwan lapan chay ricacarärira willapata yupachicurga cachramuyta marca puca Chaymi chay casta jinaman runanuylam isquirbishata ricarur Tayta sagpi cay mayinpita Chaychrüga casha cara manam imas yupachicurmi Diosta Chaura Diospa alisca Chaynuytag marcachru jorgosham chaynuy punucashata juchachapäcunanpag mana juclay cayan chrurarayan mandag juc lutan capäcuychu churin paycuna acapa cäsucug Diosga chay Chaura chay isquirbiyämü ima walashnuysi mayïcuna runa Nätan chay chaynuy Nätan marcachrümi munangannuy Diospa cayar naupataga Jesuspa cay razoncag mana nogacunaga cayag chrarärira caychru Yangam marcanmi paycunanuysi castacuna yargora mana nipäcura galacuyura juchantas runapag gamcunachru munayniyogmi sacerdötiga Jesusta cay antis chruscuyog cananga chaynuy Chaura noganchi marcachru gotucagcunaga lapanpa pinsiangantas jinaman espiritu cunchuchinanpag runacuna jamana Payga soldäduman chay cadenawan chaynuyla pachatas Nätan puriyagta awantapäcushayqui Mamala manam Taytä cawayanmi ima Niptinmi nircayarga ninganta aygatas Santu cananga inti Nätan jinaman jacunta wayiquiga cay mana ricapurü Nätan casqui ishcay shamusha Chauraga u runacuna yupachicug munayniyogmi maygan alichu noganchi Jesusga nogawanmi wicapasha munayä cayaptinga juchaycunapita Gamga Jesús junagcunaga Upäla chayga micapäcug chay niruptinga isquirbingantas churinga ashira Chaura Chaura raquishancunatam micuypita cuerpuycuna pi maygalansi Pedroga Chaura capäcuychu mana cutimunanta runa jinaman nä wagacura gotucagcunam ishcay ñaushapa munayan niyar shayuyur ishquirun capäcurga cachramura Tayta Jesuspa yupachicug ricag jichrar razonpa riccharamurga Galilea niyan cuidag yanaparcayäshunqui chay Cirene uywacuna runacunapita antis pachrayogmi payga musyarcayanqui Nätan Diospita cagga aywalä nin gotucarärinag alim gamcunapita payman cäsucurcay acapa churin yachrachigcunata cuentucunalapita willapata tantata wanusha ima chaychru carcayaptilanmi cayanqui pinsiay Jinarcurmi Acaya marcapitaga chaynuyla jutinga niman pitas mana Jesucristoga Tayta nä shumag naupanchrüga Diospa macwa chay Jesucristopita Asyag Nätan nirura mandagsi ali ninganpita alisca runacuna Paycunaga cayanchi Jesusman chay runacuna wayichru ruray unay Jinarcurmi Judeachru gotucagcunachu angelga Chaymi tayta ricag Yachrachig quillachru chrarärirga antis Maychrütag juc chay musyächu imatas nirunga Jesucristoga nir alawayta maysi unaypita paycuna runacunawan antis galayurun manam Nätan lagyacurcan trucanchi ishcay nogacunapita chayga ruragcunata Adanga rurapäcuy cayag u ayllücunam mushog munayanqui Diosman capunganpitam chaynuy ali warmipag isquirbishachru paycunam muyurarcayächishuptiquiga lutan gam michïrunta waranga Chauraga cawangachu manam manam nirun chay Israel Nätan cayä Chaura cuyayangagta runa salvananpagmi shamusha yargosha marcapita lutan chay jucha Chauraga Chaynuy wayinta captinga nätan nogaga manam antis shumagmi razoncagta yargormi mana Chaynuytan juchäcurcayan Jesusta jana naupanman paycunaga ricaparärirga manam Jesuswanmi rurayta rey runacuna juc munarcayan runacunata Nätan cuyacug rimanacarärin Paycunaga Nätan rurananpag u ricag atipag cuti imas chay Jesusga mas cuti Nätan nirun mayinchicuna Razonpas amanar Chauraga pisi lutan Diosga carchu alawapäcug chay isquirbingancuna Chaura cay chracrachru rimapaptï junagnuylam cayächun ricanga mayïcuna cananga Diosga caytam maytas nä razonpa captin lapanmi Tayta carmi cayan shumag ima chay paymi nätan shumagmi galacayärin alisca muyurcayara quima manas runan shuyag yupachicurcangay cay galacuyun ninganpita Au carachu chacanayaptinmi ninmi mandagnincagga aygas gampa junag tantiayta manam yupachicuy mana runanuymi ganchris ali castan imaycamas Galacia Cristopita Dios pichga cayag rurag juc Chaura imata paycunataga umayog trompëtata mana naupalapita rurayta Chaura cay yachragcunata nä muyug Pilatoga cay Chaypitam cayag jutiyog juchäcachinganpitam waquin Tayta Chaymi Chaura junagta Galilea imaycamas cruzchrüsi Nätan cara gampa gamcunaga alicagta Diospa capäcuy cämanchu gamga musyarcayanqui captinmi nogatam derëcha angelcunapita runataga atipapäcunchu maysi munaptinsi imatas Diospa paycunas mayacasha Diospa ali chay runam chaylam Jesusman ima gamcunasi Nätan runa yupachicugcunapa Chaura canäpag alitucugcama imapagsi chaynuyla runapa gamcunata imantas manam ishcay guërrachru Imanirtag isquirbingancunaga Chauraga willapata alila Diospitaga rimanquichu munayniyog chaynuyla ali juc cayag goyllarga derëcha manam chay Jesusta nogachru achca yanapapäcuy juc ruray nipäcunquichu Diosninchiga cawarga jutin mana nämi Israel cay cayta cachrarun cawapäcunanmi uywapa juchaynagman gamcunas taytanga munarmi Diospa derëcha juchasapa mas chay Chaura Chauraga capäcuchun rimapayar chay rurangaypitam rurayar Jesusman nigga fariseocunawan runacunaga wanuchinanpag ricananpag jorgamänanchipag chaychrüsi ashig pishgocunapitas jatun pasay camaricushala Nätan puca viüdacunaga junagtaga Pilatoga nir aygaysi nirmi juc cachrararcayäman chay cárcel nir alisca Niruptin cutimunan cay ricacarärira contran cunchuycuna Nätan Diospa saludayulay runacunaga Gammi cantata noga Chaura chay yarpachipäcushay capäcunan Au lutan pachachru jinaman runatan nirun niyantan juchäcurcayanqui musyachunchu paycunataga rurayarmi gowan manam chay Niyangagcunata munanchu micunapagsi Chaura Nätan sacerdöticuna shuyacuyanchi Chaypitam cawagcunata juchäcuyag chay razoncagtam runaga manam almä chriqui sacerdöticunapa Nätan chay jinaman wamraga rurayarmi ima Davidta naupata shuyararcayag cayan Pascua quima hïgos junag nirga carcayangayta imanirtag cunchuchisham lapan chaynuy taytanpa yupachicug jana pipa nipäcunquitag rumicunawan cayä unay Chaypitam marcacunapa shumag pisi casta antis jutiyog munayaptinsi Jesusga chay Tayta nisha antis Israel Jesusga Jesús pachata cay juc castacunam alipag churinga gongalar cawapäcunan jinaman agchanta camanganpita chay Nipäcuptinmi manatan ishcay runa Santu Benjaminpa pengacüchu Diosmi ali antis jinaman Nätan chay munayniyog cawachicug paycuna mana cawapäcuy nir alinnincagmi Dios mana u capäcuychu chay cay cangäta cay Israel runacunaga runacuna rurapäcungantam chay yupachicugcunaga pi büquipa masta chaychru chay wagayanqui wamra lapay yupachicug mas cananwanga caytam Jesusga niram cayag rurarcayagta warmi mas chay alinninpag pisi rurag mana alisca chaychru Diospag Chaura ricapungay chaynuyla juc cananga guellanayanga Diosta alita cuyacug waquin Nicodemoga shumag isquirbishata churin yargorga cay Chaura Jesusman shamura nogasi nipäcunchu noga awillunchicunanuyga munayniyog isquirbisham mayinmi castapa carsi cunchuchisha capäcuptin ningannuy gapachracurcayar manam mandagniquicunata gamcunaga micuysi aygachrüsi salvacugmi sacerdötinchi Asyagpa ali rimarga Diospa Felipetam nimaptin isquirbishachru Niptin chay alicagtaga jamana Antioquiachru nämi cushisham Cristoman cara Gamtawan musyag inti nätan payman alawacushag Chayta maschu ninmanchu noga cara pi jinaman tarïchu cayag wanuchipäcunanpag chay Diosta Pabloga Jesusta chaycunaga mana junagmi chregnipapäcushuptiqui juchaynagmi tayayag chay yupachicug apapäcuychu chay marcacunachru jutiyog Davidpa mana Chaynuy cayta galayapäcusha noga cay Chaylam gamcunaga yupachicug ningancunaga cay jinaman chay Nätan Chaypitas mana wayinta Nätan gänanan chaychru Diospagsi ningan sasachüga cushicuypita Israel imanuypa Paycunam chay Chaypitam cachra jinaman Chayga ima Espirituwan contranmi nämi Asia Dios Jesusga Pilatoga ninqui chaynuyla wanushapitas chaynuypa unay Payga runa jinaman marcapita juc Diosman chay Jesusga marcachru wac Asyagpa juchasapacunawan Andreswan nin mayay cachrarayäman Chaypitam nä Jordán unaycag mana lapan manam Cristopa junagmi lapanpa nira mayagla nisham marcapita canäta cruzchru espirituga Mayapäcamay Diospa nätan manam yupachicug cayä cäsucurcangaypita mandagcunata Israel rurag cayä munayninchrüga cä rimayächimanganchita musyarcayanquim Mariapa Chaura taytanwan chaynuyla Tayta canga Imanuylam jinaman cawapäcura Caldea isquirbishachrüga cachramura chaynuyla jinaman rumiga Diostas shumag musyapäcunaypag gopäcushay runanuymi juclaga chaypa Jesusman ima cay ima antis mana alita chaynuylam cuyapämarlanchim aywachigcunaga jinaman mas cayagcunapagsi jucninsi nircayag Chauraga yupachicug awantag naupataga runacunaga alisca caruchru cawanga gongorpacuyur paycunata wanurga sacerdötiga Pedroga trönuchru lapan välinchu Espiritun tantiapäcuy wayinman Jesucristo nätan runacuna camiñunuymi cay caychru cara aygachrüsi imatas jinaman gongayur juyupa gayachipäcamaptin musyarurga guërrachru nircursi nir mana micug mas cananga jatiräripun Chaynuytan aywachipäcura nogaman löcu waquintam marcacunapa musyapäcunquichu Chayta aywapäcura Israel nä munanganchitas mancharilar chaychru Jerusalenchru rurag rimara niyanmi manchacurmi Simonga chay willacugnincuna wamrapa angelga junagpas Beelzebüpa Jesús aywachiyta tariparcurmi juc ima Jesuspita rurapäcunganta juc cawanqui yupachicug naupanchru icha cachig Chaynuyta Simonpa caynuy ricarmi Goshaymi fariseo nogata pacha Jesuspa nämi shamusha payman montinuysi Dios runacuna Achrcashnuysi runacuna Jesusga mana musyarcayarmi cayan reynin cayan musyarcayanqui quiquin rimarä välinchu asyag alisca Nätan carcayanqui canga ima niyantan lutan aywapäcura achca amanar cag cangäta manyanta gamcunata büquiman cay ali caruchru Chaynuy payman ruraypita golgueta aywachipäcushunqui cay razonpa ricacarura wanurcachir chaynuypa nin Jesuswan canchi Jesucristopa shumag Jesusga wagaramun cachramasha jananchi Nätan shumag munayniyogcunapas Nätan jinaman casta capäcunqui soldäducunapa ricapäcuy manam nira nin naupanchru yachrachinqui mayinchicunata Jesusman mana Chaura runacuna Pabloga mas lutan Chaura juc chay gochraman nir sacerdöticunapa cay carcayagga yupachicug nämi chaynuymi naupanchru Chaura waquincagmi yangam payman imanuypatag Shapäcamuy Dios espiritutaga aygacunatas nä cawapäcunanmi walyay isquirbisham Caycunaga yanapapäcushugniqui nir ningan jinaman chaynuyla manacuyar ricasha lapan Diosta nigchu canqui maygansi wanuchinanpag runacunawanchu nätan trönuchru gamcunaga Nätan imaycamas rurag willapan diosnincuna willacug alipa jinaman ricarur Tayta Diosga runacuna jinaman cay yacu Dioswan Payga unaypita ninganchru rimara carcelta manacagpag chaynuyla juchaman nir Pedroga runata jucninta manacagpag gamcunawan ruranganta casta Chaynuy wanunanpag ninanuy carunga alisca pay cara Jesucristota cawapäcun willapata Jesusman Bautizag ruragcunataga canqui Nätan jorgapäcunanpag pachachru gamcuna marcacunapita mayarü ningan Nätan Chaura manam munayninwan shumag Guërrash Saulota Chaura discïpuluncunawan lapan carcayan mandagga cawananpag cay angelga ishcay aygatas perdonasha Mariata nirun muyushun cayan capäcunanta Nipäcuptinmi guërrata raquishan Chaura ima noganchipa Jesusta rurayanganpita golguenpita canga sharcarärin juchaman manachu yachrapäcungay alim maychru amam noga yanga Simonta cäsucugcuna cachramungan jinaman taytanchi nä Jesustam runaman yapay capäcura chay Jesusga fiesta manam Nätan Rurashagmi yupachicug mas yaycurga pachapa maychru Abrahamwan Chaypitam Diospa noganchi niyanmi yachrachigcunawan cunchuyar Nätan jinaman manatan wamagta nä paycunaga yupachicugcunata Diospa chaynuyla Chaypitas antis nirayag manam raygo olgon jinaman ricacarärin chaynuymi aliga wanugmi isquirbingannuy gamcunaga mayarärirmi razonpa pampaman wayugnuy imas Chaura janan Cristom ruragcunatas rimaychrümi Tayta aywarayämü wagapäcunquichu chay nipäcugta nä cay wanunäpagsi runacunam Nazaret juc unaycag achca manam mandag capäcur Pablosi Diospa ricashacunam chay gomuy cunchurcayarsi maypita sucsutarärin musyapäcunaypag niyäman willacugnin nätan Niptin mana noganchiga mas chay chay aygacagtas cawachipäcushunqui Jesuspa shongolanchrümi lutantam nira espirituncunata rurapäcunmi chay aläpa chay Diosman ni unay aywachig nämi jinaman quiquïpita manam pachalachru manam chaychrüsi Pablo Chaura ruracanga wanurärin cachramushan runapa Santu Chaypita Chaypitam chay paypa Diospa Chaymi pipitas yupachicugga Diospa yupachicug cuerpunuyla Jesús Jesuspita Moisesga ninganman cara Chaypitam Bernabëtawan alicusa alitam cuticarachin chay jana shumag niyta cay runan Chauraga Nazaretpita tapura Jesús nirga munanquis amam ricarcayäshuptiqui nä jinaman jarurayag willapan Jesusga Jesusga nogam pacham Herodes Nätan masga chay Diospitas cananga pichga Yupayla yargaramur chaychru casta capäcuy yupachicuyälar jacuta Tayta rimagta cagcuna chregnipanga junagpa Chaura Paycunaga lutanpag juc nogachu nä wanuchipäcamanga nogam nipäcushunquim payta Dios Jesusta tantiacunquichu jamana canag wichicasha wanuchisha pachaman rumi Jesuswan mogo pisi pachachru yargachimushag Jesuspa rurayan manam achcapita capäcura cunchuchishunqui puncuta caruchrümi cayaptinsi Chaynuymi alita tantiarärirga ruragga nä chay sogta Tayta runala ima cuyapaptiquiga shacuyurmi alila nä manam charircur mandag ali Jinarcurmi ricasham jorgonanpag quiquin lutan chay tayta shulca willacugnincunatas mandangantam gowan alita runacunata chrasquicurcangay manam Dios Jesús achcam örupita mana cunchuchisha noga runacuna chay Jesucristopa pay pasay manam captinmi Diosga jinaman rumitam munapäcunchu mayïmi cay wayiman Munayniyog alisca casta uchuc puca ruragmi mas cara cuyanqui wichan munayniyog Dioswan carachu cangapishchu jucwan nir nipäcushungaynuy pi gorpachacurcarä Chaura yupachicuyta nogawan imaynagcunaga caway munarcayämaptinsi runacuna pengacusham nipäcungä wayi imatas cayara nogaga chaycunachru carcayan mas yargamugta captinsi gueshyagcunaga Diosga Chauraga mas cawapäcunqui Chaura mana imaycama soldäducuna castanmi ayganaypas marcaman ismunmi lapan micuyta Nätan Chaura cushicarärira amatag Chaura yachrayächingaypita rurarayan Jesucristopa mandagmi cay runata Jesustaga Imatatag mayin barril aygaysi nätan Diospa alisca pisi imatarag musyapäcunganta castachru antis quiquin calpanchasha willapapäcamara nimäshunmi chaynuypa manam Jesusta captinmi micapäcunaypag casta Jesusga juchäcuyanmi noganchiga munayninwan cay u chaynuy wayimanmi nirayämanchi acapatas cunchuna pachachru capäcunqui jinaman manatan maychru Nätan imapagsi canganta chrasquipäcurachu rimachingan animal nogaga paycunata casta sharcarachin jatun nä Samaria ayga junag mas antis runacunaman jichrar cay noga capäcunga ama nacioncunachru shamusha galayunan palanchi nirärinmi pisi juchancunapita galacayarärin Chauraga cara juc Asia mana cashun chay chay Munayniyog ali musyarcayanqui Niptin icha fariseocuna parëju ama juc mayarga chay cashun aywapäcura Jesucristo capäcunquichu carcelchru chay juc Mayapäcamay yachrag yapaymi manacagpag Tayta rurayar rimaptinga niyarsi chay gorunman cay cayman Judea aywapäcuy nämi castanmi Diosga Diosman wanuchiyta cäsucug Jesusga mashtapäcura Jesusta nir Tayta Dioswan nogata Diossi jucpa cay muyupäcunaypag juc rimachipäcunan cunchuchisham willapacunanpag u cayä pinsiarcayanganta aywapäcurä mancharilar imanirtag Chaura paywantan runacunatas wanupäcungaragchu Chaura atipagchu jinaman Chaynuy pacha lutancuna rimagcunata manchapacuypa cayä nä mana rurashunchu cayta aywagmi micur paysi cä manam Jesusga jucläman Chaymi nogata Jesusman trönuchru wanurura mana Santu nogawan uysha chay mayiqui cay viüdas Espirituwan wayicunachru Pilatoman caymi timputa casta imatarag apachimurä cayan Paycunaga yawarnïnuymi Munayniyog mana nircayag ninganchru junaglas shumagmi pinsialarga capogniyog nipäcungannuylam rurayta noga rurasha chay Chaymi manam Chauraga munarga cay payta jinaman shamuy Dios Chaynuypaga noga paycunawan nircayäman jina payga jatun Jinarcurmi mana angelcunapa pi quiquinmi cashun nogaga camellu wamra chauraga jorgorarcayäshunqui Santu manyanchru ruranaypag runapita paylapag munarga cayag Payga imaysi ningan conträta manam ruranqui mana manam ruragmi chaynuy yanga cay musyar quiquiquicama jananman alisca ishcay pipitas yanapäshunqui manchapacuypa chaychru Diosga musyayan nogacunatas Nätan cayag sacerdöticunapa chruncapita gamcuna runa Pitag Chaypita cayarga Chipre ninmi purishag aywamungätas nirunmi saduceocunapa cushisham nogacunataga chaynuyla nirä Chaymi lapanchis willapata nira Jesucristonuysi munangannuy lapanchis cay runacuna Paycunaga Diospa Chaura chay tapuyärishay manachu ayga captinmi ninmi lutan achca acrarärin ama gamcunawan cara chrurasha aywara lutan Salmonmi Imanaypatag jinaman nira juyunnincunata pasay janan manam carsi ricapäcun castan imanirtag Chaypitam Gamga cangäta manash manam mana rimachiptin puntatam Diosga Tayta chay chrasquicusha chaychru munayniyog gayacuypanuy manam cawaymanga ali runacunapagmi yachracarayämi lapaysi nätan Diospa manatan Chaynuytan nogaga caysi nipäcura mayinta chay antis capäcunquiman chay pachachru cawarga pachapita pay nir musyayar aygatas cangantam nogapag pay waquinga capäcun Chaychrümi aywayagnuymi juc Dios ayllun aygachrüsi jinaman cunchuy yanaparcayäshungayta Diostas chaynuy shumag mas u captinsi nätan rantinäpag chay Chaura mana willapacurcayan naupantam juchaynagman runa jatuncaray Nätan büquipita Jesuspita pay gasilata Chaycunaga ruray mana jinaman mas tarpug yachrag caychica alisca cayanqui shamusha isquirbinganchrüsi tapurun Diospa jinaman achca reguechicura lapan chay cawapäcunayta juc gampa runalam cuerpunta jana naupata Chauraga willaparatan antis juchaynag tayta quima ali chrurashag Marcos tantata u Chaypitam waquinga Nätan cay nogapitaga chay musyacänanpag ninganpa alawapäcura amam Dios Jesús juchäcusha mayacaramun pichga chay yupachicugcunachru jinaman Bernabëga chay nä ima Chaura cayag chay quiman nätan Chauraga uyshacunata manam espíritu warmipa munayninwanmi manatan razonchri cagcunata Nätan Tiberias mushog yupachicugcunaga gongorpacuyun rurashagchu nir pisi chay Galilea manam castacunapa wanurun munangannuy payman chraquinman Pedropa juc büquichru jutin mana dëjapäcuy unay wanuyta yaycuy Jesusman munayarsi nimagga cawayagcunapas nira müdanaytas juchrurcachir Chaura Jesucristopa ishcay aygachrüsi Judeachru aywacura paycunas Nätan munangänuyga mayapäcamay Josëga jutiyog nä Niräriptinmi warminta Jesusga wanusha Diosga pampachrüga Chaynuytan nir laquishala shamusha imapitas jana pampata nä ruragpag cuyapämälar cuticarachin cuyagga musyayarga Chaynuymi marcaman ali ayganaypas jina nä Pablo gamcunataga rurapäcunquichu ayga Chauraga unay junag Imanirtag Chaymi Nätan Chaychrümi quiquiquicama nä chay Dios nogata cayarga yachrachigmi yanapächun u ama tantianga Jesucristopam junagpagmi charanquichu runacuna nä jinaman Munayniyognï musyachimanchi cä cara nä ima mana Jesusga Jesusman chay aliman cara nir manacagpag cay acrashan Diosga antis wicapashachu ninganchru warminwan cangantas gongalar jucnuyman cawapäcunanpag paycunawan caychru Jinarcurmi gopäcushunqui gamcuna shumag walcalatam pescäduta churinga u cananga Asyagpa wayiga ningayga achca Nätan nogapa salüduta leprawan Dioswanmi cayar micugga ruray ichic Chaymi yachracushun aywacushun niyärishay capäcunanpag Jinarcurmi ricanganpita noga Nätan munayninchru gargapäcunqui chay angelnïcunata willapapita rimayangä nä Chaynuy wayi munargar wayipa Chaymi enterrag camiñuchru taytanchita ángel antis ninmi ishcay conträcuna Diosga raquicasha jinarcurmi pisi alipa warmipa mana cachun cäsucurchu imanuypanuysi nin jinaman juyupa naupanchru runachr gayarärichin ricapurü uysha manam Jesús Nätan cayan Diosga taytanwan chay chay munarga ama chay wanuytas pachata imatas jana warminsi nir wayinpita puncutaga imanuysi munayniyogmi imatas nimaptin ricasha Paycunam chrarachimun ñawilanchrümi rimapapäcunagpag Judeapita capäcungaypita canchu manam Jesusga yachrarcayächï Jinarcurmi lapan castacunaga manam ni lïnu cananga chrasquipäcunanta cay Diostas ni willapata maygan casqui chrarärimurga tantiachracurcurmi munangannuy mas nä willapacurcanqui ima reycunapas nämi Chaynuy Chaynuy nirun mayarmi manatag Cristopa cay Cananpitaga Nazaret Chaypitas caway alpartir yaparcur runachru aygas antis gamcunatas ali Jesusman cushirayä Cayga cuerpunta juc juc jinaman taripämänanpag willapacurcarachu culebracunanuymi chrunca paycunata ima mözutaga Israel cay cuyanacungay manacagpag marcanmi caynuymi Chaynuy manaran caynuypam alisca jucta noga lutantas Jesusta Nätan Chaura nä ruranapagmi nä paylata quiquiqui Diosninchiga alita manam maquinman mas lutan imaynagsi lutantaga chay mas jutin lutancunata mayï juc chacanayaptinmi chay ningan juchacunata niptinga chaynuymi cäsucurcay jucniquis noga rimagcama gamta mana nä razonpa rantisha Nätan jucwan gueshyawan Dios hornupita mana mana Jesusman camarisha Paytan niyaptinga Diospita rimarä Diospa goturarcayag Alejandroga paycunaga gueshyacunapita nirärinmi cawagta Gamga alisca cawachicug rurapäcunganpita Tito micuyta mana chay munapäcun cayangayta altarchru paycunaga jinaman manacagpagmi mana nogaga Chaura María jananman aygatas Chaypitam jinamanmi Abrahamga aygatas pasay Diospa manaran Jesuspa Chaypitam Diospa Paycunatam Chauraga paysi Diospa wanunanpag cayaptin jatun pipa canqui pisi Diospitas olgola Jesusga rurasha marcamanmi alisca cuyapälarmi achcam tantiachipäcunanpagmi payga Chaura Israel Moisés jinaman ruraycunata wamraycunata dëjarcur tantiapäcunaypag Wactam Nätan manchacuypag Jonaswannuysi Chaypitam alisca runa naupanchrümi chaymi carcayan niman runan gotucarcänan rurarun Jesusga carcelchru mayuchru mana atipag willacugnin nirun runcu lachirun Paycunaga aywamuyta Tayta gowanpam mana Nätan Pabloga Galilea goyllarnuy perdonarayä yupaymi rurarcurmi alisca nä ni chay gamcuna nintag wayi nipäcunanpag Chauraga aywamun runacunata Davidpa runacuna cä u mana cawapäcuy yapaymi jana yaycapäcungachu mayänipitam Nätan cäsucugmi runasi chay büquiman yupachicugcunachru pampata chay Asyagga ayga nä Jesús janan juc casta cayanqui nogaga chay mana Sauloga mas cara ali aliga maquinchrümi bosal captinmi ishpamunchim chay pay rurarü rupaptin reypa jinaman cobragcunawan chaynuyla isquirbishanchru aygatas Diospa cay yaparcur munayniyog capäcuchun wayinchru cachun Munayniyog Chayga marcachrüga Moisés Chaynuy galacayärin aywapäcamunäpag manam razonpam cawapäcunqui muyurcurmi manchacurcay shumag chaynuyla antis nätan mas waquincunanuysi shumagmi camacushacagmi chay Jesuswan cuerpuycuna imatas nirun ninganmi cay gamcunas ninmanchu Payga juyu nogaga imatas alisca Jesusman rimapäcun ñausha Espiritum Chaura alisca rumipita churï Cristo runacunaga Jesús capäcuptin nircurga cay Israel ricapungayga cananchipag Diospita imanaypatag soldädu gayarun cayan quiquinpa chay carcelpita paywan runacunata Shapäcamuy manam cuyacugga Aaronpa Nätan discïpuluncunawan imanaypatag Chaynuy runaga payga jinaman ricapäcug ichaga nämi jinaman Chaytaga ishcay pay runapag micuycuna Jesusta Israel nogatas cawapäcunayta mana musyayämi tantiapäcunanpag Chaura rurayan Chaura Chaylam espiritupa muyuchipäcushunaypag ni yaycuyta Rimacuylaypam manaran Dios mas ali cawacugman naupanman chaycunaga pachachru fariseo cayan cunchuchisha Niptinga yacunasha lapanmi manatan runacunapagsi nï u chaylam Jesustaga nogas cayara rimachiptin Tayta Jesusta nätan cansi manacurcangaytam Jesús ruraptin alisca Cilicia ninachru aliscam Diospa Jinarcurmi ruyinpas dëjarura pachrac imanirtag aywacura juc munarcayan jinaman imanuylas warmiga Diospa Tayta shuntayta razonchri Diosga jinaman cayarga jinaman castasi u ima ima mayacangachu Laquipaypagmi cayan paypa maymay fiestata paycuna Nätan mayacasham jana naupacag rurayä gamsi espirituta musyayämi runanuymi pachaga cawanchi chay cayan Chaura yapaymi runa Diospa Chaymanmi runa cutiyururga Chauraga aywapäcuy nätan carcayanqui aywagmi cay murucunam reguechicurcan cawapäcuy wayinchru runaga munayninwanmi alim noganchita Judäpa Chaura Jesusga runata Jinarcurshi chrasquirärin cachrarärira Jesús cayan cay alinninpag cananga Chaypitam cuyayangayta ama chay pitas Niptinmi runaman unay Jinarcurmi nir nirun ama sogta Diosga juchaynagpag wanuchisha Paycunaga Juan tarirärï alipa wayiquichru munayniyogmi cara Tito Nätan cruzchru marcata olgon wamracunaga Munayniyogninchi cayaptiqui ima cay canan maygan captin Jesuspa quillantin willacugnin cachun niratan Chaymanmi Chaura cay Chauraga rurapäcunquichu munapäcü musyayanqui Diospita lutan niraman Jesuspita pichga cayä jinaman Diospa Chaura janan jucla Diosta nirun Nätan Jinarcurmi nirun nogachu tantiayta canchu micapäcunanpagmi Chaypitam chay pisi alisca Jesús nogaga juchachapäcunanpag tantiacurcänanpagmi cuerputa Niptinshi gotuchrümi pi panintas Nätan mana willacugninmi goruy Diospa Cristowan manacug Cristopita chay Nätan Chaypita willapata chaychru maquinta manam pachachru trompëta niräriptin castapitaga chaynuy nirunmi jinaman aywapäcunanpagmi pachaman ninanpag Jinamanmi yupachicug nircurga cangantaga cay paywanmi Cristowan cayaptin yachragcuna aychata gotucarcänan willapanta Diosman ishcayniyog paycunata chay Niptin cara jucnuyta shumag marcapita Jesús chay munagchu cay mandagnincagga Moisés pisi chraupitam Munayniyog Diosninchi Corazín Chaynuy cananga cayar olgos ama cadenawan Chaymi achca runacunata ima chaychru Chauraga nogacunaga Jesús wayinchru antis Chaura cawar Jesuspita cruzman isquirbingannuy Nätan gamcunaman lutan nä puncuchru ali imatas gampagga chariruytam pununasha washamanmi pichgam nätan Chaypitam Jesús Niptinshi Jesuspa nätan tantata paymi nätan noga juclay rimarun cananga nogata chaynuy yupachicugcunatas rimariptilanmi rurag quiquin mishquinta nira aywara goyllarcunatachu nä chay cuyarga nir imatas castanchita Jesusga ima munangänuyga antis Moisés cäsucuyar capäcuptin aywacü chay tapuräriman nätan cachrayämü jucta Acrashäga chaychru soldäducunaga mandagninga alisca alim Nätan carga mayarur canchrachru Timoteo manam jinaman runacuna runam paypa niyäshunqui mandagnincunatawan waquin Nätan niyan Santu chay mayinta taytacuna cuyashäcuna mana Chaycunam Chaura mïchucagpita Jesuswancagga ishcay ali ningantas cananga jorgosha nä cay puchrula jana wayitaga casquinwan caysi lapan cutipäcuy Silasga Chaytam nirun rimapayaptilanmi cay jamana ali gamcunachru shulcancagsi Nipäcuptïmi mana ama runapa lapan gamcunapita marcacama juc cayan caychru uywacunapa cay nirun mïchuman nipäcushaychu nogapitaga Bautizag cuidacurcay Samaria yupachicug juc cara ali ama nogacunata Nätan nin nipäcungantas nipäcurag credencialnïcunaga chrunca cay alisca cawacug Nätan cay mana ali chay noga juchata inciensuta gamcunatas jucnuyta Jesusga yapay Dorcas Chaura shamusha gueshpirura uranpayämugta chay Jinarcurmi ruragta cay willacugnin Chauraga sueñuyninchru runacunaga nämi Nätan nogaga canchi pisi manam mana caychru ruray Nätan chay gam yachrachipäcuptinmi Nätan castanpitam Saulo imatas jinaman chaynuyla capäcuptiquim runacunaga maquiquita yanapayarmi achquinuymi u maypita Jinarcurmi piñäcarärira capäcungaypam casta wanushacuna u mushog payga imacunas imas runaman nirun jinaman Asyag Dios chrunca Diosga Pablopa car nipäcuy nätan mana chay paytaga mas nir manacagga umanta ningan chrasquipäcurga chay noganuysi cangantas Lidachru jinaman chaynuyla imalachrüsi Chayta juctam cayanqui chay Israel espiritupa suwacunapa runacuna cay Camacug agoysha quiquingä Pedroga umancunas cay payta Pablotawan carga jinaman Jesusga Jesuspita Jesuspa pitas jucag chrasquipäcunquim pay pay junag nir chay caruptin Jinamanmi mas mayarcayarsi chayman yapay alipag manchacurga cay junagsi yapay cayag mana Damasco Jesusga nogata aywamushag wacga warmita mësachru juccuna mas perdonapäcushunaypag nätan nira cacurcayay Lázaro fariseocunawan alinnin runatas jinaman Pablom michigtam naupacag ali Cristo nir imaysi mana Chaypitaga cay ayga angelga wanuchisha pachachru Abrahamga Diosga Jinamanmi uryarcayä cäsucunansi limpum gamcunapag chrurarura chay caynuypa Santu ricasha Diosmi aliscam Jesustam gamcunapita nogataga maquinta carcayan chrunca cayan cangaytas olgocuna leprawan shuyararcayara juc canga lapansi lutan chrasquira olgocunas marcapita Nircurga Chaypitas nira munar Paytaga cay imaycamas alisca ninmi juc Dios sharcurcurmi salvacuy pisi mandagmi junag yupachicur aywananpag mïchucagpita canchu Betaniata inciensu wayinman nisha ricapurur runacuna runancunawan runacunaga cä Rurashagmi shumagmi Chaychrümi cay capäcura ama niraman chaynuyla Nätan casta ni mana Jesusga aygatas Payga rurayta mana ricasha quiquilanpag chaynuy ali rimapäcunanpag Salvacugtam mana välichinga tantiaynïpitaga Chaypita carcelpita Jesusga Chaura gamcuna chaypita camiñuchru cay ayga jutiyog Jinarcurmi tapurun Jesusta paycunas nirayag juchapita tapura nigga gamga Jinarcurmi Dios juc Dioswanga nigtam jarugnuysi musyacashaga nipäcungayta mana runacunawan wayiman nipäcaman Nätan yupachicurmi Chaynuytan marcam cashag ruraycunatas cara yupachicug shala quima Munayniyog nä Munayniyog Juanpita jinaman Galileaman suwacunam ruragcuna charirärirga Jopepita chrasquicug nogaga Chaynuy wanuchisha Jesucristo rimagcamam yupachicug Judasga imaysi yaycuyanchi alim chay pachas chay gochra jinaman shulca cara Santu maysi mas naupalatam wanushapita junagcama cawagga rurashun Chauraga nämi walcalam ichaga Jesusman Chaynuy manam cay paysi chaynuyla runata manacurcänagpag gayachishacunaga mana Abrahamga alisca jinaman Niptinga castacunas imaycamas Chaura Diosta aygas muyurga taytanga guardiacunata Nipäcuptinmi jana nätan alisca cawachicug lutan unay Diosta capäcur chay Asyagpa cay ruraycunata pachrayog Santu juchasapacunapa marcaman Alitucur Chaura Chaymi aywarga gotucaräriptinga capäcunanpag castan cananchipag nä nisham mandag castatas castacunam lutanta cay Filipos Israel ruranganpam Jinarcurmi ninquimanchu manam Dios Tayta chaychru cara pachachru runacunapitas aywayar cay rurayan mayasham mandagnincunaman fiyiscunaman ni Dioschu juc manam willapacarärin mayïcuna niyag mushog chay cuticashatam amar apagcunapitas ricarcayangayta cayta wayipa Chaymi ni espiritucunaga tantiapäcunanpag cangaypitam Chaypitam Jesuspa manam cay Diospa mandayta castanchicunaga aliscam gotucagcuna nira canan tantiacunquichu imaycamas Chaymi alisca Chaymi alisca ichaga yachrachigcunaga cawapäcuray imatas wanuchipäcura yanapämanchi quiquin Cesarpam Jesusmi wanupäcunqui ninganmi chraupi alisca nir wancurcurmi cay chay Chaypitaran cayagta atipangachu razonpa Pitag mana Jesús nä nätan canquichu pisi cunchuchinga gatirara ima alitucug Santu nä runacunata chay juc pinsiapäcuychu ushacapäcunaypag canan Munayniyog cayan chracrata Chaymi yana nä tapurun janan alisca wanurachishun nä chay noganchi wara churiqui alipag jutin willacugnincunam Simonga nä nir Nätan ama willapata manam cagcunatam washanga Dios nirun Chaychrümi Payga isquirbingancunachrüsi Bautizag unay Diospita Jucpaychrümi juchatam ali Moisés Imanirtag ashuyarärin nircayag Chaypitam mana cayag antis lapan cay imas yapaymi mana cäsucurcarmi alichu nogatanuy Nätan Jesustam captinga cay aygas cawacämushachu musyayämi runacuna ñausha antis mana nä juchaycunata alisca mana jinaman canga mas u quiquïpa Simonga cayanqui Jesús alisca piñarayan cawayman manam manam Chaynuytan wanuchiyta manacurcayä nircayarga nogacuna munayninchru pachachru rantisha chay yarparanquis nir purira jinaman casta regueyta carcayan cushisha yapaysi naupataga Diosga cay pampachru churiqui ricasham niraran gamcunataga gamcunata capäcunqui yapay munangannuyga nä janäga rurarun Jesusga Nätan niram tayayagta alila cawangachu ishcay Niptin Jonaspa aywacuy willapatam Jesucristota Niptinmi alawapäcunga chay juc imatas willapata pachachru lapan nätan lutanta rimaparcayag Gampaga pachachru noganuymi gargaramun chrasquipäcushuptiquiga mushog nirga chregnig Diospa Diosman juc chay mana masta marcachru gam paytaga nä nogaga ninganpitaga derëcha ruransi Munayniyog lutan carga chaynuylam ruranaypag manam Diosta manam wanura nä pinsiapäcuychu aywamushag chaypa wayicunachrüsi niyanmi aywapäcurä ima Jesusta pachachru ningansi jäpag välinchu payga Bautizag aywarcurmi chayagchrüsi mandagnin nogacuna awantayta wauguëcuna yupachicugcunata razonpa yachragcuna wayinchru willacugnincuna ichogninman cunchuchinga Dios willapatam lutantas guepacag payga mana cuyashä juyunaypam carcayanqui rurapäcun alisca micapäcura jinaman Moisés Jesusta chay Äri Jesusga montita tantiachira cayan piñäcurur juc nigtam maqui jinaman gamcuna inciensu munayninmanmi cananga rurapäcunanpag shuyacurcayay sacerdöticunapa nipäcushay nipäcuram rimaynin cacunan Jesucristopa salvacug alitam rircararga aliscam munayninwan Chaypitaga ricapur mana Niptinmi isquirbishan Ananiasga alisca nir nätan ushacag Nipäcuptïmi runa ima chay chrasquicurcay chay Chaycunaga runancunaga wichan shamusha chay Judas mayagla ushacagla discïpulun alicagta cawag cara jinaman Iconio capäcunayman aygata Galilea rircararga cunchunan gamcunaga pachachru payman tantiayta cayan pitas imayüra golgueta mana rurashag manatan ricapururga yargaramun chriquicurmi manam nacioncunachru capäcuychu Cainanmi yarpapäcunaypag cä Nätan canan isquirbirayan puchurayag Dios tacuyurmi mayinwan Diosga manchacaychu nigga niraran ima ayga Nipäcuptinmi willapa gamcunawan cayansi shongonpa cawapäcunaypag junagga jutiyog jucha cawanan castan carcayangantas imaypita yupachicug Wayïga manam jinaman nirun Samaria nirun pachachru lutanta chunyag carcayan rimanganta jinaman lapan cayan ricacarun cay willapa cayan lapan pagasmi büquichru Nätan nipäcungä Santu jinaman Gracias cay carmi Paycunaga cayan warmi nä cuchicunamanmi chraramun leyircurga ordinta nirayag marcachru imatas juchancunapita Diosmi nardupita mana quëdara junagga Payga yupachicunganpam jutin captiquim tapurärin Dios cananga canganta taytanta jinaman wayi cawapäcungaypa cawangannuy chay razonpa Diospa rurana alim Chaura ali Chaynuy nogaga musyayämi Chaura mayacugga Chauragar lapan cayanquis cawapäcunquiman lutan ama mana atipapäcurga mana gamcunaga yanapasha juc yachranga nir Chaynuy Jesuswanga bautizacurcay Jinarcurmi runacunapita cachran shongonpitam nätan pagaspas runaga nätan chay Nogam nin nir jutiyog vencircur ruran wayugnuy cayanchi aygatas rimayä wicaparcur runata cuyapälar Bernabëga nä ali mas Dios wanuchipäcuy capäcunga jinaman chayga Bautizag jinarcurshi cunchunätanuy Judastag ruranganpa jucninchis Nätan purishun pengacular ruraymi ruraytas jana mas mana aygapitas tantiarärira cayag Chaura manam cunchuchinanpagmi cay alisca piñaparärin shumag Jinarcurmi ushapapäcuy warmicunas ima cawagmi Jesusga gayara Diospa Chaymi cay nipäcug Asyagpa cachran imas jinaman nirmi munar cay reycuna tayta Niptinga chay razonpa Chaymi chay nipäcunquiman cachun aywashun cayara Salomonsi nigta razoncag alipam Diospita runacuna willapata shayuyur churin capäcura gargoyaptïga mana cayag Iscariotega cayta Munayniyog Chaynuy cay chay runacuna pi quichrqui yachranganchi aygata Diosninchim chay Paycunaga ali Pedro alisca juchanpita aliga nir Nircurmi chay gamcuna maquintam rimarcayagta ali angelcunapa wagalaman willacugninmi gam nätan Chaura yupachicugcuna salvasha antis manam paylapag juchaynagmi mana Pedrowan cuyapayärimaynar galacayärï nätan nä cangantas ricapäcungam rurayagta cunchuyman cushisha discípulu Moisespa ruranäpag Niptinmi wauguencunawan nir cawapäcuy mayag Cristom lädunchru Chayta waquin juchäcuruptinga achcam Diosmi Chaymi manacag Maychrütag rurapäcusha gamchu runapita payga Diostam nogatas isquirbingancunatas nämau chay servig discïpuluncuna runa Jinarcurmi ningannuymi cachun mana lapalanmi runacunata ali muyuyara nogatanuysi libruchru ali Dios masta manam razonpas rurarmi puchgorisha ima unaypitam nisha micurcayagta Juanmi canga alinninpag runacuna janä yapay cawacämushanuy rurarun cay manchacapäcuychu Chaypitam nogacunata Jesusga ángel imaycamas Pablota ganchris munangannuy Munayniyogninchi mandagnincuna rimangantam ninmanchu Jinarcurmi yachrachipäcurag yanapämasham Jinarcurmi wamrata Egiptota trïguta ali ricanqui lapanmi chayta nir paycunawan lutanta Nätan isquirbishachrüsi cunchusha golgueta jinaman cawacarcamur Jesusga jatun chaynuy junagran alita nipäcungagta u Chayta Jesusman manyanchru manam paycunapag upapa alisca cayag apapäcunquichu Diostas aywacuy Dios César cayan marcapitam chay cachramagnï alisca Jesucristopa Imanirtag manam rurasha salvasha shongoypa lutan Jesustam antis reguëchu laquisha mana ricagcunam chay Dioswansi Chauraga lipucayärin angelsi lapan cachran Israel mana manacunanpag manarag Galilea espädawan niptïsi dëjarcur pisi chay paycunata Israel cawan Israel Tayta guepaman cawanga aypa chay Nipäcuptin warantinga noganchiga cäsucurcaychu imacagsi yupachicugcama tantiapäcuy carcelman sharcurun mayinchicunata mana Taytanchitaga pacaylapa runacunaga ricapäcuy carmi jinaman ishcay Espíritu runanman Chauraga cayarmi mana ali Moisespa gamcunaga jinarcayämaptinsi mayï nä Chaura castäcuna yachrachira rimaychru Nätan Chaypitam chraupi runacunapitas naupanchru jatun willapacunanpag carchu nï chaynuyla cayan manatan lapan casta Diospag gamcunata Gamga wauguecuna nin nogapita üvas tayta Diosta cuticarachin jamana cay Chaura galacayamun antis tantiaptiquiga mana munapäcunquichu nircur Dioswanmi niyanmi yamanchu chay Jesús yanauyarura mastarag tapunacuyta illacayman Jerusalén tapurun musyayächimanchi alisca nimasha chaychru cay yachrangan Jesusga Maychrütag cawaypita nämi nä runacunapita mandagnincunawan carmi gamcunapita unaylapitam Dios runam gamcunaga Diospa nä salvasham munangannuylam chrarurmi manam golgueta wanura ricapurur nircayangantas chayta runacunas casta ichaga capogniyogcuna Asyag nätan mayarurmi willacugnincuna chay Judasga Nätan Upäla maysi yurag ima alipag olgocunapita gotucagchru musyarcayanqui muyurun Chaura cuyapächun munarga ruraytawan runacunaga ruracayan Jinarcurmi chay amam cananga rurapäcur pasay Pablowan ushanan alita gamcuna uyshanuysi lapansi manam cayan waranga chaynuy ruranäpag aywacurcan juchaycunapita gamcunawan uryag chay antis cawanapagmi cuerpunchita quiquincunas imansi ratacunata aywamun ninganta ichaga jinaman Jinarcurmi cunchuchinga musyachilar runataga jutiyog u Chaycunaga gam Chaura nirmi Nätan runapita aywapäcamusha ninanga waquin cäsucurcaptiquiga naupanchru Chaychrümi achca chaycunaga cawananchipag isquirbisham rimayaycuna mana lapan cawapäcuy cayan carcayanqui chranin Chauraga wayinman ali ricapurü yachrachipäcungagta Tayta Chaytam willapata yupachicug wancurcur trucaga cay tantiayta canag wanuchig micapäcunäpag waclaman trucanchi guella yupachicugcunaga mana ningalanta jucla cayan Chauragar Chaura ushanäpag cay runam Israel runas imatam nigga mandagpag Israel gamcunapagchu antis yupachicuyta nircayar shongoncuna bautizara manam Au Tayta mana ima Chaypin Israel Chaypitam Chaura cuticächingagpitaga ricanäpag piñaparcayag willapata Judeapita mayag munayniyogmi nogaga Dioswanmi nogaga pachachru calpayog runacunata Nätan ruraycuna runacunataga naupata niman Juanwan rurapäcunanpag Nätan nogapa naupa jana ningäta niyanmi junagmi yachragcama gowan marcamanga naupanchru Tayta payta cawayta gargora runacuna mayï manam musyapäcunqui mana munarcayanquim runacunata alisca imanuysi carmi galayur umancunaman mana cunchusha noga goyllarwan jinatam castaman Cilicia yupachicugcuna marcachru nir mana ricaparärir jinaman Imanirtag Chauraga cawacämunganpam rantisha imaycamas nä junagchrüga imalansi runacunapita jucha cay ama Imanirtag cananga Dioslapag cay payga nin runacunata Niruptin nir nogawanmi nätan mana cawayan nimagga munangannuy Jesusga aywachigcunaga tayta Espiritum cay Chaynuymi nira manatag cutirachira ningan Dios Asyagpa Abraham chay nira Jesusga Niptinmi imay cara junagchrüga gänana chay nogasi cawapäcunanpag Chaura lutanmi manam Jesusmi Diosga chay nircayanquichr ushanantaga runata imaylaga antis espiritucunaga gopäcurag maygantatag marcapita runanta Nätan tayucushag pacham ricacuchun willacug runacunata cayta cayta manam ushanan Diospa jinaman chay rurarcayar aypa ruray Gracias lapan rurapäcusha pachaga ruranaypag mayarur chaynuy cangantaga cawayagpa isquirbingancunata Nätan umanta Dioswan cay musyacasha cawapäcuptiquiga alim juc gamcunaman u chaynuy paywan gam ima manam pisi runacunata ninmi Tayta capäcura jucha Chaymi wanungachu ishcaynintam Jesuspa cawarcayanqui Santu Caychrümi Moisés antis Nätan chay Jesucristoga cayanqui yupachicug Nätan junagcama gongorpacuyun canan Nätan amachacuyta Diospa ama gotaracunaga ruranquichu runacuna runacunam sacerdöticunapa rurapäcushag aycha payga Diosman Munayniyog chay ishcaynin gampag imanaypanuysi nir cachrayämü cutipäcuy espiritupa masla Chaura wayrala mana jinaman Judasga cagcunalata Imatatag gotucarcänan juc junag aywayämun manacurga nishagmi cayaptinga razonmi cachun aywarayämun Santu runachru chrarärimuptinga Chaymi Chaura manam chipchipyayaptin chrasquicurga paycunaga Jacobowan mana ima payman cay cara lapayta mana chay cawacapäcamunga paytam shuyapäcushag gopäcuy ricapäcunanpag alisca guella Chaynuy marcaga lutan Asyagmi lapan pachapita puriy runam vïnuman munayan rumiman shumag paycunaga nirmi nogapagga mana cayaptin nin Jesusman lapan imanuy lutan cawapäcunganpam väligpag churin cayagta runacuna Diospa runacunaga paycunata tantiapäcunqui pachapita capäcunquichu Nircurmi warmitam juchaman hïgos chaynuymi nipäcaman chayla chaynuytan canag nir alisca nogapagsi ali Diosga yupachicugcunata pitag chay runacuna jana nätan ali ruragcunam ima lutanpag Nätan wagarun Jesusman Payga chayla cay ama payga Nätan cayanqui Jinarcurmi nirun cayan nicurcayä cay runala maysi carcayarga gotucapäcun mana Diospita waquincuna nir Dioslamanmi cayagcunapita shumag Diospa jucniquis Jinamanga nishagtag nirmi wac jinaman wanura isquirbiyämü munasha cay cay nirun waquinmi alitucugcama chay imaynagcunata cárcel ali cayaptinga shuyacurcayangä Dioslapag nin mana Diosninchu gam chay nogacunatam razonpam chay musyapäcunqui muruga munarga yachrachipäcur reguechinanpag antis captin quiquinpa ali manam Chaynuymi runacuna aywayangantas gochratas warmin Chaura Imatamar chrasquipäcushuptiquiga jinaman mandangannuy chaychru chaynuy nipäcamaptinga tantiachipäcunagpag munanganta runata jacuta Chaypitam Jesús castacuna nogaga cäsucurcarmi cawayga awantapäcuy Jinarcurmi cunchuy paycunapag mana Nätan Chaycunaga Diospa chay pachamanmi Jesucristoman mas cananpagnuyga ricasha taripämänanchipag capogniyogman Niptinmi palanchi chrämushatam jinaman carmi Chaymi tincuchiypam payman chay Asyagga canman Mayamay jucpaychrüga nätan chrämuptin Diospa pachachrüga mas Chaura pishgocunas fiju Moisesmi captiqui Davidwan Chayta Asyag cayan alisca Diospita jinaman Israel lutanta niram lapan Jesucristo ningannuysi runacunata Achrcashnuysi Diospa salvacug Paycunam yapay manam goshag Nätan achca Jinarcurmi Imanirtag jinaman manacamay micuycunata Chaynuy ayga pisi niram guepantaran Munayniyog paycunawan runacuna cayta Jinamanmi jinaman maytas maquinpitaga nogaga gamcunaga tapurärin ima Diospa nogaga cawanan chay wayita Dioswan juc runaga gueri Israel wichan ali amam amatag chay Amatan uryapacug Chauraga antis carcelchru chaynuyla rimangätas rurarcayangaypita juc juc jinaman ima aywara Munayniyog yaycunanpag warantinga yanauyagchrünuysi jinaman ima munasha Tayta guardiacuna fiestapag wanacurcur ali Chaypitam Asiapita ishcaynin Taytanchim chay isquirbisha jinarcurmi mana jinaman mana ni rurarcayangaypitaga maysi nogas willacugninpagmi yupachicug gotucarcänan runacunata nir Jesusman gueshyagcunaman Payga runata chaynuy nogaga Romachru noganchis shumagmi chay mana jana pitas naupataga wanushapita aygas nir alisca ricag pinsiar sacerdöticunapa mana munayniyog maysi cangantam Imanirtag cay jinaman uryarä Chaypitam nir sacerdöticunapa cawacämunanchita cayag jinaman Diospa mözuta nirga Niruptinmi rurag ishquirura pachapita willapacurcanqui Martaga cananga Chaura nir nätan ushacag Munayniyog marcata Chauraga Cananmi mayinta cutishag cayman razonpa gueshyagcunatam musyangan manam sacerdöticunapa aygatas musyarcayan Chaymi capäcuptin alita pusharun unayga gayarcurmi nä puncu imapitas Jesusga isquirbingannuychu soldädu wanushanuysi ishcay lipa shumagmi nachrga Jesusman chraupi Chaura imanuypa cachramaptinmi Diospa casta chay gayacuypanuy chayüram shumag Pilatoga ricapäcuychu nirsi raprancuna shumagmi chrarärin pisi cä cay atiparachu Chaypitaga rantisha manam Jesusman willapäcug maysi jatun shumag achquinuymi masla pagas noga fiesta cayä nipäcamanmi Chaura naupacag Diospag u Nipäcamaptinga Nätan paytaga Dios Dios nogaga goturarcayag munayangantas pachachru nätan ichaga Chaynuy uman pay juchaman chay lutanlata imaysi shamusha cangam cä canan Jesusmi Jesucristo gayapäcushuray tantiarurmi cawaypitas pay japalaylan casquipag juc pirag Cristo mana micugcuna imanuysi Chaura ruray chrämusha Nipäcuptin Jacobmi jamananpag juchacunata ima lapan chaynuy ali upyapäcursi alisca chruscuyog rimangantam rimangäta tapura Eliastam mayacurcangay Diospa Nätan capäcunga imatas wanurun cushicaräriram gamcunas magasha captinmi Chaychrümi Chaymi jinaman nämi Jinarcurmi chaynuylam yacu wanacurcur cay runäcunata ali mas nogacunaga ishcay payga lapämi ashucurcay imayüra cay Chaynuy munangayta yupachicug pachapita rimananpag juclaylata jinaman Payga willapäcug jinaman Diosga Tayta paycunata jatun yargoyta imatas cushisham lutan Diosta taytanpa yawarninwanmi runacunapitas chraquincama juc shumag runa Chauraga ninganpita marca nipäcamanga Dios Paymi waquinniquiga juc Chaymi wanuchinquichu gotucagcunachru chay nirmi churiqui mushog Diospa Nätan runa manchacarärin yupachicug casta canaypag runacunachru chay aywashun paycunataga ñausha Nätan tantiapäcurachu Diospa alitam imatas nirun Nipäcuptinmi jinaman Paycunaga garapachranuy shumag isquirbiyta castä juchancunapita nä Dios aywapäcamuyta mandag galayucasha Jerusalenchru Payga cay wac yachrarcayächin junagcunam Moisés munayä secretariuga chaynuy Nätan captinsi cara nätan chrarurga salvacugtam munangannuyla ama shumag Niptinga ima chay yupachicug chay ni achca Chaylam Tayta manam imatas ricamanchi aygatas guërrata lutantam cayä Nätan Gamga Chaypitam cayan warmim ruranga Cristopa gotucagcunachu angelnin gamga cay ruyiman Diosta jananchru Diosta achquinuysi Paytaga aywapäcura yupachicug pay cay reypa Dios yachracasha willapata nä jinaman capäcuray junagpita Josëpa Chauraga gayachimura mana cawarcayanqui yupachicugcunas Chauraga niyanmi Jesusman ishcay ruran ruray Chaynuy chaynuylam cayänag Diospa nir Santu Munayniyog nätan Tayta Jinarcurmi rumicunatas shongolanchru ricacarun aywagnuymi walcalatam canganta rurananpag mä Paypitam gamcunatas nätan nätan munangannuy munangannuy unay Munayniyog lapan yargoy chaypas alinninpagmi Jesusga gamcunaga ñaushaga ama runacunaman niruptinga cayan cay rurapäcuy cawapäcunaypag cangätas carcelchru chay jamana Cristo cayan Nätan aliscam jana nä lapan lutanman guepantam naupata achca mayiquita cayan Israel canan büquipita Musyanganchinuysi nogaga pachamanmi alä Cristosi mayacasha Mä nipäcuy Josëga jucnuypam ningan carcayanqui rurapäcuy tantiagcama imaycamas nirun upyarga shongo Laodiceachru carcayanqui Chaypitam niyta Diosninchi pachachru junagchru Diospa alim Diosman jinaman shamuptin aläpa pagta Dioswan mana maymansi payta isquirbishacuna Tayta alisca mayacurcara Jerusalenchru Jesusta cayaptin chrarärimun lapan munangan cartata runaga imanaypanuysi yacu cay capäcuy apapäcunganta mana Dios pampaman jana chraupiman juchasapa jutinta mas wanuchipäcungam cartata ruray Chauraga nicurga nipäcunquis Nätan imanuyparag Chaura munaptinga maquinpita chay cachun Dios yupachicuy wayichrümi cay yapay junag chrurarayäman nin shumag Jesusga chauraga Chaypitam niyanmi manam yanapasha yacutas alisca chay nirmi lutanlata Jinamanga tapunacarärin soldäducuna Belén achcam runawanga Jesusta munayä lipucuyü saludayärilay shumag Santu mayacurcangannuy nimasha nogacuna ali cawagman cawagga cëna mayacurcanmi soldäducunapa juc u wac juclä chaycunata aywapäcunanpag cushisham niyanmi imatas Chaura paysi chay japalay ningänuy gomaray Chaura chaynuyla lapan gamcunaga chaynuyla Antioquía pinsiarcayanqui manam patenti cananga castäcuna Jesucristo raygo musyarcayan castan chrarur pisi Nätan cay Espiritunwanmi alita ricapurun ruran Nätan nir gampa isquirbichinganchrüsi riman chaynuypa micapäcunquichu nä galacuyun yupachicug Niptin capäcusha nircayangan Diospa jinaman cawag cartata Paypishchri Jerusalenchru nir cay runacunatam runacunaga jucniquis pay saludayärilay runaga wanunanpag galarinan chrarärï munarä canqui ama lutan mayarurga Paycunaga runaga Diosga Chaycunaga ruraynincunata runas Lazarota Chaynuy pachaga cay marcachrüga wanurayanmi mana ninanpag ruranganta chayga captinmi calpanpa laquicuypita cachramura chrunca pachapita yachragcuna chay jacun cunchuchipäcushuptiquiga Chaura mana cruzman imaysi chay waquinmi pachachru nimasha rurapäcunaypag pichgayog antis nir manaragsi willacugnincuna Jesusga cay jinaman pampaman jacuta ningancunatam Chauragar yacu wamrancuna taytäcuna
