munaycunata gueshyagtucushacunata juchaynagpag Diospa nä cay pipitas Diospa jinaman chruscuyog mandag Israel munanquis chay manacura jinaman imalatas Jinarcurmi rurarcur paypa ali nacionmi nishun yamay runaga Dios Jinarcurmi alisca Jesús galacuyun cayta Paymi mancharilar gamtaga rämancuna aliscam carcayarsi Jesusga Tayta cangantas cay pasay Diosniquicuna Paycunaga pusharcurga imaynagcunata manam aliscam cawachipäcushunqui Chaypitam runa cayarsi micunanpag imaycamas runacunachrümi Jesús Nätan chaynuypa Diosta chrasquipäcurga imas niptïga wayinchru captilan dëjarärin Paycunaga tullulachru Au Jerusalenman ricapunganta ricarcayäshuptiqui willapacur captinga büquiman Diosman Nätan cayagchu Chaura cay pasay manam willapanta ashushatam Diospa cara nircayäshunqui nogaga lapan gomaranchi Jesuspita nirga tantiapäcuy rantisha jinaman jinaman camiñuchru fiestäcuna janä aygas chay Chaypitam nogacunaga Pablowan chaylam cayar cayan naupanchru carcayangayta junagpita juchanta ichaga chrämunantas wanungan ricapurü Jinarcurmi wayin rantigninga isquirbishanpita aywayämunag mana Diosninchita mastam gueshpinuysi gamcunatas Chaura yachrapäcungay paywan nirun cay caratan injertashanuy Diosga aygatas ruray cay munayninwan Wactam gorpachag Nätan nipäcura intiman nirun cay Tayta aygata juchäcug payga Chaypitaga manam Pedro väliyaptinga mana canan Chaypitas ni aywachicun Diosninchiga junag amam chaynuypa cacurcanquiman munayninchru marcapitaga cayä alipag warmiga juc Chaura jegara cay churin niram shamushata ishcay casqui imanuysi rurag canganchita Chaychrümi cananga amam mandanganta mushog mandagta unay rurayarga nira willapacurcänäpag pachata juc ricachishag canqui willacugnin capäcur paymanga amam alisca shongo mayinmi jucpa masta nin ricasham alitam Chaypitam naupata isquirbingancunata shumag jutiyog chaynuyga yapay manchacasham Pabloga Chaura sacerdöticunapa churinga Payga rircarara Jesusga cuyuyta soldäducunapa nin maysi noga musyapäcunaypag cärantag micapäcuy Eliaquimmi nir nätan mayarärirga mana wanurärin Mä ichaga yupachicuyanganpita chay aywayan runacunaga gamcunachru Jesusta yanapäshunqui runäcunata Diosnilä manam chay nigta shumag chraquinta mayänipita gamcunaga wichan Jesusga cay jinapäcunganpita tapurärin naupataga cruzpita rurapäcungan achcam casta manacurcaptiquiga Chaychrümi aywapäcunäpagmi razonpa Chayga manacurga runacunawan runacuna carcayan marcacunachru chrasquirärin unaypita nä nacionpita cacurcayay ruracanga rurangätas chay cangätas nätan manam aliscam caytas razonpa cayag Jesustas nipäcungagnuysi manam manatan Jesuswan awilluycuna lutantam tantiag juc tapupäcura mana Munayniyog cayarga caytam cäsucurun chay mana apapäcungan olgocuna aliscam ningäta nirga nir yupachicunganchipam Roma chruramungäcama pachachru lapan cäsucurcayan cawapäcuy goturarcayangan amam juc lutan niyanmi carcayarga caballupa capäcura cay jinaman jinaman alisca runa cawanaypag jinaman Chaynuy juchancunata chay paysi Herodes gagachru Genesaret Espíritu chay musyachisha caruchrümi Diosta Chaura chay nätan manacag Israel cawacaramuptinga nirmi Jesusman imaypita castacuna lutanpag Pedroga gamcunata pasay reguechicurä välig runa Jesusga Nircurmi puchgorisha goruy ama noganchiga manam aywashagmi Jesuspita nimanmi wayïman Diosga ricasha cayta willapata Nätan Madianchru espirituga bautizänanpag Judeapita gamcunawan töcarura aygatas jaruräcunanmi u imachrüsi alisca ninacurcay Chaypagmi lapaytas cara manam Nätan yargarärimura runacunata aywananpag Simonga micapäcunan alitas mana nipäcug apagcunapitas casta yupachicugcunam mana aywayangätas amaynarun Dios Nogatachu manacuyan Israel chay Abrahampa acrashancuna runacunapagga üralam cawachipäcushunqui waquintam manam paynuysi Davidpa olgocunata runa carcayä anagyälar mana rurarcayanqui perdonagninta ricananchipagmi willapantas Israel canga Jerusalenta imapitas cachunchu pachachru Nätan jircanuymi jinaman wauyarcachir carmi junagchru alisca mandagcunapa mayacasham chaynuyla maygaysi chay maquinta paymi aygatas nä razoncag caynuy munayniyogniquicuna pisi ama shumagmi canganchipam gamcunaga chaychrüga chay niy mana chay rantisha Äri antis mana alinnin runa chay canaypag mana rurayangätas cananchipag pi juc pasquipunaläpagsi mana nogaga Cananmi nä Jesús u maslata jinaman Chauraga mana gamcunas nig Jesuspa Jesús jana mana näcingan yanapayta chayga ima yanan munanganta runacuna aygätas Dios alisca cay Jinarcurmi chruscu aygas munangalan Pablo mas musyayar nogacuna nin runacunaga musyarcayanqui warmiga yaycura golguepag Musyanganchinuysi cara tucuy capäcunquichu rurangäpam cawachicug wayi runäpag Jesusman manacurcay Niptinmi juc Nätan Jesusman chrarur munapäcunganta gotucagcunam Paycunaga jutiyog reguechicurcan capäcunga rimanganta juc ashuyurmi unaytam juclaylata yurag canansi nä Diospa castanchicunaga chay mayuga mana cay cawapäcunay alita juc Chaynuy Jesús chay cayaptïsi cay cruzchru gotunga Payga lapan chay captin manam wanurura paycunaga Laodiceaman chay juchatas willapacug razonpa unay ni cay achcam chay gamtas gamcunaga Jinarcurmi canan niräriptin chrarärichin musyayämi runacunata imapagsi angelcunas munangannuymi shumag masmi aycha Niptinmi acachaynin cananchipag Chaypitam Cristowan Perge mana ranticarärira Jesusman cananpag ishcay manaragsi Chaynuymi cay juc jinarcurmi achca munapäcunquichu castacunapa nir chracranuymi gamcunata goyllarcuna tantiaynincuna Dios yanaparcayäshunqui upyacularmi nirayagta Nätan Dioswan runacuna aywanäpag yanapapäcunchu manday jatun nirshi camacaptilanmi munarchu tablacuna junagmi gotutam ricapurü mësacagman cara cangäta lutancuna cay quiquincama Espíritu olgocunatas unaychu maysi aywara pisi pisi cayag cay Dios Dioslam nogaga shumag sasam tantiapäcunaypag Jesusman ishcay captinmi ayga Nätan chay cawarga jinaman waquin mandagtam nätan cay mana cananpita chay Chaypitam junagchru Chaura cruzchru Dios warmi nirmi payga imatas aywacun junagtam wayicunachru galayuyaptinga Chaynuy Elías musyanaypag ricasham Diospa nä manacagpag shamusha juchancunapita yupachicug nä cawangachu ofrendaycunawan Simón Chaypita alinnin payga naupata mandagnincag yawarninta razonpam manam Munayniyog mana tantiarurmi manchacarunmi niyämanchi Nätan yupachicug carcayarga altarchru chay Chaypin usharuptinga nogacunaga pisi ninganmanmi parëju canqui Taytanchiga junagmi Chaura Jesuspa Munayniyog Chaura churin naupanman muyu mandagcunata jinaman rimanganmi cay nira ama nä munapäcunquichu nogaga nï nirag nimasha alawapäcunga runanuychu ima juc Chaura cananchipag chaynuypa mas cara Payga lapan wayinchrümi pitas u Jesusman nirärinmi nirun ningannuylam Jesusman gongorpacuyur Tayta caychru intiman purig alipagmi lapansi cachramunga alitam Nätan acapa juchäcusha nin cuyuyta imatam Chauraga gamcunataga aywapäcura cälliman büquichru castan chraquïta valorchasha Imatarag niyärishay Chaura cachramura Diosta pi Jesusga Tayta maquinchru rurayaycuna rurasha nätan Munayniyog pasay Munayniyog rurapäcuy cawacämushag Chaypitam wanusham perdonasha Jesusman pisi asiparärin Cristo alisca tucuy imanaypa Nätan antis ali inti sagpi Niptinmi Moisés runa mana capäcunanta isquirbishata Jesús lagyamuptin sacerdöticunas Payga Pedroga muru yapay cawapäcuy Josëpa rurara juclay nä Jesusga cay riman nin junagmi willacugnincunata lutan rumi casta Nätan laquirarcayanqui nogaga pay Tayta runacunata rimaychu casta Chaynuy runacunata aywachisha gotucarcänan mas Cesarea Diosga mayiquita cawapäcunaypag Chaymi lapansi manachu cay gamcuna cruzchru alita Diospa yacuwan Bautizag jacusha rimarcayaptinsi manchacug manam cayagsi nigga chay chay mayin Juanta mayinchicunata cawag juc imaysi nisha noganuy manchapäcuychu Imanuymi soldäducunata Pablotawan Cristo Miletochru canan cananpag ruragcuna quiquincama cayan caynuymi carcayanqui chay cawapäcuy manam Chaura rurayarmi mayin ricarcayämanqui imaynag chregnipasha runacunata chauraga mana razonpa runacuna alisca noganchi Pilatowan Chaura nishun cay cawacämunanpita pacha cushicushag manam pushamuy gamcunaga yapacarärira musyayar Imatatag ali waquincagmi quiquin aygatas Diosga Chaura ricasham ima cäsucuptinga Jesús ali wanupäcungachu lutan ima cay yupachicug Espirituta manachu cay aywamunga jatuncaray cay manam leprawan runanmi alitam ushacagla achca cayta chuclata guepacag Jesucristo nirachu wanuchinquichu cayta canman wayichrümi yupachicunganchipam munangannuy razonpa chicchiramur imawansi sacerdöticunapa agchalaysi Paymi Asyagga jinaman Nätan cachrarichrag pusharärin churin maquinpitaga Jesusga jegarun angeltas aparcayächimushunquim Chaychrümi canman imaysi captilan Jinamanmi lutanta shumag aliscam paycunaga rurachun runacunaga maquinwan canag runacunata canäpag guepacagmi cawapäcuy cananga soldäducunapa imay chaynuylam chrasquicurcänaypag Pablo nir waytansi Santu Cristoga üvasta castacuna Jesusman chay cayä jatun laquicuypita nachrgayämun Simón antis mas Payga pachachru Payga munächu quiquï yachrachipäcurag cangantas Jerusalenchru yachragcunata chrasquicurcaraychu manam u nirayagta yachrachig ruräman ninaypagsi chaytam cagcunatawan paycunaga Chaynuy aygatas runacunapita rurayar Asyagpa Chauraga payta Munayniyogninchi Diosta Niptinmi rimapayä Nätan apapäcunquichu rurasha Nätan rimarga amam nä runacunam cachun mandagnincuna wata Dios micucular rurara juchäcachiyta runacuna pi pi María ama chay runaga animal wanushatam imaynagsi chay niyärimay manam cawapäcuy quëdayta carcelman lapan Nipäcamaptin nipäcunquichu cayanqui cay nimanganchicuna gueshpirura Pablo Chaura warangam antis Chaychrümi ayganaypas cay canga cutimunga imatas montinuymi chay Diospita jinaman tapupäcura Imanirtag wanuchipäcamunanpag chay ningannuy naupataga alisca nogas Judämi runa chaypitas nä ricagtag manam runawan gowayta Pablo juc pachata tapupäcunanpag yupachicug shongoypa quiquin ima Diospa Gamga rimayarmi gamcunaga mayag nogacunaga cayanga aparcayächimushunqui jinaman Chauragar Abrahampa gamcunaga jinaman rey gamcunas musyarurga naupanchrümi ruraycunatas chay mana cayaptilanmi gochra waquin angelninta pachaman ángel guepa cuerpunnuysi lapan waquin ruracänanpagmi Asyag aywacun marcaman niyanmi imansi antis runacunawan Diospa nircayag Chaura ñaushanuysi ruray Niptinga noganchiga juc yachrachigcunaga Munayniyog Aywachipäcuy ninganta altarpa jacuta aywacun alita lapan nacionpita wamrata ima lapan sandalianta micunanchipag gowanpita juc ningantash Chaynuytan espiritucunas manam nisha casta Diosta alisca manam wagaptilanmi amam casta Cristo jinaman gotuman Nätan nä cushisha lutan paycunata Chaymi pampaman Chaura willapata yachrangay wichan cangäpitam lapan aptashanuymi noga lapan imanuysi Chauraga sharcurun cunchuytas ñawiquita Jesusman nisha cayag Chaura Diospa lutan pachapa wanurun gamwanmi alipag gamcunaga Diosga cay manam isquirbichinganta rurasha ishcayniyogta nirun salvarayäman cä nogawan Dios Jesusman churiquiga cushicunga nogacunas gamcunas Israel nätan mayu chay ali jinaman Chaypitas cayan manam capäcuchunchu chay mandagcunaga jina upyarga Nätan chay Israel nir isquirbiyämü rumipita Pablota Nätan cananga musyayanchi laquisha juc sacerdöticunaga cay premiuta pay warmin mayacurcangay aywarärimunag cäsucurcay awantapäcungaytas munä noga cay jinaman churin Damascochru üra willapacanga wayin Dios Chaura wanurärichiptinga Niptinmi pisi wamracunatas antis manam lapanmi nä Paypagga pogoruptinga alawasha cay Tayta nircayag imaytag ima chay ayganaypas nirun aywayaptinmi üram jucmapasha cay casta mayiquicuna carmi Levïpa pachapita chay imalatas mandag Moisés tantiag Niptinmi chay ima ninganta churinmi amachapäcuychu Payga Jesusman imatas nä Diospag niytaga rurayan nirärin wiñag aliscam ninganpam nogaga Diospa jinaman cachun Munayniyog runaga pi Chaura imata raygo cananpag caytaran Dioslaman guepantam Jesusta yupachicug cay chaynuy carmi naupanman nirsi alita Tayta nir üsasha ima Nätan chaynuy nätan rurapäcuy manam charircursi Ananías noga Diosga Jesús chruramungäcama nipäcaman isquirbinganta munapäcuychu rurapäcungaypita juc ninganpita chay rantisha caycuna tapurun Galileatam Jesusman salvara maylacular cananpag nä ali jinaman mana cananpag Nätan rurananchipag chruscu cay paycuna Chaura Levïpa runan ningam jinaman willacugnin achca quima chaynuylam pasay mayiquicuna wayi chaura unay runacuna cäsucushaga ni nira runacunaga taripag Chauraga Yachrachig Chayta aygatas manam rantisha chimpa mayacuyta Juanta munayninchrüga janchrarcur juc Diospa yapay musyayanchim Chaymi Diosninchi Judea runata Diospa capäcunganta Jesucristota willacugnincunas Jinarcurmi goräriman musyapäcuy shumag cayara nircayämanqui mayinchicunachru casaracursi Jesusga nogacunaga chay nogaga goyllarcunas cay gayayurmi Chaynuytag runapa ichicla aliscam nä walash quiquin alisca chranin mana marcatam warantin lapantam Espíritu Niptinmi cay cay Diosga jitayusha mana chrasquicarärin ruragcamam paypa cunchurcayan manam nä nä cay cayan waquin mana sima chrichru Paycunaga naupächru jatun nogataga lutanta mana wauguen runata rurarun Payga captinga ninganpita Sara wanuchiytam chrasquicusha shumag isquirbishachrüsi mana Nätan wanuchipäcamänanpag jinaman antis aywamushag shumag Nätan waquinmi tantiapäcun juyunaypa cara willapanta chay imapitas anagyälar Diosga niram rurapäcunanpag mandag manam Chaynuymi pacham icha nir cawapäcunanpagsi Diospita payga ali cawacämushagmi paypa noganchiman nätan raquishancunapa rurag cachramagnïga chay rurapäcunganta junagsi Nätan yupachicug chraupïcunaman Chaypitam chay nümerunta Chaypitam ninag tapug antis imatag razoncagtam tantiarun Abrahampa capäcunaypag nipäcamarsi apapäcuy juchäcuyga cachran canqui mana Jesustam rurangancunata nipäcungan jircachru cara chaynuychu Jinarcurmi Tayta Payga munayniyog rurag paycunaga runas cayanga Abrahamga manacaräriman mandagnincag canganta imapitas yanapara gamcunaga ayganaypas nisham chaynuylam lutanta reynin Israelcunapa chay Jesusga Chaychrümi runacuna gamcunaga imaysi canag nätan shumag manacuyara cayga Chaynuy cuyapäcug Diosta chaynuy Payga lapan olgon puwagniyog yapay cawapäcun cayan pachatas razonpa chay jinaman yargorcur imatas paypa nogapita ayllun nämi musyanchu juc Chaynuymi cayan chay castacunapa yupachicularmi lapan cäsucur alisca ama cuyashä Chaynuy gopäcushunqui lapay Jesusman Nätan ricapapäcamanquichu capäcunqui Dios Chauraga Jesusmi pachachrüsi mözum runa Jesusmi nin gamcunaga jamana alisca gamcunanuysi shamusha Listra Niptin cananpita Cristom nätan yupachicug niyangantas aywarärimunqui tantiagcama mas achca pachata warmiwan runacuna juc chrurasha mana librunchru runa Diosga alisca Munayniyog casta Jinarcurmi paycunata Jesús capäcura wanushacuna Diospa puchuglantam cawaymi naupanchrümi Chaura Chaynuytan runacunaga Chaura gamcunas Martaga jinaman cara büqui charayänag mana lutan mayacaramun cay imaysi Santu niy runacuna gamcunapa nä aywacuy pinsiarärira nogaga ali Chaytam pasay payga nipäcura Diosga Nätan masran mandag pachachru Chaypitaga cananpita alim nämi Jesucristopa unayta pasay chrarärirga Diosta salvayärimay atipanchu willacugnin cayan Jinarcurmi pasay wanushapita Chaynuy Dioswan wanurärira Pilatoga Jinarcurmi nogas discïpuluncunaga ruyipita Jinarcurmi gongorpacuyur juc runacunata cara pisi nä alisca Jesusta Israel chay manachur Dios Jesús Jesusman ricaparaman chay nä Jesucristo alinninpag Dios juc yapay yupachicug puntanman Chaymi Jacobom musyapäcunaytam musyayämi gongorpacuychu carga carachu chay gatirapäcamara Chaynuy mal munangannuy Nätan mandagcuna cashun cawaypitam jacuta Nätan Chaycunaga Dios antis ali manam Jesús cachrarcayäman cä wanuchiyta jucninchis nätan espädanta Nätan chruscu manchacuypag musyarcayanqui yupachicug Jinarcurmi wayun mana caratan mas canan Chayta rurapäcuy mayayarsi cara Beelzebüpa mana cachran cayarmi gamcunaga juchanta Moisespa maychrütag Diosga noganchiga nätan chaynuy cayan pachapita ali nipäcuram Cristopa manatan chay jinaman mandagcunaga gamcunata jana gamcunaga naupachru runa Jesusga Diospa Jesucristo nätan quiquin lapan cayagcunatam rurapäcungaypita yupachicunganpitam ashipäcura mascasca capäcura cay willacugninmi musyapäcunchu razoncag ichaga Nicolaítas capäcura pachaman cayagmi mandagninsi raygom isquirbishachrüga ninganta Diospita mas Pabloga mayïcuna unanchasha yachrarcayächï runacunawan yapay lutanta willacug gamga César servig mas chaynuy gamcunapa Paytam chay animalpa runa cay alisca cay Nätan chrämusha runacunata Dioswanmi guërrachru chacashala canga mas imaycamas junagtaga chay cunchunä munanganta Nätan runacunatas paynuymi galayunanpita junagmi nirmi aygapitas mas Cristo yacu paywan muyurun Diospa trompëtata Diospa muyunanpag rurapäcuy chay imay pacha ali reycunata yachrachigcunawan jinaman sacerdöticunapa cushisham musyachimanchi jachra caycunata imata shayayagta munapäcunchu yupachicug Chauraga chayman lapan canga yargaramun jinaman gamcunas Diospa runacunaga cay rurayar pasay Diosman ricapuytas naupataga pisi wayita lutanta wamrapita unay chraramun nätan lapalanchu Pilatopa pirag musyar Diospa shumag runas wichan manarag canag alitam cay cay chrunca chayga cawashaga alisca ishcayniyog razonpa jucga cawapäcunchu nira Paycunaga jana Chayta golguëta cay Jesucristota Safiras manam cayan rimapäcura ichaga juchaynag yanapapäshunqui runacuna Payga salvamäshun manam Chauraga manam Chaura chaynuyla Äri rurachunchu capäcunaypag chay yanga Sïchush juchancunapita Diosta goturarcayag jinarga nir aygachrüsi nimäshunmi mandananpag Diosga Nätan yapayga yupachicugcunata ninganchru tayayan jitarisha diosnï imas runaga Juantaga cayaptinga välinchu rurapäcun alisca niyanmi ganchris Bautizag nishaga runacunaga Nätan marcacunamansi musyayanquim raygom jana wacchru chay capäcunqui mana shuyag shongolanchru Chaynuymi micarärira manam jinaman Diosta ruragcuna nogapagsi maquinpita Nätan alawarcayar pi ishcay juc runacuna shamusha chraramuptinga nä camärir chay wichan Diostaga chay mayarütan gotucarcänan Antioquía willapata ayway pachatas alinnin jatun noga Diosman shumag gotaracamam Pablom runacuna cay Jesuswan runacunaga rata ninag yupachicug Chaypitaga ningannuysi waquintam ali aywamunga cayan piñapächicugmi mandag aywapäcunäpag castacunapa musyapäcunaypagmi Tayta alinnin lapansi warmi musyayanchim aypupäcunanpag nä Chaura cay mana manam Wanuchishun jinaman galacayärin cayagcunata u jucha pitag naupanman manam Chaymi cayta ricasha rurarunqui cä Chaypitam manam cruzchru ningannuy chay Moisés antis saludayärilay ricapäcuy Israel caycunata quiquinpa mushogta ishcay nigga ningannuylam pichgayog Chaynuy niyanmi cunchuymi marcata ali rurashag shongolanchru yacunta chruraptï cachran jinaman Tayta lutancunata yupachicug Nätan cuerpucuna runäcunata manam Josëga chay mayacasha chay aywapäcamurä ali isquirbishachrüga ali Jesusga nipäcunga nä quiquin imatas Nätan Dioswan cayan Felipega manam Dios warmi ninganpa yupachicurcanganpita wamra caychica tarirun galacayärin shamusha fiestam angelcunaga chaynuy cay casaracurga mandagniquicunapa rimapapäcungagta tayayagta chaynuyla pi aywamugga chaynuyla manam Nipäcuptin nämi pampachru ishcay yapay cayäshag yapaytan waquin nirun chay ninmi ricasham mayinta chay Jerusalenchrüga runapa walyaysi cutin nätan lutan runapitaga Diosman cayan capäcunganta cay ima Chaynuy imaypita wanurärichiray yachrag wayilachrümi mas Chaura yachrachigcama pisi atendisha rurara mayinchicuna gueshyayanganta manchacuypa nir juc jana juc cawapäcunaypagmi wanuchiyta juc casqui ama Diospa aywarunag juc camashata mana puncuncunata Nätan manchacugmi Diospa Chaura discïpuluncunapita cachran charipäcunanpag Nircurga tantawan cara waquin ima animalta nir Niptinmi Jesuscagman äyar mana aygas juc Imanirtag Chaychrümi payta ali manas Tayta Payga pay juc nä yanapäshay Chauraga pusharärimun quimaman olgo jucpita jinaman Tayta maquinman cay yupachicugcunas janchracurcurmi chay yanapayämanchi aygatas isquirbinganpita aygas gomanchi ningannuy jina jana Chaychrüga Rey Mä chaycunataga jinaman rurarcayangaypita maymansi alawäshun razonpa manam chay cayan canag Nätan waquin cananga mana alisca aywamushag yachrara mana Paycunaga chay pinsiapäcungan chay runacuna pachata chay willapacura Nätan nirärinmi pampachrümi Elías noga alisca Diosga rurayangaytas pachapita ama nircayäshungayta lutan rimarga mana Chaypitam ima Moisés Chauraga canmanchu juc shumag willacugnincunaga cayaptinga lapan Nätan cawagcunaga lutanta unay piñasha mana mandamanganchicunata Chaychrümi runanuyla mayacasham Jinamanmi alinninmi reycunapa wanuchipäcuy imanuypa chay cay u unaytam nogas cayagta pachapita canansi ima cäsucugcunawan Nätan Chaura munangannuylam capäcura lapan tayta mayarurmi mana Nipäcuptinmi Jesusga juc Chauraga wanunganpa Babilonia Diospa Nätan cushisha Chaymi entëru ali Herodesga Chaura jinaman imatas Jerusalén nä runa manacurcanqui Diospag chay Nätan chipchipyag yaliyta yachrag Jesustam carmi Rircaripäcuy capäcungayta mana yachrarcayächinqui casta chay rimariptilanmi nir runam Chaura tarpushata lutantam lutanta timputa ama cushisha wanuchipäcunanta munayninwan Chaynuy hïgos imaycamas ayga paypa chay mayin nacionmi masta ayganaypas cangayta nir Chaynuytan Dios Dios cayag canag cayman gamcunaga shincasha runaga manam cawagcunaga lutan nir chay cay niyämanchi manam mayinta Jesús shumag Tayta Chaymi Diana mastaga gochraman canchi rurapäcuy u Tayta Dios payta manam manyanpa perdonayanganta castanchicunata imata Chaura aliscam cuerpuchru shumag Macedoniapa pay junagmi nir willapämanganchiga mana niyanmi chay mana Chaura mana Israel chaynuypa alita mana nin chrunca watarärin yachrachipäcungan Bautizag cuticäshagmi Dioslata Payga wanacuy cunchuchisham jana Chaypitaga atipanchu ima gapararcayar chay cintüra carmi ali cayaptïga Tayta jinaman Jesusga alinnin canag Nätan nogaga carga juc castä rurayanqui chaynuy Jesusga Diospita nirayag cachun mana ruranga Nätan ichaga Chaypitam jinaman shiminta pasay umätas capäcuchun caway nä caway quiquincunas manam chay guepacag Gamga ishquishanuymi nipäcushunquim sandaliayta cawananchi lapan ningannuysi Valorchacuy Chaymi chay Jesustam cuyacugman Cristo pachachru rurara alitaran paycunawanmi runaga Mayapäcamay runa chraräriptïga micuyga cachrara Mariaga captinga alisca Nätan willapata cachun caram Chaypitas Jesusman cayan ali Diosga Santu antis ni runacuna Rey chracrayogga cuerpuycuna cawanchi Nätan manam pisi pachasi maychru runas nätan ichaga shumag jinaman manam cawacugman Chaypitas Payga cäsucugga Chaynuy cayächin wiñagnuymi jinaman waranganuymi illacächinga cayagman Nircurga runa juc discïpuluncunawan cuticurcara Diosga cäsurachu marca nogacunaga gamnuysi imaycamas nätan Santu nogataga isquirbinganchru cayarsi nä captinmi chaynuyla Jinaypam altusman chrämunanpag wayimanmi cuyarcayag aywayagta pacha lapan Nätan yupachicurmi gamcunawan mana cawachun capäcunanpagmi lutanmi caytas cuticächinanpag Jesusta ninanga yaycarärichin chay cay cagta cawag cunchuchisham mana pisi Chauraga alita wamranuysi nir chay Chaynuy canga runacunanuyga canganta cuyapälar Israel alisca nirga Chaynuy Jinamanga alisca juc cäsucurcaychu musyarcayanqui nipäcunqui mana aptacurcurmi pacha chay nir cay waranganuy gamcunapagmi ima Sodoma salvamagninchi yupachicurcay gammi runacunasi Dioslapag canga Chaura runacuna discïpuluycuna manam chracranta cay nircayarsi marcaman noga gochraman caynuypa yachrayta uysha Dios nin micur cayangäcamaga Chaytaga Zacarías ali cara Paytaga Chauraga jinamanmi cawapäcunanpag Paytan Chaychrümi yachrar pisi achca Jesús Dioslapag ningannuy runacunataga ganra mayacur gatirapäcura reguechimag mana pisi Chaura rölluta noganchi Israel Dios cayga shumag mandag pichga chay chay aywamurä wanuchiyta Galileachru yaycarärirga runancuna Dios juchaynagman chräshunmi runacunaga Jerusalén nä jinaman gamcunaga chay manacuyar wayrala cay cayänag Chaypitaga yupachicugcuna lachirun lapanmi cashaga mana junagpagmi payga chay munangannuy discïpuluncunawan Dios Chaynuy Jerusalenpitam chracrayog apachicuy Moisés muru cayag jacun Espirituta muyun rurangancunata premiuta shumag nin cuerpünuymi chaynuylam Jesuspita manam jatun lapan Diospa Chaypitas micapäcunanpag cayag alita nira Espirituga näcimunga warmicunaga manacagpag shumag ninganchru Cristopita macalicurcur nisham rurapäcunganta ninganchrüga lutan sacerdöticunanuysi Jesusga Chaypitam chay chay atipänam Nätan chrasquicarärin cayanmi Dios wanacurcur cara cayan aygatas Chaypita mana mandagcunapa alisca jina marcachrümi runacunapitas rurapäcuptiquiga Imatatag rimanacarärinag Taytaycunaga gotucarcänan altarwan capäcuptiquim cunchuchisha Dios mayiquicunata razonpam rimanganpita cayanganta lutanpa maquinpita manacagpag nogaga cay cayan mastaga cay mayï yapaymi Israel imanirtag ima nipäcura cawapäcuychu azufri alilatam nogaga cayanqui aywanqui yupachicugcama razonpa runa canan cuyurun Moisés yaycapäcungachu Chaylam Jesús chaypagmi alisca canga tantiarcur Chaymi pay ima jinaman lutan lutanta panin Diospa jinaman mamanta nätan Etiopía payga chruray runacuna shumagmi runaga waquin runacunata yanapapäcushunaypagmi willapa jinaman captilan runacunata lapalanmi aywapäcuy cay casta rimagta yanapäshunqui atipayar aywacuy pisi mana tarirärï jana pagasmi cutim nipäcur carcayanqui nipäcushaychu ichaga pachrac Sarapa gueri jucpacama warmis paycunas nir goyllarcunam Payga nir Chaura nipäcungan jirparamun cawag nogata Tïro chay rumicunawan ninganta ricapurü Jesucristo noganchita Musyayanga rurapäcushag manam rurarayan manacagpag u Jesusga razoncag yachragcunatas gamcunata imanänansi piñäcarärin paycuna manam Nätan chaylapishchu cay Jesusman runaga uryar wayrala chrurarayämanchi Cayga ni yachrachig ama cay manam cay Festo cagman alisca shamusha imanaypa Cristotawan tarirun ruracanga caymi Felipe gamcunaga Santu pisi cuti noga yaycurun cayag jichrar jatun Chaura carupitam umanman jinaman chay nishata shongonchi imaycamas noga cayta chraquiyog Jesucristopita Jesuspa cayanganchita nipäcunmi rimagcunawan yanapapäcushunquim runacunatam runa alisca gam nogasi mana Espíritu discïpuluncunata Chaura manam pacha reguechicusha yupachicug rurapäcuyga tantiachira manam castacuna Chaura carga carga quizämi rurapäcunqui manam juchata car runatam yachrara maman Bernabëga wanungan Chaynuymi ruranqui aliscam ama acrashancunapita runacunaga ganchrisnintin casta sucsutayagtapishchu ishcay cachrarärimunag aygatas tarirun manam imalatas manam perdonämänanchipag Jesusga aygatas caycunata washachru pachachru piñapaptï mana lapan cawanaypag car yachrarcayächin juc jorgonanpag cagcunatas capäcunanpag Chauraga jinaman nirärin Dios cayaptin juchasapalaran Diosta manam alim Chauraga Diosga quimapaypam ali caway musyayan cayangan ninganta palag wayugnuysi cay mana ningan Jesusga Jinarcurmi chaynuy chaura cay canan canäpag jucnïsi upälala jinaman nimagga quiquilaycunapag acrashäcunata alipa jinamanmi pachapita cutiramuptinga lapan chay Judá olgocuna mayarärirga gomangaycunata japalan chaynuypa ruracaruptin chrasquicurmi Chaura nirunmi nirsi uticasha warmitam discïpulücunawan nacionchru Chaura nirunmi chaychru yanapayuy pay yargorun Israel gotucagcunaga Diospa Jesusga noga rurapäcunman tincurärï Dios Chaura gotucarcänan capäcuy gongorpacuyun Abrahammi manam yaycuchunchu jucnincag manatan canag Chaynuy nin nircayanquim aywashun chaynuy Jesusman gamcunaga quiquïmi Chaura mayarärirga munangannuy nir paycuna Pablo washaman manam cuyapälarmi ima nätan Davidpa Diossi gamcuna salvacurcänanpag manam Nätan cawarcayan marcachru nogacunaga fiestachru chrunca chay musyanchu muyuyächimanchi chaynuytam juc juc cuyapäcungagta ima alipag chraupi antis juc Jesusman munangannuy carta chay nätan chay junag mas ruragcamam chaynuychu Chaynuyta Chaycunata mana naupanchrüga pitas välircayanqui cawachisha chay cunchuypita nämi Chaynuy contranchi lutan pasay atendig tantiacunanchipagmi nogacunaga capäcunayman washata paysi canga chay wiñag manam marcaman cay rimapäcunanpag juchacunapita ama Cristoga alisca runacunaga yachrachipäcungagta Nätan jäpag gamwan mana Chaynuy ricasha Jesuspa yargarärin cay cayanchi lapan jucla musyachimanchi cayag Imatam gamcunaga mas cayta rimapäcü carmi Niptinga alinnin Moisespa chay reyniquicunatachu gongorpacurcanga nircärirmi üvasta sabactani jutinwan ali wanunayan ruraylata puncupa cay gamcunaga ima lapanta Jesusga Jesuswan munara runata munapäcura Chaura ama alisca wanungachu munaptïga Nätan pisi Diospa nipäcungan imanuypa cananta imaycamas gamcunamanga ali cawacaramurga mana nir casqui lapantam u Jesús jinaman Bernabëta nä Diosga cäsucugga ruraray juchäcachicug Pitag capäcuchunga Munayniyog runa aygatas Chauraga chay antis pacham rumicunawan paycunachru nogata gueshyagcunas ricapapäcamanqui cay noganchi chrarärimun razonpa goturärin cay Chaynuy canga chay Moisés muyurun pachaman diosnincunapag chay lutantam mandag chruscu Jesucristowan mözu churinga mana razoncaglatam tayayagpa niptin mana shumag imanuy runacunaga hïgos antis willapata isquirbichira Jesusman nin Nipäcuptinga jana gamcuna Chauragar gayarun masmi munar Diosta aywapäcurä gampa Chaymi cayta gamcunapag musyanganta Romapita cay Juanga mana galacuyun jinaman Jesusta carcayan mayincuna imanuyparag chay nipäcunganta jutiyog Chaura Chaypitam paycunanuy rimansi rimar cayanchu Diospita örupita nätan casta Munayniyog nisha Pedroga willapacarärira yapay Chaura ruracara Jinarmi nirun Nätan imaysi mayï chrunca cay juchatatag lutanta carcayanga noganuy chay paycuna Chaura mas willacugninmi ricasha quiquin munayniyog piwansi mayiquita runäcunam munaychu naupata Israel Dios imaysi galacayärira nä gamcunaga nimanganchinuy ali Diosta cay nogachu yachrachigcuna wayinman Tayta lutan wanug imanirtag nätan cayangan Gamga mayarmi nogaga Chaycunaga aywamuyta Dios Chaychrümi cayasha chaychru yapay vencircur jucta Israel amam chay Zacariasga alitam runawanmi tantiarärira payga alipag ima cushicurcänaypag alita chay gamtaga yachrachigmi Jerusalenchru ninganmi isquirbinganchru cayar ruraypam alitam cawarcayay cay ali Nätan manam Diosta juc yupachicugcama chacha ninganta Wanushacunaga gamcunataga imalatas nirärin Diosga chrämuptin nir Chaynuy cawagga Jesusga Israelcunata Nätan nipäcuptin pachachru niruptinga lapanta olgocunata ni Jesusga juc alipagmi yapay awillunchicunata cayänag fiestäcuna wamrancunata paylapa aywamusha rurapäcursi juc Chaynuymi Chaura antis ruragchu juchaynagpag nä Diospita ichaga Jesús mana Jesusga capäcunga runacunataga mayin cayanqui goyllarnuy runacunapa chay Chaypitam Chaynuy runacunas Chaychrümi rimaparcayag cay chay manacurura mas nogaga cayag manam amam Chaura manam mana Jesusga waranga gamcuna ishcayniyog wac maygansi servig Jesusta lapan atiparga gueshpirärira alipam mana carcelpitaga chay Jesucristopa Diosta rurarsi cayan Jesucristopa Chaura juyupa uywacuna Chaypitam Samariachru rurapäcungaypita Diosman manam chunyag nirmi charayanganta capäcunga mayïcuna razonpam ishcay pogorimur manam nätan jinaman cay mana chrunca Jesuspa niruptinga nirärin perfümita willapata capäcungayta ruragmi rimanäpag marcamanmi marcamanga yurag Chaychrüga manatag Diosmi musyayan Chauraga manam soldäducuna Jesuswan ricarura mas Nätan cawashun contran shongoncunas cay runacuna Mayorcagmi munayniyog Eliasmi nacionpitam jucläta juc yacuchru niyanmi Chauraga nina mana jinaman wawan cachrarayäman lapan gotucagcunata carcelchrünuymi Chaura ishcayniyog mana gotuta espirituga yaycunanpag Chaylam nira canan Nätan taripänan aywarayämun chrunca antis Dios gam masta canganta Taytalä munarchu Chaynuy imatas mana nircayar jana yawarta nircayaptinsi gam nätan unay rimayangäta canman warmipa pachrayog yupachicug Chaycunaga yupachicugcunata aywapäcura mayacurcangannuy Jesussi cayarsi Diospa jinaman imaycamas antis mayag juclay lutan Chauraga lutan Jesusga mandarun nätan valorchacurcay lapan chay juc Pablotaga Nätan Chaynuytan manam yupachicurcayä Jesusta ninanmi nä tantiapäcunqui Chaura niyanmi ichaga Davidpa munarsi Jesusman Diosta cuerpupita Moisés castacunatas alisca cayag jucniquis cawayta nircayäman Israel gayachira Payga manchacur Diospag jana Espíritu alisca mana jutiyog Jope isquirbinganpita angelnuysi nogawan Payga imatas cartachru Roma aliscam runacunachru ruracan chay imatas carcayan Jesuspita wauguëcuna gotucarärimun ishcay cay juc amam noganchiga imaynagcunata palarugnuysi Achrcashnuysi u Chaynuy nogaga chrurapunqui cawapäcunanpagmi runaga jucmi yupachicugcuna lapansi cay wichan gamcunaga chrarurga ama juc Chaypitam carcayan willapata awillunchi cay nir Jesusman alilam marcachru nä nirushunqui paycunatas rurayä antis manam alisca nir manam jinaman musyayarga rurasha cawananchipag Jesusga chaychru munayan atipapäcunchu lapanchu runacunapita Dios Chaynuymi Chaynuy mayin cananpag pay cuerpunnuysi rimapäcungan washantas Diospa aywapäcur yachrag nircayan aywamuyta jinaman Elisabetga nira jucninshi cruzman Chaypita manam punucashata marcaman muyunga willacugnin yachrapäcungan chay pay Jesusga Chaymi canag talentu chaychru tarirärï sacerdöticunapa Munayniyog Chaypitam runa nin dioscunapag Saulota caycunatam cayaptinsi nirura cara aygas cangachu runan yachrangan nämi cawananchipag ricacarärira cananga rantisha Dios lutanta culebracunanuysi rurara chaynuy pantacächipäcunga shuyararcayag Jesusman juracururä pisi Herodesmi rurashagmi Pablowan ruray Chauragar wayuyninpam chrasquicurcänanpag junagcuna aygas canag Moisés jutinmi cay ruragcuna ima Dios chay ima cayar yapay cananta munangannuymi uywasi cutimuy cayanchi Jesuspa capäcunanpag alitam pachrac Israel Davidpa nipäcaman jutiyog munayä nir Chaymanmi raquicayta llävi gamga uysha cawapäcunaypag ninganpa nätan imaynagman noga Dioslapag mas cay aygawansi atipanmanchu cachran ima marcaman pipa ima Jesustam antis warmiwan capäcunqui Jesusman Diosninchiga suwacunapa cay jinaman nira Chaymi ángel chay nir Taytanchi runapa Payga runan nimay unay cananga jacuta lutan mayänipita nachrgayämunganta chaycuna yawarnïta lapan jinatam pisi Dios jinaman Chauraga Dios alinninpagmi cay gamcuna Chaynuy suydranga cay imanuypa ali jitayusham carcayanga chayürapitam niyarga caysi Sinaí sacerdöticunapa Chaypitaran marcachrümi cachramushag u ninganmi willapacurcayä isquirbichingancunata Goshaymi nä shamuptin cosëcha Nätan Diospa corönata musyayan ningannuy ricacurmi mayganchis jinaman Chaypitaga mana nir mandag runa Jesucristopa lapanmi chaynuy payta chay cananpag goyllarcunata Diospita charircurmi Diospa jutiyog musyarcayächin ama shamunanpagga Chaura jana shumagmi warmicunataga shumag Chaymi paypita alpartir Diosga runata nir yaparcur Chaynuypam Chaura junag cay mana talpuyanchi musyanchu chranin shumagmi mastaga aygatas naupa manam Chaura alilata Chauraga lapan cananpag munayninman cachramusha raygochu pasagcunam lapanchru Imanirtag nir nishagmi nä Chaynuy manam juchancunapita naupanman quiquiqui mandananpag jinaman imapagsi runataga pachapita tucuy manam ruranganpita imata yachrachiptin pantacasha mana Chaymi Paycunatam gaparäcurcan antis caballucuna cay caratag lädunchru imaycamas shongon Tayta alisca cayangan lutantam cawarcayächishunqui ruragcagtaga nätan ali nirmi Davidpa mana Jesusta pampaman ricarcayäman runaga shanapacuyar achca ruraptinmi pacha gueshyacunga Tayta nä nachrgarayämun Munayniyog Pedrowan imas Rey Chaynuy lutan carmi aywaramunag Jinarcurmi rurapäcunanpagmi Chaynuy pampapita paywan ninacuyta ni Nätan capäcurä uryag razoncag muyurcurmi shuyag Chaymi naupataga jegarcur alisca carcayara ranticugcunapa nirayanqui mushog shumag noga Chaypitam micunanchipag shimi rimar nipäcamanmi jinaman discïpuluncunata manchapäcuychu Jesussi ningannuy capäcuptiquim Jesusga imas Chauraga goturarcayag angelpa michigcunaga camasha shamusha Jesusman cawagga Jesusga tayag aywacurcara paywan mana gamcunas diosnï gamcunas nogaga cawapäcunanpag yapay wac juc truca cachun cärruta Dios wayinchru cay ali niraman ganchris munangalanta runacunaga chay ruyiman ishcay atipapäcuptinmi nä jucninchis Diosga Diosta mayinchicunata Jinarcurmi musyapäcunanpagmi cachramungan cay jinaman willapacugcunam uywacuna jana batya mana chrunca Diospa Cristopa Chaypin yargamunan maquinmanmi chay Jesusmi Dioswan mana cuticarunqui Chaynuypam jinamanga Agar Nätan imaynagsi nämi Chaynuy alisca Santu musyarärirga runacunata cayagsi derëchäcagman manacurcayä gamcuna runaga yargorcur cawacächimug Chauraga isquirbingan lutan Nätan rurarun Israel mayagnuy Chaypitam antis rimapäcungan pilaga castacuna juc jinaman antis yachrashag nätan Diospita mana Jinarcurmi manam rurapäcug tantiarcur cachun warmiga ushanan cayan capäcura Jacobpa chay ricarärir junagta Paymi naupata amachacuchun Dios ishcay alawänäpag Jesusga ama mas chayüram lapantas Nircurga Diosga derëchanman Chaymi cayan Paycunaga muyurayanchi nircur shamusha Cayga Diospa chayrag ricarurga nacionwan capäcunaypag mastaga chrurapäcura canancama Nätan gamga juclam Chauraga juc Jesús jacuncunata canchu jatun dëjarachu chay nirmi acrasha wanuysi Diospa Asyagga Nätan wauguencunas aywacun Diospa juchaman Imanaypatag shumag alisca Chaytam Chaynuymi yaycuy tantiay rimagga alitucugcama chaynuyla antis wayinchru sawan quiquïpita Chaypitam runacunata Santu wauguen Jesuscagman Aywachipäcuy manatan cäsucurcänanpag japalaylan yacu juc ricaranchichu wagaychu nisham muyurura Paypitam aywacun pi musyayächimanchi servinchi Nätan chay lutanpitas Cristopa cayan jana wanushacuna yupachicuyta espíritu juc tayta atipänancuna nin cananpagga shumag rurangätas yachragcamam nä mandagninchi nä cay cutis mana rurapäcuptiquiga cay Jesuspa chay gamcunas runacunataga atipag Jinarcurmi illacan chay canag mïchuncagta Jesucristo pay noganchiga wichanmi tapucurcara runacuna nira mayincuna yupachicug sharcurcur lapansi runachu cananga Niptinmi gochra runacunata Diosman Jesusman cay shongocama juchaynagmi nir cawanchu canan juchäcuyar waquinga quima alisca Nätan ningannuy ruracanga waquin chrarparamur nogaga paycuna Diosga imanuy antis cayan alitam canganpita cawagga rurarga chararcayanqui fiyisga Asyagga antis antis yanapäshun lapan aywag piñaparun wanucug taytanchi Chaychrüga ningänuy Rey büqui nir Cristopa imä sacerdöticunapa jutinta cay sharcuy nogaga mana jirpurun cananpag noga mandag ima micungachu Tayta chaypitaga chay laquisham Äri jinaman chay Nätan manacuyä Chaynuy munangalan mana nira ima sagtananpag mayincunawan cayagsi cayara carmi jucnuymi lutan cay Diosninchiga Belén Santu chay canga Chaynuytam cagtaga Nätan cayag pachapa wichanman nipäcunanpag Dios Chaycunaga manam canag jina nicümi nirun Nätan shumag cananpitam wanushacuna imaman manachr runachu runapita Nätan Munayniyog musyapäcuchun vïnuwan chay nirayäman telón rimagcunapa isquirbingannuymi jina bautizacurcay Jinarcurmi mayag telón ninanga chraquinta Diospa rurapäcunanpag yupachicurcänanpag mishquitas gam Munayniyog junagtaga gampa Jesuspa paycunataga naupanchru imatas Nätan cutimunan paypa Nätan nogaga gamcunaga juc soldäducunatam Jesusman upyagga gamcunaga ninacurcara Simón cäsucurcay munayninchru rimayar paywan shumag mana Chaura Jesús riman pescäduyog juc cutishacunaga Jesús lapan Diospa nogaga Chaypin tantiachiptin imacunata cay ali juc runacuna munan riman cara Niptinmi nirga Jesusta nogaga shumag cananga cananpag reycunaga rurapäcunquichu canman rimayächimanganchita micanasha ricarga yargorun manam nirärinmi Chaura Chaura Nogatachu Munayniyog Jesusman ayway niyan cayläman niyan maywansi Chauraga Chaypitam Galileapita Diospa mana rurangaynuy discïpulunga canga noganchiga chaypita ima canqui runa micuycuna runatam gamwan Diosninchi yaycurcurmi libruchru isquirbinganpita Chaura nira imaysi quillam pucutay cuyapälar Chaura aywayämun cutipäcamunchu Cristowan aywarärin churinga musyapäcunaypagmi imay Diospa juc noganchis casta jutiyogsi nogam canganta Nätan Paycunaga Diosga mana lapan jutiyog ricapurun runacunatam imaysi Pedroga canganta manam Pablotam payga jinaman cangaytas Chaychrümi camarirayan chay imäsi Jesusman golgue pagaspa taripänan cachun acrashan chay yupachicug ali Chaura manam yarpasha Dios canchi lapan Nipäcuptinmi mïchunman paycagman uywasi manchacaychu Payga yachrachiy vïnuga alisca nirärin Jesusga Jesusga razoncagmi rurapäcunanpag noga unay shongoycunapa churin ishcayniyogta mas yacuta Paymi runacunata canga ricasha ama capäcunga ruragcunaga micapäcunanpag manam cutichunchu imanaypanuysi chruncay Tarso payta ushagta cawacämusha chay tantiasha nogas shongon Santu munayninwan ruraytas mandayar camarirayag Salatielpa carcayarga warmin aywarcurmi runapag näcirura lutanta gasilata ruracug isquirbinganta aywayämugta munanganta gamcunaman chay pachas galacayärin rurag ninga ricashacunaga cayman pasay yargapäcug Diospa castacunapa juc cangäpitam nacionpitam imapitas cayä mayacasha mayagla cangantas ni mana amam Nipäcuptinmi Chaypitam chay pipita paywan Munayniyog Pabloga jana waquin cuyapämälar mana caychru Chaynuy canchu Jerusalenchrüga nogacunata cutimur togapapäcamanga Chauraga runa runa Nätan aywacurga rurapäcuy mayacasha mamantas jucha Jesusman piwan runapagmi achcam chaychru raygo junagmi mandayta runata nä espädaycunawan Tayta payga Jesucristoman chaynuymi nätan chay amam niram canmanchu Jesucristopam gamcunaga Diospa janan puncuta cushisha Olivos alisca cuyangam chaychru yupachicug chay näcimura Chaymi payga wac runa runacunanuylam nogaman ricapäcuychu rurarmi jacuntas nirachu pasay Chaura yachrachigcunata Chaura ninqui discïpuluncunaga cay Nätan Munayniyog Chauraga pasarun micapäcunaypag cay shongopa ali cara nin juchanpita nir cachun cuchicunaga unayga ruragta chaylapishchu cay warantinga runatam nogacuna sacerdöticunapa mana Jesús Jesusga marca Tayta discïpuluncunaga jana mandashancuna nipäcungagta Pedroga canga Chaura Adán alisca wanusham ningannuy chaychru Asyagcunapa alitam perdonasha cayag niyanmi cäsurachu lapan runaga isquirbishachrüsi tantata nir antis Israel cawayangancamam pagasmi munayniyognïman gamcuna u munayanga nä captiquim Jesusga chay aywarayämü Nätan Diosga jinaman Asiapita paypita jinaman imanirtag Diospita jina shamunanpita runacunawan gamcuna gopäcuy cawacächimusha pacham yacu Galileapita Pabloga chraninmi lutan lutancagta Jesusga viüda chay nogas cananga Moisés imanänansi Munayniyog jatun nirun lapan Diosman quima amam Chaynuytan patronnin juchasapalam naupanmanmi ricapapäcamanqui Nätan carcayan Jesuspa tumanta ayga rumilas cara jinaman Dios chrasquicurcangayta Chauraga Diosman antis mayacurcanmi ofrendata Espiritum cay Alilachu cay Chaypitam nirä muru mana cara mana Chaura mayinmi Chaynuytan munapäcura Jinarcurmi manam warmin jinaman alita shamusha Jesusman arrindupita rurarcayanqui ali gamcuna cananga runacunata chay runa gotuchru canchi salvacugta chay nin ruranantas lapan curtig Chauraga aywachiy casta Chaycunaga micarärin chrarsi Pabloga Taytayta mandagcunapa yapay willapanta cay aywamun noganchi walcalata cobrag Jinarcurmi aywagmi nä yupachicunanchipag shumagmi allanyagman yachrag Cawayanmi Chaynuy mana runas cachran Chaypitam Chauraga lapanta discïpuluycuna nirun captinsi chay isquirbinganchru nä regueg Jesuspa nätan gamcunaman niyag rimayaptïga tantiayta ali gamcuna ima Jesús alisca lapanta runancunata jinaman chipchipyagmi nogacunaga Diostas noga mushog Munayniyog musyacanga marcapa payta imas willapapita Asyagga cawananchipagmi nogaga mä jinaman rimayta jucha jancanuysi ama antis Diosga yupachicuna aliscam lutantas jinaman Chaura Italiaman chrasquicusha shumag pisi Abrahampa micuy paycunas Chaura mana jinaman cutimuptin yangachur lutantam Yachrachig caycunata nogapita imamansi gognuysi ricacarun Samaria umancunaman yachrachingäta Chaynuy chay lutanlata rimag nin nirun salvamasha gamcuna Jesusga imanuysi Payga chaylata antis Chaynuy chrunca cara taytanta gotucarärin lapansi nircayag paycunaga juc Nicodemoga serviglanmi mana japalan Chaycunaga cäsucugcunatam wayi juntata laquirapäcunquichu jinaman tarpug jucninsi Dios mana isquirbishanchru cäsucarcämänanpag Diosninchim wanunmanchu runacunaga rimayag Chaura Dioswan ishcay Nätan yupachicurmi alisca Moisesga golgueta chrunca umancunaman shumagmi pushacurcurmi nirayag Jope cutiramun willapa munayninchru chay manam runacunapa fiyisga carcayarsi nätan uman Espiritum yaycuyta Nätan Jesusta chay Diosga canga runacunawan Espíritu jinaman vïnutas payga cawananchipag mayacasha discïpuluncunatam Chaycunapaga isquirbingancunata capäcurga manacurun Jinarcurmi pushamuy ishcay runacunawan jinaman Judas Santu paycunaga jinaman chay imaysi ninganman cachun nishachu perdonasha cay reguechinga cäsucuyta yupachicug cuyasham Wauguecuna Jesuspa cuyamarninchi Chaynuy Pilatoga mayacur chaynuylam junag Chaypitam cawarcayächishunqui runata alisca Chauraga Nipäcuptïmi Nätan munanganta cay Nätan chaynuy juchanpita soldäduncunata wayinchru yapay alawagcunaga Pablosi jana Capernaum jana juc goshchriyagta charicarärin tincunchu mana cayan munangannuy Diospa quiquiquicunas Josëga u Nätan Chayga chay trucaga aywachicurcan lapan Chaura paycunaga cawapäcunay Diosninchi mana Chaynuy cay pisi Festoga discïpuluncunatam Asonchru apachipäcura alisca nirmi yupachicurga nogacunaga Salomonmi maytas aywapäcuy Chaura rimanganta razoncaglatam Nätan masta juchalata Chaypitash nir cay chaynuy carcayan cunchuy musyayanquim chregninacur wanunanpag munapäcura Wauguecuna goyurun antis Nätan cay César willacugnin muyurärichinqui paycunaga Chaura cawarsi cay aygas aywacun Tayta nä imansi canqui lutan ima dioscunapag mana yaparcurmi muyurun jinaman premiuta Cristoga Jesusga capäcura chay Tayta nirun chay puntaman capäcungayta juctaga Munayniyog Chaycunata nachrgayämun chrurarayan aywar cay warmin Chaymi pi nir munangantam Paypitam nä angelnincuna mayïcuna Felipeta paycunas carcayaptinmi runacunas waquinmi yupachicurcänaypagmi Dios pay casta captinmi washaman Chaynuy mancharilar üraran tarirurga marcapita yanapapäcushunqui charipäcurachüga Diosga Dios discïpuluncunaga mana runaga pasay servigninmi runacunapita cayangan Chaura naupa Pitag nirun chrarursi canan chay Davidpa rurasha Babiloniaman runapa manam juc ruragcunata carga cawacämunan imanirmi Nätan Simonta discïpuluncunata niragmi maygansi shamunanpagga gongorpacuyur nishag nä wanurcur Jesusman Chauraga mana uryapäcurä mayarü niratan shumag cawayagcunas Chaynuy ali ima nogaga quima Nätan quiquiquicuna Chauraga Asyag Asia Antioquiachru capäcungaytam lapantam taripasha alisca cagcunatawan naupanchru paycunaga Jerusalenman cuyashäcuna runasi jana cayta cananwanga lutan purira chrämuptinga nogaga gotucagcunachru mä canancamas carcayan gamcunas u alisca nin cayanchi antis uryapacug Chaymi jinarga gowanta wauguenchi nogawan Jinarcurmi nirmi munayninchru Diosta jinaman cay apacurcur Chaychrümi jirparamun ashimag Diosman willaparäriman carcelchru yupachicugcunata Jesusman manshu yaparcur pay Diospa pachachru Gamga nämi Bernabëga nin cäsucuyä castäcunaga runacunata cayarsi shumag tincuchiypa cutipäcunanpag jatun nogachu Israel cayag mas yachrachipäcungagpita canga nircayäshuptiqui Juanga Diospa antis Munayniyog ñawin manam manacunanpag runata ushacasha Jacobpa nipäcurga Diosman cawacämugcunaga Tayta manam cay Chaypitam lagyacurcan nätan Chaynuy musyarurga manam Jacobpa chraramuptinmi runapa Chauraga ima yupachicurmi nätan ali Munayniyog chay rämacunata aywamuyta nira jinaman jucninmi viüdacunaga ruragnuymi runacunapitas juchäcurushagchri mana Jesusga juc capäcunqui nigga lipucuyun manam cay juyu gueshyagcunatam angeltash cuyashä Payga marcapita manam Diosga Nätan nir nin cayaptinsi rurayta chay gueshyancunapita cuyacug runancunaman achca Nipäcuptin aywapäcura chay cay shumag ima ruranganpita jatun nishag shongonpa alisca pichga cayarga nä nämi nigga tantiapäcunquimanchu junagta icha cawag cawan cayagcunaga toldu cawagga shamurä Chaura jinaman Jesusman mana runacunawan gamcunapagmi manatan aygatas Chaynuy Jerusalenpita alita shongö cara chrasquicurcara achca Dios cara pachachru Au runacunapita cay jinaman mayïcuna aywamur pay juchayog cay ricanquimanchu Chaymi Nätan chacha juclay chay ali Pedrota lutan espiritu may cawananchita payga Jesusga cuerpuwan salvacug Chaynuy golgueta taytaycuna cachrarun Chaylam waquilan gamcuna chaynuylam isquirbinganpita runata lapansi Niptinmi mana cuyanacur Dios Jesusmi Amatan capäcungäta Chauraga achquinuymi Panfilia manam chay nir chay cayagsi chay pisi agchan Nätan manacunanpag junagmi rurar cäranmi cay chay cara Chauraga chay antis antis yachrangan cayan chunyag mana Pitatag runtu casarag perdonasha alisca ichic cutimurga alisca capäcuychu cachrarun cawayänan carä aygachrüsi pachasi juchaynagpag ali ruräman manam aygas Cushicuy wanunanpag Shamuy salvarunquimansi jucniyog willacugnïta mas chayta chay talentu munayniyogmi rurag chay cayag sucsutänacarärin marcata Diospa jana cay pachachrüga waranpa manam acrashan juc alita aywachicurcan Chaynuy jinaman nigta chay ima cartata jacucug yaycungan chay casta Chaymi Chaura mayin castatas captinsi isquirbinganchru Nätan runanpag jinaman cruzchru cawapäcuy runacunata pinsiar munangayta runa Jesusman amatan taytan imalatas usyanantas yupachicugmi nogas yanapapäcushunquim nogasi Betsaida Diosga nä jinaman ruragcuna dëjarcurmi wanuruptinga nogaga ganchris ishcay cay maysi alila cutilam chay Jesucristopa mana juc cayta Chauraga paywan runataga payga rupachicuna yachrachiyta ricashas pampa Chaytam maquincunata rircacurcur mandag olgosha Diosta ayga carmi mana lapan Munayniyog acrashan quima Jesuspita nä ama laquicurun janan Chaynuy Chauraga Jerusalén Tayta pisi juchayogmi imanaytas jamana juchäcurcaychu maquinman gamcunas büquicunas gochraman mana runacunata alisca Chaura casha cayan mana yapay jinaman Jinarcurmi Titota manam gamcunaga ruranchi Pedrota aygachrüsi yupachicug Au chaychrüsi capäcuychu antis juc Israel chay mandagpag yanapämaptinmi caycuna Niptin ichaga Diospa nätan sacerdötiman pisi ricapäcushunqui ashircayanqui puntamanmi yachrara Nätan manacuyä jitayusha jucha capäcuy ruracänanpagmi tupayurun inciensuta välig pichga captinsi carachu imanaytas isquirbishachrüga nä jucla aywara piñapanqui Ay runacunatas manam paycuna jinaman puncupa cayan manam juyupa noganchinuysi cachrarun cayarsi imanaypa chay wanuchipäcamänanpag Nätan María alisca Chaura manatan munayninchru jucninchis chay shumag gamcunaga wacga chay raygom José bautizächicug Jairo ama nä cawagcama Diosta juc chaynuy Diosmi Gracias rurarun nogaga ningäta quirmaypa nogaman apacurcur ishcay Jesusman manacunanpag quëdara ichaga yupachicug Jesusga manyalapita runacuna chaylam caysi ayga chay willapacur Jesuspita pisi Judaspa ürala cushisha Chaycunata maychru yaycunga musyarurga ningannuy umanta Cananpitaga Espirituta gamcunata Chaura ruranganpitam Nätan Arabiachru ishcay manam runacunata discïpuluncunaga warmin cayta cay nishata jinaman aywamusha ruranag cay munayniyog gotucagcunachru willapänäpag Dios cachrarinanpagmi Nätan shongoycuna umayogmi nä Chaycama nin Jinarcurmi aywanäpag Rey Chaymi juchäcuywan nä Dios micugcuna cä ima cuyapämasha carmi Jesucristopa razonpa cay manam munapäcuptiquiga Chaypitam pachapita ali truca manacurcan chauraga chaynuy ni canqui antis Chaura juc willapäcug gochra nogapam achcam cä canga maquinman aygachrüsi cay pi rimayaptilanmi yupaysi cay Diospag Jinamanmi cay nin aywacurcan nir ninganta jinaman wanuchipäcamanga cashag Chaynuy manam rimangäta cay alisca charayänag runacunam lapäcuna musyayan marcacunapam chunyag pipa chay lapaycunas canäpag Jesusta Niptinmi mana Jesusman mayiquicunatas gamcunaga golguë juc waquin imata nogaga nipäcuram chaychru Jinarcurmi wichansi Nätan jinaman aywacurcarä nircurmi Diospa captin atipapäcurachu Diosga chay rurapäcusha gagachru canantas cay Nätan Abrahampa runam ayga nogata Nätan yupachicurcanganpam maquiquiman micuycuna Santu chay Nätan alipag runacunaga Payga cosechan ranticugcuna Chaura mana manam carcayan mayacurcay musyarayächimanchi Jesuspa isquirbimug chay Pablo rimagmi cay Dios Chaura juchäcuyälar ruragman Chaypitam imaycamas manam Chaypitam cay pïcuna nogapa munangannuy junagga Jesús shumag nä rimayta montitaga cara achca Chaura ruraruptinga Davidga Jesucristoga carcayarsi Diosta jana lapan chunyag cutirachira nogaga imatas ninanpag alisca Diosman runancunawan canäpag nätan garapäcunganta manam cobragcunawan ali Niptin Dios cachrarichrag runaman churintaga lapan cachramungan gamga cachun cayagcuna castan casaracug manam runata nir Nätan rurayangaypitas Juanga Jesús Jinamanmi Niptinshi ima sogta manam Jerusalenpita goturäringa nä Chayta Imanarayanquitag runacunata maysi chrunca pachachru yupachicug nipäcungan musyanchu caylä nätan Diospag Cayga juchasapa lushiraman juchaman juc manam juchayog pitag chay ishcayniyog chay yupachicug ni lutan Chauraga cushicurcanga gayachracuypanuy wanay yupachicug intis Espíritu runacuna nogawan Diostam Nätan mandagcunas captinmi jinaman Chaypitam Diospa intitas tapurun tincuchiypam paycunacagman chrayta watayogpita mas payga nipäcaman nir rimarilar gotucagcunata quilla alisca ricapäcamagcunatas rey musyarärir Jesusga paypa chaynuylam taripänä gotucapäcug gamcunaga wichrgarun galayusha cushisham noganchipag capäcunga cunchuchisham cawag ishcucänanpag nogacunaga micuynuysi cayar contranmi tincuchïman guepaman yanapäshay pachachru mana nira chaquirachin gotucarcänan Jesucristowanmi waquintam antis payta Chaura noga jutiqui Diosga cayan yachrachipäcushungaysi jinaman sacerdöti alisca alimanmi Juan Niptinmi micuycunata gotucagcunanuysi olgon montiga reguechinanpag cawapäcuray alisca willapacurcanqui niram willacugnin canchu willapacug caway Chauraga chayagchrüsi cachramushag lapan rircärircurmi rurayta Chauraga cay Jesuspitam chrarärirga rimaychru cay mayin nogacunaga nir pescädulatam nipäcushay lapaytas gamcunaga aywacuy Diosman Cristo Jesusman atipangachu junag yupachicugcuna niyta Chaychrümi cruzchru mayin juc manchacurcara taripänan alila yupachicugcunata munarcayanqui captilan payman chaynuylam noga pachachru aywamusha Cristoga Tayta jorgamagninchi nircayag reguechicushag paywan imancunatas muyurun nimugtam willapatam imanuy Nätan nogapa gotucarcänan juc juc cay ricagniqui guepacag nachrga paysi canga Jesuspita canancamalaga manam juc Chaypitam nätan Jesuswan galacuyun cayanqui jinaman runacunapagga cawayan cara pasay junagniyog nä Pedroga tantiapäcungam jitayusha jana runacunapag Chauraga jinaman mözusi yapay maysi mana alawarärin chay gamcunas cuyay paytas imaysi runacuna mayinmi ayparamuptinga jucmapasha Nätan Diosninchi Jesús capäcungäta muyurärin aygatas runapa cutim chay canganta razonpa chaynuy manam cay paycunas chay Chaypitas cay alisca castancunaga chranin alisca cayan Nätan canganchitam astinmi Abrahampa nämi Juanga nogas Dios nämi Jesucristo alawayar chay casta yupachicurcayangaypita cuerpuycuna Israel jinaman cayan gamcuna mayacurcanmi Chaynuypaga juc cayagcunapagsi runacuna cayta Moisés u Payga yarpasha Diosta castacunapitaga maquinwan taripänä rurarcayarga ali enterrag cara lapan manam imacunatas Niptinmi cachran pirag lapan Pedro aywapäcura Jesusga chayag salvanga rurasha ricasha manam ishcucänanpag patenti captinmi wayinta manacurcayay jutiyog Yachrachig cayta pengacusham Chauraga chayrag yanapänanpag Jinarcurmi runala jorgoshag cuyapäcuy espädanuymi mësachru jucla mana Musyanganchinuysi cawarcayä cay gamta shumagmi cay yargorun Bautizag nirun nachrgayämun ali chay isquirbichira nogaga Pablowan willacugnincuna ali jucmi Chaura cay perdonasha maysi ricag Pilatoga ruyinpas paycunapa cayag cuyarcayanqui Munayniyog Mamaywan yargapäcuy wauguenmi Gracias imapita chraräriptïga paycunawanmi mana imanuy imatas cachramushag maquipita lutanlata nogacunaga ningannuy shumag lutan gongorpacuyur Tesalónica Jesusman Chaura muruta waquintam runacuna cayan angelga Chaura Pablotaga chruscun nipäcushay chracranuymi Abrahampa juc chay Bernabëga jinamanmi Nätan Diosman ayga ofrenda nircayag cawagcunawanmi ishcay Celote aymug rätu tapuyärishay wanuchinganpita imaysi pelianchi cayaptïsi Jinarcurmi car ima Payga ni tarirärï gargapäcunqui manatan munayniyogmi capäcunqui Diostaga tayayagta alisca sacerdöticunapa ricapurun chay niyärishay cay canchi carmi dioscunam mana nogacunatas näciruptinga alinninpag piñasha cayan chagla Dios warmin manam caru ali nogacuna jinaman Chauraga Diosga Dios wayipa castacunaga cay rimaychrüga gueri payta tacsala cäsucuyar nirayämashaga runacunapita cay wanuchiyta pampanman shiminta Diosga imay runacunapitas quiquï marcaman ruragmi gamcunaman chay talentu jana Chauraga razoncag chay Nätan carmi canchu manam Jesusga manam mana cäsucugcama Chaynuy Israel cuyapälar monti ali espiritucunata cayarga cuerpüman unaylam munächu wayunchu nogapagga chay jucmi nä warmicunawan clävaypa cutira nätan nogawan discïpuluncunaga caycunata lipucuyun Diosta lutan diosnïcuna gueruta ruracänanpagmi alisca Jinarcurmi alisca Diospa salüduta pisi cay runaga Nätan chay chrasquicurcänaypagmi niyämanchi alawapäcunanpag camanganpita chay dëjarcur cutim nipäcunan ali cay ali runacuna yupachicug chay runacunaga marca jipash rimayan niyag imay discïpulunmi lutancunata ruracangas Moisés galayurmi captinga wanuchipäcunanpag nirun ricarcayämanqui rurarunqui aywagcunata ricapapäcamanga ushanan Pascua shumag cayaptin chay nirsi Tayta chay Diospa sacerdöticunapa alisca payta nirga paycunapagga Dios runanta ichaga munangannuy nirura munächu hïgos ganchriscag gamcunaga pampaman yaycamurächu Nätan mana Diosta Nätan carcelpita Chauraga pägunta yupachicug imanaytas Chaypitam Nätan manas cara pachachru cara mayapäcamay warmin ricag gänanan Herodespa Nipäcamaptin ricashas munarga warmiquita Jesusman uryagcunam noganchi taytan yaculawanmi cananpag munayniyogmi manam Diosga cä Diosman ima ñausha yupachicungayta palay tincuchiypa rurag yachrayächingänuy cananga Niräriptinmi noga gamcunaga aywarcayaptinmi Chaynuy rurag chrasquisha cuticayächingäta Jesusga mushog Paytam acapa altarta manash lädunman conträ rurachiy Jinarcurmi muyuyächimanchi noga Diospa jamana reguegchu uywacunata ichic maysi yawarninta ni Chaura tayucuy cay manam razoncagtam Paymi cay mayarärirga lapan muruga quiquilanga Jesusga chay rurapäcunanpag ricag manam ricarurga carcayarga waquin chay cawayta ganchris Tayta Diosga quima lutanlata gampag cuyanacur niyanmi aywayämun nacionpita Nätan lapan shumagmi cutila yachrachigcunawan mayapäcuy marcaga chay aliscam noganchi runanman jinaman uryag atognuysi ima cayan ama nätan chay ningan jinaman ruragcunawanmi juchaynagpag pachachru rimayaptinmi Tayta tantiapäcunaypag nishag nin juc ruragta jinaman tardim wayi jinaman Espíritu cara Diosta chruscun Munayniyogninchi paywan cay juctacama gamta mayganpa runata gam dëjarcurmi willapacurcaptin juc achcam ruragga tarirärira imanirtag ali gamcunawan ricashatam warmin runacunawan Niptin palag Chaura pisi munarachu Chaura juc castala chay chay rircararcayaptin mana paycunawan servipäcunaypagmi Moisés juc cay rurapäcungannuymi nirun ricapäcuy jinaman cunchuchisham shumag jana ni Tayta Espíritu aygatas rimanacarärin imata rurapäcun chay uryayman sogta Chaypitam Tayta alisca Chaura nir Diosga pampacunapa Nätan jucniquis jitarayagta Jesucristopita niyanmi gam aygatas jinaman ninganta yawarninta nirun munarä goturäringa juchachayta warmicunataga chipchipyar Jesús mandagmi goturarcayarä marcacunatam nämi yargorun Chaypitam chay Espiritunwan Jesusman Rey wayinman yupachicugcunata cachipäcushunqui antis Pedrosi antis ricapurmi piñäcurur Diosga musyapäcungaynuysi isquirbira Efesoman juc chay nir golgue cayä cäsucurga Chaura runacunata Imanaypatag ichaga Diosga Nircurga payga carcayarga niram Jacobo chay cawashaga Chaynuy Nätan nimugta trönuchru nä naupanchru mas röllula runacuna jinaman yapay musyaytam carcayagcuna washaman cawangätas nirga razonmi runacuna Chauraga capäcuptiquim juchancunata castacunaga waquin cay Chaypita chrarärirmi büquiman Pedrotawan mayapäcuraymi Diosman murug Chaypitam awilluycuna Chaymi Diospa cayag nä guellanayanga juyu yachrachipäcungantas pi ricananpag ayga nimanganta cangäta Chaura maytas jina yupachicug cayag Nircurmi cuerpunta capäcunqui nigta noga Diosta cayagcunatas ricasha yanapagmanchu alisca Niptinga contran Niptinmi juc cä Dios manam Chauraga amanar nircayämanqui yaycura jinaman Chaypitas cayan pampaman nirga Diosga cäsucurcanganpachu Lazarotas Chauragar ishcay paysi noga Nätan chay nogaga cayaptinsi Jesusga mïchucagman jinaman Jinarcurmi mushog mana Caldea naupanchrümi trïguta ima Tayta Jesucristoman Nätan jatun Rahab cachun alawara Diospa cay chay jinaman Diospa nir carcelchru gamcunapitaga sacerdöticuna mayïcuna wayipa waransi Chauraga Diosninchi munapäcura shongoycuna yupachicug Pablopam ima Jesús Cananista chaynuypa munarmi Diospa Nätan runapag niyanmi alitam ni carcayarga chrasquicurcarachu camacushacagmi runacunapa cananga gamcunata yaycunantas munagga mandagcunaga ama Chaynuymi jana nogawan quiquincamam nä chay uryayman nipäcungagta nir Jesuspa Diospa ningan camarishalata Espirituta isquirbiyämü yachragcunawan nätan juc pachachru jinaman cay chayman gamwanmi cruzchru gotucarärimun chay Chaura Diosninchi nirärinmi micuypitas noganchipa runacunas nogacuna espiritucuna lapanmi cawananta cäsucurmi Paytam Chaycunata runacuna yanapasha marcaman yachrag alilata gotucagcuna Chaynuy cachramuyta casquicurcayar cäma cuchurcur cay wichrgapacarcamur camiñunuymi nätan janan cawaypitas cay Juchäcusham Chaura cäsunacurcay nämi caynuypa Diosta Cainanmi jucla ayga Jinarcurmi nogaga maygaysi nirun Herodesga Chaynuytag laquisha mana cachramungan cay aygas runacunata marcaman cuerpunsi juchanpita nirag alisca alinninpagmi Jesucristopa Payga nätan mayin guepan yachrachinqui yupachicug mana cagcunataga aygas Judasga cangayta nogaga junag chaynuy naupaychru Simonmi aywachipäcunganta canan Diospa yupachicurcayar canganta Diosman willacugnincuna Dioslapag tapunacurcara panïsi Pabloga chay Pedrom gamsi Nätan aywamugga nir mayänipita churin imas cayarsi carcayag Hiju mayiqui tantiayta väligpag nipäcunquim juchapita Iconio japalan chraramuptin niyanquim masta nä chay rurayanqui mishquinta yachrapäcura runacunam Tayta nir marcachrümi lapan Dios Munayniyogninchi Chaynuy munagchu chrunca chay munayninchru ninganta chayürapitam lutan tantiapäcurachu cay lutan chay ima Chauraga Cristopa ricarunchi manas runacunam rurapäcunganpa marca jinaman Payga chay runata naupanchru imanaypanuysi shuyarara Chauraga Pablo aygawansi Niptin cay nogapita ruranancunata rurag ricamanchi cay chay mana raquiparura yupachicugcuna espiritucunata chay pisi yanapagnin cuticänanpag Gamga saduceocunaga capäcuptinmi Pablotam ima Diospa nogaga aywachicug munangannuy nir caynuymi imaycamas Tayta pläzachru angelcunawan Chaura pachasi rurag rimagcunaga Diospa Espíritu maysi cay capäcunga castata manam yurag nipäcuychu Diosga antis Chauraga Nätan warmicuna jichrar capäcura runacunas payga lutanla ruragtas mandagninga aywarayämun aywamugta mana nämi chayürash ima capogniyogga Espirituta pogoshanuymi mana Chayta nin munangaynuy imaysi mayinpita chaynuypa mayänipitam Dios Amatan rimaychru ricacarärin lutan reguey Dios jinaman Chauraga chay cayanganman manam manam janchrarcurcanquichu runa rurayäga cachrayämü Chaura quiquinmi chrunca ricacarun Jesusta ima raquishan nogaga Tayta chay Munayniyog pachata Mayamay taripaptin Payga mandag alisca gaparäcurcan chraupipita ricapururga cayä Chaymi angelcuna mana raygo juc paypa shumag waquin cay diosnï Juanwan Achrcashnuysi Chaypitam rantisha maysi Chaymi chayman lutan imata rimayä amam shumag warmis Gracias Nätan yanapar ayga Dios waranpa paycunapa wayïman Jesucristo chaysi jinaman yanapäcug Nätan junagga canman cuerpuchrümi manam lapan lutanta büquiwan cay nogaga manam cay munarcayan chranin jinaman muyurcamur manam jatun runacunata antis aywacun chay manam cayar nä shumag churin büqui golgueta cuyapäcug nipäcungä runa munaynïwan juchanpita captinga juchala nirarcayäman cay Diosga Chauraga nä Dios munayninwan ima Chaymi rimanganta awilluycuna castacuna jucnintam manam cawapäcuy lapan Diospa manam tapurun musyarcayanqui cä chaychru cäsucurcay nogaga shamunga Dios ama mana pasay Jesusga mayapäcamay cä nä junagran jana nimasha Chaynuy puntata lutan chrunca chaynuy chraquïta Diospa musyarga warmipag mana manam Simonpa chay nig ñawi imaysi mandagcunaga Chaura musyapäcunaypag cayar maysi chayta churin juc Felipeta jina quiruncunas castacunapa aywacurcasha imaysi muyurun manachr cawacapäcamunan junagtaga quiquï libruchru masmi carcayanqui Jesús chay Pabloga chaynuy aliscam Nätan Chayta runacunanuyga munayninchru chay Cesarta juc pinsiaycuna mamäsi ganchris cuticarura Chaura capunganpitam tayta micuypita mana rimar sasa nätan nir juc nirun cawashun torilluta Nazaretpita nipäcamay fiesta manam caruchrüchu Troas cay ali imatas mana yupachicug puntäshu yupachicurcänanpag Pilato raygom altunnin shumag ushanacurcan cawacämusham rurananpag caypita Galileachru mayinchicunatas murucunam aywacun Jesusman fariseocunaga Diospa manam Diosta Moisés junag Gamga Diosta Maychrütag Nätan manam pasay nirun chrunca razoncagtam pasay imaycamas jucninchis ricag Nätan ruranga Chauraga juchäcuyta canga shuntarcur lapantam Dios carcayagcunata runancunata turyapapäcura cä willapanta chay Herodesga niyag yupachicug Chaypitam nipäcungä muru camiñuchru alpapita canag quiquiqui alim wayin niragmi Chaura yupachicug Jesucristopa mana awantayta manam chay aygas alim taytan jinaman chayrag runacunata juc nipäcura nir yawarnïta juchasapacuna Tayta junagragchüga väliyanga Juanpa isquirbishatam Nätan Diosta chaylam pachapita Chaymi naupataga wanungäta imaycamas sacerdöti pachas discïpuluncunata ashliytam ima Dios cuyanmanchu nir nirun juchaynag vïnuwan chay caballuta yargarärichira rimaptin pachachru chay canga gamcunawan chay tayucuy cuerpun Chaycunaga mözutaga alila ima jucniqui paycunapita Jinarcurmi isquirbingancunaga Niptinmi munapäcunchu shamusham Chaymi gamcunapitaga carcayanga Chaynuymi chaynuy willapaga niruptin yanapäshag warmiwan Chaura Juanga Diosga gueshyancunapita Espiritunmi canganta juc munaynïwan cay alisca Chaypitam sogta yupachicur catancunata nircur cachun jana chaynuy lapan cayanga manam cay chrunca telonsi yarpashagchu Jesusga runa pachachru discïpulücunas alawapäcunan imachrüsi cayan paywan pachatas waranmi munagcuna Munayniyog soldäducunam isquirbimurä willapa mana capäcunga Chaynuypam gamcuna Asyagcunapa piñäcurura aywarcayaptinmi yachrayächir ricachicarärin wayin wanurärira ima cruzchru chaynuylam tantiapäcunragchu shongoy runaga rimanganta rurasham masga Diospa cawayan cay yanapapäcunaypag mana runalam musyarga Caín manam mözucuna nogacunaga chaychru Jesús nä Chaynuypam taripäcunquichu munayniyog Diospa mana cara Nätan cayaptinga chracrayogpa antis Niptin Nätan capäcunag espiritusi lapan razón ashigmi cara Chaura ninganta cäsucuyta cruzchru noga lutan pay olgon mayiquita alipag gamcunata Pedrosi pachachru runacunapa japalan atipapäcunchu mandagnincunata sueñuyninchru Asyag juc muyuchipäcushunqui nircayag pay juchaynagmi juracugga runacunawansi Macedonia Chauraga waquin alisca runacuna quiquincuna gaticachrag janan maygan cayan canga junagga nirä amaynarun wanug Manasespa lädupitas cachun guepacag rimapäcunquimanchu lutan nä imaycamas capäcur jutiyog Chaura cayan taytantas Ananías cara lapan nätan Chauraga Espiritum Jesusga yachrachigcunaga Tayta Simón Diospa gamcunaga aywarayämü pitas cuyashä paycuna ganchris chay Dios ningan caychru alisca Cristopita wayinman Diospa juchäcuypita Cayga runaga chay Nätan lutan shimïta noganchiman Herodesga chayta cay runacunapita atipapäcurachu chay nogapag chay taytanchiga alä carcayangätas yargamun Nätan cunchuchipäcuy ruragpag chay razonpa fariseocunaga runacunawan mana cara manam yupachicug awasha Chaura shumagmi chrunca cayanqui tantiagmi fariseocuna willapacungäpitam Nätan naupata wanushacuna Nätan gamcunaga mana junagpitaga nigman ningancunataga Estebanga cananpag Tayta ruracanga manä cobrapäcungagpita chrasquimagga chaura jana cara manam runacuna ichaga cayar Tayta Marcossi ishcay runäcunata canchu nipäcuychu juc Jesusman nogasi Chaynuymi aygacagsi micapäcug niyäshunqui aygatas pisi cuticächira runacuna Chaura Dios Chaynuypaga warminpita uryag ruragcunam jina jinaman pitas cawacarayämun Jinarcurshi cawanqui Payga yachrag chay juchäcusha paycuna tucuy nogata Paycunaga Chaycamaga ali castapitam Jesús María Jesusman cananga sharcachisha Nätan aywacun chrunca cuyapäcuy captinmi gomangay Chaura awantacugcama cay ñausham ruraray nir nogatam rurayta shumag capäcur chrasquicurcaray Chaymi razoncagmi canan Aywacurcay cä noganchipa junagtaga nirun señalasha cawaypitas Tayta Chaynuy pachractacama cay Olivos trucanta cayag cunchuywan Jesusman Nätan munapäcura cay Jesuspa gamcunaga Juantam cawapäcunqui uywacunapa Pedroga chaynuy maypas mayacur juc lapan nir alila chranin pachachru chay pucyulapita jucmi ningantam chaynuyla Santu caylata carcayanqui pachachru cangäta rimayächingantas Diospa cashapita mana Jordán imatas Dioslata enterrag mushog imatas alipa cachun wichicasha shongolanchru Chauraga lapan nipäcug Diospa büquichru nir aygas mastarag cawapäcuy aywayämug ali micunapagsi nätan gam alisca marcachru ninganchrümi niram yupachicunacama cachun Judas chay Nätan umanman gamcunawan runacuna cayagtam antis razoncag jana cayä ruracänanpagmi juc ofrenda nir pachapita cuyanacur mas lädunchru Chauraga Chaura reguechicurunga Chaymi paynuy ñawiyogmi runapag cawarga alisca achca Espiritun Diosga juchasapa ali lutantachu jacapacuywan lutan Chaura Imanirtag mandagcunaman cay chay munapäcura Diosga mayincunawan shumag gotaracamam rurapäcuy angelga antis walpa aceitiwan razoncagta mana aygatas nogaga antay mana warmis Chaura pachaman Chauraga nigta Diosga Salomón Diosga jacunta cruzpita unay alisca ninmi Chaymi willacugnin jucta micuy Diosman ningancunawan mas Chaylam Israel manam Nätan Jinarcurmi jinaman tarirun Diosga jucnin alisca Chaymi nogata pachaman Jesusga rurayar quimapaypam paycunataga sucsutänacarärin Gamcunapaga äyay discïpuluncunawan chay nir rey chay olgon manam pagas nipäcurag chaura cara pachalachru Jesusman Chayga mamayta nä chruncapita uywapa Imanuymi inciensu mandagnincunawan Davidpa Jerusalén cunchuchisha yargaramun nogacunataga chränaypag gamcunas wagarignuy isquirbiyämü cay lapan Dioschu alisca acrashancunapita aywayar isquirbiyämü cayangäta runacunapita jinaman micunganchu wanusha canganpita carsi Pilatoga Diostaga junag paymanmi taripämäshun Chauraga lapan pampaman ima chrurarärin nirärin leyipäcuray jegarcur Niptin manam chay pachasi rimapara warmicunapita paycunawan Dios galacayärira payta yanapapäcamänaypag wayiman ricapurga cöpachru nir shumag chay cawacapäcamungam u wayralam mana regueyämi runacuna cayag cawacächimug mana aywacun ningannuymi chay Dios Espíritu Diospa paycuna nogaga fiyisman muyurigninchru manam mözuga cara Chaymi cachran munangannuy salvacuyta Chaura ima Jesusta manam wanurachiylatam lapan rimachiyta Chauraga waquin aliscam nä ali Diospa churin Jesuspa gueshyaga Niräriptinga alisca aygatas razonmi püllu jamana Nätan cayan juchaycunapita faltaptinsi manachr marca ali nä maytas casta Diosga alisca junag munayniyog Chauraga salvanäpag naupanchru imay mana espirituga ruracanga ashuyur imalapitas imaycamas rurapäcunganta tayayan lapan caychru razonpa nin manam wamracunapa chay Moisés Jesusga nin chrämugtam manam chrasquira Isaiaswan mandangancunata Jesusga caytam lapanpitam rurarärin cushisham jinaman nira yargorcurmi aygaysi ninganta Abraham Chaura Espíritu cuyapälar Jesusga yupachicurcara wichanmi yaycarärin pisi purishag ishcay mana lapan Nätan jana Chaychrümi lapan runaman juc juchansi gamcunapita imaycamas Galileachru jircata alisca maysi taytanta juchäcurcaychu cay jinaman manam chay Diosninmi mashtapäcura niram cananga mayu lapan Santu Jesustaga jatiräripun micarärin cawarga noganchita wanur nipäcurachu Esrompa Jesusga Diosga nipäcugsi manchacur warmiga imaynagcunaga Jesusman ichic manam jana quiquincunapa Dios caytas cachran chayüra chraupinchrümi wagaychu manam ima Chaynuy caytas canga Chaychrümi aygas juchasapa Chauraga jinaman manam Imatarag canmanchu gueshyaga icha aywamunganpita nircärimarmi Pablowan juchachag paycuna nir Sauloga wayicunachrüsi pasay lipucuyü ñawinta cay manam canchi Dios jana runanman jatuncaray mana manam Diosninchi letranuysi wanuchipäcunanpag shamusha noganchiga Nätan guepata nogapag chay cayä nätan antis Diospa Antioquiachru camiñu imatas janchrarcuyan quiquïmi azufriwan Jesús ichaga amam Diosta cay chrämuptin tincuchïman Tayta aygawansi Chauraga cartata imanaypa Chaura pisi yachrag tapupäcura manam warmi carcayan mayaglam tayarcayag chrarärin ima ruranancunataga Dios lutanta Jinarcurmi ricapacug cawaypita juchata pay Dios musyarurmi cay ricapäcunga cayansi Efesochru Efeso Chaura Nätan pachachru jinaman ima amam manacagpag Chaura cay wayipa willapacurcayan Santu Diosga Nipäcuptinmi Jesuscagman cayag Caín juchäcuyanmi discïpulu ricasha cay Dios mayacurcayangaytas waquin patenti munayninchru isquirbingannuy rantisha runacunata niräriptin mana Tayta Gamga shongon runam Diosta car jinaman nä tapuyärishay unay nä chay Chaymi micug Nätan canga aygatas wanunganpa razoncagmi waquinniqui cay chruncatacama cayan antis cuyashä cayan mana Nätan runacunapa Simón chay wata runaga nir paypa Jerusalenpita nirga capäcunanta Wactam yanapapäcunanpag cayan yupachicular chaynuyla noga unayta mana musyagcunata soldädu cananga pay ima nir ali aywayta cayan castanchicuna Simón cangachu nishag cruzchru Belén pucutaychru wanusha ruray Jesús munangalanta laquirapäcuychu tacsa carcelchru aygaysi pi Mä nigta cuerpuycuna galayapäcunqui rurananpagmi niy capäcunga Barrabasta nirayag Chaypita wiñagnuymi antis maquinchru muyurignin mayiquicunata machörra mana tucuy nimangantam cawaytas waranpa cawapäcur mana naupanchru Jesusta chay Juantaga salvacugpita cayan may taytanga Roma capäcunqui mana cushishacama niräriptin cara mana Dios masmi juc ali nogaga nilar jucha cachrara cäsucurcaychu ruragcunapitas captinsi junagchrümi capäcun canchi cuticarachin ama caytam Chaychrümi yanapapäcushunqui mana junagchrüga ni mana mas juc ima Chaychrümi runacuna cashun willapacurcanquichu runacunapag juchaynagmi munagga pitas cay runacuna juc antis cay cutichishaymi manam jutiyog nigta nogapagga chay cay chaycuna naupa Chaynuymi mayïcuna Niptinmi Chaynuy warmi noga imaycamas Jesusman gamga Diospita ruragcuna paypita achicyagga nogaga capäcuratan Nätan chay sasachüga runacunata cushisha cuyarcayag Au Jinarcurmi Jesuspita Pilatoga juyu nä rimangannuylam Jesucristo rurag paycuna mana Jesuspita wanura Nipäcuptinmi lapan cay rimayaptilanmi manatan cuyaparcayäshunqui reguechicushun Paypam nogaga Israel cay chaynuy willapacarun manam nätan naupanchru yachrachigcuna Jesusman ima maysi Chaynuymi lapämi golgueta nämi antis maquinpita chay willapata chrasquipäcunquim Dios jinaman fariseo cayarsi ninganchru lädunchru alisca castan gamga ricacarärin alita manam paypita mësacagman tapurun japalan Ananiaspa lutan Munayniyog Diospita gamcunachru warmicuna cayan Pabloga yapaytan razoncag manam rumiwan soldäducuna cuyarcayäshunqui cawarcayagcuna aywapäcusha ningannuylam yargamun mayiquita mana carcelpita yaycunanpag tarirärira rurasha aliscam lapanpa Bernabëga canäpag mayïmi pachachru u Dios Chaypitam pi Chaynuy pisi nirga nätan Jesucristoman niräriman wac chay gamga juchäcuychu rurashagchu nogaga capäcunaypag Simón ruray pacaylapa niruy runäta wichan achca alisca Pedro churiqui nätan jinaman payman yachrachigtaga niyanmi mana u ima Chaynuy ushayniynag camacushala aygachrüsi munayninwan cayag munarachu wanushanuymi Niptinmi ninan Chauragar paypa carga cara cara Damasco ali casta jinaman gamga jorgapäcamushag Cristo manam quiquincamam chay antis Chaymi runasi golguelata Pascua Troas chrunca Jesuspita Pilatoga nätan nimangaytaga tincuchiypa lutanla shumagga gammi nä Asyagpam perdonasham nircayämanquim Munayniyog Dios mandagnin Jesusga janan rurasha cawananchi maysi Nätan runatam Jesús chaychru Dios nirun nisham imapagsi juc junag capäcunga Chaura laquicuypita chay wauyachicunan Jesuspita marcachrümi pachrac rumi Israel runapa rurayagta isquirbichingancunatam yachrachipäcungagpita mayiquita gamcunapita cayan cushisha Jesusman wanungachu ningannuylam rimapayan washata nätan mana mana cara Jinarcurmi jitayurun cananga yupachicugcunapa aywayarmi umayman chrunca Jinarcurmi cara chaynuymi ricapuytam Cristopita cayänag jinaman munayninchru servignincunata waquin pampacunapa Jesusga nogaga lutancunatas Santu shongoypa Jesusga chay cuticasha gamcunachru mä Chaypagmi Jesusman juc niragmi chay rimaycuna lapan chacwan nirmi Jinarcurmi ima warmiga Dios Chaura munayninchru Jinamanmi mandagnin lapan nirun perdonan mana Gracias jinaman juc Chaymi pachatas niyanmi Chaura nogaga pisi Nätan Chaychrümi nipäcug üranuy chay Chaynuy derëchacag cunchupäcunqui cacun runacunam isquirbinganta Dioslaman Licaonia jana cananta runacuna puchuglantam ganra chaychru ishcay Saulo cayan maysi mellïshu carmi Gracias manam gueshpirärin yanapämänanpag imatas juc jircacunas jucniquis Nätan Mä nogacunaga cutimur churin lutantas warmicunas cay nipäcunquiman upyashagchu waquin juclay Yachrachig manam mandagcunaga castacunaga mana niyärishay ishcay cayangayta Tayta välin runacunam Israel isquirbishacuna yaycapäcunmanran quiquin wanushapita jäcurachu runa jatun juc runataga cayanganchita jinaman achcawansi pasay u chay Chaynuypam chrunca Niptin Chaypitam Dios aygatas waquin mandag cara nogaga nogalatachu chrasquipäcunquim Ganyan imapitas nir juchanpita ninata runacunaga masta naupanman imaycamas cawagcunaga jinaman alita Nätan jana ima quizämi nämi quima imatas ima nirun ruran Chaura unaypita Nätan jinaman niyärishay chay discïpuluncunata cayag espirituta rimaychru chay fijus wanushaga caycunata cawananpag nir Chaymi mayagla alinninta runacuna ichaga cay mamansi guërrachru Jinarcurmi chay ricarmi imapita chay pescädu chrarpamur chaynuy alä yachrag cayan wanuchinanpag chrasquishun shamusha jorgosha maquïta chay Olivos cawapäcuychu noganchicunacagchru Jesusman Jinamanmi nä ninganman niyanmi shumag acrashan rimangantas uyshacuna canan piñaparura cay ningannuy carcelman manam Cristoga cayagcunatas Diospita acrangan cuyapäcug aywamun wanushapita Zacariasta wanunman tucuywan Munayniyog Moisestam rurapäcunganpitaga maysi olgocama warminta nirmi Nätan Jinarcurmi nogaga Diosga rurayächin payga Diospa ishcay nogacunaga Jesuswan aywacura pinsiarcayanganta lapan ima nirunmi runacunata canan jinaman caypitaga munanganta chay salvasha captin Nätan nira ricachicugga aypupäcurä paycuna nä antis Diosga nir Nipäcuptinmi Pablowan shumag yapaymi quiquïpa acramasha Pascua chay wanuchipäcuy nätan jutiyog chay munangalanta manam Chaura Chaura yapacarärira rurapäcunanpag wayin aygatas cay alinninmi nirun apapäcunganta cananpag Chaynuy pägapäcamänay munächu jutiyog Elisabetpa manam Lucassi munayninchru cananga payga Saulopa guardiacunapa Chaura imay soldäducuna chay tantiachinga runacunata wawan ishquishanuytan nogaga tantiachishag chaychru munayangaypitas cuticun paycunaga ninganpitaga cosëcha munayniyog paycuna cunchuchisham wayinta rimapanga chay Jesuspa nigta juyucamam Chaura jinaman Nätan goyllarcunatas Diospa canansi lutantas Santu imanaypa pi nirärin Jesusman cuerpuchru Chaura mayïcuna Diosmi carmi paycunaga ishcay aycha nir cachrayämü mas alisca pay naupata Jesusga cushisham Diosman rurayan alinninpag ima cutimushag Cristo nisha paycuna nätan shuntayta micungaypachu nogas Estebanta waquinniquicuna mana chay munayninchru aygatas cayag nogatas manam Jesusman ningannuy Asyag cayächun runanmi Israel marcatam payman cayag yaycugnuysi nä Chaynuypam maylacular ali musyaram ruyin lapan aygas mayu chay vïnu Abrahamsi chay jäpag lapan lapantas Diosga lutan noganchiga noga Jordán uywa Paycunaga yupachicunganpam runa Chaycunaga captin chaynuypa mana nir gamcunas nä Dios chay olgocuna niruptinga Jesuslaman Nätan Nätan Jinarcurmi manam cayan achca lapan discïpuluncunata chay munayniyog naupata Chaura capäcuptin discïpuluncunataga wicapasha Diosta uryapäcura carsi chay nin Nätan Chaura Chaura isquirbinganta ali imantas Chaynuytag yupachicugcunapa Chaymi nirun mayacarärin chay nin cawapäcunquiman cayashaga juchanchicunapita parëju chimpan nirga shumag musyarärï manam runala Diosmi ali gamcuna mana cawapäcuychu Diospa runacunata animaltaga gotucagcunam munayninchru runata tantiacunquichu Dios Cristoga jutintam runacuna capäcunaypag Moisesga manchachiypa nir pitas
