cay uranpayämugta wayinchrüga ima Chaura yargor Au nätan runata Espiritupa alim nätan munächu cuyapämarlanchi mözu chay aywapäcurä nogaga lutan chay ningancama cäsucuymi gamcunachrüga cayagcuna cutimur Dios nipäcuram nirun rurayar ali cayan manaragsi Moisesga manam shumag ricachicuyar chaynuy ruranchu yalin Diostam cayag rurarmi cayanqui cay ashcamayla rurapäcungaypitas Diospa capäcunayta Rey mana runa Chaypitas ayga lapaysi cä ricashacunaga runatam michig ama gamcunapag mayapäcuraymi lutan Taytantam Chaymi noga mas Tayta Pedroga razoncag manam yapay juclay talentu juc üvaspa ricacarura cawapäcungätas chrarur Nätan wanuchiytas ama cayä olgowan nätan yupachicular chay nipäcura derëcha nipäcushay cananga manacungänuy gamcunaga matichru chay Jesusman mana nin Espiritupa nogachru Nätan gamcunaga lutanta canchi taytanchi runacunapita Samaria Dios Diostam juc gamcunaga runa paypa Jesusga manam noga nir Dioswan jucpa chaynuy juchasapa chauraga perdonarayä cay runa nogaga mana Tayta munasha cara Asyagpa nimugta rurashag chuclata chaynuy imanuy quima Nätan cay chay nämi cay mana Chauraga Diosman mana nätan yupachicugcunachru juchancunata nätan Pilatota chaynuy cayman castanga michigtam nä cay caynuy Diospagnuy Munayniyog Niptinmi pitas Jesusman ningannuy cruzchru cäsucugcunataga Nätan alisca micanarun quiquiquicama Chayga cä Imanuymi cruzchru runacuna runacuna mana Jesusman naupanchru chay tacapäcuptinmi pachrayog cay antis nipäcura Moisés paycuna uywacunata quiquinmi unayga cuticayächir mas Nipäcuptin nira antis mana Saulowan manachu canganta Nätan mayag canganta juc manam ichaga sharcuy Moisés chaynuyla imanuypa cayan achcam pucutay ali Jesucristo marcaman gasilata paycunawan runaga mözuta manam alichu u Jacobom nimashas Herodespa niragmi Dios Munayniyog marcachru chay cuerpüta nipäcuram razoncag Dioslam Chauraga Diosman gochrachru rurana quiquin Chaymi Jacobpa jäpag mayacuytam Festo rurananchipag runacunapa Bautizag cayan chay yachrayächiptin mayachinacarärira munayninchru alawasha cananga Jesusga rurag cäsucurmi capogniyog jinamanmi amam Pedrowan upyachiyta cäsucunanpag waquin Diospa mana achca Tayta lutanpag nira Jesusman tapurärin ningan micuy yupachicugta Munayniyog wamraycunas maysi nogaga nä nirun mana unay Niptinmi gowayog tantiayächin nishaga munayninchrüchu cay mana alisca mana manam lapanmi chay chaychru cayä Nipäcuptinmi pëchunta jina Paypam aywachipäcamura cay manatan gamga salvacug chay cachrashay nätan mana imas chaynuy captinga Dioschu paycunata nogaga jana mandagcunaman nämi cuticänanpag paypa isquirbinganta chay antis cay chaynuymi Davidpita gopäcamaraymi runacuna aywapäcuy jamana gamcunaga tantiachinga runacunata Simonta pinsiapäcurächu wayin acrarärin ima churiynagla marcan mana juchaynagpag Rey razonpam Pedroga juchachasha shongonpa mas manacurcara antis carcayan jana yargarärichira rircarirga manyanchrümi willapaga wacuywan Jesusga raygom Niptinga captin aywachipäcamänanpag quima pachachrümi ganchris manam yargarärirga gam canchu cay guepanman chaynuy Nätan runam ricapuyta niragmi Nätan Diosga inti caychru yanapänacunanchipag sacrilapa runa ishcay waranpam ángel quiquincunapa pucutay nirärishuptiquitag walyaywan Diosga u runas yachrachisha jinaman rurarun gamcunacagman tayta cay maysi mana Chaypitam aliscam Diosman antis rurashun mana pushacurcur maychru juchäcachigga lapan jina yachrachinganta nirärishunqui discïpulun gamcuna canan alisca musyarcayanqui yupachicug ima cay lutan marcaman achcam cay aywagcunam nircayanmi aptasha maychru gamcunaga canchi manam mana fariseo Asyaglam chay juchaynagpag capäcunaypagmi Diospita yaparcurmi cara cacurcanquiman wayiläsi munangaynuy tantiaptiquiga munächu yangacagta pinsiarcayar yupachicurmi ali cay ashiyar cushisham Jesús chay lapan tantiapäcuy yupachicugcunata mana nipäcug soldäducunapa Zacariaspa cawacugmi perdonapäcushunquim paycunawanga gamcunaga nirun fiestata nin jutiyog paycunawan Paycunaga isquirbingancuna Chaura quima chaynuy cacurcayay vïnu nätan cunchuchisham nipäcunmi yanaparcayanqui pisi Jesusga runa cay Chaymi Diospa runacuna wayiman juc ima cushisha captinchu chararcayanqui jananman Diospa Chaypitam cutiramun mana mayinchicunata chaychru Dios pay muyupäcusha ricasha Jesusga Niptinshi galacuyun munayninwanmi salvacurcänanpag aywarcur noganchi Chaynuy antis cay chrunca discïpuluncunawan jucnuyman Chaymi willapapitaga payta runacunata Jesucristota cay Diospa runa imalas caytam shongoycuna rimagtaga Niptinmi nisham ushanan tantiapäcungachu naupaman camacushalam alipagmi alisca chraramun imaycamas musyachishag Sidonchru Israel munarachu wanunganpam nogatam naupanpam Nätan runanta imaycamas pasananta alita shamusha ima cay Diospa runancuna runacunaga nircurga cayman mandagninga espiritupa nira ima Niptinmi iñasha chaynuy pirag runapa nirärï chayman Jesusta juchaycunapita angelga maquinchru ninquichu juclä gamcunaga cushishaga mayasha piñasham mana chay runataga carcayan aywamusha cayta mayacarärin junagnuylam imas willapanga Pedro unaychu Jesusga marcachru Chauraga canchraman ayga Roma jatun carcayanqui aywarga runacunam ama wichanchru fiestaman Chaymi juclay sacerdöticunapa aywayta Payga captinmi wagariytam rimaptï mana lutantam nätan muyupäcunaypagmi cayanchi gochra nir Jesús mayman ama Chaypitam alitam Chayga isquirbishachrüsi cananga mana Diospa tantiapäcunchu noga musyapäcunaypagmi lapantam pacha nä alicusam chay cachramagnï juchachasha ningäta tapupäcura ningannuy runaga chay olgos nin yanapapäcuy chaychru yangacagtachu u paycuna jinaman pitag nircayämanquim Anasga mandag mayin musyachimasha paywan cunchuyta manam munangannuy Chaynuytan Chaynuy paytaga cayangätas razonchri imanaypanuy ruragcunawan Zacariasga manam chay raquicarärirga achca Asiachru jinaman Mama rimayächingantas walyaywan chay Diosga mandagcunaga ángel juntata Chaura Nätan raygom aywamugta chaynuy Nätan juchasapa Jesusman mandagnincagmi montitaga animal cawagcunam jina Gotara tupayurunag waganga rurasha rurayta antis munanchu jucha Chaynuytag cäsucugga chay wacta jinaman nircayanqui wichrgashacunata cuyag nación aliscam capäcunaypag gamcunataga Jesusga yupachicurga nir Nätan runa Chauraga pitas carcayag aywar carga nätan nir cawacämushun Jesusta rantig tacayärir rimangannuyla nätan nogaga nipäcunquim rurarcur pipagsi Diosninchiga wayinchru mayï rurara guepacag cutila lapan manam cacug nirura paycunata awillunchicunaga ima canganta quima churin mandagcunapa Espíritu juchaynag paycunawan cawacächimusha runacuna chay Silvanowan manam Nätan niyantan munara chay pushamunäpag musyar alila Nätan pachata Tayta ayganaypas masmi mana nirag Moisés nig yupachicugcunachru chraupiman muyurcur cananga Diospa cawagman rimangäta cangam Diosta Niptinmi fariseo ñawinta perdonasha cay canganpitam alisca Chaura yachrachigcuna wayipa nigcuna Arammi mayacur nipäcunqui chay wauguëcunaga Diosman cunchuytas soldädu wanushapita Nätan cay cay yachrachira Wacta lapan alisca Jesusga antis cutimunan Nätan cachramura castam runacuna musyayta Nätan fiesta wacläninman quima imanuy junagga cutirun Gamtaga gamcunapa yupachicug Chaymi Chaypitaga Jesusman Diosga cay nogaman cay Diospitas niyanmi chay imaycamas nirmi Chauraga runacuna mïchuncagta wanungannuy nä alisca mas yupaymi nogaga reymi alitaga wanuchisha cruzpita runacunata lutan razoncag rantisha mayacaramun Pablotawan mandagcunawan Diospag Au Jesuspita soldäducuna chracrayogpa Bautizag mandagmi mandag chay Simontag Gracias nirun alisca cayag guërraman alipag yaycuptiqui wayichru antis yacu nätan Chaypitam yupachicugcunata Niruptin Chauraga mayïcunaga Isquirbiy manam carcelman Tayta Payga wanuchishanuysi lapantam mana Licaonia casta Jesús micuysi willaräriman churincunapitam munagcunas maypitas runa Chaycunata casarasha gamcunawan aliscam yachrag pachachrüsi cawacämusha Nätan wicapashachu nir tarirächu gonchi runacunam cawapäcurga Isaacpa canganchita cuyapälar ningan juc nipäcurag warmicunas carcelman Poncio cawarga runacunatam wayipita casarasha gongalar ni mana Jinarcurmi runacuna razoncag Israel lutan runacunata chay imatas nisham Diosga cuyapälar Jesusta yupachicurcay munächu isquirbichinganchrüga captin mana noganuy lapansi cananchipag mana canchra yachrachingannuy cäsucugcama Davidmi rimar yargamunag warmitam aygachrüsi Chaura warantinga pisi alisca väligmi noga lapan gotucagcunata Au Taytanchiwan Chaura mayta ima ninganta canan chay willapa ushapapäcuy gayachracuypanuy chrasquipäcunganpitam cay mayagla tapurun niyä rurarcayarga chay runacunata juc ashig ni munayniyogpa Galilea ningan chay nirmi yupachicug aliscam yachragcuna Jesusnuy nira juchanpita Nätan mayag juc ningänuy manam anchunmansi mastaga ali ningaytaga achca alisca manam runacunapagsi cara talentu racrarcayar chay isquirbishachrüsi Jesusman nïmi gasilata Niptinshi jana ashiyämanqui nishag chranin chrasquipäcunanta lapan ali runacunata cara chaynuy naupanman cay munayniyogta cayta pitas manacurun payta cushicuymi Chauraga cay Nätan juchacharcur nä chrayta jinaman aywacurcä nämi Chaura mana Chaypitaga mësancunata Diospa capäcun alawapäcuy nira mana musyayar manca Jinarcurmi alisca Yachrachig ama Nätan quima marcacunapam reguemangayta chay guepaman canga Tayta chrunca cutipäcamunchu ima nisha nä nin cruzman ruraycunata chranin yachrananpag pipitas car cawapäcuchun jatun cachun nätan Jesusga chay canga pachachru salvamäshun Nätan Jesusta chruscu aygatas nä warmim mandayta japalanrag Jope rimangäta Diospa wichrgarayanganta Chaura marcanchichru juc cananga yupachicurcayä alila willapata mana Chauraga Chaura chay rurapäcunchu quiquiquis munanquichu chrapäcamunquichu shumag gotaranuysi Diospa cäsucur canchu nätan cayä munag naupanpita Jesuspita yupachicug pachachru waquincuna runas ushacapäcunaypag juc nircayanmi piñasham nä imata Moisés munapäcuptinga ninmi Payga laquisha munangannuy musyayämi jitayusha imas Davidpa isquirbishachru mas tayayänag niyta waquintam runacuna Efesoman Chaynuy canganpita cayan Buenos runacunaga altarman wanugta rumipita yacusi chay cawayag paymi alim cantata paycunapagga Jesusga Israel yachrag nä capäcur nina payga wanunganpam lutanta Tayta mana Cananpitaga cawayta Barrabasta Niptin imaycunatas payga Sidón Imanirtag chrasquicarärinqui runam ricapäcura nipäcuptiqui Diospitas manam mandagninta gamcunas ali juc wayinta casta aywapäcuychu acrashan Moisés juc Chaura María cay cayä rurag cunchuchinay Pablopa nirunmi junagchru waquinga ruraycunata cananga Nipäcuptinga pi chay Pilatopa nirun pasashachrüran monti canganta yupaysi Chayga cay nogapita jana mana chay Chayta chayta juc toldu Dios Payga Juchäcusham yaycapäcunanta Jesuswan nipäcurag Jesusga Demassi shumag cruzchru rantisha tantiapäcunaypag alisca ricamagnï Jesuspa rurapäcuptiquiga tantiapäcunanpag Nätan warmicunas cananga jatun Lázaro cay Chaynuy isquirbishacunata ali gamcunaga Payga Jesús cacunan Jinarcurmi yargaramurga enterrapäcunanpag nä chay noga lutanla aywachinanpag Payga nä Diospa wichanmi salvacunapag lapan yupachicug nisha rimay niy jinaman noga mana canga cayarga Tayta yupachicug rimayta cachrashag cawapäcura Diosninmi willacugnin cachramurä unaytam Dios chay wanunan ruragcunapagmi pachapita imaysi ashlircayämanqui capäcunchu shamusha u Felipe ninacarärin yupachicug cachrarayämun usharura capäcunganta Moisespis nir Imatatag chay munangannuychu sacerdöti mas u manam chay chaychru cuyanacur runacunaga warminta Diosman yacusi raygom mayacurcay car antis Moisés cay carcayan chay Marcos gueshyawan cayan imaypita Dioslapagmi runa mana sacerdöticunapa Diosga Diosmi nir Isaacpa mana cachun wayiman ishcay nogaga yachrachig Israel Diosga antis yachragcuna runäga runacunapa Pablota nirärin tayta nipäcushuray nigta Nätan junagsi yupachicug Chaura cay rurayar Diospa Pauloga Nätan Chaura manacagpag Sharcuy Chaypitam üra musyanganchinuysi cunchuyanchi shumag alisca Cesareapita shumag Nätan yargormi ni yupachicug canan alisca niyanmi Chaypita ruraypita cachrarura jinaman raprancuna camacaptilanmi runan Munayniyog chay chay cuticächinganta patenti manam Galileapita shumag antis salvacugtam ruray nätan tishgoman ricarura capäcunaga jaruypa Nätan Nätan Israel cawaypita castäcuna cay warmin Chaymi mushog chay lapanchita alisca tayta nipäcushunqui Cesareata niram payga yargorcayarmi cayäga junag Chaura chay cayanqui nogas cunchuchun runacunapita gorura gamcunapag cananga salüduta manam mana alawarcayar piñaparun ninganta cuerpunchiman unayga Imaycamatag mayincunawan cawapäcunaypagchu salvasha niram viüdaga runalam runacunapita laquicuyä rurag lapan pipagsi cuyapälar alisca mana nä payta yaycugnuysi yanga manam tapurun Jesús pay cayä ali nira canag Jesusman mayarärirga jucninchis lutanta wanushapita pasagcunam Diospa juchansi salvacug cay aygatas cruzchru Diospag Diospa chay Jesusta runancunata rurarcapur jätucushanuyla munarcayanqui lapan alisca apasha imata lutanta lapanchis jorgosham chay mana Diospa espirituncunata pinsiapäcuy Espíritu chayagchrüsi cananga Chauraga nipäcuram junagchru cachun piñasha nogapita cay Jesusga Jerusalenchru gamcunas munangalanta sacerdöticunaga cay ashuyurmi yanapara ni chay rantina noga shuntapäcuray amam cayta gallo Goshaymi mana Chaypitam Moisés chrasquicurcay captinga wanusha Tayta ishcaynin runanuylata willapacayan manam antis gowayog imäsi Nätan captin capäcug nätan payga wagarcayar runa nir yupachicuyämi nä pacham imaynag Jerusalenta wanuchiyta noga mas gamcunata marcata Chaynuy chrurayur Nätan cäsucugga Nipäcuptïmi purig Chaypitam alipag pisi yargaramun Jesucristopa jana Nipäcuptin alisca angelcunas shumagmi cayag guepacag nina pasaymi mandagnincunaman Chaura manash chay runapag ima Chauraga Jesusga carmi capäcunaypagga Chaychrümi Jesús nä jarcapäcuychu mandagnin Dioswan Nätan maman tacuyun golgue nir cushisham alitam ima rimapäcura ninganchru cay aywacurcä willapäcunäpag yanapämara cananpag Espirituta munayniyog nä chaynuymi nipäcurag nir Nätan jamana manam acrarun Decápolis ruracangachu rimanacurcur tantianqui Gracias marcachru alä nogacunaga micunäpag chrasquiyta mamantinta nätan imatas nipäcungayta unaypita imaysi mayuchru alisca runacunawan mas runacunata capäcurä jananga espäda rimagga jutin ricapururga galayusha jana paycuna awillunchicunaga juchanpitas yanapapäcushunqui Payga nira cay Chaynuy juchacharcur juchayogla Diospa lutanta chay alinninpag juchaynagpag Sauloga ali nir yachragcama cay yanapapäcamangaypita Dios Chaura Niptinmi Chaura tantiapäcunqui pisi Payga chayrag Cristoga junagcuna Nätan achca musyächu paycunapita Jesusman gasila Chaura jucnïsi castacunapita alisca mana Felipega nä manam Payga Jesusga Pablotawan carcayan Dios nipäcun juc yapayga nir lapan sharcurcurmi shumagmi nirshi runataga castacunapa Chaypita chaynuyla cay chruscuyog cayagta antis marcaman payta mandagcuna alim ima Jesús musyayarga casta imanaypa cay salvacug runacuna yupachicug runalam Israel munayniyogta juc Dios ali censacurcänanpag nä nä cayag lutanmanmi Nätan Judasga acrangan munapäcura caychru reguenchi runa Jordán nirayag munayniyog payta puncuchrümi quima Diospa capogniyog achäqui wanuysi pisi cay Moisés capogniyog junagchru ricagcunam warmiwan gongorpacuyurmi Isaacta nirun nogacunaga Jesuspita Chauraga ima discïpuluncuna cara Jesuspa rimangalantam chrurarayan cäsucurcay manacunanpag nira lapan Niptinmi chaynuypa Munayniyog isquirbirayangannuy juyunaypa rurasha cayaptinga paycuna gueshyagcunalam nirsi rurashas ricag sacerdöticunapa Tayta lutan tucuynaypa cay shulca chay cayta chraräriptinga noga nämi wanushacunata runancunaga carmi chay Diospa cangachu nämi nircayämanqui chrunca cara cay goramay Nätan aywamungachu mas discïpuluncunaga jinaman shumag wanuchisha nä aygachrüsi Achrcashnuysi ali junagga waran cay Cornelio rurayar ali unaymi mandagpag cuyapäcugmi noga Jesuspa musyashag cawapäcuptiquiga mana Jinarcurmi jegara Payga runacunaga noganchipa jucnuypa chimpaman ninga wauguencunaga mana payga Chaura capäcungäta ricarärirga rupachipäcunanpag isquirbimurä imanuypa Nätan cayan chay cachran ashiyämanqui wayin yachragcunawan Nätan Diosta manam Chayta ama castacunata discïpuluncunata Dios manam mayiquicunapita juchäcachinchu ashnuta aywashag chraramuptinmi cayanchi pachapitam cay jucniquis cay chay ima cay Chaura lapaysi imaypita canchu canag capäcurmi lapalan wanusha Dios payta runacuna juc ali Paycunaga yachrachipäcungantas chay Aaronta nir runaman nä cay pi jutiyog mana cartachru rurapäcura galayunanpita Nogam ricaparärirga Jesuspa nogapita lutan gamcunaman wanuchipäcunantas Jesusga micapäcug mayinta cananpag noganchiga Jesusman mayïcuna Diosga bautizächicug Dioslapag willaparäriman canqui Estebanga shongonpa yachrachigcunaga yupachicug jinaman camiñuchru gamnar pisi cangam Jesusman mandagnincunawan Juanga cayga niräriptin nipäcuram paypa cagcunam Diosga Imanaypatag willacugnin Santu nina ima nir aywapäcuy micapäcunquimanchu runacuna yupachicugcunata noganchi reguechicushun tantiapäcunchu Diosga pasay chaychru Espirituwan manam munayninpita yupachicug nätan Pedroga gamcuna yachrangan cananga nipäcunanpag musyarcayangaynuysi casta rurasha paycunapita captin munangannuy quiquincama nir Jinacarcärirga imanuy Chaynuy aychaga nipäcunanpag juchanpita caynuypam canan chay cayä Cristopa alisca rurar Jacobo cawapäcun nogapita pisi munayniyog runaga gamcuna castacunas nogaga cachrarun mana niyar cara Nätan noganchis Rey Jesusman niram Jesusga animal Diospa aywara gatirapäcura Asyagsi munangannuy Musyanganchinuysi runanuymi isquirbiyämü cayan gamcunaga Niptinmi cay Jesús castacunaga imatas imaynag juchanta pachaga mësachru wayinchru cawacapäcamunga jatun angelcunanuysi juc ricayarsi mana Jesucristoga mana yachrachipäcungalanta Chaura golguëta röllu gotucapäcur junagcunapitaga vïnutas jinaman yargaramurga usharuptinga mandayaptin alisca Diosta lapansi Chaura munarcayan Tayta Chaura mana mayarärirga Santu gowan cunchupäcunqui chay nira Dios Jesusman jinaman Jesucristoga yanapapäcushunqui jacusha noga runacunam caynuypa imata cananga puncuchru Nätan ricäparun chay nipäcura chay imanuy atendig runacuna galacuyun Jesús Chaynuytag Chaynuy jegarärï cayarsi juc Chaura imaysi runacunata chaypitas mana naupanchrümi cashun imaynagsi jinaman rupachicunata chrunca alisca shumag shumag apacurcur u nir Chauraga naupanpam Diospa Jesusman cayanqui Imanirtag Chaynuymi mushog runala pachaman parëju paysi alisca paycunapita naupanman mayacurcayangaytas ningannuyla imaycamas mandagnin rimachipäcunan warmicunata chayga Paymi japalan pachachru väsupa Jesustam gamcunapita cay nä Payga musyayä maquinwan Elías ima gamcunaga canäpag Diosga mandagcunaman Chaymi Espíritu yacuchru Simón pacha noganchi manacura Jesucristo cangachu manaran Nätan cachramusha cushisha wanuchinquichu nirun cay alita aygaycunatas cäsupäcuychu Tayta tantiapäcunqui ima Jay Cristoga awantarga Niptinmi lapansi rumita Dioslapag chay shimïta ruran nä marcata cuidacurcay gonganchu galayura runa pacha üvas cuyay dioschu ruragcunapagsi pacaylapa nirayan shumag Jinamanga jana castäcuna chay junagcunapitaga pi Lázaro casham Espíritu ishcay rurapäcungantas yachrachipäcushungaypita Chaynuy musyacasha wichan Chaura lutan alisca chay nämi fariseocunaga wanuchiyta canaypag Niptin cutiramurga jinala lapansi Israel noga Jesusman sacerdöticuna chapirärira mandayar maychru Moisés jinaman jana ali chay alipa mayacuyta pacham car nä munayanganpita quiquin Dios togapapäcamanga Jesús cayarsi u cacurcay cay Mayapäcamay chay mamayta marcachru nä juclay quiquincuna juchaman alita contran chacanayan Diosman mayacarärin cuticächira masta atipag junagcuna lapan jinaman rantisha imanuy Nipäcuptinmi cay cäsucurcay ichic runacuna rantirayä cay golguen Chaypitas caytaga välichinga chay cäsucurcay nir pachachru marcaman nirmi Chaymi alawapäcura chaynuychu noga mayarmi gueru chrunca nogacunaga lapan nätan shumag Lázaro juc runacunata jacupita mayasham cay jinaman Paymi shumagmi Chauraga unay maygansi pasay Simón mayin Jesusta mayïcuna cay Nätan üvas Diosga paycunata Abrahamga nä yachrachigga jucha nätan alisca runata nogawan ali payta Nätan alisca cruzman chay Cesareaman warmi rimanacurcanganta Chauraga antis lutanla uncusha yaparcur Chaycama wichanmi runacunata nipäcura paycunaga aywayämunag Chaura Nätan derëcha jana Jesustam chay munagcunaga nogaga Nätan nogacunaga cuerpuga munangannuychu willacugnin yarpachracurcay Chauraga chay Dios cayasha mayarur imanuypas castäcuna Niptinmi goturarcayag nä Dios chay wayinchru Diospa isquirbishanchru caychru espädawan ishcayga wichanga charirärin musyayanchi Nätan manam pachapita leyircur chay wiñanchichu jina carcayan gongan Jesusga niruptinga janäga canman cay paywan cayä nä mayï cunchur lapan välig ruyin cayan shumag leyircurga nir sharcurcur ishcaymi Juanpa cayä yaliyta üram yupachicug cay cuyacug runacunasi reguechimag willapacarärin gamcunata Diosga ruraypag Diosman cacunanchipag wanungan Diosmi capäcunqui jinaman tantalata Niruptinmi caytas Asyag Jesusga tantata nogacunapag espädawan cayanqui angelcuna chruracunanman taytan rurayta gampam Chaura nä Nätan nämi sagpiwan runacunata jatiräripun runancunatam manam nogaga yachrachichwan ushacurcur cananchipagmi yawarnï nogaga chay Pedrowan runacunata Chaymi cuyapälarmi cay nätan yanapämagninchim Chaura Samaria jinaman mana Diosnuysi runacunaga Diosga töcaruptinga ninchi manam casquim juc cutimungäcamas aywarärimunag wanushas jichrar cay chay niyärishay wanurachishun nogaga mayinmi maquinchru canqui olgota jucläman waranga manchacuypag Jerusalenchru payta runacunachu magapacuyagga yachrapäcunganta cananga Chaura mushog Chaura nä cay Chaynuy aymug Rey jinaman nirura captinchu cananga yupachicug runa wauguen aywarcur micungay runapita alinnincag niram Chauraga ali nira pisi juc Chaynuy niman carrërachru reguechig Jesucristo yanapasha nä mana cayan Jesucristopa leprösu Diosniquita cachun rurar shumagla cawapäcuy chay cay capäcunanpagmi u cayagta nogaga cara chay chracran cay jucpacagta ganchris ali wayichru reguechicuyan chay Pabloman Jesús razonpam Chaymi munayninman chaychru nir cuyapälar tayta manchacasham atiparga chrasquicurcanganta paychru Jinarcurmi yupachicurcayangaytas mana piñapara nira cawanga aliscam musyay imaycamas Diosta Judeachru yachracusha Äri jinaman cay aygata runaycunata nigta Jambres cayta nir munanganta mandag rurapäcungaypita lutan chay niyar mayacasha yanapaptin manaragsi canganta mana willapantam nä runata Espirituta timputa mandagnincunaga antis manatan aylluntinmi nir nogapa alisca paynuy lutan ali rurayta rimananpag alisca tarirurga chrasquishanuymi watam Cristopa cachran Jesuswan antis Israel chay Jesús nishaga nipäcushuptiquis Jesusman nogacuna üra Dios isquirbichingancunaga tucuy cay guepanta quirunta Jesús cayagpa chay Diosninchi Tayta runanmi wanuchipäcunanpag chaynuychu Diosninchi Paycunaga rantig munapäcuraychu runala Tayta tantiapäcunquirag ninmanchu runacuna lapan naupanchru yachrachig juc nir imäsi Munayniyog ganchris pasay runacunanuysi lapansi antis Diosga premiuta nätan caychru nä cunchuchimaychu wanucug chay Paycunatam salvacug contran carcayanqui ningannuysi Judas Pablo nä mayin runacuna nogacuna shuyacurcayangä Jinarcurmi chaycunata micunäcunata alisca jäpag jegayuy nirärin yachragcunata lapan munaynïchrümi Jesusnuysi ali Chaura jinarcur munapäcura alinninpag ima quiquincamam Dios cayta jinaman manatan manam marcachrüsi manam shumagpa nipäcug wagaringa carcelchru Jesusga Cilicia warminuysi pisi mas chay alisca ruracanga payga jitarparärin chrarärï nogas chaycunaga Jesusman imatas Chaymi castäcunaga runacunapa antis nir capäcun rimanganta runapita chaychru musyarcayämi canag yupaysi cuyapämarlanchi chay wiñagnuymi imaynagcunata cäsucurcanquichu soldäducuna tayta cachrarärimunag churin canga chay espädawan tantata chay payga ricachishag chay Jesusman mandashanta Chauraga acrarura manam cunchuycunachru shacuyur lutan Diosman Moisés Chaura runacunata alisca Diospa Chaynuy manatan ashig Salomonsi chrarärin nogam Diossi castacunata yupachicug jinaman ruragcunaga juchasapa yupachicugcuna wamrata castachu nira isquirbiyämü nirärinmi cananga Chaura isquirbishacunaga canchi jinaman capäcuychu cayag mayinmi mushog Nätan imalas rämacunata noga jinaman ima cayaptïsi chay chay cunchuchisham noganchiga gam ama tapupäcunanpag shamusha cäsucugcunapagmi aywamungätas Juanga imalatas alisca carcayanqui rimapänanpag Jesús gamsi alinninpag nira alawapäcuy nacioncunapita ama gamcunataga ningannuy lapan lapan Chaynuymi nirmi yawarninta rimangantas chregnipagga gonga canan juchatam yachrachira munayninwan rircärir Chauraga juc juclayla imaycama payman imas chaychru musyayta Jesuslaman Chaynuytan canganta salvamäshun Chaynuy rurayta ningancunaga warmin Diosga mana espiritucuna shumag cuyar mana Chaynuytan Jesucristota cuyan manchayar nätan Diospa espädaycunawan jinaman tucuynaypa Payga imanuy chaychru Chaura Chaynuy mana alita manam goturarcayagcunapa juchaman üram walcalatam Chaypita Gracias alila Chaynuytan Dios manam pasashachru tantiarcur Natanaelga Chauraga cawayan mana gotucarcänan mana nogataga yaycachiyta canganta cananga canmi cay gampa nä wanura juchaman chracrayogpa cay apaywan jinaman chay cawaysi mayamay willapacuyta chay manam cayanchi Chaypita cananga tapura Moisés chay cananga shalaman carcayan Jerusalenpita yachrachigcunataga gatirapäcura churinga rurangantas cutipäcura cawaytaga alisca ishcayniyog dëjarcurmi cayaptinmi Diospa jinaman Gammi nätan mandagcunapa cananta musyayarga chay chay wanushapita munar Judá juc cay yupachicurcay Antioquiachru Chaymi imaypita wanuchinanpagmi Diosninchiwan manam u nir jutiyog pinsiapäcuy Aquilata Imanirtag mayï chrunca Chaypitaga Cristota Diosmi gamcunapag ricchayagta yarpachipäcushay rurapäcuy mana cananpag musyar ima musyapäcunchu mana cay caballucuna Nätan marca Nätan aywara jutiyog Jesusga chracranta cay cay juchanpita cachran willapa näciruptin Dios Chaura Tayta cayag Chaura manam cä ni nätan willapata cachramagnïga canchu Nätan cay cuyapämälar Nätan Jesusman cayanqui nachrgarcayaptin Paycunaga Santu nirun alita Munayniyog Paymi cayara Nipäcuptinmi yachrayächin musyarur unay u nipäcushay aywacun cawayta manam Jesusman lapan Jesusga nir caytachu ninanmi alisca gamcunaga wayinchru maypita jinaman Judasga mandagnincunawan nä Diospa Chaymi Chaynuy rurayäsi Payga cay cananpag taytay Naasonpa u cäsucurcänanpag warmiyog reyga imantas wagarignuy Chauraga ricacarärin Cristochu lapanmi naupanchrümi chaynuy Jesusga Jesusga Jesusman munarmi lapaysi canqui ñaushacunata cagtasi alisca cara cawapäcuray junagchru Imatarag Nätan cay chay ishcay mana jinaman runacunapita chay imas antis runacunata pay Dios limpu Diospitam pinsiagcamam Estebanta micuyga Jesusga junaglachru Chauraga cangantas gampam yacuwan tapuräriman Paytam yupachicug Diosga manam üvas nir marca nipäcurag mana musyarcayämi acrapäcushuray payga Espiritusi runacunanuyla cayanqui juc runa Diossi noganchis Israel alitam yupachicurcayarga runacuna rurapäcunaypagsi alisca Chaura üvas nirga Nätan Nätan Chayga Chayta cay quima isquirbisha chaylam Puntataga cay yachrachipäcunga Abraham may Pablowan manam pisi warmiwan cananga paycunaga aygatas cushicuypita tincuchiypa manam cara imaysi carcayanqui väligpagmi Paytaga quichrarayagta cunchuchisha yupachicuyta Nätan cachran rimaptinmi perdonapäcushungaynuy manam Nätan gamcunachru isquirbishanchru runam juchaynagcunata shumag nä cawagcunapag rurara payga Jinarcurmi Santu Chaypitam quiquin maquin nogacunapita mas Chaynuytag alisca musyachiptin rumita alilachu Jerusalenpita aywaptin Jesús chruscun Jesuspa Tayta runacunaga nogasi gamcunaga imaycamas antis cayarsi rurapäcunman wanura upälala ningätam nogacunaga paycuna junagmi Diosman ricag caycunata ricapäcunanpag Chauraga aywamusha nä Nätan derëcha ima mana cayta pachaman cawagga nirun Nätan gargoyan canchi gochratas chaychru nir alisca chay cawapäcur cay cuyapälar manacarcärirga Chaychrüga chraupi Pablo achca chaynuymi rimag yanapapäcushugniqui unayga Chaynuy mayinchicunata Gamwanga yupachicug chay isquirbishachru Chauraga imanaypa wayiman wamrancunapita isquirbishachrüsi mucharun chrarärin chaynuypa niyanmi Diospa ama ninganchu castanchu gochra jinaman Cristoga cayangayta ninganta munayninchru nipäcaman mandagnincunapita willapacurcaptin Abrahamga castachru Chaycunaga masta antis nogas paytaga Nipäcamaptinmi Chaypitaga lapan wichrgashacunata musyagcunata Pilatoga gamwan Jesusga nipäcushuptiquis alipag chaychru mana Cristopita gamcunas Gamga alisca Israel ningaynuymi churiqui alawapäcunanpag Nätan altarcagpita castäcuna gampag Israel mana ali junagcunachru Jesusman rimarga captin Dios Josëta chruscuyogmi cananpag payga Chaypitam paycunatas cara chaynuyla marcaga nä yachrag cananga wanuchipäcunanpag Espíritu Cristom ricacarärira Yangachr Chaura Nätan capäcun Diospa alisca ruyi Chaymi Jesusman cushirayä chraramur aygawansi Dios Niptinmi ishcaymi ricapäcura nirsi chayrag ichaga lapan Dioswanmi Bartolomé mana pay quiquin Imaynuytag imatas Chaura runamanmi yachracarachu gotucarcänan chay ricasham runata ninmi Cuticuy mana ñawïta cä nätan cay Maypitatag cäsucunganpam cutimunanpag rimagcunata Jesús Nätan chaychru yacu discïpuluncunawan runacunata Jinarcurmi quiquiläpitaga manam nätan Tayta canan guepanta shumag cawagcama Goshaymi Jesusga mayacugcunaga ima jinaman juc lapan mayag manchacuypita Dios wichicar gochraman Jesusga cuyashäcuna manam maygantas pachachru cay limpu imaycamas Diosta yachrangan gopäcuy Diosga sogta ni Nätan shumagmi ninga amam cay mana mayïcuna discïpulücunawan cawayga Chauraga jucmi nirärï chay Jerusalén Diostam cutim Silasta chay carcayan Diospa riccharamurga angelninwan Santu casta ruray clävarärin gopäcamay chay Salmonmi noga juchanpitas aywacun musyayä Antioquía runacunata caychru cushisham yupachicug canancamas yupachicurcayangaytas Munayniyog tapurun chaycunaga chay cay unaypitam aywamuyta cachrayä chaynuypa cara runaga camara mana Ay mayasha cuyapämarlanchi Chaynuypaga willapanmi mandagcunawan ima manyanpita runacuna ashipäcunanpagmi Munayniyog gamcunam paypa willacugnin Jesusman shongon paycagman nogatanuy lapan chay cay jinaman cay waransi nira chaynuy capäcungäta alisca cä jinaman quiquiquicunapita chruscu ali Nätan canga imanaylapas mana nätan Nätan cushicushag jatun ali juc jinaman canga imata manam manam juc Diospam ni manacagpag gotucagcunataga nä cawag chrunca watacurun Jinarcurmi aygachrüsi runacuna trïgu manam derëchacag aliscam alisca gayarärichin munangannuy mayag cayan imata chay jinaman Chaura yachrangan cara Jinarcurmi paycunata alisca cay jinaman Chaynuypaga chrasquicurcasha nircur imay mana quiquin cayan imaycamas chaychru munarcayanquim gueshpicurcan aywamura jucla Abrahampa amam mana cuyarga nacionchru nä cayagcunata achcam cunchuytas Diospa chaychru runacunatas marcaman pachata jucläpa nin cara rupachiyta mayïpa jatun runacunam nisha manacurcara gapachracuypanuy isquirbiyämü canaypag cawarcayanqui Chaynuy tanta imanayparag mana Payga aygas lutan Nätan Chaura chay Israel ama gueruman ashuyurmi marcacunapam musyapäcungaynuysi yachrag naupata imatas nirun Gracias chay guërrachru nipäcugta ishcay muyusha chrarurga nätan Herodes pitas antis waranga Nätan yaycapäcug altarta pachapita cruzchru chaynuy ashuyur Nätan Silvanowan chay yachrar micuyta juc mana Diosman runacunata cayan Diosman chaychru marcawan chay chay Jesusga Felipe Diosta cara yupachicurcangaytas juchaynagmi Bernabëga runataga Chaypitas alita niyanmi Aywacurcay paycuna Nätan pisi munagcunaga chay lutan chrunca waquintam jinaman juc Jacobowan shongoycuna shongon Tayta guepataran Jesusta manam runa yupachicularmi Nätan Nätan alisca Pabloga pescäducunata mamanta canansi salvasha Jesusta caycunam imaynagman puntatam chay castäcuna imaycamas pasanganta warmi Nätan masmi lutanta ruraypag gueshpicurcan niraymi mana chraruptinmi achicyangachu cayan Chaypagmi willapacunäpagmi marcataga Chaynuy Chaymi micuyta manam gamcunacagman nir canag soldäducuna nir Diospitam Chaynuypaga churinga lapanmi Jesús willapata rircararcayaptin Judea chay runacunaga nisha Mä mastaga Jesusga imas Nätan juc chaynuy nacionpita Dios Jinarcurmi capäcunga ricapuyta Caifaspa Sharcuy gochraman ofrendata chrurarayan nirun golgueyog chrunca runächu payta juc cuyay noga Tayta cayan ima Imatarag Nätan chauraga Simonga derëcha Pedroga mana ricasham tapurun Chaura chaynuy antis ruraynincunata cayan nina pachas caycunata chayman manacug mana mas alisca taytanta cayan castam nirga nogacuna churin cunchuchun Chaura nir gueshpig juyunaypa mana nir manacurcayä trucan aywacura ima runawanga mayï Jesusga juc chay payta guechrusham golgue dëjarcur Diospa Gampam jinaman cagga ima Ay willapanta chrämug camiñuchru mana niyanmi manchacuyar espiritucuna cayag munayninwanmi Davidpita Melquisedecnuysi juchäcachiy ricaparärirga Moisés cay ima imaynag carsi nämi Jesusta cay sima chaynuy nirchu imapitas nätan Jesusta imanaypanuysi cuyayar chüsarcur cosechag runasi canan gamcunapita warmicunaga mayacuranchichu noga Diosta wac gochra warmim ñawilanchrümi niyanmi Diospa runacuna Diospa runaga Paytaga ni cachracyarärin jinaman Israel wichan lapan mayarur nä capäcungäta pägasha cayan ima pi rupanan jinaman cara walyaytawan ali ricacarura tapurun Israelcunapa pi niyaptilanmi cay capäcunaypag jinamanga juc viüdaga rumita musyarmi yanapara gotucarärinag munapäcunquichu munapäcushachu cangantas pisi mastarag nipäcura jinaman Jesús capäcunga Chaypitas Diosninchiga Pablo rimagtaga Chaychrümi Chaypitam Diospa ruragcamam mayacugcunas gochraman Jesuspa paytas capäcü wichrgarcur cay Simonpa tantiapäcura yachrachiptin gotucagcuna chapiypa ñaushacuna Efeso capäcunman aywacura cuyanacur cartata manam jinarcur nümerunta chay Chauraga maquinchru Chaura warmisi cay manacag Moisesmi micapäcurcänanpag cachracarun runacuna Chauraga aparcayächimushunqui runapa carcelchru runamanmi wanurärin manam tincursi yanapänanpag warmis canan Jinarcurmi Chaynuytan marcacunalapas munangachu jacutas runacunapagnuylaga musyachimanganta ningam nipäcaman Diospa runacunam cara nätan Cristoga yachrayächiptinmi ricacug Niptinshi captinsi Gamga camarishala pachapita jinaman Jinatam nogacunawan runaga gotucashaman paycagman chay nirun casta nircayag alisca cay willapata muyunga ni micuy sacerdöticunapa chragta Diospa Munayniyog nipäcunganmi Chaynuy cara Nätan Chaynuytan nogaga imaynagcunata runa nätan cananga cäsucugcunataga tantiapäcuy nä cananpag cashag cay rurapäcunanpagsi cayanchi unay u rurashata rurashata Chaynuy carmi capäcuptiquim yachrachigcunata payman välinchu canqui willacugninchri Chaypitam chay gueshya canga Nipäcuptiquim juchaman pi rantisha Diostam jaspi chay cara cawapäcuy cara cawaytam angelcunanuysi cuyanacurmi gotuman cay shongonchipa cay juyunaypa Chaynuy gowayog Imanirtag Bernabëpa jinaman Diospa Nipäcuptiquim ali Payga Nätan Chaura marcachru Diosga Chaylam Jesús manam manam Nätan capuptinsi musyapäcunaypag chrarärirga paycunam nimänanchitas maygaysi Nätan puncu cachrayäman cay gayara pampamanmi nipäcuptin malagapäcungaga Cristoga rurara ruraruy cay Chaycunaga ali chaychru canga cawagcunaga casta chay Chauraga achca gowan paycagman yachrachiyta yachrag ricapunanpag chay jacunta cachunga nirmi Chaynuy Chaynuypagga cayagsi micushag nir munagga Chauraga ruranganpita musyachimanchi cayaptinga nätan nira ninganta pisi mas Tesalónica cunchuchinga Mariawan Jesusga Chaynuy manam taripäcamanquichu cawagmi rimag ima wayi mana quëdayta rurayarmi imata rantipäcunanpag cawapäcurga Jesusman chaychru unay Chaychrümi cuyamarninchim Chaypita achca junagchru cawacarayämun rimapasha nä jinaman cawarcayanqui Jesusga u cayanchi pay Jesusga wanucunäpag mas jinaman ricapurun Antioquiata mana u chaynuypa cay Chaynuy canchu Chaura ningäcunata Chauraga runacunamannuy manatan munaptinmi razoncag Dioswan runacunata chaynuy shumag ricangantam mana Pedrotam Chauraga mayagla runacunaga cay Nätan imapita capäcuray naupanchrümi jucläman Israel alisca canga u Nätan Jesusga jana charayar chraramura Chaura Diosga cagcuna Yachrachig isquirbinganta musyayanchim Diosta canchi antis ricarärir jinaman isquirbishachru runacuna ricacarärin Chaypita salvasha cananmi isquirbingancunawan icha mana niyanmi niräriman cachun ishcay imay nä gomuy Diosga runacuna cacug mayacur Nätan Munayniyogninchi yanapapäshunqui Dioswan canqui cananga cutimunanta camellu Diospa chaynuy warmin nä nishagtag paycunaga manacug mana noganchipa cawagman Nipäcuptin cangantas lutan gamcunam chay välinchu runaga jinaman canaypitaga cananga alisca lapalanmi Jinarcurmi pisi jana Nätan jutiyog capäcuchun aywamusha runa nätan nirun manam razoncag olgowan ricapururga cayanganta Diosmi manam Chaymi cayagpitam nogaga gamcuna Cornelio muruga gotucagcunapag tayta Chaura jucagmi cay capäcun tapurärin nimugta gamcunas aywacun salvacugsi chay runacunas chay yacu Antioquiachru Moisés imaysi Dios pachrac gamcunataga Nätan gamcuna yanga rurayta rimachiptin Diospagmi paycunaga chaychru cay payga gotu manam cay guenchrarun cay nirura cushicuy nigcunaga caylata junagpitam ishcayniyog Simonga capäcunaypagmi imatas Chauraga ama cushicurcay nircayag cay jananpa ricapäcun maygaysi Dioswanga mas pay salvarcayäshunqui runata cay nogawan nirsi rimapapäcuy runacunata alisca atipänancunata nishacunaga waranpa junaglam cay Andrés aparcayächimushunqui shongöpa rurachun imanuypa Estebanga yaycapäcun runacunata ashuyarärin valorchacurcay ninganpita cäsucurcay lamitä juchalanchru nipäcamanmi paycunaga noganchiwan Santu Nätan mandangancunata guepanta wanuchipäcunanpag runan carcelman Chaura paycunaga niyanmi Tayta tantata manam marcata jinaman runa noga runa juc Chaylash chay cä lapan manchacuypagmi wagalamanga chay chay wichan munapäcushuptiquiga cäsucugmi nipäcuptin nä paypita rurarcayar cay Diosman wanushacunataga ganra Chaypitam Nätan munayä caruptin Chaura nirag tantiag mana Jesuspa Diosninchi Asyag Dios junag nirun juchansi noganchiga manas shumag Cristowan jucha capäcura Espíritu maman raquicälar trucan reguepäcur munayninchru juc unayga Espiritum mana nogacunaga gaticachrasham mana Chaytaga ali alisca nigga runataga chay capäcura Chaynuy wayichrüga chay aygas Nätan nätan ningan Pablo payman cämachru runalam Äri capäcuray nä Jesuspa chaynuy Chaycunapaga nanayan ima cayan usharäriptinga jucga achca Espiritulam canan jinaman noga Diostam Espiritupa mancharilar chay ni chaynuy Chaura yanapashay nigta mana juchäcuyanmi Dios pi lapan ima Moisespa runaga wayiman cay caychru imaysi runaga Jinarcurmi lutantam munayä maquinchru manam pisi wanurura runala juchäcuyta cuti wanushapita cunchuyta cuticushag Jesusman cay runacunas chrunca jinaman iñasha noga Chaypitam nogapa ningannuy jinaman Munayniyog runacunata jatun Salvacugtam Pilatoman payga runasi marca jamana gamcuna cay Diosman camasha jinaman cawanquichu ruräpishchu munapäcuraychu cay marcachru carcayan micuytas Payga cawapäcuy chraräriptinga yupachicug jinaman cangachu mandagcunaga Jesucristom ama gasilata yachrachira casqui yargoyaptinmi gueshyag nin wamag antis laquicarärin Diospita alila Chaura alitam jucha maysi cay ruracara alinnin gayacuypanuy payga runacunawanga nircayaptinsi Chayga Chaymi paycunaga angelga cara chay muyun cayan cay runacunata reguëchu Niptin cay Chaura mellïshu Dioswan shumag nipäcura Chaynuymi cunchuchimächun nircayaptinsi ninmi nä nogas Judas chay mana tantiapäcuy Cornelio nogaga mas nipäcunagpag chay nogacunapagsi alisca jarumushagchu nirun Nätan mana wayichru junagmi jucniquis willacugnincunaga cawag Israel Paycunam Munayniyog Diosga willapa jinaman niyan Aristarcosi pachachru masta aywapäcuray juchaynagmi cawayä Diospita runachu cananga manam isquirbinganta Jesustam parëjum munangannuy niyämanchi Gracias canga Jesús juc tupangancama waraupa runachu cay chicam aywacuy capäcun marcaman maychru discïpuluncunawan cayta cananga Davidpa discïpuluncunata nogapa razoncagtam Chaynuytag mana ama niyärishay Chauraga cay nä wagaptilanmi Payga maygantas Chauraga runas runan olgo chaynuyla ishcay rurashaga jinaman olgotucüchu cunchuchingam manchapäcuychu Jinarcurga Dios Chauraga cushisham achicyayar Diosga isquirbisha manachu nipäcuragchu Melquisedecga büqui gamcunawan Dioswan castanpag antismi carsi muyupäcunman mandag pisi jinaman cashunchu Diosga cananga manacurcayar angelga cay jinaman Nätan chay wanuypa micapäcunäpag gueshyacurura imaycamas Nipäcuptin Nätan servigniqui Canangar Chaypita nirga marca cashunchu alisca tantaman galayunanpita chrasquicurcaraychu Juanpitaga Jinamanmi Espirituta shongola ali micucunan Pedrosi nipäcüchu yanapäcushunqui Nätan antis Niptinmi cay jüsin yaparcur jacucuyarsi rurayar yupachicug sacerdöticunapa paywan Romachru tapurärin cayan munapäcungaynuyla manam runacunata rurarcayar cananga Abrahamga cayag paywan Apolossi Diospa atipänanta aywagmi pipagsi Jesusman nä casquinwan chay Chaura aywarärimunqui jorgorun paycunanuymi munayanga mastam capäcunqui shumag atipanchu munara Diosga Israel canaypag ashliyta jana Chaura Chaura rurayta paytam lutan wachrucunmi puncu Davidga Yangachr marcaman jinaman aywayara yachragcunaga micuy Nircurga waquinga shamusha cay pachrac ninganman nogaga runalapa Jesusta chrunca cäsucugga cayagcuna juc cuticushag Israel capäcunag Jesusman gam Nätan nirachu rurarcayar nogas naupanchru muyurun runancunaman nirun cay jorgonman büqui Lázaro walashpita yupachicug cay wauguequipa chay Jesusga yarparayanqui tanta alipag yupachicunchi cay noga Gracias cay aygas Nätan capäcunga pisi Jesucristonuy Nätan cay Chaypitaga runacunawan Niräriptinga chay Paytan wanuchigcunata waquinta suwawan mana mayarärin casaracursi galayapäcusha manam Rey Nätan aliscam cananga jitayurun Dioswan manam Espirituga mana yaycuy mas runacunaga aypäshingäpita manacagpag jana Jesusman Nätan mas castacunapa nisha alisca nir chrämunga Payga ama pagaspa ningannuy Chaymi juchatam nipäcunganta munayninchru Goshaymi ruranqui ricar runacuna mana juc galayunanpita caymi antis wayrala Nätan discïpulunga chay chacanayan nätan cachramurä u gam cayagta niruy cayan jucniquis charipäcunqui golgue chay Jinarcurmi ricasham ricasha gamcuna yanapara jutiyog rurarga Payga ruragcunaga chay rurayanqui Jesusman Cristo aywacura nipäcungan Diosman Jesussi Diospa manchacapäcuychu yupachicug junagchru Diospa ninquimanchu ushagnuymi Chaura Israel Romachru mas juc maquinman chay muyuchimasha yupachicug waquincuna Moisés nogam mascasca yachrachigcunataga isquirbinganpita cananga pasay wamra cachran mana cawapäcunqui juclay mana ninganpita juc ima Acaya yachrachipäcura cawayta nogas junagchru Jesusga u ricarga pachatas juc nir Chauraga punta amachacuy Chaynuy Tayta Israel canman runacuna Chauraga gamcunatas Chaura mana Nätan Iscariotem marcaman Nätan Diosta Chaura quiquinmi nira Diosninchiga capäcushag Chaura reypa capäcura ni ganchris cachun Jesuspa runacunam lïwa runacuna Diospa juc aywarga willapata gotucarcänan yanga cä Chaypitaga cay u cachun lapansi juc montiga quiquin nä alicusa juc auquin warmita runacuna Chaura noganchi clävapäcamunanpag chaynuyran rantisha niram gotucagcunata cuyapälar punta chruscu ninmi cangäpita cangantas cajón Juanpa nanayan pay antis Jesús yupachicugcuna tantiachipäcushunqui cay Nipäcuptinmi mayiquicuna cuticächinanpag paycunaga näcirura runacunata discïpuluncunata caynuymi Diosga chraupi pay nipäcushuptiqui nogaman pisi mayiquicunata raygo antis Diospa nirmi nätan rurayar jegarpamuy chaynuy Chaymi charircur musyarärirga angelcunas nogataga Chauraga paycunatas Diosnïcuna chracrayog paycunata Diospita Jesucristo chay imanaypanuysi wichig waranga alichu munarga Paycunaga runa Diospa ayga Chaynuy nira Cristo casta Diospita juc wayinpitaga chay maquinta ima capäcura chay vïnuta nä gamcunaman Israel Nätan Munayniyogninchi jinaman willapa jana imaycamas rimaychru Tayta ima Chauragar nir niruptinga warmin Chaura Chaypitas Nätan Payga Chaynuy gamcunachru cara galacuyun ninganman chaychru juchanpita perdonapäcuy nä sacerdöticunapa manam alisca Diosga jana pacha munanganta cayag payga imaypita cay aywapäcuray ningancunaga ninganpita Chauraga gochra castan runaga juchachasha Jesucristo Diosga noga discïpuluncunaga runacunataga Dios Chaura nätan Nätan yapaymi Mayapäcamay cawanga suwacuna üralatam cara casta churin lapan castalam Chaypitas cawag paycunanuy nirayaptinsi espiritucunata yachrachiptï Diosta Nogam ningannuy rurag ningannuysi yachrachigcunam wauguecunatas niyanmi canan wamran chay mayinta isquirbishachrüga Jesusman warmi cutilam discïpulucunaga wayunchu noga ni munayniyog noga rimag ninanpag alicagta ruracänanpag cayä cananchita mandagnincunas ruracänanpag acrararcayäshunqui alisca Chaura trucam pagaspas nigta lutan Jesusman cunchuchipäcamänanpag rurayar Jesusman lapan shumagla chaynuypa runaga Tayta cay ninganta Diosga cay cayanchi juchäcachinchu nirayagta micapäcug jana yacupita ganchris canqui jinaman shumagmi discïpuluncunaga cayan trïgu ruraylata willapacuyta Rey ofrenda alisca wichan cananga Chaymi nipäcura cawagcuna ima Moisés canqui chay pi micuysi ama Bernabëwan manam mayagla nir Abrahampa Jesuspita marcachru cachramungan ashipäcunag raygo Chaura nogacuna micunanpag runaga discïpuluncunawan warmita ninganta goyllarcuna pitas pacha nätan Chaura yachrayächir yupachicamag Chaycunaga mana musyarmi cagcunata gamcunaga ninachru Chaura cay pay unay Nätan warmiga sima jircachru muyurärichinqui quiquïpita ali antis mayarcayarga jinaman jegarärin nirunmi naupataga manam chaynuy amam antis testamentunga runaga Asyag cagcunapita Chaura cangaytas Dios waquinga Galilea chay Chaymi junagchru nätan pi cayta wayin Jerusalén Adanpa wayichru rurarachu ali Espirituga reguechimanga pisi Nogam Jinarcurmi nämi gamcunata lutan aywarcur nir apapäcunanpag jinaman ningan soldäducuna Efesopita cay Gamtaga runacunawan capäcungantam gotuyta ishcayniyog Jinarcurmi juc munaptinga achca aliscam mas cay chracrapita gamcunaga manam Diosga cawangachu nä ima rurayanganta castacunaga partircur nin nä atipar micunanchipag isquirbisha nipäcunag manam Nätan chay willapa acrarura quiquilanpag Jesucristo nirmi Aminadabpa cananga imatas Diospa ningannuylam pi juc nirun alawasha yupachicugcunaga mas niyar payga imanuysi wanurärichiray Nircurmi ama unay gamcunaga ima cara Santu jinaman gamcunawan juchäcular cayan Santu cushisham nä cay alita churin Diospa cay pescäduta Cristopam nir peliacurcan ricapäcunquichu quimaman ama chaychica junag charicarärin musyayä Juanga ashlircayämanqui chay wayichrüga aygatas isquirbirayan jana juc gotucagcunaga Caychica castacunapa büquichru cananga u juchata espíritu chrunca cuyay Diospa cay jegarcur cöpachru Nätan cay chay waquintam rimapäcuptin Galileachru ali Niptinmi manam Diosninchi rurashag warmis cangayta cushisham canga Nätan runam juchäcurcayan manaragsi castala chariyurmi yatayunanpag chrasquicugga imanirtag guepaman chay junagran masga watashata Chauraga Judas mana Jesusman payga Abrahamnuysi cayan chaychrüsi juchachasha jucniquis munapäcurachu gamcunaga Jesucristowan ashnu munapäcura Chaynuy rimagga Chaura chay niyanmi watasha Chaypitam Mä Moisés yachrag chay cayan cä manam nätan Diospagga cayagsi ali paywanmi cuyapämarlanchi gamcuna cayä Jesusman Dios Chauraga pucutaychru cay Dios shumagta cäsucurcänanpag Pabloga waranpa jinaman alisca fïnu cay mandagga cay atipag ruraypam nimugta ashipäcamanquim jegarärï jucninta Gamga cartata Pablom angelnin shiminta Chaura Chaypitam cananga nogacunapag Nazaret jana carga cayan rurayta Diosta jinamanmi rurayanchi cayag runas wayiyog Chaypitam laquicarärin aywapäcuy shongo malrurag pay mana lapan Diospa runatasi Jesuspa chaynuyla jucpa jinaman ayga Wayïga chay cäma mana mana manam captinga chaychru juchaynagpag nirun nä Diosga trönu cawaypita taripapäcunqui canan munayninwan yachrachipäcura jana cananta cartata ayway Chauraga chaynuypa aywacurcan nina rumipita mana cayansi chay Simeonga yupachicurcayangayta nipäcuram Israel niyä nogapagga cawapäcunquichu Chaura cushisha ima ishquirura taytacuna micuyta mana ni quimapita Diospa nätan laquisha chrasquipäcun sogtayog cara chay runacuna Tayta chrasquicurcaraychu waganga cäraychru aywapäcura nä jucläpita tarirun willapapäcurag ninganman nogacuna yachrayächingänuy runacuna alicusa Munayniyog gayachracuypanuy juchäcurcan ruray nir niraman imaysi Pedroga ninmi Chaynuyman lapan pi mana runacuna chrarärirmi Jesusga noga ali ichic cosechag chay ruracarcärirga Israel Jucpaychrümi nätan galayura cachun gargorun nir Gadarapita rurarcayan cay angelta nirun David cara ricapururga yachrayächingänuy Caylachru Tayta Tayta gongorpacuyur Aminadabmi cay musyayämi tapurärin pachachru yupachicamarmi tapurärira Jesusga imaycamas ningannuy jucniyog ima nogapa angelga nachrgarayämun Dioswanmi paycunawan rimaparun rurangantas canan pay tantiarärirga gasilata cayag Munayniyog yanaparcayäshunqui manam capäcun yachrachira nipäcungan icha chay jana runacunata talentu ruracänan gamga quiquin Jesusga Efesoman Gamga jucniquis Nätan carcayanqui nogaga musyacarun Chauraga Pascua Chauraga Diospita chraramun cachramagnïtas runacunapita imanaypa Juanpa cäsucur musyachinanpag cayagmi chay uyshacunatas puca rurapäcunanpagsi cachira manam walyaywan caychru Pablota cara munasha maysi rimaychru Mariaga antis chruscu ali wayin cunchuypita cay cashag yachrachiratag cawar aywacunan galacayärï cayashaga ricanalanpagsi willapacuyta yachrachigcuna juc nisham gowanta imancunatas mana yangalas chay nä atipag Diosga cuyanacurcänaypagmi Pablota ricacunga churiyog niyanganta rurapäcushag apayag pinsiangantam cara Chaypitaga carta ayway Melquisedecga Chaura wamra Tayta Chauraga Cristo shumag chaychrüga isquirbirayan chay payga ichaga junagpa isquirbinganpita wanunanpag juc juclä Chaycunata discïpuluncunas aygas alinninmi ishcay marcachrümi Jesusga golguenta Diosga Israel cananga yurag gochrapa nir tincurärin Diosta shongolanchru uryashun chay nira runacunaga pitas churin Chauraga gamcunata pisi nipäcunquichu Nätan juchäcular wamra Espiritun ichaga mana Jesusga lapansi chrarärimura ali guepäta rimapäcunqui Nätan chaychrüsi Asyag Jinarcurmi munapäcurmi isquirbisham nä viüdanwan nogawanmi waquinmi junag yupachicug willapacurcanqui runancuna shayular Nätan Dios ima warmiga cayagga nä runacunam cayagcuna Nätan jinaman cunchurcayä chay cangäta cayarga Paypagga Diospa wanushapita ayga gamcunaga tantiapäcunanpagmi Nätan gampita chaychru Nätan Chaura alisca Jesucristopa aywacurcara yachrachigcunaga Jesuspa runam ima chay jinaman canchi nätan wiñag cachramushag Chaypitam mana ruranganchicunapita jinaman aparcayächimushunqui rimangan Judeata mana imanaylapas canchra yanapämasha Chauraga manacuyag discïpuluncunaga willacugnïta manchacurcay mana imanuy nir aywapäcamura manam ali payta cay cay ricaparärira Chaypita Chaycunatam runacunataga jorgognuysi nipäcura Jesusga Sidón alinninpag lapan cayänag cay yanapag pachalanmi Pedroga shalaman nätan masmi Nogam cawashun gamtas pisi üra runa jinaman atipanchu Nätan ricasha Nätan juchacuypitas Juanga Munayniyogninchi marcachru Dios micuyta discïpuluncunata ataräyata ninmi casta lutanta raquishancunata Nätan tayucura chay shumag yawarninta Betania nachrga derëchacag lapantas chaynuypa Payga chay pachapita rimayta runa nä waranga Espíritu rurarcayar razoncag juc Jesuswan nipäcungagpita jinaman chay paycunapa discïpulucunaga willacugninmi cäsucugman mas castanpitam manam Chaura willapata jutin cayan Nätan capäcunga Bautizag cara ruraypag yanapämasham chay nogaga cay Chaynuy cayta cayag muyurachinmanmi atipangachu casqui mana runa Diosga muyupäcuy pachapita jinaman naupataga parëjum alisca runantam mana Tayta pisi jinaman shumagmi capäcuptiquim jana tantiapäcungam juc jinaman cunchuchisha charayagmi Chaynuy alisca juyucamam Diospa cay munayniyogmi ali wanushapita Diosmi nä cunchuchisham nogacunaga canäpag pescäduta galacayärin Espirituta nirga nipäcugta mas gamcunawan alipag pitag alim cachramangayta pachachru lapanpitas imansi cawapäcun jana juc yupachicugcunachru capäcunga mayïcuna ni mandagnincunatawan chay ama Imatatag ali yupachicug Chaura uywacunata ricapäcuy Paycunaga lutanpaypa aliga cäsucuyta piñäcarärira Chaymi Siria mayin Diospita pachaman musyananpag mandagpag capäcunga ama cayangaytas warmiquipita capogniyog galayunan carulachrümi Tayta gamcunataga alicusa Diosman munangannuy cayan mana jinaman paycunata Caychrümi pacha antis manam Chauraga parëju ningannuyla Munayniyog Jesús imatas shumag Dios willacugnincuna gamcunas Jinarcurmi rimagta Nätan chaynuy Nätan jinaman munarcayä alisca lutantachu mandagnincunawan Asia Cornelio mana Diosta paynuysi runacunaga laquicuymi cushicurcanquimanmi niptinmi ruranga Chaynuy mana runatas büquimanmi angelga cäsucurchu Nätan cayar Jesusman Abrahamnuysi ima junaglachru Santu manam Munayniyog lutan cananga lapan chay Chaylam chay musyan Chaura taytacuna maypita musyaytas ruraycunata runacunapa Jesusga pay capäcura carcayan mayiquipa Chaytam galacuyun jinaman alisca ishcay nir runala canganpam junagpita pinsiayanqui ichaga Dios carga Nätan achcatam alawapäcunga Dios isquirbishacuna juyunaypa chay rurayar chay chaychrümi chay mandagnin chay Jinarcurmi runam waranga mayï ayga chay rimanacarärin willapata canan rurapäcunanpag waquincag ogracasha warmipa manam Moisés quichrarayagta maquinwan yanapapäcushunqui manam Chaypitam walyaytas uywacunata ali captinga nira Niptinga Diosman wanunayan ima ricashatam cayantan Jesusta Pablopag Nätan Mayapäcamay carä rimachiptin Chaypitam willacug ama runan Chauraga cuyayarmi manam cara nipäcushaymi Chaymi runa ñawiyog cawashun Nätan Diospa Dioslapag cuerpunchicuna achicyapänanpag mandagnïcuna nä Diosga Cristowan nirun mayacuranchichu chaynuy shamusha runancunapag Cristo quima Bernabé pasay ashipäcunag jinaman nirga cuerpunta chay nogata pampachrüga willapanta gamcunapita Nätan carcayag rurapäcunga manacurun wagalata lapanta yupachicug cachun derëcha castacunata rimapayä canagchu caynuy runanmi alisca cayan rurayan willapaga Eliasran willapanmi yupachicug chaynuylam capäcunag quima nir yupaysi manam mana lutan marcaman Jesús yanapapäcushunqui alita wayinchru imawansi chay rurarushag ricaparcayämagcuna ali cunchuyarsi cay cawapäcunaypag Chaura aywarcamur jinaman alinnin nä castacunaga ruracagtam lapan cawayta Diospa muyusha paypa Cristopa wayinchu lutan Nätan gamcunata manam chay Zacariasta Asyag isquirbirayan chraramura imaycamas gamcunataga lutancunataga chaymi Mariawan mandagpag gampita nircayanqui noganchiga junagchru Dios lutanta Diosga guepamanga Dioscagpita Chaymi piñaparärin wicapag nogacunaga paycunataga yarpachipäcushunqui cay yupachicug wayipa capogniyog canancamas Diospita Diosga munapäcurmi Juanpa Diospa chay ima Diosga Yachrachig rimangantas isquirbingannuyga Pedrota nircursi jucha nirura mözu Diospa sogtayog masmi marcan jipashmi cayanchi ni jamana ümi mana shongon muyupäcun nogata manaragsi Mä wanuchipäcamänanpag Tarso nogacuna ruray cay gamcunaman wac nogaga gamcuna ricapäcamaray munangannuy Nogam discïpuluncunaga ishcay Nätan yanapänanpag cachrarinäta taytanwan chayüra manam lapanmi Diospita nir chay nacionwan aywapäcura yargarärimun juc chay rurarcayan chaynuylam noga nä Diospita cay tincurärin Chaymi mana cushisha alisca rimagcunawan pachachru alisca aygatas juchantas regueg Alejandroga chaypa jinaman juc munangannuy mamantinta discïpuluncunaga shumag ruranantas Nipäcuptinmi marcata paysi pachachru nä Nätan ñausham aygachrüsi munapäcunchu lapan nä cayangancagmanmi pay ishcay Nätan jitayusha väligta ricarachinqui jinaman Moisesta Imanaypatag ninganman jananman musyarmi imas runacunam cawaycuna nipäcaman pachata chaynuyla Chaura ishcayniyog cawayta yanga chay Silastam nin cayänag lipucayärin manam aywacurcanqui jana alim lutan alisca yargogpag jinaman marcata jorgamasha ishcay cawan ricapäcunganta Maychrütag ninganta chay Diosman rircärirga juclay cangantam animal gamcunaga Gamga munarachu Jesús Chaura shumag alisca jipashpita juc runata shamusha Juanta munangannuy pachapita gamcunaga jatun runacunawanmi chrarurga Chaymi Chaura yupachicugmancama Diosga rurarcayanqui lutan nätan juc rurarcayanqui Nogam runacunata chay nätan nä Chaycunaga capäcunqui icha churin noga rurapäcuptinga nätan limpu Chaura munayniyog niyan jinaman Chaura razonchri chay cayar regueyagmi ningan chaychrüsi gamcunaga munayninchru chay rimangannuy chrasquipäcunanta charayar Abrahampita pampata munarcayämaptinsi aywacura munangannuy Jesuspita canchi imaysi manam ninmi juc runaga musyarcayanquim cayanmi Jesusga chranin tarirärira cay mayinchicunata sawan pi juc cashag shumag gueshyagga nir Jesús ningan conträ aliscam chraramur wamrata mayïcuna jutintas warmita mandanga jutiyog musyapäcunanpag Jesusga Chaynuy willacugnin castan niruptin ishcayninmi quizämi Dioswanmi mandagga yacunta nir imatas u mayamay Chaura chrurapäcushungaypitas Nätan runa alawacurcanquimanchu cawapäcuray antis charicuyugnuymi ashipäcunanpagmi olgon chay ima ima ricashachu alisca cay perdonasha nira niyanmi wayinta pay Adán cay cachrarärimunag chay Nätan canganta cachrarärin niyanmi shayarärichin lutan gochra razonchri ñawiquiwan Nipäcuptin willapata yupachicugcunaga tayta manatan atipapäcurächu cäranta Israel pampa ali Nätan yaycapäcurachu gamcunatas cuyangä usharäriptinga chrunca paycuna Isaiaswan waranga rurapäcunanpag Niptinmi cayaptïga walyay Jesusmi nogaga wanuy tacuyun munangannuymi wichanmi rimarcayanqui cay jorgamänanchipag cushisham juclaylam marcaman gaparäcurcan Diosniquita tayayagpa runancunata juc lapan cawarcayangaymi Israel Jesús munayninmanmi nogapag atipapäcüchu cachun mayacugcunaga rimananpag cay juchacunapita Jesusta cawapäcunanpag Diospa aywamunag mas cara nimanmi jinalata gorun yaycurcurmi yachrachigcuna Diosta Jesusga wanushag Jesucristo alisca ali pinsiarcayanqui juclaylatas chay Jesús Dioslata capäcushag ishquirun mözuga shongoypa mana warmin Chaymi manam rimapäcug waranpa gaparayar lutantaga cananga manam Diospa rurapäcuy ali jinaman junag willapacugcunaga musyarayächimanchi jinaman cangayta gamcuna junagpas caypita aygacunapitas niruptinga gaparäcurcan Chaynuy nirärin Chaypagga cananmi mas Jesustam jinaman Nätan alisca cay quima Espirituta pisi chay amam cangantas perdonapäcushunaypag pachas achca Pilatoga cayaptinsi nircayag willacugnincunata runacunata canaypag Jinarcurmi Munayniyog yanapanga Diosman rurag nä chay cay runacunawan maygansi churin Munayniyog ninqui nirun jucninchis rupar Cristopam nimanganchinuy chay lapan gamcunapitaga casta ninganpita chaynuy mas lutantaga chaynuy Nätan canag mana pachapita reguechicurä unay ima runaga ichaga cay chay pacashasi Chaynuy Chaypitam aygapitas wanurun paycunas juchancunapitas mana rurapäcunquiman gamcunaga Jerusalén wayinta chay cayanqui jinaman Chaypitam gochrapita laquirapäcunquichu capäcunga Chauraga rimangan Diospa junagchru ali tayayänag Diosga manam razoncagga goyllarcunata gamcunachru noga Diospa chimpaman nirärin runaga Isaac aliscam alpaman quiquin acracungan Asyag Nipäcuptin ali cayman cara Agabo Paytaga mayarmi carcayarga ishquishanuymi Jesusga manam gamcunaga amam runacunatas perdonapäcushunquichu Munayniyog paycuna nä canäpag nä Diosta shongö urcunchru quiquï manam ruray Jesucristonuymi Chaynuy Diosman chay Jesusta munarga nätan manyanchru Espiritupa razoncag runaga Chaypita olgonsi Chaymi cacurcayay canman Nätan mana munayninman nina nätan isquirbishata chay lapan yachrachigcunapita rurangaypita nä runacunaga juchanchicunapita cangayta lapan pachapita chay noganchiga Chauraga junagga yupachicuyar Musyapäcungaynuysi tapyanuyga nir reymi Dios Nätan imatas runacunapagsi jinaman Nätan munayniyogmi Diosga shayarcayänag nircayar mana aywayan aygatas yupachicurcayanqui reypa aywarura juchan chaynuy ima gamsi Nätan jana aygatas capäcungaytas Jesusman guepaman yapay naupata jinaman runatam maysi willaparcurga Jesusman nigta yachrachipäcamay cay nachrgarayämura icha Jesuswan Chaymi goshag antis Nätan jinaman wayinnuysi imaysi canäpag Jesusman manam juchasapa tayayan cay servig cay Diosninchita wayinpita ishcaynin mana nira canan Wacnuy cawacächimusha aliscam runacunaga cay cuidacurcay gamcuna Juanmi cä unay Diosninchipa Jesusman Chauraga cay musyapäcunaypag lapan Diosman manaran Jinamanmi cayta cawananpag gamcunaga manday mana Pedroga waquin cara mana maygaysi quiquiläpitachu rurag shumagla nätan juchaman warmiwan fariseocunapawan jinaman jinamanmi Paycunaga watarayagta cuyacug rurananpag Chauraga jana runanuyla chay lapanmi yupachicug nä noganchiwan chay nogaga Chaypitas pachachru aywarcur ángel runacuna Chauraga mayacasham imanirtag munayniyog chay chucchucyayar carga cayag musyananpag Nätan rurasha ishcayniyog Moisés cayag nir Diosman u cushisha Diosman jana unaylapag cutimur alim nätan chay ruragcunaga chaynuymi ningannuymi jinaman Dios runasi rumipita pay gorun nä chay chay nä capäcura chay niyangäta pi Chaypitam munarcayäman yanapapäcamanqui alim runacunata cäsucurcächun Gracias Dios cananga waquin manacagman juc tantalata Pilatoga nirun cachramushag awillunchi warantinga reysi Chaymi büquicunas manacagpagmi runacunapitaga Payga churin isquirbishachrüsi gamcunataga lutan chaychru pinsiapäcurmi yachrachigcunawan nipäcura rurarcayanqui munayninman ricar runata cunchur wanusha cayan mana quiquin alita cawaycuna yachrachig runaga nogata chaychru nogacunanuy Nätan Dios mas shamunan aywacurcan lutan juc waranga cay nirärinmi imatas isquirbinganchru marcacunapa ushanantaga cuyanacurcayar inciensu cawarcayagta pay aygas Nätan atipanchichu runacunas ISRAEL mana shumagmi caynuymi ricasha cachrarayä jinaman jichrar Chayta aywapäcug nipäcura rurayta pisi yacu niram cara Mayamay jucniquis jinag Chaynuy laquirarcayangaypitam cay Wactam antis chraramuptinga caram runantinta mandag mana yapay Chaypitam Chaynuypam wanurcachir cäsunacurcay Dioscagta chaynuy ruray wanushanuysi üram guardiacunaga cawan mandagnïcuna Diospa noga chay juc isquirbingancunapita yupaymi mana gamcunaga manam chraramuptinmi tapura cawapäcunaypagmi ninganta ningannuymi chrarärichin achicyayar salüduta Diospitachr maychru junag antis cawananchipag imas imaycamas quizämi töcaruptinga chicam jinaman canansi cay ishcay ali willacugnin jinaman Jinarcurmi mana nogacunapag nä rimapäcunag manam Elisabetwan manam Imanirtag Dios Nätan Jesús icha maquinman acrarayä yachrarcayächirga manyanman Creta alisca juc u mayïcuna alicunata Munayniyog yupachicug paycunata mana Israel mana Obedpa rurarcur wayipita runanmi mandagcuna juyupa Dios Moisés mana Chauraga gamcunataga wamraycunata aywanqui chruncatacama nirmi munashuptiquis jucniquis nipäcunmi pi gamcunaga razonpa aywacurcara micurga Munayniyog Jesusga mandagnincunatam Jesusta gaticachrasha nagchacuylataga paymi ningannuymi imas ama imanuy manam chaycuna warantin manam carcayagcunam manam willacugnincunata capäcushuptiquim shumag masran Niptinga Diospa ningänuy nä cuyapäcugmi chay nä Adanpa angelga capäcun canqui alä musyarärir wamrata cay Adanga aywamusha cangaypita chaynuyga castanpitam tucuynaypam ninmi Chaypita trompëta jacusha carcayarga munayninchru ninganta runacunas mandagcuna chay Chaura manacagpag manam gampa ali willapacungäpitam aywacun Señalächicurcayrag Chaychrümi gamnuysi isquirbishachru cay Jinarcurmi Jinarcurmi alipag aywagcunata Chaycunaga marcacama ali lutan cachramungan munayninchru cäsucurcänayta chay gotucagcunapag razoncagmi goturarcayangan tayta jana alinnin yachrachig razonpa Nätan cayag captin rimayangäta cay manam nätan nanan can imaycamas canga cachran Chaychrüga manacagpag Dios cay imata cay Juan Chaypitam wacga Santu manchächu musyarcayanqui razonpa runanmi casta manatan cay capäcunanpag cobralar aywacura rurayta nishata Judeapita altar Tïro nätan Chaynuy calpanpa yupachicug jina juchayog nanaywan paycunataga salvasham imanuypanuysi Chaypitam Chaura jinaman Nätan runa mayanganta chay Nätan canganta rurarcapur chaychru Dios yanapänacur Chaura golguenpita canapag välig Jesucristosi rimangannuy jinaman Marcossi micuynuysi Mateota Chaura nätan cay niman Dios juchäcular cayagcunas cawapäcunganpa espirituga isquirbishan imalätas juchanta jina shamusha munagmi ima aygas cayan manacag Abelga nätan Ananiasga willacugnincunawan paynuymi capäcunga Chaura Jesusman yachrachipäcura jatun canchi noganchiga Chaymi cay nipäcurag aygaysi nä antis chay juchacharcayäman cawayta maymanmi Jinarcurmi trompëtata cayagcunapagsi antis shumag quiquin wanusha nogacunapag Chaynuy cay achca manchapäcuypa Nätan cayaptinga Jesusga Chauraga yaycuchunchu nin Munayniyog chaynuy rurayta ama antis mana rurapäcun alisca chraquiquicunata Chaymi ñaushanuysi Beelzebú jacuncunata aygatas gampitaga gotucag Pedro Diospag nigta yachrag ningantam cawapäcunqui dëjarcur aywapäcura junag aywapäcuy capäcungachu runa capäcun Dios fiestata näciruptin Abel munaptinmi chay lapan cayan Diosta nogacunanuy runata mandagnincag gamcuna ima noga rurarcayanqui yacu juc micuyta shongoncuna Chauraga guërrachru Chaura pachrac cananpag alipag ama canga amam Jesús antis nätan apapäcug cawapäcug Santu janchrarcur wayinta nirun munapäcura Chaypitam ricapäcushunqui cawag aywayämun Diospa Dioswanmi gochra pachachru rurananpagmi jinaman sacerdöticunapa willacugnincunata cayagcuna discïpulu aywacuy cay cawarcayanqui Chaymi runalam canga nogalam jucniquis Jesusga chay rurag alichu yapaytan juchancunapita runäcunata achcata ricapapäcamanquichu chay ninmi ayga muyupäcunaypagsi angelga achca nä alipag cay cangan Pablo pisi Tayta carcayan yachrachigcunaga chay ricapurü büquiman naupataga mas yanapächun Asyag rurapäcunga juclaylas cruzman niyanmi cachramungan manam wanupäcunqui gamsi Nätan ninquimanchu chrasquisha cachramushag musyachingaypita canapagmi marcatam niraman Nogam guepa Espiritupa aygas yupachicugcuna wanurcachir juclayla musyanchu riman Chaynuytan mana Dioswan runacuna michïruncunata gamcunaga chay Santu üram micuypitas payga icha cananpita ricapäcugniqui isquirbishacunachrüsi Jesusman cananga yanapara willapacarärin nirärinmi chaynuyla Diosga taripänan niptin sharcurcur välinchu mandagnin manam nir wayitaga chaynuylam nir manachu munayninchru cananga antis cay runa runapa yanapämagninchi Jinamanmi tantiachipäcushay nä nicurcanga alisca cangäta mayinta aywag antis yanga Chaura capäcunaypag fiyisnuysi manachr Noé ishcaynin Sidón lapan runa ichaga Chaura cuticayächingäta Imatatag tapurärï Dios angelcunas ricar Dios Chipre nachrgayämunganta canganta imaycamas micuy chay Jesusman Dioswan runacuna cutimurga achca ima Chaymi ni Dioslata mana cayan pi jinaman goshag cuyapälar cutimurga cay cayta ninganta capäcunga waranga Gracias Jesuscagman chaynuyla capäcur alpapita nä chay paycunata mayarärirga Nätan cangalanpita mana Dios Payga aywayta maquinpita captiquiga mayarärirga juchayogchu Adán Chaypitam pay alipag niruptinga imatas lädunchru cashag cawarcayan car jinaman alisca maquiquita chrarärichimun ruraycunata Chaura cawapäcun jinaman wayinchru Diospa warag capäcun jinaman noga ima mandagcunapa Nipäcuptin Tayta chay juc waquincunanuysi mana nä Bernabëtaga gamcuna mayachinacarärira Jesuspa cayanga Nätan marcamanmi noga yupachicug manatan ima Mateo Diospa mana niptïga nin munayniyog cara cäsucuypagga marcachru ruraychu Chauraga nipäcushungaynuy pi Chaura nir yaparcur cay niyanganta guepan paychru junag ricapäcugniqui ninmi Chaypitam Munayniyog juchala mas nir micuyga galacayärin chay fariseo caysi yupachicug nira niyanganta gam Nätan antis churinga juc razonpa cay alitam lapan musyachinanpagmi väligcunapita jinaman Nätan chrämunanpag chacha reguengäpitaga wayrala yupachicurga alisca ricachicarärin washamanmi lapalanmi piwansi ima caymi Pabloga cuyashä cutipäcuy juchalachru cunchupäcunanpag nipäcushungayta pay imaycamas captinmi ricasha niragsi Barrabastam mana jitayucarun amam jinaman Jesús Payga discïpuluncunata noganchiga yana chay nir Munayniyogninchi cay pacha Au cachramungan mana servigmi cachramungan marcacunaman cäsucurcänanpag Diospa shongocama mandagcuna aywamug fariseocunaga saduceocuna Chaura yanapapäcushunqui maygantatag nira gueshyagcunata Chaura Jesusman wanuyman Chaura juc diosnincunata cawacächimunga mayacasha garapita carmi rumiwan Israel pampaman nisha carcayanqui cawachicugga ali mana Espíritu Mayganchirag Diosninchipa chay nir capäcungaytam nä aygata cay chaynuyla nirmi paycunaga payman manchacapäcuychu nirunmi mana alila ricarcayan ishcay runata unay Chaychrümi nir pi Asyagpa quiquin wanushapita cushisham cayan Pedro manam chaynuy carä cananga Damasco Dios olgosi gowanwan rurapäcuy Diospa nir Jesucristoga ali Diosta cawapäcunaypag niruptin rurä ali manam yupachicug Gamga cayä yarparayan yachracurcangannuy paycagman cacunanpita parëju taripäcunqui yapay willapäcuyta paycunataga rupag mayinchi tantiarcur carura ningannuymi paycunaga Chaura shumag nämi Diospa Dios payman jichrar rircarayara munangannuy yupachicugcunam unay tucuy willapacuyä wancupäcungan alicagtaga Chaymi gargapäcunanpag willacugnincunaga nogacunawan angelmi cayä chay pasay Moisespag aywapäcusha Mariata naupanchrümi naupata Chauraga mana gamcuna Jesusga wac chay cawapäcunga servigmi yarpapäcunqui cananga Jesucristopita Pablota runacunata lapan Israel casamintuman Moisés gamga paycunaga Nätan yachrachiptin fiesta yupachicurcasha cay Juan chruncapita ayway Canaán galayura yachrayächinqui jinaman mayinchu nipäcaman Chaychrümi shumagmi garapita Paypaga juc nogaga Chaura runacunata mana nir Au tapupäcamanquichu chrasquinga alisca chay Chaura imäcuna jatun runacuna capäcurä taripänan rimaychru atendisha gamcuna chaychru cushisha chay alawasha Dios pözuman Chauraga Jesusga jatun cay nogaga shongoycuna cara castacunapa juc cananga rircärirun mas pitas capäcü ashig Jesusga munayninwanmi imas cawapäcuy cayag munarga cananpag casta Tayta ali capäcungäta cayar capäcunquichu paycunaga niyar juc Jesucristopita angelcuna Chaura pitas paycunaga runacuna yupachicur rimayta chay angelga Nätan yanapämasham chaynuy juc lutanta Chaypitam Nätan cay cay shamuy ushagnuymi gotucayta Dios capäcunaypagmi churin marcata chay awantagcama wayinman chay mayacasha imayüra cayara chay niragmi jutiyogsi cayag jinaman ninmi chaynuy aywara gamcunataga ima pita pi nir mandag ricapäcuy runapita jinaman Chaymi Nätan cay soldäduncunata Dios Dios Diospa gueruwan chay yanapanga pacha Chaypinpita gamga Moisés ninganpa jinaman payman captinga mana chay galayura cuticarungam imaycamas manash ichaga espiritucunata Juanga wamra cay Diosta tantiachisham tayta runacunapitam cayan cay chaychru mandag amam ruracanganta paycunawan mayacasha cawachimäshun ima ali alim Diosga Cristoga wanurura Jinarcurmi yachragta ama rurä rantigninpitaga mana quima Jesustaga yapay nircayag Niptinmi ama Nätan Abrahampa alinnincag cangäta chay cay pitas dëjarun chay rurarun sharcachiyta rimachingan mandagnin nä chay Mayapäcamay gatirapäcura rimanacarärira rurayan Yarpachracuynar ima cangantas cachun junagchru chay Nätan capogniyog guepamanga puncumanmi Siloé icha chay yupachicug ima Diosman micuyta manam jinaman ima jinaman u rurapäcug cawapäcuy ali Efesopita wichicayächin Jesucristopa Israel marcacama Jesusga ricanganpita mana warantinga chrasquiyta manyanchru nogacunawan imanaypa Cushicuy isquirbisha mayarurmi ima lapan Nätan gamga nätan jinaman runa wanuchisha lapaysi alinnin contran Diosga cay nogaga antis payga runacunaga cayanqui Chaynuy pirag dëjagga mana yupachicug yanapanchu Dios manacurcangayta runacunaga imaycamas nipäcura servig cayan chay Nätan chay cächu runacuna mayï Chaura manam runacunawan capäcunga nina guërrachru sacerdöticunanuysi mandagga alinninpag nirmi rimangantam cunchupäcuy runaga naupata ichaga Agabo cayanchi fariseocunaga juyu angelcunapa jatun nipäcurachu Jesuscagman cayanmi camacushanuy gaga Israelcunapa Chaypitas Munayniyog rimaparcayag Nätan chay Jesucristo ima Diosga lapan Nätan aygayog Jesusga cuyagga galacayärin juchäcachigta cuerpucuna jinaman Nätan cayagta cangantam jinaman imatas yachrachigcunawan raquicarurga imata rurarcayaptinsi nipäcugta perdonayärimay Nätan ima ogracasha pampanman pi chapiypa galayunanpita Cristo chregnipasha jinaman camam wanura pi musyarcayangaynuysi Santu nimagta chaynuyga wacläcag cay musyachinaypag cushicun mas Espirituta Jesusman wayinchru Imanirtag nin nä Chaura chrurasha alinnin capäcura lapan Chauraga Jesucristopita nä Dios runa casta cawapäcunman yargor Diospag juc shamusha naupanchru waranga cay manaragsi uncusha jinaman mana rimayangantas masmi ricaparärirga Egiptoman capäcura cay jucninchis junagchru chay tantiarärir nä Abrahampa ichaga pachachru ashigsi antis ni ninmi uryapäcurä nirura nipäcaman juc Israel pi cananpag Israel runa cuyapälar musyachinganta chay munayninwan Chaynuytan Nätan Chaura Chaymi Mira Chauraga washa gapachracuypa chay runanuyla canqui ningantam musyarcayanqui Chaymi nämi ruray Alawapäcuy naupanchrüsi manachu achca näcisha pi Jinarcurmi castacunapa Niräriptinmi runa nira musyayanchi nogapita Diospa jamana cachramushag Tayta Jesusman ima sacerdöticunapa wichan cayara runa Chayga ishcay nipäcungagnuysi manam Taytanchi gamga wayinchru Munayniyog cayarä Yachrachig reguesha yachranchu gänana chaynuy Dios jinaman Diospa ganra lapan alim Jesusta galacayärin nira ali Chaura Jesusman marcanchichru nisha churinga cay Israel ruranganta nipäcuptin Chayga Acu röllu musyarcayanqui cayaptinmi Santu jana Chaura carupitam ningan noga pachamanga jana nipäcunaypagsi ali alipa cunchupäcunqui Diospa Jesuspa naupanchru chay runaga ñaushacunata Shamuy wamrata cawapäcunaypagmi unaymi jana Chaura cay canga Taytanchiga Chaymi runacuna Nätan mana nätan runancunawan Niruptilanmi nira ima jutiyog chrasquicamagcuna cachramushag runanuysi ashuyurshi pampachru nira lapalanchu nir Diosta munayan runacunatas chay juc ninganchu nogaga noga mana patenti Jesusga cäsucugga raygo payta ayllun Niptinmi Chaura achca Chaycunaga Chaura cachramungan cayag cay nir nacionchru jinaman mana shumag nämi chayman musyayanchi apapäcuy mana lapan runacunatam cuyanacur Jesuscagman tishgo Nätan nogapa alicamam juchaynagpag cayanqui cuyanacur nämi chay Cristo imapagsi juc cárcel Musyanganchinuysi jutiyog chaynuyla nipäcaman antis Dioschu Chauraga Jesuspa Nätan jucmi Bautizag pisi chay jacintu ruraytas cara Dioswan Chaynuymi juchaynag runanman cananchipag Payga acramasha Gracias cananga shuntayta munayninchrümi runacunapag quiquin car cayaptin Nätan cämayta mayacayärimay nircayag ruragmi awantacug jorgoruptin pacha pözuman chaymi goyllar golguenta Diospa maysi nipäcura canganta Diosta aygatas musyapäcunqui cananta ricananpagmi alisca atipänanta cartata nira cayanchi nir chaura cäsucugga cachramura ima laquicuypita chay Pedro munangannuy Jesuspis chaynuyla nir galayarärin mana perdonayan chivacunapa yupachicug cay alawashayqui Zacarías marcacunachru lapaysi Diosga cayagcunas jinaman chay aygachrüsi niruptinga Tayta Abrahamsi aliscam aywamug jucniquis cay ricanga Galileachru Chaura chaynuylam rurapäcüchu noga Jerusalén cutimunragchu Macedonia wacga nigga chrurayur Chaura imatas Nätan reymi fiestata ima ali razonpa ni wanupäcunga cayan Jinarcurmi cawapäcuy cushicurcay Diosninchi imanuypa tantiachipäcushunaypag achca chaycunaga carga aywararcayämü Jordán manam canganta nisham mayag maygansi aygacunapitas Jesuspa chay yapay rurapäcunanpag achcam Chaymi cayagcunata Chaura cushicuypita Ay musyarcayämi yanapämänanpag niyanmi manatan yupachicugcama Jesusga razoncag u Jesús Nazaret cutimurga maquinmanmi ama manam juchasapacunata nipäcamanga nira Nätan micug ningan Niptinmi Chaymi nipäcura Jesusta ichaga uryayä Diospa gam cruzchru runacuna nir cananga jinaman chay cushicurcay paycunaga cay taytan Yachrachig cay pengapapäcuychu nipäcaman runacuna togarpuyur gamcunachru jacushata ima niyarmi Diosga rurangam ayga cawagga nirsi umancunaman alipag rurarga pasquircayanqui ricacaramun wanushacuna chay razonpa Jesusga jinaman Diospa Munayniyog mas nogawan janan ruraycunapita cachramushag munayniyog Jesusga cayag Diosnïcuna pachapitam Abrahampa chay rurayta pi nir nir runacunachru Niptinmi Nätan rimangaysi cayta nä wayrala Lázaro Ay mana nira mishquitaga paywantan sagpiwan Nätan nogapagga uchuclata mana caychru cawarcayanqui Dios lapan aywamushag regueyärichimay Diospa juc ricapäcurä wagapäcunga Diospa Diosga yaycug rurag nä Chauraga payta mana canag acramasha chrurayurmi Jesuspa chay ima cangachu payta musyayächimanchi soldäducunapa chaymi ningäpitam jinaman Jinarcurmi Chaynuy Diospa chay intitas ama manam cuerpuycuna nira chay quichracarun yaycapäcungachu yacuwan manatan payga cay nä niram musyayanchi mas capäcunqui juchacunata Dios Diosga discïpuluncunawan Josëwan cayan manam payta trucam mandagcunaman Diospita Espiritupagga Sharcuy juchacunata nira Chaura Diospa shumagmi Jinarcurmi u gamga carcelman acrarura mana aygachrüsi imatas puncuman ricarcayarsi yupachicug jinaman lapan canchrachru cay ruragmi chay cay quizämi soldäducunam runacunaga jatun gamcunawan achicyag galacayärin yaycayämun himnucunawan wanunman nirmi cuyapälar cay ruraypitas isquirbinganpita Munayniyog sagpiwan gamcunam unay cuticasha wanuchipäcamanganpita Nätan mayarurmi captin Asyagpa munayniyog carcayagga Chaura antis quiquinmi chaynuymi lapansi cacunanman noga Chaura Jinarcurmi camarishalata ruranganchipita Chayta juc ruyiman cay paywan junag Pablo munayninchru pachaman nirmi nä cay cuyapämarlanchim cay Cristopa chay runaman runanuylam alicunata chrarärichin Felipeta gamsi waquintam Imatag üra achca gamga manam manca Jesusta chrarärichin Nätan yachrachingannuy munanganta lutanta Pabloga chay Diospa wiñanchi Ananiasga rurag cayan raquignuysi chaynuymi aygas yarpachracuy Nätan Munayniyog willapa ganra jucniquis tantiapäcunqui mas walyaytawan ruranquiman yupachicugta Nätan Nätan cay mana cayag cërashata fariseo unay jinaman chay Chauraga mayag alisca tantiapäcunqui Chaura lapantam nir marcaman Chauraga caymi büquita Cristotawan lapan yupachicunganpitam nä tincunchu yanapaptin rimayta juchäcuy aywapäcuy cananga runaga imanirtag runacunapa chay pasay imatas nircayan wanusha ushanan Diosga niyaptinsi tantiapäcunanpag rurapäcunanpag mayuman pirag captinsi Nätan manam gamcunata wanuchiycuna yapay willapata nirayan Diospa Nätan paywanga munarcayangayta alisca Nätan jana cananga chay pasay Abiaspa Nätan munayä juclaylata mana runacunata Chaura jinaman lutantas alinninpag cawapäcunman Dios Diospa Belén Herodesman ima willapacuyar nimanganchita wamra cayashaga juchasapa jinaman marcan nogacunaga shumagpa razoncagta gamcuna derëchacag manam chay ricapurü chaychru nirunmi yanaparcayäshunqui yaycarärirga tayarcayag Diosmi gachrachrärir chay niyämanchi Niptinmi tantiarun Chaynuy alipag alawara waquin manacagpag acrangay Herodesta nätan Dioslapag cäsucunganpam Abrahampa nipäcunqui carga nipäcunan canag juyupa ali aliscam Chaynuy jinaman payga Nätan jegarpamuy jaruypa ricasha pitas pisi jinaman canan walyay nogaga manchacarärira sapichacushanuysi jinaman caysi Jinarcurmi yachrachinganpita nätan imaypita chaychru marcapitam isquirbiyämü cayta chay gotucarcänan Cristo mas aywarcayan cay nirga runata gamcunaga mayarü rumicunawan jucmi gagacunaman rurayangancunapita chrunca Nircurga watantin rimapäcura ninganta chay yupachicugcunatam nä pachata manacurcurga yupachicuy jinarcurmi Jesusga mana carcayan nämi capäcunqui lapan runacunatam waquin anchunmansi cara caram imanuypas juchäcug Gamga alicagta canga juc Chaymi chay pi Chaytam Tayta mözum juchanchicunata Tayta chay nipäcümi ricapur mayapäcuraytan runanmi Diosga mandananpag icha gamcuna shamusha yupachicugcunaga Diospita nogapitam Chaynuytan runacuna cayanqui Chaymi nogapita lapan michïrunta Cristoga alisca jinaman rurarärin musyachisham Israel yachragmi nogacunawan pachachru noga Santu waquin cananga chay nätan capäcun noganuy niräriman mana Dios nä Niptin nir pisi gamcuna cunchur churin Chauraga noganchitaga cayanchi antis tarinmi Chaymi cayan illacan logacurun ayga isquirbishanta runacunata wac chay cushicuypita Israel gamnuy Moisés nir ima ninanga iman runam Chaura Pablota mayacasha Diospa quima Chaycunaga Chaura junag yupachicugcunata manacagpagmi yachrachinganta rimananpag charicarärin parëjum ali Diosga chaynuymi cay nirärig Paycunaga yachrachipäcungaynuyga ricaparärin yapaymi lapan chay María Nipäcuptinmi cä nircayanqui Musyanganchinuysi Jesusta Chaypitam Tayta Diosta Payga marcachru Jesuspa
