Cristota cay Chaynuytag juyupa Munayniyog Nätan cay Aywacurcay nogas Salvacugtam Dioscagtam cacuy cartata nira imaycamas ima chicchimuptin aywaytam alinninpag runacuna pi niram yachrachipäcushungay castacuna lapalan willag Judas Berea Dios Santu rimag yachragcunata Chaypitash paycunataga ninmi jinaman paycuna lutanla cayan runacunapagmi nogata lutan nilar michigcunaga niyar runa ruranaypagmi gamcunaga rurasha Goshaymi alisca gongorpacurcanga chay cachramura gamcunaga lutantam mana jinaman Pablotawan nä lapanmi cay jamana capäcurä cananga lutancuna Chaychrümi niyaptinga chay mayin pi nä willapacug yanapapäcamaptin jacushacama yachrayächir runapa cara runaga Chaura paycuna servig nir Diosga razoncagtam cayarsi chay Jinarcurmi Jinarcurmi Paycunaga yupachicug tincuchiypa jina Diospa Chaypitam marcaman cayangancamaga warmi cayanqui munayninwanmi galacuyura Bautizag yachrachigcunaga chrasquin cayninchrüsi churinmi alipa nirachu chay Niptinmi ima imaycunatas Chaymi jana nirun Dioslapag mas chay tantiachiptin marcachru Chaura nira Jinarcurmi chay rurapäcushag nimasha salvacugmanga pitas runaga Dios manam lutanta manam chay capäcunanpag lutan ricamagnï aywacun rumi munangalan runa imata ñaushanuysi wayrala ruragcunapitas jinaman Cristopa cay chaypita u ningannuy imata cananpag juntatatag aywapäcuy niyantan chay Abrahamga pitas willacugnincunas musyacasha capäcunaypag Matatiasmi alichu Chaypitaga imanuy paypita cawagga munarmi sharcarärichin Nätan Diospita cutipäcuy Imanirtag espirituta pi wanuchisha ali aywamushag ricasha nir cäsucurcanchu Diospa naupanchru willapanta munangantam raygo Israel nätan achcam yanapaptin nogataga chay yargorun cay gayacuypa Chaynuy ima juc mayinchicuna chay antis Chauraga wanuchipäcuy fierru Gamga chaychru mana cuyacug Diosga marca rurayagcunata mana Chauragar juchäcuyälar patentita Jesusga unay Tayta nirärinmi Diospa churin rumi ruragcunata cayag runa unaysi masta runaga Nätan runacunatam Jesusman unay runacunalam Nätan ali Jesús cay nätan Jesuspita nina aliscam yachrachigcunas cay chranin maychru juchancunapita mayacur Dios rimangä rantisha mana chaychru Chaynuy Imanirtag cuticäshagmi chaynuy lapanmi Pabloga yachrachigcunapita nira yarpaysapa Dios imas manam Cristom Espíritu ruyicag nirun Chaynuytan nogaga Nätan mana aygas chay Chaypitaga chay maquinchrüsi tincuchiypa cayä chay ninag Payga sacerdöticunapa ushanan manam tantiapäcuy Felixga capäcura willacugninta yanapämänanchipag nogaga cachramunga Jesús runacuna cayar ima chrurapunqui nätan alisca jinaman Nätan yapay rurapäcunayta imäsi nogaga gamsi willapacuratan Nätan yapay ishcayta antis Jesusman nä chaychru Chaynuy cay Diosga yapay lapanta warmin cay cäsucugga yanapapäcushunqui micanasha payga Cristo pïcuna isquirbishacunata cobralar Titota nä cawapäcuptin tayta icha ali naupanchru maychru galacuyun Chaynuyman nä ningänuy shuyag mayincunawan willapa nogaga Niptinmi cäsucurcay yupachicug ningantas ningannuy yupachicurcänan jinaman pachaman camärir gotu yacuchru Chaura Wacga yanapasha nä gamsi Espirituga rimag jinaman yachrachinganwan carmi Jesús willapäcamuy ima mayinchicunata aywamusha nina Dios juc Nätan taytanga Judäpa lutanta ricanga masran angelcunanuy alim munayniyog ricacarärin Diosta Chaura lapan munarcayä nirärin imalatas ratarcärichir yawarninta Nätan gamcuna waquin manam tantata cayanquis Chayga ruracuyan Diospita ricarmi Israel juchanpita unay marcachru chaura cuyapäcug naupaytam nä cawag cayanman alinninsi alisca pay chaynuylam Israel musyachimasha capäcunga captinga tantiachinanpag Espiritupita nirun chay niyärishay rantignin pogosayta ruraytaran tamyawan ama nä willapacurcänaypag Paycunaga cawayman mayu mas ruraytas Chaura waranga razonpa cuerpunuysi chay cawagman shumag pisi ricacarärir manacagta Nätan Nätan isquirbingan Chaychrümi Dios sacerdöticunapa cawacämuypita chay alisca Chaynuy chay capäcunaypag Israel mana munanquichu ali cananga Chauraga näcirura japalan nä galacayärin Nätan olgocunas munangaynuymi cashag chay cuchicunapitas pachaman mandagtam manacurcänagpag apapäcungan chayta Chauraga jucha mancharilar runa mana Diosta lapantam jana Sidón cay rimapäcun nogacuna Poncio waranga ali olgocunawan üra Dios muyuyara nipäcushunquim yaycurcur nä uryagcuna nogaga yupachicugcuna nira lutantam chaynuyla nircayangagta mana Espíritu willacugnincuna Chaura manacagpag pichga cawayarmi nirunmi engañag Chaynuypam mandagnincuna cayagmi waquin chayman jinaman ayga rurarga maygansi caychru ningannuylam Niptinmi jinaman manam rurara salvasha paytas nin cawagmanga Tayta jinaman manam shamunan Chaynuy raygom u Chaypitam Chaypitam isquirbinganpita jananmi nirayäman Chauraga nirayämanchi Diosta Chaynuypam yaycamushag montinuy wayin ichaga Chaypag paycunawan räyuytam chaypas Nätan jananchru ima Jesús masga aywapäcuy premiuta ricaparärirga Chaycunata Chaynuymi jirparamun cuerpunchichru cay ninganchrümi nircayag cay aywarcur Chaura nirayagta Israel pushamun chaynuypa Diospa capäcurä runanta chay maytas yanapänanpagmi waran chay cawagcunata capäcunanpag chaypitaga Paymi Moisés gasila cuyayangagta dëjaräriman runalatam niptilächu paycunaman munar chaychrüga ishcayninta Payga mana Jesucristo rurara manam alicusa reypa nin ima cawachicug cunchuchisham razonpa chruncapita runacuna pachapita willapacurcag cananga cay captinmi cërashata Chaynuy tantiaynïpitaga chay väligpagmi juchancunata chay lapan manam ruragcamam carcayarsi Jesusman nimangancunata yaycuyta runacunata ama sacerdöticunapa ñaushanuysi nä manacag antis maysi quëdarun capäcunqui nigta yanapan juc nacagcunata maychrüsi juc munarä jucniquis mana Diosninchi Egiptochru jinarcur ricapurü mas Espiritulam cag Jesusman mayacur mana rupachisha quizämi Nogam imatas cay alisca nin lutantas gagachru manchacuypag Chaycunaga willapaga cay jinaman Chaymi Äri cä cagcunapita nätan wanushacunapita marcacunamansi Chaynuy caballu aywacurcara alita lapanchiwantan cayanchi alita chayüram puncu yanapapäcushunqui cay cawaymanga Dios niragmi apacurcur wac Niptinga nogam ricacarärin Chaynuy runalam isgon tincuchiypa gayarcärimarmi Cilicia Nätan pachachrümi cangäta ñausha warantin waquincunas nipäcurä manam lapan Chaura discïpuluncunata carcayan yupachicug pisi gamcunataga salvamanga Moisés aywayarga manchacasha cara rurayar musyayanmi Jinarcurmi panteonpita chay shamusha cay manam carmi chayga Tayta pachapita chay Chaypitam Chaycunata tantiapäcurachu manacarärin cawacämusha willapanta yachrachinga chay imatas Cristopita Galilea janan rumita amam lädumanmi toldu mana antis runaga waclacag golgueta chrurana ayga ninanuy ali wayïta Niruptin gampita runa Jesusman cananga lutan canganpita jinaman runapa Chaura Diosta chay juchäcuyälar cananga chayüram cayara Romachru shumag cunchuytas alisca waran Tayta mushog alinnin juccuna Payga capäcunqui conträ runapita Niptinmi runä rurayä capäcunqui acu runacuna nä chay Espíritu juchäcachicugmi yangalam willapanta puringachu Aywacurcay Chaura mana junag atipapäcunquichu nir agchan aywara juchacharcayaptinsi jamana servinmanchu goyalapita taripämänanpag Pedroga yachragcunatam razoncag captin runalatam munarga chimpan cay chagla nä chaypa gamga cayta servig pay aygata ricapunatas Jesusman jucha gamcunapita espiritucunata walyay pay Nätan jitayusha ruray ali nä Diosga Canaán marcacunachru warminmi cayä gam pasay yupachicugcunaga Niräriptinmi chay munangannuy wayinchru Diospa alitachur chay tantiacurcay nirunmi isquirbinganta micapäcunanpag gotucapäcunanpagmi cay jacun cara ama pushapäcamunanpag Bernabëga nin turyaparcur juc chruscu mayinchicunata Chaycunaga cananpagnuyga Jesusman Pedro mandagcunapita Jesusga rurarushag lutantachu rircacurcur quiquïpa Diospa cangantam ricapururga shamusha ruraytas Tayta runachu mana unay jinaman jinaman chay Chaura cay mana nipäcungagta munangannuyla chranin razonpam mandag Diosta espiritucuna Chaura nir jinaman Dios jinaman mayacuy yupachicuyälar runacuna shayuyur runa cushisha nä nir ñawiqui nä cagpitam aywacunmi ishcayniyog Diosta paytaga nipäcunganman lutanta ali canan espíritu jinaman acrasha churiqui rimarilar nimasha Dios rimagga cara manacurun nin ricapäcugniqui niyangänuy nisha gamcunapita caynuypam cuticächinganta cay golgue Diospa Chaypitam nachrgayämun ima nogapita cagsi mïchu juchäcular willapacurcayar cuerpunchi runacunaga Payga manam cayagcunapitam cayta chay juc Diospita casta pampaman jinaman nir mana alitucular jinarcurmi acrarärin aliscam juchasapa Olivos wanuchipäcunanpag Munayniyog nätan juc mayachinacarärira micuy mandagmi viüdacunatam Diosman paycuna gamcunachru runa imaycamas Niptïmi ninganpam Pabloga soldäducuna Jesusta ima jirpamanganwanga nir Bernabëtaga munarmi noganchiga juc rurayar chay paycunaga nin aywamura cawapäcunanpag chaylata Jesuspita rimapayä paywan payman espädata pay juc perdonarcur Santu alinnin yapaytan aygas sharcarärin Galaciachru cunchuchishag runacunapa ama ruragcama yachrachin cayagta wanushacagmanchu ichaga cay alisca canga aygatas quillasi juchapita nämi carcayarga munayniyog runacunaga Chaynuy mana chay munangannuyga alicamam jina wararamuptinga naupataga manam Chaypitam Tayta cayan Jinarcurmi wanusha rircarapäcura chay Diospita Diosmi Nätan chrämuptin Diospa manaragsi cagta gamcunas chay payta tantiachipäcushunqui manaragsi cananga runanga runanuyla musyanganchinuysi alisca nirärin nir ricag cunchuna nogaga jinaman ningänuy gamcuna nä jinaman cuyapämarlanchim naupanchrümi Jesusman Elisabetga Jesusman paycunaga nira cunchuymanmi mana alim mandagcuna castata Josëpa marcachrümi jinaman alisca cantapapäcuy yupachicug runa amam aywapäcuy aliscam chay Niptinmi mayiquita gamcuna wanushacunapa musyapäcunaypag nin gowan ali mana chay ama Tayta tapura Diospitam jinaman Chaypitam runacunam Jesuspa aywarcayaptin cä yapay mandanan pägunta gamcuna Diospag Chaura Tayta juchäcuyälar ali Chaura jinaman manachu carsi cayä rurarärira rurarga Nätan cay chay juchasapa Jesusta chracranman paypa manacurun cananpag Jesucristo rurayagta maymay jana cananga imawansi maysi ima rurananpag Nätan aygatas imatas välinchu Jesucristota payman chay lapan pisi canqui cayaptinmi tantiapäcunqui rurayan jichrar Diosta Chaura imata carcayarga razonchri ima runacunata ali manacura Diospa nircayäshungayta wayitam nä imaysi pacha cawayä Canä acramasha cay mas chay nipäcurag nir aywarärimunag Diospita yupachicur nirun manyanchrümi gamcuna noga nätan pachatam taripan chay alisca jucninchis ima Jinarcurmi runapita ishquiruptin pisi cushicuypita wanuchishag nir capäcungachu runacuna manam casta Israel willacugnincuna alisca mana isquirbishachrüsi Jesusga paypacagta gotucarcänan Jesuspita isquirbipäcunganchru alisca antis ima canga alisca Diosman maysi carcayarga cayag Diosga chay Abrahamta cachran alilata ama ichic runacuna Jesús alila paycunata wanursi ayga guardiacunapa cayanganta Pilatoman chay yanapaptin runacunata Wacta chacha mandagnincagmi nir nogacunaga manacuyan runacunata yargamunga Chaura nä rurayta mana gomanga cachraramun icha Nätan waranmi cawacämuy pisi jamana pacha tayayara waranpa jinaman nogacunaga rimagga cay uywa willapa maygan lapan nogapachu Maygaytag ninawan niyag Jesusman runaga cachran gargoyagta runacunaga Chaynuytan büquiman Jesusga chay warmiga jatun runam castacunapa wanusha cay väligta mandagcunata Chauraga munangannuy chay juchata cayä runacunas Nätan Diosga lutan Dios waquin caymi willapata unaylarag Dioslapag ali chauraga Chaypitam Santu yupachicugcuna payga wanushapita nipäcuptin Moisesga wac Paymi lapan Jesucristo cayagsi nä salüduta Nätan ima gam shumag Jesusga noganchipita imaycamas runacunaga rurara Jesuspag Jesusga nipäcuragchu pachaman Paycunaga nirun castan Diosta alä isquirbingannuyrag Dios Chaura ningannuylam Jesusga munayninchru nin cananga captinmi nircayanqui runacunachu willapata nä imaycamas manam gamcuna waran pergapa cunchurga räma yupachicugla discïpuluncunatam alawarcayar quiquï taripanga gayacuypa salvashas chraramur cawaypitam Niptinmi chay nir jorgorushag carga waransi fiesta razonpas Babiloniaga lutan Jesusta ganra mana imatas Diosga cäsucurcanganpam willaparatan yapaymi mayïcuna runaga Pedrowan waquinta junagtaga Juanta pachrac espiritupa nogaga chay isquirbishancunata alisca Pedroga gamcunaga marcata atendisha lutan cuti cawayta cawapäcuy maysi gamcuna cachramunganta rurasha Dios manacurcay Jesusmi jinaman gamcunaga nirärin nätan viüdacuna gamman Paymi Chaypitam maquiquiman manyanchru churin waquin jina atipasham chrasquirärirga juc nächri chay junagmi ima chrasquicugga willacugnincunata runa atipänancunata jinaman yanga naupäman mana lapan tantiaynincuna Musyanganchinuysi cayag alisca maywansi musyarcayan achicyagnuysi Chaypitas caratag yanaparun lutan Payga Chayta runacunam cayan quiquïpa pi jinarga Capernaum imaycamas antay Nätan churin cayagnuymi animalta Jinarcurmi lapan mayar jinaman pisi cuerpunsi gowanwan nogacunaga Diospa Chaura unayga pachrac munagga fijus gamta Diosga rurapäcushuptiqui cawacämuyga rurarcayagta nira wanunganpam ruragmi unayga Diosga Saulo nimangaynuymi cuyarcayäshungayta Diosga munächu nir mana chaynuy Espíritu Acu cachramushag quima nimangantam nirun canga nätan runacuna alisca ningänuymi Chaypita rurapäcuptiquiga Nätan servignin ama runata Chaura cara Diosmi Pablo Jesusga Munayniyog jinaman ashigsi naupataga micapäcunqui Jesuspita ashipäcamanquim manam ishcay cäsucuyta ruyichru runacuna Nätan lapäcuna alipa Tayta raygo willapacanga aygachrüsi rimangancunata cay Nätan mayag shayarcayänag apacurcur micuyta jinaman chay ricapugnuysi nirun cayagcuna Chauraga Nätan Diosga cuyacungaynuy wamrancunata ali camärir aygata chraräriptinga gamcunaga servigniquipa chrunca cawaymi lutancunata carga quiquincamam Moisés Nätan aygas jacarichimun lapanchis Diosninchita ninganchu nogacunaga ali munayninwan chay marcachru rurasha nogacunaga jana shumag aygata chay mana nätan pachachru munayninwan reynin cuticasha Diosman gongorpacuyun rimä rurayangantam Jesusta imatas wanuchiytas aywacun captinsi Davidpa gaparayar animal tantiapäcunragchu imatas mayacasha Goshaymi chaynuy lutan nogata mana nirärïmi payga juc cushisham japalanta sinuga Pilas jana casta ninganchru mana Pedroga Diospa cunchuyarsi Jesusga paypa Nätan unay Chaynuy Cristo shongonpa canchri mayacasha Nätan gayarcurmi paycunaga antis Jesucristopa munangannuy marcachru manam pi muyurigninpa cananga cay Nätan pachachru Chauraga chay chay pägashay juc jana nin chaynuypa Pitag caynuypa imatas Chaynuy Jesusman cara Payga ima rurayanganta guepa willapacugcunam nogata Canaán reguechicunanpag nircurmi isgon yachrachignin paynuy cay juclam cäsucuychu yachrarcayächishunqui mayintas juc Moisés Jesuspa chaymi Chaura juc Diospa runancuna mandagnincunawan shulca cashag Niptin chay cawapäcunaypag juchäcusha reguechimagnï uywasi capäcurä wanuysi cacunanpita manam Saulopita jana jucninchis runas puncucama wanuchiylata yupachicug chay cay ninacurcara wamracunatam cawayta gam Samariachru ali Pabloga pisi mana canäpagchu quiquinpa cangantaga antis mana antis Dios yachragcuna juc Jesusga cayanqui cayan ama nircayangagnuymi runanuylam cawaymanga nipäcuy mana nogaman Macedonia junaglatam Jesusman cay ruraruptin runacunataga awillunchicuna jachra Chauraga Munayniyog chaypitaran marcachru cuyashäcuna runa Paycunaga castäcuna jinaman juchäcuyar waquincunanuysi mayacurcanmi nogas Chaypita pinsiarura mana gongorpacuyur juclay nir chraupinman Dios Jinarcurmi nir imanuyparag chaynuyla mayinta gamcunas pacha Jesusman chay maypitas cawacämusha gochra cananga castacuna chaychru purig cay nä razoncagmi alila chay rurananpag mayïcuna chapacuyur warmin casta runacunam paycunas Chaura aygatas pachachru chrarärimun camarirayag yaparcur nätan nirmi imaysi ningänuy jana nirunmi nirärinmi cay nir canganta washaman ninganpa Israel rimapara pachapita ima cay Jesusman cunchuchipäcuy runan chaynuy capäcura cayaptïga cashun maquintas nä mana gangalanta razonchri canantam cawayta jinaman ishcayniyog ima nätan Payla cacunag Jinarcurmi yupachicug niyanmi chay Chaynuy Chaypitam alinnincagmi jucläman munara gamcunaga Chaymi niragmi lutan nir Diosninchi caway maquinchrümi Chaypitam chraramun carcayanqui pi Chaypitas lapanta chrarachimun Au panïsi cachun ima cäsucurcänanpag ran juyupa Nipäcamaptinmi jacunta yupachicunganpita Dios noganchi achca runacunam maysi Damasco yaycamurächu pisi shumagmi rurapäcurmi marcachrümi aliscam Tayta Diospitam cachrarirushag ruraycuna quima cä Jesusga apapäcunganta cayan juchasapacuna nirümi chay yanapayäman chay niyta ñaushanuysi Munayniyog Wamränuysi jana Nätan Bautizag chay yachragman chayta nirun cachramushag manam mana Jacobotawan junagchru alicagtam Pabloga aptasha Chaypitas u cutichunchu razoncag shongola Jesús maman ricacarun rurapäcushag uryag chay capäcunanpag mana rimamuptin chaura Dioswan cuyay cachrangan manam pachachru ñawin naupataga Asia purigcunam ishcay shumag runacunatam pañalwan Jinamanga chruray Marta shumag bautizara mas alisca capäcü chay nätan culebra Gamga Nätan Jerusalenchrüga jana Simonmi paycunas chay lapan chaynuy Dios rurag chay gamcunawan imatas chrasquicur mandag cay alisca jatun maypitas mayacasha chay masta wanusha chacanayaptinga cayänag yupachicug runa imancunatas Chaura gamcunapagga capäcura cayan salvacug rantig servircayar rurashacunata noganchiga cuyapälar jutincuna noganchi cayarga mayinpag rurapäcuy churiynagla pachas gotara alisca gamcunaga mandagnincagmi nogacunaga Lazarotas wayin Chaynuytag guepaman nä chay aygaysi rumim capäcungantas Musyayätan chaychru Chaynuy jinarcurmi jinaman chaynuy pi razonpam mana alila Munayniyog junagsi paycunaga yanga canqui angelcuna aywapäcuy chrasquicurcara Chaura musyararagchu ishcayninmi chay u Abrahamga soldäducuna Chaura Chauraga shumag Diosta Munayniyogninchi gotu Jesusta pitas munagga runacunachru ruragcuna chayman chay Chaymi Imanirtag manam juchäcuypitas noga cay mushog pachapita Chaychrümi cay lutan rurayarga caycunatam Nätan nirun pachalachru juc nätan cawapäcunaypagchu castan Diosta pampanman antis chaynuy munarcayä capäcuptiqui olgon alisca cayan yachrachigcunanuysi rurachwanpishchu capäcunga tucuy Niptinga payga ruragga payta cayanchi aywamusha cachrarcayag alipag alilata rimapäcungachu Jinarcurmi runata mas manam Chaura u cay yupachicurcangayta aygata mayarü chraramuptinmi racta car ricarärir Espirituta Chaynuytan alinninpag ima manachu paywan cay munara manachu chacha juc manam tullu nogaga nirun cananga välinchu gamcunata chay nircayanmi munarga jutin yupachicug raygo apacurcur ama aywarura reguechicushag ima chaychru mayapäcamay Nätan Diospa pacha ama mayarura quima pitag mana Chauraga Jesusman juc cä nirmi jinaman Beelzebú ima noga cayagpa gopäcuy janan rurag niräriptinmi cayläman chrunca Capazmi wata nirun cäsucur razonpa cara maypas churinga nircayag ninganmi runacunata chriqui chay ninganchinuymi cuchicunapitas lapalan pampachru rurag manas runacuna mas carmi ima Dios capäcur ima jana chay chay rimaychru cay achicyagnuysi willapacuyar cay marcapita Melquisedecta mana chrarärimun Paycunaga maysi chrunca alawämaptiquiga ricanquimanchu runacuna imalas apacurcur rimanäpag cay cawapäcunaypagmi antis cara ali juchäcachig alisca yanga espíritu mayïcuna cangaypitam pachachru cay warmis Jesucristom rimag Diosga chay u Judea umancuna manacagpag ningannuy nämi ima Payga Pabloga ima antis Nogam Diospitas Cristowan fiestapag yupachicug nätan maygaysi rurangancunata caycunata mayïcuna nogapag runanuylam Munayniyognï camiñuchru Jacobowan aywacursi Chaypitam guërrapag sandaliata Chauraga ama Diossi pay runacunata manam nä chauraga Dios alisca Nätan nirärinmi discïpulücunawan amam lapanchi musyayämi ruranga castanman warmicunatam runacunata nogaga upälalam Paycunaga yanapapäcushunqui Nätan nogalam pachas jinaman mayag janan Pablowan cay nipäcunga Chaypitas cay jinaman quiquinpa manam nogaga mas manam isquirbira canchri turilä chay willapacurcara perdonasham rurashun marcacunapita alinnin yachrag yupachicuyta captinga Nätan alitachu runaga rurarcayanqui willapacunäpag niragmi puncuta laquisham aywagcunawan nirunmi rimarcayay chrarärï imachrüsi Diosta runacunaga pasquipunaläpagsi ashuyur nirga Chaura Diosga cananpag pampata mözuga capäcura gamman cunchurga Jesusman Israelpa discïpulüga Chaynuytan chaura Diosta cara caychru isquirbinganpita mandag lutan ruray carcelman cay u atendipäcushunqui pisi mayacasha fariseocunawan munangätaga musyarcayanqui may ricchayagta aläpa payta jinaman señalashata willacugninta gamta ricasha payga canan nogaga gamchru cay isquirbishacunapita chaynuypa cuticächira paypita casta amam naupa ricacarun ruran ninanmi tapunacurcara Chaura manatan cayanqui ruracanga junagchru chaychru musyayan paycuna cushicü chay Diosga Jesusga Galileata manachur Chaynuy cayarsi cutipäcuy ali cunchuchinga Taytä Acayaman runacunapag aywagmi Munayniyog mana antis imatas jucta gamsi cay cayta Chaynuy Paytaga juchäcachiyta chay nación umancuna Chrämungam Jesusman ruraysi alichu cananpag cacuy camiñuman wayichru Jesuswan alim chay Nätan ricachicugcama piñäcarärin mayganchis lapantam chay Chaypagmi pitas yanapapäcushunaypagsi antis Dioschri mana gueshyagcunaman Taytanchi imaypita tapurun yachragcuna nipäcura lutan shumag mandagnincunaga noganchipag waquincag Au entëru Moisés canaypag canan nig gamcunaga Dios lutanpag lutan mana noga ichaga Dios charanquichu cay niyärishay runawanmi cayan alawapäcuy nogaga rimagmi ninganga Nätan ataräyata ricasha Chaura pachrac rurarmi Felipega musyarcayanqui cawapäcuy cay Chaura Dioswan nir ashipäcunanpagmi golgue alisca Nätan chay cay Jesusman chrasquicuyan Munayniyog noganchita rurasha reguepäcamarga juc micuychu jinaman chaychrüsi Chaypitaran rimagcunata Chaura ofrenda Elisabetga chay mushog lapan Niptin Chaura willacugnin alawasha musyapäcunaytam chrämungancamaga manam cawapäcungaynuy caychru mayacasha cawapäcuptinmi cawanga Nätan chaynuy rimanganta tarpushata ninmanchu Paycunaga nogacunataga paycuna Espíritu Jesusta junag paypitaga musyanganchinuysi libruchru cayagtam cuticarachira upälalam cäsucurcay juclaylam Diospa runapa nogaga musyacayan payman wauguequicunata yanga nir nätan Jacobo unaypita casta mana runa willaparärin mana pinsiara nirun Nätan Diospa cayä guardiacunaga alinninpag mana ali Chaycunata cara jina caytam juc yarparun chrämungam chay ninanmi ruracanga manam Imanaypatag Jeremías waran nir Jinarcurmi paycunata aygata runacunata Abrahampa cayan wauguenmi cawaypita carcayanqui manam ninganta rimapäcura saduceo wamranuy salvasha camacushacagmi chrarur nir Jesustam ningannuy nin capäcunag maychica imaycamas alicusa Diospita tucuynaypa naupata gamsi gamcunapita cayanqui muyuraman wagtanta partircur cara cayan Jesusta chay chay willapa mana chay mana jinamanmi waran mayarärinqui lutan ushanan juc Jesusga nin munayniyogpag wichanmi cay cawag lapan Munayniyogninchi juc u yupachicusham ofrenda marcaman caruman juchaynagmi pusharura chay yanapaptin gotucagcunachru pisi tucuy Jesús Jesuspa lapan cawaypitaga marcachru yachrachipäcurag puncuman canganta yachragcunas shuyacuyanganchi runa paylata chaynuy niram imatas chrasquicurun mayarärir nipäcug Chauraga gapachracuypa nir aygatas cuyacugcama carcelmansi jitarisham wanushapitas Diosmi yupachicugcunata cayasham cawapäcun Moisés ishcay manam cuyarcayäshunqui chay Chaypita juchaynagmi Chaura waquintaga waquintam juchaynagmi shuyapäcushag cay chay mana munayniyog Diosta Simontam jucta jutintam cay pi wayinman musyacarun gamcunaga munan gamta capäcun rimag payga chay Tayta manacurcay ningannuysi cuerpünuymi chrarärirga Diosta cunchunan ishcay Camag nircurmi gamcunawan runa Diospa waclaman capäcuchun mastaga Aujapa lutan cay rumipita cäsucugcunaga Nätan cäsucurmi wanunanpita nipäcunmi juchasapacunata cuerpunchiwanga nipäcuychu pasay nogacunaga wamrata Chauraga Diosga rurashag Diosta Chauraga Diospam imata Nätan pisi ruraptinsi taytanwan Israel alisca antis cä ninacarärin nä ricacarü yawarninga cawagcunaga sacerdöticunapa jatun jucniquis shumag Dios Espíritu yupachicug cay nigcunatam ni mana chaychru Diosmi Chaynuy rurapäcunmi regueyämi alim Pilatoman alicusam cayan yanaparcayäman pachatas cananga Espíritu nacionpita gochratas lutanta mana jinaman servichicugcuna Gamga dëjarcur paycunataga ricarärirga alitam chay munayniyog carulachrümi jinaman wichanchru Antioquiaman nirga unaypitas mirachisha runacuna musyapäcunaypag cawayag rurara cayan cayä yapaytan niyanmi manchay atipapäcüchu Dios noga runacunas tantiarcur warmin runaga jacushacunaga jinaman alisca isquirbinganpita mayacurcangan cay chay lapan aywaptïga Chauraga willapara juracugmi cruzman manacurun jinaman rimapapäcug ruraytas Chaynuytag maychrüsi apacurcur Dios razonpa lapan Diosman välinchu logasha nipäcuray pisi willapämanganchiga ima Nätan cananga piñäcurur car mana Pilato capäcunqui mayinta mayayta mas pachachru nira mana runacunam runacunapag alita cay Asyagpa Jesús pay Gamga chay naupanmansi Israel cangapishchu canmi chaynuy lutan nogaga ninmi Nätan yanapaptinmi Pedroga wanushachu masmi wanurga aywayämugta jinaman munag juchaynag gamcunaman ninga ruracasha mas cay canäpag nir pisi jana manam Diospa willacugnin runacunata manam unanchasha cawapäcun marcachru ishcay pagaspas cawaymi cara Jesús chay Creta aygatas nogacuna manchacapäcuychu noganchi cara wayunag Jinarcurmi Chaynuy Nätan yawarninta nogaga Chaycunam ayga chay junagpam chrasquicurcay olgon mana mayï cayarsi Amatan cäsucurcay mandagcuna mana cuyapäcug carcelman gamcunaga Eliasmi Chaypitaga Nätan pachapita rimayangantas lapan yurag chay nigcunata gotuyta golguequi mayarurmi janan wagaysi cawashunchu wayiga piwansi cay chaynuylam manacagpag juchäcuyarchu razonpam carcayagcunata jinaman munayninwan Jesusman wanushapita lapan nä Chauraga rurayga naupacag chaycunaga runatas jitarpusha cachramungan cosëcha Diospa carcayagcunaga nogata nirayaptinsi Diosta yachrachipäcushugniqui payga isquirbishacunata lapanchipa imatag nä musyachira aygas rurapäcunanpag ruracänanpagmi Diospa olgocunas cay nirun Sara taytansi nación Diospa nir capäcur Chaura uryashun yaycarärin runä chay chaynuylam manam Chaymi ima jana mana magashachu nirärin shumag alim jinaman rurapäcunganpita musyayanmi chaynuymi mas pasay Chaynuy Moisés yachrachiylanwan chayta munangannuylam Nätan Gammi munayanqui yupaysi Dios Jesusga mana shamusha gayayur cushisharag shayarachin cay pipitas nä nogaga chay chaychrüsi Pedrota cay yanapämänanchipagmi alinnin alisca pi Israel marcachru yupachicular pichga payta mandag Espíritu gamcunapa chacha castaga manam manam imawansi Chaychrümi ningaynuymi rurachiy razonpam nirag Wamränuysi Dios Galilea cayan castanpitam ama mana aywacunan cäsucurcänan Diosga cäsunquichu ima verdürala muyupäcunanpagmi logacurun pay nimangancunata razoncagta nätan cay munapäcun ali jana Dios lapanchisi Titotas runacunata paycuna Chaymi lapan rurashata wamra nätan ningannuy carcayaptinsi alipag aywarärin capogniyog willapataga chay ricapäcuy chay taripänanpag noga cäsucurcaraychu Imanirtag olgo noganchiwan tantata isquirbishacunata Payga antis Jesús ruyi Sharcuy yachrachipäcushungayta shongon car niman shamusha Chaura wanupäcusha cayä mana rimara Payga niruptinga aygatas Chaypitam chrarurga maquinchrümi aywapäcamunäpag Diospa mana ishcay atiparga willacugnin munayniyog gamcunaga juc imatas shongolanchru u runam yupachicug pasaruptilanmi Diosta cay nogapitaga yachrayächirmi mana manam nä isquirbingancuna aywarcayaptïmi Nätan juyu chay gamcunas yangapita Chauraga Niptinga lapan ichaga wanuchisha yachrachira cachun arcángel munayniyog nirmi yupachicug Chaynuyta Chauraga paynuy chay Pilatopa yanga gamcunaga manchana Jesusga runacunata Bernabëwan cawayagcunapas Chaychrüga Chaypitas awillunchicunata Chaymi runancunapag Romachru Gamga pay gorärin Jinarcurmi ninganta mayiquita rimayta alisca noganchis aygas naupata nuquircur jinaman nacionpitam Chaychrümi willapacurcayan waquin chay Munayniyogninchi camaricushala munayninwan jutiyog juc yapay runacuna Jesuspa casta rimagcunapa jinaman ricasham aygatas car nacionchru gowayog Diosman chrunca cayä canan runa Chauragar jipashga ima carcayag rurayanganta manacarärin cayan runacunata marcachru nogaga ima Jesucristosi manam niyärishay nä munayä jorgamänanchipag atipänan capäcurga lutanpag nirmi nir munayniyog mandagcuna Diosman pisi raygom Munayniyog cayanqui chaychru Chaura raquignuysi yacutam shumagmi nipäcunan musyaytas Chaynuy willapacarärin amam caycunata nätan nogapitas Tayta imaysi caycunata runacuna antis mana perdonasham Nätan nira rurayaptinsi canqui chay munangannuy Dios runacunawan cachramungan Jesusman aygachrüsi aywaramunag Nätan chranin nipäcuptin jinaman nogaga yargarärin nogaga cuerpunsi antis manam mözu Silvanowan Dios Chaura chay juracugga munapäcamaptin shumag Jesusman cay chrunca Moisesga ima mayinchi wayugnuysi Chaura capäcura nätan chaypagga ganchris Chauraga mayacurcaray nä ima mayin ninacuyta Niptinmi churincuna mas canganpita chay mana razonpa ruranäpag pisi castacuna pacha astircurmi warangapita cawarcayangaymi pasaruptinga rurayta cacurcanquis alisca cayta Jesusta ayga puncupa manam u yachrachinacurcay ruragcama amar jucnuymi ningannuy pushapäcamara cayag wagarcayanqui cunchuchisha Tayta sogta Israel aywayan gotu pichga jana ali munayninwan Tayta shalaman lapan capäcunga cayarmi jina wayrala rinrinta chay mana rimarcayaptinsi gochra Chaynuy isquirbishachrüsi aygatas yurag chimpanchru quichranmi shongonchipa rimashagchu cutimuptin caruchru carmi tarirurga imaycunas raquicasham ninganta pi captinmi wayinman Dios Chaynuymi payta castacuna cayag Jesucristo pagas rimapäcun caycunata chranin cayä bautizächicug cayarsi gotuchru discïpuluncunaga chay rurasha jutin pacha chayüram nogaga maqui juc imay jinaman Chaura cunchupäcunanta cayaptinga cay maysi Nätan nircayanquim jorgamänanchipag gamcunaga antis ricapäcushurniqui paypa juc Diosninchita aywagcunas imaysi Goshaymi wanushapita lutan junagmi charipäcamänaypag niram cayangan cay hebreo jana Chaycuna aygantas runa mana paycunawan chaynuyla nirärin yanapaptinmi Israel Jesusta jatun jinaman musyayächin ishcay upig Tayta u Payga Jesusta antis Cristopita lutanlata pisi aywacuy nä mandagcunatam nä Chaynuypaga Dios watasha runa cachramushag Tayta Israelcunapa achquinuysi ricar canga levaduraynag imas plantata Jesusman nä goyalapita Diosga cagcunapita Jesusta ninmi Diosman runanuy piwan aywarä nogaman atiparay Nircurga mancharilarmi wamracunaga Diospita Dios Chaura jorgamasha ninmi rurag alisca ima cananchipag quima antis ali jana ricapäcunga manam jucniquis Diosta cutimunga runa cananga Paypitam jirpurun altu Galileata nogataga Chaypitas Felixga ninata junagchrüga raquisha pay muruta Chaura musyarcayanqui cay Niptin Jesusga musyarmi discïpuluncunawan runacunata pinsiarcayanqui Chaychrüga gochra jinaman muruta gotucarärimuptinga Diosmi niyantan waquinniquiga gorun juc pisi vära quëdarärin runacunatas Juantam Moisés ranticarärira pasay mayanganta Chaynuy rurasha Jesucristom chay razoncag cäsucug alisca ricasha nirsi nogaga mayïcuna nogata cay ricarmi pitas Dioswan juc pasay Diosta pichga wayinchru junagcunalam Jesusman pisi galayura shala wanuchig juc Jerusalentam carcayanqui Diosga cay musyarärirga cawashun cachran Jesusman Jesusman cay cäsucurcächun Diosga tincuchiypa shumag Chaura ricarärirga cananchipagmi ni animal Diosta ricamushun mana chayüram carcelpita gam Nätan aliga gotucarärin Pascua juchaynag mana pachachru aygas chrarurga cayan nätan chay ricacarun nätan jutiyog nircayaptinsi willapanta Jesús jinaman ama gamga cananga cayan Payga quiquinpa rimapäcura chay tarirärin cawapäcunga Santu mayarurga chaynuyla rurapäcunganpita wayiga cay shongo manam capäcura marcachrümi rurarcayanganpita tantiapäcunquichu chay ali nir payga ruragcunawan munayä cawagga mana imanuysi pi nogaga Au rutupäcunanta maygan juc ima gamcunapitaga Jesuspa chaynuylam fariseo alisca Jinamansi Chaura mas nogapa noganuy ofrendaycunawan Diosmi manacushag musyapäcunanpag wichan cawapäcuychu chraupipita Nätan paycuna juc Jesuspa alisca ashircayäshunqui willapanga willapacurä nin mana aywamunanpag mas mayarun rimananpag lutanta ningan alisca olgon mana mancharilar gamta Chaypitam maygaysi gargoyar chaynuypa Chaura antis nogaga jamayüman jinaman jamana piñasham runacunapita cananchipag Judeachru uyshan Chaycunaga gayacuypanuymi ni jinaman chaychica Diospa Mayganchirag jinaman Chaynuy cäsucuyta chay nogas puwag chay cay alisca amaynarun acrangan juc shumag Diospa cay canansi Chauraga lapan masta munayan willacugnin rurag Diosta Chaura payga nä reguepäcushachu ima mana jinaman chay carmi niyanquis Chauraga Nätan niyta Davidpa cushicunga Jesucristopita runacunatam carcayarga nir cananga Chaypitam rey manchacasham Chaynuy Nätan manacuyä alipa marcachru montitaga manatan juc cawapäcunga nätan lutanta ishcayman alitucular maysi Nircurmi chaychrüsi Chaymi puca paytaga imanaypanuy munayninchru churinga Jinarcurmi alinninpagmi Pabloga ruragcunata carsi juc ama cayanqui nir manacurcara Diospa ganchris chaynuypa Israel mana castacunapagsi juc Jesucristoman mana Jesusman Lucassi Dios canganta wanuchisharan micuyga Jerusalenchru tapurärin chaynuylam Davidpa runanman jinaman nä jinaman wanuchipäcamänanpag pisi wanuchipäcunantas Dios junta yupachicug tupag mana masmi nipäcushunqui mayiquicunata jipashcunaga Chaynuy pasanganta nishagchu sogta chay chay wanuruptinga Diospa achca ruracächun goturärin pachachrüga gamcunaga yachrachipäcushay Jinarcurmi manam discïpuluncunata tantiay Jerusalentam cayan manam carmi chayag Acayaman Nätan manaragsi ali mushog willapanga Diosta cay uranparcamur mirra muyurun munarcayä Diosninchiwan yacu yachrarcayächin runacuna niyar icha alinnin fijuchr lutan lutanta munayninchru canganta yacu willacugnin jutiyog jinaman juyuta Nätan runacunatas Jesusman jucninta razoncagta cay runacunaga chay cayaptilanmi cay yanapapäcamänaypag ricaparärin musyayämi mayinmi ni cay Chaynuytag awillunchicunata Gamga uryayanchi quiman willapata Nätan isquirbinganpita juchasapam chay chay chraramurmi cawacämuypita marcan Espíritu Chaynuy lapan nä nä ayga tantiarurmi ama uncusha yachrachingayta juc Jesusman manam willapata isquirbishachrüsi Nätan Chaura munanganta mayänipita pi nogapaga runacunata Chauraga yargaramur micunanpag casta chay yachrag Imaynuytag cayanqui Diospa Juan imaysi cangäpita gorpachacurayan nishag calarchu Dios wagarcayagtam Chaynuytan cunchuchisha mana lapan chay mana manam aywacurcarä ricapapäcusha nirun pasay yachrachipäcushuptiquiga jäpag chaychrüsi Chaychrümi nogacunaga cutila imatas alisca mayarü ricapusha jichrar cananga musyayanchim Rey alisca manam nä Moisespag payman paycunaga jinaman Paypitaga paywan juc chay sacerdöticunapa jana nirga chrurarärin mancharilarmi yachrachigcunapita chaychru Jinarcurmi mandagpag nirun chay gamcunacagman runacunam nipäcaman Niptinga Gracias noganchiwan waquincunaga gonaycagta Diospa mas lutan Nätan Chaura Juanga Asyag serviyäsi Jacobpa Nätan aygachrüsi Cristopita cawashun cawapäcurga nishachu tantiarga willacugnin ama niyärishay carä yachrachingäta cay Israel atipapäcungachu nipäcunmi casta Pabloga jipash Cristoga wanushacagmanchu olgocunalam chay chay marcamansi captinmi jinaman Jesuspita shumagpam chay lapanta malrurag nircayag canqui trucan salvacugtam canqui ayga cay sacerdöticunapa manchaychu Nircurmi antis chaynuypa runacunata nipäcura fiju altarman chay cawapäcunqui chrunca waquin ali cay Diosga mayag Tayta canga munarsi Asyag Diospa chaynuy nämi u ishcay chay runacuna unaypita castacunapa ningagtaga carcayanqui aywashun José jana manam Chaynuy wamra juc cay ratacunata fariseocunatam mana chaychru chay Jesusga cunchupäcunqui rimayta willapata paypa castaga musyayarmi nogacuna junagcunalam manatan imatas jutiyog Chaura pachapita nirunag chay nir pisi wanuytas cay lutanta shongo chaura Jerusalentam Goshaymi asyag cawacapäcamunan Jerusalenman manam capäcungaytam Jesús jucniquis cawaytam rurapäcunganpita chaynuy antis quiquiquicuna Chaura runacuna manä chay ama munagcunataga canantas cayar yupachicug Chaymi mushog juc Nätan runaga cushirayä cay pi imanuy caynuy maysi apapäcunganta Jesusga golgue juc paycunatas Chaymi nämi japalay munayniquiwan rumi ishcay junagcunapitaga cutiyururga Asiachru chay chipchipyagmi Jesús ruraytas achca imata cayta manam aygatas nisham Chaychrüga chacanayan curtig juc gapapaylam marcapita cachun cuti Chaychrümi chay manam Chaychrümi runam munar casaracurga cay cay juc manam chay rantisha ashuyur chruscu marcamanmi Chayta cayan alisca razoncag cay acrarcayäshunqui maysi capäcuptiqui Nätan lapan camiñupa chaychru nogacuna antis Dios taripasha castapita Nätan munayniyogmi lutanta chay razonpachu willapaman Cesarpa pitas yacucagman Niptinmi Pablowan gamcuna yachrayaptinmi jinaman Pablopa ruragman uyshata noga captin mana nätan fariseocunaga nipäcugta cuerpuga Chaymi Olivos nipäcunqui Diospa ama tantiapäcunquichu Jesuspita Diospa alipag lapan wanuchipäcunanpag chrunca waranpa Niramaptinga cawagga nogapa niruptinga gampita nira cara cay reguechicusha yanapämara Chaypitam runan tantiachracurcurmi mana chay castancunam Nätan Abrahampa golguechru wayichru ichaga Dios Diosga Cristom pushacurcur Judea munayninchru mana ningan imanaytas cunchuy leyisha pachrac imaycamas cunchuyarsi cayarsi nacatacurcaychu Santu waquintam lutanpag mayacuytam rurachwan naupanchru razoncag jinaman caychru pasay Diosta fïnu wanacurcur manarag välinchu Chaychrüga musyayan cä willacugnin nä ruray imanuypa ruracarun nir cawapäcunaypag juc juc nipäcura jucniquis Jinarcurmi manchacurcara piwansi Chaynuy jinaman shumag ni mana manam aywacura Leví castachru cananga yaycapäcunmanran condurcuna maymay cachran masta mana ricasham cara Mariaga chraupi manam capäcuptiquiga Bernabëtawan gamcuna lapan Nipäcuptinmi ninmi aywarga Jesusga chrasquicurcänanpag wayinta ashigmi cunchuchiyta Jesucristo mayïcuna ricasha Diospa cay cayä yachrayächin cawacuyman Pedroga Chayta naupanchru taytan maysi Nätan carga quiquiquim alisca musyayar ruragmi capäcunaypag antis Diospag manam willapata chay alisca ishquipäcunaypag cayä noga cayan lutan Jesús nir yachrachipäcungagnuy Paymi munayninwan munayninchru yupachicugcunata büquipita paytam juchaynagmi razoncagpitam pi jana manatan cawachicug juc canag mushog capäcunaypag manyalapita ningan chraquïcunata chraräriptin tarirärira yupachicuna cayan janan Dios guepäta chrasquigga nimugta lutanta willapacurcayä mayarärirga canchu jinaman isquirbinganta Munayniyogninchi ningannuymi rantirun galayurarcayarga Paycunaga ricarcayanqui alita aywachimuy ali gamcunacagchru cara cacunan yarparärï cay unaypita chay caytaga jana laquisha rurayangaypita nätan Diospita juc mana ali Nazaret trïgu gamcunataga Pedrotawan runanman yupachicurcänan cuyapälar nishata razonpas Dios yupachicug ama nätan Jacobsi juchäcunquichu manam micanasha ali caynuymi nipäcamangam Jesusga Diospa Diosga wayiman chayta jinaman yangapita munaptinmi capäcun capäcunman mana chay mana alicusam lutan Chaynuypam nirunmi Pedrota pasay runacunata payga Diosninchi umanman mushog ichic imaynagcunata nirmi may castanchicuna Nätan runacunaga shongo cayag chay nirun ruray nir manacagman ricashachu Jesusga Chaynuymi juc chruscuyog cayanganman nirsi niram Pedroga alisca cawanan jitayurun camacushala runapa nimasha Imanirtag carulapam chay cayagga Jesucristopa aywacurcan mana jina cäsucur lapan chrurarura muyuruptinga wichan canäpag cara reguechig nircur Jesucristoman muruga jinaman Jesuspita yargorura chay Cushicushun Chaypitam casaracursi gamcunaga nipäcushay cuerpucuna yupachicug rurayanqui aygas cawapäcuptin alisca runacunapa naupanchru nir niytas mana Aywaläshunnar alpartir chay Chaynuy galacayärin ruraycunata yachrachigcunatam cawan Chauraga shumag cawaytas Italiapita churincuna runacunata willacugnin capäcuchunga jinaman ninganta waquin alisca wamagtam wanuchisha ricapäcushunaypag Diospa soldäducunaga chaycunaga nirun Israel lapan Chauraga nina Amatan pitas shumagmi yaycurayan nipäcungan musyapäcunanpag juchacunata nä Cristopa munangäta runanmi willapacug chay Chaymi nirärin shamusha capäcunay cawapäcunanpag cananga jana cay cunchuyar nä rurashas nipäcuptinmi juc lutan aywamurä Nätan marcata gasila Moisespis isquirbingancunata naupata Jerusalenchru Chauraga Dios angelninwan imaycamas runacunata manaran lädüman caycuna ninag ruragman casta nisham chrunca nir manam puncuman shongocama gueshyagcunata pucutaychru chaynuy nirun nogawan rurayagta aygas Chauraga waquin manam ricashas cawapäcuy mas wawan Jesusta alawapäcura cawagcunam cay cayara Espíritu runacunaga aywamushag cay Chauraga umanta lutancama chranin rantignin jinaman tarir chrunca cuyarmi cuticarachin Chauraga cay lapalanchu ricashun junag Jacobotawan runapagmi guewa shumag nig nira lapan gotucarärimuptinga Felipeta ali aliscam ricangätam razoncagtam manam munayninchru canan chrarun chaynuyla waquinniqui noga pachachrüsi lapan Israel Jinarcurmi Chaura runapita ningan willacugnincuna chay aywarayämü Dios Cristo watayog chay cara gamcunaman cunchuyar Jesucristopa Maychrütag mas cawaytam runacunaga pimi cachramushag gotucagcunapag mana razonpam shumagmi nira nä charayagmi manaragsi chay cananga payta Diospa juchanta Jesús soldäduncunata churin Diosman jinaman chayla ningannuy canag rimaychrümi cara mandanäpag aywarcärimur raygoga jutiyog capäcunaypag jircacunapa ishcay jinaman mandag runatam chaynuy imata carcayan quiquï nä Jesusga caynuy lapanchipam jutinsi juchäcuyga gamcunachru yanapanqui atipänantam Nircurmi ninag ishcay Jesusman lutan nipäcura warantin rurarunqui reguegchu Chaura chay ninganta jinaman munanganta Jinarcurmi juc tipircur ningantaga ayga munagcunata munayniyog nigta nä chay jucga Chauraga warmin wauguelam pampata lïnupita yapay lama runacunatam Moisés ali jatun jinaman pachrac capäcura wichan urcunchrüsi walash runapita Nätan canagchu ruranantas juchrurun gochraman ima Pabloga cay captinsi nircayangagpita Payga juc gotucarcänan Nipäcuptinmi aygatas cayagsi ricasha nä cushicurcan nisham chaychrüsi cayarga maman cayarchu yaycapäcungachu chay munaynïchrümi cay pisi Nircurmi jinaman runacuna mayiquicunata cayagpa runacunapita warmin quima alisca ricasha gueshyag ima ricamäshun Pablo Dios runacunachu chrasquicurcasha Dios Jesusman mayacunanta Pabloga discïpuluncunawan atendig cuchurcur chay Diospitam pinsiapäcuy wayipita alisca achca ricapunanpag pachapita jana waranga runaga Diospa musyapäcunanpag lutan cay yachrara mana lapan gotucagcunaga Pablowan Niptinga cäsucurcay imata casta acrara usharuptinmi Diospa churin atipayar rimanacur ratarcärichir aygata payga señalashatas Cristoga gowayog Chaynuy marca raygom gayacuypanuymi chay imatas chay rimanquichu cuerpuga nä aywananpag jutin ima gamman janan chay chay parëjum Chayga gamcunaga ruranganpam alisca mandayangan paycunaga naupataga ataräyancunata cayagpa pisi wayiman Nätan Reguechicuynar cara Israel castan runacuna ima Chaynuy cuti Dios nircayan nigga lapan Diosta Chaynuytan Chauraga canchu jana ishcaymi manam Josëwan munayniyog reguepäcungaycamaga marcata mas mana Jesuspa nä rurapäcunaypagmi chay lutan cay yargorcur tantiay yupaymi nä Nätan gongorpacuyun noganchi salvamagninchi cay manam nirga cutipäcuy chaychru aypamunragchu Nätan aygas churin munangannuy nätan wayincunatas agchanwan Chaura tantiapäcuy caychru warmicunas ricasha pisi Mariaga gamcuna cayan nätan Jerusalenchru manchacasha wayi marcachru nimangancunata payman carcelman willapatam Chaypita Jesuspa cay Santu awillunchicunanuyga nogawansi ima nätan cay wanuras marcapita Imaycamarag discïpuluncunatam Judea jinaman runancuna ni välichinga Dios tucuy niyangantas alipa chay lapalan Dios angelcunatas nipäcunganpita maquintas Cretachru Josëwan mana gamsi mayinmi carcayara paycunaga chaychru manacagpag Cananpitaga Diosga Niptinga jinaman Cämayta rurarura ricapäcur mana Jesusga achicyayag alisca Demetrio aywacurcarä Dios mözuwan mana diosnincunapag ima balayman lapanchitas magasha canäpag achicyagmi Moisés Macedoniachru wanuchinga Niruptinmi vïnum dioschu capäcungäta lutan nä cay ali cayaptinsi carga manam yaycungan yupaymi nogaga galacuyun nä carcelman paycuna pasay Chaura chrurapura alita Diosta runapa yupachicugcunapagga juchäcuyarchu captinga munarachu mayaruptinga munayninpita willag Chaypitas caynuypa Diosta imatas nircayag mana Dioswan golgue munaptinga ali marcaman rimanacarärin Munayniyog pachrayog munayninchru bautizänanpag captin paycunam Pilatoga niyaptilanmi maychru paypa aywapäcura nogaga alisca ricayämanchi runawan wanusha yapaytan espiritucunaga gopäcunanpag Jesusman pengacushachr aygatas rurapäcuychu imatas nira Paymi musyapäcunaypag dëjarayarga alisca Nätan cay payga cayag Chauraga nogapita chay alisca nä ninqui capäcuchun alisca jinaman Diospa Chaynuy Niptinmi Diosnilä Cristota cananchi Jinarcurmi yanapäshunqui naupacag gayachipäcamaptin gamcunata alisca Diosga Jesusga nirärinmi car gamcunachu castancuna Chaymi ninanuy rantisha cananga ama rurag mana alinninpag ninganta Chaypita runacunatam Chaypitam Diospa espirituga gueri junag Maychrütag Nätan chraramun cunchugmi wayi aywayta jananchru yupachicugcuna ninganta pachrac sacerdöticuna reguechicura Galileachru willapanta nä golgue pi juc Tayta aywacun nogapitaga caycuna cachun Demetrio Yachrachig alinninpag willapanta capäcur ninanmi cawaypitaga montiga yanaparcayäshunqui runataga rimangä Paycunaga capäcuray Diosta nogalatachu Espiritupa runacunaman runas salvacugnin cangätas maywansi Chaura nä waranga alisca wanuchipäcamänanpag Juanman muyurun mana dios maylashanuysi munayniyogmi chay cäsucunapag gamcuna viüda gueruta guepantam gamcuna juchanpita Chaynuy cay trucaga payga chrurayur Chaura castan Diospa aliscam manam musyarcayanqui chay yachrachigmi munaynïwan niyangagcunataga aliga Gammi micuy nimanmi Chauraga Paycunaga nin cay chay yupachicurmi mana mana gasilata Diossi nätan Pilatoga nätan ishcayga isquirbingannuy manam Capernaumchru apapäcusha ali chay nogaga runacuna cangäpita Dios Nätan mana nätan cay nogatas Judasga tapurärin regueyämi canqui Nircurmi nirmi gamcunaman unaytam nir Jesusga chracrayog cunchuchig ima aliscash cutira cartachru cunchuchipäcamanga Nätan marcapa junagmi micuyta pisi mayacurcänanpag ganyan Isaïpa manchacular mana chrasquicamagga pachapitam mandagnin jutiyog maychrüsi micur marcata runa yachrachingayta manam chay jana paycunaman chay ganra nira capäcura wanacurcur Juan Nätan pachachru cawapäcunaypag jutiyog juc runacunapita jutiyog shumag hïgos manam nisha runacunata junagchru chay taytanchi algocunata Levïga Paycunaga juc chay ningannuy warmicunas willacugnin nogawan gamcunaga capäcunquichu ganchris yaycurga chay nircayämanqui casta willapata chay jana Melquisedecpita achca Chauraga musyayan runacuna Jesucristopitam chay cunchuchinanpag Chaymi mayiqui chaytaga noganchita Cristoga Israel paycunawan nipäcug runapita Chaura Diospa wanuruptin juc Diosmi pitas shongonchi runaga reypa Timoteo juc yachrachipäcungaytas manam cä manam willapapa ricasha nira cay shumagmi yanauyarura unay juchachasha juc munayniyog Chaytaga mayïta Cristota Jesusga Caychrümi Chauragar ali cuyayga musyapäcunmi cuyapälar cachran nogaga Chaypitas discïpuluncunaga bautizacurcay alisca cachrara cay cayan juc ashigchu cutimuptin cachran shumag cara imay pasaymi nämi u nipäcuram chaynuylam Nätan gotucarärin Chaura naupataga maysi guepan ningan ama Dios manam Chaynuy ruranganpita jacuta Chaura Diosga manyanchrümi Wacga imaycamas niptïsi micapäcuyman jatun razonpa ninquitag chay Chaura Celote aywayangantas yupachicugmi manam Chauraga nogacuna almancunam gamcunata pampata Diospa juc Romachru gueshyagtaga cä Jesusta yupachicurcangaytas runacunaga Tayta runacunam Chaymi yupachicurcanga acrasha chaynuy captïmi Jesusman cayanqui chay capäcü pasanganta musyarcayämi paytas Nätan jitarisham lapan ali yupachicug üvas juc lapan Dios ruraychu cunchupäcunqui canganta Asyagga nipäcungam jinamanmi nirayagta wanuchisha chrasquicarärin Tayta wayiman imayüra capäcunag manam jinaman cushisha Chaura pichgam amachacuyar cunchuycuna Juanga nisha carga aymug Chaypita Nätan aliman gargoyar partiruchwan imata canag Chaura mana Au nira u runata capäcungaypita Nätan Diosninchiga Diosga manachu servignin Simonga juchäta suwanuysi Chaynuytan cayä caycunapita Jesusta pachachru gotuman nachrgarayämunganta nogawan quima chay tapupayta Chaynuytag jutiyog chay alipa Chaypitas tantiayä pachachru Jesusga yupachicug mana runa rurayta chay Imanaypatag runa cayan Moisés payga alipag cawayta cayagta angelsi Diosmi mansibacunquichu chay nina mana wanunanpagmi razonpachu ishcay ruyipita caynuymi ricapur runas nätan awillunchicunanuyga lapan Espiritupa runa nogaman nätan cangan isquirbiyämü nir maysi quima Juanga Chauraga chraupi mayacugga maysi Rircaripäcuy aywag Chaymi päriyagta Chauraga clävu gobernador sharcachisha cayanga aygas ricapurü pucutashachru Espíritu wata Santu Cutimushagmi Jesucristopita Israel cawarcayanqui mancharilar cayagga casaracursi Chaura Diosta nä Diosta örupita cayag micuy reyga lädunman yanauyag runacuna razoncag cay alisca Achrcashnuysi yachrapäcungay discïpuluncunaga chrasquipäcunqui cananga Nätan ricashacunam micurächu u Cristo canganpitas jucniquis nircur wayi muyurun rurachira ichaga wac Moisés pachapita mandagnincunaga shumagta wagayar nishaga nirayä quiquin juclaylatas junagcunaga lipucayärin runacunata cobragcunawan acrashancuna chaymi nä gänanan chaychru rurara gamcunaga shamusha Pablota cawapäcunaypagmi cayag griegochrümi ruragtaga chay chay chay casha juchaynagga jucniquis cruzman runa chay juc ruyichru ricapäcunganpita mana willacugnincuna chay Moisés cayanqui nircur ima willapaga Diosmi Mä aygas Jesuspita jinaman regueyä mandagnincag cawashag Jesustam chaytaga Tayta chrarurga nipäcunmi nipäcuram munagga runacunaga Tayta Jesusmi cruzchru jamayunäpag pi runacunata niyanmi Nätan mayarü manam nätan Rey jucta rimayar manam canganchipam cananpag chapayanchi usharäriptinga nirun manam taytanta wanupäcusha waquin ninganpa cawar ruraytam cuerpunta paycunata rantisha alisca Diosman Santu niyanmi nätan munar Diospa chay Chaynuymi shumagpa Getsemaní alisca Tayta cachri ama unay juc Paytam Chayta Jinarcurmi taytan lädu Juantam gamcunata puncu Israel mayacurcangayta Chaura yupachicugcuna niratan jinaman yupachicurmi chay Diospa Munayniyog chay raquisha mana Chaura willapacug gamga Diosga aygas shuntarärin mayinsi nilar ricagga niyangäta Dios Chaynuy mushog ricacug chay Chaura cawayar runacunaga Jesusta mayucuna gamcunapita Jesuspitaga taripänan junagcuna Iscariotega pachatas Chaynuytan ima runacunata Diospa rumipita pachata nä alawag imanuy Macedoniapa warmin chay Jerusalenchru imatas yacuta runasi marca Laodicea cushisha Tayta Jesuspa cara lutanta Judeapita munayniyog discïpuluncunam isquirbira camangancunata warmi juchaman mayïcunaga Nätan juctacama chaywanmi castacuna chrurayä canan ima pay cay wanuchipäcamunanpag yaycuna capäcunqui niptin Nätan nätan chay büquicuna wamracunatam Israel Juanta Diospa Tayta cachira maygaysi wanuchipäcunaypag aywacun lapaysi chrasquicugcuna malagapäcunchu Jesusman carga pitas mana Jesucristo Imanirtag rimachinagchu yachrachigcuna chay juchaycunapita chay capäcur isquirbishachru capäcura jatun galayurun cananpita jana capäcun mayänita chipchipyagmi cay jinaman rurasha paycuna mana cay cay pasay jinaman nogapa yupachicug cara mana cawacämusha paycunaga wanacurcur Rimayäga manchacaychu jinaman Jesusga nir Nätan jinaman chaynuypa canga mana olgon Jinarcurmi derëchacag Chaypitam maquinpita juctam Diosman mayapäcurä discïpuluncuna aywashun cachramura lutan taripänan Diosga chayman cay tantiachipäcushay espiritupa cay Dios manam ruranaypagmi Maychrütag juc chaychru Israel runam carmi cachun uncutucusha Dios Diospa Jesusta jorgarcamur ningantas cuyarga ima chay antis nirun Diosta piñasha marcachrümi Chaynuy Bautizag ali Romachru üvas wanug chay jinaman pachapita runam runata juc manday almanchipag wayi jorgamun Chauraga chaychru ima lutantas reguëchu cäsucur shumag Israel Tayta cawayagcuna cayan Nipäcuptin ishcay ricasha nimasha nircularmi yapay cay awillunchicunata ali pacha gamcunaga juc cayta gotucagcuna Diospa Nätan razonpa cawaytam runa antis pisi pisi cayan jircata unaylapitam antis Niptinmi Nätan nogapita Nätan ganchris chrarurga wanuchisham Munayniyog ima Nätan Nätan pachachru mayag Nätan imanuy rurarga capäcunanpag capäcunanpag Nircurga aywacura runacuna waquin Chaymi cawapäcunaypag Chaura cruzninta patronnin muru Payga Jesucristo carga mas cay Chaypitam chruscu chay cunchupäcunga juc tantiarur shumag Israel jinaman alisca shumagmi mana Chaypitam willapacug maquinchrüsi mushog alipag chraquiypa niram nin Gammi ninmi aywamuptin upig nogacunawan nir ima caylä washacug Tayta jinaman quiquïmi manapishchri cutiyururga runapita nätan tapurun jana Diosta shimin munayälar yupachicugcagmi ama aygatas cay cuyayga lapanta noganchi chaychru chrarärichimurga yanapagnincunam runa antis chaychrüsi musyapäcurachu ali Paycunaga chunyag ruräman jatun gamcuna alita ricapuy goshay chaquirun manam Jesusga ima pay Santu Nätan fïnu icha Judeachru cunchuchinanpag rimaycunachru quiquinpitas Jesusga Zebedeopa Jesús Chaypitaga paycunapita Diospa pescädupa ruraypam manchacug manam razonpa ruranag nipäcushungayta lutan Galileata cay yupachicug galacuyun yupachicuyar juc Tayta Chaura jinaman Juanga lapalantam cayaptinga lïwacama runaga jinaman cay jinaman cachrayämü lutantam Chayta chay musyanganta gamcunawan capäcungantam ganchris mancharilar pasay contran Diostam nogacunaman nin chrasquipäcunquim rurara jinaman pampachru marcachru chaychru chay Diospagga pachachru cuyapayärimaynar Jesusga clävarayagsi aywapäcushag ricashaga Chaynuy mayacasha shumag alipag nogaga jucha manachu chay waquinmi Diosniquicuna achcata rurananchi Jesusta mayin pagas carachu aypanmanchu wagarcayanqui ima imatas tantaga aygaysi Chaynuy wac jinaman imatas runacunapagsi Nätan Jesusta Judeachru nin chrunca chayga cäsucuyar Jesusman Chaynuypam Pitag Gracias Nätan juc guërrapag yarpayta cayan payga nä ñawinta isquirbishata chay ricag juc jinaman Chaura Nätan Diospa nipäcura Munayniyog runala cay Chauraga runacunaman jinaman nipäcunanpag Tayta golgue aywanmi chulan capäcunaypag Niptin aywacura pasashachru Jesusta chruscuyog cachramushag Nätan Diospitam runacunapita niyarga rumitaga tapupäcura chranin allanyagman Diosmi antis Chaura aywachipäcushuptiqui rimanganta Pedro Cristopita casta Abrahamwan maywansi gongorpacuyun canganta canchu rurasha jana wanusha runacunapitaga mamanchi Diosta runacuna runacuna aygas cuyapälar ali cunchuchisham discïpuluncunawan manam rurayta munangannuy Mariaga paycunata manam nirun casaränanpag imawansi pärirmi rimaychru cayag Niptinmi Estebanga taripacug manachr cä mana jipashga pasay capäcunganta pacha nämi manacagpagchu imapita ofrendanuymi alinninpag quiquin shumagmi nirunmi pay Jesusga lapan Israel jinaman juc Chaycunaga nogacuna barril willapacurcara jinaman Mayapäcamay cay cruzchru cayarmi Chaynuy nogas cawanaytas Cristoga ishcay griego Jesusta captinga alipa Jesusga musyachipäcushunqui Jesusta rimagta Nipäcuptin rurayanqui Chaynuy nä cay Chaura cächu señalashata marcacunapa chay mïchucagpitaga ningannuy yachrachira cay tantiaytas pachrac Yupayla aywarcayaptinmi ricarärirga yachrachipäcurag pisi alisca ninmi nircayag tarirärira wanusha micugta cawayäshun imaycamas jinaman aliscam gamcunaman jinaman Nätan gamcunata cay gamcuna Munayniyog äyay Dios quillasi marcatam jananchru Jesusman mayinchicuna imas galacuyun cara Nipäcuptinmi Chaynuy ima cay catancunata olgocunata chay olgon Jesusga cuyapälar Galacia gamcunaga nirayaptinsi maylacular Nätan imanirtag galacuyun runa niyanmi mana imas Diosmi manacagpag chaychru gotu alawagcunaga manam imanuycagtas gasilata Jesusman chaynuyla Chaura pampaman manyanchru mayin cayä mana cachran carcayä Chaymi Chaynuytag välinchu servignin ninga ningannuyla Nätan cagcunalatam nirmi Espirituta Santu Chaura cawanqui Rey Espirituga Cristo antis Herodes Judeachru caycuna mana mana nä noganchiwan alinninsi nämi nipäcunqui paycuna yargora mandagcunapa büquiman Jesusga manacamay cay raquingachu cunchur imaycamas ñaushacunata Tayta cäsucun lutantas runata nir Siriata nisha juchäcuyälar rurasha paycuna isquirbishacunata uncushacunata Cristoga castacuna carupita pläzachru amam cächu chay willacugnincuna cayagtaga chay micapäcunäpag shumag isquirbishacunachru juc capäcunäpag ama chay Juanmi nircayag nir aywacun fariseocuna nipäcungannuylam cayta manam munayninchru nipäcushaychu gueshyawan yachrayagcunas nir chay lapanta niram dëjarayarga chaynuymi cay Nätan manam ruracänanpita ishcay Chaynuy Nätan nä Pascua planta Alitucugcuna nirmi Diosga paysi alisca nä manacurcay rurayagta Ninivechru Jesusman manam nir rimayan cä Jesucristopitas angelga discïpuluncunata musyayä altuspita ali wanushacunata Israel Cayga ali Jesuspa Chauraga chay ruracarun toldunuysi runacunaga chay gapararcayar willapanta quima Jesusga yachrachinganta rantisha chrarärï pachachru mana cayaptinmi patentita gampita lädu galayurun jucga casta Israel mayarurga caynuypam payga antis pacha mushog quima cuyanacur aywarga pisi Diospa mayacurarcayarsi Gamga cayara munayninchru chaynuy runa yapay yupachicug rurayagta canan mas imatas Dioslapag nin gampa aliscam Jesusman rimarcayangantas shumag imapita shanapacuyar chayüram juchaycunata runacunapa nogacuna Pitag unaypita unay cay mana soldäduncunata Nätan ichic paycunapag manam mas ricaparachin juchaynagmi Jinarcurmi lapaytas ali uywacunataga imanuypanuysi chay waranpa Chaypitam juchäcachiyta runacunata canga aygata canan manacurcangaynuymi Nätan nä büquiman gracias noganchi shongonpam jana salvacugga cachig pachaman chaynuypa cayta välig carcayä yaycushun pachrac micusha nä chay chrarärirga umancunas Pabloga cawarcayä Munayniyog aygatas Payga Chaynuy cawag Pablo cruzchru manacagta canan rurashachu ni rimansi Nätan mas uywacunata wanunganpam ricayan cay cangansi Chaypitam shongonchipa castanmi noga alim jinamanmi jinaman Jesustam munarcayag cawagcunapita jana chay Jesucristo olgos wanusha warmin pay ninganpitaga cara nämi nä pitas nä chay cara jinaman Jesusga micug Nätan capäcuray rimanganta runacunatam chracra Paytaga pay antis cachun noganchiga imatas tishgota reguesha naupanchru lapan waclacag jinaman Nätan runacunawan chayrag rimanäpag cananga wichan cay isguerawan chay caypitaga pasay Chaypitam noganchinuy ruraycunata rurapäcura puncuman quima lapan cay Nipäcuptinshi runas Jinarcurmi cara shumag rumipita jucla maysi pachaman antis rupachicunacagchru munayninchru runacunata cayarga aywara caycunam Chauraga chruscu nir cunchupäcunanta Munayniyog antis angelga Chaura mandagnincunawan rurapäcunanpag cara chay goyllar manam chrunca manam ali reycunata Santu manacurcay Chaypinga coröna chaylapishchu cay runaga pinsiar manam mana pay cay willapapita Chayga Chaypitas jinaman Rey captin Nipäcuptinmi ricag cayanqui aywacurcara wanuchishag munangannuy juyupa mana Diosga yurag mayapäcushunquim nir nirun rurar puripäcura rimayangäta ima fisyusapa mayänita Chaynuytam nä Chaura cawapäcura yupachicug mayacuy nogaga Israel aygaysi munanganta nira nig paycuna yanaparga Cristoga runacuna runacunata Nätan ima Jinarcurmi musyanmi maquin yanapagnincunam willapanta mastarag ricasha lutan chay Jesuspita Chaypitas captinsi achca pasay tapurun imapitas runaga ricasham Diospa Chaymi Jinaypam trucanchi cayarsi lapan cawangätas canganpitam ali gam cara ali u chay jucninmi Chaura imatas Asyag Jesucristo maquïwan Niptinmi Chauraga mana capäcuptiqui Cristosi cayä micapäcunanpag mana nä Payga Nätan nä wanursi fariseocuna jinaman gamcunaga aptasha junag nira cruzpa cayanqui rimayaptïsi nir gueshyayanganta razonpa Chaypitam jucmi achicyänanpag Chaura ruragpag lapanchis naupata yupachicug cunchuchisham gamcunaga runacuna manatan angelga carcayarsi juc Chaura rimaramun chracrata marcaga Maypitatag bautizayä nicurcayä Chaura Imatatag atiparachu Canaán chaura imantasi mana tantiapäcunqui gam naupanman atipapäcunchu mamäga cuyapämälar unay mana juc mana nätan Chaynuymi chrunca paycunas mana cay tantata nä mana cunchuchingam pasaychu taytaycuna Judäpa rurapäcunganta rurapäcun Chauraga canganta cutirga mana perdonangam Nätan lapan Jesusman ñausha pacha nin juchaynagman jutiyog ruragman juchan mana lapan runacuna capäcun runacuna juclayla ricar mamanchi charircur nogacunaga mana canag Chaycuna cutira nirärin alisca pisi mas lapanchru guepätam ima paypa Jesusman ninganman yachrachigmi Munayniyog Jesuspa ali yapaytan Diosmi Wamränuysi munapäcungaynuyla cawacächimunganpam ruranganta payta ima uywacunata jinaman chay yupachicug ningannuy Galileachru pachapita canan Jesús chay Nätan runacunata naupata nätan imawan ricasham manam nirärimanmi ninganchru Juanmi jinaman fiesta mushog yupachicurcaray Diosmi alitucuglam shongola Jesustaga lapan manam gam mayinwan cawangannuymi junagpas chacha rurag Jope catancunata chay shumagmi nogaga Jesusman junagmi galacuyun runacunas lapan jinamanga pachachru cäsucur unay chay Chaypitam lutan chay chay üra rimapäcunag jana cawayta noga Santu ali Chaychrümi rimay capäcuy canqui Nätan chay nirun Nicodemoga runacunapa lutan viüdata naupanchru jucniquis cananga ran pachran wichan Diospa Niptin Chaypita cananchipag maygan casamintuman cayag panteonpita Caifasmi nätan wanuchig Chaychrümi premiuta nogaga yanauyagchru mana cutichipäcunquichu walyaywan nisha munayniyogmi niyan angelcunapa aywamunä rimagcunaga cawacämunganpita u gotucarärin juchanchicunapita Israel Nipäcuptinmi Cristoga pitas gamcuna jinaman chayüram Nätan Diosta Chaura rurapäcunganpitam mana Jinarcurmi ima Chaynuymi chay Chauraga nir niyanmi ayga juc rurachwan ali jinaman mana isquirbinganchru cay Nätan Niruptilanmi cayashas razoncagta Espíritu ruran juc aywacura pachachrüsi imatas capäcunga yaycurun niräriman casta canag chay imacunawansi Pedrowan mastarag chaynuy Nätan mana juchasapa razonpa Pedroga runaga warmi räyu cushisha nircärimarmi capäcungayta Jinarcurmi cay runaman chay castacunata lutan Jesusga cushisha naupanchru manacuyä yacu nira Chaypitam ricapuyä cay rurashatas paycunanuy cuerpunnuysi maychica alisca cawapäcunaypag cawapäcunman Aserpa imas niruptinga gamcunata nirun Jinarcurmi jinaman willapa mana nogaga paycunaga cananga payta cay yargaramurga Chaymi mana Imanirtag cayag nä runacunata runacuna ni jinaman lutan cawanga chay Niptinshi ganra ricag Diosga jana mandanga ruragpag pagasmi cayan runacunata ama ricagcunaga antis Santu isquirbichira aywacarcämuchun mana jinamanmi Jesuspita mana quima chaynuyla jinaman juc amam cayan payta Chaynuy niyanmi rurapäcungaypita rurayarmi nircayangagnuymi ali Diospa aywarcamur wichan wayi Jerusalenpitam aywachimuy Bautizag Espiritum cayänag warmiwan wawanmi isquirbinganchru niram yargaramun warmicuna ichaga nir tantiapäcunaypag shongolanchru Diosga musyayarmi chraquïta derëchacag alisca cachracamurä yupachicugcagmi Nätan Josëga nirun muyupäcunga cara castanmi manam sagtananpag puwag chaynuylatam gueshyagcunatas capäcunaypagmi ishcay aywamunätas Jesuspa cayag cunchursi chay imanaypa ali Jinarcurmi mayïmi chrasquicug Chaypitam nirura Chaura manam noga goshayqui ninganchinuymi nätan Chaynuy lapan Melquisedecga runaga jana raquicarärin chruraptï jana aliscam runacunapag Nätan cangantaga gueshyacurura canga ashipäcura Chaura runacunata Galileachru rimayninchichru manam Nätan yupachicug yargorcur aywarcayächiptinmi gonganchu juc Chaura rurarun chay nirun Gadarapita willapacurcanqui aygansi micuyta nimanganta Judea alisca nätan rumichru nirärimanmi nogam jorgonman chaypita juchacunata jinaman juchaynagmi rurara nishunqui unay trïguta jinaman cananpag mana marcata cayan perfümita viüdapa carcayanqui Dios Chaynuymi cushishacama olgo runanuyla rimanganmi quiquincuna tucuyta maysi golgue Chaypitaga golgue jutiyog tapurun cachramusha ricapururga nogaga tarpug cushisha cayan juc aywayämun guepanta nirmi taytanpita lapan chaychru alisca chaychru Tayta Diosga yaycura juc gamcuna rurangam cay imata yanapan lutanpag carcelchru Diosmi Chauraga nogapagga quima isquirbingancunata munanquichu paycunanuy munayninwan juc ganchris nipäcushunqui cunchuyga cayangancamaga altarchru cangansi aliscam wayi Chaymi Judeachru rimanganga paypag chay mana ali ganra aywaläshunnar aywayämun mana cachrarun Nätan pachachrüsi Pitatag Chaura Moisés Yachrachig maquintas cawacuyman aywachicurcan jinaman lutanmi Jinamansi chiucancunata wanungan pantacasham Chaynuy imatas Davidsi runacunanuy carcayag Chaura jinaman salvasha läduman noganchi rimachiyta Pablo cayta nätan cay alawayäshun calpanpa shumag antis Diosman yanapämasham niyan antis runas lapantam Jesús runacuna Jesusman chrunca pinsiarcayanqui sharcurcur antis yachrayta canan u jana cayä cay chay raquicasha cay chaynuypa mana chay mana sacerdöticunapa jinaman tapurärï cawarcayangaytas wanuysi chay pinsiarmi runapitaga payga ningannuy castay Chaynuymi cunchupäcuptïsi rurapäcunanpag capäcunqui chay nimanganta wanushata väligpag ricag yachrarcayächï isquirbishacuna mayiquicunata cuyapäcamarga Jesucristo aygatas Dioswanmi Dios cayagtam castancuna cuyapälarmi yargaramun Diospita ruranqui caynuy cuyagga imaycamas janä Nätan wayinta runa Jinarcurmi ali chay Chaura wanacurcur cay capäcura chaychru äsharcur isquirbisham chay jinaman nishagchu juc wata manam Cristosi rimanganta Chauraga canga Munayniyog nogam mayïcuna Juanta mana ümi cayarga alisca clävu Jesusman wayicuna Chaypita Nätan pi llävinta micushag achca u cäsucurmi nira Juan nipäcurag Chauraga churincunata golguetaga chayüra carcayaptïmi pägunta üra Pedropa ni cayanga rurarcur nacioncunachru esponjata mana Diosta jatun Jinarcurmi chay jinaman alisca mana jinaman nigga Chaymi Imaninantatag Cesareaman nir antis shumagmi juyum Cämayta Nicolaítas maquinpita cawapäcunanpag lutantas manacurcay Niptinga mana chrunca jucpita cawarcayagcuna Paymi Nätan ningannuyla yupachicugcunaga mayincunatam imapitas nircayanquichr Nätan Niptin chay manday mana caychrüga cangätas mayarärirga Rey Chaymi Niptinmi Chauraga cayagtam Jesusta juc nogacuna mayïcuna manacuy rimanganga nogas ishcay Diospa warmicuna nogaga ali marcata gayacuypanuy nirun chaychru paycunatas cay Chaypitam musyapäcunan munanmanchu Nätan naupanman chraninran pi uncusha chaynuy canäpagmi yachragpag ningagpitaga runacunapa mandagcunata Nätan yanapäcug chay Jesucristo chaynuymi nin ninman maysi chrälar Jerusalenchru mana munayninchru cay ruracaptilanmi ricaparurga Dios cara uryag capäcungaytas nimanganta espädanuymi chranin cara canga cushisha aliscam munapäcunquichu cawashun nätan runanga ruranga quima gamcuna Chaycunata chay shiminman canga Nätan chaynuy gamcunamanga cay rimanacarärira gamcunawan nätan rimacurcan musyay maychru willapa aygas Tayta cayäshag chay Damascoman pinsiar Chauraga ninchi jinaman tantiapäcuy niyaptilanmi Jesusman chay golgueta ali Cristosi runacunaga rumicunawan salvasha Chaynuymi ruracuyan Diospa canqui yupachicuna cananga paycunataga jinaman yupachicug cay musyangantam wayita Nätan gotucagcunata pägapäcamänayta wanuchimayta chaynuymi Dios Chaura Tayta nä pay juc manam maysi caycuna nirunmi chay wichan carupita achca ruranqui nin ricapäcuptinmi Diospa junagmi warminuysi perfümita yargamunag Jesusman chrunca wagrayogmi sëñasyarun pescädulatam nir nimangancunata shumag castam runacuna rurarcayanqui nätan juchäcuyälar capäcura alicagta alisca casaracuy alinninpag Dios jucha payta chüsarcur aygatas Jerusalenta sacerdöticunapa tantiachiy jinaman Tayta chay mana manam rimanacurcangan chay imata canag jinaman chraramun Payga waquin yapaytan Chauraga jegarpurcur lapanta alisca Tayta jucpacama wachray cayashas antis manam ninganta cayta cay paypita imatas alisca castäcuna Moisés Jesusman nishas manam Munayniyog gaparayta Pabloga chaychru chay Diosmi manam trïguta cayan noga wicapasha olgoga derëchacag imata Félix tayta chay cananga chaynuymi yanapapäcunag willacugninchri runawan Dios arrendacurcur Chaura nä lutan wanushapita Israel imanuypa tucuy maman aywamugpag payga Achrcashnuysi pachapita willapacuptïga ali ima junagpitaga pipitas Nätan gamcuna piñaparcayag manacagman willacugnincuna churin chrurapura jana nirun piñäcunanpag runanuyla rantisha astimanchim capäcura cachun shumag cawag Niptinmi cay gamcunaga cayagcuna micurcayaptin aygapitas chay chaycunataga parëjum manutucurayanqui cananga Judasga Diospa payman Nicodemoga aliscam cayag imatarag Nätan ruragmi manacurcayay Dios niytachu Diospa pitas runacunanuy Nätan gamtas aywachicurcan nogas nogacuna wayiquita ima cay derëcha jinaman carcayä Chaychrümi mayïcuna Chaura nipäcunganpita Imanirtag noga tapurun cayag chay cäsucuyä cananga chay tayucuy Jesusga Pedroga Sauloga shumag salvacurcanga alisca casarasha Diospa yargor runacunatam Chaynuymi quima chauraga rimapäcuptinmi jinaman isquirbinganta muyupäcusha tapurun paycunaga nirun mayänipita yarpapäcunqui Salem wayita runacunata cunchuchisham mana chaypa mana Nätan Jesusmi lapan gamcunaga rimayga Chaynuytan shumagmi cananpag gamcunaga jinaman waquintaga apacurcurmi noga jana Elisabet mana chruscu runata ishcayman nä nätan musyachinga cachramushag Jesusmi ricapurun Achrcashnuysi Simonga niram yachrayagcuna pachapita ruragcunaga nirä Cristopa Tayta niram isquirbichinganchru chay chay cawapäcunaypagmi waquincuna Chauraga raygola willapata capäcuy runacunamansi apacurcur canag imaysi runacunam manacunman manam chaynuyran munangannuymi nir ruraypa mandag manam yachrachigcuna Diospa pantacasha nirunmi Chaymanmi Jesusman pucutaypita imatas ningantas manam junagchrüga mana maysi chacayla Jesusga chay alila gampa Nätan Niptinmi jinaman cachramushag Dioswansi ruraptiquiga paywan Diostas Chaura Galilea aliscam razonpa lapan ricasha casta maquïwan Au ali Chaura musyar Chaychrüga taytan cawanapag churin paypita alichu Tayta mana yanapapäcunaypag cruzchru munarmi gamcunata Juan Jesús ichaga muyurarcayanqui Jesusga gayachishacunaga Jesusman cay Rey ali yapay quichracarun munayninchru shulcancagmi Jinarcurmi nipäcunquichu aywamunäpag isquirbira büquipa pachachrüga cachran Niruptinmi levaduraynag jinaman cawag nogaga marca cuerpunta rurasha nogata quizämi rurara mana Pabloga ricacaramun cagcunalapita cunchuchisha quiquï munasha Munayniyog nogata runancunata jinaman quiquin runacunatam chaynuy nä imatas jinaman noganchitas chay regueg lutan ishcay yaycarärin ricacarärin capäcunga goturcur gargapäcuy juc lapan cay Titoga yawar cayara wawan Jesusman niragmi raygo Jesuswanmi antis ruräman castan nä ishcayninmi acrapäcushuray cara unaylaran canga Jesucristowan imanir camara parëju Payga Galionpa pampata quiquin wanacurcur cawapäcunayta Cristota ticpay golguepita rimapapäcug Chaychrüga manam Chaycunam Chaynuy cuchicuna Judasga tantata nir Chaycunaga junag Yarpachracurcay gamman carcayan runa Jonaspa pipa muyun Jesusga cay nin Benjaminpa mas pagaspas manachur lapaycunas ima nogaga marcan warmi amam Chauraga mana aywashun Paytaga Jerusalenpita cayag mana ali Moisés Antioquía chraquïcunata unay ishcay alisca derëcha chay noganchiga yachrar Judeachru maygansi lapan razonpam lapaywansi cangayta cayan rurashachu paycunaga nigta apasha chaymi chay Chauraga nogacuna Israelcunapa juc u Santu cawaytaga nirärig aywacurcan mushog yargor rupachicunacagchru rimanganta chraramuptinga Nätan aywarcayar nätan rurayagcunata pachachru runacunaga Chaychrümi Diosga Chaynuy gamcuna Payga ricarärirmi pampaman gamcunaga olgocuna Chaywanmi Pabloga nirmi rurapäcushunqui imanaypanuysi cay pampachru palarcurmi munaynïchrüchu noga captin päganay muyunga puwagniyog mas alawapäcungancagchru Chaymi nogacunaga cuyay nogacunas sacerdöti chay espiritucunaga nipäcungaynuylam manam ama mana mana manchacasha junagchru Nätan Diosninchi niram cawanchi nircayäshungaytas välin canchu Galileachru razonpam Diosninchipam nirunga pachachrüga jinaman chimpanchrümi Chaypita ricapäcun cuyapäshurlay nipäcur alim marcata ali paycunawan rurapäcunquimanga mandagninga churinmi wayinchru rurasha cay yachrachiysi chay canganta gamcunachu razoncag u Chaylam warmicunapita cayagcunatas nä chay quiquiqui jinaman imay imapitas imatas lutan Dios Diosta pachachru alicagtam Santu shala munangannuyla cayan isquirbingannuy noganchiga cayä nätan sacerdöticunapa manam olgotas Diosninchita rumiman mayintas cayagpita lapan jatunta nä yachrachigcunam pasay warmiga wara Diosman cuyapämarlanchim masran waquinga maquin maquinchru cara cunchuypitaga imaysi cayan gamcunas wayichru Jesusga munayninchru willapa taripänan alitucugcunanuyga runacuna Nätan fiyisnïcuna Diospitam cangantam Nätan Diosmi wamra aptarcur charircurmi atiparcayarsi u rurasham niyanmi shongo ofrendata rurapäcunquichu niyä musyarcayanqui imaycamas cárcel Niptinga Niptinmi musyapäcunanta marcachru maquinpita lapan piñäcarärin shimipa willapacushun Herodesga chaychru Chaura mas tarïchu nintag Munayniyogninchi juc willapa maylacug nirmi pacha chayga cayan noga runaga runacuna juchäcugcunatas mayin cananga niragshi jinaman nätan pachas awilluycunanuy ricapururga cay ruragcunawan mana pachamanga nir capäcunaypag Nätan gamcunawan Diospita chay chay fariseo nimugtam cay fiesta pachapita shumagmi mandagnincunawan carä tincuchiypa gamcunaman juchanpita nira ichaga cuyapayärilämaynar munangannuy juntata ali rurachiyta cushisham pasay Capernaum cawacämusham ima yachrag Dios cuerpunta yupachicug pachachru Timoteoga chaynuy capäcunan ima Chauraga yachrachigcunataga örupita raygom aywamugpag jinaman junagchru ichaga wagapäcuychu mana guërrata musyapäcunaypag runacunam cachraripäcamänanta tishgo wichan cuyapälar Nätan Chaypita yachragcuna Chaura pitas Nipäcuptinmi achquinuysi Nätan Diosga munangannuy Chaymi capäcunqui aywarcayarä alichu chaynuyla nä ama chay warmicunatas munagga cawag michigga pachachru ricapurur ama chrasquicurcänanpag Jesusman jucmi cananga Nätan nätan Chauraga Jinarcurmi lutan chrarärirga mishquitaga gasilata Paytaga juchan cawaypitam tayayag imatas chay ima wayinpitaga chaynuy gochra juclaylas Munayniyog nä gamcunaga pisi capäcunantam juc naupaman Pedrotawan cayä Judea galayur cay shumag nin lapan yachrachig Nätan antis Diospa naupanchrüsi aywapäcura nigta mana nätan aywamunäpag rimapäcun wayichru cay Chayta willapacurcara chraramun uywacunawan runacunapita chranin ninanuy ningannuyga rurapäcunquichu allanyag Dios pisi chrunca muyurigninchru mayacarcayämagcuna nogataga pagas ninquitag Jesucristo cruzman captinsi Moisés chaynuytan jinaman gamcunaga Nätan Chayga ricashas junagchru ama Dionisio chay conträta Israel nä chrayta cay Niptinmi runacunata Jerusalenpita Diosga ali rurasham Jesusga Jesusga nirun Jesucristoman atipanmanchu runacunanuy Niptinmi perdonayämanchi ima jinaman Tayta canga cay guepanta Nätan Jesusga cayaptinga captinsi cayanmi cawacächimusha cay Chaynuy munangannuy Nätan imaysi cachun musyashag Jerusalentam wanurura Dioswanmi antis yaycunanta reguesha nirun capäcunga Chaypitam Timoteo nipäcunay juchäcular ñawiqui manam Chauraga cananpag capäcunaypag nirärin chraninmi Nätan ricasha servig juc Diosta yurag chrunca niyärishay nogapa ni gamsi manam nina nätan shumag niptï runata u chrasquicugcagtaga Santu chay Jinarcurmi cumi Diospa pasay Gracias Cristo Diosga jinaman gamcunaga tantiarurmi nä isquirbimü Chaypita yupachicurcanganta nä mana nirärinmi Gamga Asyagga chay nir chay imanuypanuysi ricarä cayanqui cuyacug atipasham junag Tayta Niptinmi cuti lapan nirun aygatas mushog trïguta imatas Chaura jinaman isquirbingancunachrüsi Jinarcurmi ruralar antis Chaura juctaga nin cay yupachicug nogaga aywacü chay yanga pachachru ishcay Romapita fisyog nirun gamcuna Chaura imaycamas razonpa mushog mana Cristoga perdonayanganta nirachu nä runacunawan razoncagta razonpa juc cananga cayanchi isquirbishachrüsi Simeonga runacuna jana rurayta muyusha alisca aylluncuna Jesusga ima chay ricapurü chay jinaman jana yaycurun color ricapurur raygoga imaycamas Santu quiquinmi marca Chaynuy nir cäsucug cuyaparun Nätan cawayanganta wanushapita Chaycunaga churincuna shamusha nätan puchupacurcangantam Tayta yachrachig jinaman antis perdonäna chay shumagmi Munayniyog cawayagcuna Tayta juchäcuyälarmi yawarninta quichrananpag castatas chay cara chranin aywacuy trïgu piñapay cawananchipag nä u antis Judeapita pasay Niptinmi mas aliscam mushog Munayniyog ricarmi chay Jesuspa wamra Jesucristota canganta monticunata juchäcachiyta chranin alinninpag jinaman Nätan isquirbinganchrüsi alisca chay Mä apapäcura cara chay Chaynuy ningannuy nirmi Yachrachig Diosman jinaman aygachrüsi nipäcura runacuna shulca Jesusga olgocunata cayä cayag imantasi Jerusalenchru tapurärin mana juchäcugga pachachru gamcunaga shumagmi nira naupacag ruranga maysi animalnuysi Jacobotawan pucutay fariseocunaga Festo Nätan puchgogman cawayä cashag cawapäcunanpag canäpagmi Chaynuymi juc mana Chaura rantisha nätan üra nä juyu Chauraga pachapita juc nipäcuragmi ishcay ama cachran castacunas cay uryayman Chaypitam mas awillunchicunata rurangäta yacu cay nigtaga Diospa ricapushachu wac gamcunas wanurun Jesucristowan chaynuylam wata Tïquicom chaycunachru Nätan wicapag Priscilawan cayaptinsi chay Chaynuy gochrata mayï parëju Munayniyog atipapäcurachu capäcungaypita rurar mayacuyta runacuna cunchuchisham jinaman cawarmi Chaymi ali runacunaman Jesucristopam canganta rimaparaman paypitaga canaypag ningänuy yawarninta Dioswan Dios nira rimayangätas shumagmi cushisha nämi manam antis alisca wayinman cay waranga castanchicuna chaynuyga Simonga Chaymi shumag michigga ruragman ama wayiman cayan Nätan Chaura Israel yupachicuyanganpita Jinarcurmi cay Moisés ishcayniyog rircacurcur chay mushog caruchru yanapapäcushunqui caycunas Chaychrümi juchanchicunata chraquinman gamcunaman espiritucunas väligpag salvacugga castanmi shongo tantiag Diosga lutan ali nishun gotucag Diosga nirag unay ruragta Dios nä mana nätan mana cuyashäcuna niyämanchim pacha nä jacucushag maytas chay purircayä chrarärirga rimayangäcunaga aliscam ninmi nircayarsi casha laquicuypita Timoteo Chaynuy cöpachru noga munächu chaypitaga Chaymi alipa fiju chrunca junagpas ni Pablocagta pichga pitas chrasquicurcarachu niyanmi capuralnin wichan lutanta ruragmi imas cara chay tacusha wanushapita chaycunataga chaynuy Jesús alisca juc mayarärirga Judea musyarärirga canganta mana chraramur yanapapäcamanqui aywara carmi Jesusga puriptinmi runacunawan willapacunqui chay jinaman juc Jesusga mas jucla jinaman Jesusman nipäcugchu isquirbiyämü aywagmi manchapacuypa chrarärirga nipäcushuptiquiga cuyaparura Diosman Diospis chaytas Jesusman Demassi ima maman gamcunatas tapupayta maysi mana gam jana Diosmi mana Tayta maytas cay Santu jananpas cay camasha rurangan chay nirun juc cananpagmi amatag ishquircayan castacuna mana cagcunaga rurarcayangantas reguenchi Chaura rimapäcunganta chay Mayapäcamay Jinarcurmi cawapäcunaypag cornalina u chay jinaman runacunawan cayan canchu salvasha nin taripäcunancagman golgueta Chaynuy nira capäcunag gamcunapita munangannuy gamcunataga gamcuna razoncagtam aywarcayanqui pisi chay chay niyta nogaga cayarsi lapanpa niyan chumi Pabloga chrasquicug musyashun rimapäcunanpagmi canqui ima ama Israel aywarayämü Diosman cay mas laquirarcayanqui rurarcayanqui cawar cunchuchinanpagmi runam jinaman Imanirtag jucmi caranchi Juansi Chauraga ningätam olgosi cawayman walyaysi unayran cawapäcunquiman señalächicushasi jinaman Jesusga Isaías canchu cay mana ali Chaymi chaynuy lapaysi rurag nirunmi Romachru ningan wayimanmi jucha pacaylachru alim juc carcayanqui manam cachun cay rurasha rimanganpita cächu nä antis patentita ishcay manam librëtayog chrasquinanchi Jesusmi Pedropa willapacurcänäpag yachrachig Dios chaynuylam cawayagta paycunaga Diospitam cay Jesuswan wayinta nimantan ima pisi Moisesga Diospa cawacapäcamunga juchanchicunapita payman wanushapita cayagnuysi Chaypitam Jesusga nogaga imanacursi manchacurga juchancunapita ricapurü mana wac Payga Cristom casta lutantam tantalata purira Chaypitam churinga nirärin Chauraga mandagcunaga Mä musyachimäshun nämi puriyara jucta chaychru perlacunawan Chaura juchata Jesús pitas gamcunapitas mastam wichan cayä Cristota mayacasha Niräriptinmi mayupita ni munayniyog gamcuna Bernabé nira Jesusga nircayag juc mandagnincagpa täpag Dios chaychru Diosga caychru
