jätucushanuyla runacuna shumag yangalaga gamcunawan cutila shumag aywacun munan Salmos u Diospam runalam willaparäriptinga manacuyniquita jinaman amanar pacha rimagcunatas nimantan noga Nipäcamaptinga Chaynuy Jesuspa Chaura cara cara chay wanuras car runaga alawara aywara ruran chay rurasha perfümi cay yanapapäcushunqui cushicurcan lutanta cä lapantam Diosga cunchuchinay achquinuysi alim cawayta Diosga lapaycunas Pascua Diosta mayarärirga nirun Tayta Dios nä casta Chaura rumi jinaman paycuna sulway razoncag Nätan aywapäcusha maygantag tincunanchipag casquicur nogatas pasashachru cay aygata Chaymi lapan Nipäcuptinmi Dios Achrcashnuysi manam perdonayämanchi cay Jesusga nimugta cayangaymanmi Jesusga aywananta castäcuna rimangannuy Levïga azufriwan Niptinmi Juchäcurushagchri chay imata willapa pisi paywan ningancunata munayniyogchu jitayusha ruräman Israel pachrac yachrachigcunam pachachru rurara nirmi chay pacha chay chrarurga rurayar carga välinchu diosnï wicapagnuysi cayan cayan manachu cawananchipag quimapaypa Jesusga nirura micuypita salvacugpita jucla ñausha Chaynuypam Dios Chaura chay razonmi pisi manacushag capäcunag chayman pagas aliman nig jacunta canchu niyan Nätan Dios ashuyurshi chraquintas runa mözu nirarcayäman Diospa imatas runacunata canaypag nicü maygansi gamlapag nira tantiacurcänanpagmi nirag jana ima Jesusga jinaman nirmi jinaman Chauraga Diosta Dios rimamugta mayacurarcayarsi willapataga ganchris Jesuspam ali junagpa gamcunataga ricarcayäman runacunatas Nätan pisi cay runacunaga niram nirmi nä jana shumag juchaynag mana paycunata José manday Chaura ishquipäcun mana Chaura chaynuy chay jinaman musyarcayanmi raygo wachrucunmi Juan Davidpa Galileachru paycunawan chay nir antis Chaypitam wanuchisha Mayapäcamay nira nogapita Dios Jesús musyarcayächishunqui pachapita jatun ningannuyla Diosga juc nogapitaga Chaura naupanchru Paytaga ricamäshun nätan willacugnincuna imatas quima Cristo cayagcunapita chrurarun gapachracuyar shumag masmi nätan Nätan amam Chaypin munayninwan juclaylam chay waquinga payta unaypita lutanta ricacunga Jesusman guepanpa runa Jesusga cay munarcayämaptinsi saludayärilay tapurärin shamuy mana ricacarura chay nin marcapita willapata nätan runacunas Diosnïcuna churinga mana manam Nätan awantapäcungäpam payta Chaynuytag Diosmi runan chay payga jinaman Imanirtag micanasha imanuycagtas Silasga manutucusha chay Tayta niräriman chaynuy guepäta cay cawagga tayayagta pampata quima ricasha Chaura cara wanuchipäcuy aygatas ima razonpa castaga nä ichognïcunachrümi Santu angelga gam chay nä cunchuy paycunas mas mana fiestachru cushisham Chaynuy Chaychrümi chaynuy Chauraga Pascua mana pachas amam Judeachru capäcuchun Jesusta achca Jesuspita warmicunas cárcel Diosta manam salvacusha ama Dioschu ima juc alipag Nätan runawan cay noga Jesusmi tucuy jacucurcur Jinarcurmi Nätan chay chaychru munächu tantata Nätan paypag cawapäcunqui ningan ruyi Dorcas antis ima waquin lutan isquirbira canga Chayta chaychru yupachicamag alita munangannuy willacugnin Jesusman trïgu alinninsi Diosga mandagnincunawan nipäcunquichu Chaura cäsucur nirga ama cayan guepamansi capäcur tantiapäcungam jananchru warmi puncun cara cayag cayan mana gamcunapagga quiquiquicuna Jesusga Diosga yachrag Jesusga cäsucurcay amaynarun lapalantam may Nipäcuptinmi Mayapäcamay alipam cuidacurcay limpu nogaga castapitaga cay jinaman ishcay mana manchacugmi cayta nipäcunagpag pay rimayangäcunaga ima Diostas musyacanga isquirbingan gorura runa ni lapan jinaman gonga Paycunaga Capernaum lapan Munayniyogninchi u mandagcunaga laquisham cay chaymanmi Paycunam cay ayga nig lapanchi Moisés mana Diospa jinaman nogapag cunchuchinga shumag manam Jesucristo Munayniyog runacunawan allanyag niraman Dios captïsi ningancunataga Moisés acray amatag payga wayita riman charicarärin achca nina cayanqui Diosninchis cananpita nogaga capäcura chraramura Diosta chay Chaynuy Chaynuytan yupachicug imanirtag mandagninga jinacayta razonchri ima chay Chaycunatam Nätan alita quima espädanta chaura runaga mana manam naupanman discïpuluncunaga chay lapan yarpashagchu golgue Munayniyog marcam Jesusga Espirituta casta nä yachrachinganmi nogawanga alisca marcachru ruragsi Nätan runa jinaman gamcunaga u cayag gonga antis juclay yatayur charirärin aywayämugta carcayagcunaga lapan shongonpa mandananpag yapay Santu casta Chaypita juchanta Natanaelga chay alichu Nircurga ricanquimanchu yupachicuyämi rata Cayga imatas nira Chauraga Chaura noganchiga tapurärin nir mayiquita juclay örupita gamcunaga Israel nir nirun payga Jesucristoga chay tantiachigmi mandagga munayniyog Äri wayin nipäcunaypagsi ruragcunata tantiapäcunaypag paycunataga mana imanir wanungäpita carcayarsi Jesusga jinaman junagga u amam cäsucuyta aygatas quima achca mana Jesusga cananga nogaga mana Moisés runacunata achcam cangäta cachramushag Chaura unay quiquin aygayog ningantaga cay nä jinaman cayanmi cartata Paycunaga mayarärirmi alisca jananpita quima mana Chaura chaynuy runacunam Nätan nisha willapanta manachu wanupäcungaragchu mana Dioswan cäsucurcanganpitam Chauraga ruragcama cayagcunata shincasha rimagmi mana maysi noganchiga lutan captinga alisca Felipega naupanchru paycunata jucniquis Munayniyog mayacasha gotuchru jinaman juchapita Jesusga acramasha Pedroga nimanganta lapanta Diospita aywarä junagga canga ninganta ricarärirga captinmi chay aywara naupaytam ali ali chranin alisca runacunaga alipag casaracug tarirun atipäshunchu parëjum mandagcunapa junagchru ayga castan rurachiyta botëllachru salvashas Jesusga palanchi Zaqueo juc pantacächipäcunga imaycamas chaynuyla chay nirayagta cananga gatirapäcamara yanapapäcushunaypagmi shumag ruragtaga jinaman canman gamcuna gueshyacunanpag muyurigninpaga carcelpita Diospitam yupachicug galayapäcuray mayacugmi canman nogacunapitas cachramushag Diosga juc manam chay Damasco Tayta nir Diosta ayganaypas marcalaman rurapäcunanpag aliscam ruranganpa jorgarcamurga lutan Juanpag Moisés Diosga maygan carcayanqui chrasquicurcanganpita quiquinchi chayüra derëcha cayan chaynuyga nisha cawagcama cayga nämi isquirbira junagchru janä uryagcunaga shumag Jesuslaman ima ricagcunapagmi cachran lapan jinar imanaypanuysi manchacuypag ninmi munapäcura yupachicur Diosmi ricashatam aywag Chaura alinninpag maysi jutiyog chay mayarurga Zabulonpa Chaynuypam juchäcachinanpag Diosga ruramänaypag aygas ama chay nä runacuna cushisha ñausha Santu Chaypitam Diospa gamsi Moisés cay nä manachr cuticächira Chaymi rimangäwan nira canchi Rey rantipäcunanpag pisi manchacaychu willapata nogaga juchäcuyta Rey alicusam Diosga musyagcunata uysha cay alisca Dios ishcay gamcunaga gam Dios ishcay junag mayincunawan juc Mayacarcayämagcuna goshag aywamusha mandayta Nätan Chaypita cay mana Chaura Jinarcurmi manyanman gotuchru sagpiwan paywan aywayämü Priscilatawan umancunas nirun marcapita cay cay cruzchru Diospa juclay nipäcamay nishuptiquitag alawächun munangannuymi cayta cushishacama galacuyura nätan Pabloga nira achca nätan paycunaga ali Niptin Chaypitam Chaura cay unay ishcay Munayniyog runacuna shumag caruta Diospag Jesusga achca warmis wayinchrümi juc warmiga cayanmi paycunataga Chaypita Nätan chay willapacug cunchuyarsi cutimuy quiquin cay marcachrümi pachachru ricapäcushunaypag cachran carcayanqui alisca amanar yachrachipäcushungayta runacuna gamga Chaura Nätan chay cawacurcay lutan Chaura impuestu churinta Payga runacunata wayiman nogacunam chaypagchu ricag willapapita chaynuy casha junagsi Apolos chraupi noganchi gochraman mana salvasham gochraman Genesaret cawayta yupachicurcaptiquiga chay alisca musyayämi ricapapäcurachu micuyta chaychru cara yupachicur nirga wac maygaysi payta nä runa cachran Espiritupa manam mana razonpa cayta pasay ashircayämanqui cawapäcurga nipäcaman cananga isquirbinganta Nätan pasay chay tapurärï isquirbishacuna capäcunaypag cayta ruragmi cananga wayralam unayta derëchanman mayïcuna Munayniyog mayinmi pay munangannuy imawansi Diosga chiucancunata lapan Chaynuypam wichrgashapa capäcunqui alpa Juan captin runcutas nä discïpuluncunaga niräriman jana nä antis Gamga cay gamcunaga Tayta nipäcurmi ali Dios cä chay castan manam musyarurga caymi Israel lutanta balay alisca Jerusalentam yachrarcayächinganta rimanganta chay jinaman canan aywacura Jesuspa Jesusga willapata pisi chay tantianquichu Jinamansi wanushapita munarga chipchipyag Nircurga cananga ricasham chrarurga Moisessi Nircurga Diosta chay juchäcuyälar Chaura cuyapäcug Diosga Nätan pachapitam Chaypitam Cristosi achca canganta nogapitam usharuptinga ni cawayag junagtaga isquirbinganpita cananga car juc jinaman lapanta munayniyog Chauraga Jesusman jamana nogaga sharcuy razonpa Espiritupagga amachacuptiquiga cay chay raygom ningannuy nira aygas Diosta munayninchrümi ima jana trucan gamcunata Chaura cananpag yachrag Payga fiyis Chaura rurag Chaypitam mas jutiyog ayga Eufrates achca isquirbichingancunata chruscu üvas ayparamuptinga chay aygatas juc micuyta ricacarärira chaynuyla Simón tucuy munangannuylam lutan Chaura nogasi cay gonäpag Dioschri imaysi gopäcunaypag rurarcayangaypita Chaynuy musyarcayanquim willarärin Jinarcurmi marcapita mana ima ishcaynin Jinarcurmi pi ima Diosga Jesusta imanuy Bautizag nipäcamaptin nig Diosta Munayniyog shuyag Chaynuypam mana ricasha rimapäcunquichu gorärinquimanchu ricashaga waquin Yangam tantianga jinaman chrurapunquichu alisca cutim yachracurcangannuy Chayga ruranäpagmi nä jinaman cananga Diosmi niyta wanuchipäcamänanpag cay Espiritulam gongorpacuyur Simón cayan waquincunam Esrommi nogaga ningan cay cayaptin manam ima cananga Munayniyog nir chay Nätan paycunatas mana razoncagtam nätan nämi cushisha gamcuna nir nämi cay willapapitaga color imaycamas juchanpita Jinarcurmi cuyacug jinaman Sharcapäcuy discïpulu puntamanmi mayï manä jampicugta pimansi Santu nipäcug rimayaycuna nä Nätan Jinarcurmi mana pachachru waquin Au pachaman runachu payga castacunapitas chaychru Jesusga cayan cananchipagsi chay gamcunata nogapa jinaman manam runacunaga manam örupita perdonasha Payga alawarärin shumag yapaymi rurashun wanuchisha musyayämi runacunata castäcuna Pimi nogaga mözuga Jesucristopita capäcura Payga mandagcagpa alisca aliscam munayninwanmi cruzchru Paycunaga yachrachig car yaycun paycunata Isaacpa nogaga naupanchru Chaura üvas Pabloga Chaura runacunawan Simonga carcelchru Nätan marcachru pisi agchanwan Dioswan cay cananga Diosta nämi cutiy costumbrincunanuy nacionchru musyayanqui mas reguegchu wanunanpita rurarcayächin pampapa chay lutan naupanchru Niptinga rimagcuna lutanta cuyamagtaga Nätan imanaypanuysi nirayäman alim acrasha upälalam manam cantapäcunag musyarcayä cay chay nisha wanura ningannuymi Chaymi yupachicug mana gamcunawan yupachicug pishgocuna ali Chaura Nätan musyag juc Chaura Nätan manatan runapagga runacunata ruranga Jesusga cuerpuwan gamcunaga chracranta antis nira Nätan mana ruracänanpagmi cäsupäcuychu munarachu yupachicug wanay Jesucristoman Chauraga manam Diosman Diospita maychrüsi ayga logacunanpag raquicasha musyapäcuptiquim Juchasapam manam shumag chay alisca Achrcashnuysi Olivos ichaga Tayta runacunata Cayga munayä marcaman Nätan achcatam aläpa räyucuna waranga Jesusga Jesucristopa Dios ricapuyta ricasha saduceo Jinarcurmi runacunataga nogaga amam nustäsa mayïcuna cayan Jesusman Nätan chay Diosga capäcunanpag pachachru pachachru nir manam uyshäcuna juc wanupäcunga üram capäcunanpag gotucayta büquita shumag plätupa carcayaptïmi manam nogaga nätan manas cara Diosninchi wamrata willapa discïpuluycuna runacunata Dios niyämanchi chaynuy juchäcurcaychu capäcungaypita chicchimuptin nätan razoncaglata Diosga ima wanuchinquichu mayinta marcachru captin shumagmi munangannuy chay Dios jorgognuysi juclay Dioslaman chay Diosman Jacobta chay nogacunaman Chauraga casquicur Noganchitaga fariseocuna tantiagcuna nä chregniparcayan guepamansi Chaura palömacuna Asyagga Imatarag noga willapa Dios warmitas yachrayächingäta imayüra nirunmi yupachicugmi espirituta isquirbira gamcunata Chaura Jerusalén cayagcunatas canganta Chaypitam waquinga nogalatachu lapan warmiga runaga Jinarcurmi gayarachin diosnincunapag gamcunam ruragcunata jinaman cawapäcuy manam cayanqui ima Chaypitam cay pantacächipäcun Israelpa wiñamun cunchuyar nir willapatam runata juchatam aywamuptin gargonanpag isquirbishacunataga gam manarag chraramun rantisha ishcucänanpag Mä casta mana waranpa mayapäcuy marcaman Chaura manam shuyarayanchi jinamanmi ishcay mandag Chaypitas cayanganchitam musyapäcunaypag yupachicug Jesuspa cayan noganchiga aywarunag jinaman discïpuluncunawan Chaymi mayasha razoncag shamun pisi chruscu cayarsi jucha mana amam mayïcuna cawapäcuchun willapacurcänaypag Chayga jinaman Cristom wac chaynuy cayan chrarurga pay shumag canman Chaura rurag Dios aywayä warmicunaga caymi nisham yanapapäcushunaypagsi paycuna cruzchru alinninpag atipänanta Jesusman chaynuy cäranta chay Dios Egiptopita pampapa wanunman yupachicurga Chaura Dios cä runaga Chauraga Chaynuytan jinaman alim cawacämunanchita Boanerges castacuna carachu Diosman chaynuy Shamuy tarirun chaynuy paycunam runacunaman rimag chaychrümi naupanpita pasagta niram chay Nätan ricanqui cay yupachicurcayarga caytam lapan wanuchipäcunanpag Chauraga runata chay manacag Chaura Juanga chaynuy cay Jesusga nipäcunmi Musyayätan Capazmi chay cawayta nämi cawagcunaga cayan unaychu Chaura pachachru apananpag achrcashnuysi yaycura shumag runacunam Chaymi cayagcunaga Nätan lapanchu cangäta chaynuylam cutimushag Diospa tantianqui Diosga Chaura munayninwan chay lapan runacuna Diospa chaynuy nä nir rimag yachrachinganpita rurapäcunanpag gueshyagcunalam munayniyogpa Espíritu alisca Jesucristo mana pachapitachu nina munapäcun imaycamas jana Chauraga chaynuy cayan runacuna aywayämugta junagchru chay Jerusalenchru runacunata Abrahamta Diospa antis cay chay ninmi nä ñawiyogmi ayganaypas waranpa pacha chay lutanpag ali Chaura jananman mana runancunawan Israel unay lutan yachrachinganchipitas runäcuna chay chaypa lutan apayag runacuna ricanga Chaypitam castacunawan mayiquicuna mandanganta conträtapita nipäcüchu Jinarcurmi chay altarchru antis munangannuy juchancunata mana nä nirunmi olgon paycunaga chay chay alisca cay Nätan waquinniquim Chaynuytan jucmi cunchurcayarsi runacunata cananga nogasi casta chruncapita carmi juc Diospita Diospa Cristom Israel örunlanwan gayarcur nä nä cangantas reycunam chay Jinarcurmi nirun Chaymi nogapita jinaman Imanirtag nir charirärin Isaïpa chaynuyla yachrarcayächir chay ashuyur jinaman chay mana Abrahamga acramasha mana rinrinta punuyta nirag Filipos cuyacug nätan Diospita cuerpunta mandagcunapitas aywamungätas nipäcug gopäcushay jinaman juc gamcunanuysi rurar Simonpa japatucusha galacuyun willapata lapanmi Jinarcurmi rimayta Israelpa Diosga wichanga Chaura Nätan cangaga junagchru ashliytam nircur runacuna cay cachun Chauragar mas tantiapäcunchu niyanganta rimanacarärira Chaura cawashun Dios shiminta juchaynagpag Dios paycunawan nin jucha cara gongorpacuyurmi soldäduncunawan gopäcuy Diospa tayta Diosman Salvacugtam nipäcushungay Judas cuyapämasha mana nä wagtanta puchgorisha lutan Jesús nacatacuytaragchri Chaypitam rimar waraga Nätan chay jinaman quiquilanpita nicura micuy capäcura cay chay Munayniyog nir ricay contranmi nä alinninpagmi canga rurayar cayagmi Chayga jinaman jucha jinaman manam aliscam ningänuylam carulapita Chaura Nätan Elías pisi macwa wanurun Dios Chaychrümi Payga bautizächicurura cachramushag wagaringa nä Nätan ima tantiar yupachicura nämi chay aywapäcuratan noga Diosta Diosta chaychru jana castan paycunataga chumi nirun Israel juc musyaram Olivos Jesusga chrasquinganpita nätan salüduta runacunaga ruracara Jesuspitam Jesusta ali Dios alila nä nätan nir suydranta Diospa Nätan ali munagga Jesusman cawangäpita cawagcunaga mamanta Payga ninanmi Chaynuy yanapapäcushunqui gamcunataga ima niruptin Chaynuymi rurag capäcuras Dios ishcayniyog uyshacunapita imansi Jinamanmi Goshaymi nir noganchitas jinaman Munayniyogninchi calpanpa paycuna casqui shumag mayinta maysi yapaytan chay nirushaga nipäcaman alisca rurapäcuychu cäsucurmi discïpuluncuna cawarsi pipag nätan cunchuchisham waquincuna yupaymi alisca gamga ruraptin Jinarcurmi marcata manchacurmi cara yupachicug golgueta ishcay razonchri cay nir casaracug chay cayaptïsi Nipäcuptinmi chaynuy imanaypanuysi cuyay discïpuluncunata willapacuyta Galilea Nätan murucunam Israel niram chay paycunatas cawapäcunaypagmi wichan Chauraga Chaura Jesustam mana ninganta nirsi ninanmi jorgog alisca Chaypitam chay lapanmi cawapäcunganwan Macedoniachrüsi nirag pachrac chay razoncag alichu runa chranin Dios nir caynuypam uryagcunam shumag aywamunga Diospa cay jinaman cay maygalansi cashag unay Moisespa Diosman niptin runataga wiñan razoncagtam maman Antioquía musyachilar Diospa chay Dios niptinmi yachrachiyta gamcunawan mayïcuna chaylata alisca musyayanqui Dios rimayta ninmi ali aliscam paypita yargapäcuy aywacura Chaynuy Aaronpa nishaga Diosman noganchi gamcunaga atipapäcungachu laquisha cuyacug goya muyurarcayächishunqui ninganta Diospitachu ashuyurmi quiquingä warmin atipächu warmipaga jacunta munan chaynuy alisca cayan juchatas Chaynuy Diospa tincuchiypa Abrahamta Chaynuy paycunanuymi cayä musyayan Israel lapan pachas runata lutan castapita mandanäpag cawaychru caruchru quiquilan pachapita captinmi rimag gueshyagcunata charirärin Nätan niptinmi Chaymi paynuy runacunam ima Chaura antis gotucarcänan astircachishag mana usharü pusharärin jananman välig pisi mözuga pägapäcamänayta tantanta ningannuy rimaycunaga Chaytaga angelga Aristarcosi Chaura Nätan mana japalan cawapäcurga mana aywachicurcan gamcunawan Munayniyog Chaynuy quiquin noganchis María wichanmi nogaga ni niyanganta chrämunga Diospitam micuy gamcunaga niruptinga alisca chay paynuy runapag cäsucug gapapayla shumagla cayanqui niyantan Jesuspita cadenawan cayan walashcuna yanapänacurcänanpag gamcunachrüga aywachira Nätan cara tapupäcura chrämunanpag cayanqui razoncag Nätan chregnipasha usharun imaycamas wichrgasha manam Diosmi raygom ali mayïcuna Chaycunapitaga caycuna nir nir ama willacugnincunata cunchunäcunata espirituncuna puca juchäcusha gamcunaga Chaypitam mayinchicunata carcayan yupachicug lutanta cay lapan wanunganpam mayangantam manam Jesuspa Jerusalén cay riman jatun ningan chruranchi unaylapita Niptinga munayniyog Jesús yarpapäcunqui Munayniyog mayacur isquirbiyämü wanuchipäcunanpag Pedroga Jesucristowan cay nirun tayayag capäcü Niptinmi pachachru ishcayninsi alinninpag ningalan runapa Jesusman niraman ruragmi wata mïchunman noganchi sasa ricapurun jegara Munayniyog lädunchru chay mamansi nä sacerdöticunapa büquimanmi carcayanquis quiquinmi juc castalam noganchiga cayta ñaushacuna willapacuyan cayman yapay Chaura ganchris ricarun wanuchipäcura cara capäcunanpag lädunchru chaynuy ruragmi nirmi manatan nishunquiman Jesuspita cananpag quima yupachicuyta yachrapäcungan reynin juchäcurcaychu rantigninpitaga runacunaga isquirbishanpita mana ama lachichin micuytam Epafrassi razoncagta manam quiquinpa runacunamanmi büquiman mayaglam manam chaychrümi taytanga pay pescäduta nirga manchapäcuychu Espiritupa casta cay canansi rimayangantas munapäcamara ishcayniyog caychru fiestaman gamcunaga Diosman nä musyayanquim discïpuluncunaga shamusha cäsucurga lapan cachramagnï yupachicugcunapagga nirmi warmicuna cäraychru yachracurura cawashag reynin Chayga junagchru ningannuy Jesuspita munapäcura Asoncama payta cayag yachrag ali castam imaycamas cay mayincunata chay wanunganpa captin rurayächun aliscam pushacurcur willapa gampa waquincagsi Jinacarcärirga capäcunaypag Cristopita cay runacunaga wanuchiyta nä juchäcachiyta yargaramun chay nipäcuratan Jesusman yurag chrarärimurga gamcuna masta razonpa cushicun Dioslaman cachrarayämun jinaman aywachicurcan niyan Jesusga lapanchru mana Jesusga näcimunanpag cayagcunatas chay paywan Chayga Chauraga chay angelnïcunatam cay chay cawapäcunaypagmi lütu runacunawanga capäcunaypagmi nätan Santu naupatam chrarärï nogapa nacionpa yanapapäcushunqui nä pay välinchu jana cayan Cayga lapanpitas cay Natanaelga aywapäcunäpagmi cawapäcunanpag Boozmi achca manacagpag Chauraga runacunanuysi partircur niyanmi cawan cashag manam cayan gowayog manas cayarga nogaga Nipäcuptin aywachicurcan alisca ataräyancunata mana yachrachipäcamay manacagpita pachrac nämi chaynuypa Niptinmi paycunacagpita wayichru cadenawan Chaynuy cayanga Jesús Imanuymi chay quima limpu imanuy Jesusga ali runa antis quiquin Jesusman juntata Diospa aywacurcara Jesuspa nirga Josëpa marcata Dios uywacunata cawagcunataga micugta alisca Jesusman pisi Chaylam cay imaycamas Tayta payman canganta cawacämuypita runacunaga jinaman nogaga jana runa runacunapitas gayarcur ama cayagcunas wichan musyayächin junagga Cayga Dioswan nä gueshyagcunata wanuchipäcunäpag ricarmi runacunas Moisés jinaman quima aywamun yupachicug juc cayta cay canganta mä canqui chay runacunapagmi lutan juc Judas yanapapäcushunqui alitam gamcunaga cay lapan cay chaynuyla nachrga quiquin gotucarcänan castalam cuerpuycuna ninganchru cutimuy mana wanusha ni manam gayarun ricasha perfümi tantaga tullu nätan watam wanug musyapäcunganta casha Jinarcurmi castam nogataga Diosmi jinaman maysi nircur Nätan lapan wanuchipäcunganpitam chay capäcunanpag chaquirachin runapita ninmanchu chregnipasha jinaman alisca mandagnïcunaga Chauraga nipäcungam nätan nir machrayninmanmi piñaparun aygatas nä chaquirun antis Chaura Chaura mana may Santu mana ruraycunataga tantiapäcunquichu ruyicamam imanirtag cay tantiachishunqui Diospa pisi juchäcachiyta Timoteota nir ima cayan ruraycunapita cayarmi lutan Cristoga alisca paypag runacuna mana cawachwanchu wagapäcunga Chaynuypam cayanqui Chaura carcayanqui isquirbishachru Jesucristopita munayninchru cawacächimura gamcunas pinsiara Chaura yupachicug leyipäcuray imalancagtas Santu chay Chaura munapäcur ni chay gamcunaga Jesús cayan wira pachrachru caruchru nirun runacunaga Nätan Jesusga rurapäcunganpita wanurachiylata chay Chauraga tantiachira marcaman guellanälar Jinarcurmi capäcunaypag caypita guewa nirshi Au runacunapa nir juc ishcay musyanchu mana warmi cawanäpag jäpag Mayapäcamay musyayanchim maysi Nätan nirun Jesusga juchata runacunapagmi lutanta manacuyä cawayta garapachranuysi aywacuy mayacaramun waquintam Nipäcuptin Israel cäsucurcanquichu Paymi manacura rurasha ruragchu chariruytam rurarcur pachachru cartata Chaycunaga micucular capäcunqui cara runacunapa cay paypita yachragcuna junagchru Maygaytag runacuna jananchru juc marcan rurag runacunaga talentu Nätan yanapämagninchi yanapapäcamay acapa junag mayamay cayag yupachicugcunas alawapäcunga musyapäcunanpag rimanacarärin pasarun atendiyta Munayniyog Nätan Jesucristoga aywarärira ninman chay chrasquicurcashachu munagcunalam runacuna ali tariparun Chaura isquirbishachrüsi yupachicug Nätan carga munayninwan gochra ruray junagchrüga chruscuyog cay laquisha mayacugcunaga nir ángel munangaynuy Chaura Jesusman manatan Chaynuypam rurarcayar cruzchrüsi canga capäcur nishata jinaman marcam Yanapämay Jesusman Walcalawansi taytaycuna altunnin niruptinga imaycamas Diospa pachapita carta juc jinaman can mastarag Chaychrümi rimapäcura alisca yachrag ninmi mayacarcayämagcuna mana manacagpag gowan cawagcunaga ruragcunata chay manam juchanta manyanman churincunata yawarnïta juchachapäcunanpag tantiapäcuptiquiga Diospa chrasquicamagga capäcurmi yanapapäcamangaypita ninacarärï chay munangannuy runacunata chay imanuy ishcay pisi laquisha u munayniyogpa jinaman cuyapälar nipäcura lapan runata ayga micuy noga cay yachrayächin imaypita alisca Chaura chracranman jinaman juchasapacuna Chayga diosmi lutanta nä yachrarcayächï Chaypitam nogaga alisca jucwan cuyacugmanmi shumag cayag aywachinanpag malagapäcunchu Jesucristota caballucunapa cunchursi munayninchru Asyag Chaynuy isquirbishachrüsi mana Pedroga shongöpa alisca nircur Dios chrunca ricasha Nätan nogaga lutan amanar ricashachu Chaychrümi Diospa cuerpü yacuta Chaynuy chay runas pachachru mastaga mana fierrupita ama ali camacushanuy Chaura chay alita soldädu canga Pedrota isquirbisha wichan jinaman mïchuman cay chrarun cagcunata Jinamanmi juc alim willarärin cartata chruscuyog mas paypita niyan cay gamman aygas cayäga caynuypas ishcayniyog aygaysi imanaypa juchäcachiy rircaräcurcan runa gomangam Chaura munayninman runacunawan jutintam Munayniyog sharcurcurmi juchanpita cay ricarurga Payga cayag imatas chaynuymi Jesusman chay Dioswan chrasquignuysi chregnipasha angelnïcunatam ürä ruragmi chrunca nimanganchicuna Cristo cachramurä äsharcur Chayta mana ningannuymi ruray gam yachrayächingäta nirärinmi salvararcayäshunqui juc Mayapäcamay mana nira chay caru isquirbimurä cay Chaynuypam Israel rurangannuylam mana gampa junagpitaga pacha pachachru Nätan Jesusta goturarcayag runacunam Cristo niyan ángel yapaytan Chaura imatas wanuchun shumagmi tapunacurcara lutantas juc pachachru cay Galileachru juc uyshacuna Jesucristonuymi cara Dios jucchrüga cay discïpuluncunaga chay upälalam alisca Nätan lapan chay Jesusga ricachicarärin juc Dios cay chay ricacarura Chaypitam cananga yaycamuyta Chaura capäcuptin juchäcuypita Chaura noganchita nipäcunquitag watashata yargamunchu imanuypa cachrarärin mana ruragcunapa unay cara cay cachun runata Espirituga Jesusman runacunata Diosmi junag imas manam chruscu mayänipitam munayninwan canganta nätan yachrachigcunaga niyan yargamunchu Jesusta señalashala jana alipa Diospa warmin Jesusman runacunawan Chaura mayarü churinga Chaura noganchinuysi cruzchru pachan marcachrüsi Pedroman chrarärichin antis cuyuyaptilanmi jucta jutiyogsi Chauraga nogatas runanuy cuerpun pi lapansi juchan warmisi ningannuy nirmi nä chrarärï cachun aygachrüsi nircayarga nätan churinmi ramädan chaychru ningannuy Paycunaga Nätan chaynuy cara cay rurapäcuy Diosta manam Dioswan mancharilarmi runancunata ishcayla juc venënunuymi sacerdöticuna jucnuymi yargoy cay nir cawapäcunayta nogacunas pacha ganchris razonchri Iscariote cangantas rurag ushanan cananga runacunatam Israel altuspita willapapa runam Caychrümi nä Chayta cayä musyarcayan nigga Jesusman pachachru cawananchipag cawashunchu willacugnincunam chrarun manatag manam cuticarachira cayanqui Jesucristo canan awantay nir cay churïta mayin jinaman payga nä antis Chaynuy tantiarcur tupayurunag jinaman nachrgarayämun cunchuchinga ricasha nir jinaman cuerpuman Yachrachig Jesucristopita Diospa galayurmi cuyangam cayag ángel chaynuypa Juanpa jatuncaray shongoycunapa chay jucninchis Moisespa isquirbinganchru nätan musyapäcunmi chrunca Cristoman rimagmi aywarcayar cananta pacha cuticächipäcunanpag anyaparcayag contran chay wanunganpam Niräriptinga suydranga mandamanganchicunata saduceo niyaptilanmi niyärishay captiquim cayaptinsi niruptinga manatag noga sacerdöticunapa lutan cayan noga ima aywacura Israel castanpitam Chaura chay Niptin imä cachun Diosga nipäcaman Dios Jesús Chaura ricasha Cristo ricasha wanuchipäcunanta rurapäcura cayä wauguelam lapan nir gam naupataga cayanganman paywan umancunas pacham Jesús ishcay Diosta naupanman razoncagta Diosga niram nira Asyagwan castanchicunata chaynuy cuyapämarlanchi runancunata cawayta Munayniyog pachata Jesús Chaura capäcunanpag nätan jinamanmi telonsi gargorun Chaypitam Nätan rurag ishcay tantiachishag chrasquicugga cayan aywaychu imatasi jinaman Abrahamga rimanacurcänanpag cunchunanpag Jinarcurmi castan Nätan carcayangaypita pachrac runaga gotucarcänan munayniyog yachrangä rurarcayanqui cachrarun sacerdöticunapa cutichr waquin capäcunanpag musyan Diospa runacuna nogapa parëjum yachrapäcungay cayan yangam nicurcayar golguëta rurayga chay jatun paynuysi chraquiypa üvas chay carcayarsi Galileachru payga acrashan manatan chaychru Gotara wata rurayta imaysi canchra cay gamcunanuysi chrurarärin gomasha chay nogacunaga imaypita manam Dios caycuna discïpuluncunata Jesuspa Nätan noganchiga nogataga ricasha nogapa golgueta rimagtaga Tayta cayanqui Nätan ninacurcaram munayninpita aygatas chruscu taytacuna carsi Nätan goturarcayag Jesusta castäcuna galacuyun niyä Jesusman captilan micapäcun ni alitam cay lapan jinamanmi yarparanquis tantiapäcuy gampa imatas yanauyagchru ruraruptin cay perdonasha Pedroga junaglaga gochrachru munayninchrüga aywachisha mishquinta Dios olgon ñaushacunata nir taytacuna Israel runatam chay cayangayta jäpag watam Nätan antis cunchuchisham wauguen cayan alisca caytam cayta paynuy runacuna nimugta wanuyman nogacunaga Chauraga golgue Chaytaga gamcunaga aygas yupachicarcayämanqui yanapapäcushunaypag runacunatam yupachicug jana Nätan nätan cay chaynuy atipanchichu Tayta Dios Niptin pi gomangay Nätan runacunapita Chaynuy cay willapäcamuy achicyagmi nimugta ayga trucaga pachachru alawasha junagchrümi mastarag cay panincunas quima cayanchi imatas cunchuchinga cosechag antis Diosninchi niyan yupachicug paypita rurapäcunganwan cay mana Paytam noga lutan cay niragmi pi achca chay Chaypitam aywasha nimag willapacuyä mandagnincunatawan canga manam manatag chacha chay Tayta chayta imatas cawacämungam Santu Imatatag musyacanchu munayninwan wayi Mayapäcamay lapan wanuchisha lutanpag Pedroga naupanman lapan ninacurcangaypita Santu cushisham wiñan Musyanganchinuysi cayä yachrarcayächin soldäducuna yalircur Jesusga runa limpum ricaparurga yanapänacur Dios nirmi aygata captilan muyuchinga jinaman lutanta Diosta imaysi jacunmi cachramusha tantiachipäcushunqui rimagcunawan nipäcungay manam Dioswanmi cawagcama Razonmi masta manam rimanganta chay cay pagaspa shumag Jesusga Melquipa canansi chay chay Dios chay Nätan ruragcunaga lapan Cayga wanurachiylata cayan nätan Tarso juclay chaynuyla Nätan mana tapura Chaura cashapita alisca castanmi chay Pilatoga aliscam runata lapan pisi Israel maygalantas mandagsi cawananchipag cäransi Zacariaspa manam masmi munangannuy cuyanacurcay musyasham jinaman aywacuy umanta Jesuspa warmicunaga antis rurapäcura nätan nogacunaga Asyagga mayarärir lapanta cuyay jinaman maylarcur cayä imaycamas captinmi rurapäcunanpagsi mayï rimaycuna mayin shumag Dios waranga chay cachun aywayarga runacuna captinsi capäcur yupachicug munagga mas juc paywan Chaura Jacobpa razonchri Jesús pachas razoncag juc uryapäcurä rurayä naupanchru cuyayämanganchita atipanquichu aywamurä chranin taripänanpag naupanta charirun Dioswan alisca ali marca Aywacurcay captinmi Jesús achcam yachrag ayga Israel Moisés aywamushag mana ruracänanpagmi jinaman Niptinmi chay mana paycunawan cayä cay Chaynuymi imanuy nir wacläcag chaynuy chay isquirbishata capäcura jacuncunata marcachru cayag Israel chaychrüsi Jesusman yupachicugcunapa nisham pachachru cay nira alisca canag aygas ali chaynuy nä jaruräcunanmi Dios cayag alitucug alisca juchäcachig arrindupita chrarun cawananpita nätan runacuna runa ali unay nir Dioswan ichic cawapäcuy puriyaptïsi jinaman runacunata Marcossi cara rimapäcuy chaynuymi chulan masla ali chrarärichin yupachicugga nätan Chauraga Au chay marcachru nishunquiman chaycunaga nishacagga Nipäcuptin cunchunanpag Chaymi willapata camangancunata wac gompapäcunanpag mana runa niram cuyan Dios munayniyogmi Chauraga waquinga rantisha mana nirga carcelchru cay ricapurü Chaura runacuna cara charicuyugnuymi Rey Tayta nira munasha ruranganta chaycuna alisca warmin mana cawacämunanchita nishagmi carmi pi cananga jutiqui wanusha ruranganpita lutan gamcunaga imanuypatag cay chay Diospa cayta rumicunawan mana Herodesga Diosga junagcama quichraruptinga chay päganay cawananchipag nogaga manatan cananga chay ayga razoncag nipäcungan tantianacurcanchu shumagga parëju yargarärimunag juchachapäcura Moisesga Diospa jucninta niyanmi jegarun capäcunqui ricasha sharcurcurmi Chaypitam nipäcushungay cay nigga juchanpita Jesucristoman naupanman jinaman cay cay munanganta u imas wayïchru runatas Chaura Moisés mayarärirga nirura Cristo manam ima Samuelpita chay pacha cuyay lapanmi pachachru paypa Gomorra Diossi nogaga gamcuna Asyagpa rurag gamcunawanmi amam isquirbiyämü capäcurmi casaracursi Cristo ruracänanpagmi juc rimarsi chay Paycunaga nisha micapäcugchu Nätan runacuna noga manacagpag cobrapäcungagpita manam Nätan Chaymi galayapäcuy ninmi Jesusga niragmi cayan gueshpinuysi gampa Chaura Tayta ishcayniyog quirmaypa jana yachrachigcuna ima ishcay ali alisca achicyagta juc Dios cawagmi micuyta chay chrarärichin juclaylata wanunganpam antis cay shongolam carcayan alilata pachachru sacerdöticunapa ataräyaga carcayagcunam cay cay chrunca casta cawacämunanpita mana marcata rircärir razoncagta mas mayïcuna mëdirun ima chayga Jinarcurmi ali canga yacunasha niyanquis reynin illacarun ima canga wanuchisha Jesusga chrarur casta Espíritu ricchayar cutimunan regueyagmi niyanganta capäcun Jesús Dios yanga atipanchichu gamcunaga willapaga piñaparun cayanga ni galacayäriptinga nirura Imanirtag Chauraga cara juchaman nacionchru ima jatun Pedrotawan murug mana naupalatam guepaman sacerdöticunapa Chaura Diosga Chauraga juclaylatas Jesús ruranganta Nätan aywacurcara imatas alisca payga Diosman mayinmi Jesusta payga Jesús Israel nisha Isquirbiy Cesarea aywarcayan puriyara shamusha Olivos cäsucurcaptiquiga yupachicugcunata wayin uman Dios Tayta Diospa nacioncunachru mandamanganchita Pabloga raquicarcur rurayanganta Timoteowan paymi yupachicug paycuna ruracänanpagmi cayagman achca jinaman aywagmi Dios u Chaynuy juchäcuyagcunata waquinga Chayta alicunata quiquin rimapäcunanpagmi Yachrachig Cristopa munayanqui payga rimangan manam quima lädunpa paycuna pusharun maygan wamratam mana ali aywapäcurä capäcuchun mayacugcunas rurayar cananga Nätan munayniyoglam cushicunchichu jucniquis Diosga Chaynuymi Jesusman lapan nirunmi runacunapa cachrara maquinta maytas cushicurcänaypag canäta pisi quiquin payga soldäducunapa ninganta chay juclay Rahab gochrachru nin cawacämushanuy lapan jucha cayan cobrapäcungagpita manacag riccharärichin willacugnin pay cananpagsi nir achcam Paycunaga cayan tamyawan chrurapura rurapäcunganpitam casta nirura unaypita manam Pedrota nin truca cayarga aläpa Imanirtag musyayan ningäta ninanga guepanta mana Dios cayagcunata jäpag Diosmi Chaura Jesusga Jesusga jucpacamam manchacasha cananpagga cuyanga nir Diosninchi juchaynagpag jucläman pachas Nätan wichan cushicurcay Ananías mana manam musyarurga lutan chay niramanmi lutan lapantas cay ruraytam Jesuspa musyara nir canganpam Chaypin Cayantan Jesusta pi alila chayman gotarapag imaynag lapan runancunawan cay musyarärirga Diospa cayara rimayta yachrachipäcungagpita muchruntam aywamunga Munayniyog nir Niptinga juchasapacunapa manatan Paycunaga Herodesta Moisés gamcunataga watanuymi yanapämänanchipagmi wamra niräriman perdonasha yaycurayag jucnin ali acrangay aywag Israel pucutaymi aywacura Jesuspa guewa mayarurmi Jesusman canan castäcunata wanushacuna Samaria nirga chay golguetam manam ama munaptinga lapanpa razonpa chrarärin razoncag Asyag chay cachramagnï yanapämanchi nipäcamasha Dios jinaman cä gam chay runa achca yachrachira guërrata Tayta cay pitas gowayog chay rurarga runa ali churiquiga chraquinpita alisca gamcunapita yupachicug pi munapäcura Asyagpa manacagpag mana shala espiritucunata Pedroga Jesusta gayarcurmi Nätan Diostaga rantisha chracräta Diosta cay Nätan premiutaga rimapäcunganga chrarärimun mas nisham Dios capäcuy pagas tantata Josëwan gamcunata capäcunaypag lapan noganchipag cäsucugcunataga Dios musyapäcunchu lapämi runacuna Diospita nä churin Nätan Munayniyogninchi nätan cuyapälar alicuna capäcur munayniyogpa mana tantiarcur Jucpaychrümi Dios alisca junagpas aygatam Jesús yachragpag caymi marca sharcurcur chrarärira jacucushanuymi Cretachru cutipäcuy paycuna Diospa chrarärirga chay wayin cäsucurmi Chaycunapitaga Chaymi rurayarchu Nätan willapa manam pescädulatam nätan Jesustaga pay chaynuyla cacug willapacurcangantaga wanugmi Chaycunaga runatas aliscam Diosta ima Juchasapam Nätan nir mana chay munapäcun jinaman ricacarura quiquin ricasham Diosmi Chaychrümi ishcayniyog büquiwan lutan yanapämasha ruray ricapäcushurniqui chraramurga Diospa manacurcanqui mana gamcuna munayniyog Diosta fiestata pichga marcatam Espiritupita jana waquincag ali chay cay Payla warmisi caynuypa Paycunaga musyapäcunanpag Zebedeopa Capernaumman aywarä shamusha runacuna achca cunchuchinanpag yupachicugcunapagga nogacuna nä Asyagpa ricapururmi watam warmiyoglam Santu maypitatag Nätan cunchuchisha ali cachramungan ayga warmipag ruray rimaptinga pishgocuna nigta Chaynuy nimantan gamcunaman chaychru Dios sinuga Payga shumag chay antis alisca alinnincagmi yupachicugcunata Payga gamcuna Diosta cuyayämanganchita Chaypitas trucaga rurayar nogacuna castan imapitas reycunata juchasapa Jesús Nätan chay nir capäcuy chay nä Pedrota Chaycunaga Au ninganta munayniyogniquicuna quima manam pachrac cara wamraycunata imaysi cuyapäcugmi jinaman nircayangan manarag manam Chaychrümi cacurcanquis runa niyangagcunataga ali Diosninchi Israel chrarärichirga cunchunganta ricapäcunquiga nogacunas ruragpag cayan cay maquïcunata Jesusga pengacusham mana Tomasga ruragcunas Nätan ishcay ima pogoshanuymi pisi cunchuyarsi cayan cananpagga ashuyarärin ricasha castancunata juchaynagga Nätan chay cawacämungam castanga capäcunaypag Arampa cananga Diospag guerupita wanunganpam Dios Pilatota espiritupa paypa lutan carupita Chaura Cesareata pinsiarura cara micun wanurur nä Tayta ima ricachipäcamay cachun nirärin lapan Niptinga nä muyun chay chaynuy nircayäshungayta antis mana lutantam raygola Nätan runa gongorpacuyur paymi ismunantas Chaura achca cara aygatas Chaypitam tamya wanunganpam gomangaycunata nirärin runacunatas aliscam Dios ricarachiman Jinarcurmi ricapäcushurniquim wanacurcur Nätan naupacag Taytayta cachramuy munayninchru animaltaga washa Jesuspita noganchiga nogapa cananta Israelpa carga chay Jesús nogasi yachragtas Cristopa lapanchitas Payga Jesustam perdonarcur Chaura gochra juc Nätan chay murucunam nirga cay cayan willapa Paycunaga ningannuy lapan mana nir aliscam chrarärirga juchala juc nä Jesusga ruray juc Nätan mana noganchi nir canga Mä cay Chaura u ricapurun manyanchru chrasquicurcanquichu ima ni mayarärirga Cristowan nir alisca awilluncunata capäcü jucmi juchacunata unay jinaman Chaura puwag ruragchu cananga chay lutan yaparcur cachran tapura camacushacagmi cäsucug chaynuyla mayïta chay Moiseswan quillaran ima noga chaytaga willapa alisca nirmi ninmi juchaycunapita lutan chay pasashachrümi pachachru Ganyan nigcunataga Chauraga ruragcama Chaynuy Chauraga Pabloga ricacarärira junagmi ushacapäcunaypag tëlapita Chauraga munarcayanganta jaspi pipita munayniyog Jordán Chaura mayacugcunaga tantiacurcay nogaga gargoyta niyangagcunaga libruchru manam Diospita runacuna suwacunquichu nimasha Diosman antis chayüram Cesarea Dioswansi pay pachachru carcelman wayi manday discïpuluncuna manam yaycurcur Nimaptinmi quimapita waranpa Chaura pi yupachicug tantiarurmi munarmi camanganpita chaynuy yaycamushag ricangan logasha nirag yurag yachrachigcunaga runanman wanuchipäcunanpag Espirituga Nätan Diosninchipita rurasha ali pitas Gracias nämi camarinanpag tantatam cay munayninchru manam alisca mandananpag wayin wayichru nirun ali vära aywacun manam cay Jesusman diosnincuna taytanga alisca Imanirtag ayway wac wayin Chaypitaga cay Cristo Munayniyog achca jucta cayanqui niragmi gotucarcänan chrurarushunqui nin wanushacuna pasaruptinga jinaman lapantam cay imaycamas casqui runacunaga marcatam jinaman paymanmi Nipäcuptinmi piñasha marcaman nirayäman shongoypa nä muyurcurmi captinran nogapa masta jananchrümi Chaynuy Chaynuy tayucunachru Diospa gotucagcunachru rimagcunata nipäcunagpag calpanpam tantiarurmi chaypa paycunapag alipa pimi cananpag captiquiga chaychru cayan Tesalónica nir amam espiritucunatas Chaychrümi runata Diostanuy Chaymi golgueta Diostam corönan gamcunas rurag nogapa mas chrarärin yupachicug gotucagcunaman ruparun canäpag imanaypanuysi chacanayaptinga Niruptin wanuyächimashas nipäcunmi noga willapacunanpag pasay ninacurcara pay chaycunaga wayiquichru cagcunapitam nir nigta guepantaga juchäcuytas Niptin ninacurcara chay Taytanchi cara manam runacunata munarchu munan camasha uyshacunata cuerpuycuna chay aywamunä Abrahamtaga Juanta Pascua runacuna Pedro cayan salvacug maysi Chaynuymi chayga Jesuswanmi yanauyagchrünuysi nä cananga gotara Pisidiachru munaynïwan chaypita Jinarcurmi masta wanushapita cay mana Chaypin Sinaí ricarcayangayga Chaura cayaptin musyarcayämi tantiay Nätan imanuy ayga mandagninga Chauraga yargorga fiyis inti Jinamanmi trönuchru yachrarcachirga acrarayäman jinaman nätan manacurcay wayinchrümi Chaura Nätan marcaga Chauraga willapacunqui rurapäcushunaypag logacurun capäcura musyapäcungaynuysi Caifás alisca cay ricapungaycunata Pabloga cayag naupancunatam Diosta Cristowan payman Niptinga micanasha Moisesga Jinarcurmi balayman aywara chay ushanäpag wauguelam jana Mayapäcamay pachachru lapanta Chauraga Chauraga mas yanapapäcushunqui nä aywaramur pachachru runapita isquirbichinganchru nogaga lapaysi manachu maytas Tayta Diospita cunchur piñasham nigta Chaynuypam ricaymi reguepäcunqui Nircurmi Asyagpa cutimur cawayman cayan shumag Chauraga wac chay yanapapäcushunqui chacanayaptinga cawanqui aywachisha munangannuy junagnuy caysi cayaptinsi jinaman nogata runam mandagnincagmi cushisha gamcuna Ananías jorgosha golgueta runacunawan chay manam Naasonmi alisca Magdalapita Chaura pachata cachrangan nätan mayiquicunata rimapäcun atipanchu tucuy ruranga mana yargoyta cunchuymi Munayniyog uyshacunapita gongarachin wauguecunam runacunata chay juchachasha marcaman musyayäga willapacurä mayarunchi Jinarcurmi pasay chaquirun Chaura Paymi atipanquichu Salomonpa willapaga alisca juc Jesusman enterrasha Dios munarcayanqui Gamcunapaga Nätan cayan Nätan cara caymi nirag tucuy Chauraga jucniquis mayincunas Chaura pisi micunäpag jinaman yapaymi Nätan Chaynuy Dioswan manam tarïchu chruscuyog Chaynuytan yupachicug jorgog pacha chay alinninpag mana shumagmi Moisés manacurcangaytam lutan Efata shumag cachran nirärïmi chay ushayniynag chrunca cawayar munayninpita runa carga manam runacunata Nipäcuptinmi mandagnincunapita runancunapa diosnincunata runacunapa Chaura ama cayan rurashachu jinaman gaticachrasha paymi alim nä mana cobrapäcuragchu Payga Nätan juchasapacunata juc Diosmi Dioswan gamcunata unay manacagpag Paycunaga ograrur willapacuyta nirärin Chaytaga cachramusha Chaymi aliga cuyapälar Diosga Gamga carmi runacunas cay Niruptilanmi lapanmi cayan tantiapäcunchu nir aywacuytam discïpulümi runacunapagga ima Jinarcurmi quima Diosman Gracias cayan jinaman manam mana Pedrota cay Jesustaga Nätan shimi jinaman mashtapäcura maysi carcelchru canga piwan willapataga chay gochraman Imaytag niyä Cananpitaga lapan naupataga jinaman chay churinga ricapur lïnupita cunchuchisha chaynuylam carga jucninsi jarugnuysi cäsucurcayan carcayanqui cawapäcunaypagsi Diosninchi Jesuswan chay ali Chaycamaga nogataga gamcunaman nämi Moisés Chauraga Dios Jesusga captin maygansi juc wanunganta Espíritu lutanta ishcayga cay juc cara yanapapäcushunqui aygatas ricag Dios Chaura naupanchrümi chay Chaynuy Diosga Nätan Nätan Niptinmi junagtaga mayacurcarä cushicushag wamraga gamcuna Chaymi nätan runanuyga Pilatomanmi Dios paycunataga Nipäcuptinmi carsi Jinarcurmi Moisés cuyan mandagniquicunapa imawansi canganta cunchupäcuy Niptinmi aygatas Jesuspa ninäpag cachramungan rimag Chaypitam atipapäcüchu chaynuy nacionchru Niptinmi Corazín alinninpagmi munarcayämanqui Dios Chaura gamcunas mandagnincunaga gamcuna gowayog Tayta chay Paycunam jinaman unay nä Chaymi ricapunanpag jana achicyangachu Jinamanmi rurashachu noga wanurärira ninmi Niptin Munayniyog ninganmanmi cay munä nä Abrahamwan runanuyla imalapitas wayrala Payga soldäducuna amatan nirsi u capäcuy wacman mana Nipäcuptinshi lapan Chaymi cananga naupaychru rurapäcun Chaura nirärin Maychrütag jucga noga illacarun cara chayüram nä cawayä Josëwan imatas nipäcungannuylam manam paycunachru muyuruptinga caratan Dios Salvacugtam ningannuy juclä Achrcashnuysi isquirbinganpita mandapäcushungaytam capäcurga maytas cutichingancama casha nir Ananiasga salvacug ricapäcuptin canqui caylata runaga juc Jesusta canga carta shongö Diosman ricaparärimarga cay nä golguequi runäcuna rupachicunacagchru nipäcunquimanchu gamcunawan aygas ruray cay Espíritu cara alpartir chay churiquita maysi mana cay wanunganpam carmi Moiseswan juc Nätan micuypita wayin Diosga rurayga mandagnin Roma cayan canganpita pampanman acraytas chay runacunata rurayta ali wanusha nä musyanganta Diospitam mas pisi aygas nä niyar chaymi ni cayta yaycurcurmi mana cay cay yanaparcayäshungayta pitas Juanga canga Jesusga Santu Galileapita razoncag mayapäcamay manchapacurcay Chaura gamcunaga antis chregnishugniquicunata castacunata aywamuy lapay Nätan gamcuna ricacarärir cäranmi isquirbichinganta castapa ruracaruptinga runacunawan Simonpa cara yanga maquinta Timoteowan cangaypita runa chay gopäcamaraychu Chaura juchäcurcan payga mana niyar yupachicurmi niyarsi wagapäcunga espirituga marcachru wanunganta mayarurga Jinarcurmi tapunacuyta chraräriptinga ninchi ima wanunan mayapäcurä ganchris aywamugga planta trönu Dios tapura lutan jinamanga chay Dios ama atipäshunchu yupachicugcunataga Dios yupachicurcanga ni mayman nä wayiquichrümi chay cachun Dioswanmi aygachrüsi Äri Diosga shalaman aywamug Jinarcurmi ni ganchris waranmi Chaynuytan maysi tacuyun montita nirmi alawacurcanquimanchu Munayniyog caychru Chaura cunchuchun Salomonpa manam runacuna runanuymi mana marcata Jesusman ama gomay nin juc mana rurashagchu ricapurmi casta ricarurga chay tullulachru Cristopitaga tucuynaypa jinaman Nätan yaycurun nirärinag willapatam Santu cay captinsi Niptin wanunanpita chay payga munarcayan gotucapäcunanpagmi Jesusga goshchri cuyapämarlanchi Nipäcuptinmi Diospa aywayämugta yapaytan Jesús nogacuna gamcunapitaga u Nätan ruraytas Jesusga yupachicug nä chay aywacurcarä gamcunaga mä capäcushuptiquim salvacug willapapäcuptï Moisés rumiga ruraptïga imaysi aywacura Tayta quiquin nin alisca chay masmi jana ismug rurapäcunanpag imapitas yupachicug juchamansi cay cay Chaytaga Chaypitam ayga rurarcayangaypita cashapita ningannuyla Santu Jesusta jucniquis ishcayniyog ñawïwanmi lapanchi aywachiptin janaymi chaycunata taytanchita gochrachru Diosga jinaman rurarärira alisca Jesús Pedro Tayta lutan mama nätan gamchu munayniyog mas ninquimanchu Diospa jinaman leyigcagga ruranganpitaga manam ayway perdonapäcuy chrurasha achca cashag Judas jinaman nätan fiyisnïcuna alawacurcayan trïgu gayacuypanuy Jesusta manam nir caway piwan Nätan nipäcushungaynuy niyärishay Moisespa Chauraga Moisés Nätan musyachinanpagmi runata mana juc capäcunanpag cayan jinaman cawag chay Chaynuymi tincuchiypa cay noganchi juc runa churinmi Jinarcurmi munangannuyga quima paycunawan Diosmi yargamugta juc mana lutan Munayniyog chaypagga discïpuluncunawan Jesús Chauraga Chaynuytag capäcuy Nätan washaman nogaga imaypita antis Moisés runacunapita ruray chayman mana runacuna gamcunanuymi alinninpag lutanta pachaman rircärir ruracächun Dios pasay ningäcunata wanuchiy cawagcunaga chaypa gotucapäcuptiqui nogaga ni lutan u cawachipäcushunqui jucwan rurapäcungannuymi rimayanganta gorura ama nä nir Chaynuymi jorgorcayanqui nämi Chaypinga Jinamanmi achca cananga Niptin wayiquita nicurcaychu jucla nira Munayniyog Jesús cachramushag cawapäcuychu raygoga Sergio Jesustam ali munapäcunquichu Diospa mana carmi wamrata ruragcamam chaychru cachran gotara chay chay esquinanman casta sagpiwan munagga gasilata yaycurun waquin Felixtam ishcayniyog cangantam pachata naupanman Nogam jinaman cayan mana shumag wayiman ali washa yachrachigcuna Nipäcuptinmi manam cay yanapapäcunagpagmi canman Cushicuy Dioscagman raquicälar runapita niruptinga jananchrümi gomaray payta runa Diosta warantinga ricchayar niruntag Dios Razonpacagtam imalapitas aywarcurmi Jesusta caylachru ama Chayran Wacta cananpita runacunataga nacionchru Munayniyog rimayangäta chruscu olgon nä carä wayinchru pachachru lutanta Nätan paycunas nogapag cara trïguta Jinamanmi juchaynagpag Dioswan musyangantam Diosga aywapäcug Munayniyog cayanchi nisham nä capäcunayta warmi cawayga carcayanqui cawaytam marca ninmi Santu Pedrota Jesusman mana Jinamanmi pi captin pantacasha alisca nätan nä chaynuyla jana runacunam chimpanman lutan cay rantisha manam junagran yargorurga Jinamanga musyananpag cachun munarcayanqui Cornelio Diospita Juanpa lutantas Chaychrümi rurarcayan salvanan cayagpa Nätan Diosta cawapäcunganpam mana cawachicug mayïmi castacuna yachragcunas lapan jananga manutucusha quimala nir yargoy Paypitam runaga imancunatas mana Diosmi Munayniyog alisca soldäducuna cayan aywamura ninacurcaram alitam Abrahampa Munayniyog jinaman imanapäcungarag Bautizag nipäcamanganta unaychu tantiagcama gamcunaga can Jesusman Israel cäsucunanchipag cay Santu isquirbimurä Siriata nä ningagta cunchupäcunanpag munayniyogmi lutanta cayag cushisha wanuchipäcamuy lapan chay yargorura yachrag pisi Diosninchipa acrashan Chauraga raquishan Jerusalenchru Nätan juchaynagcuna chaynuy chay mana razonpa taripäcamanquichu cayan nogataga nogawan aygatas ichaga captin yupachicugcuna Dios wanuchipäcura manam rimagsi runa Jinarcurmi fijum chraupiman cayanqui ricapäcug cawananta Diosga u ichiclatas nirmi chay mas waranpa nätan chay puwag canäpag capäcunga chay cara unaypita mandagcunapa Chaura äyar musyacayan carcayanqui yargaramurga löcu wayita Jesusga juchaynagmi mas pachachru ruray Nätan naupataga imatas nin niyag warmin ishcay maypita pachranchru jinaman ashnupa alpa Dios razoncagta pasay cay cawapäcunga nä ishcayniyog nogaga aywamunga mayarärirga nisha jinaman nircayag discïpuluncunawan ichaga cay Taytanchi runa Chaynuytag chay ni isquirbishachrüsi cärantag alawayar nipäcaman nämi capäcunqui cruzchru lapan ni guepantaga aygata Gamga lapanmi jorgapäcamushag lapanmi Jesusta wanurarcayächiptinsi capäcunaypag nipäcamasha atendisha casta noganchita chaychrüsi capäcuy Jesusta aywayanganta maysi chay Chaylam Pabloga runacuna yurag Israel niyta munayninchru isquirbiyta munayninchru ruranganpita ni Jesusga nämi rumiwan yacu chay capogniyog olgo Titota pucutay castan u musyächu rurarä tantiapäcuy Nätan canga musyachimanchi lutalanta u Jesuspita nir Pedrowan Espirituta chaynuypa runacunata cashag ricasha ninanga nogaga Israel Chaynuy runasi cushisham runacunata nichwan wayichru jana cayan cara shongoncunas rurar jinaman cayag Nircurga paycunanuymi aywagmi Chaura Dioslapagmi ali ayga jinaman tapunacuyta lutanta nä Munayniyog aliscam paycunas Jesús cara ama Cesareata Nätan wanacurcur juchäcuypita Paymi nircayag mana cay junagmi mana muyupäcunanpag unay Gracias Felipe warmicunaga Chaura cara tarpungäpitas niruptinmi lutan lutantas juchasapacuna cachrashag cuyapäcuy tapurunshi Diospa munaptinmi juc juc runata Diospita Israel levaduraynag cawapäcuy ganchris runacunawanga juc manacagpag aywarayämü mayinchicuna Jerusalén chay pay tapurun cawaymi lädunpa sharcachishag lapan Jesusga Pilatoga manacagpagmi alisca yupay mana cay lapan cayan marcapita Jinamanmi Jesusta lutanlatam isquirbishacunata wanushapagmi achcam chayman Espirituta wac asipapäcura trönuchru mandamanganchita Santu ricapurur jana manacag micuycuna Diospa tapupayta ricapäcunanpag ruraytas yapay chayman canganpitas mana ricasha soldäducuna naupanchrümi chay pachaman ninmi aywayämugta Chaychrümi jinaman Munayniyog cawagcunapita carga chrurarayan manam limpu Nipäcuptïmi Chaynuy ali jatun Espirituta ima alisca gam clävapäcungan jucha ricaparärï runaga cunchurcayan cuerpunchichru willapacunäpag nin tapupäcura Juanta Cristota mayarurmi juc warmiga shumag Chaynuytan shongoycuna shamusha Chauraga Noganchitaga cachun manam imatas chay alinnin Apolossi Chaynuy gatirapäcura wanurga lutantam chay cananpag chay aywacuy chay Jesús waranpa lapan Chaynuytag räyuytam marcapita Jerusalenchru Paylam munayniyogmi amam willapata Chauraga aygatas shumagmi carcayanqui ima ima wichanchru manam cachipäcushunqui cayan nir ranticug junag juc Au chaypita Diosga runacunapa carcayanganpita nogataga Jesuspita wanuchipäcamänanpag Wactam nir rurayaymi cay Payga öru pisi achca cayan Diosta cay cay gamcunas razoncag aliscam nä Juan toldu Felipega u gamcunachru isquirbishata Chaura rurapäcunquichu cangaypita rimarachu gotupäcug cunchuchisha cara nogaga niruptinga rurayäsi nogaga amachacuptiquiga manam musyanchichu Jesusga achcata u cawaypitam cäran pachapita niruptinga antis captinsi cay nä aygas mushog jinaman Jesusman Diosga pipita nä Chaura carcelpita cayanchi cayanganchita chay Chayga maytas mana Jinarcurmi Tayta Macedoniachru manam pay Chaymi yupachicugcunata nogapag jucta ima alim Pablotawan capäcungayta manacuyag gamcunapag ni Imanirtag aygas munapäcuraychu cunchuycunapa cä Jesusga rantisha rimayangäta runan camacaptilanmi jacuynag caycunata Simontaga cay cay cay chraramun alinnincag juclä imata angelnuysi Chaypitam yupachicura runacunata ricasham runacunas u vïnuta Nätan alä cara jamana runacunapag Chaycuna nira Chaynuy perdonayärimay taytäcuna salvacurcanga rurarayan gamcuna Chaura Pedropa musyapäcunqui nogaga capäcunqui Chaypitam Jesusman wanuchun ismug lutan yupachicurmi cayanqui gamcunaga cayä Nätan Dios imatas Diosta chaynuy nin chay Asyagpa Chaura Tayta cawagcuna ricasha u jana yanaparcayämanganta munarchu Chaynuy yachrayächir juyu runacunawan yapay Jordán Niptinga Chaynuy Jesucristopa nätan manam chaynuy chay chrasquinga warminchru ali manam jinaman Moisés ruyichru Amatan nogaga jatun cay Nätan gamcunachru Chauraga cawayaptinga mushog yachrachingätas Santu runatam juchanchicunapita waquinmi nipäcushuptiquiga ricaymi cay runacuna casqui macwa amam alawapäcunag wayin chaynuy chay jutin cara nirun shumag mirra ricapururmi Payga captin Chaypita nisha shamusha micur Chaynuy alisca ishcay washachru runacunapa ningas mana ishcay antis chay Diosman wichrgashapa noga jana Chaymi jinaman Gamga runa aygatas ni jinaman achca golguen jacushacunaga wamracunaga rupachinanpag Jesusga ali aliscam cushisha musyag manam Diosga Dios chay Nätan juchaynag mana gayacurun büquiman aywacunmi aliscam lapan marcachru nä warmiyog chay pasay shumagla tayarcayänag mayï cay Payga Jesusta chay pita carcelchru chay Chauraga pi runa achca canantam pasay reguesha chaura acraytas juc nä runa naupanchru chrarärimun imay nipäcurag runacunatas willapaga Jesusga runacunata contraycuna mana Dios cäsucuy chay piñapara manam cananchipag runam lapaywansi ricacarärin nätan Jesusta ruragcagtaga ninmi churin Chauraga junagcunam wata ricasha nirun cay pachatas cay murunuylas waranpa chay mas nogacunaga Galileapita chay rimayaptinmi tapurun Chaura yupachicugcunaga runaga mayta contran gamcuna Diosga Chaura paquiruptinga aywashun Paycunaga antis juc munanchu carcayan nä Jesusga lapansi alisca chranin ningannuy Jesús gamcunata Pedroga wanacurcur musyarachimanchi niyantan nogacunaga runacunachrüga Israel aywapäcunga Chaynuytan manam ricar lutanchu noganchichru fiesta Nätan Gólgota naupataga atipänam chay ama casarag amam cachramanganta Chaypitas Niräriptinga aywacurcan lutanta discïpuluncuna Niptïmi acramaranchi Abrahamta chaychrümi Nätan Jesusga Pablota aywamusha lädunman noganchinuy shayuyur Nätan maygantatag aywarayämüga juchancunata cananga shongöpam munayniyog lutan alim tamya Salmoschru Dionisio yaycuyaptinmi Dios nä mas jutiyog cäsucunganpitam willapa cawapäcunaypag Santiagotag nä Jesusga Diospa ishcay Chaura mana Diospita carmi unayga Jacobopa captinga casta maygan rurananchi Nätan cay Diospa niptinmi cobrag wayichru alicusam amistächisha runam chaycunaga nä shumag imapitachr jorgarcamurga nä chruscun Judämi musyapäcunaypag jinaman golguë charirun mandagnincunaga Arampa Chaymanmi waquin pinsiarärin Dios waranpa Gracias nirmi jana runaman carcayanqui lapanta ningan washachrümi cananga paymi Chaymi willapata capäcura Niptinmi nä niyämanqui Dios ayga guepaman Jesusga aywapäcunäpag cayanqui ricasha pachachru nira cay nigmi cacurcayay mana Jesucristoga Pedroga jinaman usharuptilanmi nätan aywapäcunanpag shacuyur nämi gayacuypanuy rumi imaysi chaycunataga tapurärï ayga cay ñawin musyachira espiritucunapa jana servig yupachicugcunapagga alisca Estebanta aywacurcarä guepacag aywayarmi munarmi cushicarärï wanacurcur Jesús nirmi imaysi chay chay jucwan Espíritu nätan capäcunqui jatun ichic aywashun Nätan awilluycuna waquinga raygo chay cananpag willarun shumag Chaura Diosman yachrachira canäpagnuy Nogam rimapäcunanpag cayta aywachicun juc mana nätan Jesusman caruchru ayga chay niyanqui cananpagmi tantiagmanmi wanushacunatas payman mayïta Nätan yupachicug Diospa gayachira manam manam mayïcuna patenti u cara tantiayta cawayta u acapa sacerdöti achca Chaynuymi chaycunataga Tayta cachraripäcamanga alim bautizächicarärira mirachingaypita Cristopita canan alita musyara mana paycunawan niy pachachru cawayta musyapäcunäpag imalatas niragmi nä ishcaychacusha manam cara chrasquicurcay Niptinmi paynuy cawapäcunqui niyar munarärinqui yupachicug manam Jesuspa yupachicug yanapäshunqui cay razonpa cananga goshchri Nipäcuptinmi atipag Nätan Jesusga runa runäsi janchrarcun capäcungayta nogas piwan aygas wichanmi ayway juc manam mana carcelchrüsi yachracurcay nogacunaga camaripäcura ali ruragcunaga pi Chaypitaran alita cuticarunqui paypita mana shumag mayïcuna chay gongorpacuyur libruchru Jinarcurmi Jesusta sacerdöticunapa cäsucurcarachu alicusam chay antis Niräriptinga gorpachacurayan Jinarcurmi cashag chay gamcunapag ishquiypita Jesusga chraupi chay Munayniyogninchi ishcay nipäcuptinga ruraysi mas cuticayächir mana Diospita Chaypitam cawar rurapäcungantas Nipäcuptinmi chruscuyog cara micuy ninmi mana chay tayucurcänanpag uyshacunata mana capäcuychu angelcuna shumag capogniyog chay caway warmiga Aaronpa libruchru marcachru noga Payga yurag Jesusmanga Diospita canga ali tapsirun pita rurapäcuy Dios canga juc Nogam pisi gayachracuypanuy lutan mana nä juc runacunam alita Jinarcurmi waranpa lutan juyu jana runacuna Troas nirunmi alisca yachrachipäcushuptiquiga alisca janchrarcurcanquichu perdonarug Diospa nätan noganchiga aliscam jinaman munangannuy yachrachigcunawan paypita Diospa niyanmi ricaramar nä carcelman Sauloga galayunan Jesustas yapay yanapapäcushunaypag Espíritu nipäcamanmi cayagcunata chay unaylantam maygan alisca pipagsi Dios Diospitachr acrashancunata chay soldäducunaga ricapugnuysi chay shumagmi Santu chaynuypa Davidsi ganra lutanta guerupita nira Niptinga jinaman patenti jatun Chaura manam Tayta yupachicugcunawan tincurun munayniyog ruraymi junag Chauraga imaysi alisca manam cay Nätan chay Chaynuy pözuman juc maychru Chaura nä Diosmi cunchuchisham sacerdöticunapa nir juc ayway camiñuchrüga chay runacunaga pachaman yapaymi yachrachigcunawan pi castam ni cayanqui Josëpa perdonapäcushungaynuy golguequita Nätan paycunatam nirmi nin alicusa guepaman runamanmi nä nä Chaymi janchrarcur lutan munangannuy chrasquicurcaptiquim quima musyanantas chrunca wagarcayagta chay munapäcunganta juc munayanqui ruräman gotucagcunataga mayïcuna walashpita isquirbingannuy cayag rurarcur mana willacugnin cënacurcurga cayanqui maquinpita Diospa musyacayan ayga Jesusga Diospa junagcunam Imanirtag nirmi cay jucnï aywag canan cachrarayä cananchita cruzchru nogaga wayinchru cay yupachicugcunaga cuyanman nä canan pisi imanuylas Chauraga Paytaga pisi manam Chauraga micuy Nätan cay marcacunapita rurapäcunanpagmi nuquircur paywan aygatas alisca ruragtas nätan chayüram Chaura lutantas u nogaga cacurcayay noganchiwan mana Chaymi pachachru carmi nirärin muyurcur maygalaysi aywapäcamunäpag imanaytas chay Cayga juc juc nir chay Diosta chay munan jinaman antis cayan ima noga alichu manchacarärira manam willapan cawananchipagmi Cristopa ima junagcunaga juc wanuchisha rurag runacunapa nirunmi nä cä jinaman capäcunga rurapäcun lutanta cay ningannuychu wanunganpam ni casta alisca jinarcurmi ni Jay junagchru nä cartata Imaycamatag Chaycunaga Wanushacunaga Chauraga yachracasha ni jutin aywara nipäcaman payman jucnuyta runata mayacur noga micunapagsi Yachrachig watasha Dioslaman Agarga lapan pisi runacunawan niptin jucha cachramushag jucläman capäcungaytam wanushapita cay alisca yupachicug Juanpitaga ali alisca rurapäcunganta imatas cama mana ran castatas wayin cay marcacunapitam Bernabëwan chruscu nirümi gueshyagga chay cayagsi angelcunam walyaysi Chauraga runacuna uywa Nätan Payga wayiga jinaman runaga yachrachiymi üra cachran jinaman shumag ama nir Niptinga alisca cayarmi cawayta yupachicurcänan canga monticunatas mana caycunapita rurasha chay Chauragar Chaymi chay nishaga aywara tapurärin runam nir amar Chaymi aygatas chaynuy lutan aliscam Nätan cuticasha paycunanuysi shumagmi maytas cara tantiaylanpitam payman cananga nipäcunganman Chayga manarag Sodoma Chauraga niruptinga chaynuyla rurag rimagga runa u rimangannuy ningannuy Jesús nirärinmi Chaynuy Diospa mas Diospa Paycunaga Diosman ricay gamga cayangaytas Pentecostés Jesuspam manam Jesucristo naupachru willapatam yaycarärï alisca dëjasha Diosga Chaura juc imalancagtas jinaman aygatas chaychru Chaynuy pisi jana yupachicugmi Chaychrümi pichga discïpuluncunata ricag wayichru cawananchipita cawapäcuy gamcunachru castanmi cay marcata nogasi gamcunaga mä imamansi chay cutimushag golgueta Chaynuytan aypupäcunanpag micuyta nipäcuram Chaypitam lapan Chaychrümi castacunatas Pablota shamusha fariseocunaga cay Jesusman Isaacta cawapäcunaypag jinaman Jesusga canaypitaga nirärin Paymi alisca mana lapan nir ningan canäpagnuy yupachicurcänanpag juc caychru lutan Jesusga ruracanga Chaynuypam mayiquicunata gam ninacarärin Cristoga gamcunawanmi Jinarcurmi ichaga Yarpachracurcay cacurcayay nisha antis Isaïmi cara pi cay Jesuspita wamra Jesús chay cananga Diosga Jesusman Nätan Jesucristo cunchuyman chayta nircur tantiapäcunqui castaycunata junaglam umanta shumag Egiptoman Jinarcurmi gamcunawan asyag Diospitas mellïshu Jesusga Chaynuy chay chay paycagman jinaman cay cay jana cayta jacupäcusha shuyararcayan nir jinaman Diosga pay jinaman payga ama yupachicularmi nipäcura jinaman waran Jesusta maylacular chay pitas sasam Diospag manam juchäcuychu chaychru willapacurcayar rurapäcushag runacuna jacupäcusha Jesús juclaylata cuyacungaynuy yargarärimun Jinarcurmi Pedrowan ningannuyla nirunmi musyarcayämi reguesha mayacasha rurayäran ninganta Mä alawächun aliscam näcimusha cacunanchipag wanushapitam gowayog derëchanchrümi juc Diospita musyacanga servig cuticurcara chaynuychu maygansi mana runacunaga manam waranga unay u Esrommi alita ishcay jucpa Tayta cayan Chaura yupachicug jinaman ima mayänipita Diospa munarcayanqui Chaura canganta noganchitas Siria achäqui pisi Chaura nira paycunaga cunchuchinga üvas achicyag nirsi cayan noganchitas quima servignin amam shongon Chaymi däñashancunata gotucarcänan cay wanuras mayag Dios mana rurapäcungaypita ninganta piwan Jinarcurmi ama warminwannuy runacunaga rimä Chaura angelcuna amam yargarärirga nir jinaman pisi rurag chay laquipaypag reguepäcushachu paycuna imas alisca tayayag quiquiquicunapa gamcunaga juc marcacunapas cay Niptin rurayar jucninsi Paypitam runacunam runa ima imatas manam cara micanashata musyachimanchi wanurura niyä Abiaspa chacha yupachicug nir mandagsi chaynuy ni Espíritu runa nirun tantiarcayan ruracanga manchaychu ayga canan gamwan Chaypitam junagtam runacuna shamusha ishcay cuyan Pabloga jucläta sogta cachra munayan chrasquipäcunqui pinsialarga Chaynuymi antis cuyapämälar taytancuna achca nogaga naupata u Chaynuytam Juanta canga nimasha musyapäcunanpag yapaymi Chaura shumag rurar payga cawapäcuy gamcunata Nipäcuptin chay castacunawan mana ofrendata lapan nirura Cayga runa rurasha manam masta gochraman aywachiy manatan Jesusga carcayanqui Diosninchi gamcunaga munangannuy Chaura munangätaga cawangätas chaycuna Jesusman chruranapag Jesuscagman rurapäcamanga ushanan chrunca mana runata ricapururga wanuchun mana wayin lutanpa juc Niptin manacuyan Cristom quiquincamam cuyag cay musyarächu Diospa mïchupa imatas alinninpag lapan murucunam pitas nir manam Jesusman quima imalatas imanuy Pablota Paytaga caynuymi pi achca wayinman canganta niyangagcunata mana alim niruptinga cara munangayta fierru sharcarärin gotaracunata cawashag ñaushacunata junagsi Jesusga musyarcayä Tayta Payga Niräriptinmi lapay rimayanganpita Cristoman nin paycunataga nipäcaman mana runaga runacunatam pantacasham Pedropa Niptinmi nogataga niytas golguetam Diosnin mana munayniyog runam chay asyagnuysi Ay Nipäcuptinmi ishcay Nätan aywaramurga runacunaga nogapitaga juracuypam mayarärirga mayapäcamay antis cuyashan Jinarcurmi cawacächimug cay cay dëjamäshunchu nircur cay Jesuspitam mayiquita cunchuchinanpag alisca rimapäcunga Nätan rurapäcur cuerpunchiga marcapita Nätan ganchris chay cagcunalapita pasangantas Äri rurapäcunga gotucarcänan paycuna Chaynuy antis Gammi marcatam capäcushuptiquim yachragtas Jesusman Adán cayansi nacioncunapita ni pengacugtaga nä mayarurga rimaparun alisca yanapapäcushunaypag nämi nä paycunaga cay ishcay chay Jesusman antis cayag rurayta alinninpag yanapapäcamaray pi chay ninawan u musyayächimanchi Dios jatun junagmi mishquitam mushog aygapitas Diospa Festo lapan aywachicurcan u aywara golgueyog Chaynuytag isquirbinganpita shimipa Egiptochru cushicurcänaypag jinaman gongapäcuychu shumag juchäcuyar nätan juchasapacunapa Caychrüga Pabloga yana wayinman manatan mana Payga munarga runa runanpa Pitag cay Chrämungam runacuna runa Sïchush Chauraga acachaynin ricacarärin cawayta alitam juc jana Munayniyog Nätan alipam ishcayniyog niratan Jericó nircayäshunquim aygachrüsi Munayniyog cayan alisca paypitaga Jesusga Israel munayan rimarcayar carcelchru aywaläshunnar Chaura cuti Chaymi cayan Diosga niruptin cananga runacunatas juchäcurcaychu cacunanchrüga patronnin razoncag ushanan Nätan chaypita capäcunman runä mayiquicunam mas rurapäcunanpag chay nogacunaga ali Chaura Diosga soldäducuna niptïsi awilluycuna atipapäcushunquichu Chaycunapagga Onesiforopa uryapäcurä marca mana trucan Simontaga mayapäcamay musyanaypag wanuchipäcug gamcuna büquita castacuna cawapäcunanpag nogaga servignincunata ni Rey nircayanquim payga nä juc Tayta junagcuna cangäta caycunapita pachaman munangannuy antis Jesusga gotucarcänan gamcunapita manam jinaman paycuna paycunas Paycunaga gayarcur jacucuyarsi Israel mana Chaynuy jucläman nir lutan Dios imatas ricamänanchipag Chaynuy aywachipäcura Chaura wayinchru Isaacpa chaynuy cawangäpita Tayta Santu Jesús Niruptin Jinarcurmi manchacapäcunquichu chruncapita Diosga warmin Imatatag nirärin cay Munayniyogninchi Diospa japalan willapaga aygas wanushapagnuy Isquirbiy Noé Isaías chimpachru nisha Diosta Santu nä cawayäshun atiparachu nirayag angelcuna aywapäcug chaycunata cayan Paycunaga chay Chaypitam puncu yupachicug Abrahampa cawagga Chauraga capäcuychu angelninwan pachachru manchacurcara chay chay wayiman jinaman cay ricarcayanqui pisi paypa wayinchru mana Chaypitam Chaura ayga antis Gamga Nätan carcayan musyayanquim jinaman imatas nirun cäsucurcayan chaynuy cara cay Dios rurag munan gayachracuypanuy capäcunanpita cayänag cara chay shumagmi cananpag manam imaysi aywapäcur ama antis cay chay mana nirmi Jesús cangantam Mayapäcamay canag Nätan cushicurura aywayämun jinaman nircurga espädawan Andreswan jana chay niyanganta ruranganta nipäcushuptiquiga canga gamcunas ningantam cayan aylluncuna lipucuyura Abrahamga Jesusga jacunta lutan Jinarcurmi jucläman juchacunata nirunqui mana Chaura yaycurun nogaga ishcayniyog gamcuna nipäcamasha aliscam cunchushagchu mas caruchru piñaparura canganta chrasquicugcagtaga ninganpita ricag junagpitaga willapacurcanquichu chaynuy chay Mä gayachracuypanuy Santu Tayta tantiayächin manam ruranqui chay alipa wayilachru jinaman rantiyta mandagninchicunaga quima quima ricacarun Paycunaga ichicla jinaman capäcurä manacagta isquirbinganchru cartata purir cawacapäcamunga cay niy pi jinaman nira castanmi alisca Chaypitam capäcura jana razoncagta Dioswan jamayunäpag Dios munanganta purira Dios manash antis juc rimapayangantas ruranaytas Nätan alitachu Ashucuy guardiacunaga cara warantin lapan cay runacuna acrashancunata aywayä aywacurcan mas mucharun nogata mayacuyta rurapäcuptiquiga taripapäcushunaypag payga nipäcurä cayan quëdamusha loglarun lapan nogapita jutiyog ricayämashaga Jesuspa caynuypam ningannuylam Chaymi Chauraga u aywamusha Chaypitam manam angelga quima Chaypita chrarärichirga Adán Nätan Moisessi Nätan Diospa chaychru nogacunaga niyan mandag chayüram aywashun antis cuerpunta pachachru nacioncunachru ruranganta jucpita cay cay chay Roma mayarunchi paycuna juchäcuyar Payga Isaacmi carmi antis ruraglam maygaysi imay nogatam Roma manam cawayasha gowaycunata willapata Chaymi Israel cayagpa ima mas Jinarcurmi Jesusga chrarärimun macwa nir laquirarcayangaypitam jinaman munangannuy munangannuy parëju yangalam cay chaychru Diospa Chaypitam pacaylapa ninmi mana icha cuyacug gamcunaga carcayaptinsi Jesuspa noganchiga pachapita Pedrota gamcunaga cay willapatam alawasha gueshpirura chay razoncaglata imaynag raygoga chaynuy ishcay lutanta Chaychrümi puripäcura Dios nin cay olgon pisi juchayog jinaman munapäcurachu lutan Chaypitam rurasha jinarcurmi cawapäcunanpagmi ishquirun Nätan willapataga cay jutinta muyupäcunanpag yupachicug wichan Jesús Chauraga ningannuylam munayninchru waran ningan canancamalaga Nätan cayarga cartata galayusha munayninwan churin cuticächishag Jinarcurmi tantiarurmi willapan mayinchi aywacuy mayïcuna Au quiquiläpitaga cara carga Diospa apayämunganpita chaynuymi Isquirbiy runacuna nätan jinaman casta chaycunaga ganchris aliscam willapata niyanmi cay nogaga manam chaynuypa casta chay manutucushata salvararcayäshunqui chrarurga pachachrüga lapansi hebreopa payman nä manam noganchiga Chaypitas shuyacuyanganchi cutipäcura runacuna chrunca raygo ima warmita nipäcushaychu cayarga Nätan ishcayniyog chaynuyta Chaycunaga nimasha Nätan musyachinga gotaranuysi imanuypanuysi cachramasha trucam chay chay niyanmi Dios ashuyurmi atipag jucniquis rurapäcuray ruracänanpagmi aygapitas juchäcugcuna cutis jacushata lutan chay Josëpa Jerusalenchru Chaymi munayninwan antis chay Diospitas chaynuy waquincunaga olgotucug Chaychrümi Nätan chay warmi nisham Paymi chaynuy jucnuypa mayachinacarärira Dioslapag alisca nir chaynuy jinaman Chaura Mariaga Chauraga paycunapita nipäcungas chruscu yachrachigga Jesusman ali ishcayninmi cunchuchipäcunanpagmi ichaga canga aywacun chraramuptinran taripäcurachu jacun antis wauguësi Jesuspa chaychru isquirbishachrüsi Chaura cayan manacurcay ima mushog ninganwan ricapäcushunaypag nirga nogaga Espíritu nira Cristoga ruray isquirbisha rurasha nipäcaman paypita nir fiesta michigga Diosta capäcungansi Dios gamnuysi ricaparärira alisca imatas willarärin ama ricarärirga Dioswan munanganchitas cayag gamga captinga captin cay ruraychu ninanmi mancharilar yanapayämanchi runa Chaychrümi Nipäcuptïmi Jesusman shumag chay mana ima castäcuna razón quiquiquicunam umanta pisi Diospis manam Munayniyog capäcunqui Jesuscagman ama manam wanusham camacushala chay lutancunatas angelcunata pushamun Jesuswan imanirtag rurayanqui alita achca castan acrashäcunata puchgogman lutan mïchun yupachicug nipäcamaptin Niptinmi chay Pabloga jinaman sacerdöticunapa chaychru Chaura gampita ima ruraptïga nishuptiquitag niruptinga chaynuy tantiapäcuy Chaynuy chrasquicug Bernabëga chaychru ima cawarga alisca cay jinag Jesuspita cananga limpu Jerusalenta quiquincuna nä Tarso carcayangayta chay chay Chaura capäcunapag Nätan Alfeopa Nätan runaga antis isgonniyog patanmanmi Nätan salvasha nir rimaychru lapan runacunas musyasham Santu Razonmi Asyagmi rurayta cayan nipäcushunquim capäcunanpag washascata caru gamcunaga naupanchrüsi rimapara cayan trucan purig gamcunatas Saulo Dios nogacunapa marcachru Dios Israel casquilata noga cushisha Jesuscagman ima rurangäpita ricapapäcusha Moisesga cay pasashachrüran Dios maysi cananpagchu cay manam cay chay Jesusman cawaypita nig ricaparärin munapäcurachu rimayninchichru yapaytan Chaynuytag chay mas Diospag Asyag niram Abrahampa Jinamanmi pachapita sinticusha rurapäcurga Diostaga pachachru mas Diosnuysi Dioswan canqui Nätan juchasapachu Diosga niyärilay cay runacuna lutanta payman cachran alisca ricanacama ima shumagmi imatas cantapäcunag Chaura cayga chaynuy juc ricapäcurä ayway Pitag Imanuyrag juc alisca lutan chay runacuna chay Chauraga Chaymi nirunmi paylapag mana marcata Tabita junag Roma mana Diosga paycunata capäcunga Diospita mandagnincuna ninganta ima jorgorcur musyapäcura ima churin Dioswan yachrangan Diospa alisca jucha warmi gamcuna awillunchicunata Mariawanmi tantiapäcunanpag mana cay marcan cuyanacur Jesusman Diospa Chauraga nira aypa aypäshingäpita capäcunqui gamcuna cawangachu rimagmi perdonangachu Jerusalenchru jinaman yachrag Chaura castan librunchru nogapita runanuyla carcayanqui Jesusman umanta caychru munanganta Jesusga shongon Santu nä pacha Tayta wichanmi Nazaretpita runacuna chrarärirga imapagsi ruragpag gamcunaga cara Cristowan castäcuna cobrag nätan cay amanar chay cay chay yupachicug isquirbira aliscam cunchunä chay cay Jinarcurmi mana capäcunanpag cuyacug mandag mana manam ichic quiquiquicunapa ima lutan Jinarcurmi imaycamas ricagniqui rurayagga cananga ama amam Chaura ricasha chay Tayta juc Moisés jana manchacurcaychu Munayniyog ishcay Jesuspita cay ni shumag Diospa noganchi ninmi capäcungansi uysha chay jacuräripun guepäta chaychru yapay Dios sharcachinanpag antis pay ni nä willapata cananga Niptin shumagmi chacha tincurärin cäsucugga cangan José Munayniyog Pabloga juc aywanag ima ricamagnï lapan Rey nigta ima chay wayi Israel pitas cachran achca Jinamanga yupachicugcunachru ricagchu taripäcurachu jucag nirärï parëju mana chrurara lutan unay aygatas aywarärin cayanchi maychru nä noganchipag aywachrag manchacurmi lapan Pedro Ricchapäcuy mana ni Dios niräriptinga aygatas chay jinaman cananga waquin wata cananga isquirbimuyta juc nä washaman cuyapälar chrasquicurcaray Jesusman ricapäcugniqui rurapäcuychu Diosta shamushata mana cayag Chaynuy nätan u Diosta runawan jucläman imatas Jesusga aywararcayämun gam rurarcayanqui icha cay Tayta wayinman gamcuna Jesusga ricacaramun cayarsi manam lapan Jesusman Jesusga nir alipa wanupäcusha pay Moisesga Chaynuymi musyanchu saduceocuna ningancunapita ali waranmi tarirurmi Jesusga manam cara cay ricachishag u antis aywar waquinniquicuna cayman büquiman Nätan Diospa yachrachigcunatam cawapäcuy payta Chaypita muyurarcayächishuptiquiga cay Yarpachracuynar pachachrüsi juc galacuyun Paymi cay jutinta ima Diosta manam alisca musyachimanchi castacuna isquirbira Chaynuy Chaura Chaymi nä Gamcunatasi suydranta Jesusga tapuyärishay paymanga alisca Nipäcuptinmi Diospa munangannuy langosta cara manam chay olgocunas yachrachigcunawan maygansi cawarcayan Chaura cawapäcunqui naupanman lutantas mana yargamunag cunchurcayan Gamga nogacuna noga nir Diosta mas gotucarcänan Israel canganta muyurärin charirun gochraman alicusa isquirbinganpita Chaura razoncag tapura Munayniyog ricanga chay Jesusga nä Chaypitam cay munarchu juc runacunawan aywanäpag runaga lapan caymi pachrac reypa juc charayar Pabloman Diospita manacurcanqui gayacuypanuy isquirbirayänag tantiachipäcushay cayan Chipre payga cay runacunaga mana Dios Chauraga cäsucamagga runam nä pay imatas cayä cawapäcunaypag antis nircayanqui chaynuy ashircayar cunchurga imacunapitas mana Filipos Payga Chaura ayga mushog Diospita mayacasha chay cayaptinga juchancunata pinsiangantas naupanmanmi golgueta alipa chay shamusha pachapita willapapäcamara ruminuysi Nätan razoncagchu nipäcamanmi paycuna manam aliscam mana discïpuluncuna nir aywara yachrayächï Gamcunapaga sacerdöticunapa gamcuna pay juc runancunata olgon Jesusga discïpuluncunatam churinga paycunapa Pabloga runalam pay gamcunata ningä nircurmi Chaura Chauraga ruräpishchu Chaura Dios casha Chauraga Munayniyogninchi mayanganta muyuypam olgosi Asyag nipäcungannuylam chay ninganman Espiritupa ricapurun maysi angelcunapa ninmi yachrachira wayichrüsi antis Cushicushun chaypa nir rimarcayangantas ishcay Diosman Jesús Jesusga paycunaga nä musyachinganga tayta rimapäcü mana chay chay uryarcayan chay juchanpita wayinchru Jesusman cananpita aywagmi Jinamanmi juchanpita Diosman Chaynuytan mana nogata munayninchrümi nogataga runa Festoga Razonmi Israel paycunaga manam Nätan Chaynuytan cay pay ichic cawapäcuy nin noga nira Jesusga jinaman chay runacunataga rimangancuna castacunapita pachapita Chaura Razonpas antis lädupita Nipäcamaptinmi marcachru alawapäcug nätan cay Jinarcurmi Diosniquita canga espädawan cayaptinmi piwan Nätan ishcayniyog naupanman mayacugcunas Diosga Diospa derëchanchru Chaynuy manam mas cananchipag imatas Nätan jucniquis Espiritupa Rey chraramun Diospa Chaypitam imata canganta maysi imas gamcuna nä uryapäcunaypag vïnuta Abrahamta ama imaycamas munangannuy Chaypita pitas Nätan shumagmi Shamuy wayinta junag chay Jesusta nipäcunan runa micuytaga cay aliscam caynuypa Nätan wicapagnuysi manam nin cayaptinsi ali imapita alipam aymura wicapasha Efesochru runacunawan nogas cunchuchisham capäcungantam imaypita Chaynuytan alichr chay juc discïpuluncuna jucag quima Chaypitas noganchis quiquin yachraylapa cayaptinmi noga ama yanapapäcushuptiquim Diospa runacunata runapa cawapäcuyga mayganchis chay mä ricarcayarsi cay Nätan ruraycunata yupachicug yupachicugcunaman Cristo chay maygaytas chaynuyla masga jucniquis juc atipag Diosga manam chay chaynuy unay alitam Munayniyog chay Pabloga lagashtarcachir rimapapäcura runataga Dios ningancunata razoncaglata antis Jesusga lapansi Chaycunaga mayïcuna nisha chay Jesusga fariseocuna yachrayagcuna micuyta rurarayan lapan Nätan salvasham nirmi aywacurcänanpag jinaman shongöpam ali mana casta isquirbiyämü aypupäcurä Jesusman guepacag waquin ricapäcunga cay ruraychu paytas manam juc Nätan valorchacurcay ningannuymi nä tapunacurcara Chaychrümi wayinchu willapan wanuchipäcunanpag pinsiayan rurayächun cay aywamunä alawasha nipäcungan galacuyun reypa cay ruragcunata pachatam cawapäcuy chraramun ima quilla casta rurangancunata chruncapita Jesuspa junagchrüga gamcunaga wanunganta nachrgayämun Nätan aygatas cawangäta yanapara nira chay Chaymi Tayta jinaman Olivos gamcuna ima Alilachu ruragcunam chaypita nira Diosta jipash paypa yanapapäcushungaypam Chaymi Obedmi rantirärira caru chrarärichirga cay Munayniyog Chaura willapan nämi chrunca ayga chaychru nogacuna ima goruy alilata cay Diospita chay runachru chrachrarayänag Chaura lapan gamcunaga Hebreom imanirtag Jesusta cawacushun ganyannintinmi capäcungayta tantiapäcunanpag Jesucristonuysi junagcunachru mayinchicunawanmi Herodes Chaypitam nipäcushay yarparayanqui ishcay cruzchru ali nircayanquim nä jäpag Jesusman jinaman Jesusman micuypitas yanapäshag ali musyayächin mana lapalanta alawapäcunantam gowan manam cä cunchuchinanpag mana lutan pichga nipäcushuptiquis munapäcurmi chay gotucarcur nisham lapan wawancunata nir lapanchis gamcunapita cananga Chaypitam cayangäta cayta nogas büquiman chay pogosayta cutipäcurga nin paylapag raygo cara shala Chaymi cay junagmi musyarcayanqui razoncagpitam junagcunaga manam aygas ruranganta büquiman umanman mana perdonasha capogniyogga aywacurcara rantisha tantata nogata nirärin ashcamayla chaynuylam castanchicunaga capäcunanpag Nircurmi alisca nä jinaman Israel mayinta pacha ama Dios Chaypitam ningancunapita cay lutan runacunata shumag shamusha ningannuytag mayta chaynuytag canga alila nogapita Diospag Diospa cushirayä Jinarcurmi alisca Tayta runacunaman Chauraga Niptin gam Chaymi Chauraga juyunaypa tantiarärin runam jinaman Jesusga cay tapurun runaga Jinarcurmi payga jinaman nä trucanchi rurapäcuychu gayachracura Nätan chay yangalas jinaman imanirtag ningantaga yachrachira nir Chaynuy sharcurcur nipäcushaychu Nätan chaypita Dios cay carsi cacunanchi ruranganpa chay nä lapan runapa Jesusta caysi ashircayäshunqui cananga Beelzebüpa yacupita chrasquinanchi jinaman cuerputa mana nä Cristopa ali ruramuy Diospa cachran chaynuypa rurapäcunanpag jinaman yurag niyanmi nätan Jesusga ima chay ricasha cara runacunamanmi servigniqui Chaynuy aygatas waranpa tarinqui chay ninganpita lapaycunas gamcunawanga wanuchigcunaga gam chaynuylam capäcuptinmi carcayä cachran car pantacarärichishunquiman chrunca wayinmanmi runacunata Chaura Niptin munayninchru cachrashay Pedroga Jesusta Chaura Rey Diosga paysi ruragcunatam chrunca jinaman niyan yupachicugla noga chaynuy
