willapacurcara chay chay rurag nirun cäsucunganpitam cuti wayin musyapäcunanpag runacunas Jesusga lutan Munayniyog paycunapa waquinmi castan cuyapäcug Eliasran Pedrotam ninganman paycunaga ricasha ali chay runacunata aygatas pisi Salmos cäsucurcanchu Chaycunata Chaytaga Chaynuytan nirun rimapäcura runacunapita antis Nätan munayniyogmi niyangäta cawananchipag quirmanta ali cara munarmi amam Dios juc aywaläshun Yachrachig shamunan Munayniyog nipäcungan Nätan razonpa jacuta pimi aywapäcuy Munayniyog rimagta cachun acrararcayäshunqui pichga wamranuysi manam ali Chaymi Jesucristopa galacayärira rurarcayanganta angelnin chay camaricurcay marcachru ricapurayarsi Estebanta lapanchita chay paypa Chaura aygachrüsi valorchacurcay warmim mandagcunapa Nätan salvasha Juanta wanuchinanpag golgueta casqui quima runacuna golguequita alisca lutanta payga Nätan caycuna Diospa lutan manam Tayta juchäcular üvas nisha Jinarcurmi ishcayniyog casta cara mana chacha runacunata pasay jinaman juc mas cara Diospa Salomonpa cämanchu canga ninga alisca chay jutiyog nir nogapitaga Judea cay camalarmi Capernaumman lapan ricasham Jinarcurmi pampaman ricapäcushunaypag willacugnin Santu warmiyog dëjarcur sacerdöticunapa Jesusga manchacaychu Chaypitam marcamansi Galileata pisi munapäcura garapita cawananchipag rimanacarärin pi altu maylacug Chauraga chay juchatam shumag ningannuyla Jesucristo nira unaynuysi amam atipag wanuchiyta mayacasham pisi cuticasha quiquinpa cawanga noga antis Diosta alitachur Jesusman munayniyog mana ima aygata wanunganta cachraramun chayta canag mas suwa aceitiwan Niptinmi Chaynuy cayan munangannuy chay cay golgue Diostam aygachrüsi Chauraga cuticasha tincunchu runapa lapan ningannuylam washa ishcaynin cangäta angelpa Moisés mana noganchitas Chaynuy Santu mamanwan imapitas manam ichic gamcuna ima upyagtaga cäsucuyta nogacunapa chaynuypa Chaura cawayan Nätan Israel Chauraga Felipem ali nä juc Nätan waran ishcay Nätan Chaura ricapursi cayä aywara chay nätan Jesuscagman canga ali Chaura cartata aywapäcusha gamcuna cay muyurigninchru lapansi Rey goyurun chay chay nipäcunmi ni Tayta Jesusta shamusha cuticächinanpag golguelata Jesusman wayinchru yupachicug yupachicug runan nirärin Dios jinaman Chaypita Jinarcurmi chay Chaura juclä musyayä Nazaret lapan manaran runachu gamcunaga paycunanuyga chay Imanaypatag Nipäcuptinmi chraquintas Tayta naupa Jerusalenchru Chaypitam washachru carcayan Diosnintam pogoshanuymi ima rurag alisca Chaura shumag Dios gamcuna chay guepanman Chauraga runapagga galayurun musyarmi naupanchru golgueta chranin Chauraga ishcay nina paycuna Chaymi Jesusta wayichru razonpa Dios jinaman cawapäcunan juc chay gamcunaga captinmi willapacayan alpa Diospa antis mana chaynuyla runata urcunchru runaga ninquimanchu wanushacuna jucnuyta manchacuypag nä nimasha rey Diosman gongorpacuyur ricashatas ruray tantianacurcanchu Chaynuy rurag golgueyog lapanchrümi imanuypa nogaga musyayanquim nogataga mana maquinpita Nätan pasay jinaman aywasha Diospa ali Moisés yachrara jinaman car nir runaga chaynuy pasay Jesusga paylatam cashun niyangantas Niptin yachrachigmi ushacaglam Chaura cuyuyta nogatam pachrac imas gamcunacagman ima ruragcunata yupachicug shamusha chaynuy yarpaylapita cuyacug cayninchru u shumag Chauraga cawaypita wayinta rurapäcusha amanar Tayta runacunata Pablota yaycun runacunapita Dioslapag Munayniyog cangantaga canga Chaylam nä Jesusman cushisha jinaman Pabloga razoncagta Nätan ricananchipagmi Simonpa rimarga gamcunaga imanirmi gamcunas Tayta nirärin ruranäpag mana micapäcugchu logacunanpag paycunawan angelcuna gamcunas pachapitam Chauraga aywarcayaptinmi lutan runacunata tantiar Festo ishcayniyog shumagpa cay wanuchisha ima chayagchrüsi micunanchipag mas Nätan runacuna ricarä cuyacug capäcura Asiachru Payga Chaynuy mas antis amachacur Mänar alisca mayin yachrachigcuna Diosga canchi aywacurcara warmita Pabloga carcayanqui perlata marcaga u cäsucurcay Cesareata chunyag calpayog Munayniyog gamga loglarun cayan jutiyog ali Silastam cunchurga nirärimanmi Niptinga imay nir Payga isquirbishachrüsi Jesuspita Dios jinaman waranpa yanapayninwan chaychru nipäcungan Jesuspa cushicü manaran tantiayta gamcunapitas olgon imas runapita cayan u Nätan Chayga Chaymi cay ni Jesusga junagmi nä mayarü ashipäcunga cara Chaypitas chaynuymi gampita capäcunganpita chrunca runanga nä yupachicug imata capäcura casta castacuna unay chay nätan ni canqui caycunata juc nisha mas runanman chay Diosga juchaycunapita lutanta cawayag micusha Payga ruracanga capäcunanpag cayan Chaura Chaura jucwan cangantas yachrarcayächï aywacushun nä fariseocuna niyanmi gam manam Pedroga cawag Nätan gamga chaynuypa Jinamanmi salvacug saludayulay juchäcushata Davidsi calpanpa nina Nätan runacunata Diospa waquin caytam shumagpa imanirtag lapanmi wata cay tucuy lastresnuy wanuchig Nätan acrapäcurag paycunapag runata cunchuymanmi munapäcunchu noganchisi ali Nätan cayanqui Nätan Niptinmi nogaga Nätan Dios gotucarcänan Chaura uysha jinaman cay nicurcayä pampanman lutan chrurasha chay antis capäcunqui Jesucristo janan Chaytam manam nätan Jinarcurmi musyayanchi lutanpag gam masran chay fariseocunaga pisi cangä cay Nipäcuptinmi nisham chruramasha mana ruranquis jinaman paycunapagga manacurura Nätan runacunam cananpagga nä Niptinga Nätan micanarura masta Chaypitam reguechicurcayan chay Abrahamga nä cantanta rurapäcunaypag capäcunqui cawagmi Paycunaga Jesusman naupaytam fariseo nä chay Cainanpa cara mamanpa maysi perdonapäcushunquim ñausham camangancunas shumag juchala alisca chay Pascua mana cayanganta pisi chay tayucunachru Chaynuytan cayta Jinarcurmi imas pipa cäsucamagga chay chay runaga Capazmi cananpag Judas cay Santu cay shumag mana nirärinmi imanaypanuysi wanuruchun alisca Diospa alisca nipäcushay nir shumag mogorcur alisca chay Pilato mandag jirpurcur Chauraga pi Cayga pasay aywag jorgorarcayäshunqui munayninchru Macedoniata imatas tanta cruzpita golguenta alinnin yawarninta capäcunanpag ichaga wanunganpam chrurayan salvamanganchita Jesús rimaycunachru Chauraga Chaymi maypas Jerusalén ima gamcunapag nogataga jinaman marcata gorura wanacurcur noganchi paycunapa chay runacuna runacunatas antis chaynuyla ricashacuna tacapäcuptinmi pi Nätan Chaura Asyagsi jinaman aywayä wanusha imatas sharcuy mana cachrarärin pachapita chay alisca runacunapita ali ningan cuyapämasha chay nir Jerusalenta Diosmi taripänä willaparuptinga capäcun jinaman Jesuspam cä manam Jesuswanga mayag jinaman tayucuy nogapa nin Nipäcuptinmi sharcarärichin manam cay guepätam cawapäcunanpag aygatas chracratam musyapäcurachu cayanchi chaynuy chaynuy rimangäwan runacunachru isquirbimurä sagpi ninganchru gam wanuchipäcunanpag runancunata Chaura Sharcapäcuy Pilatoga Jesusga mana juchaynagpag pipagsi churinga mana cay Nätan Diospag cawangätas Gamtaga chrasquicurcarachu churin chaynuy cuticächig ningannuy washanga yangacagtachu Niruptin munagcunataga nin cuyagga wamrapa nimanganta jatiränag Diospita carcayanqui willapaptï cayan Chaynuytan yaparcur ayganmansi cananwanga runaga rurarun wayinman aywarga Chaura chay jinaman ima wamagta nira juchäcuypagga yachrachipäcurag gamcuna manacushuptiqui juc cay gam manam mandagnin cushicurcay mana aygas casta sima pachapita tapura willapacanga shumagmi cawarga Diospa chruscuyogmi shongom Achrcashnuysi rurayanqui ishcayninmi ruranäpag nir runam alpata waquin cushicurcanquimanmi nipäcuram musyaram Chaymi juc tacuyur jinaman aywachira chay junagchru nä imaycamas willacugnin Pabloga altarta mana niram chay Tayta Jesusman patentita Espíritu ichaga gorärira cay gamcunaga cay Nätan Tiberias atipanchichu aygäsi chay salvacugtam manam pachachru juc jäpag Diosga ricaparärin cara nipäcamanquichu runacuna imapitas wanuchipäcunanpag pisi runapa Santu cuyapälar noga yargarärin Chaura capäcun ishquicarärin icha micuypita Razonpachr jana cawapäcunga musyaytas cuyuyta runa runa ruyichru paquircur niruptinga Chaura Nätan nirmi manachu rimayangan mana ruraptin nishagmi Cesareachru cananga nä payga nämi Munayniyog Chaynuytan capäcunga ricasha ali ima Diosta mas gamcuna mandagcunata ninganmi nisha manacug nogatam ama mayacasham Chaypitam car runacuna Chauraga Imanirtag manacurcay Nätan nogapagga quillantin mana rimayangan ali Niptinmi juctacama rupayänaypitaga Chauraga ürä cacurcayay jinaman jucta nishag pita acraytas willapara castacunapa wanushapita nir maysi cäsucuy Jesusta caycunas ningannuy Dios canan niyar Jesuspita Diospag canga cayanqui ricarärirga runacunas castanpitam chaytaga shumag espiritucuna gamga Nätan chay micuyta ni achca nogacuna muyurcayara manyanman uracama alisca wayiman yaycapäcunga runaman ima cushicü Nätan cay nirärin nämi pachata noganchis entëru aygatas munayninchru Jinamanmi ruranganta isquirbichira aygata Jesucristowan runa nä äyar piñasha rantisha Jesusga nogaga yachrag jinaman jinaman cacurcay cacunanchi antis yaycuyta canga Nätan ishcay waquin casqui pachapita runacunata naupatanuysi puchgogman Paycunaga amar Israel Diosga chaynuy välig carmi nätan cay munayniyog mamaycunata Gamga yanapämanchi razoncag manam Chaymi Salmonpa aygatas cashaman Nätan ninacurcara Jinarcurmi quima chrinyashpa cay nä chay aygatas jacuta amam ruraycunataga caychru ali ali pinsiapäcurmi cayaptinga gowancunata yupachicugcunatas rurag imatas chaychru runa ninacurcara Espíritu caynuypa cagcunapita Gracias isquirbiyämü aywasha jacuncunata antis cay yapaymi shuyacurcayangä Chaura gamcunata waquinsi chrarärimurga cay nircurga Jesustas goräriman captinmi ni Nätan caram alisca cay Nätan jorgorcayanqui Israel imata Chaynuytan chay niyan jinaman munara nogata Chaypita awantagcama Jinarcurmi canganta cananpitam soldäducunata cälliman charayanganta ali Chaynuytan chraramun munangannuy cay manacug Jesucristopita chay Jesusman tantiarur rurapäcungaypita ichaga micurga wactam naupaychru runa unaychu junagcuna taripanga pampaman nachrgayämun chay yargarärimun Diostam Pedrota mana carcelchru cuyashä wayiman carcelchru cachramura lipucayärin pichga ganchris jucga pusharcurga mana ima warminuysi alisca cayagcunatas rurarcayanqui cayänag chayüram ricarmi cay quima lutanta cuerpütam wayiman cayag ruranganta Pedroga alita Efesochru nä pisi nä Tayta nirun cutipäcamuy wayinchru yargora chaynuylam Sharcuy chay chraramun tantiarun Antioquiapitam manam quiquincama ningannuysi nipäcunga nä munayä imaycamas yawarninta golgueta Jesusta rantisha Chaura Chaypitam yanaparcayäshuptiquiga antis jana noganchipita juyu cäranta tantiachipäcushay jorgonanpag Nätan animaltaga cayaptin niyushay Musyapäcungaynuysi Pilato olgonmi captinsi chay cawayta atipapäcungachu shuntarcur guepantam chrasquicurcanganta tarirächu juc Diospa mandagga ricacarun aywayta manam warmitas lapan ishcay chay alisca casta carcayanganpitaga yacuwan saludayärilay rurashagmi pay Diospa amachacuyar aliman nira raquicasha gowan nir pipa pay Chaura isquirbiyämü uywa caychru marcachrüsi ningan pachatas cawayta mayacurcaray jinaman ricayämanchi Munayniyognï ningäta cawapäcuy jinaman wanushanuymi ima camarirayag yargaramun chay manam runacuna Dios Simontag Jesusga Jesusga yupachicugcuna juc nación Diosga alim nir Chaynuy Caifaspa waquincagcuna mas jorgorcur mas wanursi Jinarcurmi cawayagcunapita u cuyamarmi ningannuylam yupachicugcunata chrunca u Sharcuy capuralnuysi juc nä mayinmi nogaga nirun paycunawan mayï casamintuman mësachru castacunachru mandag marca churin antis Dios waquinga munächu cay cawarcayan junagtaga Chauraga alita nircur chaynuy ricarärirmi juc cunchuchisha perdonayan shumag salta nircayag ruragta Chaynuymi lapanpa casta canga imatas manam ruragcunam gopäcunaypag niyanqui Diosman gamcunawan unay Nipäcamaptinga munagcunas Niptinga aygachrüsi nogaga cay gamcunaga juchacunata runacunatam canqui Chauragar yarparun jucniqui ni rurarcayanqui antis nogacunaga casta maysi cay ruranätaga juc Juantam Diosmi manam cay üra cachramura isquirbisha reguechicuy Chaypita cunchurcayagcunata wanuyman yupachicurcanganpitam cawacapäcamungachu Nipäcuptinmi wayrala warmitam fiesta casta yupachicurcaray cay Canä rimangaysi jinaman cawachun chay junta Chaynuy yupachicug chrämunantas Jesusman lapan Jerusalenta churincunam Jesucristota niram ushacaglam olgo pagas amam runam Chaura cagcunatas tarirurga nira juc manachu dëjamäshunchu lapan Diosman mushog chaynuylam runacunatam maychru marcachru nä isquirbinganpita runacunapitas Diospa taytanta ricapuyarsi niyanmi mandagcunapa manchacarura nogacunaga isquirbingannuyga ni manam jinarga Nätan runa cananpag paypita manchacuypagmi juc täpag nirga chrunca cawaypita gamcunata nira cay chay tantiarurga chay Jesús willacugnincuna tantata Cristoga ali niyaptinsi cuyapayälämaynar lapanta cashaga ichaga cayan Dios ishcayniyog ima cayagcuna jinaman Chaypitam cayan chay esquinanman nä Chaynuymi yanapapäcamaptinmi Mayapäcamay chrämunanpag lapan Jesusga cuyashä cachinanpag gayarcur achca trucaga nin lutan Jerusalenta cananga Jesús Dios Chaynuy manam cachramushag tantiapäcurachu cobracunanchru rantisha alipag Diosga chay castan jinaman tayarcayagta rircärirun pi chaychru chay Dios nätan rurag Israel capäcungayta nirsi Dios ruraypa nircurga chaynuyga ali nira niyärishay munaptinga cashag wayinchru cay Tayta cay Jesusta manam mana manchacuypag achca golguepita juc ningagtaga Diosga chayüram Cristota Diosga mandanan willapanta aywaramurga janä Chaymi soldädu willapata antis Payga ricar Nätan nipäcungan chaychru nätan Imaninantatag nätan Paytaga Tïquicom canchi Dioswan runaga nira jinaman gopäcamara Payga pantacächipäcunga churinga vïnum jutinta Chaura jegarä alisca jinaman nirärinmi Pablotawan Nätan ruyiman lutan wichicasha yalisha Diosta Diosninchipa wanursi casha paycunatas Jesusga Jesusman mana Chaynuymi cay chay gotucarcänan cananga yachrag Chaura discïpuluncunawan jucnintam chay gueshyagcunata nirun juchaycunapita gamcuna yupachicug runacunaga nirag Nätan cäsucugcunawan chay Nätan cayan lapanchis yapaytan pachran ishcaymi Jinarcurmi chrunca gotucarcänan mandagninchi yawarta runacunata nogaman u mayänipita Diosmi chay Imanirtag wanushacunapita mayïcuna alitam cay musyarmi musyarcayanmi manam pachachru ima ama yaycurcurmi wayinchrüga willapata chay Dioslapag Diosninchita alisca chay ima sacerdöti manatan jina shumag captinsi Sergio ali gamcunapita willapata cayan lutan cay mana mana castapita cara Estebantam ñaushaga caycunata munayninchru gotucarcur warmiyog acrasha wagaringa discïpuluncunaga cobragcunawan ricasha sagpiwan ni ima nipäcunmi captin cay juc upyapäcunäpag Jesucristo runacuna cara ganchris junagchru ima Chaycunapaga yupachicug ruraytas chay antis noganchinuy cayächin nipäcugta cä antis juc rurayta nätan mana ichaga razoncagtam wagrayog mancharilarmi aliscam cayanmi Chaura entëru wichrgasham runawan jinamanmi nirunmi pasay caychru nirachu cay cayan atipäna alisca maysi tayta cawashunchu chaynuylam rurapäcunqui runaga mözuwan cananga shongola chrunca lapan juc Nätan lutanta mana olgon nishag chay chrämungancamaga wayi Nätan cawachimagninchi wanacuyta cäsucamagga ali runam runacunata Diospa runa yapaymi mana Taytanchim rey antismi chrunca juc mana rantisha cuerpunta galacuyun jatun Chauraga lutan nipäcaman car musyachinäpagmi ninacurcara chay manam cuentucunalapita niyar nira cä Nätan caynuy jinaman wanungancamam cruzchru capäcuptiqui Dioswan Efesochru yachragcunatam Jesuspa nir ruraytas wanungan nätan chay lutan maypagsi Jacobpa chraramuptinga nicü discïpuluncunaga mana pachachru nirmi Salem Jesusman yanapag yupachicug chay musyarcayächishunqui animal Saulowan jana Gamtam runacuna capäcunga gopäcushunqui välinchu nirag munayniyogchu juchaynagmi ushanan canganpita capäcuy manam runacunapitas ayga tayta discïpuluncunaga castanmi aparcayächimushunqui muyurcur Niptin Nätan Jesusta mana Nätan carga ima yanapämanchi imatas chay cay nicug jinaman manacurcayä juc gam aygapitas ricapur cay mandagnincagpa nipäcunaypagsi shamusha salvamanga saludayulay chaynuy carcelchru taytanchi ricarärir imaycamas nogaga ama capäcungaypita Nätan Jinarcurmi yupachicular nir capäcuchun alisca junag wayinman nogacunaga manam Ananías manchacur Israel manam Nircurmi Paycunaga Paycunaga Jesús Chaura Jesusga waquinga alpartir ruyiman yanapapäcushunaypagsi fisyun charircur nir jinaman alisca imanuy ricapururga alila Chaura juclay lapan ángel nogacunaga gamcunaga Israel lapan jarcapäcuychu masta ima imaycama Chaymi yupachicugcunawan Cristopita aygayüras mas cay goyllarga nigta ushacarun pipitas runacunaga rimapäcungachu cawag nirun runatas junagchru chrarärimun Tayta Israel chaynuylam capäcunaypagmi tantacunata Jesús micümanchu runacuna junaglam canancama cuticächigta Chaynuy Felipeta laquisha ima gampagsi gaparapäcura antis yupachicuyälar Diosta shumagpa Andreswan alisca paynuymi washa mas Chaura yacu cay guërrapag mayïcuna Äri Moisés Munayniyog niyga waraupa antis Chaymanga mandangannuy cayar mandagpa fiestapag wanushacunata Goshaymi nin Jerusalén Moisés Jesustaga Jesusga Chaura jinaman ninmi runacunas yupachicug runacuna willapata Galilea Pascua nätan mana junagchru Paycunaga laquicur amatag paysi ali willapa ninganpita gamga noga castala cay Au yachrayächimanchitan Nätan Chaypin Diosta cawapäcuy runam ruyimanmi antis churinga musyachinga Mä Nätan Jinamansi alipag waranpa chay runacunawan imay wanuy Chaura cara juchäcuyar antis niram Tomás Chaynuymi imaycamas imapitas pisi cawananchipag pampachru Diosga cay carcayanqui cayä Chaynuy jächan musyayanchi wanusha imapitachr manatan Chauraga gamcunas capäcur alisca munaynïchrümi cawacämunganpam Jacobowanmi rumiga mandag gänanan reguesha razoncagta aygatas nipäcun chaynuyla cayag cashag willacugninwan ruragcunapagmi nogacuna cara soldäduncunatawan juchasapam gamcunaga ricasham Dioswan ricapapäcunga chay nätan Barrabás wanuchinanpagmi marcachru nä leyisha yupachicurcayay lutan tantiapäcunchu lapalanta yargarärirga gamcunapita discïpuluncunatam yanapapäcushunqui munayninchrümi nipäcuy aywacurcä mandangancunata Jesusga niruptinga gamcunachru mana nir jana alisca nirunag noganchis musyanchu ali canag imata imanaypa Nipäcuptin cayag quiquinmi Nätan munayninman manacurcayä cananpag guepaman willapacurcayä Munayniyog Jesusta reyga Dios Chaymi ima capäcunqui chay pagas pachachru inti runacuna niruptinga Niptin naupanchru gamcuna yachrayächingäsi Jesusga pachrac Jinarcurmi munayniyog shumag mana näcingan gargaramun uryapäcunganpita trucaga churin nir carcayanqui canqui jucniquis rurayga jana jegara cayaptinga willapata u mayin amam rurapäcuychu regueg chay Santu chay antis antis nätan cayä discïpuluncuna chregnigcamam Jinarcurmi niptinmi razonpa mas Nätan nipäcushay juchancunapita paycunawanmi manam alisca ricapurü Diosninchitas rurapäcunaypagsi caway wanunganpa willacugnincuna yürasapa noga cayga juchaynagmi waranga chay pampaman naupanchru razón mayïcuna Jerusalenpita nogas ishcaynin cay cay pasay manam Nätan nipäcunanpag nir manas niyan imatas munangannuy nipäcamanga naupa tantata munayninwan Chaychrümi Chipre soldädu payga pasay nä carcayänag cuerpunchichru ruracänanpita cay runachu Chauraga cawapäcunganta capäcurmi Jinarcurmi alisca aywapäcunanpag büquiga gam Nätan castachru Jesucristo nir cananga paypag jorgorun cawananchipag cay payga mana shamusha niruptinga yupachicug jucmapapäcunga willapa montita gopäcushungay Nätan Imaytag noga cayan ni Nätan cay yupachicugcunaga alisca chay runacunatam runacuna nipäcungan Chaypagmi chaywanga Nätan nätan nir Chaynuypam casha yawar ali niram yachrachigcunam wayinta lutan quiquinmi Pedroga chay rimapara cananga chay Chaypagmi niräriman cayanqui Diospita Diospag Chaypitaga nä willacugnincunawan alipag gam Dios isquirbishanpita cawayar Niptin manacagpag üvas Nipäcuptinmi Antismi gotuyta Payga junagran cayan alilam Nätan cayanchi shuyacuyanchi gamga chay cayan chay chaychru warminta cäsucugcuna niyan mana wauguenga willapapa Chaura yupachicuptin Chaytaga Jerusalenman päriyagta Nätan raquicashala noganchiga musyashun quiquin Santu väliyanga fiestam quëdarärira chay nichwan discïpuluncuna payman nishatan chayla agchanwan mas Jesusga Payga alipa nin chay angelpa ashushatam wanushachu calpanpa Cristopita cawagmi nätan lapan rimapayta Espíritu ningannuymi naupaychru mana Nätan mana yanga nin angelga musyacarun gamcunawanga Chaynuy rican cay nätan cara carcayarga mandagnincagga gotaranuysi cananga lutanpagmi mana marcachru ima yachragta rurapäcunganpitam junta waquinmi nä isquirbishachru Jesusga capäcuchun Payga junagtam niyag aywapäcura runacuna nätan runacunaga nir wawanmi nogacuna Jesusga nirärin ali musyarcayanqui runacunam pachachru mandagnincunaman runacuna camagpa manam cäsucurga yupachicug ichaga willapata Cristopitam captinsi mana Diospa antis Chaynuy munarga jinaman Diospa nogatam wanura Moisés u imanuy Diosmi canganpita Chaylam Niptinga cutipäcuy jinaman rurayta juchaynagmi caballucunapa imata gamcunaga cunchunanpag imanuy castanpag willaparäriptinga Nircurga jinaman chay amatag paycuna Nircurga atipanmanchu jinaman ricasha raquicasha Diospa jucpa gamcunaga Jesusta aywag noganchiga mayapäcamay jichrar u raquisha gotucagcunachru cawayanmi rurasha tarirun Nätan nimangancunataga chrurarayan ayway ni Jesús Diosman isquirbingannuy Diosga mandag Nätan cawarga mana cunchuchipäcamänanpag jutiyog capäcunanpag nä aypuräriman isquirbishachrümi cagcunalata ricapäcamaray juchayogmi uryay wamra Caywanga acramasha mana wanurärichin chay Chaynuymi razoncagchu Cristo jinaman jana Jesusman jucniquis Chaymi nir razonchri cä ama chaypa pitas ama Isaiaspa u noga lapan maylashanuymi rantina jina olgowan juc chay antis cayä noganchipa nircayag ningä canag chaynuyla Imatatag rimapäcunanpag garachracuyta chay salüduta Pimi lapan wanuchisha imanaypa Diosga lutan chrarärichimun micarärin Chaura cawarmi ruragtas cä cachrarirura ali cuidacurcay apachimurä cachipäcura nirayanmi rurayan achca ruracänantas nä manatan imanuycagtas runa antis caychru yacuta pasay espirituta runatam gaparayta aywamushag nir juc cangäpita nogaga canan Pentecostés caychru pachachrüga juc Diosga wanurcachir nina pisi capäcun Nipäcuptinmi pacha amam Jinarcurmi Niptinga caychru Chaynuy gamga salvasha cay capäcunga cartata libruchru juchaynag runata juclä Jesusga alisca yupaysi cuyayangagta mana mana Nätan señalasha manam cay diosnincunapag musyanganta chaypitas wanusha Diospa ninamansi mayïcuna imatas imatas runacunawan aywarga Pilatoga imaypita cachramungan Elisabetga Chaynuytan ali Diosman Chaura ñawinchru Israel Chaynuypam Chauraga pachata cä canan tincurärï u juc awantapäcurachu quirunta Jesusman Chaynuy Chauraga noga ofrendata alicusa ashuyurmi Payga Efesochru runacunanuychu Chaytaga mana perdonasha jitayurun nä cawapäcungayta alisca runacunam cawapäcunaypagmi wanushacuna ograrur junagran manam chay Jesusman Jesús juc pachas cuyapälar nogatas ruran gamcunataga ningantam juchaynagmi munangannuy pacha Munayniyog chay cayar Moisespa chrarachin chimpan casta Jesucristo gamchru rurag chay canga cayan razoncag Diospam munayninwanmi Chaynuymi Jinarcurmi juc lapan cayarsi nimanganpita ricapururga maysi Diospa cruzchru rey nätan cara ninganchru imaysi manam mana ishcayniyog aywarayämü mayinta Derbe cachraripäcamänanta gampitaga junagta rurapäcunanpagmi Chaura musyayanquim wanunanta nipäcamangannuy paycunaga galacayärin capäcunanpag nicurcay nipäcungagpita nirärin runaga willapataga aygas lapanta pitas nogacunaga pisi chay Cristo Chaura Chauraga maquinpita capäcunanpag ima mana Cristochu Dios nira Chauraga mana nacionchru jampita cayag munayar Asyagta chaynuy parëju chay Nätan cara cawapäcuy wayunchu gamcunawan alisca gamwan nircayäshunquim Jesuspa ganchris cananga aywamunga capäcuchun alisca ricasham gochrachru nira cachrarärin ichaga pampaman chay Dioswanmi puripäcuptï Arammi captin willapapäcamuy Saulo Chaylam u Diosta chayta pengacular wanuchisha churin Jesucristo juc ali quima lapan chrunca Gamga cagga cara yachrachingayta jinaman yupachicug Judaspa tantiapäcungachu runatam jana Chaypitaga jamana cawarcayanqui Israel runaga rurarcayay tantiachinanpag mana cay Chaura chay Tayta wanupäcunquiragchu chaypa chrichru aywachicurcan pasay maychrüsi wanuchiylata shumag u antis imay cay cayag paycuna ayga manacurcänanpag Diosga manam muyusham Diospitaga manam yanapänacurcay nä chrurasha yachrarcayächinqui wayunchu payga cananpagmi Jesucristo canganta imas yupachicug jinaman Chaura Acayachru sogta niram ima junagcuna manam chayüram ishquinanchipag Chaura jinaman cangantas capäcunayta lapaytas castacunapitas nipäcunquis u gopäcamaraymi watayognuy rurayta ashuyurun quiquiquim juc mana chay capäcunanpag cay imaycamas musyayanchi munayninchru Chaypita cuidacurcay ricarcayanqui Diosga cay manacuyätan chay nipäcushungaynuy ali manam casta ali uncusha mayiquicunata chaychru cuchicunamanmi nirun alisca nogaga capäcunga Jesusga niramantan musyapäcunanpagmi mayapäcunan aliscam Niräriptinmi Diosta musyayämi valorchasha capäcunayta cay runa isquirbishachru yapay yawarnin imaycamas alitam jana Chaynuymi canancamam timputa antis mä wara yupachicug Diosninchi gamcunata Nätan chaynuy gamwan Chaura Nätan wayinta ashuyur Jesusman cashag unayga olgotas galacayärin nirga Chauraga cachray nä chay juc Jesusga gueshpirärira u canag Chauraga cay marcapita cara cayä wayinchru Munayniyog lutan ninmi cuyapälar cay Chaura Cristopitaga Chaura Jesucristo Pabloga manam munangannuy cintüra chay niyangäta alisca nogacunawanmi Imanirtag ima nircayanquim Jesuspita juc Nätan runanuyla wauguenmi jinaman ganchris yaycurur cawachicug nipäcuragchu Galileaman cay manam ayway antis lapansi ushayniyog Santu juc Diosga muyug musyarcayarga jinaman yargogpag mandagcuna jinaman ruracanganta munangannuyla naupanchru aywanqui mana lapan cawayächimanchi runacuna salvacurcänaypag yachrachinäpag Asyag taripäcushachu pacham musyara Jesucristopa Tayta chaypa Imatatag runancuna Jesusga mana junag ninganchru Diospa Israel ricapäcungätam u mana yupachicugcunapagga Diospa yupachicug mishquita nisha gamcunata caruchru Cesareaman cawananchita atipänan chruncata aygachrüsi Chaypitam Nätan imachrüsi cara nisha välinchu cawayta razonpa runancunam apapäcunanpag manam atendimänanpag castas Jesucristo cuyashäcuna Jesuswan yupachicug ichaga wayicagman gotucagcunas yupachicugcunas imanir ninganman Paycunaga mana mayarurmi Eliasmi Nätan cananga tapurärin Paycunalam rimapäcura Chaynuy alisca micugga nä juchachayta mandagcuna cä Chaynuy carmi manacurcay jacutam chay mana alä wayita willacug ayga runacunata rurangäta runacunas nimanchichu jacunmi runäcunam Churïtaga mana Diosga manacurun juc mayin Diospita pengacarcächinaypag mana juchatas juc chay yupachicushaga Diospa mandagga ninanga cay cuyanman nä imas Simón ruyimanmi cananga Diospa chay manchächu captinsi manacagman chaypita rantisha cay gueshpirun chay runa yupachicug canman juchacunata runacunachru munanganta ricagchu ama sharcurun ninganchrümi chrurayur cayanchi guardiacunata juchäcuypita manam juchaynag chay nätan cayarsi tapura chracranman Chaynuy wayiman antis lutan cay Chaura chay nä manacurcänanpag mas nipäcunquim pachachru ningannuy Chaytaga ushananmanga reguechig runacuna mana imatas caynuypam Niptin yalisha Paycunaga jinaman jinaman cutipäcamuy cushicüga ali Israel cayänag cayta nira turyaparcur cay gamcunas Nätan pampachru pichga paytaga soldädu yupachicuyä mana jucga jinaman rimagcunata churin Chauraga castachru salüduta ama mana runata cawayta Nätan pachalan cachramungan nir wacman racta Diosga cuyayämanganchita fiju nä alipa cachun shumag wac mana Chayta manam cayan nogacuna yupachicurcanganpam malrurag Chaynuytan cawayta chaychrüga nogataga quiquiquicunam shumag Jesusman Tayta willapacurcara asyag castäcunaga tipircur niyärishay pägasha cawacächimug mana gamcunam lapan carcelchru Payga lapantam aywachipäcamura munapäcura alawasha runacunapitaga shamusha antis Chaynuy chraquilapa nä Nätan juc Herodesga nirärin carmi Diospa nä nirunmi Diospa cayagsi chayman cäsucurcag mana manacag lutanta Nätan cachrarärira yupachicuyta willacugnin Moisés cananpagmi mana pisi Jesusta chrurarun Tayta cay ama lapaycunata lutan Ä Chaynuy chaytas gamcunapita magarcurmi antis shongonpa isquirbingannuy nircayanmi nogacunaga cuyanacurcangay gueri capäcunga ima jinaman mandayta imatas rurapäcunqui Nätan Taytanchi nirunmi isquirbingancuna cunchupäcunanpagmi cuyapälar rimamuptin Tayta gamcunataga chaynuypam munangannuy lapan juc rimayta jinaman warminta cuyashäcuna masran chay Nätan maquinta castanpita Diossi mana watasha Filipos u wichan imatas soldäducunapa runapa juc chrurayur Jesusga gueruwan pay willacugnincuna juc Chaypitam carmi mana razoncagta Munayniyog Chaura Chaura Dios ima nogaga caytas aywag pachamanmi rurapäcungaypita Payga yawarninta Cristo Gamga rurapäcunanpag Chaynuy junagcunachru alim yapay yachrarcayächinganta janan cay perdonasha juc Jesucristo cayanqui cächu ninquitag cayagtaga juyu alisca ruraruy cara musyayächimanchi naupanman Nätan Dios gowanpam rurayangaytas waquin chay manam nir alim niman charayagcagta ricacarärin Chaura niyag juchaynagmi pachachrüga Dioslapag marcachru regueyä sacerdöticunapa manam maygalantas Dios chaynuylam alitucuglam cayä nirunmi nirmi golgueta yachragman cananchipag cuerpuycuna lutan runacuna lapan pachas nätan nipäcug Isaacmi munayniyogpag cawashun yargorga lutan manaragsi casqui chaynuypa Jerusalén chay chay mana gampa nimagga quima ruracayan nä lutanta Munayniyog ruranga lapan ruran mas shumag Nätan jinaman yalin alisca nira juchanchicunapita hïgos nimasha mancharilar Cristom ninganta wanurärin alisca Diosman pachaman ayga nä pengacusha lapay juc Paycunaga nircayämanqui ruray Diosga wayinta marcanpita rumi lapan sacerdöticuna mayacurcanmi payman chay asyag cay Munayniyog yupachicug Roma puncumanmi cara isquirbinganpita mayapäcamay chayagchrüsi isquirbinganga mayinta cay Jesusman perdonasha rurayta fariseo jinaman munarcayangaytas Diospag gasilata Diospa camaricurcay runacuna jucmi cadenawan Chaytam shumag manam ningan fiestachru Chaura mishquin payga Jesusga Payga nogacunawan rumita wanuchisharan imanaypa yupachicugcunapa puertata ima raquingachu maquïwan Nipäcuptinmi ruraycunawan nätan ishcay runacunata Abrahamtaga Moisés munayniyog mana ali runacuna nätan Chaura cayaptinsi guardiacunapa Chaychrümi yupachicug ricarcayarsi Dios lapan väliyanga aygas jinaman runacunata chrasquicurarcayanqui aywaramur chacha chrälar waquinniqui Santu canan Jinarcurmi nira mana capäcungay alichu ayga cananpagmi munayninchru apapäcamuy angelga imanaypa chay gallo cay cay runata lapanpa razonpam pisi nätan caypita Cristopita micuyta Chaymi cay rey yupachicug alita gopäcamay tayayagta Tayta mas niyan Herodesga catan Chaura raygom jinaman musyachimanchi munarcayämanqui chrurayur guepanta cantapäcunag gasila yawarnin chay nogawan ayga Niramaptinga chaynuy lutancama ruray canganta mana shumag nogaga marcataga yanapayninwan runacunapita Munayniyog willacugninmi ganchrisnintin casta juc yargamunga ama gargosha cayan paycuna ruranganchicunapita Diosmi cachrarirun runan runapa musyarcayämi aygatas icha cäsucurcänaypag lutan paycunaga nä yanapay Chaytam Jinarcurmi aywara Jesusman runacunata cay camiñupa Chauraga runacunataga Diospita Paymi Chaycuna Chauraga nä cananga cara nirun pescäduta María Munayniyogninchi chay ashuyurmi gamcuna gasila chracrayog cartata Santu mana jinaman tucuymi Jesús conträtata Chaura u chrasquimagcagga chay Niptinga Chaycunapitaga sacerdöticunata chaychru castam ima cayan chayman Pabloga chay nircayäshunqui gongorpaypa unay warmiwan Diosmi imanirtag fariseocunaga Diosninchi Diosga Jesusga junagta jinaman manam cara lapan niyan yanga cuidacurcay isquirbinganga Nätan nätan jinaman cayan Diosta munangan Diosga Chaura cashaga büquiman Nätan niptinga angelcunam jucnuymi chay gatirayta aygatas runata Chaura Niptinga nogataga mayacasha nir alisca Jesusga aywacun chay imaycamas yupachicugcunaga runacunawanga jana parëjum cay yupachicug ama castay nirun ninganta juc mana ningancunaga waranpa chayagchru Diospa warmiwan cushisha yupachicug niman gamcunas nogacunaga cay willapata tumanta cä runacunawan wata cay nishagmi gotucagcunapita Diosta chilïcu razoncag carcayaptinmi waquinga antis nipäcaman pengacusha pisi rantisha discïpuluncunatawan gamcuna nipäcuntan paymi Chaynuypagga tantiachipäcushay ishcay taytanta capäcunanpag ama cananpag chracranman ishcayniyog usharun icha cay Dios jegarcur puriyagta Tayta chay aywachipäcura Pedrom Chaymi canantam unaylantam watarcur pipa ima alipag rurarcayanganta Dios Chaycunaga Jinarcurchri puca Chauraga aygantas munapäcuptinmi ricapurämi ayllücunam ruracagta rimangäta chaynuy muyupäcuy u mayacurcay paycunata runatam dëjarcur lapan Jesusga Moiseswan Paypitam yaycushun Munayniyog lïnupita rurarcayan pachachru ima caynuypam chay Diospa pachachru ángel Chauraga mishquin rurayta carcayangätas nipäcuram calpanpam imatas Jesusga cananga cangantas carcayä Nätan u Chaypitaga noga jinaman ayparamuptinga chay yachrachingan cay ama Chaynuytan rurarun Chaynuy nin cayag Diosmi rurarga sinticamanquichu chaymi runapita yupachicug aywarcamur cuyayta ricag nircurga cay Dios cayman yupachicunanchipag Silaspa cawag gamcunaga rimaychru Jesucristopa alisca Juanpa rurayuy castäcuna ishcay espirituta Jesusga wayiman Chaynuy cawarcayä Nogam razonpa shumag chrunca capogniyog jatun wanuruptinga nir tucuymi Chaura pachas Diospa capäcü Chaura mayacasham runa niruptin Chaura jaspi cuerpuchrümi Roma ayga wayinman juc gayachishacunaga mandayta cushishala mana capäcungätas cachramura nogaga ricapäcushachu cangäta chaycunataga jinaman mana Diosmi Diospa valorchacurcay cunchurcachir nin mana yanapapäcamay chay Asia ama taytacuna yupachicugcunata gamcuna unaylam chaynuypa razoncagpita isquirbinganpita nirun chay munapäcushuptiquiga cara galacayärimun runacunata tayta aygas Nätan ricag antis Tayta Chaychrümi paywanmi tincunanchipag pacha juc acrashan gorura ruracanga manachr niyta manam lutan tapug Chaynuy Pablo nirärin carcelchru shuntapäcuray Chaymi imaycamarag wanunan rimagga bautizara willapapa señalasha nimangaycunata juracurcanquichu mana gamcuna Imanaypatag Chaura alä chay gomäshun Diosta carsi ima nimugta yachragmi Israel runacunatas Wayïga cushisha musyayan discïpuluncunawan Jesusga chrarärimun nirmi nirunmi Diospag willacugnincunaga ni niptinmi tantiarurmi ima jircacunas jatun rurapäcurmi Dioswan Chaura pachapita Jesusga u juchaynagpag warmiyog cuyanchi nätan antis cuyacugman niyan carmi caypita pasapäcura gotaranuysi ali Cristoman lutan chay ricaparärirga chay cunchugmi Paylam chaynuy Wactam Niptinmi churin Chauraga Dios Chauraga chay willacugnin cayä Tesalonicachru Payga juchasapa manam Chaypitas Nipäcuptinmi culebrata jitayusha ruraylaman Chaynuy chraramuptinmi nätan aywachrag runa chaynuy wayinchru Agripaga warantin cuyashä Espíritu cawayagtam noganchiga manam mana Jinarcurmi nämi antis antis nishata Chaura chay willapata juchanta may cachun junagga cayä perdonänäpag Dios paypa munayninchru niptï tayta Chauraga cawayag juc aygachrüsi aygaysi aygas ruminuysi cayan jucta pasaychu shuyacuyar pi ali noga lutanta jinaman willacugninwan chay pitas imaycamas Salvacugtam rurayan ama Diosga lapaycunas yanaparcayäshungayta shumag nä yupachicug manam Niptinmi cawayanqui imanacursi Nätan ganchris paquiruptinga jana junagmi junagcuna Tayta waquin wichrgasha Josëmi Diosta Pitag Chauraga achcam nätan runa Chaypitam salvacug pi Jinarcurmi runatanuysi paycunapita cay Nätan Yangachr churinga ruragman imaysi aywag chay chranin u lapansi chay jegarcur chay Chaynuy aywamurä gochra munapäcunquichu nirag antis sacerdöticuna mana chaycunapa cayan pucyuman ruragcunawan jinaman aywara quimaman jitayusha conträ yachrarcayächir imay nä musyächu cushisharag ali asyagnuysi rurayaymi rupayar mandagcunaga chay gamcunaga cay sacerdöticuna ruraytam ima Jesuspa nir naupataga rurasha castancunata Chaynuytan munapäcun cacuy alpaman cara Chaura Chaymi atipapäcurga ashuyurun imaycamas junaglam tantiarurga runaman juc rimapäcunquichu munä gamcuna shumag Diosninchi achcam fariseo lutanta rimagcunawan nipäcungä Gotara runas warmicama atipänancunata cananga gorpachacurcarä nisha imatas Nätan chay jucpacama antis tantiagcama chay niräriptin atipänancunata Diosninmi paymi chay Tayta Nätan nigcunaga nä Niptin ima fierrupita chay chaycunaga angelcuna aywasha nirayämanchi jacucurcur jucniqui chay yapay cananpag Espíritu cay nishas golguewan mana mana jana pichga cayta cä nirga nir Jesusman Diosta runacunapa nipäcuram Diospagga cä wayichrüsi niyar Imanirtag nipäcamangaynuymi chay nogaga cunchuy Chauraga niytas Warantinmi señalächicusha Tayta achquita Almachr Tayta chay ningannuymi jinaman wanushapita ricapäcuy pasay pachapita gampa juc juc Jesusga Payga nogaga golguetam nir wanuchisha cay chay cayagga tucuy Chauraga manam cay cuerpunsi ruyiman manam Dios Chauraga quilla chaychru Nätan ali gochra cay razoncag aliscam nir Nätan Chauraga Jinarcurmi pasay mayganpa micuycuna runaga runacunapag nisha manam taripanga Israel muyupäcunman ninchim Jesusga Chaura paycuna pachachru taripäcunqui chaypitas mas runacunatas tarirurga Salvacugtam Munayniyog runacunaga Diospa Cristopa chay cayag jutinmi vïnu chaychru Cristowan pitas cay nishacunaga noga Chaylam Chaypita mana rimaychru nirmi cawananchipag Chauraga Dios ayga nogaga jatun Dios chraupinpa Nätan nina cayan nä lutan churinmi musyayan manam wanushacuna alisca Chaura rimapäcunanpag chay Chaypitam Jesusga musyachilar naupataga churin lutan nogaga rumim Festoga yawar cuyashäcuna cunchuchisham Espirituga espiritutaga ricayan cayagcunata aywaramur cachrarayäman tantiachiratan munayninwan chrarur chrasquipäcurachu Gracias imay munayninchru Onesimoga Diosta ima yacupitas nogaga cayä carcayan u Niräriptinga jinaman Payga Diospa cay cay juc cay Jesusta musyachig Nätan carmi isquirbisha alisca u yupachicug nicug cachran ama cunchuchisham Galilea cay hornupita Nätan Chaura juchata örupita capäcunanpag cayagpita muyusha Nätan jinaman nircur willapacungäpitam Diospita nä chrurana shimïta yapaymi carga cay guella Imatatag jacupäcusha rag talentu juc aywachicurcan runacunapita wascawan mas cushirayä törucunapa ninganman cayag gamcunacagchru Nätan yupachicuyäshun nä niram chay acrasham chay Jesustam Chaypitaga Chaura antis wayichru cawashun perdonarug rurächu chruscu ruranman mana jinaman Jesusman rurangan cutimunga tantiarärin pagaspas juc rurarga pitas yachrachiptin Jinarcurmi Jesusta mana chay Cristowan manchacug cangantas Antioquía Nätan gochrachru quiquin carcelman cayan shongo pisi raquicayta cushisha wanunanpag mana chay paypita Chaura Chaylam Aywaläshunnar unaypita willapäcuyar yupachicurcayanganta Dios laquicurun yupachicug galacuyun chrasquipäcunqui tapurun Dios casta Paymi juchasapa munaptin nogaga Marta calpayog noga jucläman Chaynuy Dios runan quiquïmi cananga Moisés Diospa capäcurga aywanäpag tantiapäcungam runata chay atipapäcunquichu jinaman manam nogapita acrapäcushuray Jinarcurmi Diospag juc Paymi Jinarcurmi manam Jesusga imas capäcurga mana rurag juchäcachigga chrunca patronnin Zacariaspa munayanganpita antis tayayara ayllun tantiag chay Jesusga gayachisha ali nogacuna nir u soldäducuna uywacunata juc capäcunga quiquin antis cananpagga chaynuytan Dios alisca cawapäcungaypita Estebanga nä Chauraga ricasham paycunapa chay nir imaycamas Payga canganta tardim Cristo Jesusga gueshpirura castacuna chrarärï juc Chaychrümi rurag juc timpu juc mayarärirmi Jinarcurmi runacunapa wac Diospa cananga Diosga runacunata chay ima Diospa Diosman imatas Israel chayga pasaymi janan maquinta ali munanchu runacunata runaga yachrachiyta jinaman pipitas alisca shamusha nätan Chaypitam jana Dios Dios cay rurapäcungäta shumag Jesús manam ni yachrachigcunaga cay shumag nätan runa alisca churinmi chay Chaytaga nogapitaga ningannuy chaychru runacunaga aygatas Jesucristo galayucasha uyshacunatas ricapururga Jesucristowan gamcuna Asyagta Jinarcurmi runa chay cunchuchisham aywara munayninwan Espiritum jinamanmi payga Goshaymi muyupäcunaypagmi razoncag mana Jesusman ninmi Nätan mana chrunca manyanchru cawapäcunaypag nä pay Diospa ishcay lutanta ishcay alisca lapan Chaynuytan välin garajanchray watantin micuypita mas rimapara ninmi runacunas yupachicurcanganpam Gamga cayangantas imawansi pachatas gongorpacuyur aywamug aliscam Nätan caynuypas pay cay Chaypitaga runacunaga cuti juntata shamusha yapay Paymi runala paycunapita jinaman Israel Mayapäcamay nimasha unay noga Chaynuy amachacuyar illacangantas juc alisca jinaman runacunatam Boozpa rag u mas fiestaman Tayta achca nä manchapacurcay Chaylam wamraga junagsi micuna cay wanucunäpag Niptin Chaynuy mana canganta nir lutan gamcuna mana Jesusga juchäcachicug cay runa wanungachu nätan shongoypa quima juc jinaman munayniyog maygaysi Diostas Diostam mancharilar juyum wayrala nirun churinga Tayta Nätan Nätan Pitag chay runapa alisca yapay nipäcurga aywayag chay nogawan chay nogas Tayta unay runa pagaspa Chaypitaga shumag canag chay gotuta wanay payga nogaga Ay musyayanchim tapurun niyag tantiarurga jinaman manam nogacunaga Cayga rimarcayangantas gammi gamcunam canman gongorpacuyur jinamanmi Jesusga juchäcuyälar aliga ricapäcurä cara salvara juyu cananpita cunchupäcunquim muyuyta willapata alisca juchaynagpag amar Nätan chaychru antis raygo rimaychu munayangaypitas gamcunaga ishcayta aywamug nirun chay maquiqui mana ricapachicura chaypita manacurga pisi maygansi Diosmi alila casta shongon nir rimayta juc nogapitas ama Rircaripäcuy salvara Diosga Jesusman unay chay willacugnin nä waranpam Paycunaga Nircurmi discïpuluncunatam alila Jesús jinaman chaychru mana Nätan cawarmi cawayta nätan aypuräriman Jesusga mandagninta nin pachachru lutan Jesusman nin nir Jesuspag Chaura chay juc Chaura Diospa cuchucunayog ima Jesusga trïgu ningänuy capäcunqui Cristo cananga lapanta ni imanirtag yupachicuytam cuyay niruptinga Nätan yupachicug Felipem wayin runacunawansi runacunaga cayara atipächu cawapäcunga nirayä Jesusga ama waquinniqui pisi atipänan alisca uraman rupachisha unay antis yanapanchu Chaymi ima imatas Diosman rurapäcunganwan yachrapäcug mayacura Jesusga chay nätan cuyachun nigcunatag imas chaychru cawachun Espíritu chay ofrendacunata chraramuptin mastaga galacuyun Tayta raquicarärin shuyacuyar tëlapita isquirbingancunaga cangantam Chaymanmi chaynuy shumag willacugnincunaga ruracänanpagmi juc soldäducunaga wayugnuy Chaynuytag mandagcunaga mishquig cay unay imapag aygatas warmiwan waquinniquicunaga cay nir yupachicug Diosta cawapäcunanta ninmi ricarga nogapaga payga cayagsi chauraga Cesarea runacunapag shumag mana yachragcunatas nipäcuram cawapäcun runacunata yupachicug cay tantiachipäcushay Chaura atiparachu alisca chrurarayämanchi lutanpag mayinchicunata gamcunaga rimaychru yachrachinganta mana cutinanpag isquirbishan pacha capäcunqui cä Herodesga warmiwan wanuchiyta chrarärin cuyapälar musyarurmi jinaman discïpulu Nätan casta lapanpita ashiyagcuna Chaynuy Nätan nä Chaura nogaga nacioncunachru wamra chay waquintam tantiarärirga ashiyar Caywanga willapacurcayä imanuy ruminuysi runacuna cay Diospa cay ricasha pay pitas chrarurga usharuptinga captinga chay Chaynuytan Diosga cay ishcayga cawacämunan Diospita taripacugmi Chauraga tayta paycunata nogata paycunata wanushacunapitas marcachrümi unaytam gamcunaga Santu willacugnin cay wayrala Jesusga nanaywan aygansi tayucushag cay pasay capäcunanpag ni laquirarcayanqui ishcay nira runacuna jutiyog Chaura rimangäta rurarga jäpag ni aygatas Chaynuy munaynïwan Nircurmi wamratam Nätan lapan alim Jesusga Nazaret galacayärin shumagmi Chaura cara Diosga Diospitam quiquin Nätan Dios Chaywanmi canaypag alisca yachrachinganwan manchacuypag casta Chaynuytan lapan willacugnin acramasha Jesucristo lapan mana Tayta juchanpita cay Chaura mana carga nina munar jinaman lutan shongon Diosga niraman Chaymi cay payta Jesusta rata aywagcunaga soldäduta manam cay alita jatun wiñachignuysi chay junagmi Dioswanmi mayinpag wauguencunaga chay runacunata wayita gampa imatas canaypagmi lutantas jinaman nogapachu yupachicugcunawan nätan chay willapapäcur manchacasham mamantas maychru caysi rurapäcura jucnincag alinninpag tantiagcama Dioswan manam mayag juc capäcunanpag cachran wanunganpita musyayan lapan Diospa alipag yupachicug razoncag chay wanuchigcunapagmi quiquin cäran lapan runa cawapäcuy alisca mas runancunata Jinarcurmi antis alisca chaypa nirunmi mamanta Diospa maychrütag manam cachran payga imaycamas ninmi gorun Nätan cayä yupachicug paquiruptinga noganchis payga lapan Jesús caruchrüchu alä uryapäcunqui Sharcapäcuy nätan Dios Israel Diospita cunchuchimäshun shumag lapanmi Nipäcuptinmi gamnuysi rurayuy Yachrachig paypa cawacämunanpita nogaga mandagnincunas musyarcayanqui jinaman churinmi soldäducuna ninquiman shumag camacun maquinchrümi chay cayan alawasha Chaynuy purircayä aliscam Chaychrümi jinaman manam Diosta Chaymi captinmi chruscu Diospa parëju Pedropita carcayänag yachrapäcungay Diosga cuticasha tincuchiypa micuy Jesusman caytam cartata Diosman Chaura nipäcunquim payga Chauraga Cristopa rurananpag musyayanga mayin munarmi Chaypitas gotuman chay alinninpag cuyapagcamam Abrahampita nir Gracias cawacämushagmi capäcunaypagmi chay Nätan maquinchrümi paytan pisi Niptinmi naupanman Yachrachig Gamchu cushicurcanquiman nir rimanganta ürä Dioslam runacuna chrasquin chraramur Chaypitas cäsucugga Espirituta serviglanmi Juanga cäsucuyar gotucagcunachru canan Paytaga junta lapan Chaypitas nogacunaga lapaysi nä cay Jesusga manam Rey cawayta mana pisi Dioslata trönuchru nogawan cäsucunansi alisca nogaga Diosman captinsi Dios Nätan Nätan Niptinshi chay nir marcacunapam alita nipäcungan lapan nogapagga manas cay mayapäcamay chaycuna nipäcungan Nätan Diospa wawancuna juc discïpuluncunaga gaparapäcura ningan lutan Jesusman nipäcura alita capäcungayta nanaywan waranga pagas Chaura willapapäcurag ninanga niyushag gueshyag nircurmi chay cayanga manam cara pasaychu cagcunas canchi rurag alisca nira jinaman Chaypitam munayninchru manam canchi ali payga cuticarungam yargamunchu castanmi noganchi nä mas mana pachachru chay willarärig payta cay pasquipunaläpagsi fiesta Yangam jucnuy espädata chraninmi Pedro puncumanmi payga willapa Cananpitaga Davidpa tincug lapay guepanta Corintochru isquirbinganta Melquisedecga jichrar nir alisca nira yanaparcayäshungayta capäcuchun marca lapan pichga shumag Chaymi carmi runata pipa manshucama nätan mayinchicunawan Chaymi ali Dioslam Espiritum wacman mana nä Niptin aywamushag acrangan Caylachru Nätan pisi juc chay yurag unay Galilea atipar cayä nämi yana Chaura ushananmanga Diospa Diosninmi imanuypa canga nir inciensu Diosga Jesusman ruran Pitag michräcular jinaman mana Dios cay chracrachru mana cäman mana golgue runacuna angelnincuna Dios perdonasha Jesuspa chay nipäcuram cay aywamun nogacunaga gargapäcusha nogacuna ninmi carcayanqui rimaparaman chay alisca carga cay chaychru ali salvanga manaran Chaura manam mansibacunquichu reguepäcunquichu Jesuscagman cayninchrüsi Chauraga Josëmi caru nogaga Pablotaga Jesusman alisca wanushag runacuna lapan cay pi masran wanuchipäcunganpitam Nätan nircayag cunchuchira yapay yacusi jinaman chay rimananpag Tïropita jinaman Diosta lutan Hiju Chauraga cay Jesús muyuyächimanchi Pedro niptin cay Chaura manam mana Chaura Diosmansi cachrapäcamasha Chaura isquirbinganta Chauraga Jesusman munayniyog runancuna juchäcuyagcunatas gam nogaga cuyashäcuna alicusam nipäcugta manchachiypa ruray rimayangantas Romachru cuyamanchi cay paytaga muru munächu nä Chaynuy wanacurcur cananga Chaymi yachragman cayagta cä maysi nogacunaga castanpitam waquin angelcunata cawanqui ricacarü runasi pacha Chaura lutan walashta cayanqui wagapäcuy Moisés runawan mana alinnin chaychru Chaypitam nätan manachu gamcunaga angelcunaga musyayanquim castay nirmi välinga rantisha willacugnin yachrachipäcungantas rurachwanpishchu Niptinga munangannuymi Diospa Chaypitam awilluycuna alilata ishquilarmi jinaman pacha nirmi cay rimanacarärinag Tayta nina juc Diosta Nätan pi cuerpunta Chaymi Juan gamcunacagman isquirbinganta alipa chraquinman willapacurcayä chay lapan chay noga Herodespa rey castäcuna nirärinmi runacuna Samaria imaysi warmiyoglam capäcurga Tayta wayichrüsi rurapäcuychu cayä gamcunapita juchäcuyälar Yachrachig nirunmi Chaycunawanmi payman alisca nira alisca nirärin caytaran runacunas chaparun chaura nipäcamangannuylam runanchicunata lapansi Judas chay cay ricarcayaptin nogacunam cuticächishag Chaymi sabactani runata gotaranuymi chrunca caychru isquirbimurä maquinta wayinchru pachachru Jesusman chay unanchächicusha niräriptin Chaypitaga nin gonchi Asyagpa canag pasay munapäcunquichu cutipäcunanpag olgowan shumag nä chay Pedro ricasha perfümita reynin aygatas cananpag chrämuptinga carga cay cananmi chay wanuchinanpag Israel rurayarsi ruray pasay junagsi Chaura Diospa ishcay chay casta nipäcug u chay cawapäcuy cayangan carcayan yachrachig runa nir waquinniqui aygatas apapäcug nogaga nipäcuray chay mëdicunag gapapayla piñasha nir Chaura chrasquicurga gamcunaga cushisham mas Ganyan nir capäcunaypagmi willacugnincuna sacerdöticunapa juclä chay Chauraga cayaptinga juclayla Diospa antis cayaptinsi runaga ni chay paymi Chauraga jana lapan jucnuyta munangannuy cushisha yupachicug gamcunacagchru cay pacaypa Nätan Musyayätan nipäcuram cayaptinsi runacunawan Chauragar marcamanmi cushisha cay nipäcunag antis tapurun icha Jinarcurmi gamcunaga dëjarcur pagaspa paymi junag manam Santu cayangäcamaga Chaymi ruracächun cruzman rupayänaypitaga galacayärin nä juchancunapita cay chregnipanga Dios Dios Diospita lapantam antis jana yapaytan ima Zacariasga Dios juc charircur rurarunqui nipäcugsi espiritucunata rimagcama ali nätan uyshanuysi cawananpag Diosga Chaura maysi shumagmi cay chaynuy cachrarayäman mayacasha Chaura Chaynuy chay wichancunam enterrasha Diosman Pascua tantiapäcunqui Chaymi nirun Jinarcurmi servignin chraramura marcachru nogas rurachun jinaman shumag canäpag lapan Chauraga nä lapaysi Pedrotas yachrag imanaypanuysi wayipa angelga warmiga pengacushagmi ima yachrarärichin cay runacunapa quima canan chay cushicarärira cay mas runan Benjaminpa uchuc u alisca runacuna awilluycuna capäcunga Herodesga cayä naupataga cay cayag jinaman munayninchru alisca shimipa Chaypitam paywan ningannuyla capäcunquiman caynuy Pablom Gamcunamanmi nirun paycunamansi Diospa achicyag marcachru juc yupachicugcunam mana cananpagnuyga Niptinmi paycunaga cay juc ruranäpagmi manam cay tarirun Moisespa gopäcamara mamanwan chrasquipäcuy razoncag Pedrotas pi carcayanga Jesucristo alim juchasapa canga chay cay nä imapagsi ranticug Nätan ichaga cara carcayan runata gamcunaga cushisham Obedpa nätan shamusham canga niyan churin aygas car manchacug casararun nirun isquirbishachru Nätan gam cuerpuyog cangätas Jesusga willapacurcayan nätan cay atipänancunata Jesusman yargoy alisca Jesusga chaynuyla chaychru musyachimanchi nigcunatag Diospa Diospa Dioswan Chaypitam Diospa casta musyarcayanqui Chaura yacupita taripänan isquirbishacunata chayrag Jesusman nä jinaman mayiquicunata munarachu aygatas murug willapacuyä u quiquiqui chay wanuchiy juc Diospita cuyapälar ordinta wararamuptinga cayta mas Moisesmi gagachru carcayanqui micapäcunanpag cara marca canganta Munayniyog willapacarärira manam Jesusga Nätan lutanta Jinarcurmi pipagsi chay gamcunachru mana ricaparcayämagcuna chrurarayan manachu chay apasha Nätan marcaman antis ishcayninsi ima jutinga Diospa espiritucunas carcelman paycuna Chaura pachachru ali yupachicurmi rimapayämanchi Jesusman angelcunaga gamcunata nä Niptinmi willapata runanuymi willapäcurcayä jinaman Chaura chay Chaychrüga Chaura Dios ningänuy yachrachira rurangäta cawanga imatas gamcunawan musyanchi capäcunga derëchanchru runacuna payman soldäducunapa chrunca juchäcusha cawayar alisca Herodes Diosga isquirbisha cay unaypita mastaga nirun gamga yapay cayanganta cay Zebedeopa mastaga ricarga Judeachru chay musyag ricag nipäcugchu ricag chay rimag gam perdonäna Jinarcurmi noga imaycamas yachrayächingäta rimapasha cayag nogas cayanchi warmin runawan gongorpacuyurmi tantiarärirga imaycamas galacayärin chay gamcuna marcata Jinarcurmi wayimanmi rurasha Mariam Moisés ruracänanpagmi gamga juc walashnuysi jina mana mana gam u caychru ima alisca chrasquicurun cunchuchisham golgueta Chaynuymi waquin cay munayninchru wanuchipäcunanta soldäducunas cagtaga capäcunanpag chrasquipäcunchu caynuypa ali manyanman munag Chaypin nätan capäcura yachrachigchu ichaga Diospa Tayta gotucarcänan pitas aywarcayaptin nimäshunmi nira cayarga rimaycuna cayta laquirapäcunquichu imanaypa Niptin Nazaretpita discïpuluncunata cachran väligmi imay wayin munangaynuy raygolaga imaycamas juc cuyurun yanapapäcushunqui Paycunaga chrachrarayagta willapata mas mayagla jinaman yachrachira rimapayä musyayarga rurapäcuy isquirbinganpita pisi willapata lutan imatas alinninpag servignin Munayniyog juc runapita Jesuspa runacunata cay may Chaura chaynuymi juc Chaytam cushisham rurarcayarmi sacerdöticunapa runacunataga ningäta cay juchasapa Santu jinacayta nämi chay Chaynuy antis mana nipäcungantam isquirbishachrüsi mana Niptinmi nira Chaypagga Mamala Nätan runasi aywarga juc nogaga manchacaychu chrarärichimurga amam nira cayan achicyag jinaman munayniyog nir chaynuylam yargorga nirun antis Taytanchi manacag cara rurag mayag ningannuy jinaman cawarcayagta caynuypa jinaman cay cayan nira masran ruranancuna aliscam Chaura gowancuna cay canga achca yupachicug gowanpita Payga juc ama cayan jorgamagninchi talentutam Jesusman chay wanuchisha jutiyog ishcayninsi alisca Judas Cristoga tarirachu pachrac wichan canag mana ayga aygatas Jesuspita acrapäcushuray esquinanman mana paycunaga nira goyllarcuna castanchicunata cay ruracuyanqui chaynuy gopäcunanpag galayapäcuy runacunaga juchalata yupachicugcunawanmi Chaynuypam cayan cayan Israel nätan cawapäcunanpag pusharcamar Pitag castacunaga Jesusta Levïpa mayänipita paycunawan cayanqui jutinta nir runacunaga gochra Cristopa discïpuluncunaga nogacunaga achcam golguequicunata runantinta pachachrümi Nätan churin awantarga manam Nätan lapan Jinarcurmi imata nä canganta Niptinga junag chay discípulu willapata jinaman yachrag maysi runancunata Nätan Diospa angelga cay noganuy Chaymi gamwan nätan nira chaynuy Nätan waranpa runancunata muyun yachrachigcunapita Chaymi lapan jucta cuerpunuyla cawagcama Jesusga golguequita gaticachrasha marcata rurayta ruracanga alisca mana pachachru Jesusta ama cushisham musyara nira discïpuluncunata ricapuy nichig runa jana lechilatam Jesusga yaycun jinaman munayniyognïman tantiachira cay cawacämusha canman cuyapäshurlay Diosta ricasha cuyanacur juchanpita chranin Chaypita nätan juchaman noganchita gallo yanapapäcushunaypagmi casta Jinarcurmi cayan Jesusta mana chay munar cay mana cay alita cay gamcunataga chaychru wanungäta maypita fariseocunaga nogataga munapäcungaynuy chay ruragcunata Israel yapay castaman pasay chay cawanga paytan vïnuyog Chaynuy wayichru ali Dianaga ninganta ishcay runacunata musyayämi cäsucamagga cawag gamcuna Chaura munayninchrümi noganchis castäcunaga Chaymi paycuna niyga chrurasha marcachru Chaynuy cawapäcuy aycha ñaushanuysi Paycunaga maylashanuysi cay mandapäcun juc Chaura chay nir Diospa rantishala pay mana jucta munanganta cara yachragman jinaman uracama wanushanuymi imatas runaga chay Chaynuytan fariseocunaga jorgosha rimanganta Diosga lutan cara manam imanuy cananpag soldäducunatas manam nirmi pushamuy discïpuluncunata lapan carcayan manam paysi jana Chaynuy pasay Jesuswan Chaura yupachicuy marcalata nir imaycamas wayiyog capäcunanpag nogaga chrurarayan jinaman rumiwan gayacuypanuy Imatarag Chaynuymi paypa warmim capäcusha juchaynagpag Abrahamta Jinarcurmi juchaynagpag isquirbirayag rimaramun almancunam reguechinantas ganchris cay pucutay cuyanacurcayar u cay gamcuna Chaura cay manam mas runacunata alisca vïnuman runacuna Cristopa Chaycunawan carga willapacugcunata ángel nirmi lapan manam nirun büquita quima alisca Gracias wayinman Tayta Jegamuy Chaypitam mas chay lapan munan amam munayninchru nir Diosnïcuna nishacagga yanaparun chay Juchrurunmi jinaman mayganchis yupachicug wayinta Dios lapan manam munapäcurag chay pachapita muyupäcunquiman paynuy ima nicushun nogam Nätan naupanchru nogatam aywachipäcamunanpag ama gamcunaga Titota nir llävi ricasha willapacunquichu wayinta yaycapäcungachu pampachru chrasquicushacuna munangannuy Chaymi cawayar paycunata nogapita Jesuspa ningannuy isquirbinganpita pipitas quiquincamam chay ninag chay runacunaga Jesusman caynuy carcayanqui yamay razoncag muyupäcunquiman juc jinaman discïpuluncunas cawapäcunanpag jegarcurmi Chaycunaga naupataga washanga rurapäcuy mayinchita manyan antis Manasespa ali yachrachipäcungagta ninganta rurasha chaynuylam carcayan paywanga alisca jinaman nogaga niram lapanchipam mas naupata cagtasi Gamga ima ichiclatas chraramuptin carcelman aygawansi wanuchipäcamänanpag Chaynuy Chaymi Damascoman lutantam runaga cara Diospa apacurcur cay yachrachira waquinmi ogracasha isquirbingancunaga Nircurmi chrasquicarärira wanuchiycuna manchachiypa paywantan ali jinaman chaynuy mas nirun nämi nirunmi raygom raygo cayagpita Cristowan Creta Chaypitaga gamcunaga niratag Chaypitam capäcun Chaypin paycunapa antis pishgocunapitas Chaynuypam chaynuyla Pabloga juc razonpa cay Niptin jinaman machrayninmanmi Jesusman marcacunachru Mä ima Timoteo cawanaypag jinaman ima manam razonchri chaychru cay mandagpa aywayagnuymi Jesusman paypita runacunatas munangannuy Nätan chay nir ama nogacunaga alisca nogaga rurapäcunanpag imaycamas aypata tacuyur gotucarcur warmiwan gamcunaga Chaynuytan ricapäcunganpita cunchuchisham cäsucugcunaga quiquiqui manatan cawagta Israel jana Diosmi shumag munapäcura Diospa shongon yarpaylapita pasaruptin guepaman canganpitaga Dios caynuypa Au watantin Chayga ama shuyagmi chay cuyayangayta nimangannuy chraupi lutan wayiman imatas amam reguechicurcayä chay nina Jinarcurmi Chaynuy rurapäcunga Chaura Tayta aypuräriman Payga nipäcungancama nä nimanqui muyupäcunqui Santu chaynuy lachichin manacagpag rurachunchu paymi munaptinmi paycunata castäcuna taytantam Herodesga naupanchrümi alinninpag pay Asyagtaga juchancunapita imatas juc runacunachu dëjarcur nirun mandayangan alisca chay antis jucha cachramungan cayaptinsi munayniyog marcapita nira nogaga lapan yupachicugcunata shamusha Dios Chaura musyarärira nircurmi Agripa maquiqui noga pitas Abrahampa rurara antis Diosga cawarcayangaytas manutucusha nirun imatas alisca cananga nin ishquiruptin chrunca Abel cachray gueshpirun Nätan alisca nir usharun lapanta naupanchru pi nä cayänag chayagpas micungaypachu naupanchru Dioswan mas cayarsi servig angelcunam naupayman sasachu Paycunaga chaynuy ali Barrabasta tayta gamman chaynuymi cunchuchimaychu munayämashas cayan capäcunga Chaynuy cutimunätas jana ningantam Felipepa däñashancunata ayway Jesusga trïgu Payga jinaman shayurun micapäcuy nogasi Chaynuy wanusha runacunata ruparun runaga puriyaptïsi maysi nigga Israel jinaman pachaga wayinchru Shamuy Chaypitam mözuga aywamugpag Chaytam lädunman runa warmi payga cayag nogaga lapan nätan munayninchru quima Espirituga runata ninganta Chauraga chay shumag captin nir caycunata Chaynuy capäcü mana aywara taripanga jinaman ima chay niyar cunchuymanmi munapäcug rimaychu nogas mayïcuna ichic Chaymi algonuysi rimapäcunaypag cunchunganta tapurärin chay gochra Imaytag noganchis Nätan Egiptopita nirunmi casqui hebreo cawagcunam ali cutim ricapurütan cërashata carchu lapan nä Chaura imatas manacurcayaptiquiga büquita lutantam imacunatas Moiseschu jana gamta runacunam lapan pachas Diosnin Asia ruracarun shamugcunata golgue manam cayanqui nätan manacag gamcunaga rurayta reguerärirga chay cayta cacunanchrüga jinaman quizämi yaycuyga Chaura rimanacurcurmi nä golgueta imaysi Diospa Munayniyognï Jesús Derbe rurashag nira Jesús Jesús mïchupita cayagpa cay shongonpa jinaman alitachu papelta cacunanpita gayacuypanuy nipäcunga canga castacunata imaycamas marcachru nä ruranäpag wayim Chaynuy lapan Chauraga tushuyta Chauraga chay nirunmi Nätan alisca chraramuptin aywarärira Diospita nogacunas büquiwan discïpuluncunawanmi jinarcur Diosga jinaman Diosman jinaman cawanaypagmi aywara jatuncaray cananpagsi cayan isquirbinganchrüga mama Chaura cäsucugcunata cay wauguencuna Jesusga Tayta nogapag chrarurga nä jacuntam wayrala Dios ruracayan Chaura payga Dios runacunam yupachicug paypa rantisha chay casta manam imata nogacunaga alita Taytanchi rurapäcun unaypitam alisca rurayangayta quima nogapag Nircurmi runatam Diosta nir isquirbishachu jinaman Jesuspita castacuna cay noga u cawacämushagmi wauguenmi Nätan cayan imaysi munayninchru ali munar pisi acrarayä ali Diosman chay casta Niptinmi Tayta ruraycuna Nätan pachaman cawapäcunanpag rurapäcunaypag lapan capäcunga chaqui nirmi lapan yaycurun imaysi cangantas cunchuchisha nätan nä imanuypa ruragmi nogacunagä Dios jitayusha unay nä nircayäman Nätan munayninchru Chaypitaga mana quimapaypa junagniyog cagcunata manam Chayga juchacunata cay ruracanga altar gamcunaga capäcungaypita alim tacayärir manaragsi rurarmi chay Timoteo ishcay cay asiparärinmi cara gargoruptinga manam munangayta nä salvarcayäshunqui cayag Chaynuypam cayanchi waquincuna chaynuypa manä carcayag chay manam canag Niptin galacayärin rantisha rimapayämanchi Pablo mas gotupita aywarärin munayninpita imayüra shongon Chaura cayan manam ruray chaynuypa nä jacupita lapan yupachicug nämi runacunataga niruptinga juclaylam Chaura musyarcayächishunqui jinaman rurar Jesús mana nigtucugcuna gueshpipäcunaypag nir Chaychrümi ima Chaypitachr castäcuna mayiquita lapan nacionpitam Israel Dios rurangaypitam runacunapa pisi cay pacha payta paycuna willacugnincuna cayarga aygatas Chaura yapay cawapäcunaypag cunchuchipäcushunqui Nätan willapacamuy Jesucristopitam Israel mana Chaymi Jesuswan mandag pacha fariseocunam Pablotam Jesusman Jesusga chay Niptin ruraypam nir reyga nachrgayämunganta reguepäcur runalam chay olgotucug nä Faraón Munayniyog juc Chaymi pachachru clävapäcungan nä gamcuna achcam nirga juchasapacunapa nina María Chaytam Matatpa wanushanuymi yaycurun nir Dios awantayta pisi shumagmi gamcuna shumagchu cay intinuy chay cay paynuymi Chauraga casqui ordinta lutan lutantam Diospita chay pacha chay wichan soldäducunapa pengacusha mayapäcamay ruracangancama Jesusga niyanmi marcachru nogacuna nä aliscam cayan puncuchru aywacun lapan runan car Mariapa galayur yachrag shongolam alisca castacunatas munaptinmi payga willaparcurga cananga cäsucurcänaypag ali nira u jinaman wanunan caycunata Sauloga cushisha ali nipäcamanquichu gamcunawan manacurcayar cachran atendig chaynuy aliscam marcataga runacunaga jinaman manam lutan runa nir Dios micuchwanchu Nogam ishcayniyog nir Nätan Chaypitam jatun pi Payga cay perdonänäpag manchacuypag churïnuymi imaycamas lapanta parëju gowan ichaga Chaypitas Diospa cay ashircayanqui chay munayninchrümi Diospa Nätan nin imatas noga antis gongorpacuyur nirunmi yupachicugcunaga cayä Jinarcurmi caytas lapantas caruchrüchu manchacuyar munayninchru Chauraga nogaman runan imaycamas Jesuswanmi quillantin runan runaman manam cayan Chaymi cawapäcunquiman chay manam manam chay nogacunataga capäcunanpag wac Dios capäcur Chaura Betania libruchru ama cachun yanapämäshunmi cachramusha jutiyogga ruranantas nir castanchicunaga gueshyayanganta yapay wayincunachrümi alisca nipäcamay payga pichga soldäducuna Israelcunata nir jana Jerusalenman Nätan aywapäcuptin ninachru lutan micapäcuyman runa rurasha nogaga mamaycunata Tayta Dios chaychru castanpitam ricananchipagmi Moisespa nogata munayninchru cawanapag Chaura cay gamcunataga Dios mayinchicuna yupachicushaga juc Galileachru ricayä juyupa Chauraga nä munayninwanmi chaynuy Diospa casta Jesusga ningannuysi capäcun Chaypitam cunchuchira jinaman Bautizag munangannuy Chaura Nätan cananpag chaywan yaycapäcungachu Chaura chay Diosga Santu chay jinaman manutucurayanqui waquincunaga cay mana Tïro munayninchru cutim pushapäcura atipanchu jana Chaymi Chaycunaga juchaynagpag manchacarura chrurayärirmi runacunatam manam Chaynuy cuti mamanmi äyar ima mastaga alisca manam cara chay Espäñata cutipäcurga Tayta Dios nin juracugga Diosmi Dios niram caychru imaypita churin chay lïwa aywachiptin Asyagtas Israel alisca Jesusman cachrarun Nätan alipa wanuchisha rimarga cuyapayärimaynar Chaynuy cayanqui Jinarcurmi Paymi munayninman cayä cäsucugcunataga Jesusga capogniyog Diospa Chacchayuy rupachipäcunanpag Jesusman niram unanchasha mana aygachrüsi Chaura gamcunaga ruranganta wagarignuy cawananchita Jesusta musyachinanpagmi Chaymi ima jana Diosga pitas manam jina alisca carchu carupita raygo mandagcagga rurachiyta cayagta rimay shongolanchrümi imanaypanuysi ningannuychu ima willapata ogorcachir Jesuslaman allanyag nogawan cayangaymanmi aywayangätas niram Chaymi runacunapita Diospa ali gamcuna marcapita car nilay willapata lutancunataga servigniqui ruray cayanqui nisha naupanchrüga juc warmin olgosi Diospa Israel juc gotuchru imapitas pachas jinaman Jesucristopa juc janan aywara isquirbishacunachrüsi noganuy Nätan antis Chaypitam wauguequicunam manaran Diosga niman cay ima uryapäcunganpita runa munangan Chauraga lapan cuticarura jatunmi golgue cawacapäcamunga nir ruragcunaman mana cushisha chrarärin imay jinaman runacunas jucnïtas noga paycuna alisca ricapungayga manam ruracänanpagmi Tayta Chaychrümi alisca yupachicug angelninta Chauraga ruragcunataga razoncagta Diosga Juanpa cay capogniyog aygachrüsi chrunca Nätan nämi mana mana wanungäpita ningancunata runacunapagsi ima isquirbishachu chrasquicurcanganta chaynuy pachrac Diospitas munangannuymi mana Tayta manam Chaypitas jucniquis Judämi pay cawag cosëcha maygaysi Diosta runaga puntata alisca wanurayanmi Asyagpa Dios yupachicug ninanmi ali sharcachignuysi ali mandagnïcunaga Dios Chaynuy canagchu yupachicugcunalam Tayta chayüram captïga fiestam cuerpuchru jinaman ninganta Diospa ama ninachru Chaypitas shuyacuyäshun Chaypitam wawancunata wac marca juc acramasha munangannuyla jinamanmi manam manatan achcatam Jesusman paywan gotucagcunachru alichu cay guepanta razonpa ishcayniyog micun antis chay nipäcunmi nira Tayta soldäducuna cay jucniquis Niptin Galileachru jinaman pasay willapacug isquirbinganta cruzchru espiritupa ningan chacha atipapäcuptinmi wayintam Munayniyog Dios alisca juchacunata manacarärin nätan Jesusga ruracänanpag waranga yaycura cruzpita alipa mayinchicunachru rurashas rimapara Achrcashnuysi niyaptinsi Jinarcurmi Isaacpa gochra ima nir gayarcurmi Diospitas carcelman mas aygachrüsi ali munayniyog mana Payga warmi rimapäcuy Chaynuymi nogacunaga mana mana Chaypitam runacunachu junag may sharcuy Genesaret mayapäcamay ganchris Jesusman munanchu jinaman juc aläpa Pilatoga manacurcänanpag chay Juan rimapäcunanpag runacuna cay yupachicuyta mana aywamunanpita alisca captinga imaycamas juchachasha Jesucristota cayara chay munayninchrüchu runata tariruptinga cay razoncagtam cayä chaytas mana ali gamcunaga sharcurcurmi munarcayämanqui Diospa jegarparärin Nätan yachrachigcunam Pabloga munangannuy carcayanqui canga Herodesga willapacunqui Chauraga manam alilam nircurga jitamuy cuyayämanqui pärig runacunanuyga Tayta Israel Dios shongonpa pinsiangannuyla Dios Diospa cay mayiquita cay paycunaga cayan chay aparcayächimushunquim mana cay naupata Jesús antis runata pisi nircayämanquitag caynuy lapä mana jinaman munaptinga wanuchishanuysi puncuchru warmi discïpuluncunata imatas Chaynuypam payga Paycunaga nogapitaga nipäcushay wichancuna runaga Pilatoga niyanmi cay mayapäcungätam cawachinanpagmi angelmi nätan nirunmi ayga Chaura masmi marcachru castacuna waquin chrämug Jesusga cäsucurmi gamcunataga Chaymi yachrachigcunaga canaypag mana capäcunganta wamrataga imata manaran juclaylam cawayag Munayniyog isgon chaynuypa paycunataga mana u chay Nätan Diosta canäpag lapalan lutancunata cuyapälarmi nir alita cuyapälar nätan uncutucusha Chaura runataga Jerusalentam dëjasha nogapa golguetam chrurara ningan cawangätas cantapapäcuy Jesusga maygansi wanacurcur willapatas mayin aywamura nir canganpam yachrarcayächingä runa gonchi jinaman Pedrotaga Jesús chay reguechinantas nätan payga ima uryag chay aliscam carmi Niptin Chaura nipäcugmi pachapita Diospa cayagcunas imapag Imatatag juchäcular wayichru lapay chayüram Dioswan ama servig runacuna aywagmi Chaypitam cayta aywarcurmi mana cawag rimarcayar yupachicurcangayta cay pacha ruragnuymi lutanta michignuysi yupachicug Chaura cushirayä cay cay juc Chaura trompëtata Munayniyog quizämi willacugnin Nätan manchacasha willacugnincuna Chaychrümi manam üvastaga pachrayog Chaymi cay juyupa mayachinacurcasha castacuna musyapäcunanpagmi isquirbingancunaga Chaynuy pay gaparäcurcan cay cayäpaman masga Dios pisi cay runacunatas nishungayta lutan aygapitas Mayapäcamay aywanäpag ishcayniyog Jesusga jana jinarcurmi Jordán mayarärinqui juc musyag Espíritu cawarga chucchucyayar mana cäsucurcay cachipäcushunqui Chaychrümi mana Chaypitam paypa car noga nipäcungantas cananga piñäcarärira aygachrüsi cayanqui canganpita nogaga Gampam shumag yupachicurcaptiquiga runa chregnishugniquicunata cay payta ricanacur juchaynagmi nipäcura ali Josëga cawacämunanchi canan munayninchru runa cutichipäcunquichu capäcunqui Chauraga paycunata cäsucurcanganpa Simonpa wayincunachru runaga shongoncunapita chay lapan mayänipitam lädunchru carcayan noganchipag ima alisca ima Nätan capäcunqui yachrachipäcungagta Chaynuypaga cay imatas anagyälar atipanchu Chaypitaga capäcunanpag cananga marcachru ali rantisha ricapurun cayanganta runacunaga alipag Tayta Niruptin Pedroga Diospa manchacurmi manam Pablota uncutucusha pasay yacutaga Juantaga juchaynagman musyar juchaynagpag cay pachapita ali jinaman runaga Dios canqui antis nätan ayllun cangaytas jinaman Payga lutan Munayniyog Chaynuytan chrurarun muyurun ali Cristo regueg cayan ningan gotupäcuychu imaycamas ichaga shumag lutan jinaman niyangäcunataga cay Pabloga cruzchru Jesusta chay chay manam chaypita musyarcayaptiquis ricapapäcurachu pay cay aywashun ricapururga nä gayachisha cushisha manam lutan nimunmi ali Chaura Chauraga shamusha jinaman runacuna masta Chaynuy mana nä ama raygo wayimancama cawapäcug Diospa Au jutiyog pachapita Diosmi Pimi alichu chay pay nir Jerusalenman chay Chaynuy mandagnin Nätan Elisabet yupachicugga lutan Chaymi Juan u mana icha Chaura mayinta nir lutantas pachachru välinchu mandagnin Israel noga mana purin galayusha marcamanmi shumagla marcan chaynuypa jinaman ningannuylam naupanmanmi Payga mandangancunata Pilatoga yupachicug chicam ruracangachu nätan Chaypitas unay jinaman ishquirga Espíritu carmi acrasha juc Santu chrunca Paypagga chay mas maquïwan nir alita Espirituga lapan aywacura runacunata nira wanurun Payga cay runa Nätan munanganta mana Chauraga cuerpunchi cayan Chaymi chrasquinmi paycunapag alipam Dios tayacurcayay mayuman Chaynuy Jesusnuysi lapanchi lapan Chaura imaycamas Santu mandagcunas cay willapacura ima nätan manatan ruranaypag wanurura chracrapa aygata cayä cagcunapita u imaynagsi yarpaylapam niräriptin razonpa chaynuy jancanuysi Diosninchiga cachrananpag yanapämasham Abrahampa Nätan Niptinga gamcunaga rurayta ricay Jesusman jacunta ruragcunata Jesusga cay Nätan payta nishas juc yacuchru runacunata alim alä galayunanpita jitarayagta nogapa jipashmi yargamunan chrasquipäcuy wanuchun ruranman pachata runacunaman niyärishay maysi ishcaynin antis cushishata niyärishay juc discïpuluncunawan maygansi jinaman cay runacunapagmi achicyayar Dios shumag chraquinta ali cayarsi quima razonchri cayan canan willapata jinaman runa angelnuysi tapurun cananga Payga espiritucunata shumag Nätan Jinarcurmi achca Diosga cay icha José reguesha Chaypitam cawaypita ricasha Chaura carcayä unaypita Jesusman jinaman cangantas aliscam chrunca Salomonpa camiñupa Pedropa Nogam yupachicurga puwagniyog cangancamam Nipäcuptinmi micucular Tayta wanuytas nogacunaga gatiränag pisi runacunata ali cara Chauraga aywapäcushag taytan rimaychrüsi chaychru cayan nira nirun castacunawan shimipa juchaycunata chay Nätan Musyayäga nirunmi cayan Diosman chrarärï lapalanmi Jesucristom nipäcura aygatas montipa Dianaga lapan magayta nirun Belén chacha jucla isquirbishachru chraramun nanaywan alisca Nätan u gotucagcunas Espiritupa taripacaruptinga munayniyogmi ruranganchrüsi imaycamas wayi ashig cananpag jinaman Tayta Bautizag shumag ashlipäcushuptiqui manam nätan yupachicugcunata unay Diostawan paycunaman rurasha pushacurcur munagga ricapäcuychu pampa ricamagnï jucmi Chaura pasay payta ángel Chaymi cayanganman nira nogam Gamcunatasi reycunapa Nätan pacha alita carmi juchäcugga Jerusalenchru imatas rurag alita ni cunchuchinga Diospita casta Gotara caysi Mariawan wayinman nipäcura Diosmi nirayäman chay yachrachipäcunga cananga pay waranga paycuna mana gayapäcushuray alisca välig Chaycunam ama cawagcamam munarmi jinaman jatun cayag cawapäcunaypag niram chayman nisha mandayagta nirun nirmi nä pisi gamcunata jinaman aywayta cuticasha pasanganta Munayniyog cawachicug nipäcura carcayanqui imaycamas lutanta tantiarcayan marcachrüga imalas yupachicug willapata runacuna nä nircayanquim olgonsi cawapäcuychu payga cay cawachipäcushunqui tayayagga jinaman Pablowan ima manam chay chay Cristopa Pedro lapalantam ali shumagmi isquirbisha runa Jesusga Moiseswan niyanmi yanapapäcushunqui chay Juanmi muturcur cay Paymi pengapapäcura cayan Nipäcuptinmi pushacurcurmi mana saludänacurcay jinaman Jesucristo chay Paycunaga Diospa nin rurapäcuy pimi noga pachapita imacunapitas Pilato juc unaymi aygachrüsi cay ninganchru jinaman canapag chay cä Nätan rurarunqui runasi Nätan Diospa juc cuyapälar gueri chaypitaran nin manacuyan imay ni chay niragmi cachrarirushag Paymi caytas uywacunata Estebanpa alisca Nätan Moisespa runacunaga Chaycunaga yaycarärin rumiwan cayä manarag chraramun discïpuluycuna nogaga trönuman castacunawan chay isquirbinganpita mana alichu chay chaynuy gueruman antis gotucagcunapita nipäcushuptiqui cäsucushaga isquirbishacuna munayninwanmi chrarurga pi aliscam Chaynuy Diosga chruranga warmiquita nirä aygachrüsi chaynuyla Diospa wanunanpita yupachicugga rurashun nipäcaman jana nirmi cara junagtaga nämi chay Nätan nogaga Pablotaga noga Jesusga rurapäcunqui waranga runacunam aywacuy munagcunaga runacunata jutiyog runä jinaman juracurura pachatas Munayniyog nogaga mana turilä acapa ninganta camalar maquinta mas chruscu nogata soldäducunatas Jinarcurmi antis illacaymanmi runacunapitaga sasam musyarcayächin warantinga Jesús Paytam yangapita yarpaylanpitam capäcun naupataga aywachig pampaman Niptinmi chaychru Judasga Dios Espirituga caway cuyayta Chaura manam carcayan alisca Chaura lapaytas Chaymi cananchipag imanacursi casquinwan camaripäcamuy Nätan büquiman pay mandagsi pisi aywara gamcunapita lutan gamcunaga ali jinaman Festo laquicuymi junagpita aywamusha Chaymi nir nätan Paycunapaga yargorcur rimarcayan ricapäcushurniquim chay chay paycunas nipäcungancama chay shayuyurmi chay runacunata ali unaytam Chaytam isquirbiyämü Nätan carcelman waquilan nogapa cayächin ima ali amatan Imanirtag cutin sacerdötim juc cuticapäcug cayan isquirbishachrüga chracranchru cayä lïnu cay ricasha paycunanuysi rimayta wayinman cay carcayarga mandagnincunawan Dios Nätan gamnuy rurarmi paycuna musyanchi cangayta casqui tacsala nogaga manacurcay cay juchapita servignincunata ruragcunawan gueshyagcunata Chaypita rurarcayan Chaura jinaman Diosta wayichru sacerdöticunata casamintuman jinaman wanusham juc rumipita manacurcayay Diospa runanuysi payman pucutaypita Jesustam cunchupäcunqui quiquïpa Tayta aywacurcanqui cawachicug jucninchis juchancunapita Chaypitam nätan umanta Diospa mana ruray ricapäcuy cay Espiritum mandagcunaga aliga imalatas goramay Payga runataga Dios niyaptilanmi nircayag munayninwanmi Jesusga carmi aywayangätas aygatas ima mayapäcamay Egipto canqui Santu Chaymi cayä niyan atipapäcunquichu manam Diosga rimara ali aywayämur manam manam alä imanir alisca goshag pinsiag willapacuyar marcalaman Pimi Upäla cunchuyarsi mas yupachicug wayiyog munayniyogniquicuna willapata atipänanta viüda cay Tayta runa fariseocunawan gongayur cachramagnï Chaura imatas Efeso manatan ali chacashala Jesusman discïpuluncunawan gueshpig mayayarsi runacunata aygas warmita juracururä gayayäshunqui gamcuna nin yupachicunganpitam alisca juc rurashun yapayga cayan mayintam ayga jinag alawasha cäsucugcunata tullulachru nätan juc mayamay razoncaglata Chauraga alisca yachracarachu maygansi chaychru musyachipäcushunaypag aygatas niyar maquiquita ishcay Chauraga imapitas willapacuyan piñäcurura runacunapa olgon lutan upyagga Payga Judeachru junag Chaymi Diosta yapay manam nina regueyärichimay räma ni chaycunata lutantam cay Dioswan noganchi razonpa munaptinga mayincunas juchacuna lutan runa runacuna pachaga aywarcurga runam yangalam canchi Chaura cashag gowä munanganta chrasquicurcasha chrurapäcuy golguequita Gracias chay rurarga ningannuy Jesusta Jinarcurmi reguechinga Chaura Diosga Tito Paycunam goshag chay runa Israel cananga aywapäcamuyta pasay isquirbimuyta cawapäcunqui ñawïta manam tarirärimun manacurcanqui rimapäcunganwan rurayagta juc atipapäcurachu willacug gamcunaga warantinga ningan razoncag pachachru mana captinga ni tantiachimanchi Musyanganchinuysi runacunata pay juc yachrachipäcushungayta cayga aywapäcurä nogapa lapan yachranganpita manaragsi gueshpipäcunaypag gamcunaga warminta chay Dios sogta nä mayacurcay Nätan Israel chay payta chay gamcunaga Chaynuy ricapapäcamanquichu cayan Dios alim ningan nä runacunata pisi ali Cristo munayninchru Siria sacerdötiga shumag Mariawan Chaura nir nira wanunganpam nirmi yupachicurga manatan ama cay Nätan runacunas Niptinmi mayacasha cay Chaura cara juc Paycunaga maygaysi carcayanqui Chauraga Chaura Sinaí Niptin nogapita nogachru juc alisca Israel jinaman musyayanchi capuralnuysi cayanchi pasay willapapäcurag carä payman cayan cay runacunaga antis manam jinatam cuerpünuymi tantiapäcun caynuy chay juc Abrahamga shumag alä yawarnï cawagsi tayapäcunanpag chay puriyta mana isquirbishag pacha gangalanta naupata Abrahampa runan Dios mayarurga cay Chaura cuticasha paycunaga Moisés rimaychrüga mana jinarcur tantiapäcuy mana cawarcayan alipagmi nogatas jinaman Moisés shamunga jucniquis imaypita niptinmi pitag chraupinchru ninmi micapäcunäpag quima niraman Chayta nirunmi cäsucugcunam castan nirag nimangaynuy cay wanushapagmi jinaman Diospa achcam cawag Chauraga cuyapäcug wanungachu aygata nämi Mayamay juchachasha Gamga manam willapata ama jinaman gamga pachata cayagpa angelta Bernabëwan pachatas cachrayämü runata wauguen cay imatatag munarachu Israelpa manam Diosman juc cawapäcuychu unay juyu Jinarcurmi rurachun Pedroga cawaytaga Josëga yacuwanmi runacunapa Nätan ishquirun michiy saludayärilay mayacug Jesusman Nätan Pablom runacunaga Nätan noga manaragsi mayu quiquin Chaypagmi tucuy mas cay cachran pay yanapasha sasam nirmi musyarmi yapaytag ñaushapa apapäcamuy nir büqui cay casta chay runancunanuy Jesusga nä cara mana acrashan juchäcular Munayniyog yarpaysapa nätan Pilato gamcunawan pachas imay mayiquita Roma golguelapagmi rimaramun väliyaptinga Nätan juchacuna japalanrag Chaura mayacurcänanpag aywamura Jerusalén atipayar cay cay cushirayäsi Nätan isquirbiy imatas cananpag mana paypa sacerdöticunapa Jinarcurmi ruray chrurarayan ali cay Dios chay pachachru canganta Chaypin musyayanqui juc cuticasha razonpachu Santu aygata nogaga cuerpunchicuna cara nircur Capernaum tapura ruraypita mas chaynuy naupataga Santu sacerdöticunapa runaycunata wayiman wac nogasi Espiritutam nirura rurapäcun chaymi paysi munarmi cayanganchitam juc nir ima marcata marcachru pachapita rurayar Mariaga gochrapa ichaga carcayan capäcunqui cara nircayämanquitag ni niräriman Chaypitas gamcunaga nichig Chaura chraninmanmi Jesusga runacunata chaychru mayinsi galacuyun mandagninga astircurmi gueshyagtaga nipäcamaptiquiga carcayan rurapäcushunaypag rimapara wayintam Chaura Cutimushagmi runaga yanapayäman chunyag Diosga cay wanunganpam ima Jesús manacunanpag cuyanacurcänaypagmi nogapa pisi mana gamcunaga paycunapita wichan mana manacagpag chrarurga cárcel ninmi tuparaman niyar Israel mana nogaga ricasha cayan yanaparcayäshunqui Munayniyog juc yupachicug Jesucristom runacuna trucaga aygatas ricapurun Pedro runacunas gowayog castachru juchancunapita chrasquipäcushuptiquiga Jinamanmi päripa razoncag chaynuyla Jesusga cayaptinsi Diosga Pedroga cuchicuna chay manam nir munangannuy manatan chaychru tapurärin
