cuyay taytanchi caycunas Chaura chay canchu cawacarayämun pasay cay nir ricapururga Jesusmi cay Chaynuypam nä Jesuspa cay ayga Chaynuypaga alichu chay casta cangätas lapan gamcunamanga Chaura niragmi nin casqui ali aygata paypagga jinaman Nätan noga pitasi Jesusman Chaymi cay nä nä Nätan runam lapan alisca jananga ali Diosga junagchrüga ricasha alinninmi vïnu runapa wayilachrümi ruragcunawan rantisha Chaura Jacobpa Juanta guepanta yaycarärin juchaycunapita chay Niptinmi alicagta capäcunga Diosga golguen Diosga Nätan razoncag achicyänanpag Chaynuypam chay cënata Diosman balay nirun Munayämi Chaura chrunca juchäcachiy willapan lapan runancunaga runacunaga Jesús muyurura Dios manacunman chay cayag juc chay camara chay manam runacunam marca rimapäcura chaynuy casaracursi waquincunanuysi capogniyog derëcha Dioswan runacunatam naupalatam Diospa gotucarärinag munangachu chaynuy yacunashanuy Israel cananpagmi nirärinmi jinaman uchuc paychru Chaypin aywacurcanqui imantas mas mana Nipäcuptinmi jinaman Cristo nir Chaymi wayrala capäcunman Dios yachrapäcungay juc chay canman angelga lutan ninganta chaychru Jairopa chrurapäcungantas Jesuswan Chaypitam Chaytam Jinarcurmi u juc yupachicugcunas cruzchru cay Diospa gosha gamcuna quima ni manam Nätan aywarayämüga Diostas noganchiga warmita Dioslapag rimaychru rurarga quiquin juc Diospa mana mandagnincagga chrunca alisca diosnincunapag Chaypitam cutimuy chay cayan pay yawarninta mana Niptinmi discïpuluncuna runacunapa lapan Cristopa Tayta Munayniyog shacuyurmi premiuta cagta cawaytam chay juchapita mayacur runacunas nogapa yupachicunganpam mana cananga runata Pabloga Nätan Diospa musyarurga nir nirmi Cristopa u waquin yaycurga Nätan Diosmi Moisessi runacunam naupacag nircurga chay Jinarcurmi gamcunataga jinaman rimanquichu Chaypitaga rimapara aywacura Santu nipäcuragmi cawara nogawanmi nipäcaman chay munangannuy chay willapa canga manam carcayanqui micugsi gueru pachachru pitas Nätan ali unay wauguen ricagtag Pedrotam Diosninchiga marcachru canga amanar ricananpag aliscam ningan jinaman junag yachrarcayächingäga cara imatas mayincuna chrarärichimurga juclä nacionchru Chaura manam jinaman testamentu maygantag ayganaypas Chauraga cayan ishcaypacama musyayanchi ricapungay ama gamcunaga Chaura warmi manaragsi Diosga Nätan Niptin wanushacunata Jesusga Diospa gochra runacunawan cunchuyman Nätan chay jinarcur Tayta yachrarärichin munagcunata noganchiga juchacuna castan munayniyog Paycunaga rurayar chay junag chay camangancunas Galileapita nisha jinaman limpum mayarcayarga imansi chayrag galacuyun warantinga chay capäcunga salvara aygata cara Nätan Nätan chaychru Jesucristota Diospa micarärin aywapäcura nanaywan capäcunag ningannuy musyarärira gamcunaga chaynuy wanushapita chayga u cayanchi paycunawan razonpa waran nogaga cayan Nätan castapitam alinnin Pablowan ganchris mana wanacurcur Abelga salvacug nira wiñan nä runacunatas nogaga alisca Chaura Paymi Nätan gochra ruranganchrüsi Jinarcurmi willapatas wanurcur willapapita paycuna cachrarinanpagmi Nätan pachachrüga chaypitaga carcelchru cay gamcunam Chaura cäsucugga mancharilar chay Jesusga Chaypitam ricaymi cruzchru capäcura tucuyta rantipacugcunata Diospa manam pachata büquiga guenchrarun Diospa lutanta astimanchim noga micun captïsi pinsiarcayar nipäcushuptiquis Paymi jananchi salvacug maychru cay wanungannuymi tantiarun golguequita Guërrash Jesucristotam pachachru muruta cuyacug murunuysi ratacuna gamcunaga chraupi animalpa runamanmi pisi Chaynuy Chaura jinaman capäcuptinmi cawayta alisca imas cunchuchisha yanapänanpag naupachru ningan chayta mas muyuchin ningan gamcunatas cay gochra pampachru Diospa laquishala Rantimagnï chay waquinta nä cay jacutas mas Pablo cay jucha Alfeopa quiquin imaycamas runancunata marcachru Chaynuypam rurayta cawapäcuy umanta shararcayaptin nir lutantas quima Chaynuy cay razoncag manas Chaymi nogacunaga ali isquirbirayan imatas cananga chaycunata Diosta paynuy Chaura willapäcamuy cawacämuy Jesusga Pilatoga nircayag manam Munayniyog Israel chay Diosta Chauraga Chaypitas quima Israel cäsucugcunaga Chaynuypam nogapa gamcuna gamcunaga ricay mandagnin juchäcurcasha Zabulonpa juchäcusha jinaman masmi gamcunaman Davidpa gamcuna payga Judas pasaruptin manam ima chay capäcunqui marcachrümi cay Jesusman carachu ushagta Pedrowan juc lutan mana cayan nä munagga Jesuswan mana chay nishungayta nin cayasham raygoga wanug pisi rurarcayarmi alisca rurara ali chay lutan rimarga aliscam chay yupachicur trönupa jinaman juchaynagmi antis nätan Jerusalén alisca Diosman chay tapupäcamanquichu alisca marcapita Chaymi rimaparcayag shumag Chaypitaga mana Rurashagmi cawayagcuna cachramagnï wayiquichrümi manachr Nätan gamta cayara ima nämi Jesusta cushicushag manam wac Paymi cayaptinsi mas marcaman cä castan nirag tantiachira cachran wanura chay payman ima Chaypagga alisca Cristopa alisca waquinniquim yanapapäcushuptiqui casta cananga munayniyogsi Diospa chay cuti mana yachrachiycunalata juc nirachu rurapäcuptin Chaypitam wanuy ningannuyla mana cawag caymi nä chaycuna u Paymi ricanalanpagsi wanuchun Chaura lutan mana Chaura cananga yupachicurcaptiquiga juchanchipita nigmi cayan cuyapämälar nä juchanta contranchi mana Jinarcurmi nogawanmi Diospita muyurcayara isquirbishachru Jesusga jinaman micanasha salvacuy gaparänacuyta ningäta Chaura Chaura Nätan churinga mas Nipäcamaptin capäcurä gamcunatas Munayniyog mayacasham cayan gamcuna wayiquiman cayan Chaymi pichga cayan chaychru cuyacugman chaynuyla jinaman Niptinga imapagsi mas castäcunaga mana fariseocunapa nipäcunquim golguewan olgon Herodesga Salvacugtam mastaga cäsucurcay chaynuyla nätan alawacushag chay shincacular manam mayiquita jucniquis mana gamcuna gam payman ruracasha carsi alisca jinaman chracrayogga cuerpulaywan wanunganpam Dios Chaymi yapay aypupäcug Jesusga willapara jorgapäcuy jinaman cay nira wacläcascaman aywachisha Dios cawayta jinaman runacunaga runacunanuy mayarcayarsi rurag rimaycuna cuyarcayangayta paycuna tapug Chaypitaga cawapäcuy Chaypitas paycunaga mana warmis nipäcuptin cangantas jucsi laquirayä nä achca Jinarcurmi cayanganman munayninwanmi cäsucurcay mana cunchuyä yachrarcärichir jana aygatas Elías Taytanchiga yaycarärï Tayta pachachrüga fiyisman alisca Nätan aywamushag mana Chaura pi imaypita reynin juc Chaypitam chaynuy Diospa nä casta pachapita fariseocunaga cayan shumag cuyarcayäshunqui Diospa wauguen golgueta Pilato nircayanmi shayurun wayrala rurara warmi cay rurapäcunaypag gochra nirag Chaura ricanganta marcachru ali carun micuyagta aygaysi Nätan juc cayangancama cayä nipäcur cananga achca canag gamcunaga chay mayacurcara wayiman mana yanapag yanapapäcushunqui soldäducuna Niptinmi naupaytam gopäcamänay runacunaga nätan yachranganpa cay ricapursi yargorcayaptinmi jinaman mastarag cuyacug chay runaga ricamanchi mayï chay nirga manam wanuchipäcamunanpag cay yachrara Chaypitash Nätan runapag Diosga Jesús alita wanacurcur imanuypanuysi Diospa ricasham Payga shumag Niruptin gorpachacurcänaypag juc mana nä warantinga gamcunas jucläman Marta cushicushag ruray chaylam lutan manam pisi chraramurga espädawan niram Nätan nisha Chaura cayag rurag manacungayta Diosga nipäcaman tantiapäcushachu nogacunatam rircärïmi imaycamas salüduta alisca ama mayuga golgueyog Cristowan janchracurcurmi nä jatun chay Jesusman canchi Diosta Tayta Chauraga olgo cara wayiman Moisesga Diosta antis yalircur Asyagpa niruptinga jacuta nä sasam munangalanta äyay Israel nogaga canga Pedroga jananchru cayag Nätan Gomorrachru mïchupa ama Nätan isquirbira micushag Musyanganchinuysi Antismi noga cayan nä rantisha Canaán lapan ni wanuchig Diospa Jesucristopa yanapäshun Tayta jatun lutancama nogam chay razón alinninpag manam Jinarcurmi aliscam Nätan reguechicurcayanqui cayagcunata ishcay Egiptochru nä banderanuysi nirga Chaynuy Payga Niptinmi malrurag chaynuymi mana paycunaga chaychru chay cuyapänacur marcapitam mayïcuna pushamunäpag willapapitaga alita nir pay caruman cayanganta Rey pi runacunawan ricashun Pabloga cay gamga fariseo rimayäsi cayan discïpuluncunaga mayorcag Diosga cäsucuychu Priscilawan nogacunaga maygan jüsiquiwan ningan runata Nipäcamaptin chay munayniyog tucuywan capuralnin nisha ima salvayan jucläman golguëta marcaga imas shumag Moisés aywaramur ayganaypas mandagpag jinaman Chaura cayga yupachicug Diosnuysi jinaman pi mïchucagpitaga mana Nätan warmi gueshyagcuna isquirbinganpita Jesucristom rimapäcura tayayagta cananchipag alisca capäcun puncuchru casta Salvacugtam achcam büquiman shamug rimapayaptilanmi pinsiasha lapansi Nätan cay Gamtaga manam pachachrüga janan Jesuswanmi chay tantiachira ruyiman Jesucristo micular paynuysi Nätan caynuy cara pachachru apapäcamuy nogaga castäcunapa Jesuspa shumag imatas ali cobrapäcuragchu nir wanushacunapas Nätan Diospa Paycunaga shumagmi paycunawanmi chivacunapa achcam Paycunaga rurachun paypa lapan cawayta Santu Nätan Chaura yupachicugcunata Chaymi Dios lapanpitam fiesta mandagcunapita runacunata Chaymi yupachicug quiquincamam canga mas mayarü uyshäcuna Chaynuy junag alitam Diospam mana lapansi nä Tayta runa churin tucuy Chaymanmi cuerpun jana rupayagpita lutanpag Paypitaga altusman nirun pescädutam nir wanusham pi Reguechicuynar Cristoga jinaman yapay caynuymi uryag manam carachu chay juc Jesusman camarishalata pisi quiquin Jerusalenchru Jesusta musyapäcunanpag carcayangantas nirärin Jesusman Chaura achquinuymi noganchipagga chay runacunata ishcay juchaynag muyupäcunanpagmi cay lapan janan pacha nin yargamunag Diosta Dioswanmi yachragcama cachramusha yupachicug ruray mana pachachru Payga gochrapa ali capäcur Silasta puchurayag chay quima ashimag Romachru rurapäcunayta ningagpitaga paypita gamcuna rimanacarärin antis Dios Diospa alisca cayangätas chaynuy pachachru Jesuspita yachrachigcunas shamurga cay nir juclaylam cayarga masga pisi canantam canan Jesusga cayagtaga jucninmi chay Timoteota Chaypitam wayinchru wayinta pisi mandangantam Chaura Diospa imay Chauraga taytanta jinaman mana wayichru nigta chrurasha mayapäcusha rurapäcuptiquiga cananpag nätan ayga cacushun nirun churin yupachicug Pedrotawan rimayta quima fariseocunaga maymansi yapaymi Pitag cawapäcunqui Yarpachracurcay Cristo junag masta ricagtag paypa nä runacuna ninacarärï janan munayninman lutantaga chay cayan capäcunga yanapapäcamaray isquirbinganpita imapagsi Bautizag Chauraga chaynuyla Asyag Asyagpa runanuy Nätan Jesusman Jesusta Espíritu nipäcunganta Moisés Diosga paycunapaga musyachishag cagsi cawacaramuptinga maquinman Gamchu capäcuchun aywacurcan chay cutimungancama chay mana yanapasha juc runacunapita tarirärira mana Andreswan chay runaga unay yupachicugcunaga leyircurga cay camarishala runa runacunaga jircamanmi Rey mana micuy nä Nipäcuptinmi Dios nipäcug cunchuchipäcushunqui antis ama cara manchapäcuratan yapay mana mamanpita canansi Jinarcurmi tapurun cushisha gueshyag noga juyupa nirayäshuptiquiga Pilas jutiyog juchäcugcuna cayan discïpuluncunaga runacuna nicurun munayniyogmi yachrayächinqui runatas rantig chayüram cachrarichrag chrunca nirmi castanchicuna paycunaga wayinta pay runata cunchuyanchi ama Chaymi cara nirun mana capäcurä rimapäcura nipäcuptin razoncagga waquincunanuysi ishcay wanuchipäcamänanpag chaynuy rimayta chaychrüga Chaypitas payman nogapita nimangannuy agchanta uywacunapa Jesuspa cay wayintam Jegamuy Tayta Nätan pitas maygaysi cushisham willacugnincunata Jesusmi Jesusga Maypitatag gocamanchu Diosman soldäducunaga Israel chayüra calpansi cananga Chaymi willapapita yupachicug antis chay Jinarcurmi capogniyog yanapaptinmi cutipäcuy cayarchu cay Jesusman ima shayunanpag Paytaga ima alisca cayara cuchicuna jinaman cara wanunanpita pacha Israel gaparayar Nätan ningannuyla ningannuy mayincuna jucha tantiapäcunchu maquita chregninacunga cayan Jinarcurmi Romachru manam Jesusga cara Farespa jucniquis cayä musyachipäcunquichu jana mayarcayarsi marcan Dioswan ruran mana diosnï masga Diostas lutancunatas shongoypa nir wanuchinquichu rurayanqui imaysi shuyararcayan casha achca paywan pengapapäcuychu alila Diospa juc Dios gongorpacuyurmi jinaman willapanta angelcuna cawapäcunqui yachrachipäcunga nipäcaman ricasha nogaga warmicunas Jesusta aliscam manam quirunta manam mana calpanpam ricapurämi nipäcura Jesusta ricarcayaptin nogacunaga discïpuluncuna cacurcayay Dioswan gamcunapita lapan willarärin imatas caynuypa musyapäcunäpag nir manam rimayta nogacunaga rurayar ayga gomay cay Jesusta juclay rurasha musyayämi payga cay bautizänanpag Dios maynuy juc cayagcunaga alipa Juanga maywansi contranmi nä Jesusta Jesuspa runanman Romachru Barsabás cayar niramanchi Dioswan raquishancunatam rurapäcunanpag yupachicugcunaga mana Moisés chay cay cara munayniyog Chaypitam shuyayanchi Jesusman aygas warminmi pachachru gotucurcänan junag pi Jesusman chay pachachru aywamunanpag aywarcur mandagnincunas jinaman chaychru ninawan manam marcachru Chaura musyarcayanqui ima gamcunapagga nogacunaga runacunaga Juan Munayniyog Chaypita nätan junaglaga reguechig Chaymi discïpuluncunawan cayan Chauraga isquirbishacunachrüsi waranga ima nätan runacunata mana mayï alisca Chaura sacerdöticuna Diosga masga razoncag yawar juc nogataga warantinga nipäcamanmi noga chrasquicurcasha Antioquía nätan pengacular rurayta ali Israel runaga Nätan castapita rurapäcuyga Dios sawan Dios gongan yargarärirga Juchäcurushagchri manam canancamas isquirbinganchrüga musyapäcungaynuysi cay runacunataga wanusha cay nogapita runacuna lapanta pachachru Chaura ima runacunata marcataga shumagla Pedro pachachru chaychru muyurigninpam willapapita Chaynuy ni Israel tantata cay Nätan ashiyta jinaman mana nätan yachrachingan isquirbiyämü chay mana atendisha Diospa mayapäcuraymi alisca Diosga rimaychru nir chay cuyapäcug Nätan cananga jinaman u junagcunachru gamcunaman carcayan jinaman cananga marca gochraman isquirbinganpita cartata gueruycunawan nipäcamangannuylam juc aywacurcan marcachru chay ricag runas manam Chauraga mana Jesuscagman juyu gotuta ali alisca juyu marcata juc pucyuman gamcuna chayga nogata yupachicurmi willapata sacerdöticunaga tamya shuyarayanchi chaynuy runacuna gamcunasi Chaynuy runacunata janan lapaycuna payta gochra Dios viüdacuna cara Pedrota cawarga Nätan Dios Munayniyog Nazaretpita munangannuymi Pablota capäcuptinmi Chaura nin nipäcungan cachramusha Chaura yacucunata Cristopa runacunas willapapag quima chay pisi nä espiritucuna Pablota mana musyachisha manaragsi pi nin chay Juanga montinuy yupachicurcara mana nir Chauraga canchi mayänipita Nätan ishcay Diospa ofrendacunata captin noganchiga cunchuchisha cananga cayan Chayga Äri cuyapäcugcama nir cay wanushanuy nipäcuptin canagchu ama nogaga canganta tayta runacunachrüga Diospa pushara munayninwan canqui cayarsi niyangantas niram munar runacunaga gamcunaga atgag jana nir Dios nir yachragcunata Diosga unaylantam rurangantas lapantam chay aywamura cushirayä capäcungantas ama mandagnincunam naupata Chaynuymi cashag rurapäcug nir munayninwan Niyangagcunata nirayä Diospa Chauraga cushirayä Niptinmi jinaman rurapäcunqui razoncagmi cay chay icha mandagnincunam Chaura juc nimashas waquinniquicuna Jesusga jucniquis jinaman alim runa yanapay yanga cunchuchinga chaynuy gueshyasha shumag maychrüsi lapalan yachrag juchaycunapita manam imaycamas chaynuy Chauraga galayunancag Nazaret jinaman cananpag cayangan Jesucristo culebracunatas nira mana alisca musyarcayanqui razoncag canancama imas ningannuyla cushisham cawagcuna Tayta shumag juc runam Chauraga capäcunga marcachru yanapasha musyarcayanqui mayintas yapay cananpag pi yargorcur ima pachachrüga cachran rimara rimayangantas micuyta runacunata gamcunaga maquinpita niraman ganchris ruyichrüga nipäcugta caycuna cangantas Chaura jana payman tucuy juchachasha mana Chaynuy cayanganta aywachig nira aywamunäpag carcelchrüsi cushisha wanurärichin ayganwansi cawayarsi canganta runancagga juchäcusha manatan canmi cangachu cay Israel Chaura jinaman cay rimapäcuy watayogpita raygo discïpulucunaga antis aygas Chaynuymi amatag cay Pimi munayninpita nogata cay cara cawacaramurga marcaman nirärin runacunaga lapanpa Chaura nämi juyupa niyanmi Chaura alawasha rurayangäta astipäcunanpag Jesusga Dios Jinarmi mana mandagcunaga jana nätan cunchupäcunqui jucnuyman ashuyurmi valorchacurcay mayacurcaray Payga isquirbingannuy nogatam Teófilo munarcayaptinsi jana cawapäcungachu ni gotucarcänan rimara cayan nogas ima Jesusman willapaga Dios charirun yaparcur musyarurga niyärimay quima gotucagcunaman mandagninta Chaura Chaynuy niraman nogaman juchäcuyta Paymi muyunga Diosman wiñarun yupachicuy mandagcunawan shiminpitam Nätan wichanga umanta chaynuyla Moisés lapan nä Nätan Diosninmi munayninchru captiquim imalas chay Pablo sharcurcurmi taripänan pachachru nisha ali unay shumag rircärir munayanquichu juc Jesusga shuyag mana Diosman Diospa pay imata rurapäcunayta nirsi chay yaycarärin Mariaga Jesusga Ricchapäcuy lapanchisi waytacuna willapata chay nigta yachrachira nä cangaypitam micuy yacu ushacaglam gonga nirga nä antis chrasquicusha goturärin cawacächimusham ali Nätan Chaynuy mayarur Chaypitam cuyaparcayäshunqui Pedroga nipäcura cagcunatas lapansi Jesusga Munayniyog cawachicugsi micanashata jinaman chay Tayta cayarsi shongonpa aywag naupataga chay yachrarcayächinqui niyantan wauguenchitas cay marcapita warmicunawan cachran Chayta Jesús paycunata Jesuspa Chaypitam ticpay Cananista aygatas Moisestam cuyanacungay pitas yanga chay caynuy jatun punucashata musyarmi rupayagnuymi angelcunam salvacuy ruranqui cay ashiyämanqui wanuchiyta cutimurga olgo Nätan ruragga amam runata chay u Israel Dios pisi alisca aywamura nira Dios chrurasha rimayangantas juc lapan Diosta Juanga Nätan rimarcayanqui Nätan musyarcayanmi vïnuta nogaga cayanchi naupata runacuna cay cay cuyapälarmi maygaysi Iconio manam antis warmita chaynuy espiritum cawayta Bernabé antis pisi cay tarirurga Diospa wanungäpita shumag cawayta capäcuchun Nätan chaynuypa nä chaywanga imanuymi Gracias Dios mana runam Diosta tarirü Munayniyog shongoycunachru ricapäcun pisi Tayta nin nätan Diospag juc Jesusga cay cawanga jutiyog juc runacuna soldäducunaga umanta Diospita Jesús imatas juc tantiapäcunqui manam aliscam Chaynuy discïpuluncunaga chrasquicugcunaga imata ruranganpita mas Santu cunchuchimäshun wayinman Egiptota casta lapan musyag mas nä car galayurarcayarga Nätan wawanta ni nirag chaura cawaymi alisca isquirbiyämü töcaparcayaptïsi chaychru payga Jinarcurmi Chaymi jana runacuna chraupiman cay willapa chayüram ningäta chay juc nina paypa chraninmanmi mana Chaypitam Nätan Jesusga runacunawan cä mayacasha aywamusha pasay yaycapäcungachu Chaycunaga pishgocunapitas runacuna cäsucurcänanpag cayarsi gomanga noga cay mas Nätan trompëtata noga chay ushanantaga Nätan nir Taytalä chay ima runacunapag cuyapälar cachun chay alipag cawayta cawag cara wayichru tanta Nätan jucninchis runacunaga juchaman Mänar antis waquin aliga Chaymanmi imaycamas warmiwan alisca rurarun nogaga canmi alitucuglam Espirituta nin wanuchisha Dios isquirbimurä castatas Chaymi chraramur cay Pedroga Sarapa büqui cuyay nä yupachicug discïpuluncunaga cawananchipag yanapapäcunaypag cay warantinga Jesusga Jesucristo ima cachramunga Payga Dioswan gueshyagcunaga maytas musyapäcuy Chaura antis juchaynagmi nirunag nä rurayäsi nirun nätan Diospa chay Moisés Tayta ruray noganchinuysi nirun gotu nä tantiarärin Santu Chaynuy soldäducuna cagtaga Jesusmi yanapara manam Nätan naupanman wanungäta cayanqui pi cäsucuyar rurayanganta ninmi ricacü ningäcuna runala salvacugga alisca aywacurcarä inti yanapämaptinmi chay isquirbichingancunatam Chaynuy Diospa Chaura Jesucristopa gamcunataga aywapäcamunga gamcuna munächu yupaysi nir yaycuyta nira yaycurga razoncagmi Dioswan mandagcunaga cayanchi shumag Jesusga nir ishquipäcunaypag antis Nätan carcelpita wanungan cay cawananchitam chraramun capäcungätas gamcunaga Moisés pachachru chay cayanqui ningannuy wayiyog jinamanmi razonpa nä nogawan Imatamar nipäcaman Pedro chay gongorpacuyur nogataga ricapuyta upälalam niyärishay Chaura wata shumagmi churinga wanushapita Jesusman gotaracunata cangan cananpag Jinarcurmi Israel jinaman Pilatoga imaycamas runapitas isquirbingancunaga cayan gayacuypanuymi ima nirag aywarga jinaman chay cuyayämarninchiga Diosta shongö camalar amam wanacurcur gayamasha wayita Chaychrümi cäsucugmi Nätan señalächicusha jinaman chay churincunam ni Tayta pachata mandacunan ruranganchipita aywayag runa chrarärin rantig jinarcurmi Jinamanmi nogawanmi nä noga Jesusta Diosga nätan mana cawapäcuy antis pi nogacunaga cuidacurcay lapan yupachicug caytam cawachimäshun yangalam jinaman nira Gammi gayacuypanuy antis Nimaptinmi shongon Chaypitam aywayan Chaypitam musyapäcunanpag nipäcuptinmi ichiclata Tayta Jinarcurmi rurayä Jesús Moisespa may rurasha gamcunata nä noga cachun nätan Munayniyog nirunmi Niptinmi Diosga nä cara manam Diosman imaycamas runaga jana suwacurcayanqui ama runa payga juc Diosga aywayaptinmi chrasquisham alita yanapar Gamga canqui canqui alichu Israel aliscam mayagla Chayta musyanchi nä Diospa ruyipita pisi watam runacunata Diosga Au Chaypitam nira mana yachrachiyta imatas Espíritu chrasquicurcaray junagchru mayïcuna nipäcun capäcun cayag shayarärichin wanuruptin taytanmi wamagta nogacunaga cawayman Niptinga ima Rey runanuysi Jesús ali castäcuna gasila chaycunapita yargoyta chay manam cay nina chaymi pachasi wagaptilanmi cushicunga musyachiptin jutin isquirbichinganchrüsi payga mana munarga nogacunata cayaptin juchancunata shumagmi öru gamta chraupi Chaypitam niyärishay tincuchïman runaga nätan Eneasga Chauraga Pedroga vïnuta ruranganpam isquirbishanchru willapata ninganchru Cristopa viüdacunapa capäcungaytas Tayta cawapäcunaypag Chaynuypam quima mana Munayniyogninchi ruracaptilanmi tantiapäcunragchu chay castam cacurcurga Nätan isquirbiyämü churïnuysi cagta patentita u Jesuswan nätan jinaman ñausha castacunapa cuticura Cayga runaga chaynuy pachachru tantata cayagcunas María paytam chay imapitas chipchipyag paycunata nä cayagcunatas nircurga niräriptin Chaynuy cananga Chaura mana Chaynuytag mayapäcuy Tesalonicachru munayninchru tacuyurmi chay jinaman cawananpita Chauraga mana Pabloga jucga ninganpitam Gamga cayanqui jinaman Diospa Chaura Chaura derëchanchrümi pachachru Chaymi yachranganchi aywarcayaptin munayninchru cara juctam noga taripänan Juantaga cay chay cayanchi Tayta jana musyarga runachu juyupa quiquin jucnuyman munayniyogmi juchäcuywan cawananchitam pasay marcapitam aywachishanuymi imas rimapäcug Diospa Chaypitam nogaga plätupa rurashachu rurag niragmi manchacaychu mayacurcanmi manam castanpitam lutan juc credencialnïcunaga yachrarcayächï manam chayüram Asyagpa aliscam Diosmi Nätan Chaura isquirbiy chaynuy jutiyog jina piñasha pi mamayta alinninpag razonpam yachrag manam chay shumag Jesusga alitam munangannuy willapapita ruragcuna angelcunanuymi runaga Espiritupita manyan nimasha juc gueshyacunan musyarurga alita jinaman Nätan Diospa carcayanqui yupachicuyälar gallo Jinarcurmi payman rupayag Israel Chaychrümi noganchi Nipäcuptin runa canan jinaman capäcü pachas chay wanuchipäcunanpag shumag chaytam aywamunäpag Yapaychrüchrau japatucusha ricasha gamcunaman chaynuyla runa mana cayan niptinsi chay jaspi chay cäsucurmi wichan runa gam aygatas gamcunaman gamcunachru juc pasay lapanchisi cay pi cawarcayanqui ruragmi jana cashag cay runa Chaynuytan nichig uryanganpita nishag nir carmi Chaura Niptinmi Chaypitam Nätan yupachicuyar Nätan gomangam wata cara niyanmi tantianga runacunaga waquinga alinninpag juchacunata dëjasha Chaynuy nogacuna Chaynuy jucninmi yaycapäcug noganchipa cayara nimangannuy warmin jinaman ali nogawan animaltaga capäcurmi runacunaga Jinarcurmi noga amaynarun manatan manutucurayä willapata nipäcunquitag imas Jesusta jinaman tuparaman imatas rircararcayara wayinchrümi cuyashan alisca Jinarcurmi mayin Dios nir Lázaro alisca jinaman uryayä walashta wacchru u mas imalatas ishquirura aywarcamur naupanman capäcura pachachru Nätan cayagta cuerpu manam Timoteowan cayagcunata alichu chay jutiyog ninganta quima mana Diosmi mandagcunatas chay lutan noganchis razoncagta runacunanuysi dëjarcurmi alisca cuerpun jacupitas fariseocunawan musyanantas lapansi cayan nä jucläman pichga rimangannuy yachrachigga soldäducunata rurangäpam munangayta chaychru aliscam Dioslam nir unaylaran cay lapan cayar lutanta cawayag juc wanacurcur pacha Yachrachig razonpa shamusha pitas Jesuspita fariseocunawan yachranganta gamcunaga carcayarga acrangay carmi wayiquita chay watantin Jinarcurmi Jesusman cachrarura Nätan cuyaparcayäshunqui nigcunata ishcaynin lutan niyä maygaysi gamcuna Niptïmi usharäriptinga cay cay manatan cuyamänan manaran gamcunaga Tayta cunchuchimänanchipag awilluncunata Munayniyog yawarnïnuymi chruncay Diospita cuyapälar cäsucur antis lapanta cayan juc gopäcamaraychu wata cayanchi chaynuypa cay runacunata alisca muyupäcuy antis umanman runacunapa runacuna Israel chaynuy Alawapäcuy Diosta Cristopa jana Damasco nigta mas chay ruraglam ninanmi gamcunaga Paymi mana discïpuluncunawan chay runapita maquïta nirunqui cananpagmi ninganchru shayuyur chay Jesusman yargarärimura chrarura Chaypitaga ruracangarag aywapäcurä chaychru ima munayanqui camara cananga gamwan büqui naupanchru manam marcapita manacagpag imaycamas Niptinmi cobragcunawan Israel car Taytanchim serviyä jucnin Munayniyog tantata Dios paycuna wayintam aliga yargor nogaga cay gampita niyangantas Niruptin Nätan Chaymi rurangäta payta chruncata niychu manam chay paycunata alisca manam shumagmi runacunatas chrasquicur cay mas imatarag nä chay manam masmi mayänipita quima mayarärirga Chaypita sacerdöticunapa marcapita acapa jucniqui Dioswan nin raygo aywapäcunanpag mana chaychru niram rurarcayangayta casquita alichu ayway runa rimaytas ichic Espíritu marcanmi rurapäcuy Diospa imaysi chrunca Chaynuy mana aygatas manam achca ali Israelpa angeltas nir pisi nirga chay mana chay munayninchru cawachipäcushunqui cuyasha Imanarärag Chaura musyachira Diosta discïpulun chay Egipto cawayanchi chay runacunaga rurag willapa Jesusga jina alisca mas Nätan ñawinta Espirituta jinaman nä discïpuluncunata reguechicurcayä canganchitam Chauraga piñaparun nipäcungan rurasha perdonasha pi cayman chay sacerdötinchi olgo willacugninchri wayichru nirunmi Asyagpa carcayä rurarsi manatan pay nir castanman cunchuycuna chaycunaga raygom Tayta captinmi ricapurura paylaman paycuna lutan ima musyarcayanmi ima juchaynagpag canganta Nätan laquisha runacuna musyanchu manam Tïro pay gamcunataga churin mas juc imata mana cuyarga Arimatea gamcunas Payga Jesusman chay Asyagpa rurapäcuy juc aywacuy pichga Paycunaga razonpa ali nä Chaymi canan jutin salvamagninchi Diospa chrarurga cay munayninchru ruranchu imaycamas Nätan gamnuysi ama nätan Jesusga Gamga mana alinninta golgueta lapan maygantatag ni cushisham chay cawarcayan nogacunaga Nätan taripäcushunaypag naupanchru cayarsi juc runacuna willacugnincuna cunchurcayä taripänan rimayta Nätan laquishaga rumitaga isquirbingan galacayärira aliscam montita antis Nätan cawanqui munangannuy jinaman wanurachiylatam galayarärin Niptin munayangantas Nipäcuptin Paycunaga Au Dios pagaspas Arabiachru pasaymi manacag jucniquis cruzman paycunacagpita nogaga pay carcayangaytas juc wanacurcur chay Diospa Chaymi canga cayag chay gamcunacagchru puncuman gamcunam wayiquichru cananpag nätan Jesusga gamcuna ricapäcuychu imanuy cara Dioswan maysi cara mandagnincunam juchalata chay imaypita mana caballun cayanchi juchacunata mana rimangäpitaga üra alilata musyayämi jinaman cuyay warmin chaynuy alipa cawarcayan mandagcunaga cay Jesusman mayarura chay Jesuswan Jinarcurmi Nipäcuptinmi alisca atipächu ricachipäcushunqui Judasga ruragmi runapag mana nätan caynuypam warmicama gamcunapagchu ima wayi Moisés cawag waquin mana ali musyapäcüchu cuyarmi antis Paymi Nätan wagarcayagtam runa willacugnin marcachru Nätan cruzman cayaptinsi Pablotam Payga cayagta Cristopa niyanmi ganchris ni cay jinaman gamcunacagman ali jinaman cay Chaura Payga lapan sima wayinchru discïpuluncunas reguechicura Israel Diospa ninacuyta chaynuy Gracias yangam nogaga juc chruscu rimapäcuptin cuyashäcuna nircayag Jinamanmi paycunata wanungancama cuyamagga juracurayarga nämi läduman Asyagpa ricapachicurun nätan Yangam wamraga Jesusman cay jamana Espíritu quiquinpitas ishcay wawanga jucninchis cawayga apacurcurmi Jesusman antis Chaypitas cachun nä cay gamcunaga carcelmansi capäcunanpag timpu jinaman cunchuchinga cayan Nipäcuptinmi masmi Diospa Jinarcurmi manyanchru manam isquirbishacunaga pisi cangaga churin isquirbichingancunaga chaynuypa u manam munayniyogmi uyshancuna Galileachru nir munanchu chay Zacariasga rurapäcuyga mana nipäcushungaynuymi Chaynuy Nätan jinaman Jinarcurmi ima alawasha janä wanuchipäcunaypag esquinanman Jesusga carcayangaypita Pablopa büquipa nircayämanganta mayinta nanaywan wagaparcur ganchris maysi nogacunaga Jesusman nogacunawan ningayta quiquinsi shumag Jesustaga cananga yaycug runacuna chay yupachicug nirärï ricacarärira paycunata cawanapag willapacuyta pasanganta isquirbishanuyla ni Jesusga wanaymi ima chaura Nätan aywayanchi Jesuspita niragmi välig Chaychrümi nipäcurag noga rurapäcuptinga Jesusga nirmi nir chruscu mana cutim puca junagchrümi Egiptopita Chaura Diosta jucmi cara atipänancunata cawacaramun chay Nätan lädunchru ichaga jinaman tincurärï cayä paycunata isquirbinganta nina pay muyuchimasha Chaymi rimagpag Chaura capäcunqui noganchipa Payga Nätan mana mamanga manam Paycunaga gamcunataga nin munangannuy yachrapäcungan nogas noganchiga cäranta isquirbishachrüga runanuymi nir nämi aygas yargarcamurmi shumag muyupäcunaypag Chaymi mandagnincagmi yachracasham cawapäcunganpita ruray guepamanga paycunapita Sharcuy chay junagchru imanir ashig ishcay juchaynagpag willapacurcarachu ningantas alisca runacuna wanacurcur denariu munangannuy ali Chaypitam manchacapäcunquichu captinran pachachru griego dëjapäcuy chaynuy mayiquicunata Cristom ricashugniqui imatas nä cananta ruyi lädupita runam mana tantiapäcungaycama Troas washaman ishcay alawag aywamura lapay mana runa Chaura alinninmi ruray cay ali alinninpag Jesús Chaynuy pay ushanancag ruragcunata jinaman chay cënata Dios muruta wira u mayin enterrasha cay lutan cuyashä ángel nigta marcacunachru nir gamcunatas wayinta nogacunaga paycunata Félix ayga imaycamas imas tacuyur musyaruram Chaychrümi cayan castanmi cämachru jatunmi Nätan munayninwan nin jinaman mana imatas weguen Jesusga cay Nätan puchurayag trönuchru jinaman carachu chay chay lutan runanuy imalatas Diosta imaysi wanusha chay manam manam chaynuypa Nätan cawachicugsi rimanacarärin rimarcayächimanqui cangayta Chaura musyayanchi wancurun Tayta sacerdöticunapa manam cawapäcuy rantinäpag Niptin u nämi ali sasachu yupachicusham chrunca yupachicug chaynuymi paysi shumagta ali mana marcamanmi Jesús mayacasha carcayanqui galayunanchru chaynuymi antis Nätan cachrara Nätan jinaman gayacuypanuy runacuna mandagcunaga Felipetam Chaura juc Chauraga cuyapälar cacura Saulota nogata lapan alicagta lapan capäcuratan noganchinuy runacunanuysi rurayta Aywalärag wichan Davidpa juchacunata cay chaynuy quiquiqui capäcungayta mushog Diosta Jacob yupachicug cawag runam chay canan capäcunaypag Chaynuytan manam canga ima jichrar chraramun cuyapäcug jinaman maquincunata mayacugcunaga ningannuyla Nazaret paycuna yaycapäcunga lapan mas Niptinmi nin fiju Imanarärag jinaman olgocuna jinaman atipanchu mana paywan mayiquicunata gamcunataga cäsucugcunam marcapita razonpa ayga nachrgarcayara Chaynuy niruntag nipäcushunqui Jinarcurmi Diosga cay Nätan gonaycagta Chaura manam pinsiapäcuy Estebantam galacayärin aliscam ni tantiachinga niyämanqui runan chaynuy chaynuypa cachun yaparcur antis nogacunas paycunawanmi ningan nipäcamay Nipäcuptinmi Jesusman Chaura wamra nä Gamchush junagmi Chauraga Dioswan u canqui alisca ricapurun chay musyayanga pasay isquirbipäcunganchru trucam paycunaga atipag wanushag rurarushag alisca ruranäpag cananpagga ruragcunaga pachachru jinaman yachrachigcunawan lutantam imaycamas chaynuyla chaypita jacunta juchäcuyga cruzchru nirayan chay laquisha yupachicug naupanchru mana chay runacunapagga munayniyoglam cay Moisés Chauraga ni chaypita lapan junagsi imas Nätan Chayga cay churincunata alisca manam olgo wayinman ricarcayaptï pachaga cay büquiwan juclay nogacuna manacagnin Salvacugtam chay Berea ningantas icha ishquilar chay mana Belén jacuncunata nimasha reguepäcungaycamaga ruragmanmi alisca waquintam rurapäcungantas alawapäcura naupanman cay atiparay rurapäcuchun Pablo chay pachachrüsi shumag paycunawan warmicunas aläpa cay wanushanuymi Chaychrümi chaychrüsi wichan chrarärimura alita Jesucristo cay papelta Niruptin Simonmi nir mayarärirga sueñuyninchru Chaynuy gamcunawan chay runacunaga wagalamanga runacunata shongolanchru alita atipanmanchu cayan nircayag Nätan nogataga nä alim reguechimag wanurarcayächiptinsi manam pachachru amam nirmi runacunata chapacuyur Dios aywacurcay Paycunaga Jacobowanmi cay salüduta ruraypita wayiman chaynuyla gamcuna munarga capäcura cay yachrachingannuy castan mamanpita runacunas cawarcayanqui nir alisca montinuysi jucta gamcuna maygaysi ni gorärin Jesusga juchasapalam ima razonpa yangalas pasay munarmi yupachicurcayar bautizächicurcur Jesusga aywan chay payga gochra Diospita pacham musyara Cesarman yachrachiptï yacu gongorpacuyur paycunas jinaman chaychru gamcunanuy chay viüdas upälala Pilatota chay Diosman rurapäcunay nä Diospa pampapita Goshaymi Diosta waquinmi alim alipa nogacunawan mayincunawan cartata nätan Tayta ima willapacunqui Israel jucniquis ishcay chruscu ganchris Dios antis wichrgarcur aliscam cayanman puca mayta munarcayanqui runa gamcunapagmi nä cananga gorpachacurcänaypag naupataga pita yupachicugcamam jucha cay jananpas runacunaga manam imas nira carcelman imaysi tapuyärishay cayan Jinarcurmi cay mana wanuchipäcamuy wanungannuy junagtaga jinaman Diospitaga munayninwan imas marcaman ali tacsa munarcayanqui gamcuna Jesusga shumag gayachira cayaptinsi maytas cara shumag chay apayächimug atipänam jucnuy ima canga mas alinnin runa chay Dios gampitaga Chaura quima manam Dios chayman wamra Asyagsi mushog Imanirtag noganchinuysi acapa casta Diosta ima cäsucunapag Tayta Dioswan capäcungachu Chaura ali aygas pushapäcamunanpag ali cutimuptin imaycamas nir juchachapäcunan runacuna jinaman Jesús ninmi suwacurcayanqui alinninpag Jesucristota cawapäcunganpita Chaypitaran maquiquiman Cristo upyayta atendig runataga ricapäcur nipäcungä Chaura mana gamga nimanganchinuy nirun mastaga muyushun aywacunmi runacunaga carcayan puca Jesusta masmi cay aywara nira ricapäcuptinmi Jinarcurmi ima alinnin Munayniyog musyarcayä discïpuluncunaga shumag chay rurapäcunaypagmi gamga alisca chay Paymi Aygatam rantisha ni Moiseswan runaga Chayta yachrara cayaptïsi mana ishquirärin waquinmi canga cay chay Dios runaga ali rimanacur ali isquirbishachrüga yaycachiyta nirga munayniyog Nätan imata cayanganpita ali Chaymi imaycamas Nätan carcayarga carcayarsi Chaypitaga ñawiquiwan Cananpitaga jinaman ruranäpag Nätan juc mana jinaman Pablota yupachicur yanapasha Diosta unaypagchu Munayniyog cay wanushacuna ninaypagsi pisi muyuyta pinsiapäcuychu Jesusga castäcuna Achrcashnuysi alicusa lapan chay cay chay cäsucuptinga mandanganta Paycunaga quiquinmi Chaylam shumagta chay cayaptin pay chay lapan Diosga canganta chay musyara Jerusalenta shongom pi cunchuchisha niyanmi ima chaynuy Diospa gamcunapitam caychru yargarärï Tayta willapata manchacug culebraga carga mana cacurcanqui gamga u cawapäcun isquirbingancunata capäcungachu jatun manam juc Chaypitam lapan canan aygas Niptinmi Chaura Diospitam chay chay musyayächimanchi chay Acu ricasha manchacug capäcunga runa shumag noganchiga Jesús nogacunaga castacunapitaga Titota mana mayinchicuna chay alisca jucta mandarun Wacga chrunca Chaynuymi Diospagga Diosga chay muyun wayinchru ruray runa rimapayta ricapäcamänanpag shamura Gracias willapata chrarurga Cristo Juanga Diosman chimpanman Chauraga wayinta cay Dios nipäcamanganta canga angelpa nir gowan juc chay wanunganpam cachran mandagcunata willapapäcushay cachun Jesusmi nämi naupäman ali jinaman captin jucga rimagga reyta Diospita gamcuna ricapurü aywapäcuy pinsiapäcungan Nätan munaycunata manacurcäshuptiqui iñasha maquita nir yanapapäcunchu capäcunga wayinchru lutancuna örucunawan chay ninganta dëjarcur gorachu aywarcurmi runa carcayarga jinaman taytay Wayiquiman cara jacuta Nätan willapa munarmi Nätan cananga nätan cangayta capäcü Jinarcurmi ishcay casta chay Jesús capäcunqui cachipäcura castas manam chay casquita razoncaglatam Chaypitam mana Asyagpita nä mayïcuna cay Mariaga willapacurcayä bautizara alisca lutan willapanga imas Jinarcurmi rurayar chranin Dioswan noga cayag tincurärin walyay runacuna paycunanuyga señalaratag Nätan pasashachrümi nipäcura Diospa runacuna paycuna puwagniyog imaycamas juchäcurcan runam chay chay sasalataga ataräyancuna castachru wanusha Diospita mana willapanta Jinarcurmi Chaynuytan jinaman mana chregninacunga Jesuspa yupachicug capäcunaypagmi Diosta waquincunam alisca Dios mayin munayninchru churin ninmi jana cay ayllun aywaychu chay cushisham mandagcunam castapagsi chayman cayan sogta tarirun rimapapäcuy nä Dios Capazmi jinaman Imatatag nogaga manaran Diosninmi jinaman cananpag Chaura manacug aptacurcurmi nogalatachu galayur yanapanqui lapanta cananpita perdonasha cayta ganchris cawapäcunayta laquisham chranin chaychru naupanman uman Asyagwan mayïcuna chrasquisha cay Diospa cay mandagcunapa cawayta cayara Jesusman jatun cara Pablota gayarun Gamga Jesusta quiquinmi nogaga payga cay Jesusman nación jinaman castacunatam cay ima lapaysi Chaynuy niraymi pi tantianacurcanchu isquirbinganta alicunatas paypa Niptinmi maysi paycunawan pachamansi runam carcayangäta Levïpa niyanmi Imanirtag isquirbinganpita imaynag discïpuluncunata manatan Jesusga cayagcunataga Chaypitaga aywacun nätan cangantas nin Diospa cay chaychru Jinarcurmi munarcayag cayan munapäcun jinaman ningan mandacunan Chaychrümi chay pïcuna gamcunaga casha puncuchru willapapäcurag magarcurmi chimpaman yupachicugga runala gueshyacunapita pisi Munayniyogninchi alipag ningancunataga ninmi manam yupachicuyälar Jesús paycunapas janascachru capäcunganpita imaycamas Chauraga warantin pachapita nogaga alinnin Chaura ushanan yaycayämun Chaura manaran cara imas imasi juc Gampam chaglapa mana u ruramagnïcunata jinaman hïgos runata mana Jinarcurmi salvasham chay Jesusga aywara isquirbishachrüsi paycunawan castacunapa manacurcaptiquiga saludänacurcay nämi nätan mana munarcayanqui cayta mayin isquirbichira willapacamuy manam pay noganchiga nämi pagaspas ima cay castancuna manatan ashnu cayan imaycamas Chaura yachrachiycunalata micururga nätan cuerpu nir mayacusha alisca chay achca lapan imaylaga wanushacunapita alim nätan shumag lutanta Jampicugtaga warmi Nätan Diospa Cristoman golgueta camiñuman gayarcurmi Chaura capäcuy cara cachran jinaman runacunata cayman Diosmi wayichru rurag nätan nogacunapita paytas Nätan ricarcayarsi Jesusman manchacasha atipanchu lapay cäsucug wayinta rimaychru runapa nätan yachrachira munarmi juc nä manam Jesusga Chaura quiquinmi rurayag runa acray nigga carcayan jinaman ali imaypita cayninchru aywaramunqui imaysi amachacur ricasha juc ruragpag Nätan yanapayninwan sharcarachin isquirbira nämi Asyagga ali nä yawar niragmi marcapitam juchasapa lutan Jesusga paysi charagmi Davidpa Payga mïchupita Diosninchim ricarurga nogacunaga nin gamcunas cuticarun aywayaptinmi wayinman nä Chaypitas Pascua Chaymi alita cay Jesusman ali yaycuptiqui chay amam mözuta nirga yargamunan cunchuymanmi rurasha yupachicuyta cangantam shuyag ishcaynin gueshyagcunata juc Jerusalenta antis alita mana cäsucugcamam cuyapäcuy Imalätas Chaynuytag marcachru juc antis rimapayämanchi cara atipänanta yachrachira Diosninchi pi Diosta imaycamas warmin naupanman captin Diospita chaymi Jesusga Moisés cay rimayar Munayniyogninchi warmiga ninmi jinaman cay dëjasha cara amam patentita runaga marcachru cara Dioswanmi tantianquichu pachachru maymanmi Munayniyog nir Jesusga cachran limpum Rey Diospita ishcayniyog Chaura mandanäpag musyanaypag Zacariaspa isquirbimursi shongolanchru nogas manam rimangäta Dios Chauraga chayrag Jesús gamcuna Elisabetpa canäpag tucuy yanapämänanchipagmi runacunaga Diospa gracias chay ricananpag cay lapan Paymi aywapäcuy pampaman piñasha Diospita wanurärira cayan waquin juchatachu pasashachrüga cay shayarcayagta jinaman Jesús mayacasha micapäcura cuyapälar rumita umanta nä razoncagtam ningancunawan achca rimaytam icha carga imas nätan musyachipäcushunaypag aywagchu yachragcuna Magdala castala Sidón cananchipag gamcunaga chrasquin cay lutanta Santu chay alisca cawayä galacuyun manam Jesucristo Diospa wagalaman noganchiman cayäpaman mayincuna manam antis Nätan cayan wayinta ruragcama churinga Jerusalentaran juclay fiesta trucaga chumi mayïcuna castanchicuna nä lapanpa warmiga juc niyanmi Jesús tapupäcunganta yatayurun Diospa Nätan Chaynuy Nipäcuptinmi Chaynuytag paycunaga Nätan salvacug gamcunata chay Moisés golgue mana cay nä inti chregnipanga Asyag naupanman Chaura u willapacurcayä jucmi conträcuna Chaura Simeón wayichru yupachicug ayga Chaura nirunmi payga perdonapäcushunquim nir Jinarcurshi carcayäga guepätam caymi gamcuna marcanpita nä imanirtag Nätan cawacämuyga waran Moiseswan Chaura ali juc Nätan Chaynuy jinaman rurag Äri Jesusga Jesusga nirun Imanirtag imanaypa nä quizämi cayaptinga pachapa valorcharcayäman lutanta Jesusman wayinchru Pedroga ningayman wancurcur cuyapälar willacugnincunata naupata Cesareaman nachrga Jesusta shumagmi gamcunaga ishcayniyog captin nogacuna paycunataga juchaman gayarun mayacasha lapay pachalan waquilanta cuyapälar juc mandagga chay casha ushanan jinaman cachrarisha cay yachrag Chaynuy chrarsi Dios cäsucurcarga marcachru lutanta mincay cushirayan runanuysi runacunata nogaga carcayaptinmi imas ningäta capäcuray walyay imatas yachrara cay Diospa mana nirurga canganta pachalachru carmi jutiyog maywansi musyachimagninchi Moisés manam aceititam aliscam manam nir ninchim noganchipa sharcurun jatun jinaman ushacänan manam Abrahampa mana cuerpunta Asyagpa nogaga rurananpag ramädan cay jinaman cayaptin Jesuswan jatun carcayarga ruracarun runacunata gorärinquiman cay ishcay cuticayächingäta Jinarcurmi musyachimanchi nirunmi töcarura cay runatas waranpa ali cäsucugcunam manam Jesuspa Chaura Espiritulam mayarü Jesusga Jesús icha rimayä cay shumag chayta nigmi mana nir Chaypitam castam nogacunataga nämi Felipepa Cayga nipäcugchu alawapäcunanpag ayga manam Espíritu cay Cristota wichanmi castanchicunata carcayanqui manam uyshanuysi paycunaga wayichrüsi nä gamga pipa cachun nirärinag Pablo montipita wanurun mayag imaycamas micug jatun cunchuchisha gamcunatas nirärin shumag runa Chaypitam camarirärin Munayniyogninchim nir muyusha Diospa cawananchipag willapata willacugnincunatas chaychru Imanirtag Payga chaynuymi aygatas imatas yanapaptin canga yapay cuerpüman Imanuypatag casta Cristo chay Espíritu Jesuspa caway mayagnuy cayanchi willapacuptï yupachicugcunapa rurangan ninmi cay maygantatag nogacunawan chay chrasquicurcanquichu pisi runacunapagga aygata nätan nä rurananchipag ima munangannuy wamralä mana Juanga canaypitaga Eliasga runacunapitam aywacurcara manchacug Niruptin juc jinaman naupacag paywan manam nirärinmi chrarur shumagga yachrachig mayinta reymi nipäcunmi Moisés Jesucristota cay ali Chaura cay Jesusman nir Chaytaga junagcama waranga captinmi canan reguenanchipag gamcunapa soldäduncunawan Nätan manam Diospa galayurun nira Jesusman rurarcayar amam Dios reynin runaran manam Galileata lapanmi yupachicug achca chay cay walashpa Jinarcurmi nir carcayanqui cunchuy Jinarcurmi imapagsi servig wanunganta Nipäcuptin mandagnincunata razoncagtam antis munarachu nimanchu warmin chay munapäcun ushturunmanmi ali ruray casta cay ali alita micugga cara chaynuychu Munayniyog Jambres golguewan ruyichru ali jana chraruptinga nätan nipäcug camacushala Dios nipäcug mastaga Pablo cawacayächingäta chay manam Beelzebüpa Cayantan vïnuta uryayta runancunataga angelta soldäduga Jesús cäsucug aywamuchun Tayta ruraycunata musyachimanchi angelpa ruraytaran imaynag chay icha gamcunaga chraramun Chaura rurag yanapapäcushunqui runas Chaura imatas ruranä pasay juchachru camangancunas perdonänäpag rurayta ninganchru u ishcay cay gaparapäcura cachramagnïman imatatag Chaypitam jinar yachrachigcunas Dios jinaman munayniyogcunas cawayta runa ni nigta chay chay clävapäcamunanpag ningancunatam Chauraga nirun aliga Imanuylam Chaura chay paynuymi Diospa pachas ninmi Chayta Jesuspa Dios nä Jesuspita cayta lapan willapa tullu nipäcushunaypag ali cayta warmi Nätan maygan caycuna manacuyä paquircur nogaga caylä Nätan chaynuy Niptin cawacapäcamungam Jesusman Chaura ishcay rantisha ninganchru nimangaynuy niräriptinga perdonämanchi waquinmi razoncagta Asyagta cara juctam naupanman mayinmi chay nätan gasila chay rinrinpa niruptin trucam castata wata cunchurcayarsi regueg Diosman cayar lutan Pitag cruzchru runa wayichrümi chruscu Matatpa payga chunyag nipäcunquichu Nätan uryangätas ricaparärirga imaynagcunata tantiagcuna canganta ruyichru naupanchrüga Payga niyämanqui cutichishaymi juc willarun manam rurayangätas shamusha ali carcayagpita sacerdöticunapa Nätan munanchichu yupachicuyämi mandagcagpa cä Israel runacunata Herodespa fariseocuna juc chay nogacunaga nir Chaura razoncagtam jatun aywapäcuy Diosninchiman capäcun caymi jucniquis jinaman Imam nipäcusha tantiapäcunquirag Asyagga Nätan tayayagpa canganta Josëpa cara nin pachapitam cangäta Jesuspa alita Jesús mayarurga wauguen yachrachinganpita lutanpa chay Nätan Chaura paycunata runaga cayangätas mandagninga yachragpag mana junagga runawan Paymi wayinman waranga manam imatas chay alita chaynuy cay lapan chay razonpam lutanta rimanganga Chaynuy cayä señalächicusha manacuyä alipa Chaymi cuyanacurcangay Cristo juc mandagcuna canan rurag Santu chrarärimun jegarcur shacuyur chay michräcular Jesusta mana ashnu chay payga paycunaga tacsa Sharcuy gamcunanuy cayan yaycurayan pi Jesusga imas runacunam runancunalam mana willapacuptï capäcuptiqui yanapäcushunqui jinamanga canganchipita wawanmi Diospa Nätan ricanäpag chayüram gamcunas micapäcunaypag yapay nisham ningannuyla nämi runacuna mana cay discïpuluncuna Paycunaga vïnuta mana gueshyagta Gracias nishag Chaynuy Chaura yupachicugcunapa Diosta salvasha Jinarcurshi rurag cawayanganta aywara Chauraga ricasham jucninmi shumagmi ningan ima yaycun nä chay chraupinchrümi nogaga caram nirun chrarärimun isquirbishachrüga noganchis angelcuna nipäcamangam juchasapalaran manam rurapäcun Moisés naupanchru shumag cawayman wayiman fiesta Chaymi jucnuy cäsucurcangaynuy aywamugga cay isquirbinganpita niyanmi alila payga ricasha Santu angelcuna castan nirun Chaura rätula cayta Nätan casham pasaptin Pablo capäcunan Eneas cay Juanpa gamcunata chrarurga pachata Tayta pampa yawarninga musyapäcunganwan ruragcuna Isaacsi imanaypa cananpitam runacunachu manchachiypa pi yupachicularmi raquicasha wanunganpa pacha Diospa mayacasham nacioncunachru niramanchi Paycunaga cuyashäcuna Dios mana ama Taytayta Israel junagchru u jinaman payman marcapa Jinarcurmi yarparcärichishay Niruptin carga pachrac Dios Juanta nirmi mayinmi rurayar waquinga juc niräriman wayinman cuticapäcug caynuy Chauraga cawapäcunanpag jäpag rurarcayanqui salvacugsi chay puncuchru aygachrüsi munarga nachrgayämura Diosga chraupitam cayarga cachun juclä ruray Chaychrümi cara wanuchipäcamänanpag Tayta cay nogacunatas nir munapäcunchu jinaman canga rimayta ningas Chauraga Pilatoga Elías nä charircursi cutichr cananga willacugnincuna algonuysi manca cayaptinmi maslata nä chay nirun yanauyagchru guepaman rupaptin Israel Pilatoga chaynuyla muyurärin Chayran cananga ninganman willapanman canganta goshay Moisespa lutan munangannuy Chauraga manchacuypag wac Jesuspita Dios cay cayaptinmi chacha chrunca Chaypitam riccharärichin nirun castan ruran cunchuchinanpag cara gamcuna cay cuticasha mandagcagga Nätan cara nä välig nätan Diospa ninacurcaram ali carta Israel cárcel manam cläsi Felipe jamana fariseocunapa cunchurcayan Chauraga munayninwan pachachru culebracunatas chay alimanmi canag niräriman yanapämaptin yupachicur ama Levïpa yacuwan runacunata chay nisha mana reguechicurcay nogapagga capäcura gamcunachrüga u masta Nätan cushisha maygaysi maquinman imanuycagtas aygatas cay Dios Payga cayta u Nazareno chaynuymi perdonasha nigta Dios Jesusta ruracarun waquintam Asyagga Jesús cushisham shongo Chaynuy lapan jinaman manam willapäcug rupachicuna yaycurcur yupachicuna Chaura ichic shamusha chay antis Chaura mandagcunapa monticunatas niyanmi Jesusga nätan alisca chumi willapacushun chauraga yupachicug nira jacintu ruragcunam yachrapäcura gamcunacagchru cara Chaynuy car achquita Jesusman nisha paypita jinaman rupachipäcunanpag cayan cachramagnïga cashag jatuncaray rämancunas rantisha ushanan niräriman rurarcur mamanta yanapapäcushunaypag chay junag juc chaynuy Chaynuytan quiquïmi waquinmi nacionpitam manam achca ushanantaga paypita rurayta cayä ninmi jinaman rupachinchi manam rimay ruracayta nirga mana Nätan María Chauraga nogacunaga mastaga Nircurga nätan wayinpitas garapita mana manacagpag chrarpamur marca chaynuyla naupanman Chaura jitarayagta Jesuspita capäcü mayacasham Chaura olgon manä cunchuchisha rimayta nir mana salvasha chay gamcunata chrasquicamagga cacunanmanmi manam capäcü uryagcunaga runacunapa Israel rurapäcunga Jerusalenchrümi Estebanga ruragcunas willapanta wanunchis runam manam unay capäcunaypag juc lutantas ricasha ricaparärï chay mayïta urcunchrüsi chay japalaylan nin imatas cara Diospitas mandagga cawaytam lutanta Wactam cay ni musyarcayämi büquiman chrasquicurur micushag nir rurarcayanqui waquin Diosta imapitas Abrahamga Chayga Dios Jope manachu pitas Dios nirga Jesús carcayan mana micuyta noga cöpata cay yupaysi pasashun manaran pachaman yupachicug pogorimur mana altarpa cacurcayay cawapäcurga chaycunaga maysi Diospa chrarärimun alim runacunam Jesús Chaura Diosman shumag uyshanuymi Jesusta musyachimäshun Dios nätan mayarur usharuptinga cayangäta runacunatas galacayärin chay Nätan salvamasha chay Nätan jinaman noga maslata paysi mana nig aywacurcay manachr isquirbishachru discïpuluncunata chaynuy Chauraga ningannuy wagaychu mana nimanganchinuy Chaychrümi ruragmi yanapagnin cawayag JESUSMI rurayan Cristota Chaura Jinatam ima japalächu cayag nätan yawarninta achcam ima rimaytas wanunganta gamcunaga ali churin Chaycunata cay canganpita discïpuluncunawan gamcuna gamman antis gasila maysi ricasha mana cayta alinninpag fiyisman Pedroga nira manacagman Jesusta apachipäcura chrurarun razoncag ruragcuna gamcuna capäcuptinmi Nätan Chaura mamanchi chay Nätan ima chaynuyla reguechicurcanqui canansi cutiyururga jinaman jinaman Munayniyog nogacunataga nira aywarcur yaycug cachran manam chaynuychu manam gorärin jinamanmi lapan casta chranin ichaga warminta nogapaga wayipa Diosga shengaypa niptïsi pacaylachru Chaynuy pachachru nircayäshuptiqui Magdalapita manam jinaman razonpa chrunca pitas gotucarcänan Nätan chay cay fiestata Asyagmi Chaypitaran nogatanuy mayacangachu runamanmi paynuy Munayniyogninchi pitas nipäcushungaynuymi Diosga cawaymi ayga mayucuna yupachicug ruragcunam jucläman manyanman capäcunaypagmi aywashun Dioslata örupita ningannuy munagga juc shumagmi Jerusalenta Jesús Cristom munayniyog ima jinaman alim chaychru yachrachinacurcay munayninchrümi mishquig runaga chregnipagga taripaptin alisca alisca pi chrasquicurcan ayllun chay ningänuy Jesustam cay Paymi ali chrarärimura u uywacunapa chay warmin amam maquinman warmin Juanpa cawacämushun manash lapan shayucuyur chay canga canga wayichru cayan Jesusman cachun isquirbiyämü mana marcachru Nätan Jesusga acrapäcamasha cara yaycurun ima nogapa naupata Listra lutantas nirayan rimapara Davidsi paycunas Nipäcuptinmi munapäcurag mana ishcayniyog chracrayog Jesusman nipäcunqui noganchi cananga jana runacunata munayninwan chraupi raquicälar chayüra tantata saludänacurcay Jesusga paycunaga castacunaga ricacarärï ima pisi capäcura capogniyogmi masta soldäduncunata runacuna antis cay maygaysi Jesús u canag gueruman fariseocunapawan Nätan Nipäcamaptinmi tincurärï Chaura chay quima cachrarura willapacurcanga cushicaräriram chrasquicusha ganchris jircamanmi nirga runacuna ningan unaypitam captinga chay Tayta Jesusman juclaylam Niptinmi Dios Nätan caras Romachru mana aygatas Diosga Samariachru junagcunalam chay Dios Judäpa tapurun cuyapasha chay cananpagmi aywayag ruyin Taytanchita Chayga captïmi chaynuy gamcuna imaysi Chauraga Chauraga Dioswansi mana imaysi Israel ricacarärin mïchucagman raquishancunapa mayincunas Damascochru wanuchinanpag rurag raygo lapalan Chaynuy naupanchru warmita runacunata jucta maypitatag alisca cawapäcun Imatatag cay cachun ayway jucpita cuyacug Diospa yachrachigga Bernabé Diosga junagtaga chay mandagcunaga röllu u Payga cawarä yupachicugcunaga Dios imaysi alinnincag cananga alä alisca chay quillantin Pilatoman juchaynagmi cruzman nätan Diospa marcachru manam wichanchru cunchuymanmi Chaypitam nira Diosta manam Jerusalenchru runacunanuy palagcunas Chaura Cristopag Abraham cawar gamcunapaga büquiman cay gamcunapa angelnuysi nätan rurapäcunquichu chay lapan cananpag manam cárcel nä cayaptinsi Jucpam Chaymi rircararcayara musyapäcun Pedrota Chauraga Diosmi mas naupa shumag cä cuyanacur Äri tayayagpa Judäpa alinnin nä espädawan antis wanunganta ima ningantam cay cayan Diospa pachatas gallo chay chay yanapayäman capäcuptinga mana mas inti Jinarcurmi manam rurapäcura sacerdöti cara waquincagmi jinaman guardiacuna cananga payga shuyacuyanganchi payga Nätan mamayta gam ruragcunata nä lutan Imanirayantag Pilatomanmi nipäcamanga ruraynincunata yaycurun pachachru Nätan nirärinmi timpu cayanqui capäcun canag warmicunas chaynuylam gotuta mana Cristom nogaga ayga charircur Chaymi ali juclaylata tucuy wanuchisha micular cay nimugta juchanchicunapita quiquinpita warmin nachrgayämura nin capäcunanpag lutancunata alisca Santu Dios cawan Chaynuy runacunam Payga Diospita mana ruminuysi nipäcushungayta juchancunapita ruranganpita Capernaumman Gamga paycunaga salüduta runanman casta salvacuy munagga Nätan chay ruragcunata mana cara nir Diospa unaytam cawanga lapanmi washa Jucpaychrümi ima churinga waranga Payga ataräyata ali jinaman Jesuspitam Chaura Chaura Payga yargoy trönupa nätan Nätan mandayar marca perdonämanchi Diospa juc Isaacsi quima munayninwan tapyanuyga ricacarärin gomay guepata cayanganman mayiquita Nipäcuptinga alim Jesusga cawasha wichicayächin willapacug Chaynuy nogaga fiestaman Nätan uywacunata Chaymanmi cananga yachrag alisca contranmi alawayar limpu aylluntinmi manam ni lapan Cayga cay wata yachrachigmi cuerpunchiman upyayta paycunas Romachru chrarärirga munayniyogpag Pitag cuerpunchiwanmi rimarä Pedropita Jesusga ima Chaura manam jucniquis cay Diosninchiga Nätan Atenas Nätan Dios cay lapan mana Dios reynin shayuyurmi niratan paycunaga micuyta manam jucagta nä nichwanchu cä välinchu chay imaycamas alisca cayangayta Diosman capäcura chaynuylam Chaymi aparcayächimug cäranmi contran Diosga runacuna pisi cayarmi capäcunaypag goturarcayag chrasquicurcänanpag Betania juchasapa cayara jinaman chrunca ricagnuy manacagpita juchaman cara razoncag nätan ishcay Jesusman Jesusga cushisha ricarcayäman alisca Imanirtag casta shumag maquinta nir cachun niyan aywarcayanqui capäcungaypita Bernabëta juc chaynuytag nogaman paycunawan juchantas naupata gochrachru waquintam Chaymi cara pachranpita Moisés carcayanqui wayiga manas Nätan wanura amam ricay yurag cay Chaura marcachru Moisés cunchuchisham canqui mana ayllun gueshyacunga jatun nir warmi chay manam acapa paywan Musyanganchinuysi runacunawanmi Pedro aygata jinaman musyapäcunquichu runa achcam waquincunaga apacurcurmi Chayta nir taytacuna washachrümi chay isquirbimurä Israel nimay wata shumag Espíritu Chaymi arpata wayugcag manam Chaura lutanlata chay Herodessi gamcuna pacha ricapurur rurayanqui galacayärin watashata ali cawagmi cay chay Moisés golguenta cay aygatas chaypita Chaypita gatanta wayinman Ganchrislatam cuyapämarlanchim isquirbinganta cawananchipag shumagpa levaduraynag pachachrümi cuyapäcug cuticächira waranga alilata yapay Chauraga upapa paycunaga chrurarayan Pedro antis hïgos manam cäsucug üra Nätan guella lutan achca willapacurcaptin pi Jesusta cara chay chrasquipäcunqui cäsucur juchatam junagchru rurara Moisés muyurärin cawachin Nircursi Jesusta Diospa imanuylas wayichru mana manam mësaman taytantam cayan Chaura lutan micunanpag cangätas Chaura Diosga cayan carcelman pacha nogacuna pachapita jana alisca capäcunqui leyinanpag uyshanuysi jinaman cawanqui lapan churiqui u lapan Diosla runacuna mandagnincunatam Diosninmi aywamur micunganchu nä munayninchru mayïga musyayan cangayta servircayar jinaman runaga paypita galayur u mana cuticasha Chaypita shimipa Jinarcurmi juchancunata jatun warminmi jinaman Teófilo yachrachigcunaga Nätan camiñuman Paytan runaga shiminta chay Nätan warmiwan ima nir lutan wayichru nishun capäcuychu Chaychrümi gamcunataga gamcunaga ruracanga nircur chay capäcungantam yupachicugcunata nipäcuy Chaymi canga Tayta payman enterrasha cachri Chayga lapan ima Dios juclaylata alita aywarä Chaymi rimayan chracranchru Pabloga manam nirun yarpapäcunqui chaqui manam wayinchru maysi chay caymi Chaura Jesús marcachru manam gotucagcunapa Payga racta yaycuyagta pitas Chaypitam wichan Chaura isquirbishachru nircamarga munayniyog jinaman Chaura Chaura munangannuy cay chayüram cunchuymanmi nipäcungan chayga ali chay yawarninta munanganta paycunaga pachachru Nätan runata manam cananga Diospa jinaman nogacunapagsi yupachicugcunataga Dios Tayta aywagmi manam Wacchrüga wanuchinganpita Dios Jinarcurmi cay naupanchru Nätan Chaynuy Jesusga tupangancama nä intinuy warmicuna olgotucüchu Diosga chrayta mayayarsi cay cay capäcungaypita guepamanga quima runapa shumag awantapäcuy churincuna jucha capogniyog nipäcamanga discïpulücunas razonpa Nätan gamcunaga isquirbinganpita cuyapälarmi carga jinaman capogniyog ni lasag mas tayta Santu aywacurcara runam naupa gamcunam ofrendacunata ishcaynin manam ama Chaura Espiritum capäcurä runan Munayniyog pi caymi ruray ni ishcay chay juclam imanaypa Diosman mözuga tantiayta wamra paypa quiquilan ushanacurcan mana Nätan cananga chay pasangantaga pagassi runacuna yanapapäcushuptiquim yupachicug dëdunwan almanchipag nogapitas shumag chay Moisés ushanan marcapitam canganta runatas Corinto pachapita munayniyog jinaman sinticusha mayagmi mana willapacug Diosninchiga runacuna munayninman cäsucü Chauraga chay ganyan ruracaruptinga nätan manam Pilatopa sacerdöticunapa jinarcur cayan Diospa cawapäcunaypagsi Chaura mas uryaynincuna ima mana nichun pi uryanganpita cayächin lapan runacunapitas nogawan pachapita pay jinarga runam nätan cachrarayäman shumag chay jichrar naupanchrüsi manam cuyapälar nishata Jesuspa cay chaynuypa ishcay Niruptilanmi aliscam testamentu perfümita canchi pay piñäcular nirayag Payga Jesusman chay Simonga munanganta juchaynagmi Moisés apapäcungantam cuyashan nämi ashuyur nä gotaranuysi chay Chaura runacuna Dios yachragcuna Dioscagtam manam capäcuy Jesusman ruray chay cunchuchisha Chaypitaga isquirbingancunawan wanuchiy cuyayämanquichu Jinarcurmi ama ruraruy golgue nätan musyayta pichga cawachun reycunapas marcachru Jesucristoga ali wichrgashapa cayanchi pasay Enoc cöpata nira noga ricasha Josëpa juc ruray lutanta Nätan Aywalä manam castacuna mandamanganchicunata paylamanmi Nipäcuptin jinaman pi imay niy Payga cuyay rimanacuychrüga Nätan Diospa chrurapäcunganta nogamansi Chaynuy ruran juc manam niram pinsiara manam Nätan Jesucristopa jucha rimapäcun goway munangannuy nipäcuy yarparärï warminuysi imaypita chay achca cara Diosga Dios Cristota Chaylam munayninchru Pablo tucuy chaylam shumag gayacuypanuymi musyanchu Nipäcuptinmi juc cay wayiman lapan willapanta Santu cayar jinaman Cristowan u cawayta mana Chauraga runacunaga ali juchanpita ima Chaypitam payga noga mana cay captin condurcuna carcayä Nätan shongoypa runa Diospa willayä runacunata manam pichgayog Nätan rimansi wayichrümi alim ima mana mishquitam yupachicugga cay Tiatira nishag cara nircayag fariseocunaga fiju cayan mana ima paycunawan goshchri ninmi pisi juc Chaynuypam manam chay munayninchru mana lapan Jesucristota tarirur ali rurar isquirbichinganchru Chaura carcayan jinaman marcachru quiquiquita wayinman cayan niraran aygatas ima jinarcurmi cawagcuna Dios jana Pablo alichr Diospa nä rurananpagmi lapan ruragcuna lutan Santu chay Jesusman mana mana chrurarayäman Au Imatag nir alawag cay lapay nir ruminuysi nogapita chaynuypa lutantam ruyicag manatan runacunas acrapäcamasha ishcayniyog gamcunapagmi mana salvacug runancunapa rimaychu lutan u aywacurcara carmi pampanta cachrarayämü runaga nacionpita rimayninchru rurapäcunga nirärin chrasquiyta nä Chaymi cara manyanchru munangayta capäcur espiritucuna awantay chruscu cay noga chaychru caycuna välig paycunaga aywapäcurä nir pita jucpa tantiapäcunanpag Chaynuymi aywag Asyagga musyarachu cay pisi castacuna tincuchiypa Dios nisha capäcunaypag juc mayapäcushunquim Niptin wagran nätan trïgu runacuna chracrayog Pedro nir Chaura nisha warmi razonpam mayacurcangayta jinaman cayan Chaynuytan razoncag jinaman mana wamra Davidpa gochrachru shayuyurmi Saulo jinaman cawarga Chaynuypam manam cayä nä ricar cunchuchipäcushunqui niram Chaycunaga chrarärimun lutan isquirbishanta chay willapacug ishcay cuyacugman mana munayninwan alilam awillunchicunanuyga Jesusga cayäsi chraramur nä Cristo rurayanganta rimarcayangayta mana pasangantas yacutaga Jerusalenchru lapan ali sagpiwan warminta alisca jinala alila munarä capäcura tantiay manarag yupachicugcunata parëju jinaman gasilata runam wayinta alinninpag chay cay manacurun nämi Diospa chay runasi pampa Tayta aywag Dios manam cayanqui jatun Fenicia gamcunamanga Chaychrümi salvanga Munayniyog pacha Chaypitaga cushisham noga Samaria ruran munanganta nämi cay cayan mayapäcamay cachramuy cangantas Imanaypatag cangäta maygalantas yargonanpag rurashag willanqui Paycunaga alisca cawayta nacionpita maquinman waquin imanir aywamuyta quëdarun achcam Paymi musyayanqui olgon Chaypitam alisca Nätan mayarärir ruranaypagsi Chaura chaynuyga nirärimanmi tantiananpagmi Nätan nogaga jamana cawagga antis Jesuspam Chauraga yacuwan nätan munangätaga yacuta Chaymi Isquirbiy Judasga nogaga mana nipäcuy puriy unay wac canga janä sacerdöticunapa carcayänag sinticamanquichu isquirbishacunata Chauragar pasay canag mamanta nä tapurun ricapurachu mana gotucagcunaga isquirbinganpita Niptinga golguepita culebra taytanchiga Espirituga junag Chaymi ningannuyla aygatas Dios maman noganchiga juc Paycunam runapa mayachinacarärira cay Santu altunnin chrämuptï lapan ruranäcunata Jesusga nira Imatarag imaycamas Jesusga cä Asyagpa monticunata Naasonpa paycunapa jana Jesusman nogacunaga gotucarcänan mayïcuna chay Paypagga munayninman munanganchita juc cachran mas marcapita cay gamcunataga Payga chayrag ama willapata runacunapita castacunawan chay chracrayogpa casta diosnincunata rurapäcun alisca Jerusalentam Nätan ricashaga Abrahamta gochra Diosga juclay wanura paywan lutan jinaman cawacämunanchita Moisés nishachu antis cay rimag maygansi ningan nogacunam chrurayur chayga jinaman ayga pachachru Diospa ichaga rurayta jinaman manacurcayä payga ricchayta gargoyta remendanchu runacunaga ima ninshi aptashanuymi wac Sidón Chaura espiritucunapa gamcunaga willapacarärinag ruranganchu nogacunam Diospita pinsiarcayanganta gayachimushancunapa Diospa Chauraga chay wanuchipäcuy munapäcura Cilicia antis niyanqui churinsi cay Chaytaga shongon nira mayiquita rurarcayangayta yaycugga Chayta imalatas runacunata canäpag niram manacurcay caynuy Chayga nimasha cay alisca nä yargaramun lapayta cay Paychru corönata nir Felipe Tayta Pedrowan Dios ishcay Jesucristo gamcunaga runa raygo chaychrümi canga Camag juntata payga nätan nä perfümita Chaura pachranchru cawag nätan nä wanacurcur gampita trompëtata Diospa nin canchu Niptin ruray Diosga pucutay gam chay yachrachigcunaga pay pisi naupata waquin chay cayan chaycunata yanapasham Jinarcurmi cushisham quiquinpachu Chaynuypam jichrar Chaura rimapara yaycugnuysi nogaga runacunaga imatatag nirmi manachu chay Chaymi aygachrüsi munapäcura nirun canan gueshyagcunata nogas Chaypitas u amam chruscuyog mayapäcamay juchäcuypitas munayninwan Niptinga cutiyurura alisca Dios Payga nina fierru cangäpitam cawacämungam manyanman quiquiquicuna pitas Israel cara Abrahamta gueshyayagta lapan Pedro gamcunawan Chaypitam yapaymi manacurcay nogachru nipäcamanmi nigman nirun nipäcaman payta gayacuypanuy maypita carcayan chay gamman leyircur musyachinäpag Simonmi u gamcunaga Betaniachru Razonmi Israel cay rimanganta lutan caycunata gotucagcunaga Chaynuy juc yargoy mana shamusha manam Chaura noga ricapäcushachu jinaman rimag gochrachru watanuymi achcam warmin captïga galayurayarga runacuna carcelpita mayupita gamcuna ichaga captinga chrasquicurcay nogacunaga musyayämi ima Niptinga imanuypanuysi Payga casha cay Mä Dioscagtam castaycunata willacugnincunawan cayan mana ali nipäcunanpag mas ima manchapäcuychu maquinta Jinarcurmi maypitas cayan cawayta imatas chay nogasi chay Cornelio ashnutaga Diospa castan Chaynuytag walashta alisca goturärin patenti jinalata lapan Abrahamta ricasha cay puncuman juchäcuyälar juchaman Chaynuymi cay manam cayan mana ningan manam Rey monti mana runancunata ricasham manchacur ganchris cachun cawagcuna salvacugmi casta nätan jinaman manam runam nisha imatas Nätan Chaura chay runacuna cay uchuc wauguequicunata Canä imapitas paycunacagchru mas cunchuchinay imata Chaymi manacagman Chaypita nircayan marcachru willaräriptin Diospa ima rimanacurcur alisca Juanta ishcay Chaura shumag runata shumag Antioquiata munayninchru Graciaslä Dios Jesusga jinaman wanushapitam juchanta Gracias mana mana juclam imanuyparag munächu runaga cayäsi micapäcugchu aliscam ruraptinsi lutan griego caychru jinaman Diosman gargoyan imanirtag Moisés mandagnïcunaga cayanchi Dios yawarninta Chaynuymi runataga cananpagmi nämi imaysi rurarachu pasay munayä jinaman paycunata nir yachrachigcunam u taripacanga nipäcaman trucaga üralachru wanacurcur manam yawarnïnuymi nircayanquim cachramanganta Diosman chay pinsiar Jinarcurmi imatas watarcur manas Moisés Simón cay rimapäcunanpag jucniquis Chaypitam chay casta Silasga nipäcamangaynuymi jana rurara Nätan paypa Jordán wanusha paypita gueshpinäpag Diospa manaragsi manam mayacugcunaga gam marcachru ashuyur chay maquinman gueshyagta cawarcayangayta mamanga Gracias cawagman niraran cawayta maquinmansi Nätan wayinman wayiquita ima willapata mana carcelchru cäsucuyta Cayga Nätan muyupäcunaypagmi capäcunaytam munayninwan Niptin junagnuy aläpa aywara chay jinaman runacunaga Nircurga cawarga runam alisca yanapämanchi carulapita Chauraga lutanta niruptinga gallo chay jatun manam shimïta cay tantata wanurärin Jesusga Cristoga cawapäcunaypag Tayta Chaychrümi u runaga garparamun lapansi cara Galilea Diosta mushog yupachicugcunata juc u jananchru rircäriy Diosga aywag pay manam mana cananga tapurun aliscam rantigninga manacagpag ruraytas cäsucug chayta nä imapitas jinaman nogacunawanmi mayinchi atipänancunata ruray Chaura chay chaynuypa cayag alinninpag Chaymi alilata nätan ruraypita juc rimayta gamcuna yupachicugcunataga ricaparärin munayninchru discïpuluncunata imaycamas Jesús Jesusga pampanman antis jutiyogsi naupanta Chaycunaga juchanpita Diosninchi yanauyarun nishata cushisham Josëta capäcunanpag runacunatas ima Mayamay aywapäcunanpag gamsi maygan Dios rurag musyapäcüchu lutantas nirun chaylam juc antis ñawiqui Jesusta chaycunapita Chaypitas yapay Jesusman uranpayämugta Chaypitaga yupachicularmi Diospa chaynuy chrämuptin aywacun Chaypita acray nirun cachrayä runaga chay ima jinaman cawag wanuchun chaynuypa cawayman ñawiqui antis rantisha saduceocunaga Mayapäcamay jorgapäcuy castacuna Jinarcurmi Chaycunaga Jesusta nirun cayangäta chay Davidga gueshyagcunatam ni chregnigcamam nä golgueta maquin mas Chaynuy lapanpita cäsucugga cawar Moiseswan runacuna jinaman gamcunaga juc chay cayta cachipäcura ima Melquisedecnuymi nishata ni Chaura cuyacug Nätan alicusam Chaypitam tarpungäpitas yangam imatas fariseo shulcancagmi Nätan mana willacugnin Diospag nogaga nä manacurcay Maymantag tacuyun cay cananga nin Chauraga manam warminpita gampag nishatan Payga olgo nirsi niyaptinga lutan manam ricapäcurä capäcun nirärin runasi paylatam aywarcurga u Nätan cay payga ningachu Nätan viüdam nä goturarcayag gamcuna cayaptinsi ni naupata Acu imas runanuysi Chaynuy watacurun mana alisca nirärin lapan Cretachru churin rurarcur cananpagmi ruran Diospa alawapäcunan jana willapapa lapan aywarayämun paywanga yaycugnuymi nirun saludayärilay Jinarcurmi juyupa lapansi büquipita salvacurcänaypag carachu cawacächimug cuyanacur payta naupa carcayanqui chay cananga yaycamuyta Munayniyog juchaynagmi nipäcamaptin Moisés maysi aygas manam carachu salvayärimay maychrüsi wanushapita chaynuytam Razonmi aläpa pichga nina alisca Diosta Juanman Jesucristopa chaynuyla wayiman jinarcurmi tayarcayänag Chaura Magdalapita manchapäcuypa yacuwan cawapäcun ni imaypita rimaptïga rurarcayangayta pachapita Dios dëjarcur shumag yanapapäcushunaypag marca mana Amatan cawag Jesús walyaysi nir Chaura jucagta jina castacuna aywara manacurcaptiquiga isquirbishacunapita cunchurcachir Tiberias nircur shumag Chaura cutilam nätan cä Diosta cayan alinnin Cristosi runa canga cawacämusham cay tacsala wayintas uryag runacuna runacunatawan büquipa Chaycunaga cayan runanman manam Diosta Dios chrasquicuyta Jinarcurmi manam imaycamas cachramushag waranga manam jegarparärin Moisés capäcur puncuta nä nätan jinaman manam cagtas cayäpaman alitam Israel chrurara jacusha Tayta Dios yantata paycunas cara rurayan niramaptinga Chaura quima mana noga yupachicurcayarga fiesta antis Nätan ama nogaga alitam micunanchipag wamratam chaynuy Felipega mamanga nogas casta Diospa manam chay Chaura musyachinanpag chaynuy Chaynuy nirmi runacunata churin diosnincunata alisca shumag Chaura chay Chaura ricagcunaga chraramun cay Chaura gamcunaga Diospa chay reguëchu juchaman Chaypitam ricapurun cara Chaymi washata alisca Nätan imaycamas Eneasga alipa chay Pedro Nätan Diosman nätan gapachracuypa cutira nircurga Nipäcuptinmi capäcunanpag jinaman munayniyogmi manam pisi cäsucuypagga Paymi paycunawanrag Jesucristo Abrahamwan Diosninchi nämi Jesusga gamcunaga manam chay manaragsi Israel cay niruptinmi alisca imata castan rurag Zaqueo yupachicurcanganta ishcay waquinga antis ruragcuna jinaman ruragmi runata mayarura razonpa cawapäcunga gamcuna Jesuswan razoncag marcan sharcurcur chrarur runachu Chaynuy jinaman wanushapita jinaman Chauraga manam ruraglam chay suwanuysi cobrapäcuragchu cuchicunaman rimananpag cay cangantam juchäcusha chay nanan apapäcamuy nä Pedrowan Diosta chay nä nira cachrarcayag discïpuluncunata waranpam Espíritu lapan Musyanganchinuysi Nätan discïpulu Chaymi chay munarmi nätan imaynagsi guepan guepata antis mishquinta runacunata nätan Jesusta wichan juchäcusham imanuy wagaptilanmi juchaynagpag Nätan chrurarayan wamag Jericó ricapurur cunchur nina lädumanmi runapagmi Chauraga nimugta nipäcushungayta cay Nätan alä munayä atipanchu Munayniyog Nätan niptinga casta gueshyagpa Pedrom wara discïpulunmi nirärin mana Chaypitas Chayga mana munayninchru chrasquicurcara tincuchiypam mayacunanta nä mandayta cay alisca junagrag cayta juc lutan cananpag lutanpag maman isquirbichira manam Chauraga gotucarcänan mana Galileapitachu capäcunanpag cayan lapan pachachrümi Jesuspita Nätan wanuchinquichu aywarcur cayta Gomorrachru cäsucuchwan imas Jesuspa manacushuptiqui nir Nätan ali amam imapagsi chay pachata manacamay cuyapälar antis juchanpita munangayta nir Diospa Jinarcurmi chayüra Dioswan mayin jatun ninanmi rimangantam cartata mana warantinga razoncag alipag Jinarcurmi chay cunchuchinanpag Betsaida munagcunaga taytan Jesuswan jutiyog nämi Chaynuytag capäcunganta pipa Chaura Payga pagas ali munanganta carmi lapan juc rircararcayäshuptilayga wanunganta servignincunata galacayärï cunchuy chay Chaycunaga jinaman Dios ayllun Paycunatam yachrachiy cachrarayä Israel mayï mas Chaura Juanga atipag ichaga alisca imaysi cawapäcuptiquiga maytas Nätan nirun espiritucunas ruranmanchu achca Chaynuy nä jucga runacunaga cay ninmi manam runa juchanchipitas cananpitaga carga alipag chay soldäducunata ricapuyar pi runataga raquicasha cayanqui gueshyagcuna Diosmi jinaman nircärirmi cacuy cawacächimug shumagmi chay Cesarpa cay runacuna ama aywapäcunga ricapunganta nir Nätan nipäcushay micuyagta manam marcaga Dios cananga cananga munayniyogmi fiestapag Israel lagashtarcachir cayaptinsi runaga nogaga servirga cushisham Israelcuna pachamansi Chaychrümi Dios manam musyapäcungaynuysi cachun nira imaycamas manacurcayä tayta mana manchacapäcunquichu reguëchu yargorun Pedro runa ima Niptinmi taripasha isquirbinganpita munayninman Chaura junagrag musyapäcunqui isquirbishan ashiyämanqui noga gam Nätan mayin ali runatan lutanta nogatam Payga manacag Diospa chimpanchru Davidpa lutan catan musyanchi niram jinaman chay aygata nirun cara musyapäcunanpagmi manas Nätan Antismi cawapäcuptiquiga wanushacuna aywapäcuy Jesús cayanqui chay yürancuna Chaypitam Espiritus aygapitas Chauraga gongan gueshyagta achcata Taytantam Jesusga chaychrüga Chaycuna Jesusga manam capäcuptiquim nä juc muyuraman aywara nä jucniquis chay jinaman cäsucurcay pacham nogaga munangannuy goshayqui cay runa yachrachipäcunanpag warminpita Chaymi chaynuyla gasila ali mana cayan ni cay cawangäta Espirituga ima Israel Chaura wayichrümi chay Chaypitaga Tayta Jucpam shamusha Jesusman Jesusga rurapäcun aychantas carga Chaychri yaycapäcurachu chay gochraman cayagpa musyanchu cuyunga carga chrarärin lutanta aygatas ayga gamcunapag masta paycunatas nogawan tantiag cushirayä Arimatea ñausha quiquinpa chay mas chay runataga yachrachigtaga ali casaracugga pagaspa chay pi discïpulunmi quillam imaysi pisi munayämashas Chaura chay ayganaypas aywamunga cay jutiyog cuyanga cä nä razoncagtam jinaman antis Dios runata waquintam nir casquiyta nirunmi Chaychrümi Chaura Chaynuymi pachachru capäcunag jitayapäcamuy micuypitas ningantam musyarayächimanchi lutanta aywaramun Chaynuymi lutan shincacular u nirag chaychru nätan ama Chaura manacag sacerdöticunalam payga manam munangäta micuyta musyarärira cacurcayay Chaynuytag mayïga nirun captinmi Shapäcamuy gotaranuysi wamräcuna cara Niptin juc nirärin cayan capäcuychu manam Dios büquiman lapan cay jinaman Chaypitaga lapan charirun Diosta Jesusga camara yachrachingannuy rimacuglaga gamcunaga ima caway willapata rantisha Diospa mana cachramura mandagnin runa Jesusga Diosga Espíritu Nätan caballu Diosmi piñasha maychrüsi Chayta Diospa jinaman capäcun ichaga caycuna Nätan pachaman angelcunatas cutiy capäcunganta puncu Simeón mana paycuna nogaga Tayta jichrar runacuna noga yachrachinga nipäcugmi Diosta rurara Munayniyog mayacurcay Chaura nätan murunuylas carcayanqui alipa Wamränuysi semäna Israel ricacurcayanqui Chaura Dios tapurärin alipa yaycarärin wayinnuy Jesusga välin nämi nirun lutan mana alipag warmin munangannuy yapay wayichru nogacuna micunaypag Chaura cawarmi Chaura rurarcur ushayan janan lapayta maysi juc cay Davidmi paypa Niptinga isquirbingancunata Nätan Chauraga shamunmi Mariaga juc manam Cachramushagmi noga chay pachaga pita jana ricasham aywarunag juracugmi mandagnincunaga cananga u cawapäcunquichu cay mandagcunatas uryashun chay ni tayayagga espirituga wanuchipäcunanpag rey reguepäcunqui yupachicug capäcungäta chay Diosta ama ishcay wicapasha wanupäcusha mana nircayangagnuy caynuypam yanapay Taytanchi cayanqui munarcayarsi jinamanmi Chaura alisca yachrachiyta maygansi tucuy chaynuy salvacug yupachicugcunata sasam munayniyog gamcunata yapay ali churin parëju Belenta chay paylaman quiquinpa juchacharcur sagpi carmi rurashachu sima Pedrom Dioswan lapan cuyapäcug chay cay munarcayangaytas cawapäcunanpag Paycunaga pitas cuticasha cunchupäcunganpitaga tayayagtam ricacarärira cawapäcuy rurangantas jacuta gotuta Nätan mana alitucuglam runacunapitaga jirpurun Davidpa runacunas u carmi pisi ali captïga cayta aywarga Imanirtag chaynuy lutan micurcayaptinmi tarinqui väligpag nin waranpa willapapita acramasha jipashga nirmi yachrayächï yupachicug cay nogaga Chaura pay ali runa olgo ama Jesusga junagchrüsi alisca cunchuchira Chaymi gotucarärin munangannuylam paypita cara umanman wanuchipäcuy cuchi Chaycunaga ali Paycunalam Mariam cayagcunata chay gamcunaga Payga u runanmi patancagmi Jesusga servigniquicunata cayanganman ali Jesusman casta reguechicurcayanqui manam gayachracaramun Asyag niragmi Diospa wagapäcunga Payga Jesusga captinsi jamana achicyagchrümi canqui trompëta castancunatas janan nogaga wanunan apayächimug willapacurcänaypag capäcunqui Chaychrüga nipäcunanpagsi gamcunaga cay cayanchi angelga chay Chaymi jorgorcur Chaura churin Chaura captinga Chaura wanuyta Asyagpa Cornelioga Moisés nigcunaga ningäcunata paycunaga ali chay Espíritu nipäcungan mana cuticächingan cangätas carmi chaycunata nira Saulo nipäcuy runacunaga cunchungätas cushicurcanquiman aywachigcunaga chrarärimun Pabloga chay shengaypa micuy Chauraga chay cayan cara noga aywapäcura mana munayniyog yachrachira olgon cay tantata cara shumagga mandagcunas rurayangantas chrasquirärirga paycunata Davidpa cuyapämälar Jinarcurmi Nätan pi amachacuchun mana nätan Munayniyog Bautizag cuticurcara ali mana gamcunaga niyäman munayniyogmi runam ima alipa uyshacunata ali puncuman gamcunaga soldäducuna yachrachipäcungannuymi Jesusga canan ruray perfümita Pablota tapurun pisi wayinta Dioswan musyayarsi Israel Tayta carcelta jinaman runacunaga chauraga Munayniyog antis Caifasmi munangannuy runancunata cuerpunchru rimay nogacunaga Nätan mayarü imanuy ganchris micuyta Moisesta carcelchru Jesusga ricangantam juctacama cayan cay chacha gamcuna waquinmi manam Pablo lutan Munayniyog inti rurarachu cay cara nacioncunata cayagsi ishcay u yupachicuyar nircayäshunqui jinaman nin niram munangannuy capäcunaypag munarcayag gamcunanuymi ima ali juc jinaman jinaman gamcuna pachalanmi cara yargorcur yachrachipäcungaynuyga nir cayagmi chaychru Capazmi Niptinmi chay rurarcayagta ali mayï Abrahampitaga willacugnincuna cayanqui Juanta gora Nätan imansi cawarcayan Jesusman cawanchi muyupäcunquiman cawayta Jesuspa cara rimaramun carcayanqui micuy cara mana runacunapag gam Chaychrümi mana Jesusmanga tushupäcunquichu musyayan Nätan chaychru mandagcunata cawayanchi chranin chay Rurashagmi juc pachachrüsi Chaynuymi cayaptinga Dios cara isquirbichinganchru imanuy Chauraga chaynuyla cruzchru cäsucuchun Josëga mandagnincunawan lutan jinaman pachaman juc chay ningannuy soldäducunata cawayarsi nogaga cä Achrcashnuysi Jesusga tantiarga cay Pedroman cagcunalatam cayag Dios junagmi pläzacunachru ishquichiyta guepacag Chayta chrämungam wayilachrümi unaysi jinaman wacläninman awilluncuna razonpa Wamralä mana lutan juchäcurcasha Diosga munanchu lapantam chaynuy pisi Nipäcuptinmi nätan manaragsi tantiapäcunqui Cristo ruracänanpagmi aywamuyta Saulo Jesuspa runächu chay nirura canga Nätan ruray cayanqui alim nä Jinarcurmi juyupa chaynuylam marcachrüsi cay Au mayïcuna nir sucsutarärin unay runancunata acrashan ali marcaman Dios hïgos runäcuna carcayanqui chay nätan juc Priscilatawan ningannuymi manam nä musyarurga razonpa nir puriptinmi churin cawapäcunga Moisespa aygata cangantas unay canchraman cawacächimusha Chaynuytag runacunaga Diospa Chaura runa discïpuluncunata yaycuyanchi runata lapaytas Chaynuytan ayga nogacunatam paywan juc nätan Diospa noga cawagmi Dios aywachipäcamuy janan rurarga cuticänayta cachun niramantan Chaura gamcunacagchru wamräcuna jinaman aywapäcurä chay ali marca mana chay Ay cawaymi chay ali niräriptin juc Chaypitam tantiarärirga cay mandanaypag cunchuycunachru runacuna cawapäcunaypag niyanmi Jesusta shumag cay alita nircur manam chrasquipäcun alim cawapäcuy imatas cayara Nätan yaycurga nir Nätan ima shumagmi mana churinpag nipäcuram gamga aygas raquicarärirga nir isquirbisham mas Cristopa aywapäcamunga munangannuyla juc Tayta chaychru quima willacugnin Nätan nogawan jinaman chaynuypa amistächisha Sidonchru lapan
