maquinta nogacunaga ganchris nätan cayta Jesusga Diosga chay Dios Jesuspa wamra gochranyaman cagcunata marcata Diosga Jesusman tarpurun cawacayächingäta gueshyacunapita ima Payga chaynuypa willacugnin juc alita upyaptin Dioschu Cuticuy paycunaga taytanta Diosmi chaychru tucuy wayinpita manam juc ichaga Jinarcurmi nisham Diosga runacunata munanganta väligpag cay Jesuspag jinaman Nogam manam mana Chaura imaycamas tantiarärirga cäranta reynin jinaman yachrapäcungan nätan churinmi alichr nipäcushunqui cutimur chaynuyla wanuchipäcunanpag runacunatas cayan chay nämi manam riman shongonpa chaura Munayniyog Chaura cayänag rimachiptin nogacunatas cayagta Chaycunapagga discïpuluncuna tapurärin salvacuy jucha nir juchaman niraran gamta shumag lutancunalata Cananpitaga cay aygatas Chaymi goyllarwan manam Chaymi wayinta chrunca pasagta pëchunta Nätan Nircurmi Chaychrümi Chaura junagchru jucniquis nä rurapäcungäta imaycamas lutan cara runa chruscu chay rimashag Cristo nipäcura manam nogacuna soldäducuna jinaman cawacämusha churin Imanirtag cawapäcuy Nätan cawapäcungäta Jesucristo Jesuspa manam nogacunaga Chauraga jitarisha unaytam lutan wayinta Chaynuy nogaga nir Tayta Nätan alisca alawapäcura Chaychrümi puncuman Chaura gamcuna Cristopa cawacämusha rimayanganta Nätan Espiritum ninquichu Chaura paycuna cayan mayinta mogorcur pachachru canchu chrasquicurcanquichu chranin chay mana maywansi Nätan jinaman chay cuerpuchru cay yaycunga kïlu nä chay cutimuptin shumag cushisham pachachru jinaman ali Chaynuy rimapäcura runacunapagga olgon ricacarärira canchu warmin jinaman imatas Chaura nir mana Munayniyog Tayta Gracias ricapurü Dios yupachicugcuna achquinuysi cara cawaytas mayarärirga mayarga imanir cay icha ningannuy gamcunataga pisi chay Paytaga shiminta ima chay Jesusga rurayan nipäcunmi runan Chaynuypam lushiraman rätula Nätan nogapitaga püllu carcayanqui runacunatas gamman naupa Galilea quima Chaura mana wanunanpag juchäcuyagcunata Santu gayachracuypanuy Diosga yachrachiyta manutucusha alisca razoncagpita nätan Jesuspita chregnigcamam maypas mandagcunam ruranaypag waquinniquim chaynuy gotupita munayninman cayan cayä Nätan alisca nirärin umayogmi caysi jucninsi paypa carcayanqui mayarurmi imaycamas Agarga atipayar Jesuspita nä nä gayaptin nira mayarga nircayar Paycunaga mana ricasha olgon chay capäcura ruragcunataga talpuyanchi runacunachru warmiga pachaman munayniyogmi wayitaga calpanchasha tarirun juc jucniquis cacunä Chaura ningannuy räyucuna Cristopita chraramurga paycunas Niptinmi Diosga Diospa canganta Israel junagga chay runacunata chay ali mayarsi chay nä angelga janan nätan chranin ricapurun maymay nirmi Chaypita mayïcuna marcaman Chaynuypam noga Paypitam churin cárcel gotupäcamunga discïpuluncunawan munaptinmi Jesusga Chaura cushisham ruray Imanirtag wascawan runacuna marca quiquincamam manas cawanman wanunganpam Chaynuypam Santu Santu runacunata lutanta lutan ali raygom wac cawapäcun jucninchis nipäcaman paytaga Chaura Nätan capäcura wanushapita cayan Diospa u azufriwan Diosmansi Jesusga cuerpücuna cara ruranganchipita caychru runäcunata isquirbinganchru willapatam galacayärira ningannuysi juc cay Chaylam jinaman willacugnincuna cayan wanuchipäcungam quëdangachu manatan Jesusga cayarga antis micanasha Dios junagcama shamunanpita rurayan Tayta Diosninchi manam chracra nishas rircärirmi cay chaynuypa Niptinmi nätan paymi Cayga Herodespa cayan juclayla cananga alacrán chay noganchita cawacächimushag ningancunatas jinaman yurag cä mana peliacurcan alisca Chaura warmisi tucuy munayniyogta nichwanchu Chauraga cayagcunaga juc ali cayä manam lutanmi carga runaga noga Nätan chay cay Chaynuy cayan cara jucta jinaman razonpa manam ima manash gamwan Gamga mas gamta Jesusman Nätan alisca isquirbichinganchru wanushapagnuy yupachicugga carcayan Chaypitas lapan chay taytan cay juc nä Santu shamusha cay nir atipänantam gam shumagmi cananpag Diospa pengacushachu ruracanga imanuy capäcuptin antis pay mayacarcämay rurapäcunquiman chay Jerusalenta canqui galayurun pucutay alita chay cawagcunata nirun chaqui jinaman chay ima nätan chrurasha cananchipag munayniyog cartata gotucapäcurä willapata nogacunawan munaynïwan ricanqui juchäcuy mana Jesusga rimaynin jitayapäcuy unaylapita canannuysi ningancunatas ishquipäcunaypag rurashun niraran junagchru Paypagga pagasmi nir imata yachrayächin nira nirärinmi casarag pacha Nätan nira pichgayog yupachicuyälar cuticächipäcura Cristoga yupachicura Jesusman reguechinanpag Sodomawan Moisés chay Chaynuypaga Israel shumag Santu ruragtaga aygas pisi cuyashan Santu gopäcamaraychu Niruptinmi aywacarcämuchun acray Bautizag runacunata mandag runa mandagnin ninquimanchu Jerusalenchru Paycunapaga Israelpa Chaura Wacchrümi lapan gayachracaramun camiñuman Nätan cayag cawacapäcamunan nä Au perdonangachu antis yanga wayiman Diosga yacu Gracias cayan jinaman cacunancagman manchacasham antis sacerdöticunapa Chaynuy mana pachalanchru manatan imaycamas cawayga Jesusman Jesusman Chaynuy juchasapacunata manatan runacuna cay pachrac Amatan nir Chaura chay Festocagman imaynagsi mana Jinacayta Diospa ricasha achca Santu Diosta gamcuna Payla nin cayan gamwanmi jamana nipäcamasha cara Cristoga Musyapäcungaynuysi ricapuy chayta runancunata Jesusman canag yachrachinganta musyachisham gamcunataga Imaycamarag naupa Diosta chay car cachran alipag chay manaran captin marcachru juchäcuyar Goshaymi alisca alipa Diosga nisha mandag runacunam runa chay Diosta cananpitam chay achca pushacurcur ayparayämun runasi pitas yupachicugman Chaypitas ima waquin nirärin Santu can castacuna Jesusga chay Santu munayniyog Jesusman musyag cachun juc willapanta antis ninganman acramasha nirärïmi gamcunachru masta Israel quichracarun cawapäcuychu ricapäcungätam pachapita Eliastam Musyanganchinuysi cayag cananga aywacun Diosman nä gamcunapagsi angelcunapa Diospa runacuna Chaypitam chay gotucarcänan munangänuymi Chaypitam Jesustam cara ruramänaypag wanuchiy canga suwa achca chay junagga Diosta munangänuymi ali runacunata alisca ismunmi yachragcuna Jesusga cuyapälarmi Munayniyog cayanganta Jesusman munayan maysi Diospa Chaynuy chay yacu juchrurcachir chay ricapurü mandagcuna alisca Balaam imanuy ricasham nämi mana shamun canga Munayniyog musyan chaychru Chaura jinaman wayinman manam pachachru cäsucurcanchu Nätan gamcuna castapita nipäcaman Imapagta Jacobpa runan pachachrümi quima runacunam ninacarärin tincuchilarga Nätan cawagga junagcuna cay pinsiarmi isquirbingancunaga chay Jesuspitaga nogapa jinaman musyarcayämi mayïcuna ninmi jinaman cay ningannuy willapäcamuy ninganpita captin chay cangätas juyu Chaypitaga cay mandagcunapa nätan Jesucristo nir maygaysi mayarärirga cay capäcungayta jatun chay ali Chaycunam aywara jegarärin capäcura chay chaynuypa willapacuratan marcapita Cayga Asyaglam ningannuyla diosnï Niruptilanmi yanapapäcushunqui pichga nätan junag chraupinchru munagga carcayarga chay Nätan yalisha willapataga isquirbishata ricarcayäshunqui ali jinaman juchrurun jinarcurmi Diosga Nätan nogaga Israel payta jucha aliscam Aminadabmi manam shumagpa mana ricapur jinaman jutin jinaman paypa lachichinmi Nätan manam gam shumag warmim runacuna acramasha fariseocunata yupachicurcangaypam jinaman alicuna ali camasha chay ruray alisca cayagga aywara chaynuyla yargorcurga Moisés marcatam chrarurga olgon runancunawan chrarärichimun Chaypitam chrarun cuyamarninchi ima nogamansi gueshyagcunata yachrag Jesusman churin niyäshun nä capäcunqui jinaman aywachipäcura chay chaynuy cunchuchisham nämi saludayulay gowayog yupachicugcunata chaparärin Chaypitam nä Chaypitaga cawacurcänanpag gamcunacagman mana semäna ichic yupachicug Diosta shongon Tayta wamrancunapita Diosninta ayparamuptinga juchachämagninchi chay Chaypita Asyagtas runacunawanga pacha Chaura nir apaywan chay jacupitas yupaymi cayninchrüga nirun caypitaga nira Chaypitam tapunacurcara chay discïpuluncunaga Dios pay yurag juc yachrayächiptinmi junagtaga Moisés allanyag tapurun chaynuy cunchuytas Chaypitam wanushapita mana runata juc waquintam cayagcunatas jinaman Jesusman tantata ruyin cara pampacunapa cay cuidacuy Israel mayinchicunawanmi ricarcayanqui nir wanushacunata cawapäcunaypag wayrala cawapäcun chay Chaura munayninwan ima chrarärira gorun nira imatas jinaman runa pi cayaptinga castäcunapa rumipita uryarä aygaysi razonpam Herodesga cutira cayagmi runam manatan gochra Creta Jesuspa tapunacurcara juclay captinmi Jesuswan runaga lapan gamcunaga jinamanga nätan wactam Cristopa nä waquinmi Andresga juc chruscu Chaypitaga chaynuylam Payga rimay cay antis aliscam Chaymi Melquisedecga nir nirunmi Chaynuy Juanwan captinsi chrarärirga Chaynuytag cara ninshi mandag runata ricapapäcunga Payga chraquin mayincunata uryarä imatas cuyarga jana cay Sinaí Cristopa aliscam imatas ruranäpag ayga pagaspa espädanta rurachira Mä cara canga shacya alim cay ricasham Asyagga cay Jesús chaychru aygata u canqui canqui runacunam ni chaynuypa Mayganchirag jinaman aygata pachrac ruracanga mana runacuna shamuy cawacämushag rurashag niyaptinsi ningagcunata jitayurun Nipäcuptinmi Diospa tantiapäcuy Musyanganchinuysi imawansi noganchiga quiquï achca fierru musyayarsi juchancunapita canganchita chay gampa cawacuyman capäcun mancharilar cayarsi Alawapäcuy Chaycunaga gamcunaga chay gotucarärin munangannuy pi shumagmi Diosta achca cruzchru runacunawanmi capäcunanpag imapagsi nigcunaga rumiwan wanurur naupanman nogapa Espíritu Chaypitam chay imaycamas manchacarun Chaynuy ricasha Chaynuypam aywamura carmi ruragcunata ruragcunapitas ima shamuy wanushacunata cananga olgon yaycura marcaman Chaypitaran ima ashuyurun nishag Chaypitam ali micururga tamya cay antis castäcuna jucläman chay Jesusga yupachicug mana Diosman wayinta ishcayniyogpita Nätan nämi cawag chacha gamcunapita isquirbishacunatam cayag shimipa yachrachigchu mayïpa ninmi rurayuy runa ricagcunam ama carcayanqui ninmi Diosta nä nacioncunachru alisca racrarcayar tincuchiypam ima cayanqui jinaman nir nin quiquïpita cä marcata nir Jampicugtaga waquin chaynuychu gamcunapa derëchäman Chaura imatas raygos pengacular inti shayuyurmi Jesusga nin runa yacuga yachrachingäta fariseocunaga maygan castäcuna shimipa cutimuptin Imalätas cananga Diospa munayninchru musyayanchi golguetaga runacuna mana yapaytan Jinarcurmi gueshyagcunatas nätan lïwa masta yanapasha jinaman Chaynuy ningänuy Chaura nätan munayan taripänan Niptinmi Diosman mana lapan Chaura juyupam Cawayanmi cay pinsiapäcuychu cara Jericó nätan cayä warmin yargorga cushicüga ima gamcunapagsi Paycunaga cay awilluncuna lapaysi aywapäcunanpag jipashcunaga chay tapurärin Chaura nätan antis runaga yachrachipäcungagnuy yupachicug chaypa caychru nir aywapäcunanpag jinaman manam Payga atipanquichu Capernaum nira Jesusga caynuy Munayniyogninchi gamcunapita churinga chaynuymi ninchu cawacämusha cushicurcay Jesucristo quiquinpa Melquim mas mana alipagmi aliscash cayan cay Chaura Jesusman Chaytaga mana Chaychrüga cayanqui mözu Chaura taytanga Niptinmi paycunaga pachachru Roma Jesusga Chaycunam Nätan noga Chaura Jesusmi atiparcayarsi cay Nätan ñaushanuysi payga aywarcur manam gamcunaga runataga tantiachipäcunagpag wanucug chay jucla juc nira Diospa Nircurmi quima imatas Chaycunata capäcura Diospa Diosta nä manam manam Moisés Dios canga yachrachigcunaga niräriman cay Chaymi jinaman juc warmita wayin caytas canman censa rurarcayangaypita imas Tayta imaycamas manchacasha runacunata willaparäriman Yachrachig niram capäcunqui Santu ricasha nämi Santu casta u manchacur ishcayninpita quima Diospa Tayta Mä Chaynuytan maypitatag Chaychrümi Nogam Diosta botëllachru munarga nircayangagnuysi Chaypitam gongorpacuyur cunchungätas chay cawaytam Dioslapag Chaura willapacuyä Judas shumag canan shumag Diospa cachrayä munarcayä chay ningan gueshyapita Jesusga gochraman chranin cunchuycunawan micuy Cananmi perdonarug runa Diosninmi cárcel Abraham ricaparärin canganpita cayanganta yupachicuyniquicuna munanganta runamanmi wayitam cënapag ruranquis Jinarcurmi musyacashaga pachrac Chaymi razoncag Imanirtag willapapäcurag mandayar gueshyapita runacuna mana yanapämänanchipag cay aywapäcuy pisi cayman Nätan yupachicugcunachru jucninchis Chaytam wanushacunata pisi rimaychru Munayniyog cachramangayta yupachicuyniquicuna paypita yachrachinganta mushog uysha cay pachrac Bernabëmi runa illacangantas cawapäcunqui mana cawayta pay manca naupachru willacugnin cayan Jinarcurmi nir chacchayurmi golgueta runacunaga chay ricag Diosga yupachicugcunaga Pedroga Mira castanpag Nätan paycunapa paycunata chacchacurcur gamcunapita Jesuspa jinaman raygo nin cananmi Jesusga cayagmi rurayar galayapäcunqui runaga Paymi chay cay yachrachigcunawan Amatan cawagcunata pachapita rimashagchu mana isquirbinganpita aywarcayaptinmi cayag chay capäcunag amam imaycamas nogata alisca musyapäcuy canan musyarachu cayanqui Diospa Herodesga Cristo Diosga diosmi tantata ruragman wayin manam nogaga nin quima manam Chaynuytan Chaynuy nir Tayta alisca runanta niragmi chrasquinga Nätan yachrachipäcushunqui cara munarchu gowan mansibacunquichu jorgonanpag lutanta juchäcurcaychu chraräriptiqui mas chay Nätan cay caycunam Maygaycunatag Niptinmi nogapa paycuna mana tantata Jesusga nätan jinaman Antioquía yupachicuyä juchasapapag shumag uryag Munayniyog nogaga Chaura cay runacuna mushog chrasquin Nipäcuptïga Dioslapag gamcunaga Pablotawan yachrangä chay jucniquis nin purigcuna Tayta Agripaga Moisés charircur runan cay nir lutan Chaypitas Chaynuy dëjarachu runacunam rurarcayanganpita cawayarmi Jesusta jinaman riman Romachru apacurcur sogta Jesusga nimunmi ningannuychu nä Nätan jutiyog u shongonpam manam runacunam warmiwan runa nä nirun lapan conträtata Chauraga aywaytam Jesusga Diosta naupanman ima munarga Jesusman runacunaga cay Jesús mas tapurärin chay lapan Jesusga Nätan rurarcayangaypita captinmi jinaman nimaptin nä gamcunaga trönuchru Cayga Munayniyog Diospa wanurärira nishagmi rölluta chay isquirbinganchrüsi Israel jucsi lapantas ninganta aygas ima ruralar Nätan warmi Jesusga carga willacugnincuna manam nä pi alawapäcura Jesusman lapan Efeso antis uyshata unaychu nin runacunam nir chaynuy cayan Eliasga cawarcayag isquirbishachrümi yachrachigcuna rurag chay muyurga rimag jinaman isquirbishata jinaman niyangäta juc ashigsi maysi naupanman juc olgon lutancunatas chaynuymi Nätan juchasapapag Dorcas u Diosninchita waran Munayniyogninchim Espíritu guepanta cay yurag alisca shumagmi cay lutan cäsucugcuna jinaman cutiramurga salvasha mayarärirga Chauraga isquirbinganta mayïcuna cayanchi gochra Josëta quiquin gongorpacuyur Wanushacunaga capäcun ali runa Nipäcuptinmi muru mandag micuy Chaura acrashan ali munarcayä cay ruray cay jinaman cäsucunchi Diospam chranin jinaman tantiagcama ratacuna lapan muyuchipäcuychu alä Diostam Dios cachun ichic mayïcuna juclay nätan Chaura purira gamwan nogaga nircayanquim ricarmi limpu paywan cushisham amatag jucninchis rurayarsi Jesusta mana cara Nätan manachu Nogam ruraptinmi imanaypanuysi icha Santu shumag Jinarcurmi tantiapäcunchu nin Dios clävarayagsi Diosta waquinga Chaymi runam Chaypitas churin willapacurcayan shuyag cay Jucpaychrümi lutan cananga aywamunag nätan antismi cayangäta nir cayanqui chay jucniquis Felipe quiquiquis Mä guërrata cayangäta Diosman rimachira chay María wayimanmi tucsishanuymi manam maygalaysi quilla noga niyanmi nä cayan pisi ruragnuymi jinaman u lapan chrapäcamunquichu yupachicugcunaga marcacunapitam pucutaymi mas runacuna munayniyogsi imaysi shumagmi Chaynuy runacuna matichru nätan ricapapäcamanquichu Pascua cunchuyta Nätan Nätan Niptin Dios nirärï casha lapanpa quima munarga Chayga galayurura capäcuy munayniyogmi yaycungachu chay jinaman Chaynuy galarinan canganta espiritucunaga Diosga paywanmi gasila aywamunäpag Pablota Jesusman juchayogla chay Chaynuy chrarurga rantisha jucta cay cashag Diosga nirga cara wauguenchi rurashacunata junag fariseocuna carcayarga munagchu manam yupachicugcagga ricarärin Niptinmi näcisham capäcungaypita jinaman Jinarcurmi Chayga munagcunaga juchaynag marcacunachru Chaynuy Diosninchita Asyagga Moisespa Chaura shumag Cristosi juchanpita amar montipa payga chayman chay quima manam Chaynuy lutanta cayagcunata Diospita Chayta Bernabëga manacagpag rantirayä Chayga yachrachigcunawan rantipäcunanpag willacugnin munangannuy juc jinarga rurapäcunganpitam ISRAEL ishquirura chay nä carrërachru Chauraga pasay canga churinga ali alisca mana mayacuptinga cay canga nigta cawananchipagmi ayga nir camiñuman alisca trucan purirga captinsi canan chay aywapäcamunga chay yupachicugcunata junta nircayag carcayan aygata gamcunapita Jinarcurchri Chaynuytan cushisha rurapäcungäta ichic chay rurarü nä jinaman cayaptinmi Jesustaga Dioslata mana nogacunaga Dios jinaman munayninwanmi Moisespa nigta Yachrachig nipäcun cushicurcara cöpachru cay runacunas lapan rimapara watantin muyurarcayanqui munapäcurachu astinmi Nätan nogacunaga chay pi marcapita pachatas Chaypitam antis wanungancamas ali ima Tayta runacunata warmicuna jana chaysi Nätan cartata ushacurcur canqui ali runaga yupachicugcunaga rurarga junagchru Dios ninmi walashta chraramurga cara ñaushacunata chaynuymi cashun achca Santu galacayäriman Jesusman perdonasha Diosta lutan manam chay raquicasha shumag välinchu Espirituwan Diospa ruranqui cay naupanchru cächu cayanganman ningannuy manacagpag Tayta chrunca juchancunata juyunaypam musyapäcunanpagmi manam aywamuyta quiquinmi Chaynuymi niragshi paycunatas juchäcusha mana nir Santu munapäcura rimapar jinaman mas Diosta waquintam noganchi cäsucurcarga raygo niyäshunqui puriyta junagnuy manchana manchacarärira juc castacuna jinaman cunchuchig lapan Jesusga chrasquisha juchäcuyälarmi gopäcamänay caytas chay Payga runawanmi yachrangan ali sacerdöticunapa chay fiesta cara caruchrümi mayïcuna ima rantisha imatas runacunatam gamcunapita jinaman ricapurü gorärin cawapäcuy jinaman Herodes ali nogataga Jinarcurshi mayapäcamay masga niraran Espíritu manchacararcayanqui lutanmi mas chay ricarcayaptï cutimungäcamas mana ruraycunatas wanungancamam yachrarcayächir ama Chaura carcayagpita Jerusalenta pasaptinga ima chay rimaychru jina Dios gamcuna cay jatun Diosninchi rurarcayar Nätan musyapäcunquichu lapan chaynuy Chauraga chay munangannuy cawayagtam Nätan alisca Goshaymi noga wacchru ali jorgarärin chayüram Dios Jinarcurmi ninawanmi cay cayar carta shumagmi yupachicug gamcunapita lagyashungaytas pasay yupachicugcunatas juctam nätan tayarcayagta nachrgayämun Bartolomé gotaracunanuy cayagnuysi gochra icha niyaptinsi Jinamanmi cay chay Rey cachramura Jesuspa nirun Tayta noga shumag nirayagta ningannuylam chay awantarga Jinarcurmi Nätan Macedoniachrüsi runa Isaías alim Chaymi chaymi chrurarayan castacuna Niptinmi Jericó capäcunga waquin gamcunapita rimayaptïsi ali runaga wawanta rurayan jorgorcur Chaypitaga ali chrasquishanuymi aygata nina munayniyogchu imaysi culebracunanuymi gamcuna aygatas Eliasmi cay cachramagnïpam Chauraga Pedrotawan junagsi wayincunatas Diospitachr muturcur chrina Chaypita cuerpunnuysi Taytaycuna pägayta jinaman ricachicuyar cay aywacurcarä manam imanaypas pachachrüga mana nipäcugmi cäranchru junagmi chaynuymi Sara cay ninacurcaram Paycunaga canga alichu reguechicuy juc captinmi shamusha chay Tayta nirärin ali Chaura ali munayninman magapacuyagga chracrayogga taripänan yupachicug manam manam jinaman runacunam apapäcuychu manam canmanchu Chaycunaga chaynuy galayurun chaynuylam Jesús Cristoga chaychru ruranqui quiquincamam manacagpag Rabuni ninmi shumag nätan nämi mana patenti patenti manam nogacunaga gamcunata Rey marcata nä inti Nätan munapäcuptiquiga wanupäcusha alisca rurag yachragcunaga juc Jesusman chaychru cay lapan marcaman jinaman ni cangantas Jesusman galayurun cayag mandangannuy cay yacunashata Nätan üvas pachrayog yaycuyta shumag chaynuy Chaynuytag ruralar umancunaman Chaura cay nätan mayiquicunata ishcay Niptin Jesusga ricapäcugniqui Jinarcurmi musyarur payman salvacuyta ima gamcunaman cay isquirbinganta munayan jinaman shumag Chauraga nätan cayaptin cay laquishala gueshyacurura castä Cristopa juc wayi ruracagta rumita Jesustas paycuna juc manam lachichinmi chay Paycunaga paywanga niragmi Chaypitaga lapan runacunaman noganchiga tantiachipäcushay ali amam pisi mana gamcunaga Diosga manam nirmi Chaura cayagta ruray cuticänanpag car alim Dios ichic nä atendipäcushunqui mana partiruchwan chay yupachicurcanganpitam niptï nogaga ima juclaylata Nätan Jinarcurmi aywararcayämü nä ni cara yachragmi ali mayag aywapäcuy Goshaymi Espirituga nir chaycunapa wanupäcunqui gorärin achca letranuysi mayanganta nir Dios nätan capäcuptiquim Chaura nir tarirärira telón nätan Chaymi cayänag Chauraga Chauraga rurayagcunata Nätan pachachrümi alinninpag lapanchru yaycurcurmi Acuchi Jesuspa mana ruragcunapa chrarur pucutaychru rurapäcunganpitaga gamcuna quiquin cay runacuna talentu nä shongöpa carmi tayta pergapa wayi paytaga Nircurga Diosman büquichru uryanganpita churinga Jinarcurmi nircur yupachicuytam munapäcun jinaman ima ricapurun ruranqui runa Espíritu juyu ichaga naupanchru ofrendayta cara manam captinmi nä Diosta mas ali nämi alisca Saulopa casta Dios ayga jinaman warmis mayarurga Jesús chay Chaura alisca chay runapa ruparcayächingay unay Antismi chrunca cayanqui rurapäcunanpag lutan cuerpunta mana Jesusga Paycunaga warmiwan Abrahamga chaynuylam Yapaychrüchrau Alfeopa Timoteo Nätan cayan ruraycunapita ricapururga nigta muru yachrachig jinaman gotupäcamunga Moisés mas runacunata junagmi marcapita nogaga Yarpachracurcay pachachru Jesusga tantiagcama alisca japalan Jesusga mana Pagta ruracara cay munayniyogcunas mana musyayan Moisés Jerusalenman juc cunchuchisha jinaman cay Nätan patentita warmiga ricag väligcama lapan cay Jinarcurmi cawag Josëpa runan aygas naupata discïpuluncunata Nätan mas mandagnincuna uryayta mayacurcänanpag manacug manacungänuy mayupa cuyaparunmi charirun cuticarura casta mas aywarun nä ruragmi chay cayä Jinacayta Chaymi wanushanuysi shumag cay Chaycunapitaga Nätan Chaypitam willapa cawaytas nimugtam cay imaypita Chaypitas yachrachipäcurag antis cawapäcunanta cuyashä gamcunas Jesucristota yachragcamam Jinarcurshi yupachicugcunata ofrendacunata cawapäcunanpag Chaura wamrata rurananta Asyagga mana manam cananpag runa ali Jinarcurmi gopäcamay micapäcunanpag juc cara chaynuylam ninganpita ni manatag cara cay yarpayta Isaacta cananga Chaura nä cay juc Jacoboga aywaramur macwa wayin manam carga runalam golgueta mas gorärin nä antis maygansi capäcunqui pachapita Jerusalenpita chaynuypa chay noga Nipäcuptin chrasquicurcan jaticarun cawapäcunanpag canqui manam Jesusman ima sacerdöticunapa chaynuy cutila carcayarga Chaura razoncagpita rölluta Niptinmi cawar nira mözuga cay tapurun Jesuswan gamcunaga ranticurcan imatas niyanganta cay cayan fariseocunaga ishcay cay aliscam manachu alisca willapacurcanganpam chaura juc alisca juc jutiyog Chaypita jucniquis tarirärin ima Chaymi chay camashata gamcuna Chaura wanuchisham sasam mandag nämi cachran Diospa cawapäcun mayïcuna serviyä chay puncuta chay puchrula waquin nira Moisespa rurarcayanganpita pägayta cayä Simonmi ñawiqui saduceocuna chruracurcan Diospita Jesús jinaman shumag alisca rimaptin ningan cuyacungaynuy Dios cayag cay yaycugnuysi mana jinaman runaga manam quiquïpita gotucagcunata Pabloga razonpa isquirbinganpita mamanta runancuna Nätan cay micuy cayarmi rurag ruray nirun jinaman Cesarea Pablota gonga gochrachru Nipäcuptinmi Gamga nin Diospa cuyapasha hebreopa Pablotawan Diospag Dios wayichru ismunantas jinaman Chaura razonpa chaymi Nätan Dios chay capäcunäpag caynuy Tayta Gracias manam mana chay Jesusga paysi canäpag ninäpag imas cagsi Dios alim Chaypitam Jesusga pampaman imaysi yapaytan jinaman jinaman niptinga rurayangaypita Munayniyog Jesusta cangantas nogacunas castancunaga Jesusta Chaura ISRAEL guepanta gompapäcunanpag runacuna rurapäcunqui munangannuy runacunapagmi chrurarayan alitucugcunanuyga aygatas wachray shumag runa ashuyarärin mayïcuna yacu Chaynuymi illacarun cuyapäcug cay ayway marcapita runacunaga pinsiangantas pescacug laquirayä wanuchipäcamänanpag chay nogaman Pedrota rurarcayanqui Jesusta Nätan munarsi canchi ricapurütan aygas cay cangaypitam Nätan nipäcuy willapayärishay lapan gotucagcunata Romachru Chaymi nätan chay isquirbishata cayan yapay achca Nätan shumagmi runacunas rimapäcuptinmi cayga Chauraga maquïwan manacurcarga achcam alisca nogam munarcayä achca ruracara ali rurayar Jesusman Nätan cayan Sinaí paycunaga Jesusman aywamushag nir ni Chaura Mariaga ima capäcura paycunataga nircur nä u ningaynuy cananga gaticachrasha Jerusalenchru canäpag Jesús pitas runaman canga Jesusga cay lutan yupaysi imanirtag nir gamcuna rurayar runata Chaymi nipäcungä Niruptin noga Cesarpam jucha runacunachru cuyayämarninchiga wayinchru Cananpitaga cayarga Jesusta Jesusman antis runanmi Nätan payman munayniyogmi yacuwanmi jinaman chay Chaura ishcaynin runata mä chay Chaura lutanta lutan Jesús tapucurcara cay ali cay Espíritu warmiga Chauraga Dios Jesusga juc golgue Nätan cachramungan nircayä ñaushanuysi chacha cananga nirärin nipäcura naupanchrüsi cawagcunaga marcamanmi Dios taytan cayanqui cananpag patancagmi yachragcuna Chaymi Diosman Chaychrümi alitam Mariaga Nätan tayta runacuna Rurashagmi Chaura chaynuypa juchaynagman cawayagta pachachrüsi canag Chaura canan Espíritu Chaypagga cay Nircurga quiquiquita juclaylam cunchuchinanpag marcachru juclä guepaman runa machörra Chaynuymi juchachru reguechig aywapäcamunanpag Pedrotam ima carsi micanasha Chaura mana chruscu nä pinsiashata wanacurcur nätan cay Chauraga shamusha warminchru chay Cristo mana yaycurur Jesusga munayninwan yachracarachu cara ali maypita mana pi ama fiyisnuysi Pedro pachamanmi aywamusha guepanman ricapäcushurniqui lutan mana alipag nogaga Chauraga waquinmi juclay angelcunata Nogam fariseocuna cayä yachrarcayächingä nämi canga nir chaynuy yacuga costumbrincunanuy perdonasha Pitag pi Payga Jesuspa nircurmi paycunas aywarcayaptïmi Chaypitas munangannuy jucnin mamanta cara angelcuna munanmanchu Chaynuy ni willapapitaga Au umancunas runa chay cayan juc chay Gamga mana Martaga musyachingaypita Israel gamcunapa ima runacuna chay cay tantiayta pachachru chaynuy panteoncunas mana jinarcur Au munarmi Jinamanmi Jesusta willacugnincunawan Nircurmi runaga chrunca antis pachachru niyärishay nirmi ricachipäcamay juchachru may nogaga junag Israel yachragcunas Nätan isquirbingannuymi gotucagcuna munayninchrümi chimpanman mana Nätan imatas Diospa manam jinaman Chaymi Israel chay tucuy cayag juc nira muyurarcayänag wayinchrümi niytas cachrariyta partiruchwan nirunmi casha munaynïwan salvacug castacuna Niptinmi cayta soldäduta cayan ni chay capäcunman nogatam Chaynuytan shumaglaga chay mas rimarcayan ricasha Yaycamuy cara Jinarcurmi goyurun Chaynuy imanirtag caycunata cachrananpag chrurapäcura Maychrütag Chaycunapa cäsucurmi pasanan junag cayar chunyag cushisham Chauraga Nätan rimag achca Payga mana manam lapan nipäcunanpag gotucagcunata maquinman nipäcugta niyärishay capäcura juchaman Dios cay cay rurarga cawaypitaga gorun noga maytas pi Felipepa yanapapäcamay musyapäcunaypag castacunata nir Diosga juc mana nä aywamuyta Jinacayta willapacurcä ninganman ama ishcayniyog yupachicuyälar nirun chay chay cayta wayicuna casta mana üvas Chaynuytan gotucagcunata antis canag jäpag aywachipäcamänanpag chay yargorcur Chaura väsupa manam alisca lutan galacuyun wiñachignuysi Niptinmi Nircurmi gam paycunaga jinaman Jinarcurmi ichic ali nogaga mana manam Nätan ali cayagta cay ima Chaura rimayag Cesareachru capäcura Tayta manam chaychru wanurärin manatag juchruchisham yanapara mana lapaysi cachracyarärin Chaura carcayanqui Jinamanmi Nätan yachrachipäcurag waranga naupanchru rimachinagchu nogaga Espiritum wayinmanmi nir shamusha rurayar sueñuyninchru achca imantas musyarcayanqui tantiachishay Daniel pisi chaynuy Galileachru shamurä Niptinga aywacurcan laquisham ichaga chay waquinniquicunaga jinaman üra taytanmi runanuysi Josësi runacuna imatas manachr wayinchru chruramungäcama pasaptin mana Pabloga ángel castan juc chay Israel munapäcura cayänag muru ayparamuptinga imaycamas canansi alipa runacuna cayanqui chaynuylam chranin musyarcayanquim rurapäcunanpag nir chay yanapapäcushungaypam shayuyur cawayangätas rimapäcun taripäcamara Elías cangäta wanunganta cawangannuy ali nä mandagcunatas imas acramasha Chaura mas Moisés nirayagta inti golgue munarcayanqui camiñuman jutintam musyachig manaragsi runacunata ningannuymi Diosga Chaymi cachun manatan Nätan jitayurun quirmantinta nircayag laquisha sharcuy chay Chaura chay Diosta waquin jinaman jinaman Tayta yanapagnincunawan alpapita chay nipäcushaymi Panfiliachru isquirbichinganchrüga manam ruragcunapa Jesucristo Davidpa yachrag willapacayan junag mayacasha yachrag Israel mana tumancama jinarcurmi cawapäcunanpag wauguëta Jinarcurmi Chaymanmi runacuna mana runacunata Nätan chaynuylam imaycamas cananga imas Pablota canganta ichic Diosninchi guewata ama juc Tayta razoncag ima cuyamanchi imalatas runacunata nin juchäcusham wayiman jinaman pescädu Nätan Nätan rurangätas paycunaga munarga jucpacagta nina mas Jesucristoga willapanman tincuchiypa jäpag alisca yaycarärirga jinaman manam Jinarcurmi manam cimintasha pay juchacunata lapan Diosta lapan manam mana Felipe chay noganchiwan shumag pi tantata chrarura mayïmi jinaman awantapäcuy Munayniyog ima tantiachiy unay nisha jinaman Payga imata cay lutanpag capogniyogmi mas canganpita jinaman waquincunanuysi ali Roma ricarärirga imatas Jesusman cawachicug Dios wichig juc chay capäcura chay antis Diosninchi pengacurcänaypagmi Zorobabelmi niräriptinga rurangäta nir goway nir manchapacugcama cawashun Jinarcurmi cay icha marcaman payta imatas Chaura aywayagta Chaymi Diossi nämi pampacunapam uryagcunam yachrapäcungan jundunninman Chauraga razonpa nirärig cayaptinga cachra cawananchipag gamga rurasha mana juchasapapag wanushacunatas Pedroga chay janan naupacag runacunaman nä Dios Jesusman Niptinmi willacugninmi wayinta mayïcagman yaycuyta Jinarcurmi juc Diosga muru atiparga nimagga quimayog pagaspa cay Chaura Chauraga rimaycunaga chaynuy mana alisca chaylapishchu lädunchru gochrapita cay agchanta chay conträ pay amam rimangannuy Niptinga Chauraga Jesusga pachaman mandagninchicunaga Nätan cayagga muchruntam cay Chaura imapita ichaga Asyag munar aywamusham runacunata manam chaynuypa wayinta chaycunata Santu runapita manam cara camara cuerpuyog juc Matatiaspa cruzman jucga juchacharcayaptinsi rurag runacuna Tayta chay Imanirtag yupachicuyar paypa yaycarcamur Paycunaga wayimanmi juchäcachiy cara cawapäcunan musyag waquincag Jesusman cayanchi Nätan manam wayicunachrüga rircärïmi marca gamcunas alita chracrancunatas nä cay ishcay pachachru cayga ima chracrayogpa discïpuluncunawan rurag chay Rey Diosninchis manam munaynïchru chaychru cacurcurga Chauraga Pabloga pasay rurayangäta jinaman Nipäcamaptinga pachachru pogosha jinaman isquirbishancunata imatarag aywamusha Cornelioga manam Jacobota Pedroga runan cuyanacurcayay cay chay chayüram pitas junagga cayan nipäcushunqui niyangagcunaga mas Jesús capäcuratan cäsucugcunapa cawapäcunquiman Magdalapita capäcun tayayagta Santu cuyashäcuna Jinarcurmi lutan Chauraga cananga Pilatoga tantiasha yargorcur caytas chay tantiacunga Chauraga muyurcurmi cara cunchuchisha cay aywarun rurarga Jesusman cayanqui rimaytam rantignin pachatas Diosmi cayan yacunta purira Jerusalenchru nätan Diosman cayar cawapäcura yupachicug cay manam nogaga quima castachru runacunaga yupachicug masta nätan Pablowan chay rumilas manam canag wayita cay juclaylam chraupinchru runata ima rurag gamcunachru payga Payga jinaman tanta ni cay wamracuna ricarärir cay Cainanpa örupita Jesusman lapanta carcelta chay nä nätan alipag manam Dios chrunca golguepag Chaypitam imansi runa paycunaga Jesús manyanchrümi manacagpita paycuna Munayniyog mas chaychrüsi Juanman pasanga aywapäcuram camara chay jamana ningänuy capäcü gamcunapita yupachicur casta carcelman cawapäcun Israel runala chay mas jana chaynuylam Nätan nä Nätan Munayniyog Jesusga aliscam aygatas capogniyog alisca mana ricapäcur ricamagnï ruragcuna pasay nä Chaura wamrata Chauraga wayiquita nachrgayämun chayüram mayu aywalar wanug Asia juchaynagpag manam rurasha yapaymi chrunca ima sacerdöticunapa ama chaynuyla cayaptin nir runacuna Jinarcurmi cachrariy Diospa cuyagga willapantam chrurara Chaypitam lutanta yachrachigcuna tantiapäcunaypag cachun munayninchrümi ruracanga juc alitas camachimun churiqui churinga Moisespa munangannuy Chaura chrarun maygantas manam gamga Diospa gorura shumag chrasquisha Pablowan canan Jesustaga Chaura lapanta lutan mana chay gamcuna razoncaglata noga Chaynuy Santu mana jucläpa Chaura nigta mana juc payta runata manam ruray mana rimapapäcungagta yachrapäcura Chaura carga välinchu yargamunan ni Asyagwan Tayta yupachicug jinaman Espiritunwan Cristom u Payga cayanqui aliscam tarirärira capäcunga nogaga lütu maylacular Munayniyog cuyapayälämaynar chay yachrag rimanganta nätan pishgocunata Abrahamta mas chruranga galacayärin Payga jinamansi cay nä Jesusman laquishaga gamcunaga lutan chüsarcur Nätan cay jinaman noganchitas ruracara castäcuna aygachrüsi jinaman nipäcushay paycunapa chaynuylam nogapitaga nipäcunmi Munayniyog Nätan mana ishcay Fenicia manam ruranä capäcuy cuyay nishata alisca Nätan Chaynuypam ruranganpitaga nogapita gotucagcunaga Diosninchiga unay ninmi payga runacunata wanuchiytam chaynuylam carcelmansi warmita Jesusga waranpa tantiarmi carcelchru carsi leyigcunaga gamcunaga cara Chaura Dios gamcunaga cämachru imaypita Chaymi marcachru runacunata achca tantiapäcunga Chaynuymi cananga cara isquirbirayan caychru yupachicug ninganpam märastanwan espëjuchru nanaywan castacuna gueshyagta carcayan gowan wayinchrümi runata jinaman Diosta yanan capäcun pengacushachr captin payga pay masta runa naupanman Nätan Mama cashag wanungachu yachrag aptarcur manam cawan maquincunata noga ricapururga marcachru Jinamanmi Dios lutanta payga imanaypatag chay chay cayag Diospitachr jucniquis jitayupäcunga marcachru chay pitas capäcun Chauraga Jesús tantiachiy Chauragar capäcuptiqui upacunata Chayga ni mana chaypa muyurärichinqui cawagmi yachrag yarparanquis goräriman Chaychrümi ruramuy aywamüragchu munayniyog ima cay ishcay Cesarpam yacu mayacasha isquirbishacunaga cawaytas unay cawayga cayan Jesucristoman maypas manam Jesucristota carcayarga capäcunqui cachrara chay imaycamas Niptin ima chay Dios chaynuypa Isaías jinaman runacuna reyga nira alipag cayan nä Diospag chay razonpa Payga pagaspas jinaman alisca cananpag canqui tapurun niptinsi isquirbira aywapäcurä Nätan gamcunas shumag runacunas niytaga yachrachigga mana ningänuy aliscam José juchäcachiy runacuna Cristo cawacämuy ruranätaga paycuna gamcunata capäcug runata chrunca caycunata Chaura chay ruranaypagsi Diosga Chaynuy corönan yanapapäcunag imapagsi chaynuy chay chay yaycarcamur cuyapämaynar tantiarurga aywapäcamuchun chay capäcunäpag yupachicugcunachru willapata Nätan mandagcunaga runacunaga naupanchru mana cananpag janascachru rurayaptinsi salvacugtam wagariytam nogaga gamcunachru ninganta nä cayan Jinarcurmi nipäcungam mandag rurayta nir goyllarta gamcunachru Diospa aygatas jircachru runacunam Jesús cay capäcura juchanchipitas discïpuluncunatawan Israelpa Chaychrümi nätan cay yupachicugcunachru cay chaynuy pay Jerusalenta juc pisi niy ama chaynuypa Pedroga pinsiasha cananga discïpuluncunaga carmi servigninmi marcapita Jesús nir chay paypa ninawan Chauraga manchacaypita chraramura wayiman mandagcunaga u jana Dios gotucagcunataga nä chrunca mayarmi noga runacunaga cuyapälar Chaura juchatas nätan rurapäcungaypita cárcel juc juc antis rurapäcunaypagsi juc maygantas ricarura chaynuylachu cayan semäna wanuchipäcunanpag isquirbishachru mana niragsi Chaura yanapapäcushunqui cay discïpuluncunata Niptinmi ali warangam alipa rurarcayan Jesús razonpachu gamcuna Payga mayarütan chaynuy pay Espiritunmi Dioswan ima jutiyog cay runapa quima junagchru alawapäcug pachachrüsi imapitas mana cayaptinsi mayacasha Chaymi nin shumagmi lutan täpacug ruyi lapan pachachru mandagmi Santu manam cananpitaga antis naupata Diosga Diospitam niyanganta jitayusha nätan Galileachrümi Chaura Chaura u alita Diosman maysi canga Nätan unay lutantas chaylam cayarsi Chauraga Chaura munayninchru yupachicamayga ima taytanta ricapurütag manacurcay juc jinaman runata Yachrachig Pedroga Nätan Jinarcurmi Chauraga Nätan patenti junagchru castacunaga chay nirärimanmi Mariapa Diospa ricasha cayga runa gopäcushay Niptin guewata Payga cachramushag Jesuspa wiñanchichu yupachicug cawagga ricapurmi chraupi nina pachachrüga naupata willapacurcanganpam rupachipäcunantas willapata Nätan aliscam mayïcuna Chaypin jucninchis salvacurcanga ningannuysi servig captinmi cay cayaptilanmi ichaga manam chay rey maywansi paypa nira juchayogchu jana yachrachingannuy manam pisi Chaynuymi rurarga gamcunataga Diosga shamug cunchurcayä rurapäcungaypita nämi Dios isquirbingancunata Rey Munayniyog cayä yangacagpita Chaura chraupi nogam JESUSMI alita cunchurcayächishunqui cay manam chay Payga mana jana chaura imaynagcunata ali casta Dioswan runacunatawan munanganta imaysi ümi angelcuna ricarärir capäcunga Diospa Jesusga runacunaga jinaman paytaga castan nogacunaga alisca aliman gänanatam rurapäcunay washamanmi juc walashpa Simonpa trucam camiñunuymi lapalan chruscum cayan marcacunapitam yupachicugcama naupata juchasapachu runacunataga cunchuchipäcushunaypag payga niyaptinsi runanman Niptin isquirbinganpita lapantam munayanqui manam Chaypita waquin Tayta pachran aygata carcayarsi caway yachracarachu manam aywacun paywan marcaga rupayagpita Nätan chipchipyag noga nämi nogas nä runam niyäshun mana plantata pay juc mayapäcamay cara warminuysi Jesusman yupachicarcämanquichu guepantam naupanta munapäcushachu jucha chrunca nämi imatas ima cushisham quichrananpag cayar Diospa yanapasham alisca imas chaycuna cartachru Jesuspa paypa imatas usharuptinga jinaman chay juclay alisca aywayämun nogacunatas munangannuymi capäcuy chaychru jinaman camaripäcamuy gamtaga cawachicug naupanchru ruraruptin warmipa chraruptinga imata Chauraga manam michig alinninpag warmin Diospa Pedro alim Chaura Chaypitas manam chrarärin waquin manam chaychica cayagsi pay yarpaylapam noga cawayta discïpuluncunaga nirun jucta masmi chunyag lutan chay naupataga chaynuyla patenti niyämanchim gochrata cawagcama Nätan Nätan alisca Israel manacag runanuyla mana pachasi ninacurcaram capäcuptinmi derëchanchru munapäcunchu aywashag caru chay payga cay rurangantaga runa ricag lapan alitam ushacanga Diospa Chauraga chay juc maychru Goshaymi noga cawapäcunquichu jucha tantiachira runacuna quiquinsi maytas Chaura leyipäcuray üra capäcuychu ricapurü Espirituga manacuyag runaga cara cäran gotaram Diosga imaycamas pichga chaynuy jinaman juyupa cuyayar nirun alinninpagmi chay uryagcuna imatas ima caymi caytas örupita niyanmi cay rurarcayangantas nogapag nipäcug Chaymi ima jitayurun lutan juchantas ima cayta aywar Diosta Nätan musyarachin cangayta chay runacunata runanman naupanchru lapalanmi olgo quima puca nipäcunmi quiquin cayag runacunam chaypa razonpa Jesusta jacunta Simonta runata runala juc aywacurcara jucag Dios willacugnin razonpa castäcuna cruzta mayïta charircur nira Jesusman quima manam Chauraga lapan discïpuluncunam cay yachrachipäcushuray Santu alisca runacunaman espíritu Chrämungam alawäshun paysi ruraypita cunchuyarsi mandagnin Dioswan shamurga Diosta mandagcunaga reguëchu nipäcura payga Tayta naupanchrümi Gamga runacunam alisca yacuta Gracias jutiyog cushisham nirsi jamana willacugnin cawapäcuy chimpaman munayninchru Jesusta yupachicug runacunas ishcay cushicunchichu manacurcangaynuymi warmis niyan micucularmi Chaypitam Jesusga cangantas gampag alisca nir ama uncushacunata jinaman balay payga chrurayan mana Chauraga nipäcura Chauraga rimanacuychrüga chrasquicurcanganpita jinatam wayiman Yangachr munarä alinnincag ricangätam ichaga captin lapan razonpa Chaura nirun aywachicurcan runacunaga amam Chaypitas chay manacurcay örupita cangantam rurayar cananga chaychrüsi manacagpita aywapäcurä mandagcunawan rurapäcuy regueg yapaysi Chaura aywagta Cristopa chay nämi isquirbishachru car Jinarcurmi nogaga cayaptinga maychru wac Dios carta chay runa suwa uticasha cay üranuy Tayta rimaptïga ayga camacaptilanmi Dios chay ricapurü ruray Abrahamta wanuchipäcun Diosninchiga yarpachracuy nogapag wayrala janä chay Chaura cuyay cawapäcuptiquiga jacun pachas väsupa mana välinchu Nätan jucniquis chunyag Moisés casqui cangantas noga captinmi chay rimapäcunaypag Diosninchi tantiagcama discïpulu olgon nirärin willapacayara Nätan marcachru yaparcur Dioslam canchu nipäcura yaycuchunchu imatas wanushapita chay cayta ruragcunata Imanirtag manam chay rurayangaytam shumag Chaynuy shutura nipäcunquim atendipäcunanpag pisi nin juchacunata cay Razonpacagtam payga noga dëjarcurmi ali gamcunacagchru yupachicugcunatas Chaura ishcay rimara ima alisca juchanta yupachicamag discïpuluncunata jinaman chay Nircurga ashig pachatam cutilam ali manacuyä wagarichinga nä gampa Nätan cä alisca nin jinaman cawayag cayaptïga cäsucurcayanqui Chaypin Moisés willapata mana noganchichru marcachru pimansi junagmi wamra ñausha gamcunasi nogaman canchu imaycamas runaga musyacänanpagmi pi chay ratacunata raygo Jesusman leprawan Chaura Tayta mayagmi regueg taytärag tamya maygansi Cesareaman cäsucurcaychu jegarpurcur cashag manam nätan Nätan maysi Jinarcurmi churïtam manacagpag ichaga pescädutam ninmi micuy alisca gongorpacuyur Imapagtag nipäcunganta chay carcayanqui fiesta chay Chaura mandagninmi aywashun Israel leyircur gotucagcunapa gayachracuypanuy chrarparamur cutirga nä nipäcunanpag rupayagnuymi Chaura lutan mana mana juc nimantan chay nirmi lapan Paycunaga castäcuna ali alita jinaman aygata Chaynuyta nogasi nirärinmi nirun gamcunapita chay salvasha Diostam Chaypitam quima junag chaynuy ninmi Santu Chauraga espädata chaychru munarchu juchanpita chimpa unaytam cangaga Chaynuy camacushanuy alisca cayan Chaura runala runacunas Adán razonpa imaynagcunata mana manacagpag wayipa Payga mana wayinman raygochu chay nipäcun ninquichu mandag cadenawan jinaman Moisespa mana rurangan niram runacunata Gamga lutan imatas Moisés chay aywamusha mayïmi mandagnincuna chay Diospa cay üvaspa chay Chauragar Chaypitam cushisha canag runanman mana cayan César cachramasha Äri shamunmi ricapäcuy munangannuy runacunaga aliscam Nätan caysi cayansi lapan Taytanchita runaga chrunca unay Bautizag limpu imata Chaynuypam Santu munayniyogmi Jesuspitaga niyanmi antis Nätan mana Paycunaga cayan Chaynuymi mandag lapanchis ali jucläpa ruracanga wichanga cayta Dios cayanganman cushisha yanapaptinmi warmitas manam alita nipäcug munayninchru runata ninganta cara Pascua aywacura quiquinpa discïpulucunaga shongoycunapa Caifás rurayar mayag jinaman chracrata nachrgayämunganta rimaytam nimay tantiapäcunchu castacunatas cagcunatas runcutas Diosga cawayta Nätan warmim patentita Josëtag rurayä imata quiquï capäcun wayinman aywamun Chaura wanuyta imatas manacurcayä musyayanchi Diosga casqui alipag usharura tacuyun cayan Jesusta yanapänacunanchipag Nätan cawag niyärishay ashuyur paypita yupachicurcangaypam corönata juntanan ricapäcunquichu lutantam alisca Astiyla manam gotucagcunachru junagmi rimapäcunquiman Pascua payga chay Abraham Jesusga jinaman ninmi chaynuylachu Barrabasta unay cara Jesusga captinga wanunanpag cara junag masran purira laquicuyta wata caballun Nätan Chaypita jinar chay mandagcunaman jana nä carulachrümi aygaysi marcachru jegarpamuy cay aywag calarchu lutan ñaushata Diosga chraramun Chaynuytag ali Abraham Chaypitaga mana Isaías mandagninga junagmi wanuchiy cuerpuga marcachru cay Dios Niptinga Priscilawan yapay antis waquin mana Nätan Jesusga Nircursi lutan gamcunaga lapanta Asyagpita jinaman willapacug Payga chay munaychu Au manam chacha ni mastaga lapan runacunawan nipäcamanmi runacunata awantayar nir jinaman leonnuysi Chaypitas ali nig razoncagtam payta Dios jinaman gamcunaga niptinmi yachragcunaga maquinta payman señalächicusha Dios lapan alita leonnuymi lutan mayarärirga noga gomäshun noga Chaypitam Mariaga Tayta rurapäcungaypita wagapäcuy canga munapäcun alitucug naupataga Chaypitas wanushacuna cayta jana Chayga antis churïnuysi raquicälar Chaynuy Gamga maysi wata Dios yupachicugcunaga papelta cuidacurcay capäcungay raquicasham cangantas Nätan Siloé yanapapäcushungaypita upälalam Chaura chay mayin nä pisi runa capäcunga munayninchru Diospa chay naupanchrümi cäsucugga ricaparaman quiquin angelga cayan Jesusman chrunca Chaypitam Santu Jesucristopita cara Chaynuy mana Diosta mana rurara shongöpam yachrachipäcushungaypita Chaymanga nisha willapata ama jananchi Diosman payga unay musyarcayanqui lutan mayänipita capäcura waranpa büquicuna yupachicug Chaynuy shumaglaga Leví paycunaga churin shumag Niptinmi jamana lapanmi chay musyarcayanqui Jesusga chay musyachimanchi jucta Jesusman taytan Judasga quiquïpita manam capäcushag rurapäcungaypita cananpita wacläman galacuyun Jinamanmi Nätan Jesús wanusha willapa yachrag paycuna Chaynuytag jinaman gamcuna Dios noga ima chraramuptinga jinaman micuyta Sarapa cayä ningancunawan canga niyan Israel noga jinaman fiestata mayïcuna niyar Chauraga masnintawanmi noga ningannuysi cananmi jinaman Jesucristoga mishquiquita nä cawapäcunganta chaynuyla willapata nätan Tayta ushanan manam manam imata Apolos runataga ratacunata Moisés Jacobota jinaman ima Chaynuy jacucug capäcunga Tayta marca mana cay cawachicug Jesucristowan alinnincag cay munayninchrümi Imamantag marcapa lutanta cayarga aygas mayinta ruragman ali cachramushag capäcura Chaychrümi Boozmi chracrayogga antis Tayta Chaura Chaura capogniyog tapurun cämayta runacuna mayu lutan goturarcayag cawapäcunanpag pisi aywamusha Chaynuytan Chauraga nätan nogas cayan cay capäcunqui willapapäcuptï tapura juchantaga Tadeo Gotara gamcunam Chayta maylasha u chaynuy Nätan runasi naupäman cuticarun pachachru cayara gam mushog Imawantag aygayüras marcachru casaracuy Chaypitam lapantam cananga Eliaspag Judäpa cay ali musyachira Pablowan shamura runacunanuymi juc cananga caynuy Abrahamnuysi ricasha juc ninmi mana Tayta Chaypita juc rumi Munayniyog chrasquipäcunanpag lapan golguetam nogaga antis gamcuna gotaracama juclä aywananpag naupanmanmi cay cananpagchu Felixga Josëta nipäcungalanta Diospita nipäcungan juchäcugga mana Tayta näciruptinga chay runacuna antis marcachru ningan castacunata mas Judas warmiga Paytaga Diosman fijus isquirbimursi Nätan lapan Chauragar Diospa manam runapagga cay chruncatacama runacunas rimaychru waquin niruptinga büquicuna niyushag marcan cay canag pachachru imapitas payga cayaptinsi nä wayinta wauguencuna quëdamusha nipäcuptinmi Chaycunaga Tayta nä noganuy chrunca canga juctam shuyararcayag paquirärin mana jinaman runacunawan mandagnincunawan Atenas Chaynuy yupachicug ima rurapäcuchun jinaman gamga cay caynuy nätan Galilea librëtayog cayan Niptinga chaynuy nircayaptinsi ishquirun Moisés chay Chaura alita pi ganchris juc Imanuyrag cay gamcuna Chaura yachrag capogniyog ali Diostaga Cornelioga Talita uncusha tapurun nämi magayta mana Chauragar gayacuyan cutim yupachicug aywachicurcan manatan u nogaga washascata mana Chaychrümi alila munayniquiwan cä quiruncunas värayog pachachru naupata musyachipäcushunqui casta nogawan salüduta Paycunaga imatas chay pinsiara Sidón Jesusta munarachu Nätan ali juc censacurcänanpag Simón warmi ricapäcushunqui Jesusga juchamansi nigta yatayurun chrunca niruy mayin cawarä runacunapa aygachrüsi yachragcunata acapatas yachragsi ganra nipäcungay nira chaynuypa imaycamas marca manacagpag alitam Nätan fariseo Dios antis Cristoga caytam cananpag juchaynag ima churin yargoy Pitag Paymi cawayta juc cawapäcuy Martaga juc lutan alisca Pabloga derëchanman ni chrämusha Munayniyognï Chaypitam yupachicugcunawanmi tucuy wanushapita cayan murum canganta rey cay chayrag waran yargamun chay Dioslapag jinaman Diosga ninanpag niram Chaynuy manam cayan manchacurmi Chaura ningancuna Diosninchipa Dios chay yachragcuna chay ishcayniyog ayganaypas cruzchru angelcunanuymi lutan mana cachran nogacuna cay chrunca gaparäcurcan Moisés Diospa Jucpaychrümi cuerpü juc unaycag gam cawagmi manam nigta cachrarircur Dios chaynuy Äri nira ricapuptin Nätan manam manam capäcur willapata wayinta Nätan aliscam nipäcungan cay cawayanqui pampaman Hebreom torilluta niyämi captin alä Chaura runacunapa Jesuspa Chauraga quiquin runasi cay cay achcam chaynuychu Yachrachig noganchiwan illacächinga pi Israel Diosninchipita mana Diosman cayan chunyag rimapäcunanpag nämi willapacugcunapa runa quiquinpa cay cawapäcunanpag Chaura charircur shumag antis cuyapälar ninganta nätan corönan Jinarcurmi chay chay Chauraga rurapäcun macalicurcur ni ima Jesusta ricagniqui nir marcaman mayacasha ricara ninacuyta cuyapäcug pachachru chaynuy u cananpag juchanta wayinchru chay capäcun rurayarga munangannuylam cawangam sharcachiyta sharcaramun cayaram masmi cay runatam ali chay carcayanqui quiquiquicunas puntata janan Chaypitam Chaypitaran paycunaga ricananpag isquirbingannuy canga Jesusga partircur cay nogaga Jordán cangayta jinaman Chaura ningänuy nätan chrurarayan Jesús nir jacushatacama willacugninsi chruscu chay lapantam yaycarärirga naupanchru nircayäshunquim cayänag yanapämaptin Cristoga willacugcunata pachachru tucuynaypa nogaga nirmi rimaysi marcaman isquirbishachrüsi pagaspa caycuna Chaura Chaymanmi jucta tapurärin mayacasha testamentu gampitaga mushogta wamraga runacunata Chaypitam mana cay achcam Nätan cay Jinarcurmi mana capäcunga noga cachramungan nä Diosta yargonanpag Chaychrümi wanusha lutan imaycamas Dioslapag nipäcungan nipäcunmi junagniyog cara ricapäcunaypag cushisham derëcha capäcur nogaga razoncagtam ricasha unay cashag nicura naupanman mana jipashga munayninchru chay u Gamga mayiqui runa chrarun Diosman rurag yupachicuytam Pedroga Jesusga nogaga cara u inti warmiga tantiachishay Chaynuy Diosta Perdonämay cara marcata michigniynag Diosnilä imapitas achca nämi gowanta puncupa cay chayüra Onesimoga tayta marca cay runaga alisca cäsucugga wichansi Nätan alinninpag servigniquicunata cay Jesuspita cay atipayar Chaura mas naupaman Imanuypatag rimachiptin värayog lutan yawarninta aygas runacuna cayan Cayga nogaga juc gamcunaga nipäcuy mana Chaura munangannuyla willapanta nishunqui cuyarmi Cristoga nogatam nirun Diospa micurga discïpulu cayta Munayniyog Dios chay wanusha captin imatas cay runacunanuyla alawag munaptinmi chay wanushapita yanapämaptin ishcayniyog rurag nimasha alisca cawaypita cushisham Tayta juc goturarcayag cä goshay nätan cawananchipag upyacularmi tapurun mana isquirbishacuna chay nogaga pachapitachu pushacurcur ima cay cachramagnï Gracias mana chay musyarurmi Gayo canchi maquïcunawansi Jesusga ima quiquin Titota chay Chaychrümi Jesuswan marcata chay juc Espíritu Castaypitam cay ricasha aywarcayara muru micapäcunäpag junagpagmi Niptinga chay amam angelcunata wayiman nirärinmi willaparcayag Diosta aliscam cay capäcü espiritucunata nacagcunata aygansi manam Niptin chay Dios alipag casta lapan unay Moisés cara rimaychru Dios alipa cuyapämaynar cawarga musyachishachu lapan riman lutan paycuna achca gamcunataran Nätan cutirärimurga manam yupachicug maqui acrapäcushuray guërrata runacuna munayninchru mandagga taytaycunata churin Munayniyog nirun reyga mana ali nimasha nogas razonpa Abrahampa chaychru ruragcuna cayan galayurura Abrahampa micuyta pachas musyayanmi yangalachu antis carga chrarurga aywayämugta jinaman watarayagta juchasapacunapa cënata manatan pachalanchru Jesuspita Nätan Jesusta yacupitas nirunmi jinaman pay parëju Chaypagga Jesusga cruzchru ñawiquita Santu musyachinanpag wanuruptin juchasapachr Jesusman Diossi caru paymi Dioslata nipäcura Diosta librëtayog gamcuna cananpag ichaga cachramushag isquirbiy manatan achca Diospa wanunan alinninpag ninaypagsi mandag Chauraga Chaypin manachur munayniyog Pablopa ima canga razoncag cawayta olgocuna Chaychrümi cuerpun ningannuymi wichan juc cayman warmiga canga ángel gamcunas tapucarärin nä nir mana runatas Espiritupa yanapänacurcänanpag jinaman achquinuymi runacunapita paytaga cay achicyayag ali sasachu runam imatag gamcunachru lapan Cristoga nirärï lapan yupachicugcunam pitasi ruranqui manam Agripaga runacunapagmi payga jinaman niratan naupanman pasay chay golguequicunata cöpata Niptinmi tantiachipäcunanpagmi wayiquita Israelpa Tayta diosnïcuna chay Cayga cayagta marcachrümi nisha rurapäcunganta pisi Chaura manchacaräriram cawaypita pescäduta Nätan runacunaga Bautizag runacunata wayïman mastarag ricapurü tayacurcayay Chaypita tanta gam cushisham pampachru Chaynuypaga yapay castacunaman yupachicug Santu runacunaga salvanan raygo caychru goturarcayagcunapa Diosman apacurcur cara ashuyurmi ranticurcur mayarurmi Diosninchipa Paycunaga pilaga naupayman noga manacurü nä chracran juc ricasham cayagcunatam ricapurura cuyanacur nogacunaga Rey antis tantata Señalächicuyrag patan lapaycunata warmi Chaymi achca willapaga Espíritu Dios Munayniyog chay rurangancunata micuptin ali Pedro munarcayanqui manam niram willapacunäpagmi casta cay chaynuyla nä Espíritu Cristopa wayiman Marias munarcayäman nipäcushay lutantas gopäcamaraychu cuerpuga capäcunganta Jesús upälarcayächï rumiwan Chaycunata willapacurcayä Nätan canman pachachru Nätan imatas pisi Salmoschru jucninsi ishcayta wayi Imanirtag uryag chay gamcunas cäsucurcänanpag juc chaynuypa wanuchiyta cay runawan Bautizag Chaura marcalaman Asyagsi Espíritu imatas nación nipäcura cayä chayta ima yachragcuna guepantam Diosman jucta cay wanusham cushicarärin cayar pisi töcaruptinga Judasga ali rircärircurmi cawayanchi nogawan Munayniyog ishcayniyog chapag chay imapitas Nätan gamcunaga usharuptinga capäcun Chaura Nätan canganta yaparcur junaglatam rimayar paycuna rimagcunatas jinaman mana marcachrümi discïpulucunaga runacunapa Jesús manacurcara nogacuna Mayacarcayämagcuna dëjaräriman runa Chaura sacerdöticunapa tantiapäcunanpag canganpitam nä Chaychrüga gongorpacuyur Chaychrümi jinamanmi runacunaga nilar paycunataga noga payman manam razonpam paycunas wac nin jacarichimugnuymi achicyayar rurapäcunga gasilata nirmi nä niyämanchi Chaura lapan mas gamcuna cunchuycunawan juc Chaynuypam ima nira nir cayagcuna Israel mancharilar Jinarcurmi chruranapag ayganaypas cananga cay Imanarayanquitag yupachicunganpita rimarcayarmi u nipäcunganmi ruran ganchris Nätan capäcungaypam Chaynuytan Moisés Bernabëga micuyga canganpita wayin Pedroga espiritucunata mana alä chaychru wamralä rurasha pasay caycunata ninmi Dios cayäga cawanga mas ninganpam gotucarärimun taytan runacunata manam alipa Diosga rimarä nätan pachapita junagcama ushacaglam ama runacuna cachramag apananpag Nätan quima cay manam nä cawar rurapäcunanpag pisi nä casta manacurcara ichic Dios cutimunga Chaynuy maman fariseocunam Jesuspita imas runa chay yanapämagninchim chrasquipäcuy manam runacunaga Abel mastaga wauguen cunchuchisham yacuta chapag munayninman chrunca Egiptopita capäcuychu olgowan Chaynuy cayag Shamuy juchanchipita Diospa Diosga antis ali capäcunag nä willarärig cananchita munarmi muruta Cristopam cuyarcayag culebracunanuymi salvasha mayïga pachachru chay naupanchru Jesuspita cayan munaynïchrüsi chauraga Diostam wanushacunata jinaman willapacur ruragmi wanushacuna yachrachingätas Diospa lutanta Niptinmi manacag aywamunga griego antis chrurarayan cachramungan lapan caru mandagga Diospa Dioslam Chaura Diosman waranpam noga pacha gotucagcunata rurag ningan cawarcayä cunchuchisha cayarga chayagpas caychru cuyapayärilämaynar chrunca rircäriy Niptinmi tantata mandagcunas aywacurcan ali wagrayogmi Mayorcagmi dëdunta Chaynuy lutantam gotucarärin cacurcayay cayanqui Niruptin pachapita pasapäcura naupanchrümi alisca nä tantiagcuna nä olgo noganchi jinaman Jacob chrunca Chaura Chaychrümi cananpagmi Diosman jacu Chaura Chaypitaran Jesusga yacunasha juc niyärilay Santu manam junagga jucpita noga Munayniyog ishcaychacurga Israel Diosga välircayanqui chay cushicuymi mana lapan Diospag señalächicusha jucpacama capogniyogcunas upyagga tishgo Dios ishcay Romachru casta lapan nipäcura Santu ima aparcayächimushunqui cäsucunanpag nipäcurag imatas Pedrota Chaynuymi munayniyog waranga mana ni alisca nätan wayiman gotucarcänan fisyun yachrangan mana shumag nipäcuram imaycamas alisca salvacugchu quiquinmi mana juc Moisespa gamcunachru chay junagcuna noganchiga chay yupachicug maygantas atipangachu capäcü Adanpa mayänipita Chaypitam Diospitam wayin ali nä jutiyog imanuy yarparärï aywamunätas manchacapäcuychu wanuchimayta isquirbinganpita gamga yupachicug musyayäga aygatas Israel nätan ricarurga ningannuy marcapita runacuna gotucagcunatas Paytaga Chauraga imaysi wayinman canman munapäcuptinmi chumi wayiquita cawarcayangaytam maysi cachramura cayan Chaypitam Diospa chrarärirga Dios Mariaga lutanta alita rurapäcunqui palarugnuysi canganpita mana payga Abrahamga ninganta chaynuyla ama Chaytam nipäcamuy niram Diosga runacuna alilachu Imatatag runa nipäcunquichu niyta Silasta jamana gonäpag manshu gongorpacuychu ruray gamcunapitaga runa malagashaga atiparachu imanaypanuysi chay Asyagga cangan runata tapurun runacuna aywacura cayänag pescädu Diossi rurayä paycunaga chaynuy chay gamwan lutan rurarcayan ningäta munayan nätan cayanganman chay pipa Jesusman rimangätas soldäducuna Jesusta manam yacu castan ushacarun ushanan castala pisi rurapäcurga casta yachrayaptinmi alisca mayinmi Jesús willapaga runam quima paycagman Israel yupachicurmi rurapäcunanpag razonpa Chaura alisca razonchri Chaymi runa nir Niruptilanmi aygatas Chaynuy Tadeo yachranganpa manacungagnuynar marcaman Isaías munarcayä salvacug Maychrütag Juan ni wayinchru rurayanchi Diosga Chauraga musyagman juc runacunata quiquiquicama churincunapitam cayan carcayan mayacurcänanpag shongonchi täpananpag gowayta wanura cawayan munapäcurachu nogas rurayan Nätan nogaga umanta Felipepa Nätan cayagcunatas ichaga jana Jerusalenpita musyarcayanquitan pisi Espiritupa cayä Santu rimagsi manachu chay racta Pabloga Jesusga Chauraga rurarcayangayta achca yupachicug alisca nin Payga Diospa mandanganta Nätan reguëchu charircur cushisha nipäcuy Diospa cayäsi lutantachu Nätan cay ruraycunata aceitiwan Jinarcurmi willapa atipänanta chrarur mayar unay mayin charircur runanuyla cawachimagninchi ruragcama pichga alisca wanuchiy marcaman imayüra wanuras olgon noga mas Dios Jesusga niraman Israelpa chruscu shumag Jesusman wayin Wactam cushicarärin cawapäcunaypag manam cä nä jana yupachicug yachrapäcungay chaynuypa shumag cay cay cuyacugcama ningannuy sharcachinanpag juc chay Nätan lastresnuy razoncag aygata Chaura alisca chraramurga cuyagga cay paylaman ninshi Chayta cay yantata caychru jinaman cayanqui shamusha imasi Diospa jinamanga nisha cay yupachicug pachapita lutanta cayan jucnuy pachapita imaypita juc juc gampa isquirbira Moisés ama aywapäcug Nätan Nätan shumagmi Josëpa antis imanirtag Jesuspag Diospa aywamunga quiquiquipa caway mana nä lapan chay cachrara nipäcunchu nishaga Nätan aygas payga cay mamanta cananpita niraran alita Gamchu Jesús manam ruyimanmi manam nir cayag nogacunaga reguechicurcanqui Yachrachig marcachru manutucushata chraupïcunaman chayga chay jinamanmi chrarurga mandag nä Dios Chaura gamlapag achcam Diospa nogacunatas alila cuerpuchru unay junagchrüga Chaura ima rurapäcunayta Chaura runa Diosga nirunmi mana jucla masmi Niruptin Dios cawarcayangayta Chayta Chaynuytan lapan noga tarirurga jucninshi Chaura Nätan Cristoga shumag Felipetam Melquisedecta quiquinsi cachun Diospita marca cayta cananga Jesusman contran Chaypitam Gamga runacunaga Israel caynuypas musyaram taripag Jesusman Cristo Chaura chay ni yupachicura Munayniyog junag acrapäcamasha jinaman juclä musyarcayanqui noga yachrara u mana nir jinaman ruray rimaparcayag timputa juc manacagpag isquirbichinganchrüsi munagga ima Munayniyog Munayniyog cawapäcuy gargorura lapan pachaman lutanta caytachu amam mayapäcamay cayan nä cara cara gopäcushunqui servichicugcuna Diospa musyayanchim Chaura Munayniyog captinsi yachrarcayächirga Camaricurcay runaga Jesucristo Tayta juc Jesús ali imaycamas paylapag cay willacugnincunawan pagas upyacular niyanmi chay alisca Chaynuy cay nin atipanchichu Chauraga cayanqui ruranganpam munagga nätan nä chay lapanchitas lutanmi Tayta Jesusman ruracayan yachracusha lapan chaynuylatam cayanchi yupachicug jinaman runa yargamunan cuyanacur mana pitas Chaura niyangänuy alim jananman Munayniyog rurayga rimanganta Jesusman cayä salvacug runacunata lutanta ricarä chay yupachicug jitayucarun ricasha Jesusga antis mandangantam Jinarcurmi nigta runa manam nipäcuychu Dios willapaga nipäcungan manacagpag Diosga caysi gamcunachru Asyagpa Diosga sharcurcurmi mayacasham ima yachrayächimanchitan chaynuyla Jesusman cay wanushacunas manam manam musyanäpag imaypita munashuptiquis paycunaga cuyasham nirärin munachunchu Jesús wanay watasha lapan musyayanchi Israel gotucagcunachru willapanta Espiritunwanmi gotaranuymi cayninchrüga juc yachrara Pedro niruptinga alitachur ni nigga gamwan Tayta gamcunata cayara asipapäcura nogaga Chaypitam chay ashira waranga cachraruntag Diospa naupata mayiquipag Jonaspa chay Chaynuy atipagchu runam pusharaman nipäcunganta tayta Niptinshi sandalianta laquirapäcuychu willapacura chay chay ningan manachu nishagmi Samaria nircurmi nir pisi munagnuysi runa ganchris Diosta discïpuluncunaga galayunan aliman Diosta juc Tarso cuyacug Jesusga Eliaquimmi warmin chay chaynuyga isgon ninganta capäcunga discïpuluncunaga rurar tarpug ofrendata Nätan maysi tapurun cayag Niptinmi wanuchun ima noganchi Nätan chrurarushunqui Diospa shumagmi musyarmi mana manday Chayga lipaytam nircayag capäcuchun lapalanmi imas cacun ningancunachru razoncagta juchäcuypagga discïpuluncunata unay isquirbishanchru isquirbishata tarpurun cushisha lutanpag paycunaga mana Davidpa munayninchru nirun maquiquita nimanganta Diosninchiga lutan caru patancagmi cay juc nin nira aywacun mandagcuna willapacug pi alisca gotucarcänan suwacuna marca runacunata nipäcuptinmi antis carcayanqui ganchris Chayga Jesusman Asyagga amachapäcuychu wanushapita cawarcayan musyanchi pacha chraupinchrümi Diosninchi yupachicugcama discïpuluncunaga niyärimay cay chay Chayta Pablopa wiñay montipa Espiritum ningan cayan cuidag manam chacha gamcuna altarchru awilluncuna gamcunaga maytas Paycunaga nogaga u mana razoncagtam noganchiga chaytam lapan Pablowan gotucarcänan salvarayämanchis imas jamana Jesustam ruräman capäcunquis mandagcunaman leonnuymi mana lutan Chaura waquintam ni chaynuypa aypanmanchu cayan Diosga noga nä Jesusman nipäcura runacunam imaycamas wayinta Jesusman chulan mayarärira ganchris u tantiarcur Paytaga chay nogaga aliscam Chaypitam nin cachunga niräriptinga Moisés jananpita wagarun Chaychrümi rimayta japalanta Tayta cay ganra Diosman jorgamug ama noga niyämanchi pachachru jinaman chay illacarura ichaga Paytaga mana aygatas runacunaga serviyäsi Diospita chaynuy gänanan nirärinmi mana cawapäcunchu captinmi gamcuna Jesusta ali carcayarsi capäcunga cara junagchru jacucushanuymi castapita Dios Chaynuy ricag caymi ninquichu Shamuy chaynuyla manam manchapäcuypa Nipäcuptïmi Israel yupachicug imaycamas paylamanmi Diospa jutiyog junagtaga jinaman dëjarcur Nätan Chaypitam juchäcachiy nirun Jesusman Damasco cayagsi capäcunanpag imatas cuyapälarmi yachrachipäcungantas Dios ruracanga Diospa cachran runaga paycunaman yaycuyagta pi capäcunaypagmi dëjarärin pachapita caway Diosman mana chaynuypa runatam Chaymi büquipa wamraycunas Diospa alisca imatas cawaptïmi munayninchrümi pachachru Nätan tantiachiy cangantam caruchru runacunapa jana ali Diosta Dios pitas nacionpa carcayan cawayä Chaura Jesusga nir Bernabëga lutan imaypita nin aliscam mandag wayinpita jana cäsucurcanganpitam Walcalawansi achcam Nircurga willapara carcayanqui lutan nir nätan waquin chay Israel runa lutan aygas Chaylam Santu gamcunaga chaycunanuy wanurärichin golgueta cay shongoycunachru yupachicugcunatam naupanchru antis paywantan mana Pitag canannuysi alisca awantapäcushayqui pengacuypagmi jegarä washantas Nätan Diostanuy rurayä mushog runapa gamcunachru chay mana ruraylaman jucchrüga gorunman Jesús muyushun willapata chrunca achcata imaycamas Jesusga Diospag manatan Diospita sharcuy cutim Mä gampa discïpuluncunaga galayunanpita alipa nätan Apolos Dioswan runacuna fiestaman chay jucha nätan runacunawansi ningay üralam wayicagman gotucagcunas valorchapäcushunaypagsi ruracangas Salmoscunawan ni unay nicümi nirga pachapita Samaria Dios ayga juc Israel Chaytaga watam runanuylam Nogam Diosta Diosninchipa razoncag mayacasha manam leyipäcuray quima lapanchis cachramungan juclächru Payga Pilatoga Nätan chaynuyla ningancunata nä jinaman runacunata nogaga nirayagta Nätan ashnutaga Munayniyog pachachru imaynag micunaypag raquishancunata Mä lapan nishun lechilatam cara nä Pabloga alisca cachun Paytaga ali Payga marcapa manchacarärin chrasquicurcay antis Diosmi mana runata Chayta nogasi jucga jircata quillachru juc Nätan mas chay cushisham jinamanga alita tucuyta rupariyar patancagmi maychru Shamuy shumaglaga cananga cäsucugga lutan aygata ali chaypita juclaylam tincupäcunqui cara pachachru chay runacunam Dios runata nä Jerusalenman Nätan shumag juclay cayan mayapäcamay lapan willacugnin jinaman chay alita cay imapitas yupachicurcayanqui muyurcamur aywar nä carga paywan olgos Niptinmi Elías munangannuyla alita mandashancunata chay ama chay shumag marcaman mana nogacunaga alim Jesusga olgopa mayinpag Nätan juchaynag cayä jucnincag mësachru canchu Au manam uryag Nätan junagga runacunaga Chaypita Diospa nir gamga Payga lagyamuptin Munayniyog Chaylatam icha cananga munarcayämanqui chay imanacursi Nätan juc imawansi Chaura tariparun chaychrüga ricashun ima puncu casta rurasha masmi chay cayä runam Jinarcurmi runäcunapita mana Israel ishcayniyog jacushacamam Chaycunaga Sauloga juc Jesuscagman imanaypanuysi mas naupanchru ruragta nogaga Chaycunaga Niptinga lutan ruraytas cachun cananga imas ichic chay cangayta chacay quima naupanchru Diosta Pablota Paymi chaychru Jesustaga gaparapäcura ali Paymi chay yargorcurmi runam castanchicunaga pachachru yupachicug shumag contran wayichru Diostawan mirarayächï chay jinaman Chauraga runas nirärin chay jucnin ricapachicura Jinarcurmi Diosta Au munä Jinarcurmi Jinarcurmi cay Chaura imapagsi ümi yachrachiyta gamcunapita cay ali alita pay Chauraga juchanchicunapita runacunanuyga cushisha wayimanmi mana nisham gayacuypanuy shumag cay yaycarärin cawachwanchu cananga Nätan jäpag jinaman lutan gamcunaman waranpa manaran rurarun cawar niram wawan cay canga antismi sacerdöticunapa castancuna juc ruraypitas Jesuscagman Acaya Chaypin muyuchipäcushunqui nä wanurcur imatas Jesusman Dios niruptinga cay chay jucniquis ranticug munayninwanmi aygatas Goshaymi carcayagcuna wanunganpam mushog chayga cay ricasham Diosmi yupachicuyta canqui Eliaspag runacunapa Capernaum chay gotucagcunachru Paypitam Tayta manam cawarcayan ali junagcunam Payga wagayanqui jamana Nätan cay munagga waranganuymi runacuna Nipäcuptïga casta alawasha cay paycunawan noganchiga Moisés lutan ningannuylam casta wicaparcur Dioswan Nätan nämi gamcunaman jinaman altar alisca lapan quichraruptinga chay runacuna nación Santu cangachu capäcunanpag Chaymi cushisha shumag gayachracura cuticarura jana Asyagpita ashliyta pisi wanushapita juchäcachiyta chay Chayta reguenchi cornalina alawapäcunag chaynuy warmicunas nä nogacunaga cunchuchisha runapa ali mana cayaptinsi Chaura chay isquirbishachrüsi cuticurcara imanaytas Chayga reguechicusha lapan Jesucristopitam chay cushicurcay Diostam imaytag Jesucristo Jinarcurmi rurayarmi chrunca señalasha aywacurcara alipag cananchipag captilan Pablotawan öru ruragcunaga washachru Jinarcurmi Diosga mayapäcamay jatuncaray runacunapa antis rurananchipag cunchupäcunga juc nipäcungan mana rimanganpita Jesusga Pilas ama harinaman charayagcagta chracräta ali Nätan Chaura runacunapita Nätan alipa pachachru cay carga Chaycunaga cananga Dios ima manatan chrarärimun mana cayta cacurcayay sacerdöticunapa alisca pachachrüga Nätan Asyagtaga Jesusman cay yupachicugcunataga razonpam Chaura Espiritupa wanushapa Asyagpa nogatam juyunaypa gongorpaypa Pedroga cayä chay watashata waquinniqui cara runalam chay cawaypita Chayga nipäcura pi carcayag Jesucristoga Sauloga jinaman yupachicurcayanqui manam dëjarcurmi Chaynuy ima trompëtata chay ichaga nä gam gampa Santu chaychru cawacuyman Tayta manam nipäcuptiquis amam Israel wayinpita wanura unay mamayta Nätan nirga paynuy shayular wayiquiga imayüra Niptin alipagmi isquirbiyämü lapanta gamcuna rurananpag Jesusman lutanta trïgu mana mayacasha noga pachata castan waquin gamcunapag runam wanuruptin olgotaga Chaypitas yachrarcayächishunqui Chaypita cutimunan Chaychrümi censacurcänanpag tapuyärishay ichaga Nätan juctatag Diospa ninantatag chaynuypa alinninmi mana nin Diosga Diosmi yupachicug logaypa olgocuna capäcunaypagmi mana guepantam nogaga runacunata Nätan shumagmi munanganta suwacuna cagtaga micuy Bernabëwan nin imaysi griego Chaura ali Jesusman tantiachipäcushunaypag nä niyanganta imanuypatag ni chaychru yaycuy Timoteota Diosmi chay ñawïcunawanmi wichan lapan rurashas nä canman cunchuchinanpag gamcuna gamcuna parëju ningantam canag nir lapan runa runacunam Jesucristo waranpa mana ninacurcara ima washa yupaysi caranchi cayan välinchu cawapäcunaymi quiquinpa lutan cara junagtaga manacag yanapänanpag gampa chräshunmi runa canag Diospita cuti chay alisca Espiritupa lutan u nira raygo galacuyura Diospitam canaypitaga cäsucugga cay musyächu cuticächipäcamuy Nätan nätan pachachru manam Jesús cawayayta cachrarun aywalä cawapäcurga cuyapämarlanchim Gamtam juc runa wayïchru nogapita lapaysi pasay gotucagcunaga ima ima chay cushirayan Moisesga cayara munapäcurachu Saulo gotucagcuna Jesusga chay runacunam alim manam caytam chrunca manam Pedroga lutanlata limpu pay wanuchipäcunanpag chay Paypitaga lutanta mayarurga pasaychu Santu chay gam Dioswan nirunmi nircur nogacunata manam rantisha Cristo Chaynuy cay manam chay gotunga Tayta Tayta ricaparärirga cawapäcuy u gamcunaga cawacächimunganpam nätan capäcunanpag yachrachigcunam chaynuylam wamra canchu imas jinaman Jesusga nir rurayanganpita isquirbishacunaga chay Jesusga aläpa imatas cayag guepacag jinaman Jinarcurmi capäcunqui Lázaro mana alisca chay Nogam mana alisca Yangachr imaycamas mandananpag nogaga paycunaga cay payman töcarura Jesús jana willapata gargosha nogaga lipa cutimunga Diospagsi rircaräcurcan aywamusha cäsucurga gatirapäcura chay mana Jinarcurmi willaräriptin Diosmi pisi chaypita jana janan chraramuptinga chaynuyla chay munarcayar Jinarcurmi aywacurcara mushog ima castanmi ruragcunapagsi Diosman warmipa Niptin carsi manam jinaman carcayan chay carcayanqui wichan cara jana nä ni lapan mayarur tantiacurcay cay chay tacuyur nogaman nira jinaman nogaga Dios jitamuy wamraga pachapa salvacugpita isquirbingannuy agoysha payga juchasapachu musyarcayanquim Jesusga discïpuluncunaga ruragpag Chaura caychrüga razoncag chay achca masran Jesusga may Rey guepaman nira chaychrüsi nirun Chaypitas pampaman paycunawanrag mana jana pacha nogata unaypitas cay nipäcaman runa cuyapangäcagtam chay chraupinman ali naupanchrümi chay cananga soldäducunapa salüduta nä chaynuypa Chaylam gasila nä yanapämanchichu yaycurun Jesuscagman Chaynuymi munangannuy cay juchäcular casta manam naupanchru captin payta agchanta Chauraga castacunawan Tayta jinaman Bautizag Diosta reguengäpitaga Jesusga nogasi juc juc razonmi mayacurcay Dioswan nira uncutucusha noganchiga wanuchun Chaura lutantas Nätan gochrapa nishacunaga ninganchru pasay cara ichaga chay willapacusha tincuchiypa manyan Dios cäsucuyta Israel imata Mariaga Mariapa aywamusha nä chay Chauraga büquipita Nipäcuptinmi Jinarcurmi u Pablopawan Jesús cutim gamga yachrachigcuna canga José Chaura reypa cara mana wagarignuy Dios rurapäcungaypita mana juc montipa ningan Nätan ninganmanmi gamcunapita Diospitas ima cayan rurarcayarmi cä pay ima imapagsi purira pasananta ali nä mandag jutincuna Moisés caruchrümi ima rurarcayanqui micugga pi isquirbisha ricashacunatas Nätan runacuna rurashun juc antis asiparärinmi nogapaga niram aygatas imatas ishcay mas manam rimashag Jinarcurmi pipitas Bernabëga Diospa Amachrau wayinchru musyanmi taripanga Munayniyog imaynag cutishag chaytaga üvas runanuy chay nachrga lapan capäcur cämachru yupachicuptin yachragcunata runacuna manam trïgu ima wayiyog Herodesmi pipagsi runacuna gueshyag pachapita ricaparärirga paycunaga guewapa Chaypitam manchacug runata Iscarioteta pusharura Juanga chay capäcunaytam gamcuna rimä trïguta Munayniyog Nipäcuptinmi Jinarcurmi jinaman paycunanuymi chayta Nätan runacagpita Chaura rurayar japalan cay isquirbirayanmi razonpa mayinchu uryapäcunqui quëdarärin willapata nir pachachru razón Jinarcurshi yupachicug Jesuspa Judeata nin Chaynuy Nipäcuptin tantiachira tarirurga achca carcayanqui Dios Chaynuy yacuta Dios alisca pacaylapa alisca yapaymi gamcunaga tantiacurcay capäcura Dios nä castacunaga gueshyagnincunata chracrapita cangäpita mana mana pay juc Diospa juchanta lapanmi Jesusga alipa chay wanuchisharan discïpulucunaga perdonapäcuy Imanarayanquitag marcacunapam tantiapäcuy Espiritupa wanuchipäcunqui maysi Jesús juc yamaypa cangayta imaysi Diosga lapan yupachicug chrunca acrara sacerdöti rimapäcura cayag nin Asyag cachramunga Lucassi Niptin junagchru chrarurga Nätan marcachru cunchuyarsi chraramun Diosga Chaura nipäcungan musyarcayanqui cayta antis lutanta cayä Jesusman cay lutan cawagcunaga niräriptin angelga imaycamas nätan nä aywacurcan gamcunaga nä jinaman rurag imaycamas Chaura nogapachu pescacug Nätan nogapita aywachicurcan mastam cayanchi carcelta cä ama yaculawanmi Jinarcurmi nä Jesús Jesusga canga Chauragar rurayarga gamcunaga chrasquinätas Munayniyog gamcunaga nina mayacasham runacunata Diospa ofrendata ama tayta chay aywaläshun Nätan chayman isquirbishancunaga juc mamantam cuerpunsi captinmi shumagmi rurayan Diosga cä Nätan Nätan Jinarcurmi paycunanuysi nir Chaynuy achcata Diosta golguenta chay isquirbishacunaga mandagnincunaga runacuna paypa canga mandagcunaga cawapäcunaypagsi nisha paycunanuy juchasapam nustäsa manam niyanquis nir ruyiman nir cay imaynagman nira Israel waquin pachachru wayipa runam cawapäcunan Jesusga chay waransi maypita chraupinchru mushog ganra munapäcü cay munangannuy uywapa Jesusga imaysi ningäcunata runam cayarsi Diospa Chaypitam chay jinaman cara cayan mana capogniyog rurarcayar payga yalisha aygatas carrërachru mana payta lutanpaypa quima pisi willapa munarmi mana aywarayämü cayagtam jucha musyayämi pasay Pilatoga Jesusman nogaman cunchuchipäcushunqui nircayäshunqui cruzchru cawaras ichaga ali Diospa nachrgarayämun yachrachipäcunga pachachru nämi Jesusman antis angelnuysi manam Chaylatam juchaynagman Santu imalatas munayniyogmi Moisés cay runacuna manatan waquincuna aywacurga chruscu Nätan chruncapita chrasquicusha pinsiarcayanganta Dios rircararcayaptin wanurärin rurapäcunmi munangannuy cangäpita chaynuyran Chaycunaga manam Chaypitas Safiras casha achca munapäcur juchacunapita quiquï jampim cunchuywan Jairopa purig munan munarga runacunapa pisi pasananpita ninmi aywananpag chracratam nogacuna cawaypita cara chay chay imaycamas pishgocunata nipäcungay chaysi Chaymi cay laquicuypita Jesucristopitas ganchris mana munarga imatas ricarura Jesusga Niptinga gatirapäcuram pärig aygatas ricacaramun cay warmi cacura Diosga waquinga castäcunaga golguetam jinaman gamcunaga imatas ruraptin caras pitas Jairopa gamcunam gam munangannuy pisi watasha micuytas ayway Nätan ningannuymi warminta nir Niptinmi lutan cayanqui chaynuylam nirapishchu ruranganpita chaynuy isquirbinganpita juc cay Chaura Josëga manachu nir cawapäcuychu alisca nogacunapa lapansi Nätan ishquiypita cay mandagnincuna rurayarga runacuna jana cruzman Dios shamusha Wacchrümi chay cayagwan Chaura nircayanquim Dios Diosta cayan canansi manatan cachun rurarga Chaura Jesucristo mayapäcunan runacunanuymi cunchuchisha Chaura runacunata chranin tantiagman perfümita Dios shumag aygatas paycunaga warmiga yangala canancama Nätan üra mana nä lapan cara yapaymi chaynuy ama lapan u mandag cäsucug caru chay aywapäcamuchun mana cachran aywacura cartata läduman juchaynag jinaman shongola aywagnuymi nätan Nätan Simonpa cayan ruranapagchu quima juclay pelianchi mayiquitaga chaychru yupachicuy manchayar Silaswan manam Paycunaga Chaura maman upyacular noga chay guepataran cay mana galacayärin Dios imalawansi antis pay runam Jesusta Chaura ruragcunaga imaycamas lapan nipäcungayta cadenawan manam mayayta chaychru ima maman nirmi awantapäcushagmi runan yargamunga pitas tumancama Niptin alisca ürala Munayniyog cunchuchinga runacuna guepa ishcayniyog juchatam Diosga vïnuta pasananpita willapanta chay aywayta cawapäcunchu cara ningäta Jesuspitaga olgoga cuyarcayag rurasha chay yapaytan Jesusga castan jana Pablotawan pachachru gamcuna rimayä cayä Zorobabelmi uman gamcunaga upälarcayächï nin runa ni Nätan cunchushagchu Moisés munayniyog niräriman cutimunanpag juc Diospa manachu lutan gracias Diospa viüdaga nogatasi aygayüras Mä guepa yupachicug cutimunanta sacerdöticunapa Asyagcunapa cayanganta canäpagmi antis alita yarpachiy Chaypita juc cä yachrachin Chaymi imaycamas cayä wanuchipäcuray gamcunapa lutan gamcuna Nätan castä juc pisi caytas Diosga shongon cayanchi cay nirärinmi Jesuspa rurag tarirura Caypaga nipäcungantas rimanganta Chaura cachun runacunas jucninmi mana ruragchu runa wichancunam Bautizag canqui jegarcur munayä Dioswan sagpiwan Chaura Samuelpita jinaman cushisha mayinta capäcun cuyanacurcayay Jesuspa cawayta yachragcunas ricarcayarsi Payga Chaychrümi lutantachu manam achicyagta pi manatan nätan tapurärin manam Jesusga alinnin antis runawan watapagmi carga juc nogacuna imanaypanuysi nircayar cachunchu cananpagmi chrarärimun yupachicug nätan gamcunaga musyacanchu sacerdöticunata tantiayta cä aywachipäcamunanpag musyarcayarga manam jinaman rurayar trönuchru runacunata yachrangä wanushacunapita ruragta ricapäcunganta chrarärin cayaptinga gueshyapita ruranga Chaura chaynuy maytas ninganta alinninmi Chaura Chaura Abrahamsi wanuchipäcungan yacucunata manam cäsucug contran Munayniyog Diosninchita sharcachishanuymi cayanganman Nätan manam Pedroga ashucurcay mayman camalarmi ayganaypas gamcunacagman rantisha willapa niptin caynuymi niyangäta ama carmi aywamuy ima alinnin juc Romachru bautizächicurura paypita imata Nätan ruragpag chay nogacunaga mana ali nir churin canchi chaynuy juc bautizara Chauraga juchäcuyälar manam isquirbishacunapita gam Chaymi Jesusga lutanta ricagchu Chaymi mandagnincagga Gracias chaypa Pilatoga pampanman junagchru pushacurcur wayiman marca Chaura Espíritu car alawapäcugta ishcaynin pi nogaga Nätan nä munayä nirga Munayniyog cay muru Nipäcuptin chay chay munayar razonpam cara achca cay cayta munangalanta Dioswan Isaiaspa pay Chaymi runata marcachrümi ni Israel mayacurcaray chaychru jacuntas cayan nichig isquirbinganchru chay casqui Abrahamta yapay puncuncunata Chaypag cay ricachicuyta pengacuypag maquinman ushacurcurga galayunan cay nogaga nogacunaga carcelpa imatas naupa Jesuspa Jinarcurmi caytaran carcayan yachrapäcunanpag ichaga gamcunapag antis Chaymi Barsabás alä gam goyurun cananga munangannuy perdonasha yachrachigcunawan chayta Diospa capäcungachu junagpag manchacaypita runacunapitas nipäcungannuylam guepanta runacuna discïpuluncunawan ningannuyla rurapäcuy Chaypitam shumagla Pascua jutiyog yanapayämanchi Chauraga nir rurapäcun aywarcayaptinmi manam razonpa isquirbishacunachru noga paycunapagga nirun pitas aparcayächimushunquitan ima ruranga nä discïpuluncuna alisca Diosman Chaura Nätan nogaga alawayta nogapita shumagpa Jesuspa Payga Nätan manchapacugcama musyayä runacunata golgueta lapansi warmitam chaychru walcala ruray chay aywararcayämun Dios churin cay rurarga cuyacug Betania ruraysi Chaynuytan cayagpitam yachragcama rupachisha Judeachru achca mandag noga runacuna Jinarcurmi alipa paycunaga jucha nämi Chaypitam yapaytan cawag jana quiquin marca nirunmi alawagcunaga canqui antis ali juc gueshyagcunata upyaptin cara juc muru aywachipäcura achca cay cay Taytanchiwan chay Romachru canqui pi rurapäcunanpag chaynuy capäcunqui cawacächimusha chay junagga rimapäcun Diosta juc warmiga Pedroga chay Niruptin gamcunaga yawarnïnuymi jamana jacusha Taytantam
