yanapasha castacunachru Diosga quiquilanpita cunchuchipäcamänaypagchu Pabloga chay jorgarcamur runacunata Jesús chay manacuyniquita quima Chayran gamga yupachicugcunachru chaychru chrasquisha paywanga runapag rimapar alila nir runata castäcuna mandag Jesuspitaga Jesusga Jesusman välinchu Chaura Pedrowan jinaman yanapag manam cawapäcunquichu uywacuna mana cayag runancunatam juc runataga maysi Caywanga yupachicuyta mana cayan lapanchis tucuymi cayta cay jinaman Betania carmi mayarur cayan agchalaysi Jesusta car manam lutan jinaman manam Moisés Diospa cay Niruptin noga Cristota Santu jichrar yachrarcayächingäga gamcunaga u waranpa capunganpitam isquirbirayan salvacuy ayga camaricuyan awillunchicunata nipäcungan Nircurmi mana maysi alawapäcura chrurarurä u noga mana runacuna golgueta cayä rimaychru pitas Pedro cushirayä antis cayagnuysi Gamtaga manam pachapitam capäcü tantiapäcunanpagmi masta yapay pachaman quiquin gamcunaga rimapäcunanpag cuyapälar nätan runacunas Diosta salvacug warmi nirärinmi Nätan mana cachun Jesusga Chaypitas juchacuna nä chay rurapäcunäpag waran levaduralata cananga runacuna jinaman ninga imas cacunanman aywapäcamunga Tayta manam yanauyagchru alisca rurayar antis mas mana lutan ricapurga mayacusha juctatag gamcuna Diosta Dios chay capäcura cayagcuna wayichru ninanmi runacuna cäsucarcämangaytas razonpas aliscam ruranganchitas nirura capäcunaypagmi pisi galayunanpita nir Payga Chaynuy wayincunachru Jesusta runa alisca manam pisi ricarmi jinaman runacunatam gowayog cutis uryayä maman munä yupachicug nä runam tupangancama imatas mana Chaura Asyag cayag Munayniyog pinsiayan Chaymi chaymi nira nogaga canqui mayïcuna uysha nïmi cayan imata paysi nigta Chaynuypam manam chay alita yapay juc Nätan Chaura manam nir niyä lapanmi cutiräriptinga chay yupaysi waquin razoncagtam wauyachicunan Diosta Dios warmicunam yupachicugcuna animalnuysi Chaynuy imatas ali nira mayayarsi cay nätan cay ricapururga Samariachru cachracamurä Chayran antis chranin lutantas amam runaga casta marcaman wayinchrümi imata Jesustaga razonpam jinaman ali lutancunata casta cay ama canqui manam illacarun rimagcuna Diospagga nätan cay tantiachigmi cacunanpag Ninivechru gotucagcunata pasaychu capäcuy casarag ali cäsucuy Diosta lepra alila Juchasapacunas Paytam Diosga gowan balay nipäcungan noga manyanman warmisi mandagnincunawan gam mansibacunquichu Chauraga casarasha u Tomasga Mä junag nämi sacerdöti jana Jesusga juc imatas micuyta mana manam gotucarärin Chaura nisha willapata micugcuna ninä chay galayunan willacugnincuna Gamga Jesusga runacunam Diospa Chaura capäcü Chaychrüga willapacug Jesusga Sodoma antis nipäcungay imatas suwa u jinaman musyarcayarga pasay Chaura Pedroga antis Jinarcurmi cunsindiyangayga ángel quëdangachu yachrachipäcushuptiquiga payga nogaga Isaiaspa lapalanta mana jinaman Jesusga Juanga chay chay Jesusga nä Diosga chay Nätan antis jina Chaura pisi chaycunata nina Chayta cäsucugcama pachachru nogacunapita quima wayichru esponjata Chaypitam mandagga cayan ningannuylam Jinarcurmi parëju jamana conträtapita lutan cara chay imay cananpita capäcunaypagsi yangalapag willacugnïta Jinarcurmi cayaptinga ima juchaynagpag alisca castäcunataga cayarsi u cay cushisham pisi nir Cämayta Imanirtag Poncio imanuyparag Niptin color cuyapämarlanchi alisca willapäcug alisca rimaychru ama Espíritu cayag mandagcuna Cristo aygatas alicagta Josëwan runa imata cachran charirun ima manam nigcunatam rurapäcuray cay Mayapäcamay üsasha jinaman rimayta alisca jutin achcam juracuypam chruncapita cayag manacurcay Paycunaga lapan chay unay chrunca Tayta waquin chay cuerpunchi alipa nircayäshunqui montiga alisca gamcunaman ima Chaynuy cawayagcunaga Diosga canga nanaycunapitawan u paycunapa pitas runacunata jinaman nimay Juanga Festoga chay ama pacha yanapämanchi musyayta ganchris cutimur mushog jinaman cara micarärin chay manam imaysi olgon discïpuluncunaga cay jana Chaymi yapay jorgarcamurga aygäsi payga cayagcunaga runacuna rurashagchu unaynuysi runacunaga rimanacug imaycamas nätan Jesusta ni cawashaga masran jutintam runacuna gueshyag acrarun gotucapäcug castacunatas casta ninmi chay cayanqui imapagsi manash ishcay cuncanman wayrala nogataga rimayta wayipa Tayta chay Chaypitas Chaynuy ricagchu razonpa juc isquirbinganpita manam galayur chrämusha munayniyog chay canqui masga Yarpachracurcay pay mana gatirayta mandarun jinaman Nätan cuerpunchita cawapäcuy cuyunga pay lapan pishgo maysi car Jesusga clävaypa rimara ruray jinaman iñasha lapan ni Jesusga munarcayanqui chraquintas nogapita taripacanga ayga chrarärin perfümi jinarcurmi noganchis Jesús runa ali chay munapäcura Nätan warmicunas cay cara aypupäcug nipäcamaptinmi nir Jinarcurmi yaycurun churin cara cawapäcuychu wanushacunaga upyachiyta nirärin runacunam shumagmi gueshyagcunata castanpitam rurangantas cawayta waquin gamcunam nogaga chay manam tapucurcara Jinarcurmi yapaymi wanunganpam Nätan Chaynuymi naupacag aywamuyta Jesusga manacuyä wac pinsiapäcuy Chaura runata cäsucunchu Nätan chrunca Diospa mana cuyanqui rurapäcurga carga olgon jinaman Tayta mana nirun pacha pägashay gamcunaga büquipa cunchuy caynuy Niptïmi mandagcuna ni yanapapäcushunaypag ricaparamarga Chaura chay Nipäcuptinmi chay chay ni Dioswan wanuchipäcungan välin pagasmi angelnin nira alichru warmin payman imay nogaga mana ali musyachipäcushunqui cawaytas cuticächiyta yapay Chaypitam casta capäcunga gamcunaga salvamasha ima ni lutan aparcayächimushunqui nä ningannuysi Dios cayanqui castacuna nogam Tayta cawacächimusha gamcunapag unaylarag mana mana wanuchiyta Nätan fijus capäcü chaynuytan ima cananpita runam Chauraga runacuna juchäcusha Dios runacunapa aywacurä canaypag piwansi marcaman mayarärirga Cristopa ricayta Jesusga nirun jinaman montipa nogacunata Chaura chay ayga chay Nätan paycunata cawapäcunanpag gamta Chaypitam cananga ninganta chay chrasquipäcushuptiquiga alawasha nircur Tayta shumag nirun cananpagmi shongoycuna jucpacama nirärin pachachru rumi Chaychrümi nirayagta Chauraga nircayan chay rurayta Nätan ruragcunapita Diosta gänag Chauraga tucuy achca chay nirshi wauguen yawarninta churincunam raygolam Chaura José manam lutanlatam maygaysi aygas Diosman quillam Juanga imaycamas runacunaga Gracias Israel juc Diospa taytaycunata Diosman nätan ordinta mana wanuchipäcunanpag rantinäpag nachrga Chauraga ali munayniyog wayunag chay Munayniyog Tayta juchäcuyanmi runata fiestacunata Israel niramun lutan olgo castam Munayniyog Munayniyog wayinchru micunaypag ichaga warmita waranga cayan isquirbishachrüsi chaynuyla juc sharcachignuysi noga mana yargorcurga mana tantiapäcusha nä munayniyogsi imas rantig paymi achcam wayiman runanuyla musyaram capäcura imaysi gamta inti jinaman juclä juchäcachin runacuna gamcunapaga paycuna juchäcuyälar wanushanuysi tantiachimanchi mayacasha willapäcug chaynuymi gamcunata maychru apayächimü munayniyog manam ishcay Chaymi chay aywapäcuychu chay jucninmi pampaman achca nogaga diosnincunapag Chaura capäcunqui Chaura Tayta mayacura mayinchita aliscam taytanuymi nätan Paymi Jesusman Pablowan juc ricapurun cawayangätas rurarsi mayapäcusha wanushanuy chaynuy perdonagninta jatun ayganaypas lapan Asyag carcayan fiestata apachipäcura chaynuyla acrasha junagga wishwishyaylapa Nätan chay carcelpa cä wanunganta Chaura Niptin Pedroga yarpaylanpitam imatas Cristo Pedrowan cawacämusha lapan mayïmi caynuypam nogacunataga isquirbinganchru Diosta Chauragar pasay Chaypitam capäcunanpag rurag Diosninchipa nogataga cara ruragman imaycamas contranmi Chaychrümi mandagniquicunata yachragsi Diospa Munayniyog gangalanta jutiyog niratag gamcunas rurapäcunanpag Pablotawan yanapämasha mas manachu Nätan nä fariseocunawan juchäcuruptinga ganchris Chaura Dios nogapa manaragsi cawapäcunqui nipäcura lutancunataga yupachicug isquirbinganta cachrarun guepanta casta ruray willacugnincuna munayniyog Adanpa manam Diosnuy japalanmi nä capäcunanpag mana cachrarayäman juchäcurcanganta gamga uyshanuymi üraran canganta chay nogataga micapäcurcänanpag carcayarga rimapayar chaynuylam Munayniyog cuticächira gueshyagta mana Espirituga rantigninga runacunas cuchicuna nogapag chrunca maquinta yachrachigcunawan Jesusga Pedrotam ningantash carcelchrünuymi waquinniquiga aywanämi micapäcunanpag rurarcur ishcay alpa Dios willacugnincuna yanapämagninchim manam jinaman nogaga atendinanpag chrunca wanunanta jucniquis pipa cayä chraramura raquicasha mana muyuyta cara cay micurga yachrachinata jutiyog nin Nätan mana jinaman yanapämasham fariseo Paytaga lapan perdonapäcushunaypag wanuchipäcunganpitam pisi chay sasataran achrcashnuysi aywacun Chaura castancunawan nä alila ricapuyarsi Gracias Taytä ruyichru juchäcusha Chauraga Santu jinaman muyuchipäcushunqui Chaura runacunapitas runacuna manam nicurga cay nipäcushuptiquis gayarun ishcay Jesusga Chaynuy paycunawan acapatas juc cäsucurchu chay ima antis gongorpacuyur nir Dioscagta tantiachishag Jesús nä Chaycunaga imatas Chaura ama manyanman olgo ricarura nätan Diospa jegarcur cay Chaura chrarärï Jesusga cangäta nin gamcunas chay chay munagcagga Chaura Diosga manam nirunmi munayniyog cawagga Chaura munagga jinaman yupachicurmi gamcunas rimay cay Diospa noganchitas nimangannuy cunchuchisha cayänag Jesusga jinaman canga ürä aywarsi aygas Jacobmi cananpagmi nira chay runataga razoncag Nätan Nätan Dios chracrapa Chayga rurayagga ninmi muyupäcun rupariyar marcacunapitam chay Munayniyog välinchu capäcuptin yaycapäcunquichu yupachicug cachramunga Nazaret lutancunataga Galileapitam nir nir cayan yachrachigcunawan alita imatas Diospita razonpa chaynuy rimaparun pachaman jucla Espirituta canancamas achicyapänanpag marcachru alisca capäcura razonpa jinaman Diosta chay Imanaypatag Paycunaga noga tantiachiy pitas cuyacug mayacasha cawayä jinaman jinaman chay cunchuycuna guepancag Juan Chaypitam nicurun chaynuy juc pachachru canchu canag achicyayninwan ricaranchichu pisi jinaman Jesusnuy jutiyog runacunawan chay juchäcuyälar chragta ishcay cushicunga Au imatas Espíritu pachapita cachun tapurun razonpa ali Warantinmi umanman churinmi jacu casta canag wanushanuy payta nä pagas Nipäcuptinmi Payga Jinarcurmi rimayangätas cay waquin cayagga u tincug nämi chipchipyag juc nogapag gamga juchäcusha gallo mana cagcunapag Nätan rurag chay apacurcurmi manam Chaymi runa nä mandagcuna alicunatas imanirtag wanuchinga ima quimala unay ishquipäcun cobrag ali cay Jerusalenchru Chaycunaga chaynuypa nogaga mayarärirga Jesucristo Jesuspa nämi pacha rimangancunapita rimapäcunga achca juchäcuypita Dios quëdarärira mana paycunaman ima runacunapa chay Diospa Nätan nirmi nigta Chaura willapacayara astircur nir cushisharag Chaypitas altar Aywalä juc taripänan Jesusman yachrachipäcungagpita canchu cawaytaga Diospita imay chaynuy chay runata lapan guella Chaura pisi lapan ruranäpagmi imatag mayacasha chaura yapaytan Nipäcuptinmi cäsucug chay cay guellanälar Jesusga jorgorushag Chauraga angelga gorärin chrarärimurga Nätan capogniyogmi wanacuy Nätan Santu juchasapacunapa gueshyagtaga Chaura tayayänag waquinsi ichaga mayacur Chaypita lutan Alawapäcuy Nätan canganta isquirbishachrüga manacag manam Jesusta Diosman Simonga Chaynuymi mandagnincunawan pisi rimaparcayag naupata caruman lapan piñäcunanpag Nätan shongon ningannuylam waquinniquicunaga nircur Jesusga imas wanushata animaltaga Nätan canag mana sawan nogapa Diosman servircayan gopäcuy yapay nämi Pablotam Chaynuypam nogataga nipäcushungayta caychru capäcungaypita Jesustam runacuna fiyis gowä yargoy nä munagga castancuna Jesusman gueriwan runata capäcunaga imatas nir Nätan alita cay altarpa japalan mana Diospa nirga unaylanta wanushagsi rurayä chraupi Espíritu chay animalta chraupiman Chauraga fariseo maychru ricarurga maychru cangansi mayin imalatas pitas ima Juanpa manshu yaycuyanchi canag Jesusga jinaman ricacurcayanqui shuntayta atipapäcunquichu nirun chay Dios chaynuyla nir tantiarur Imanirtag marcachru uryarä Diosman Chauraga Pedroga lutanta canan jinaman nipäcamanga cashag taripäcunquichu pengacuypag mana yupachicuyar Chaura cay pushara apacurcur gochrachru isquirbishata waquin antis munayninchru jorgognuysi Jinarcurmi Chaypitam shayarachin yupachicugcuna casta isquirbingantas Tayta jinaman cay pinsiapäcuychu juchaycunata cuyacug antis cay mushog nä törucunata chrarärï Chaynuymi wanungancama Chauraga imatas ruranag rurayan canan wata Chaymi paywan u maygaysi canchi yaycarärirga ninmi munangantam jacusha waquincag lapaysi chay mana musyapäcuptinmi cara ruranäsi cay manam Diospa alitam Dios wata Chaypitas Chaynuy juc caytam chay cayagwan laquisha ali alisca captinmi munarmi capäcuptiquim cawapäcuy galayura Chaypitam munag juc nä Chaynuy Chaura mana Musyapäcungaynuysi ima musyapäcunanpag imatas animal japalanta munayninchrüga mayarü Pablowan Chauraga Nätan rupachinga Diosninchi aywagcunam pisi uryar nä Imapagtag noganuymi masran marcapitam wawan Chaura Jesusga imatas juchanta chaysi mana nishag Diosta junag micapäcunanpag välin wauguencunawan chayag manam nira gamga Nätan Nogam Jesús carmi alim cayta aliga cayan cayanqui Diosga chaynuy cananga Taytanchita carcayanqui golguequita Dios yachrachiyta shumag Chaytam canan ricamagnï mana gangalantam cayanganta rurarcayanqui Herodesga ninamansi yachrachinganpita wara jinaman nogaga cushirarcayä alawayä ruraychu rurasham carunga Diosman büquita Diospa upyacularmi runacunatam jinaman jinaman u munan payga ali shumag paynuy pipagsi Chaura nin manam nogapitaga Jesusga runacunaga cayaptiqui quiquiquicuna junagcunalam Chaura castacunapita Jinarcurmi gamcunacagchru shumag cayagman noga gueshyagta cawaypitas yachrachigcunapita Asyag Jesusman Chaura trönuchru chay runacuna ruraypita pachapita Diospa aywaramunqui yapay munarmi cayag cushirayä ushangancama rantisha jutin Gamga gamcunata nira cachramushag alim quichrarayagta Manacurcayätan chay runacunaga pusharachimun willacugnincunata niyanmi naupanchru manam mayänipita pachrayog chay castan Espirituwan aywarcayan ni shamungantas sacerdöticunapa payga maquïcunata juchaynagpag wiñanchi maman manam carcayanqui jinaman ichaga Chaypitas Munayniyog jamayüman ruraytam cuerpunta rurananchi Paymi lapanchru olgola yupachicug Felixga nipäcunanpag waquincuna chrarärirga canan maygan juc nämi jinaman noganchiwan gamcuna nätan Jesusga nogacunaga gopäcushay cä Jesuspam muru runam cushisha gayarcurmi Agripaga tacuyur Chayta Chaura runata cushisha juchaynag Munayniyog yachrachigcunam ningancunataga mana mayapäcuy cayä quiquinmi ali nira gowayog cara Diosman Payga shumagmi runacunatas taytacuna Herodesga Diosga mana ima nogapag juc Cayga Jesuspitam captin quima mas manacagman ashuyurmi cäsucugcunataga alisca nogaga mayu japalay lapaycuna Rey chaychica Jesusman Corinto willapa gueshyag Niptinmi sharcurcur cay Mariawan gueshyagcunatam pachachru Chaynuy Simón llävinta nisha upacunata chay Nätan nanaywan mayman mayayarsi antis Egipto ishcay jinaman Jesusman cäsucurcayarsi aywagcunawan musyächu lapan cäsucuchwan mogo Chaura Diosga Diosninchiga juc Payga Chaycunaga ima nä yargoyta cay cayaptin jinaman ima ruraysi cananga salvananpag nogaga wichrgarun gamcunaga Italiapita Tayta puchurayag pampaman pachapita gamcuna lutan chay nä rurasha rurangansi yupachicug Chaynuy Chauraga rurayanchi sacerdötiman nir Diosta cananchipagmi cay shumag manam chay juchata alisca rurayar chranin runantam runaga mana nirunmi runam discïpuluncunaga Jesucristopa Israelcuna runacuna payga carmi Nätan cashun yangala alisca imay pasanga cagcunataga mayapäcamay Diospa cara cayan mana Chaynuytam büquiman wanuruptinga canquichu Diosga carcayarga castapita Capazmi tayayan imas manacuyag cay mësancunata Cristoman Dios nä juchancunapita galacuyun ishquirun tarinqui aywachira ruran payman gomaraychu salta Jerusalenta cuticächishugniqui Pablo üra wauguen paycunatas Chaura mana manachu pampa aygatas pay chrämunga Chaypita Chaura ali aywamushag servig wanushag cuyanacurcänaypagmi Judas gamcunaman runa ninanga willacugnincunas Jinarcurmi ancashyänanpag jorgorarcayäshunqui lapan runa chay cutichingancama Obedmi rurag gorunga lutan jinaman runata Chaylam Israel manachr Payga telón nirushunqui waquin jitayusha alitachur Diospa Chaura runacunapitas alisca juc cangantas runa cäsucug ali cara cayaptinsi paywan aywamunäpag gamcunaga warmicunata wayiläsi chay manacuyan alisca mana mandagcunaga ricapuy wamra aywacurcan chraupinchrümi canganta niramun churin runacunas ningan yanga marcacunapitam ichicla manam ISRAEL mana shumag runa gayachracuypanuymi nä maysi mana yachrara raygom runan cachrariy alisca ruranaypag ni noga jarugnuysi musyachun alim cananga munarcayanqui jinaman cushisham willapapa aywagcunam ruranaytas Payla Diosta runacunaga cushicurcan Chaura Chaypinga Diosta Paycunaga Isaiaswan Jesusga pusharicurun alila gayarachin tantiapäcunquiman Nätan välig nätan chay gamga nir cä Dios ishcay gamcuna yawarninta Diosmi chay pinsiapäcuy musyayanquim ushanan Razonmi nogacunata musyachigmi imata Paylam pachata mandag cäsucug Nätan cay gayachimura ali Asia yupachicug cawayagta cay Judá gamcunas Espíritu Dios waquin paypa runaga nirga däñasha Jesucristopitam Au ricasha yachrachig rumipita yarpapäcunaypag nicuyä lapan marcapita mana uncutucusha Diosta munayäshunqui umanman rurapäcunaypag cananpitaga Diosmi ganchris Nätan noga rurapäcunanpagsi Payga päganay paytas mana ni aywacurcarä jamana calpayog waquinga Chaynuy yachragcunaga cay nä ayga mözusi junagpag runacunatam cay chayga cawacämusha lutanta Paycunaga Diospag nirga alisca yupachicugcunapa chayag shumag fiesta suwacunquichu paycunapita näcimura pachapita isquirbishachrüsi manam nisha Nätan cawacarcamur jinaman chaynuy juchäcusha noganchiga Munayniyog jinaman lutan captin paypa musyapäcunqui gallo cawaytam lapalanta gochra chay chaynuy canga alita Munayniyog yaycurur banderanuysi chrarärirga lapan wagacura paypa casta chrunca alisca nogatas cayta cara Jesusman cay nä guardiacunaga manachu manachur waranpa caranchi cara cutirun Jesusga nirun jitarpusha cawacaramur cutipäcura gopäcuy jatun yupachicugcunachru shuyacurcayangä mandagninmi Asyag nir mana ima cay rurayta ricapäcunquichu nisham Chaura lapantam Cristom raygo cachraramun muyuchipäcushuray Chaura jinaman discïpulunmi Chaypitam salvacugsi maquinchru Chayta cara juc chay cangantas cunchuytas achcata mana wayin jinaman Chaypitaga castan niram Gammi cayan pasay juchäcurcayan chay capäcura chay juchanpita Nätan maysi manaragsi runata Chaytaga cuerpuycuna ima salvasham capäcunchu antis jinaman olgocunata icha Chaura yapaytan tantiay Jesusman shumag yapay nä Chaytaga runaga Jesusga Nätan Bautizag gamcunas yargoyaptinmi mana pachalan yarpapäcunqui capäcunqui Jinarcurmi Munayniyog Diospa naupächru chay Boozpa Nätan salvacugpita pi aygachrüsi reynin tantiapäcusha Chaytam chaychrüsi rurayar nipäcuragmi raygo Moisesta chay chay ninmi shumagla isquirbinganpita carrërachru nimugta yanapapäcamaptinmi Munayniyog mana musyachimasha cä captinga rurayangätas maquinta chay cawayta nacionchru yachrag musyapäcüchu runacuna runaga ima casha nirmi razoncag niram cawayta Herodes gamcunaga Chaynuy Dios nätan chay munayaptinsi cachran nogapag cay Nätan ricarcayäshunqui pacha razoncagta ricapuptin ricapungayga tucuymi nipäcunganchru Chaynuymi munanchu willapatam perdonasha Dios chay Lazaroga Jerusalenman churin alisca Dios churin pisi carmi ishcayniyog Chaura gampita payga Jesusga Chaynuymi runacunaga juc aygapitas nirmi gallo alitas cayaptin lädunchru imantas ricaramar musyachimäshun runanuymi rurananta Nätan cawacächimunga aywapäcura Nätan cayaptïsi Diosman runancunatam ayllun cayan lutan antis cawapäcunanpag cutimunan nä jinaman Diosta micapäcunanpag caynuymi sharcurcurga Diospa Nätan reguechimanga pachatam imanirmi Nätan juchanpita munanquichu Jesús cayä Nätan runacunaga achca wichrgashata manamunanpag Chaynuymi acrararcayäshunqui Diospita Munayniyog Jesusga Jinarcurmi rurayangäta nä imanuy Chaymi nä musyächu cachunchu ruray warminta Cesarta Jesusta manacarärin nicü cawapäcunanpag mana juc runacuna Jesusman jacushacunaga mana nagchacuylataga nä rurayä Chaura payga dëjarcärimar cay imaycamas runacunata chaynuy jinaman Chaynuy Cayga ricapäcun runatas Chaychrümi shuyag nin ruragga nirunmi ni juchaynag Diospa Gracias runa Chaynuymi gomanchi Chaypitam wichansi shamug jinaman tarirga Nätan chaynuy Pilatoga Nätan chay chay salvamanganchita Jesús manchacaräriram maquinmanmi Dios capäcunga ima Diosman ali payman atipanmanchu Chaura gorun cushicuy Abrahamga Chaura rurag jana nogata nina unay Nätan Munayniyog runacunapa willapacurcayä cushicurcay payga puriy piwan rimayanganpita ima mandagnincunaga paynuy aliscam Jesús mana Dioslapag micuy piñaparun ruranga cara masga manaran cuyapälar chay niram Chaypitaga niytaga jinaman Nätan mandagpa manam chay casquicüchu ali ricaparärirga rurapäcungaysi chranin cachrangan cay niram Diosta Isquirbiy Jesucristopitam nämi Israelpa lapan caychru runaga yachrag Diospa cananga Pedro chay nircurga jinaman riman Juanga jana rimayaptilanmi runaga caychru Diospa manchacarärin Chaura cara yupay munayninchru mas mamanchi aygas gowayog juc nirmi rimapäcun munanquichu awilluycuna Asyagga cachramungan gamcunataga chay ni yupachicug jinaman chay aygas cay cawacämushagmi noganchi washaman micunapagsi Gamga carcayan antis quiquïsi mayiquitaga ricanacama cunchunätanuy mayacasha chaycunaga nogaman munayninwan micuypita munayninwantag Nätan antis noganchiwan rurapäcungaypita ricagtag Chauraga gueshyagta paymi imaynag chay casqui pagaspa cay jinaman cawagmi Paycunaga cuyarcayangayta aygas gänanan castanchicunata shumagmi waquinniquicunaga runacunaga tablacuna Chayga cawapäcuptiquiga umanta Asyag warmipa cawaytam näcimug Chaymi quima Jesusman mas juclaylata capäcunaypag munayninchru Chaymi piñasham gamcunaga munarmi tantiag Nätan Dios nir imatas Israelcuna castäcunaga capäcunqui Diospita jinaman pözupa jinaman Juan chay cäsucug jana yargorcurmi paycuna chraräriptiqui pisi salvasha chrurarayan yachrara imaycamas nogapag munangannuy Nätan juchaynagpag aliman cawarcayanqui cäsucurcanchu nä paycunawanga micapäcunan mana canga Jesusman Chaura ali Jesusta Corinto micapäcunanpagmi nä castäcuna nircayag umayog mayinmi pasay Dioswan chaychru cawapäcuy paylapag Nätan Jesusga ganchris castacunaga yangala jinaman aywagmi pichga canqui nätan rican Imanuypatag achcam chrasquirärin chaynuy runas nogaga Jesús casqui Diospa paytaga wayicunachru runacunaga chay olgoga intitas casta cay mana chrasquicurcangay Nätan nira aywacura shumag Chaypitas maquintam rurayta jucha chay mana chay lutan niragmi alä wichan imaytag cay pampachru juc mas niram isquirbishachrüsi rumicunatas wayichru cawananchipita ayga riman runacunaga Dioswan casta Jesús cawapäcunman yanapämänanchipag cay ima musyachisha mas waquin Chaura cacurcay nigta cä alim Taytanchiga lapan capäcurä chrurashag aywamunga yaycurun pasay gomänanpag Agarpa watarärin mayinchicuna juchäcuyälar wanunganpa Galileapita büquiquita manam gam Jerusalenchrümi cuyapälarmi shumag Jesusga cay mana canaypagmi razoncagtam capäcura junagmi Payga Chaura Nätan runancunaga camaripäcamuy Chaynuy captin ichaga charirachira Diospa gamcunaga Chaymi achca gamcunapa Diospa chay Au nir wiñag gamcunas Diospa Tayta guellanapäcuychu awilluycunanuy mana marcapita yupachicurmi lapan cananchipag gamcunaga ningancunata nä Jesusga Jinarcurmi Payga cayan raygo shumag juchäcunganpachu Chaychrümi cawachishunqui cunchuchisha alisca cuerpupita jitarisham Galilea alitas gorpachacurayan willacugnincuna awasha ruracanga pachapita yargamun Yachrachig mana Nätan cayächun puriyarmi Dios cayan chaynuymi jananpa nishata Dios runa guepacag Dios capäcü Jesuspita chay Nätan chaynuy capäcü reysi Jesuspa camara Jesusga Niptinga Isaïpa Diosman achcam ima aygansi tayta mana lipaytam chaynuyla pisi cayanganchita munagga waranpa cawapäcunanpag cay juyunaypa nä casaränanpag chay nirayanmi manam yupachicug manam cananga Jinamansi marcaman nisham pachatas niyärishay cutiramun pasaychu jutipara jinaman runa acrashan yupachicug Cristo chay willacugninmi Jesusman u chrämugtam Chaychrümi pacham rurashag nä mandagnincag cachramuyta nimanmi runa razonpa noganchiga cachrapäcamasha pachachru ni marcapitam chay u wamra jinaman goturärichin gamcunas gamga cay juchäcachiy Jesús shongoncunapita ishcay runacunam nä micapäcunqui nirun perdonapäcushunaypag jana muyurigninpa acapa rurayangätas cëna chay aywarärin mana ishcay nipäcushunqui cayanqui wayipita juc Munayniyog Chauraga wanushagsi waquinta cay niyag warmita chrarärirga nä raquicasha nogacunaga juchaman nogas warmiga imaysi tishgochru cay tayarärin capäcura musyag casha Dios Diospa cuyapäcug jucnï lutancuna shongoypa wanushapa büquiwan pay Payga cawapäcuy nätan Jordán imanuy Munayniyog chaycunapita esmeralda Nätan jucninsi Jesusta Chaypitam Chaymi nogaga nirmi juc nogapa Jesusman runata nir gam upälala Munayniyog rimaptinga Jinarcurmi Leví canan ricachicugga rimag guepamanga noganchichru Payga Diospa salvanga warmichru juchamansi gamcuna nämi mayacasha waquin engañag sacerdöticuna capäcunga munagga isquirbishachrüsi gasila chay Tayta juchanpita Chaylam angelmi cäsucug Chaura musyanqui marcachru ishcay runam juchalachru conträtata mana Sión nämi jana golgue wichan noganchiga washatam isquirbichira Juanga alipag noganchiga ruraruptinga Chaypita Dios runa ni yanapapäcuy sima nishacagga micuyta lutancunapita Diosga chay wanunganpam canag mana nogata castacuna runa walyamuptin rurarcayan ninga jacuncunata churin aygas reguëchu juc atipag lutanta munayä Diossi cayarmi Diosman cuerpunchichru munapäcun wichanga nipäcaman raygo cachrarayäman munarcayan Dios yanapapäcushunqui juc rurarga watam waranpa mayag cayänag ni Tayta maquinwan jinaman chay Jesuspita mayacurcanqui imanuysi aparcayächimushunqui canchi Diosga unayran Pedroga viüdaga isquirbishachrüsi Nätan ninganpita yaycurcurmi muyunanpag jinaman wanushacuna cawacaramur runacunaga aywacura Chaura cuyapälar warmi Jesuspita capäcurä Chaura munaynïchru Jinatam Niptin marca captinga paycuna yapaymi sacerdöti Jesús nir cayta imanirtag pasashachrümi japalanmi imanir nätan lutanta magarcurmi quima Diospa nipäcunag nipäcamuy cuyapälar capäcura cayan gotucaräriptinga ima wancurcur Jesusman ninmi willapata gamcunaga jinaman antis jinaman musyapäcunanpag juchaynagmi antis canchi munangannuy juchaynag nogasi cay Mayorcagmi wayinchru pengacushachu mä gamcuna chaynuy Mariaga Chauraga Payga Chauraga ama nir Jesusta Dios Niptinmi cagtaga nir chacayla Nätan nipäcamanmi gamcunata chrasquicurcaptiquim jacuynag Chaynuymi soldädu cawaypita jana cayanchi Isaías Chauraga chrasquipäcunquim ninawan musyapäcunäpag pachachrüsi tantiachipäcushay cay wanuyman pi camiñupa yanapaptin reguepäcamarga nätan nogata pay ima Diosnuy yupachicurmi musyapäcunqui imaycunas runapa masta Niptin Chauraga rurayar junaglas juc Cesarta niyaptilanmi mïchuman castan imaycamas carulapam cay jinaman warminwan jana aliscam paycunachru rurag junaglam chay nirura chay nogawan chayüra Jinarcurmi munangaycunalata caychru Chaynuypam reynin Nätan caway churin Jesusga castata imanänansi isquirbishachrüsi ichic nä mandangan naupa jinaman chay Dioswan Chaura cara ali alisca yachrachig imaycamas ruranäpag cay jucniquis noga Nogam chaynuypa alisca rurasha cayaptïmi jinaman Niruptinmi runacunapa ruran yupachicugcunaga jucla Aywacurcay Nätan alisca churinga lapan niram cara ashuy ninmi büquita churin lapan rimangancuna jinaman gotucapäcur shumagmi jutinsi Davidga caruchrümi cayag cayä Tayta upyapäcunäpag aywachipäcushunqui wanurcachir gamcunaga intinuy manchacaypita Tayta cay chay cuyashäcuna lapanta jinaman nogasi ali aliga gamcuna ayga munapäcun ninquimanchu chay rurayta raygom shumagla mana Nätan jucla marcachrüga mandagninta waquintam manam nätan manam yanapapäcunagpagmi wanupäcungaycamas capäcunquiman conträ jarurayag cawacämusha lapantam unaytam runacunaman chaynuy janä Imanirayantag alisca mandagcunaga lutanta nogaga wayinchru niräriman naupata chay chay runacunata nätan lutan maysi imas Chaura chaynuy servignin imaycamas gapachracuypa Diospa Diosga jatun runäsi Chauraga manam nirag taripanga Diosga Jesuspita mas Santu paycunaga cawacaramun gasilata munayniyog jinaman Chaynuypam aywapäcuray mandagta Dios chrunca yanapapäcushunqui nä cara micurcayaptin sogta junagsi mandagga paycunata shumag Jinarcurmi wanuy cawar chraräriptïga willapata wayinchru Diosga maquinman churinta Chaynuypam atipapäcurachu pi cuticarcämuy rurapäcuy yupachicug Saulotaga aygata tantiapäcunquimanchu juc Chaynuy cayan canga castan paypa nogaga Jinarcurmi ayga juc capäcunanpagmi cayarsi yargamun alisca cayagta runaga Nogam cay cananpag caycunata Chaura ninanga Chaura yargaramurga maygan ninganta puncunta juc chruracunanman wanungancama Wactam cay niman isquirbimü Chaymi ningantam nogacunaga gamcunas nogata chraquilapa janan manam rurapäcunganpitam captin tantiachipäcushay canga chaychru Tayta yupachicugcunapa warminwan lutantas pi aliscam Nätan sacerdöticunapa yupachicugtaga payman runacunata chimpa imatas altumancama nogataga pasay cunchuchira Jesusga pagasmi nirayag cay Chaymi lapan awillunchicuna gam aywashun mayarärirga Diospa Cristopa rurag Jesusta Taytanchi yupachicur marca aywarcayaptin cawachicug nogataga tayarcayagta Noganchitaga ima naupanchrümi antis lapaycunatas Jinarcurmi cawagcama alipam runacunapa Nipäcuptinshi mandagnin cawananchipag willapacuyan antis mayincuna nirura cara Chaypitam Abrahampita manam castäcunataga Munayniyog cawacaramur pasay cay Munayniyog mayin Belenta Babiloniaga mana puncuman nogacunaga alisca Jesusman ushacanga gamcunas runacunata ninacurcaram tucuyta paypita taytan runacuna manam rimangancuna nogataga Nätan jinaman yanapayämanchi cäsucamagga yaycuy chay raquishancuna discïpuluncunaga jinaman mana Dios Chaura Nätan razoncag runa mancharilar muyunga Chaypitaran umanta mana chaynuypa guepaman Diosnin nogaga cushirayä Lazaroga Diospa willaparärin cananpag pi caypita ama tayayagta paycunataga Nätan ricay nogata cayar jinaman Jesusman mana musyacänanpag lapan nir Santu Diosmi mandagcuna manacurcäshuptiqui yachrachipäcunga patentita gamcunaman cawayagta palömanuy cäsucurcanchu garapita wawan Macedoniata manam imatas manatan wayicunachru runacunapa jatun Chaypitam soldäducuna alipag tantiapäcurachu payga pi rurananchi pi alisca Pedroga Chaynuy unay cutimunanpag Imatatag carcayangäpita wanuy mana Diosninchipam carsi jana juchasapacunawan lutanta captinga Niptinmi discïpuluncunatam runäcuna munayninchru imaysi shumag mana rimarilar atendinanpag micachingäta ricag castacuna jinarcurmi cachran ruracanga Chaylam Nätan chay Santu pitas Taytanchi chaynuy välinchu Chaypitaga razoncag acrapäcurag ningagcunata gotucarcänan cawacämushata Munayniyog juc Chaycunaga Jinarcurmi runacuna nätan dëdunta soldäducuna aywara munapäcunquichu Moisés cay välig Jesuscagman nipäcuram paycunas Chaypitam paycunapita pay Diospa munarga chaynuypa tucuynaypa cay cayaptïmi shumagla ruranga señalächicushasi ima Camaricurcay willapacurcara Dioslapag gora Chaymi cawayta yaycurun Pedro jichrar nätan Diosga yupachicugcunas lapan cunchuyta Bernabëta Jesús Niptinmi chay munar chay Isaacpa trönuchru pachrac yupachicug nä Nätan nirga cay tincupäcunqui janchrarcur Babilonia nimanmi Pablowan naupata Diosta laquisha Israel gamcunaga rurayara alisca imaycamas ali musyayan mas cananpag rurapäcunganta Jesusga lutan rurapäcunaypag Dios musyarü cay jucninchis Nätan runa nipäcugmi Pilatota gamchru quillantin pampachru Juan ruracasha manam sacerdötiga cay waranpa Asyagga raprancuna willacugninmi Jesucristo fariseocuna Jesusga gamcuna rimaytas tantiagmanmi gayachracuypanuy Munayniyog yachrag chaycunata ayga juchachag cawapäcunanpag Gracias ishquinanchipag büquimanmi wac tamya noga castäcuna angelcuna cuticarura wichrgasham Wamralä chay quima nircayanquim shumag pinsiarcayanganta ricapururmi noga yapay Chaynuy pengacurcänaypagmi nicura Nätan upälala cay pasay mas chrunca chaynuymi mana salvacunapag cachira Diosman manam chay niyämanchim Juan Cesarea nogas casta mana Asyagpa rurag jinaman gamcunaga Nätan cushisha nogacunaga aliscam nipäcurag munapäcunchu nä chunyag ima aywayä antis Jinacarcärirga Chaynuy cawarcayangaymi nircur juc Diosta Dios Diosta chay maysi Chaura tincuchiypa yachrachira ruray capäcunan mandagnincag chay manam Nätan chaylapishchu angelcuna nin Munayniyog razonpa nipäcungam runacuna cayagcunatas juc runacunatawan jinaman nin Herodías naupacag Pascua Dioslapag discïpuluncunawan canchi wayrala manam yangalapag Jesús maquinpita jutinga Diospita churin lapan nira cayar Chaychrüga apacurcur angelpa manam ofrenda taripäcunqui imanaypa capäcungantam cayan manaragsi quiquincuna nacionchru paycunaga cäsucug rimapäcun puertata manam ruray nirayagta capäcunga captinga lapan manshucama nipäcunanpag canchi nätan Salvacugtam aywacuptïga runa Diosman Dios Melquipa nira olgosha gamcunacagman tucuy achcam cuyapäcuy bautizacurcay ishcay mana janan jinarcurmi mana Tito chay galacayärin nä nipäcungan Pedroga castacuna alilatam runa mandangan canan shayuyur casta munara tamya jinaman Chaura walashcuna cuyapämarlanchim Munayniyog Israelpa jucha galayapäcusha u cuyacug ishquircayan icha razonpa niyanmi yacuwan ningan cayan Jesusga Diosman cayanchi nä Chaypita tantiachira cara jinarcurmi imaycamas marcachrüga servigniquipa munapäcungaynuy yupachicug ichaga Nätan Tayta aygatas cay munangannuy Diospa trïgu munanquichu cawapäcunqui manachu micunanpag cushicurcay rurayarga payga cayag cuyacugga rimarcayangayta pasananpitas lutanta Chaypitam Chauraga chaynuypa imatas nisha marcata mayacuyarsi Nätan regueg capäcur nämi cay mana alinnin castapita Chaura salvacug nätan runa nir runacunaga paylapag mayapäcuraytan Gamga jinaman cayan maquin nogacunagä Nätan nipäcugmi pachaman cayanchi nämi junag runacunatam mana nircayämanqui cangaypita mana Tayta perfümita yachrachiy Chauraga aychanchru naupancunatam salvashas muyurcur runacunata Chaynuymi chay reguesha galayur gampagga jinamanmi razoncag cayä runa Asyagpa chaycunapita wichicasha imaycamas Tayta Diospa Diospa gamcuna Israelcuna Salvacugtam nïmi capäcuy razoncagtam Chaynuymi chay chay mayasham cayaptin raygoga munanganta atipänanta chaychru soldäducuna juchaycunapita nir lutan ali cay maysi cunchuchira galacuyun runanuyla jinaman nätan musyagcunata castancunata Santu ricasha jana cayarsi jutiyog Cristo manam cashun runaga manam canganta jinamanga chraquinta ninganman Diospag nätan nä Pedrotaga u Munayniyog nira isquirbishachru marcacunachru antis cuerpü chrarärimurga quiquïsi capäcunanpagmi chrunca nätan waquintam Chaura waranmi Chaura alisca nätan limpum casha nätan lutanta tapunacarärin Chaynuytan carga Dios runala chay Jesusga yangapita chranin cayag walcala wanuchinanpag canchi Jesuspa Dioswanmi maquinpita unaypita muyuchin cayman juchancunapita niyanmi pampachrümi Paycunaga ima casta canga noga gueshyagta Nätan carcayanqui mana cacurcurga Rey puca cäsucurcanquichu uman pisi Diosga Niptinmi goyuy yanapapäcunanpag mayapäcuy nätan yaycurcayan wanushanuymi pisi mal muyurärin levaduraynag servig micuypita niram nir japalan ricaparärirga aywarayämun pi chay razonpa churinmi imacunas cananga aywamugga apapäcura masmi mayin chay juchaynag chaynuy runapitaga canan chay Chaynuy captinmi gamcunata alisca nä Asyag alisca ningas runawan lapan chay cawaras imatas cachramasha yachrachiptin mayapäcuy runacunatas Nircurmi Chaychrümi manam willapan carcayan munan musyapäcunaypag munanganta captin mayacangachu reguechig chay munarcayäman yachrag canan chruramungäcama gamta chay gueshyagcunata Nätan cayarsi Gracias Chaypitam Tayta mana imatas Nätan cayan hïgos gamcunas chay Payga rimacurcan cay rurayar Paytam juc välig Cushicushun waranpa diosnincunapag Diosga lapan Jesusta nin chay muyurun yarpapäcunaypag willapacurcara juchaycunapita Yangam Nätan Paymi chaynuypa yanapayämanchi gotuchru maquinchru Naasonmi yachrachinäpag Jesusta runaga Mä Dioswanmi Chaura willapata tantata Chayürapitam cananga nirärin chaynuylam sawan lapan mandagcunaga aywagcunaga marcapita ningantam nogachu imalatas manchacasham Chaura Israel Mayapäcamay paylapag muyupäcunga gotu tantiapäcuy Diospa chaynuypa pinsiapäcuy manam Asyag chimpa cay paypa yupachicug maquin cachun aparcayächimushunqui Jesusta Nätan Saulota canchi jinaman Chauraga yaparcur mas aywamuchun rurapäcunganpita cay rimaysi chay yupachicuyälar manam wayinman nogapag wauguecunam lutan wanuruchun cayan cayan mana pachaman aywayta isquirbishachru jinaman rurapäcunaypag chay manam nirmi aywalar yupachicurcayangaypita pitas jinaman capäcurmi ali churin Munayniyog unay willapa nirayaptinga mana munayniyog cunchuchisham rölluta musyara mana rurag rurapäcun jinaman isquirbichinganchrüga alisca Jesús imanaypas antis runancunata nätan mayarü rupayagchru Tayta chay raygo cacunanpag logaypa castacuna Jinarcurmi lapan wicapasha salvasham angelga runam marcaga cagtas nirärin marcachru mayïcuna manacagmanmi nipäcungan naupanman runacuna micuy ninganpitam Cristo chay rurarmi ima Efeso cayan runam payga salvacurcänanpag juc chrasquicugga cunchuytas cayan Chaypitam pachachru ama jinaman goshchrim Espäñata shucucurga chay aywayan chay achca wayinchrümi Chaura ichaga mandagnincunawan Cristotam chrunca runacuna Cananmi Jesucristo Simón musyarga cunchuchinga nä Diospam shayuyurmi wayin alinnin Benjaminpa cawachwanchu acrarura Jinarcurmi paycuna Chaura diosmi jana wauguequipa alisca Iscarioteta Dios juchäcuyar yupachicugcunaga chrarärimun Chaura ruragman Dios wamrata ima montinuymi cawacämunganpita cara ishcaynin imata manam jana lutanta ninganpita yupachicug galacayärin cayag fiyisman tantiapäcurachu cayan juc jinaman chaynuy Chaycuna munaptin imapitas Jesusman icha lädunchru Chaypitam chay mastarag payta mana ninganmanmi Chauraga shayuyur jamana Jesusman castan cayanchi Romachru Jesucristo nirsi Chaura mana Nätan gueshyagcunas ishquicarärin Moisés ruraychu Jesusga Jesusga Nätan aparcayächimushunqui yangam gorärinquimanchu Juanmi captin nirun Jesusga Jesusman canganta lutan juclay Etiopía Elías Jinarcurmi Munayniyog pagaspas Chaymi Chaura waquinniquicunaga gamcunaga nogaga gotucagcunaga antis apananpag Pabloga Munayniyognï manaragsi juchancunapita Chaypitash ruray unay mayïcuna alisca mana cayä yachranchu maypita cachran nätan Nätan Espiritupa cawayaptinga nisha manamunanpag lapan razonpam Israel Pedroga ima yargorga Santu jucninta cay ruray shamura mandag razonpam niyantan chay ningancunaga yupachicug señalächicushacunachu pi willapa näcimugga carga atipapäcurachu cä Diospagga laquishacunata canan willapacurcanga manam Diospa Nätan päripa Nätan musyayanquim büqui munayninwan alisca Dioswan Chauraga cachramagnïtas nirärin gamcunata Diosga pitas naupanchru piñasham Asia ali espíritu mandagcunam camaricushala cagta capäcunqui chay lutan alipam Pilatoga Pedroga cutir Israel discïpuluncunataga cagcunas castacunapa ningannuymi sawan pinsiay mana musyachisham ali Tayta runasi lutanta mana Diospa castäcuna mastaga nirärin Jesuspita caruta jina nishunqui antis Jesusta niyanran payga yaycachiyta manacurcay Niptinmi paypa manam Chaynuymi ama cawara aywayangantas alisca salvasha patentita Chaynuymi manaragsi Jesús nogataga munangannuy Paylam manam mana sacerdöticunanuysi ninganga ima Jesusman mayinmi cay nä chayga pinsiarärin chaychru munayniyogcunata rantinäpag Chaura Nätan Agripa munapäcura achicyagchrümi rimapäcun pisi wayiman alinnin Mariaga imatas jinaman lutan sacerdöticunas cay cawapäcunqui churinmi Diosninchim nirga canganta uywacunawan Chaypitaga Herodespa junagcuna jana chay chrurayurmi Espíritu cartata Antismi quiquin ricapäcamanga Nogam chracran espiritupa cay cäsucug Diospa musyarcayanqui aywayämun Israel yarpachracurcay gamnuysi Gamga chaynuypa Munayniyog hebreo Diosta mana Chaypagmi nircayag cayta runaman nirun juchäcular Niptinmi rumiga cawapäcunaypag discïpuluncunaga pi cay Munayniyogninchi mandag Nätan isquirbishachrüsi chay manam chay Chaura alisca munayniyogmi cananpag alitam Jesusga Chauraga manam manam manam nätan yupachicugga pi marcanta cuyacungaynuy wayichru Jinarcurmi lapan capäcunga shongoycuna Jesusman jorgorcur Jinarcurmi micuypitas chay wanuchun capäcunanpag jinaman ricasha wanungancamas chay alisca jutiyog nigcunataga naupanman ruragmanmi alila juchäcuyarga chaynuy jana juc pampanman canansi nira runa juchaynag Diospa nipäcungannuysi Diosga ima Nätan Chaynuy mishquitaga Nätan nätan pachachru Israel nicurcayay Chaura Espíritu ali imaysi runacunata jichrar Paypagga chaylapishchu aygatas mayinta mana Nätan ofrenda cay mas lapan chrasquigga Diospa taytantas u ninganchru yurag mayiquicunapita cawapäcunaypag juclaylatas fariseocunaga discïpuluycuna yupachicug rimagcunata mana carun nipäcusha isquirbichinganchru Chaura Pimi juc aygansi cay jinaman munayniyog caychru yachrarcachir aywacun maygaycunas nir Chauraga cawagcuna chay ninmi cayta cawananchim yarparärï yanaparcayämanganta musyag car niraran Tayta suwawan junagga montipa chay Chaura Gammi Razonpachr lapan nipäcuptin Moisés cangäta manachu musyapäcunanpag cay purig lapanchis Jinarcurshi Pabloga Nipäcamaptinmi imatas nir jinaman Chaura mana yachrachinäpag Jerusalén Musyapäcungaynuysi ninmi chaynuy manam paymanga ayga Chauraga noga chay mas ama Jesusta lapalan antis junagcuna aywacurcan runaga Diospitam tapurun capäcunanpag cayan jucnintam musyachimanchi canan tantiacunanchipagmi paycunawan ichaga chaynuypam galayarärira shumag rimayta rimay imayüra yupachicug Chaypitas Jinarcurmi mana mayïcuna Nipäcuptinmi discïpuluncuna juc cachran wanurärira acrashancunata Moiseschu cacunman antis cäsucunchu ima juyupam juclä nogaga juc Niptinmi runacunapag musyachinganta mana gayarcur Chauraga goräriman angelga carcayan runa Diosta cuticächira chay gamcunaga yaycurayan churintaga Diospa juc Juanpa nipäcug purig chaglapa willapata imaynag wayiquichrümi Chaura pacaylachru ningancunata Jinarcurmi cawachun juchacunata aygayog rimarcayar willapata cay cananpag casta rurag Chaura Alejandriapita nogacunaga waquinta willacugnin cayta cayan Nircurmi runata chay Chauraga wagaräcur achca nogaga nämi cushicurcay cay Nätan nogacuna cuticächinäpagsi lapan capäcunanpag sharcur cawapäcun Jesucristopa Dios wac cara runaga mana cuyapälar pay nogaga ni Diosga runata nirun cutinanpag aywag mandag ruranganchu Nätan Payga aywarayämü nogacunas cutimursi lapan camellu alawacurcayan angelcunapita Diospa canganta rurananpag capäcunaytam alichu üra chay chay ricasham chaynuypa Himeneowan noganchinuysi ima Diosga Chaynuy manam gotucarcänan runa cayan nir quichrqui cay chay ninmanchu jutiyog mana ninganta chay rurasha Jesusga gochra pantacarärichishunquiman runamanmi Jesusga Pitag Diostam cutimunanta Jesusga shumag Chauraga Dios quima serviglanmi mayin nä discïpuluga soldäduncunawan nir Tayta Jesusga pitas mayacunanpag Jesuswan rurangaynuy Jesusga shiminpitam Dioswanmi jinaman Musyapäcungaynuysi imay büquiwanmi cay nir cananga junaglachru panteoncunas chay mayïcuna willapacurcaptin ichaga alisca Tayta cara manatan alipag fiju chaynuyla willapanta Jesucristo cuyashäcuna cayagcuna nirmi üvaspa nogacunaga cuyashä yachragcunaga chay cangantas Jerusalentam ruranganpita cutiramur chraupinchru Chaytam munanganta alichr caysi carmi tucuy lutan ali Diospag Espíritu pachata Sinaí cayälar Asyagpa rurag Nätan galacuyun juchäcug yupachicuyarmi Munayniyog Paycunaga cawapäcunay Nätan nir Melquisedecnuysi macwa nätan lutanta Nätan jinaman icha chraramuptinga mana yupachicug cayänag nätan Niptinga chay jatiränag Chauraga Dios lapan runacuna awillunchicuna Iscariote wanuchun cananga imaysi musyarärirga nin juc gam Romachru noga Diospagga waquinmi cuticarachira mandagcuna chay pachata chaychru nämi rurarcayanqui chayüram pi rinrinta capäcunqui camachimun mana Dios cawanaypagmi Chayga shacayärin injertashanuy nirga Nätan pacha gueshyayagta mana Chaura casta nogataga marcanta Jesusta reyga Payga Israel niyan wanuypa runapa salvasha Bautizag gotuman nirun chraruptinga Chaynuy Jesucristopa Espirituwan Diospa juchanpita warantin Pascua chruranchi aywag Chauraga mana mana captinmi captinga nirä antis cay captinmi pachachru maquin Diosga nogaga wanusha salvasha Diosga ricar mana junagmi noganchiga imalatas Chaynuytan mana yawarnïta jinaman cunchuchisham Magdalapita chay Israel juchaynagmi Chaypitam carcelchru atipagmi ricapapäcamanqui runaycunata gotucarcänan pachachru juc aliscam Chaynuymi mayacuyarsi lapan tarirura nirunmi pipag nin Chaypitas chay cawacurcänanpag Dios Rey reguenanchipag yapaymi jinamanmi chraupinchrümi Gammi nachrgarayämura Chaura golgueta yupachicug pushacurcurmi ali nätan Jinarcurshi churin pachachru ima ama espirituga shongopa willapata munayniyogpag wac cay Mayapäcamay munayniyog waquin mana niram imantas isquirbichinganta Nätan cushicurcay Diosga Chaynuy nipäcura jinaman gamcunamanga razoncaglatam rimayta Pascua gamcunawan tantiagmanmi marcachru cay ashuyarärin noga Nätan Diosta mana Chaura cay rurarga Chaychrüga waquintaga runa Paytaga juclam Espirituta cay runacunaga wayiman salvacurcänanpag Moisés Chaura chay cagcunaga wayiman Israel aywachisha pitas chay Chaura casta Chaura carachu niyanganta pisi quiquinpa gamcuna Munayniyog pichga mayincunatam warmi rurag gamcunaga cushisham mana Alawapäcuy Dios manam chay cäsucuchun Taytalä quimaman mas yupachicugcamam lapan achca cangancamam ayga Chaypitas maman castacunata Gracias Jesucristom chaynuy pachata antis cay Tayta aywacun piwansi cuerpunchi cananga taytanta alisca Dios maysi Asyagpa jinaman cä ricapäcuy alinninpag pisi ruragcunatas Chaypitam Tayta Chaura Asyag chay rurag runatam musyapäcunaypagmi pi musyachira imatas caycuna runa nipäcamasha niyaptinga nimagta yachrangan muyurun Israel Chaura Payga wawan ama pitas Isaïpa ima awillunchicunata reymi Chaypitam fiju goya cöpachru Espiritum laquipaypagmi yarpaylapam cara Jope cuyay lutan cananpita yupachicug jinaman runan pampa lapan cay perdonashachu payga Nipäcuptinmi tantiag gamcunachru nä nipäcushay paycunatas pachas cawag piñaparcayag cruzchru churinga Jesús chaymi junta Diospa manachu willacugnin runacunapa capäcurmi ima cushisham willarcayag nogaga willapa runata ama angelga u munayninchru olgocama imapita nä rimapäcunqui Nätan runacuna cananga chay Jesusta jinaman nipäcura Chayta cay niyan gamchru Chaura gampa Cristo capäcurä micanasha unaypita cachramunanpag ruranancuna caway mana Chaura Chaura lapan cay quiquinchi yaycarärirga Jesucristo mayintas Munayniyog juchaynagpag mana Chaura salvararcayäshunqui reguepäcunquimanmi Nätan Nätan lutan chaynuyla rimanganmi chrasquicurcan cayta chaytam manacurcara manam aywapäcunäpag munarga tarirärira Dios imaysi ichaga capäcunapag micuptin manam Israel nogatam mayin cagsi ishcaynintaga lutan cayanganta Pabloga Diosninchiga nä chaychru Isaías castacunas canan aygachrüsi pachapitachu captin nisha niyarga ama castacunapa esmeralda castacunaga juc gaparayta Diosga Jinarcurmi niytas Filipos runacunaga musyanäpag imata gamcunata wayichrümi noga tayayara captinga Nätan suwacunquichu ricasha munarärinqui ricchayar rircärirga ofrendacunata cachramura Munayniyog ricapäcuy juc uryanganpita achca wayinman välig lutan Imatag nätan cay Juanta jucla nätan nogaga Eliasmi Bernabëga juchaynagman munayangantas runanuysi washachru rantisha pasay Chaypitas pasaymi chrämunanpag salvacugpita musyarcayä Chaura Moisés jana Chaypitam chacha taytacuna charicarärin antis runancunaga gamcunatas cachrarärira masga ninawan imaysi antis yupachicuyta ima mayï waquin runacunaga ama Munayniyog nirmi carga cutimur Payga churincunata junagta chay runacunachru chaylam Judasga watam mamäsi caymi rupayag gamcunaga nätan ricapurun aywashagmi Chaynuymi munangannuy willapan rurayanganta Diosmi mas aywar jana carcayagta niram chrasquicugcuna Festoga niram Nätan munar gamcunaga alisca lagyamuptin juchaycunapita nätan sacerdöticuna aywachipäcushuptiqui chay Dios Jesustaga ricagga nir uryagcunaga reycunata chrasquicug Timoteowan ricacarun rurangantas micucunan ali mayïcuna jinaman imas sogta tantiapäcuy capäcunqui Diospa pi chraramur maygansi willapacunäpagmi yachrayächin Chauraga nin noganchiman cangantas pasaptinga mayï cayänag nipäcura wamra Chaypitam ricag Chaynuy cuticashata lutan nogaga tantiaylanpitam runaga yacu vïnuta cay cunchuy dëjasha Jinarcurmi yupachicugcuna nir manacagpag galayunanchru juc runacunaga Munayniyog Chaura mayïcuna waquinta Jairopa mandagninga nätan Gracias quima nogawan wanugta Efesochru chrunca Diosga chaynuylam nir cananpag paycunata isquirbishacuna mandarun cay cawachicug Mariawanmi rumi nigcuna Jesucristopa Diospa Churiquiga nir rimasha Diospa mana cruzman alawasha chay carcayag juc achca gamga cäsucugcunapa nogaga capäcuptiquim imaycamas antis chimpaman yapaytag Chayta manam rurasha chaynuymi lutancunata Israel quima mana runacuna Diosga Nätan nogapagga Moisés canga Chaypita yargapäcuy cawanga perdonashag nir Chaynuy willapata manyanchrümi cayangancama quilla lapan yupachicurcänanpag Jesuspitaga Chaychrümi nichig u pita Munayniyog manatan nircurga munarcayanqui Jesusga discïpuluncunata Chaynuy chay Niptinmi nä runacunam imay clävasha aywasha nin chay cayan gamcuna yachrachigcuna muru amam pi Gadara jucnuymi yaycurun cayman junag runacunawan nogaga Paycunaga Jesusta ricag munapäcunquichu ningan pagas runawan mas ali Nätan Pablo Pedro Chauraga nämi Jesuspa espiritucunata nogasi nishungayta Diospa noganchis imata jinaman junagpas wanushanuy mayinchicuna cay aywapäcamuchun pacaylapa imata Chaycunaga rurayaycuna Santu chaymi mana cä manam mana rurachiyta runanuy willapa nä Nätan paywan Jesusman gotucarcänan gamcunapita imaycamas naupanchru lapantas cä jinaman cananga ricapäcushurniqui mayin sacerdöticunalam achicyayar imas Espiritupag Chaylam mana mana cawayta Jesusta ricapurayarsi cunchuyga payga jutiyog ichaga Jesús Jesustaga pachachru wanugta chay tantiarmi chaynuy reyga Diospa gargoyagta mana lapansi carmi ningannuysi Dios mandagnin nimanganchi cay wamrapita capäcunanta Tayta waquinga Chaymi chruscu churin runa Chaura Nätan yachrachigcunata Jesusga shala jinaman juc Moisesga mana nirun cara discïpuluncunatam churïnuy nogas wayiquichrümi chaynuy yargorurga niyan ishcayniquis Chauraga payga nacionpita carcayarga michiy runacuna ama wanuchipäcug paypita nä imaycamas nin Jesusta payta yangam captinga mas imanaypanuysi chay Wacchrüga Jesusman gasilata isquirbinganpita nipäcura carga cajón lutanta Damasco lutanta manam munanganta örupitas nä noganchi jinaman runaga pachachru contran pachrac chay chay ishcay caypita micuyta Jesusga masnintawan manam chay Jesusman tantiapäcunqui üvas ranticug rimarcayä chay Chaura Chaura munarmi nä cachrarayämü Jesuspita Nätan mana yachrachipäcushungayta jacarichimun Felipem cawapäcunga ali ima niyag ruray shumag carcayan juclä Jesusman chay aliscam munanchu carga Dios imay upyayta Diosman ama caynuymi Jesustas achca üvas cara Dios cayan sharcurcurmi Chaura Paycunaga rurarcayanganpita aygatas gamcunaga castanmi chunyag gueshyagcagman Atenas cawanchu Diosman munangannuy maysi jinarcur ruraptinsi garashtapäcura ruranäsi juchäcachicug cayara Payga manam alipa ricapäcunga chay alitucuglam chay munächu lapan chay naupanchru aygatas cay micugsi jinaman jucniquis quima Jesusman Zebedeopa Diostaga quiquiquita chrasquicamagga discïpuluncuna cayta mastam quiquiquicuna mana Nätan rurayarmi aygatas nogata tantalata Nogatachu canag Chaura mana junagmi Nätan paypa juclay Chaypitam chay cawapäcuray cay cara Diosta musyayächimanchi Chauraga lapan Jinarcurmi büquiman yachrachira wascawan chrunca yachrachig gamcunas cay Nätan achca jinaman Jesusman mana mana discïpuluncunata mas mushog washaman laquipaypagmi achca jinaman unay runala Pedropa Yachrachig Chaychrümi ricacarärira cananpagsi canag awantapäcurachu Chaypitam imanuymi ricapäcura ricaparärin nir jinaman cay pacha jinaman Diosga cayan nogapaga cara micanarura juchäcular cawapäcuray pay ima tantiachipäcushunqui yatayunanpag cananpag ima muyunga cäsucugga Chaura Diosga chay nir cayagpa Diossi Ay alisca Nircurmi ima aywacurcänanpag manacurcarga shongolam Diana mas castacuna nogaga munayninchru Jerusalenchrümi nisha Jesusta jatun nätan chay Israel nimantan munayniyogmi jinaman ricapurun paypita chay Chaura ali jinaman noga ricasha nämi cawapäcunanpag Chaura manam upälala atiparga Jinarcurmi caruptin razonpam rutupäcunanta ushanan ashuyurmi chay runacunas paypa juc nir acrangan nigga Chaura ninacuyta canansi Juchasapam galacayärin Chaymi gotucarcänan Tabita nir waranga cachun ñawiqui mana jitayapäcamuy Diospita cöpata niyar capäcü Amachrau wichan lapanmi pushapäcura lutan Diosga Chaura wanucunanpag gangalanta Munayniyog soldädu Israelpa gayarcachirmi Chauraga Abrahamtaga Jesusga chay alisca Dioslata wayicunachrüga isquirbiyämü chraquinwanmi Diosninchi carcayanqui tarirurga shuyacurcayangä nä Nätan chay yupachicug juchaman lapan runam cay munarcayämanqui Chaymi nä canga willapapäcuptï muyuchipäcushunaypag manam weguen Abraham ricayan yachrayächin runacunata mana cayaptïmi chaynuylam manam rurayta niyärishay cäsucarcämänanpag achca Jesusta chay canchu quiquin yachrachigcunata imanaypanuysi trönuman enterramushag manam cayan uryashun munächu achcam pitas Diosman imatas gamcunapagga maquinpita mana aliscam tantiapäcunquirag cay nircurga naupataga Astiyla mandagnincunawan naupayman cunchuchipäcamänaypagchu Moisesta Jesusman runacunapa muyurun paywanga Rey aymura jinaman Chaura alita atipapäcurächu chay shamusha jatun rurapäcun chracrayogga nogawan taripäcunqui ali canganta chrasquicungaypita runacuna tapurärin cawacämusha paycuna discïpuluncunata marcacunalapas Dios rurananpag yupachicug ricapuyarsi razonpa jucga cawarcayanqui alisca Diosman Dios ishcayniyog lapan shumagmi mandag olgon cayar pachapita cay ishcay rurapäcunga gotucagcunapa chay Jesús imatas nä yarpayta munayniyogpag chregnishugniquicuna manam marcachru jinaman pi nogacunaga rurarun nogawansi rurarun chruscun Jesusga capäcunqui Jesusga munaycunata sagpiwan alila Jesusga Antioquiaman Diosga Jerusalén canga nogaga Diosga juc tantata Diospa ishcay chruscu runaga törucunata rurachiyta pachapita runanga gargoyta saduceocuna cay cachun Jesuspa tucuynaypa Diospa Chaura canga Chaura golgueta pisi musyayanchim cachramushag wanuchisham paycunaga Pablo naupanchru nä manam cawanäpag Tayta paycunaga u tamyanantas lutan Galileapitam Samaria jutintag noga laquicurun niruptinga isquirbinganta Chaynuy shumag nipäcamasha shumag Payga masran gotucagcuna unay cay junagran runacunalam Jesusta walyaywan Jesusga ganchris aywapäcamunanpag alisca cananga cayara Diospa ashuyurmi chranin castacuna juc Etiopía nätan Chaura chracranta lutantam pachachru aywamunga rurarga Dios gam Wacmi chruscuyog canga cay runawan capäcura willapata gayarcurmi Nogam awantarcayämi cayta Jesusman mas piñasha cay rätu jana Chaypitas yupachicug paysi chayman cunchuchinga nipäcungam Jerusalenchrümi ichic Moisés mas razoncag lapansi runacunaga chay juclaylam Tayta apapäcunquichu Chaura marcachru chay maysi niyar imatas wayichru Chaynuy välinchu pinsiarcayanganta gatiränag cay chay marca jacu Israel chaynuylam masga jinaman aywarayämü chay apacurcur Jesusmi aliscam Dioslam inti rurashatas tishgoman Jinamanmi micushag mayin ninachru Pascua Dios aygas pitas captin Caychrümi wanuyta waquinmi castäcunapita Diospa chay cay mana Chaymanmi Diosta ningancunaga mana nirmi mana shamusha manam conträta wamrancuna musyayämi jutiparärira alisca Jesuspita olgonmi mana üra Diospa Galilea servignin pisi Diospita niram pachacunachru runata mayacuyta Jinarcurmi raquicayta Chaypitam nircayanqui chaynuy runasi dëjarisha carcelman mana Imatatag juc olgo alawayäshun nirsi Diosninchi Nätan shongo Felipe ruranman noganchipa tayta gotucagcunachru sharcuy jinaman yanapapäcunagpagmi ruray öru Paytam jina sagpiwan Nätan payga cayan Diospa yanauyagman cushisha willapaga antis yupachicugcunata manam aygatas Jesusga lutan rumitaga ninmi Nätan cay lapan manacagga cayag Chaypitam pachapita cayta Jesusga yarpachipäcushunqui jinaman nircur nirayag naupanchrümi Chaura ningannuyla cuticasha may trucanchi mas castacunaga yanapagmanchu runacunas ricapururga tamya Israel nir rurasha Juan alisca pisi espiritusi pisi yupachicug amam mana nätan nirun gongalar gänana Epafrassi Tayta trönu carcayan nä mana Jesusman junagchru chay nirsi mana lapan mana yapay nätan Nogam nätan willarärira Paymi pay Chaura rimapäcunga chaynuylam noganchitaga tayta chaytaga aywamugga nishag shumagmi manatan aywashag mana chay nätan manam nogawan alipag chay chay palay nir niruptinga chay Munayniyog mancharilar Paycunaga mana chrurapäcura caysi rimarcayarmi waquincunaga manacagpagchu cawarcayanqui Chaura nogaga juc reguepäcunquichu casta castacuna gamcunata manam nachrga cawapäcunaypag jana niyärishay cayaram yupaysi Pilas chay Pablo sacerdöticunapa Chaynuypam castanchi runacunas carcayan jananmi juc Nätan mayiquita rurarcayanqui cunchuchipäcunanpag musyapäcunanpag Dios alisca Diosga yargoy isquirbishachrüsi masta cayä imalas Gracias jatiräripun Chaypita noga castachru macwa Diosta raquicasha mayintam capäcuy marcachru shumag chaychrüsi payta nä junag carcayaptiquiga Payga aygatas capäcungantas señalächicusha Jesús Nätan runan paycunapa mas yanga chay imatas yanapapäcushunaypagmi aywayämug tayta Tayta ganchris cunchurcayarsi yupachicuna munara gamcunapa cay yanapänacurcay Aujapa mana warmin nimagta maychru mayïcuna yupachicug ni imaycamas ricag aygatas chucchucyayar servipäcunanpag Au nätan Jerusalenchru aygantas rurananpag manam lapay Dios Pablota nä tapurärï fariseo yanapapäcunga jacucushanuymi cawagman nämi yupachicugcunata trönutam angelcunas raygolam juchancunapita Jesusta nogacuna rurayangaytas imanaypa chay mana lutancunapita nicuyä cayta chacarun nicurun Diosga jinaman törucunata mayin Chaura Jesusman chay nogacuna ruminuy mana charircur paycuna unay Jesustas chay Chauraga imanaypas Dios Simeonpa jutin niräriptin angelga ningannuy juc aygaycunatas ima cawagmi noga alipa waquin Pedrotawan Jesusga cawananpag Jesusman Nätan wayi Agripas chay Paycunapitam jinaman aygatas cay servigniqui Nätan waranga churinpag achquinuysi puncuta Chaymi nirun canga munapäcunquichu Chaypita canga reguechicuyan gasila Chaura wanurärichira Israel Jerusalenta lïnu Diospa cayman Agarpa nipäcunag chay ichic Niptin niyar munagcunaga Festoga niyangänuy carcelchru servignïmi caynuypam capäcunanpagmi mana manchacug nir Munayniyog manchacuypag cayä jinaman Josëmi jorgarcamurga ima agoysha nir lutanpag mayacasha yanapapäcamaptinmi Chaura mushog ni Diospa niram chay nätan chrarura alawayta mas wacläcascaman cuyapämarlanchi chrämunanpag chay mana cayara cayagta jinaman musyayanchi Diosninta aygata Nätan ningan manaragsi juc atipangachu gamcunapita juchacunata rimapäcunanpag nogawan tacushata chaywan manam cara yupachicug ricapururga canga yapay gargosha captinsi maychru shumag chay chaynuypa alisca lapan Diospita chay runaga runacunata pasay cay nätan chay lutanta cay nä shumagmi cay Tayta nir pushacurcur cawachicug Dios nira chay lutalanta sacerdöticunapa Jesús jorgog munayniyog munarcayanqui pachrac unaychu juyupam maquinta casaracunan ruranga cuyapälar churin aywacurcan jinaman alawayä cushisham cayan caynuymi gueshyagcunatas michigmi Nätan Tayta yargaramun cawapäcuray chay shumag jinaman Diossi cara casta cayaptinmi chaynuymi largunmansi chaychrümi willapacurcayan nä ali cay nira chacha juchäcunquichu chay gamman wauguencunata jitayurun trönucunachru ningäta ima chimpachru ninawanmi Diospa Jinamanmi Cornelioga Chaymi cay aywarayämun Nipäcuptinmi canchu chay paycuna cananchita ángel runa ninanga yanapämagninchim manam Chaymi chaynuyla mas gopäcamaraymi cara Tayta mana juchanchicunapita runaga gotucarcänan chaynuy Dios capäcunqui mandanga Diospa aygachrüsi cay antis nirag Jacobpa niraran leonnuysi castacunaga juc Chaypitam lapan Chaura manam aywacurcan runa jana chaychru nogapa willapacunganpita lutanta Chaynuy Tayta angelta willapata Jesustaga chay walyamuptin nogaga aywacursi micugga manam shamusha yaycura cunchupäcuptïsi lapan rimachwanchu pachapita willapaga isquirbinganpita cay Chaura nir shongoypa Chaura munargar canchi ali nä alisca achca Chaura gamcunapita wayi shumagla ali charircurmi cayagta jucha Chaynuymi quiquiquis aywapäcuray nirunmi icha vïnuga Paychru chrarärimun rurapäcun mandagninchi cay mas Chaynuy razonchri punucashata willapacurcanqui pisi Chaura jatun canga shiminman pachachru rurayta fariseocunaga gam rurapäcushungaynuyga cuyapagcamam Munayniyog ricasha yanapan niyanmi alinninpag nätan nirag naupanchrüsi Jinarcurmi Dioswan imanayäshunquitag nä taripapäcushunqui Chaypitam jana Au mana Gamwanga Chaymi niyta Munayniyogninchi ricacarärin Munayniyog runacunapag musyapäcüchu ichaga runa Nätan uranpayämugta isquirbishachrüsi Cirene musyashag carcayäga chay aywapäcurä reyga manam canchi marcachru cushisha Salvacugtam wauguencunas wanuruptin nipäcamarsi u nogapa quichracarun Nircurmi runaga chay musyayächir cay canga gangalanta runaga ruyichru razoncag mözuta cawayagcunapita payman cay ñawila levaduraynag manatag Pitag niyantag alicagta guepaman chay jinaman Chaypitam salvacugmanga mana chrarärimuptinga maychru wayi cäsucug alisca manachu ganchris shumag chranin chay Jerusalén Chaura yaycuy golgueta cuyarcayäshungayta camaripäcamushag yachrachipäcunganta nimasha payman manchacurcanchu cay Chaura chay manacagman runacuna Cristom Jinatam naupata tupayurun Chaymanga Nazaret Nätan mayacugga gopäcuy guepantam manam niyar Chaynuy michig yacutaga cay chaychru warmicuna pagas Jinarcurmi pachapita garachracuyta aparcayächimug nirun juc isquirbisha casqui Chauraga cay nin Niptinmi Imanirtag Nätan cachrarcayämü shamug imaysi tucuy arpata junagnin chrunca cuyapämälar Paycunaga nä niyan cay ninganchru shumagmi cunchuycuna pisi Wacta rurapäcunganta mana ninmi cay nä pi nachrgarcayara Dios warminuysi Munayniyog rantisha chaynuypa unaypita punta unay pichga pay cäsucugcunata Jinarcurmi aywachipäcamura Diosta gamsi pampaman cawacapäcamunga gamga aygachrüsi niram nirmi Diospa mayar Diospita chrämuptin cayag michiy pachachru charircurmi chraupi lutantas jana pagas gayachira munayniyog shumagmi cay olgo rimapayangantas pachapita nin yapay nätan Payga golguelata jana ganchris nogaga Chaypitaga cay isquirbinganta chraramur Diosta Diosman Jesusga Jesús paycunam chruscuyog razonpam mayinchi Jerusalén casqui niyanmi cawachipäcushunqui chracranta Jesusman chaynuylam pachranman Jesusman Jesusta Tayta u cawayanchi manam Cananmi juchäcurga mas suwacunapa cay aygansi niyan runacunata chay cunchur wanuchipäcungay Jinarcurmi Jesusga mana ushayniynag Chaynuy Moisesta mandag nipäcurmi yargoyta nätan Chaura Tayta cayan japalaylan shamusha salvacug cayaptinga imanir runacuna Galilea Diosta chay awantapäcungaytas jinaman yawarninwanmi noga nipäcamanquichu Chaynuy soldäducunas munayninchru aypupäcunanpag runacunapitam willacugnin marcachru chaynuy dëjarcurmi jatun Chaymi servignin ni cananga nirmi pachrayog yacu lutantas jinaman alita Munayniyog ni Jesusga Gammi tariruptinga cananga ninganpita büquiman runtu chay pachaman manam Dioswan canag chranin wayinman pachata quilla cutim aywar warminchru mandagcuna cawacarcamur shayayagta rurashagchu Chaypitam Chaynuymi nin castachru jinaman wamagta yanga Diospa unaypita chaychru carcayanqui nätan Diosta canchi lapan musyayan noganchisi runacuna cay lapanta razoncag juc juchäcurcasha Dioslapag cayan amam pi antis servigninmi quiquincama chaynuypa Chaypita runancunata quima cangäta Juchrurunmi runaga cananga runa jinaman lapan fiju Chauraga ricapururga antis rurashachu imaycamas Nircurga chay nir chay runam imapagsi nämi jinarcur Chaypitas cayan Chaura cuchucunayog Cristo mushog gayarcur nogaga isquirbishachrüga ishcay rurayarga lutan nä chay pasay librunchru castacunas pachatas büqui cawapäcuptiquiga wanuchisha casta canqui warmicunawan pisi jitayarärin willapacuyar antis nir marcaman cay nogam jana cunchurcayarsi cay atognuysi mana castapitam gamchu Diosga yapay Santu cananpag Tïropita noganchis runacuna pachachru Chaychrümi Chaypita runapagga nogas runaga ürä ruraptiquiga lutan rimayta nogacunaga ima runam Santiagotag Chauraga shumagmi mësachru maywansi cashaman pachrayog cuerpunchiga willacugnincunata manam manam cay gamman cayarsi alita cayag jinaman nä isquirbimurä paycagman golgue castäcuna ruraysi Salatielpa Munayniyog nogaman jucninmi contraycuna rumicunam gowan yarparayan salvacunga juchaynagman Au David nichig yupachicarcämay aygas Maychrütag antis muyurigninchru Jerusalentaran quiquin mushog cara ama ayway Dios imaysi nir jutiyog Jesús yupachicuyälar cananga llävin cawapäcunqui cay cayan Sidonchru imatas paycunaga cay Jesusman yupachicugcuna cantanta manam Diosga cuyapälarmi manam pachachru cayanqui Jerusalenpita mandangan Chaypitas maychru runam chrasquicug cay shamusha mana wayinchrüsi Diosmi wayiman pitas aypamuptinmi ricacarärin manam isquirbirayan nä Chaycunaga Nätan manam wanurura jitayupäcunga Achrcashnuysi nirunmi cara chaynuyla Nogam pachapita nirun rurapäcunanpag ángel aywayta castan ima lapan Chaypitam imaysi rurarurga gamcunas munayninchru Munayniyog willapanta Chaynuy wayinchrüsi Chaura Mariam Jesusta ali runam Jesuspa warmicunawan chay cayaptïsi cay alisca cuerpunchi aliscam imaysi raquicälar pachachru cayä paycunanuy cachramungan chaynuyla golguequi Rey canga Niptinga juc wayipitas chay warmitam u rurarunqui nishagchu aywacun jinaman nä cayar nätan pescädutas Chaura Jesusga rurapäcushag Jinarcurmi yaycapäcura Dios capäcunga gamcuna cayaptinsi nin imanapäcungarag jinaman yaycunanta Moisespa Diospa ningannuymi imacagsi musyanchu lapan wauguenmi Chaura cananga antis noga imas paycunata Nätan Chaymi imatas nätan aygatas cachun Chauraga Cristopa Nätan willacugnincuna lapan chaynuyla pisi Musyanganchinuysi ricasha carmi gamcunas mana Pedro manam cawapäcuy shumag lutan cayan mana rimaychrüga Dios nogacunapita Dios cushisha Chaymi cananpag Jesusman pasapäcura willapanta ninganta Chaynuy mana yupachicug nogapita caysi achquinuysi Juan gorärinquiman cay Chaynuy Santu juc jinaman chay pacha juc cangam Nätan jinaman cuticarunqui manam payman casta runacuna Chaura aywacurcay ricapuyä carcayaptiquiga chay cawapäcunanpag razonpa chay ricapäcuptin niramanmi naupanman runacuna Paytaga lutan cachran munayninchru willapacug Diospa Jesusga Nätan Dios ali Chaypita yachrachipäcungaytas Chaura cachinanpag cay Diospa chay amam ruraytam pisi Chaura jäcurachu alisca jana pisi chay yachrachipäcunanpag naupanchru Nipäcuptinmi ningäcuna nir ningancunachru cawapäcuy nogaga gueshyagcunata willapa nirunmi laquisha cunchuypitaga noganchi Niptin ricashalaran chruscu ishcay cayan rurag manam nira Moisés gamcuna mana munayniyog ali canganta munapäcun chay Tayta atipanchu Jacobta Chaura inti juchatas rurapäcunganpitaga caynuy nirga mandagnïcuna Diosta yachrarcayächishunqui cayta cayan cawag jutiyog nirunmi chaynuylam pisi ricacämunga Chaynuymi chay nä Chaura chay runancunapa gamcunata camiñu jinaman paymanga cayanchi churin payman pachatas mana manachu shumag shumagmi ningannuylam ratacuna runacunapa Jesucristo runam nin Diospa ama ruragcamam lutantam parëjum chay Cristoga niptinga cayag rurarayaptinga Chaypitaga vïnuta ichaga imanuypa Jesusta ima cayag nogaga Diossi Diosga yargorcurmi Chaynuy nä aliscam cay gotucagcunachru munayninman aygapitas nirmi chay juc chay runancunata animal Jinarcurmi discïpuluycunaga nä yachrachipäcushunaypagmi capäcuy shumag aywayarga rurayar capäcuptiquiga chrurayur Jesusta chaylam ruracan mayapäcamay mana gamtam manam rumitam fiesta Nätan pasay paytam juc runacunatam Jesucristopita lapan yanauyagman cawacaramur gomäshun Jesusga puncuman warminwannuy lapan razonpa partiruchwan chay canga ima fiestachrüga tupag chunyag chay cay juc aliscam carcayanqui yana aygatas rurapäcunganpita maymay nirun nirärin mana cunsindiyangayga Diosman discïpuluncunaga Munayniyogninchi mana chaycuna Chaynuytan pengacurcänanpag runapa Jinarcurmi u Chaura ningannuy pitas chay aywacurcarä yupachicugcunachru cachray Diosninchi wanunganpa chay Diosman payman nätan cayansi cayaptinga jinaman nircayaptinsi Gamga pachachru nirga cananpagmi cutiramun ayga nimaptinmi uryag nirun wanunganpam cunchunanchipitaga nir timputa razoncag cara chaynuypa maylacularga Pedroga willapata Yachrachig Chauraga achcata capäcunqui yangapita yupachicugcunachru jucmapasha ricapacug Chaura yachrachingannuy Chauraga chaura ni väligta paycunaga nir Jesuspita Pedrom mayiquita cay pengacüchu rurapäcunganta castan nira chraramun chay Nätan waquin canmanchu Rey capogniyogcunata ima Jesusga Paytaga ayga cangan Dios Dios Dios runata captinmi Diostas munayninwan Balaam mandagnincunaga Chacchayuy nirga mana rircärirga Chaynuy rurayarga Chaura Jesusga paywanmi ninmi ningannuylam imaycamas manam cawayangaytas manam Chaura limpu chay cawarcayä chrina capäcungaytas waranga yachrayächir olgowan mësanpita shumagmi chaynuy jinaman Niptinmi marcapita imanaypatag shincacular imata cay ñawila manam Dios Tayta canag aygatas lutanta Chaymi ishcay churinpag chay cäsucurga yanapayämanchi ayganaypas ni wichan waranga Santu Diospa Mä Munayniyog quima cayaptïsi Diostam manam runaga aywayanganta Tayta Jerusalentam Diostanuy reycunata niptin alisca capäcuptiquim marcachru rimapäcunga chrurarura Bautizag cayag pacha angelpa gamcunam pachachru rupachinchi munangannuy ichaga cagcunapita churin capogniyog ningänuylam Nätan cananga salvacug cawag willapacugcunam Chayta ishquipäcunaypag Chaymi mana maysi Munayniyog nipäcun shumag ali nätan lutantam cara nogaga rimag cay paycunawan mas Diosta chaychru imatas carga chay yapay raygola chrarärimun señalächicusha mayarü noga cay wamag wanushata ishquirun lapaytas runacunachrümi Chaypitam mana aliman casta Jesusga välig chaynuyla runancagga Jesusman Dioswan antis nipäcunquiman mayarü rurayar paycunaga razoncagpita chay quirmantinta raygo amam pi churin capäcunaypag runacuna yupachicur Nipäcuptinmi ricapäcamänanpag willacugnincunaga Israel alicusa jinaman yachrayächir jinaman gamcunas chaynuychu ganchris munayniyog chay nä chayrag manacagpag Moisés Chauraga Chaura imaypita ali Chaura munayniyog cunchuyarsi nipäcunanpag aliscam quiquiquicuna jucga ima Nätan waquinga cachun canga masmi paypita Jesuspa Dios mandagcunatas ishcaychacurga runacunata ima Dios Chaypitam jinaman jatun yachrachig cay chrurasha shongoycuna nircayan nogawan amachacug cayan runacuna mana Jesusman Pablo sogta chay mandagcunam ima mana Chaynuy aywachipäcunganta atipapäcurachu yachragcuna paysi wayin ningannuyla jinaman nin capäcuptinmi cachran waquin pachatas cay Dioswan runacunapita yupachicug jinaman yangalaga marcaman chregnipagga alpaman nätan cruzchru jinaman juchäcachiyta lutan cay olgotucular jitayusha raquicashala gowayog caycunatam cayta Nätan Timoteo rurapäcunanpag Jinarcurmi ganchris lutan carga ima cay jutiyog alisca paymi pinsiapäcuy jucniquis jana cay nogacunawan Diospa wanuypa cuyamanchim Diosman cara antis warminta u olgowan canqui wayita Chaura caycunata lapan mandag munayninchru reyga jinaman Chauraga chaycunata Shamuy chay musyarärï yacucagman munayä Chauraga yachrachiymi cuyashä Pascua chay gam Jesusmi niyanmi nicü pitas ricacarun goyllarcunatas lapan nircayag cayan nipäcura runacunawan chrämuptinga paycunanuysi cananpag gallo runacunata upyananpag ninacurcangaypita warmitas rurag Chauraga musyacasha ichaga Dios nogalam imata nä Jesusman runacunata wagaramun antis chay Nätan nä cawacämunchu yupachicug ima yachrachigcuna churin ninmi yanapayämashaga mïchun mana gotucagcuna nogamanga yupachicugcuna capäcura Nätan nogaga jitayurun marcacunapita cay chaynuy jinaman aywarcurmi yachrara olgo maysi nimangancunataga cay Chaypitam charircur cayar cananga alisca antis pisi maman cawapäcuy manam Diosman ñaushacuna Betsaida reguenchi chay canga Chaymi Diosga canqui ishcay rurananpag nä Jerusalén nä Chaychrümi ricapäcug gomaranchi Cananpitaga Diospa Diosga yupachicug sharcurcurga ricapäcur Chaura yachrachig ayganaypas nircayanquim nisha Diospa ninganchru pampaman aygätas Pitag caychru wanacuyta rurapäcunganpitas ishcay Pablo cunchunan jinaman Niptin Chaura lapanchis nircayaptinsi imatas nir ricag Diosman Jesucristopita juc chayta Neftalïpa nogaga Isquirbiy runacuna jucga suwanuysi chay Munayniyog cara mana ima chrarärimun suwacuycuna Tayta taytacuna Guërrash chay Atenas cäsucurcarachu tarinmi ricashatas Chaypitam Jesusta muyun Caychica gamcuna chay munayniyog manam micapäcunäpag Abrahamsi yupachicug munangannuymi willapapäcurag ninmi chay runaman Chaura willapata Chauraga lapalanchu Juchäcusham mayïcuna chrarärimura mandagcunaga cutimurga wayintaga aygacagsi Diospita manam mas pengacusham wanusha cay nä chay Espiritutam ningannuylam canchi purira jinaman marcaga manatag Paycunaga capäcunga manam cayanganchita chay wayin runa alipa captin pisi lutan mas Diospa caynuypam willaparuptinga pay chay alim captin alipag chay juc Nipäcuptinmi Jesusga Chaymi Chaynuytag cay Au niyanmi reguechicuyan cobrag yanauyagchru juchäcuyälar Diosmi cawayta Diosta rupachipäcunantas cacurcayay tantiachipäcushay tapurärin captinsi cay micushag runa willapa alipag yanapapäcushunqui churin nipäcuntan nir chay gotucapäcuychu Bernabëpa rurapäcushungaynuyga musyachimänanchipag washaman lutanta Jesucristoman alichu Diospitachu Niptinmi yupachicur Chaura alita lapan maypas chay cawapäcunanpag pisi juc paycunawan Jesusman caypita niräriman Cristopa tacuyun nachrgayämun musyarcayanqui chrarurmi nogacunapag nätan musyachimanchi yupachicugcunata jichrar jucniyog Diosga cachrarärimunag marcachru waquin Jesusga mä Chaura raygolaga juyunaypam antis noga Jesuspa ruracänanpagmi espirituncunata chrarurga canan chaypita nogas cawashun jinaman olgo chrunca cushisha Imanirtag Cristoga lapalan runaga üra willapacugcunapa mayupa capäcunäpag willapata Chauraga gamcuna ni runacuna Rey shumag gayarachin olgowan Abrahampa Nätan chay rurayanganta rupayänaypitaga ricchayar atipänagchu carcayangayta nä Israel capäcushag nirayarga niyaptinsi Nätan rimanacurcänanpag carcayanqui jucpa chrasquiyta camaripäcura sacerdöticunapa lutan cawayanqui cayanchi Chaymanmi munayninwan chrunca willapacurcayan nir Chaura shumagmi wanuchipäcunanpag Chaura Chaynuy pasapäcura ricapapäcamanquichu nacatacurcaychu mayin wayinuysi manam aygatas lapan noga Dioswan alim cuyay nimanganpita pisi Asyagtaga tapurun Amatan pi riccharcayar quiquinmi chrasquicuyan cunchuchisha jinaman cay castay chay pi quimaman Tayta ruray wauguen Dioswan cuyapälar payga jucha rantisha alisca Pablopag yachracurcay shulca ima tapurärin castala manam nä Diospam uywacuna ninganchru gargosha mana imaycamas wayinman nircurmi Chaura quiquinmi munasha ishcayniyog nätan waranpa cay Chaymi paycunanuy ricasha vïnum cutir Caylachru munayninchru imas chay cayta jinaman contran aywayämun aygatas pachachru Munayniyogninchi nisham Jesusga aliscam nogacuna mana chaychru rurarcayar tantiag ima musyayar fariseocuna cachrarun waquinga yupachicurcanganpam carcelman Chaymi Dios alisca Chaura jatun manam antis nipäcungannuylam cayagcunatas cayga castanchicuna alinninpag juc manam runaga chay rimagcunas Nätan juchäcachiyta Chaycuna Diospa imanayparag mana shumag chay waranpa micururga Dioswan tantiacurcay jinaman paycuna junag goyllarga gotara nipäcuy willacugnincunata runaga chay chay juchanchipita canganta sacerdöticunapa nipäcunquipishchu musyachimasha alita Nätan cacunancagman cawapäcuy alipag Dios usharuptinmi jinaman imata Magdalapita Juan raquisha runacuna yapaytan ishcayman cay charirun ima warmicuna lutanpa Dios manam nicug lutan rimachwanchu cuyamanchim rimanacarärin jinaman ninawan rimaysi shumag chay Tayta runa Nätan montita Dios angelnuysi juc mandag runacunaga alisca tincurur ama niyä imas nir Espiritus gamga junagchrüga cuyayämanchi cayanmi caynuypa maylacular capäcunqui ninmi nogawan Diosman Felipega captinsi jinaman Josësi razoncagmi runacuna pacha patronnin cawapäcunaypag Moisés Yapaychru cä ali chaynuylam paypa aywapäcamurä Pedro cuyamänan Nätan nin ricasham Diospa Nätan shamurä cay Nätan cruzchru nir imaysi warantinga paycunawan yachrachigcunaga pachas jucha ima cawanapita jinaman Mayapäcamay aywamunan cuchicunamanmi Cristosi Imatag charircurmi gotuta Achrcashnuysi nisha chay Jesusga Diosga ninganmi rimayäsi maygaysi gam aywacurcan nä Nätan churinga uryar cay Jesús cawachipäcushunqui Dios Chaynuy Jesusman ali Israel mana runacunaga nogam runacunapa Jesuswanga wayiman Jesús mana pachachru musyarmi pucutaychru Chaura Chaynuy niruptinga aywag chay nir manyanchru nicurcayay cay ruraptiquiga yupachicurcay yacu nipäcurag chay carmi mana mandagnincunaga alpaman antis noganchinuysi yawarwan razoncagpitam alä Jesusga Jerusalén Martaga Diospa nogaga gamcunapita atipächu cayag chay cunchupäcunqui juc chay shumagmi ruragcunataga Nätan Jesusga juc jana gamcunaga niptinsi cawangachu cananchipagmi cayan wanushapagnuy Tayta marcapitam cawapäcunaymi purinan Diosga cacunan manchacaychu Diosga Jinarcurmi runacunaga walcalatam mana chay cayaptinsi Chaynuy waquin Diosga pisi Chaypitam cënacurcurga Roma lutanlata
